1.text: Ko e tohi hohoko ʻeni ʻo e tupuʻanga ʻo Si̇̄sū Kalaisi̇́, ʻa ia ko e hako ‘o Tēvita mo e hako ‘o ‘Ēpalahamé.
Ko ʻĒpalahame naʻe tupu mei ai ʻa ʻAisake, pea ko ʻAisake naʻe tupu mei ai ʻa Sēkope pea ko Sēkope naʻe tupu mei ai ʻa Siuta mo hono ngaahi tokouá.
Ko Siuta, naʻe tupu mei ai ʻa Fēlesi mo Sala, ʻa ia ko ʻena faʻeé ko Tema, pea ko Fēlesi̇ naʻe tupu mei ai ʻa Hesiloni, pea ko Hesiloni naʻe tupu mei ai ʻa ʻĀlame.
Pea tupu meia ʻĀlame ʻa ʻAminatape, pea tupu meia ʻAminatape ʻa Nāsoni, pea tupu meia Nāsoni ʻa Salemone.
Naʻe tupu meia Salemone ʻa Pōasi, ʻa ia ko ʻene faʻeé ʻa Lēhapi, pea tupu meia Pōasi ʻa ʻŌpeti, ʻa ia ko ʻene faʻeé ʻa Lute, pea tupu meia ʻŌpeti ʻa Sese.
Naʻe tupu leva meia Sese ʻa e Tuʻi ko Tēvitá, pea tupu meia Tēvita ʻa Solomone, ʻa ia ko ʻene faʻeé, ko e uaifi ʻo ʻŪlaiá.
Naʻe tupu meia Solomone ʻa Lehōpoame, pea tupu meia Lehōpoame ʻa ʻĒsafe, pea tupu meia ʻĒsafe ʻa ʻAsa.
Pea tupu meia ʻAsa ʻa Sihosafate, pea tupu meia Sihosafate ʻa Siolame pea tupu meia Siolame ʻa ʻŪsaia.
Pea tupu meia ʻŪsaia ʻa Siotame, pea tupu meia Siotame ʻa ‘Āhasi, pea tupu meia ʻĀhasi ʻa Hesekaia.
Pea tupu meia Hesekaia ʻa Manase, pea tupu meia Manase ʻa ʻĀmoni, pea tupu meia ʻĀmoni ʻa Sōsaia;
Pea tupu meia Sōsaia ʻa Sekonaia pea mo hono ngaahi tokouá, ko e kuonga ia ʻo e Takipōpula ki Pāpiloné.
Pea hili ʻa e Takipōpula ki Pāpiloné naʻe tupu leva meia Sekonaia ʻa Saletili, pea tupu meia Saletili ʻa Seluipēpeli.
Pea tupu meia Seluipēpeli ʻa ʻĀpaiuta, pea tupu meia ʻĀpaiuta ʻa ʻIlaiakimi, pea tupu meia ʻIlaiakimi ʻa ‘Āsoa.
Pea tupu meia ʻĀsoa ʻa Sātoki, pea tupu meia Sātoki ʻa ‘Ākimi pea tupu meia ʻĀkimi ʻa ‘Ilaiuti.
Pea tupu meia ʻIlaiuti ʻa ‘Eliesa, pea tupu meia ʻEliesa ʻa Mātani, pea tupu meia Mātani ʻa Sēkope.
Pea tupu meia Sēkope ʻa Siosifa, ‘a ia ko e husepāniti ‘o Melé ko e fa‘ē ‘a Si̇̄suú, ‘a ē ‘oku ui ko e Mi̇̄saiá.

Ko ia, ko e fakakātoa ʻo e toʻutangata meia ‘Ēpalahame kia Tēvitá, ko e toʻutangata ʻe hongofulu mā fā. Pea meia Tēvita ‘o aʻu ki he Takipōpula ki Pāpiloné ko e toʻutangata mo ia ʻe hongofulu mā fā. Pea mei he Takipōpula ki Pāpiloné ‘o aʻu ki he ‘alo‘i ‘o e Mi̇̄saiá, ko e toʻutangata mo ia foki ʻe hongofulu mā fā.

Pea ko hono ʻaloʻi ʻo Si̇̄sū Kalaisi̇́ naʻe anga pehē ni. Na‘e fakamaʻu ʻene faʻeé, ko Mele, ke mali mo e tangata ko Siosifá, ka ʻi he teʻeki ke fai ‘ena mali̇́, na‘e mahino kuo feitama ʻa Mele ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́.
Pea koeʻuhi̇̄ ko Siosifa, ʻa hono husepāniti̇́, ko e tangata faitotonu ia, na‘e ‘ikai te ne loto ke fakamaa‘i ‘a Mele ki he kakai̇́, ko ia naʻá ne fakakaukau ke tukuange fakafufū pē ia.

Kae lolotonga ʻa e kei fifili ‘a Siosifa ki he ngaahi meʻá ni, naʻá ne mamata ki ha ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ ‘oku tuʻu mai kiate ia, ʻi ha misi. Pea pehē mai ‘e he ‘āngeló ki ai, ‟‘E Siosifa, ‘oua te ke veiveiua ke maʻu ʻa Mele ko ho uaifi, he ko e tama ʻoku ʻiate iá, ʻoku mei he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́ ia.
Pea te ne fāʻeleʻi ha tama tangata, pea te ke fakahingoa ia ko Si̇̄sū, he ko ia ia te ne fakamoʻui hono kakai̇́ mei he‘enau ngaahi angahalá.”
Pea ʻoku hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē, ke fakamoʻoni ʻa e lau ʻa e folofola ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ ʻi he palōfitá, ʻo pehē:
Vakai, ʻE feitama ha tāupoʻou, pea te ne fā‘ele‘i ha tama tangata pea ‘e fakahingoa ia ko ‘Imānuela, ko hono ʻuhingá, ‟Ko e ‘Otuá ‘oku ‘iate kitautolu.”
Pea ‘āhake ai ‘a Siosifa mei heʻene mohé, ʻo ne fai ʻo fakatatau ki he tuʻutuʻuni ʻa e ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ pea ko ia, naʻá na mali mo Mele.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai te na feʻiloaki fakamali kinaua ‘o aʻu ki he ʻaloʻi ʻo e tamasiʻi̇́, peá ne fakahingoa ia, ko Si̇̄sū.

2.text: Pea naʻe ʻaloʻi ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he kolo ko Pētelihema ʻi Siuteá ʻi he kuonga ʻo e Tuʻi ko Hēlotá, pea tā naʻe aʻu hake ki Selusalema ha kau tangata poto mei he Hahaké;
Pea naʻa nau pehē: ‟Ko e fē ʻa e tama kuo ʻaloʻi ko e tuʻi ʻo e kakai Siú? He naʻa mau mamata ki hono fetuʻú ʻi Hahake, pea kuo mau omi ke mau punou ʻo hū kiate ia.”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ʻa e Tuʻi ko Hēlotá, naʻá ne hohaʻa ʻaupito, pea pehē foki ki Selusalema kātoa.
Peá ne ui kātoa mai ʻa e kau taulaʻeiki pulé mo e kau tangata ʻo e tohitapú, ʻo ne fakaʻekeʻeke kinautolu, pē ʻe ʻaloʻi koā ʻifē ʻa e Mīsaiá?
Pea naʻa nau talaange, ‟ʻI Pētelihema ʻi Siuteá” he kuo tohi ʻe he palōfitá:
‟He ko koe Pētelihema ʻi he vahefonua ʻo Siutá,
Pea toki ui fakafufū mai ʻe Hēlota ʻa e kau potó ʻo ne fakaʻekeʻeke kinautolu ke ne ʻilo ʻa e taimi totonu naʻe hā ai ʻa e fetuʻú.
Peá ne fekau atu kinautolu ki Pētelihema ʻo ne pehē: ‟Mou ō ʻo kumi fakalelei ki he tamasiʻi̇́ pea ka mou ka maʻu ia, pea mou fakahā mai kiate au, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke u ʻalu atu foki mo au, ʻo hū kiate ia.”

Pea kuo nau fanongo ki he folofola ʻa e Tuʻi̇́ pea nau ō leva pea ʻiloangē, ko e fetuʻu naʻa nau mamata ki ai ʻi Hahaké, naʻe ʻalu muʻomuʻa atu ʻiate kinautolu kaeʻoua ke ne aʻu ʻo tuʻu fakatatau hifo ki he feituʻu naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́.
Pea ʻi heʻenau mamata leva ki he tuʻu ʻa e fetuʻú, naʻa nau fiefia lahi ʻaupito, ʻaupito.

Pea naʻa nau hū atu ki he falé ʻo sio ki he tamasiʻi̇́ mo ʻene faʻeé ko Mele, pea nau tūʻulutui ʻo fai ʻenau hū kiate iá, pea nau toki ʻai hake ʻenau ngaahi tukuʻanga koloá, ʻo tuku atu ʻenau ngaahi meʻaʻofá, ko e koula, mo e laipeno, pea mo e mula.
Ka naʻe fakatokanga ʻe he ʻOtuá kiate kinautolu ʻi ha misi ke ʻoua te nau toe foki kia Hēlota, ka nau ʻalu ʻi ha hala kehe ʻo foki ai ki honau fonua ʻonautolú.

Pea hili ʻenau foki̇́, ʻiloangē ko ha ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ naʻe hāmai ʻi ha misi kia Siosifa ʻo ne pehē ange, ‟Tuʻu ʻo toʻo ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́ mo ʻene faʻeé pea mou hola ki ʻIsipite ʻo mou nofo ai kaeʻoua ke u toki fakahā atu kiate koe ke mou foki mai. He ʻoku teu kumi ‘e Hēlota ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́ ke tāmateʻi.”
Pea tuʻu ʻa Siosifa ʻo ne toʻo ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́ mo ʻene faʻeé ʻi he pō pē ko iā, ʻo nau hola ki ʻIsipite.
Pea naʻa nau nofo ai ʻo aʻu ki he pekia ʻa Hēlotá, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakamoʻoni ai ʻa e folofola ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ ʻi he palōfitá ʻo pehē: ‟Naʻá ku ui mai hoku fohá mei ʻIsipite.”

Ka ʻi he mahino leva kia Hēlota kuo lohiakiʻi ia ʻe he kau tangata poto mei hahaké, naʻá ne houhau lahi ʻaupito, ko ia naʻá ne tuʻutuʻuni ke tāmateʻi kotoa ʻa e tamaiki tangata taʻu ua ʻo fai hifo, ʻi Pētelihema mo e ngaahi feituʻu ko iā, ʻo fakatatau ki he meʻa naʻe talaange ʻe he kau tangata potó.
Ko ia naʻe toki fakamoʻoni ai ʻa e folofola naʻe fai ʻi he palōfita ko Selemaiá, ʻo pehē:
‟Kuo ongona ha leʻo mei Lama;
Pea hili ʻa e pekia ʻa Hēlotá, ʻiloangē ko ha ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ naʻá ne hāmai ʻi ha misi kia Siosifa ʻi ʻIsipite;
ʻo ne talaange, ‟Tuʻu ʻo toʻo ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́ mo ʻene faʻeé pea mou ō ki he fonua ko ‘Isileli̇́, he kuo mate ʻa e faʻahinga naʻa nau kumi ke tāmateʻi ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́.”
Pea tuʻu hake ʻa Siosifa ʻo ne toʻo ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́ mo ʻene faʻeé ʻo nau ʻalu atu ʻo hū ki he fonua ko ‘Isileli̇́.

Ka ʻi he fanongo leva ʻa Siosifa kuo Tuʻi ʻi Siutea ʻa ‘Akileosi ʻo fetongi ʻa Hēlota ko ʻene tamai̇́, naʻá ne manavahē he ʻalu ki ai̇́, pea naʻe fakatokanga ia ʻi ha misi ke ne ʻalu atu ki he ngaahi feituʻu ʻo Kāleli̇́.
Pea nau ō ʻo nofo ʻi he kolo naʻe ui, ko Nāsaleti, ko ia naʻe fakamoʻoni ai ʻa e folofola ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ ʻi he palōfitá, ʻo pehē: ‟ʻE ui ia ko ha Nāsaleti.”

3.text: Pea ʻi he taimi ko iá naʻe haʻu ʻa Sione Papitaiso ʻo kamata malanga holo ʻi he toafa ‘o Siuteá.
Pea naʻá ne pehē: ‟Mou tafoki ki he ‘Otuá. He kuo panaki ʻa e Pule‘anga ʻo Hēvani̇́.”
Ko Sione ia na‘e ʻuhinga ki ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfita ko ‘Aiseá:
Ko e teunga ‘o Sioné ko e kofu fulufulu‘i kāmeli naʻe haʻiʻaki hono kongalotó ha leta kili‘i manu. Pea ko ʻene me‘atokoni̇́ ko e he‘e mo e huhu‘a‘i hone vaó.
Pea na‘e toki omi kia Sione ʻa e kakai tokolahi mei Selusalemá, mo Siutea kātoa, mo e vahefonua kātoa ‘oku tafe atu ai a e vaitafe ko Soatani̇́.
Pea nau vete ‘enau ngaahi angahalá kae papitaiso kinautolu ‘e Sione ʻi he vaitafe ko Soatani̇́.

Ka ʻi he sio leva ‘a Sione kuo tokolahi ʻa e kau Fālesi mo e kau Sātusi ‘oku haʻu ke papitaiso ‘iate iá, na‘á ne pehē ange kiate kinautolu: ‟Hako‘i talangataʻa! Ko hai na‘á ne fale‘i kimoutolu ke mou hola mei he fakamaau ʻa e ‘Otuá ʻoku teu ke hokomai̇?
Kapau ko ia, pea mou fakahā kuo mou liʻaki mo‘oni ho‘omou ngaahi angahalá.
Pea ʻoua na‘á mou pehē, ‛Ko ‘Ēpalahame homau tupuʻangá,’ he ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘e lava noa pē ‘e he ‘Otuá ke fakatupu ha fānau kia ‘Ēpalahame mei he ngaahi maká ni.
Kuo ‘osi toʻo hake ʻa e toki̇́ ke ta‘angaʻaki ʻa e tefitoʻi ʻakau kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ikai fua lelei, ke laku ki he afi̇́.

Ko au ‘oku ou papitaiso vai kimoutolu ki he fakatomalá, ka ko e toko taha ‘oku muimui mai ‘iate aú, ‘oku mālohi ange ia ‘iate au, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te u taau ke vete hono senitoló. Ko e toko taha ko iá, te ne papitaiso kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́ mo e afi̇́.

Kuó ne ‘osi toʻo ʻene me‘a tata uité ke siviʻi ʻa e uité ʻaki ʻa e matangi̇́. ‘E ngangana ʻa e uité ki he faliki ‘o e ‘au‘au‘angá, pea tānaki ia ki he feleokó, ka ʻe vilingia ʻa e kafukafú. Pea te ne toki tānaki ʻa e kafukafú ‘o tutu ‘i ha afi ‘e ‘ikai ala tāmate‘i.”
Pea toki haʻu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei Kāleli ki he vaitafe ko Soatani̇́, ‘o ne kole kia Sione ke papitaiso ia.
Ka naʻe feinga ʻe Sione ke taʻofi ia, heʻene pehē: ‟Ko au na‘e totonu ke u ‘alu atu ‘o papitaiso ‘iate koé! Ko e hā kuó ke haʻu ai koe kiate aú?”
Pea talaange ‘e Sīsuú, ‟Tuku mu‘a ke fai pehē pē ʻi he taimi̇́ ni. He ‘oku taau mo kitaua ke fakahoko ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē kuo finangalo ki ai ʻa e ‘Otuá.” Pea toki loto leva ‘a Sione ki ai.

Pea kuo papitaiso ʻa Sisū, lolotonga ʻene kei ‘alu hake mei he vai̇́, naʻe fakaava hake ki ai ʻa e langi̇́, pea naʻá ne mamata ki he Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otuá ‘oku hā‘ele hifo ‘o hangē ko ha lupe, ‘o tuʻu ‘iate ia.
Pea na‘e ongo mai mo ha le‘o mei he langi̇́ ‘oku pehē mai; ‟Ko hoku ʻAlo ‘ofa‘angá ‘ena, ʻa ia ʻoku leleiʻia ai hoku lotó.”

4.text: Pea toki taki atu ‘e he Laumālié ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he toafá ke ʻahiʻahiʻi ai ia ‘e he tēvoló.
Pea hili ʻa e ‘aukai ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o ‘aho ‘e fāngofulu mo e pō ‘e fāngofulú, kuó ne fiekaia ‘aupito.
Pea haʻu ʻa e tēvoló ‘o talaange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otuá, pea ke lea ki he ngaahi fo‘i maká ni ke hoko ko e ngaahi foʻi mā.”
Kae tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Kuo tohi ʻi he Tohitapú, ‛‘Oku ‘ikai moʻui ha taha ‘i he maá pē, ka ko e ngaahi fo‘i folofola kotoa pē mei he fofonga ʻo e ‘Otuá.’ ”
Pea toe taki atu ‘e he tēvoló ‘a Si̇̄sū ki Selusalema ‘o ne fokotuʻu ia ‘i he tumutumu ‘o e Temipalé.

Pea ne pehē ange kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otuá peá ke hopo ki lalo. He kuo tohi ‘i he Tohitapú, ‛‘E tuʻutuʻuni ‘e he ‘Otuá ki heʻene kau ‘āngeló ʻa e me‘a ke nau fai kiate koé, pea te nau hapo koe na‘á lavea ho vaʻé ‘i he maká.’ ”
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Kuo tohi mo ʻeni foki ‘i he Tohitapú, ‛ʻOua te ke ʻahiʻahiʻi ‘a e ‘Eiki̇́ ko ho ‘Otuá!’ ”
Pea toe taki hake ‘e he tēvoló ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ha funga moʻunga mā‘olunga ‘aupito, ‘o ne faka‘ali‘ali ange ki ai, ‘a e ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa pē ‘o māmani̇́, mo honau fakaʻofoʻofá.
Peá ne toki pehē ange: ‟Ko e ngaahi me‘a kotoa ko ʻeni̇́ ‘e ‘atu ma‘au ‘okapau te ke tūʻulutui hifo ‘o lotu mai kiate au.”
Pea toki tala ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Mavahe meiate au Sētane! He kuo tohi ‘i he Tohitapú, ‘Ko e ‘Eiki̇́ ko ho ‘Otuá pē te ke lotu ki ai̇́, pea ko ia toko taha pē te ke fai ki ai hoʻo huú!’ ”
Pea toki tukuange leva ‘e he tēvoló ‘a Si̇̄sū, pea ʻiloange! Naʻe omi ʻa e kau ‘āngeló ‘o tauhi kiate ia.
Pea ʻi he fanongo ‘a Si̇̄sū kuo tuku pili̇̄sone ‘a Sioné, naʻá ne foki hake ki Kāleli.
Ko ia, na‘e ‘ikai ke ne toe nofo ‘i Nāsaleti, ka naʻá ne hiki ki Kāpaneume, ‘a ē ‘oku tuʻu ‘i he veʻe matātahi̇́ ‘i he vahefonua ʻo Sepulone mo Nafitalai̇́.
Pea na‘e fakamo‘oni ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfita ko ‘Aiseá:
‟ʻA e fonua ʻo Sepulone mo Nafitalai̇́,
Ko e kakai ʻoku nofo ʻi he fakapoʻuli,
Talu mei he taimi ko iá, mo e kamata malanga ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́: ‟Mou tafoki ki he ‘Otuá, he kuo vave ke hoko mai ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.”

Pea lolotonga ‘a e fononga atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i he matātahi ʻo e Tahi Kāleli̇́, na‘á ne fakatokanga‘i ha ongo tautehina, ko Saimone (na‘e ui ko Pitá) mo hono tokouá, ko ‘Anitelū, ‘okú na li̇̄ kupenga ʻi tahi, he ko e ongo tangata toutai kinaua.
Pea pehē ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua: ‟Mo muimui mai ke tau ō, pea te u ngaohi kimoua ko e ongo toutai tangata.”
Peá na tuku leva hona kupengá ka na muimui kinaua ʻia Si̇̄sū.

Pea toe tahataha atu ‘a Si̇̄sū peá ne toe fakatokanga‘i mo ha ongo tautehina, ko Sēmisi mo Sione hona hingoá, ‘oku fai ‘ena monomono kupenga mo ‘ena tangata‘eiki̇́ ‘i ha vaka. Ko e hingoa ‘o ‘ena tangata‘eiki̇́ ko Sēpeti. Pea ui kinaua ‘e Si̇̄sū.
Peá na tuku leva ‘ena tangata‘eiki̇́ mo e vaká, ka na muimui kinaua kia Si̇̄sū.

Pea ‘alu takai ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i Kāleli kātoa ‘o faiako ‘i honau ngaahi falelotú mo malanga‘i ‘a e ongoongo lelei ‘o e Pule‘angá. Peá ne fakamo‘ui ʻa e kakai na‘e mo‘ua ‘i he ngaahi mahaki̇́ mo e ngaahi faingataʻa kehekehe.

Pea mafola atu ai ‘a e ongoongo ‘o Si̇̄suú ki he feituʻu kotoa ‘o Si̇̄liá. Pea ko e kakai kotoa na‘e ‘i ai haʻanau alanga mahaki pē faingata‘ā‘ia; ko e ni‘ihi, kuo maʻu ‘e ha fanga tēvoló; ko e ni‘ihi, kuo ‘āveá. Pea ko e ni‘ihi na‘e mamateá, pea na‘e fakamo‘ui kotoa kinautolu ‘e Si̇̄sū.
Pea na‘e muimui fononga ‘ia Si̇̄sū ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi mei Kāleli, mo Tikapolisi, mo Selusalema; mei Siutea, pea mo Tu‘a-Soatani.

5.text: Pea ʻi he vakai ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he fuʻu kakai tokolahi̇́, naʻá ne ‘alu hake ki ha tafatafa mo‘ungá ‘o nofo hifo ai, pea ‘unu‘unu atu kiate ia ʻene kau akó.
Peá ne kamata akonekina kinautolu ʻo pehē:
‟ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ʻoku ongoʻi masiva honau laumālié he te nau maʻu ‘a e Pule‘anga ‘o e Langi̇́.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ʻoku tangi mamahi̇́ he ʻe fakafiemālie‘i kinautolu.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ʻoku anga-kātaki̇́ he ʻe ʻonautolu ʻa māmani.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ʻoku fiekaia mo fieinua ki he māʻoniʻoni̇́ he ʻe fakafonu kinautolu ai.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ‘oku faimanava‘ofá he ʻe faimanava‘ofa kiate kinautolu.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ‘oku lotoma‘á he te nau mamata ki he fofonga ʻo e ʻOtuá.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ‘oku fakatupu melinó he ʻe lau kinautolu ko e fānau ʻa e ʻOtuá.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ‘oku ngaohikovia koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e lotu moʻoni̇́ he ʻe ‘onautolu ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e Langi̇́.
ʻOku monūʻia ʻakimoutolu, ‘oka ngaohikovi‘i mo fakatanga‘i mo lau‘iʻaki ‘a e ngaahi kovi kehekehe koe‘uhi̇̄ ko au.
Mou fai fiefia mo loto māfana he ʻe lahi ange fau homou totongi ʻi he Langi̇́, he na‘e pehē tofu pē hono fakatanga‘i ‘o e kau palōfitá, ʻa ia naʻe ‘i mu‘a ‘iate kimoutolú.”

‟Ko kimoutolú ko e māsima ʻo māmani̇. Ka ʻokapau ‘e mole ʻa e konokona ‘o ha māsima, pea ‘e toe fakakonokona ʻaki ia ʻa e hā? Kuo ʻikai hano toe ‘aonga ki ha meʻa, ka ke laku pē ki tu‘a ke tāmoloki ‘e he kakai̇́.
Ko kimoutolú ko e maama ʻo māmani, ko ha kolo ‘oku tu‘u ‘i ha funga mo‘unga, ʻa ia ‘e ‘ikai lava ke puli.
‘E ‘ikai tutu ‘e ha taha ha maama peá ne fakafo‘ohifo ai ha puha. Ka te ne fokotu‘u atu ia ki ha tu‘unga maama ke maamangia kotoa ai ʻakinautolu ʻi loto falé.
Ke pehē foki ʻa e ulo atu ho‘omou maamá ki he kakai̇́, ke hā kiate kinautolu ho‘omou ngaahi ngāue lelei̇́, pea nau fakamālōʻia ai ho‘omou Tamai ʻoku ʻi hēvani̇́.”
‟‘Oua te mou fakakaukau ko ‘eku haʻú ke fakataʻeʻaongaʻi ʻa e lao ‘a Mōsesé mo e ngaahi tohi ʻa e kau palōfitá. Naʻe ʻikai te u haʻú ke fakataʻeʻaongaʻi, ka ke fakakakato hono ʻuhingá.
Ko e mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘e mole ʻa e langi̇́ mo māmani, ka ‘e ‘ikai lava ke mole mei he Tohitapú ha fo‘i kohi pē ha fo‘i fakaʻilonga ‘e taha, kae‘oua kuo fakahoko hono kotoa.

Ko ia, ʻilonga ha taha ‘e talangata‘a ki he fekau si‘i taha he ngaahi fekaú ni mo ne fakahinohino ʻa e kakai̇́ ke fai pehē: ‘e lau ia ko e si‘i taha ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́. Ka ʻilonga ha taha ʻe talangofua ki ai̇́ pea ne ako‘i ia ki he kakai̇́, ‘e lau ia koe ko e lahi ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.

He ʻoku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu, Kapau ‘e ‘ikai ke fakalaka atu ho‘omou māʻoniʻoni̇́ ‘i he māʻoniʻoni ʻa e kau faiako Tohitapú mo e kau Fālesi̇́, he‘ikai ‘aupito te mou lava ke hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e Langi̇́.”
‟Kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofolaʻaki ‘i he kuohili̇́, ʻo pehē, ‘Oua ‘e fakapō; ʻilonga ʻa ia ‘e fakapō, ‘e ‘ave ia ki he fakamaaú.

Ka ʻoku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu: ‘Ilonga ha taha ‘oku ‘ita ki hano kāinga ‘o ui ia ko e vale, ‘e ‘ave ia ke fakamaau‘i. Pea ‘ilonga ha taha te ne ui hano kāinga, ko e ʻatamai vale, ‘e li̇̄ ia ki he afi ʻi Heli̇́.
Kapau leva ‘oku teu ‘ave ha‘o me‘a‘ofa ʻo tuku ki he funga ‘ōlitá, peá ke toki manatu‘i hake ‘oku ‘ita hao kāinga ‘iate koe ‘i ha me‘a.
Tuku atu pē ho‘o me‘a‘ofá he ve‘e ‘ōlitá, ka ke ‘alu ‘o tomu‘a fakalelei mo ho kāingá, peá ke toki foki mai ‘o ‘oatu ho‘o me‘a‘ofá ki he ‘Otuá.

Kapau ‘e tukuaki‘i koe ‘e ha taha ki ha kovi, pea fei mo fakalelei mo ia he kei faingamālié. He ka faifai pea mo a‘u ki he fakamaaú, pea te ne tuku atu ‘e ia koe ki he kau polisi̇́ pea ‘e ‘ave koe ki he ‘api pōpulá.
Ko e moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala atú, Te ke nofo ai pē ‘i pili̇̄sone, kae‘oua kuó ke totongi kotoa ho mo‘uá.”
‟Kuo mou fanongo na‘e tala ʻo pehē, ‘Oua ‘e tono mali.
Ka ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu: Ka sio ʻe ha taha ki ha fefine ʻo holi kovi ki ai, kuó ne tonoʻi ia ‘i hono lotó.
Pea kapau kuó ke fai angahala he sio ho mata to‘omata‘ú, pea taʻaki ia ‘o li̇̄ʻaki. He ‘e sai ange ke mole hao kupu ‘e taha, ‘i hano li̇̄ kakato ho sinó ki Heli.
Pea kapau kuó ke fai angahala he ngāue ʻa ho nima to‘omata‘ú pea tu‘usi ia ‘o li̇ʻaki! He ‘e sai ange ke mole hao kupu ‘e taha, ‘i hano li̇̄ kakato ho sinó ki Heli.”
‟Pea kuo mou fanongo na‘e tala ʻo pehē, ‘Ka ai ha taha te ne fievete mo hono mali̇́, kuo pau ke ne ‘oange ha tohi vete mali.

Ka ʻoku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu: ‘Oua ‘e vete mo ho mali̇́, tukukehe ‘i ha‘ane fe‘auaki. Ka ke ka veteʻi ho mali̇́, ko ho‘o tuku atu ia ke tonoʻi ʻe ha taha. Peá ka ai ha taha ‘e toe mali mo ia, ko e tono fefine ia.”
‟Kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofolaʻaki ʻi muʻa ʻo pehē, ‛‘Oua ‘e fuakava loi, ka ke fai ‘i he ‘ao ʻo e ‘Eiki̇́ ʻa e ngaahi me‘a kuó ke fuakava ke fai̇́.’
Ka ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu: ‘Oua te mou fuakava ki ha me‘a ‘e taha! ‘Oua ‘e fuakava ki he langi̇́, he ko e ‘afio‘anga ia ‘o e ‘Otuá,
pē ko māmani, he ko hono tu‘ungava‘é ia. ‘Oua ‘e fuakava ‘i Selusalema, he ko e kolo ia ‘o e Tuʻi fakalevelevá.
‘Oua foki te ke fuakava ‘i ho ʻulú, he ‘oku ‘ikai te ke lava ke liliu hao tu‘oni lou‘ulu ‘e taha, ke hinehina pē ‘uli‘uli.
Ka ʻoka ke ka fai leva ha‘o lea, peá ke ‟‘Io” ʻi hoʻo ʻIo pea ke ‟‘Ikai” ʻi hoʻo ‟ʻIkai̇́.” He ka ke ka toe tānaki atu ki ai mo ha me‘a, ko e tupu ia mei he tēvoló.
‟Kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofolaʻaki ʻo pehē, ‛Ko e foʻimata ke totongi ʻaki pē ʻa e foʻimata, mo e foʻi nifo ʻaki pē ʻa e foʻi nifo.’
Ka ʻoku talaatu kiate kimoutolu ʻe au: ‘Oua ‘e sāuni ha kovi ‘oku fai mai kiate koe. Ka ʻoka sipi‘i ‘e ha taha ho kou‘ahe toʻomataʻú, peá ke tuku atu ki ai mo ho kou‘ahe toʻohemá.
Peá ka ‘ai ‘e ha taha ke mo hopo koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ho soté, ‘oange maʻana mo ho koté.
Peá ka ‘i ai ha taha te ne fekauʻi koe ke ke toʻo ʻene kavengá ‘i ha kilomita ‘e taha, peá ke toʻo ia ke kilomita ‘e ua.
Ka fai atu ha kole, peá ke tali. Pea ʻoua naʻá ke taʻetali ha kole nō paʻanga meiate koe.”
‟Kuo mou fanongo na‘e folofolaʻaki ʻo pehē, ‛‘Ofa ki ho kāingá, kae fehi‘a ki ho fili̇́.’
Ka ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu ʻe au: ‘Ofa ki homou ngaahi fili̇́, pea lotua ʻa e kakai ‘oku faikovi mai kiate kimoutolú;

Ka mou hangē ai ko ho‘omou Tamai fakahēvani̇́. He ‘okú ne finangalo ke hopo ʻene laʻā ki he kau faikovi̇́ mo e kau failelei̇́ fakatouʻosi, mo ne tuku ke tō ʻa e ‘uhá ki he kau faikovi̇́ mo e kau failelei̇́ foki.
He kapau ‘oku mou ‘ofa pē ki he kakai ‘oku ‘ofa kiate kimoutolú, ko e hā ha totongi ʻoku mou maʻu ai̇́? ʻIkai ʻoku fai pehē foki ʻa e kau tānaki tukuhaú?
Pea kapau ‘oku mou fakalea pē ki homou ngaahi kāingá, ko e hā ha meʻa oku mou lelei hake ai? ʻIkai ʻoku fai pehē mo e kau taʻelotú foki?
Ko ia, te mou haohaoa ʻakimoutolu, ‘o hangē foki ʻoku haohaoa ho‘omou Tamai ʻoku ʻi Langi̇́.”

6.text: ‟Kae tokanga ke ʻoua naʻa fai hoʻomou tōʻonga fakalotú ke fakahāhā ki he kakai̇́. He ka pehē, pea ‘e ‘ikai maʻu haʻamou totongi mei ho‘omou Tamai ʻoku ʻi he Langi̇́.

Ko ia, ʻoka ke ka fai ha‘o foaki, ‘oua ‘e ifi ha me‘alea ʻo hangē ko ia ‘oku fai ‘e he kau lotuloi̇́ he ngaahi falelotú mo e ngaahi toumuʻá, ke fakamālōʻia kinautolu ʻe he kakai̇́. Ko ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, kuo ʻosi maʻu kakato pē ai ʻenau totongi̇́.
Ka ʻoka fai haʻo foaki, pea vakai na‘á ʻilo ʻe ho nima toʻohemá ʻa e meʻa ʻoku fai ʻe ho nima toʻomataʻú.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakafufū pē ho‘o foaki̇́, pea ko ho‘o Tamai̇́ ʻa ia ʻokú ne ʻafioʻi ʻa e me‘a ‘oku fai ʻi he liló, te ne toki totongi kiate koe.”

‟Peá ka fai haʻamou lotu, pea ʻoua na‘a mou hangē ko e kau lotuloi̇́, he ‘oku nau manako he tuʻu ‘o lotu he ngaahi falelotú mo e ngaahi tuliki halá, ke hā ki he kakai̇́. Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ‘eni ‘oku ou tala atú, kuo maʻu kakato pē ai ʻenau totongi̇́.

Ka ko koe, ʻoka fai leva ha‘o lotu, peá ke hū ki ho loki̇́ ʻo tāpuni ʻa e matapā, pea toki fai ho‘o lotú ki ho‘o Tamai ‘oku ʻafio ʻi he liló. He ko hoʻo Tamai̇́, ‘okú ne ʻafioʻi ʻa e me‘a ʻoku fai ʻi he liló, te ne totongi kiate koe.
Pea ʻoka mou ka lotu, ʻoua te mou fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he kau taʻe‘ilo ‘Otuá. He ʻoku nau fakakaukau, ka lahi ‘enau valelaú pea ‘e ongo atu ki he ‘Otuá.
ʻOua na‘a mou fa‘ifa‘itaki kiate kinautolu, he ‘oku tomu‘a ʻafioʻi pē ‘e ho‘omou Tamai̇́ ʻa e me‘a ‘oku mou fiemaʻú, ki muʻa pea mou toki fai ha kole ki ai.
Ko ia ai, ko e lotu ʻeni ke mou fai̇́,”
Ke hoko mai ho Pule‘angá.
‘Omai mu‘a ha‘amau me‘atokoni ki he ‘ahó ni.
Pea fakamolemole‘i ‘emau ngaahi angahalá,
Pea ʻoua na‘á tuku ke mau mo‘ua ‘i ha ‘ahi‘ahi,
He kapau te mou fakamolemole‘i ʻakinautolu ʻoku faihala mai kiate kimoutolú, pea ‘e fakamolemole‘i kimoutolu foki ‘e ho‘omou Tamai fakalangi̇́.
Pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou fakamolemole‘i kinautolu, ‘e ‘ikai fakamolemole‘i kimoutolu ‘e ho‘omou Tamai̇́.”

‟Pea ka fai haʻamou ‘aukai pea vakai na‘a mou fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he kau lotuloi̇́ he ʻoku nau fakamatamata kovi ke fakahāhā ki he kakai̇́ ‘enau ʻaukai̇́. Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ko ʻenau totongi̇́ pē ia.
Ka ʻoka ke ka ‘aukai, pea te ke helu ho ʻulú mo tafitafi ho matá.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ʻoua ʻe fakatokanga‘i ‘e he kakai̇́ ho‘o ʻaukai̇́ pea ko hoʻo Tamai̇́, ʻa ē ʻokú ne ʻafioʻi ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ʻi he liló, te ne totongi kiate koe.”
‟ʻOua te mou tānaki koloa ‘i māmani he ʻoku kai ia ‘e he popó mo e ʻumeʻumeá, pea kaiha‘asi ‘e he kau kaihaʻá.
Ka mou tānaki koloa ki Langi, ʻa ē ‘oku ‘ikai lava ke kai ‘e he popó mo e ʻumeʻumeá, pē hae ʻe ha kau kaihaʻa, ʻo kaihaʻasi.
He ko e feituʻu ‘oku tānaki ai ho‘o koloá, ‘e tuku ai foki mo ho lotó.”
‟Ko ho matá ‘oku maamangia ai ho sinó. Ka sai ho‘o sió, pea ‘e maamangia kotoa ai pē ho sinó.
Ka ‘okapau ‘e ‘ikai sai ho‘o sió, pea ‘e fakapoʻuli kotoa ai mo ho sinó. Kapau leva ko e koto fakapoʻuli ʻa e maama ‘oku ‘i ho lotó, pea tā ko e fakapoʻulituʻu mo‘oni ‘oku ke ‘i ai̇́.”

‟He‘ikai lava ʻe ha taha ke fakaongoongo ki ha ongo pule ‘e ua, he kuo pau ke ne ‘ofa ki he taha kae fehi‘a ki he taha, pē te ne mamahi‘i ʻa e taha kae liʻaki ʻa e taha. He ‘ikai te mou lava ke ‘eiki ʻaki ʻa e ‘Otuá mo e Koloá fakatouʻosi.”

‟Ko ia ʻoku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu: ʻOua te mou hoha‘a ki ho‘omou mo‘ui fakasinó, ki ha me‘a ke mou kai, pē inu, pē ki ha mou vala. ʻIkai ‘oku mahuʻinga ange ʻa e moʻui̇́ ʻi he me‘akai̇́ mo e valá?

Mou vakai ange ki he fanga manupuna ʻo e ʻatā. ‘Oku ‘ikai te nau tōtaʻu pē ututaʻu pea ʻoku ‘ikai te nau tānaki me‘akai ki ha feleoko, ka ‘oku fafanga kinautolu ‘e ho‘omou Tamai fakalangi̇́. ‘Ikai ‘oku mou mahu‘inga ange ʻi he fanga manupuná?
Pea ko ho‘omou hohaʻá, he ‘e lava koā ke fakalōloa atu ai ho‘omou moʻui̇́?
Ko e hā koā ‘oku mou lotomo‘ua ai ki homou teungá? Vakai ange ki he tupu ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau kakalá ‘i he vaó. ʻOku ʻikai te nau tuitui hanau teunga.
Pea ko ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atu: Na‘á mo Solomone ʻi hono naunauʻiá, ʻe ʻikai ala fakatataua ia, ki he fakaʻofoʻofa ʻo ha taha ʻo e ngaahi ʻakau kakalá ni.

Kapau ʻoku fakateunga pehē ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e ʻakau kakala ‘o e vaó, ‘a ē ‘oku matala he ‘ahó ni kae mae ‘apongipongi ‘o tutu ‘i he tuʻunga vevé, pea huanoa ʻene fai teunga kimoutolu! Kuo pehē fau koā ʻa e vaivai ho‘omou tui̇́?
Ko ia, ʻoua te mou lotomoʻuá mo fa‘a lau ʻo pehē: ‛Ko e hā te tau kai? pē; Ko e hā te tau inu? pe; Ko e hā te tau teungaʻaki̇́?’
He ko e ngaahi me‘a ia ‘oku tuli ki ai ʻa e kau taʻetui ‘Otuá, ka ʻoku ʻafioʻi pē ‘e ho‘omou Tamai fakalangi̇́ ‘a hoʻomo fiemaʻu ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko iā.
Ka mou tomu‘a kumi ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá, pea mo ʻene māʻoniʻoni ʻaʻaná, pea ‘e ‘oatu kotoa foki ‘e he ‘Otuá mo e ngaahi me‘a ko iā maʻamoutolu.
Ko ia, ʻoua te mou loto mo‘ua koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ‘a pongipongi̇́, he ʻe tokanga‘i pē ia ʻe he ‘a pongipongi̇́. Ka ‘oku feʻunga pē ʻa e faingata‘a ‘o e ‘aho ni̇́, mo e ‘ahó ni.”

7.text: ‟‘Oua na‘á faifakamaau, telia naʻa fakamaauʻi mo kimoutolu foki.
He ko e fakamaau te ke fai ki he kakai kehé, ko ia pē ‘e fakamaau‘i ʻaki koé pea ko e me‘afua te ke fua‘aki̇́, ko ia pē ‘e fuaʻaki kiate koé.
Ko e hā ‘okú ke hoha‘a ai ki ha ki‘i me‘i ‘uli ʻi he kano‘imata ʻo ho kāingá, kae ‘ikai te ke tokanga‘i ʻa e fu‘u potuʻi ʻakaú ‘i ho kano‘imata ‘o‘oú?
‘Oku ou tumu ‘i ho‘o lava ke pehē ange ki ho kāingá, ‛Kau to‘o mu‘a ʻa e me‘i ‘uli ‘i ho kano‘imatá,’ ‘osi ange ko iā ‘oku ‘i ai ʻa e fu‘u potuʻi ʻakau ‘i ho kano‘i mata ‘o‘oú!
ʻA e lotuloi! Tomu‘a to‘o ʻa e fu‘u potuʻi ʻakaú mei ho kano‘imata ‘o‘oú, kae lava ke ke sio lelei, peá ke toki to‘o leva ʻa e me‘i ‘uli ʻoku ʻi he kano‘imata ʻo ho kāingá.

‘Oua ‘e laku ʻa e me‘a toputapú ki he fanga kuli̇i̇́, na‘á faifai pea nau tafoki hake ‘o ‘ohofi kimoutolu. ʻOua ‘e laku ho‘omou mata‘itofé ki he fanga puaká, na‘á faifai pea nau tāmolo ai ʻo nau toki tafoki mai ʻo tuli hae kimoutolu.”
‟Mou kole, pea ‘e foaki kiate kimoutolu. Mou kumi, pea te mou ‘ilo. Mou tukituki, pea ‘e fakaava atu.
He ko ia kotoa pē ‘oku kolé, ‘e foaki kiate ia ʻa e me‘a ‘okú ne fiema‘ú. Pea ko ia ‘e kumi̇́, te ne ma‘u ʻa e me‘a ‘okú ne kumi̇́. Pea ‘e fakaava ʻa e matapaá kiate ia ‘e tukituki̇́.
He ko hai ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e kole atu ha taha hoʻo fānaú ha foʻi mā peá ne ‘oange ki ai ha fo‘i maka?
Pē te ne kole atu ha mata‘i ika peá ne ‘oange ha ngata?
Kapau leva ʻoku ʻilo ʻekimoutolu, ʻa e faʻahinga kovi̇́, ke ‘ave me‘a lelei ma‘a ho‘omou fānaú, huanoa ho‘omou Tamai fakalangi̇́ ʻene fie foaki meʻalelei kiate kinautolu ʻoku kole kiate iá.
Ko ia, ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē, ko e me‘a ‘oku mou loto ke fai ‘e he kakai̇́ kiate kimoutolu, mou fai pehē foki kiate kinautolu. He ko e ʻuhinga ia ‘o e Lao ‘a Mōsesé mo e ngaahi Tohi ʻa e kau Palōfitá.”
‟Mou hū atu ʻi he matapā fāsi‘i̇́. He ʻoku fālahi̇ pea faingofua ʻa e hū atu he matapā, ʻoku iku ki he ‘auhá, pea ʻoku tokolahi ʻa e hū ai̇́.
Ka ko e matapā ‘oku fāsi‘i̇́ pea faingata‘a ʻa e hū ai̇́, ko e hala ia ki he mo‘ui̇́, pea ‘oku tokosi‘i pē ʻa e hū ai̇́.”
‟Mou tokanga‘i ʻa e kau palōfita loi̇́. He ‘oku nau haʻu kuo kofu tuʻa mai ʻaki ʻa e fōtungaʻi sipi, ka ko honau lotó ko e manu fekai̇ ‘atā.
Te mou ʻiloʻi pē kinautolu mei he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku nau fai̇́. He te mou toli kālepi koā pē toli fiki mei ha fuʻu vao talatala?
Pehē foki, ʻilonga ha ʻakau lelei̇, kuo pau ke fua lelei, ka ko e ʻakau kovi̇́, ʻoku fua kovi pē ia.
‘E ‘ikai ke fua kovi ha fu‘u ʻakau lelei, pea ‘e ‘ikai fua lelei ha fu‘u ʻakau kovi.
‘Ilonga ha fu‘u ʻakau ‘oku ‘ikai ke fua lelei̇́, pea ʻe tā ia ‘o laku ki he afi̇́.
Pehē foki, te mou ʻiloʻi pē ʻa e kau palōfita loi̇́ mei honau ngaahi fuá.”
‟‘E ‘ikai hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́ ‘akinautolu kotoa pē ‘oku nau fa‘a pehē mai kiate au, ‛‘Eiki ē! ‘Eiki ē!’ Kae ngata pē ʻiate ia ‘oku fai ʻa e finangalo ‘o ʻeku Tamai̇ ʻi he Langi̇́.
He ‘e pehē mai ‘e he tokolahi ‘i he ‘Aho Fakamāaú, ‘Eiki ē! ‘Eiki ē! Na‘á mau malangaʻaki ho huafá, pea ʻi ho huafá, naʻa mau kapusi tēvolo ai, pea mau fai ai foki ʻa e ngaahi mana lahi̇́.”
Ka te u toki tala mahino kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai pē te u ‘ilo ‘e au ʻakimoutolu. Mou ō meiate au, ‘akimoutolu ʻa e kau faikovi̇́!”
‟Ko ia, ka ai ha taha ‘e fanongo ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou lea‘aki̇́, pea naʻe ongongofua ki ai, ‘e tatau ia mo ha tufunga poto, na‘e fai ʻene langa falé ‘i ha funga maka.
Pea tō ʻa e ‘uhá, pea hake mai ʻa e vaitafé, pea angi mo e matangi̇́ ‘o faʻafaʻaki ʻi he fale ko iá, kae ‘ikai ke holo ia, he kuo langa ʻi he funga maká.
Ka ʻilonga ha taha ‘e fanongo ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou lea‘aki̇́ kae ‘ikai ke ongongofua ki ai, ‘e tatau ia mo ha tufunga vale na‘e langa fale ‘i he ‘one‘oné.
Pea tō ʻa e ʻuhilá, pea hake mai ʻa e vaitafé, pea angi mai mo e matangi̇́ ‘o faʻafaʻaki ki he falé, pea holo ia, ko e holo lahi moʻoni iá!”
Pea ‘osi ai ʻa e faiako ‘a Sīsūú kae fakatumutumu ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘i heʻene ngaahi fakahinohinó.
He naʻá ne faiako ʻo hangē ko ha taha maʻumafai lahi̇́, ‘o kehe ia mei he‘enau kau faiako ʻo e Lao ‘a Mōsesé.

8.text: Pea ʻi he ‘alu hifo ‘a Si̇̄sū mei he moʻungá, naʻe muimui atu kiate ia ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi.
Pea ‘iloangé naʻe ha‘u ha tangata kilia ‘o tū‘ulutui hifo ʻo ne kole atu: ‟‘Eiki, kapau ko ho finangaló ia, ʻoku ke lava fakamaʻa hoku kiliá.”
Pea ala ange ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he tangatá mo ne folofola, ‟ʻOku ou loto ki ai. Ke ke maʻa koe!” Pea naʻe ma‘a leva ʻa e kilia ‘o e tangatá.

Pea toe folofola ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟‘Oua te ke tala ki ha taha. Ka ke ‘alu pē ki he taula‘eiki̇́ ‘o fakahā ange kuó ke sai, pea ‘ave ʻa e me‘a‘ofa naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe Mōsesé, ke fakamoʻoni, kuo fakamaʻa koe.”
Pea kuo a‘u ‘a Si̇̄sū ki Kāpaneume, ‘iloangé kuo fakafetaulaki mai kiate ia ha ʻeikitau Loma, ‘o kole tokoni kiate ia
ʻo pehē: ‟‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘i ai si‘eku tamaio‘eiki ‘oku tokoto ‘i ‘api ʻoku puke ʻi he mamateá, pea ‘oku faingata‘ā‘ia lahi ‘aupito.”
Pea pehē ange ki ai ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Te u ‘alu atu ‘o fakamo‘ui ia.”
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e he ‘eikitau Lomá, ‟‘Oua ‘Eiki, he ko hoku falé ‘oku ‘ikai taau ia ke ke hū ki ai. Fai pē ha‘o folofola, pea ‘e mo‘ui ai ‘eku tamaio‘eiki̇́.
He ko aú, foki, ko e tangata ma‘u mafai. ‘Oku ‘i ai ‘eku kau sōtia ‘oku nau fakaongo kiate au. pea ʻ

Pea ofo ‘aupito ‘a Si̇̄sū ʻi he lea ‘a e ‘eikitau Lomá, peá ne pehē ange ki he kakai na‘e muimui mai̇́, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, kuo te‘eki te u fetaulaki mo ha taha, ‘i ‘Isileli̇́, kuo lahi pehē ʻene tui̇́.”
Pea ko eni ʻoku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘e omi ha tokolahi mei he hahaké mo e hihifó ‘o kai kātoanga fakataha mo ‘Ēpalahame mo ‘Aisake pea mo Sēkope ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.
Ka ko e kakai ‘oku lau ko e kakai totonu ‘o e pule‘angá, ‘e kapusi kinautolu ki he fakapo‘uli̇́ ʻi tuʻaʻā, ʻa ia te nau toki tangi ai mo feto‘eaki ʻi he mamahi̇́.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he ‘eikitaú, ‟Foki atu koe, he kuo fai kiate koe ʻo fakatatau ki ho‘o tui̇́.”
Pea kuo a‘u atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he ‘api ‘o Pitá, ʻo ne ʻilo ai ʻa e fa‘ē ‘o e mali ‘o Pitá, kuo tokoto, he kuo ne puke ʻi he mofi̇́.
Pea ala atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki hono nimá, pea mahu‘i leva meiate ia ‘a e mofi̇́, pea tu‘u hake leva ‘a e fefiné ‘o tauhi kiate ia.

Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó, kuo ‘omi ‘e he kakai̇́ kia Si̇̄sū ha tokolahi naʻe puke fakatēvolo, pea naʻá ne kapusi ʻa e fanga tēvoló, ‘aki pē ha‘ane folofola, pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e mahamahaki, na‘á ne fakamo‘ui.
Pea toki fakamo‘oni ai ‘a e lau ‘a e palōfita ko ‘Aiseá:
Pea ʻi he tokanga‘i ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘oku tokolahi ʻa e kakai̇, ʻoku ō mo iá, naʻá ne tuʻutuʻuni ke nau folau ki he kauvai ‘e taha ʻo e Tahi Kāleli̇́.
Pea naʻe fakafetaulaki mai kiate ia ha faiako ʻo e Laó, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki, neongo pē ko e fē ha feitu‘u te ke ‘alu ki ai, te u muimui kiate koe.”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai;, ‟Ko e fanga fōkisi̇́ ‘oku ‘i ai honau tafu, pea ko e fanga manupuná ‘oku ‘i ai honau pununga. Ka ko e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ‘oku ‘ikai hano mālōlō‘angá.”
Pea toe pehē ange ‘e ha taha ʻi he kau akó, ‟‘Eiki, tukumai mu‘a ke u tomu‘a ‘alu ‘o tanu ‘eku tangata‘eiki̇́.”
Ka naʻe tala ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟Ha‘u koe ʻo muimui kiate au, kae tuku ʻa e kau maté ke nau tanu ʻa e mate ʻanautolú!”
Pea heka vaka leva ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó.
Pea fakafokifā kuo tō ha fu‘u matangi ʻi he Tahi̇́, ‘o hake ʻa e ngaahi peaú ki he vaká, ka naʻe toka pē ‘a Si̇̄sū ia.
Pea haʻu ʻene kau akó ‘o fafangu ia mo nau kaila: ‟‘Eiki ē, Fakahaofi kitautolu, he te tau tuʻutāmaki!”

Ka naʻe folofola ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou manavahē ai̇́? Ko e hā ‘oku siʻi pehē ai ho‘omou tui̇́?” Pea toki malanga hake ia ‘o ne taʻofi ʻa e matangi̇́ mo e tahi̇́, pea naʻe nonga ka ko ha nonga.
Pea fakatumutumu ai ‘a e kau akó mo nau pehē: ‟Ko e tangata fēfē eni, he ʻoku talangofua kiate ia ʻa e matangi̇́ mo e tahi̇́?”

Pea ʻi he a‘u atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kauvai ʻe tahá, ko e feituʻu ia ‘o e kakai Kātalá, naʻe fakafetaulaki mai ha ongo tangata puke fakatēvolo, pea kuó na omi mei ʻi he ngaahi fa‘itoká. Ko e ongo tangata fakatuʻutāmaki ‘aupito, he na‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e lava ke fou atu he feituʻu naʻá na ʻi ai̇́.
Pea fakafokifā naʻá na kaila mai: ‟‘E Si̇̄sū, ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otuá! Ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘okú ke ha‘u ai ki heni̇́? ‘Ikai ko ho‘o ha‘ú ke faka‘auha kimaua, teʻeki ke hokosia hono taimi totonú?”
Pea feʻunga iá, ‘oku ‘i ai ha fanga puaka ‘oku nau huohua ofi mai kiate kinautolu.
Pea kole ange ‘e he fanga tēvoló kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Kapau te ke kapusi kimautolu, peá ke fekau mu‘a ke mau hū ʻi he fanga puaká.”

Pea fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou ʻalu,” pea nau matua mai ki tu‘a mei he ongo tangatá ‘o hū ʻi he fanga puaká, pea ‘oho hifo leva ‘a e fanga puaká ʻi he tahifohifó ‘o tūʻulu kotoa ki he Tahi̇́ ‘o nau melemo ai.
Pea feholaki leva ʻa e kau tauhi̇́, ʻo nau hū ki kolo ‘o talanoa ai ki he kakai̇́ ʻa e me‘a kuo hokó, kae tautautefito ki he me‘a na‘e hoko ki he ongo tangata naʻe puke fakatēvoló.
Pea ko eni, naʻe holo mai ‘a e kakai kotoa mei he koló ‘o fakafetaulaki kia Si̇̄sū, pea ʻi heʻenau mamata kiate iá, naʻa nau kole ange ke ne hiki mu‘a mei honau feitu‘ú.

9.text: Pea heka vaka ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o foki ki he kolo na‘á ne nofo ai̇́.

Pea ʻiloangé, naʻe fata mai kiate ia ‘e ha ni‘ihi, ha tangata mamatea, ʻokú ne tokoto ʻi ha mohenga. Pea ʻi he tokanga‘i ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‘a e mālohi ‘enau tui̇́, naʻá ne pehē ange ki he mamateá, ‟Tangata, fiemālie pē, he kuo fakamolemole‘i ho‘o ngaahi angahalá.”
Pea hoko ai ʻa e pehē loto pē ‘e he kau faiako ʻo e Lao ‘a Mōsesé na‘e ‘i ai̇́: ‟Tā ko e toki tangata fie ‘Otua ʻeni!”
Ka na‘e ʻafioʻi pē ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘a e anga ‘o ‘enau fakakaukaú, pea ne pehē ange kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou mahalo kovi ai̇́?
He ko fē ‘oku faingofua angé: Ko ‘eku pehē ange ki he mamateá ni, Kuo fakamolemole‘i ho‘o ngaahi angahalá, pē ko ‘eku pehē ange, Tu‘u ki ‘olunga ‘o ‘alu ki ‘api?

Ka te u ‘ai ke mahino ai leva kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku ma‘u mafai ‘a e Foha ‘o e Tangatá, ʻi māmani, ke ne fakamolemole angahala.” Pea folofola leva ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he tangata mamateá, ‟Tu‘u! Toʻo ho mohengá, peá ke ‘alu ki ho ‘api̇́.”
Pea tu‘u hake ai pē ʻa e tangatá ‘o ne ‘alu atu ki hono ‘api̇́.
Pea ʻi he sio ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́, naʻa nau manavahē; Pea naʻa nau fakamālō ki he ‘Otuá, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ‘ene foaki ha mafai lahi pehē ki he tangatá.

Pea laka atu mei ai ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o ne mamata ki ha tangata tānaki tukuhau ko Mātiu hono hingoá, ‘okú ne nofo mai ‘i hono ‘ōfisi̇́. Pea pehē ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ha‘u ʻo muimui kiate au.” Pea malanga hake leva ‘a Mātiu ‘o ne muimui atu kia Si̇̄sū.

Pea hoko ai ʻa e fai ‘e Mātiu ha fakaafe ‘i hono ‘api̇́ ma‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó, pea naʻe tokolahi ʻa e kaungā tānaki tukuhau ‘o Mātiú mo e kau angahala kehé, naʻe maʻumeʻatokoni fakataha mo Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó.
Ka ʻi he mamata ki ai ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́, naʻa nau ‘eke ange ki heʻene kau akó, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku maʻumeʻatokoni fakataha ai ho‘omou faiakó pea mo e kau tānaki tukuhaú mo e kau angahalá?”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ‘a Si̇̄suú, naʻá ne pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ko e kakai mo‘ui lelei̇́ ‘oku ‘aonga ki ai ʻa e tōketaá, ka ko e kakai mahamahaki̇́.

Ka mou feinga muʻa ke ‘ilo ʻa e ʻuhinga ‘o e potu Folofola ko ʻeni̇́: ‘Oku fiema‘u ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e faimanava‘ofá, ‘o ‘ikai ko e faifeilaulaú. Na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘ú ke ui ʻa e kau māʻoniʻoni̇́, ka ko e kau angahalá.”
Na‘e toki ha‘u ai kia Si̇̄sū ha kau ako ‘a Sione Papitaiso, ʻo nau ʻeke ange: ‟Ko e kau Fālesí mo kimautolu, ‘oku mau fa‘a ‘aukai, ka ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai teitei ‘aukai ai ʻa hoʻo kau akó?”

Pea fehu‘i ange ai ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻE nofo ‘aukai koā ha kau fakaafe ‘i ha kātoanga mali, lolotonga ʻoku kei ‘iate kinautolu ‘a e ‘eiki ta‘ané? Ka ‘e hoko mai pē ‘a e taimi ke ‘ave ai ʻa e ‘eiki ta‘ané meiate kinautolu, pea te nau toki ‘aukai leva ai.
‘Oku ‘ikai hanga ‘e ha taha ‘o monomono ha kofu motu‘a ʻaki ha konga tupenu fo‘ou, he kuo pau ke mingi ai ʻa e konga tupenu fo‘oú, ‘o toe lahi ange ai ʻa e mahae ʻa e kofú.

Pea ‘oku ‘ikai hanga ‘e ha taha ‘o ʻutu ha uaine fo‘ou ki ha hina leta motu‘a, he ‘e pā ʻa e hiná, ‘o mahua ai ʻa e uainé ʻo maumau. Ka kuo pau ke ʻutu ʻa e uaine fo‘oú ki ha hina leta fo‘ou, kae fakatou tolonga.”

Pea lolotonga ‘a e kei faiako ‘a Sīsūú, ʻiloangé kuo tō tūʻulutui mai kiate ia ha tangata, ko e taha ʻo e houʻeiki̇́, ʻo ne pehē ange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko si‘oku ‘ōfefiné kuo toki maté ni. Ka ke ʻalu ange mu‘a ‘o hilifaki ki ai ho nimá, pea ʻe toe mo‘ui ia.”
Pea tu‘u hake ai ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó ‘o nau ō mo e tangatá.
Pea feʻunga mo iá, na‘e ‘i ai ha fefine kuo ta‘u ‘e hongofulumāua ʻene puke ʻi he ‘autotó na‘e muimui atu ʻi he tu‘a ‘o Si̇̄suú ‘o ne ala ki he kapa hono kofú.
He kuó ne pehē ‘i hono lotó, ‟Kapau te u ala pē ā ki hono kofú, te u mo‘ui.”
Pea tafoki ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o hanga ki he fefiné, pea naʻe folofola ange: ‟Fiemālie pē, fefine! Kuo fakamo‘ui koe Koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ho‘o tui̇́.” Pea mo‘ui ai pē ‘a e fefiné mei he taimi ko iā.
Pea ʻi he a‘u atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he ‘api ‘o e houʻeiki̇́, naʻá ne tokangaʻi kuo ʻi ai ʻa e kau ifi fangufangú mo e kau tēngihiá, ʻoku nau longoaʻa holo ai.
Pea naʻe tala kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou ō ki tu‘a! ‘Oku ‘ikai ke mate ʻa e ki‘i ta‘ahiné, ka ʻoku mohe pē ia.” Pea naʻe manuki ʻa e kakai̇́ kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea hili hono tuku ki tu‘a ʻa e kakaí, pea hū atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he veʻe mohenga ‘o e ta‘ahiné, ʻo ne puke hono nimá ‘o ne fokotu‘u ia ki ‘olunga.
Pea mafola atu leva ai ‘a e ongoongo ‘o Sīsūú, ki he tapa kotoa pē ‘o e feituʻu ko iá.
Pea kuo ʻalu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei he feitu‘u ko iā, naʻe muimui atu kiate ia ha ongo tangata kui ʻo na kalanga ʻo pehē: ‟Siʻi ‘Alo ‘o Tēvita ē, ke ke ʻalo‘ofa mai kiate kimaua!”
Pea afe ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he ‘api ‘e taha, pea omi ‘a e ongo tangata kui̇́ ki ai, pea ʻeke ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua: ‟‘Okú mo tui koā te u lava ‘o fakaʻā homo matá?”
Pea ala atu leva ‘a Si̇̄sū ki hona matá mo ne folofola, ‟Ke fakaʻakimoua, ʻo fakatatau ki ho‘omo tui̇́.”
Pea ʻā ai ‘a e mata ‘o e ongo tangatá.
Ka naʻe ō ʻa e ongo tangatá ia ‘o ongoongoa atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kakai kotoa pē, ʻi he feitu‘u fonua ko iá.
Pea ʻi he fononga atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó, ʻiloangé kuo taki mai kiate ia ha tangata naʻe noa ka naʻe toe puke fakatēvolo foki.

Pea ʻi hono kapusi pē ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘a e tēvoló mei he tangatá, kuo kamata lea ia, ʻa ia naʻe noa. Na‘e ofo ‘aupito ai ʻa e kakai̇́, ‘o nau pehē: ‟Kuo te‘eki tu‘o taha ha hoko ha meʻa pehē ‘i ‘Isileli̇́!”
Ka na‘e pehē ‘e he kau Fālesí ia, ‟Ko e pule ‘o e fanga tēvoló ‘okú ne fakaivia ‘a Si̇̄sū ke kapusi tēvoló.”

Pea na‘e ‘a‘ahi holo ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he ngaahi kolo lalahi̇́ mo e ngaahi kolo iiki̇́ ‘o faiako ‘i honau ngaahi falelotú mo malanga‘aki ‘a e ongoongo lelei ‘o e Pule‘angá, pea naʻe fakamo‘ui ai ʻa e fa‘ahinga alanga mahaki kotoa pē mo e faʻahinga mahamahaki kotoa pē.

Pea ʻi heʻene mamata ki he tokolahi ʻa e fuʻu kakai̇́, naʻe langa hono mafú ʻi he ‘ofa kiate kinautolu, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e hēhētu‘u mo e vaivai ‘enau moʻui̇́, ʻo hangē ha fanga sipi ‘oku ‘ikai hanau tauhi̇́.
Pea toki folofola ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, ‟Kuo motu‘u ʻa e ta‘ú, ka ʻoku kaungatāmaki ʻa e kau ngāué.
Ko ia, mou lotu ki he ‘Eiki ‘oku ʻaʻana ʻa e ututaʻú, ke fekau ha kau ngāue, ke nau ō atu ‘o tānaki mai ʻa e fua ʻo ʻene ngoué.”

10.text: Pea ui ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau ako ‘e toko hongofulu mā uá ke nau fakatahataha mai. Pea naʻe tuku kiate kinautolu ʻa e mafai̇́ ke kapusi tēvolo mo fakamo‘ui ʻa e fa‘ahinga alanga mahaki mo e mahamahaki̇́ kotoa pē.

Ko ʻeni ʻa e kau ʻapositolo ‘e toko hongofulu mā uá: Ko e ʻuluaki̇́ ko Saimone, ‘a ē ‘oku ui ko Pitá, pea mo hono tokouá, ‘a ‘Anitelū. Ko Sēmisi mo hono tokouá, ‘a Sione, ko e ongo foha ia ‘o Sēpeti̇́;
Ko Filipe mo Pātolomiu, ko Tōmasi, ko Mātiu ‘a ē na‘e tānaki tukuhaú, ko Sēmisi ʻa e foha ‘o ‘Alefiusi̇́, mo Fataisa.
Ko Saimone (ʻa e Mamahi‘i Fonuá) pea mo Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ‘a ē na‘á ne lavaki‘i iá.
Ko ʻeni ia ʻa e toko hongofulumāua naʻe fekau atu mo e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu ʻo pehē:
Ka mou ō muʻa ki he fanga sipi kuo mole ʻi he kakai ‘Isileli̇́.
Pea ʻi hoʻomou ō mou malangaʻaki ʻo pehē: ‟Kuo panaki ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.”

Mou fakamo‘ui ʻa e kakai ‘oku mahakiʻiá, pea fokotu‘u ʻa e kakai kuo maté. Mou fakamaʻa ʻa e kiliá, mo kapusi tēvolo. ‘Oua te mou ‘ai ke totongi ‘e he kakai̇́ ho‘omou ngāue ‘oku fai kiate kinautolú, he na‘e foaki atu maʻamoutolu ʻa e moʻui̇́, kae ‘ikai ‘eke atu ha totongi.
‟Vakai na‘á mou fa‘o kato ha pa‘anga koula, pē siliva, pē ko ha pa‘anga kapa.
Pea vakai na‘á mou ō mo ha kato meʻakai ki he fonongá, pē ko ha sote, pē sū ‘e ua, pē ko ha tokotoko, he ko e tangata ngāué, ‘oku taau ke tauhi ‘e he kakai̇́.
Pea ka mou ka a‘u leva ki ha kolo lahi, pē ha kolo si‘isi‘i, pea mou kumi ha ‘api ‘e talitali lelei ai kimoutolu, ʻo mou nofo ai kae‘oua kuo mou hiki mei he kolo ko iá.
Peá ka mou ka hū ki ha ‘api, pea mou tuku ha tāpuaki ma‘a e ‘api ko iá.
Ka talitali lelei kimoutolu ‘e he ‘api ko iá, pea tuku ke nofo ai mo kinautolu ho‘omou tāpuaki̇́, pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai te nau talitali lelei kimoutolu, pea mou toe ō pē mo ho‘omou tāpuaki̇́.
Peá ka ‘i ai ha taha ‘e ‘ikai te ne tali kimoutolu pē tokanga ki hoʻomou malangá, pea mou hiki mei he ‘api ko iá, pē ko e kolo ko iá. Tūtuu‘i ʻa e efu ‘o e feitu‘u ko iá mei homou vaʻé.
He ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘e ma‘ama‘a ange ʻa e tautea ʻo e kakai ‘o Sōtoma mo Komolá, ʻi he ʻAho Fakamaaú, ‘i he tautea ‘e fai ki he kakai ko iá.”
‟Pea ko ʻeni ʻoku ou fekau ke mou ō atu ʻo mou hangē ko ha fanga sipi̇ ʻi he lotolotonga ‘o ha fanga ulofi̇. Ko ia ai, ‘ai ke mou olopoto ‘o hangē ko ha ngata, mo angamalū ‘o hangē ko ha lupe.
Ka mou tokanga, he ‘e feinga ha ni‘ihi ke puke kimoutolu ‘o taki ki honau ngaahi fale fakatahaʻangá mo honau ngaahi falelotú, ke tāaʻi ai kimoutolu.
Pea ʻe taki atu foki kimoutolu ki ha kau pule mo ha ngaahi Tuʻi koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, ke mou hoko ko ha fakamo‘oni kiate au ‘i honau lotolotongá pea ki he kakai Senitailé foki.
Peá ka fakamāau‘i kimoutolu, pea ‘oua te mou loto hoha‘a pē ko e hā ha lea te mou fai, pē ‘e anga fēfē. He ka toki hokosia ia, pea ‘e fakahā atu leva kiate kimoutolu ʻa e lea ke faí.
He ʻoku ‘ikai ko kimoutolu ‘e lea ai̇́, ka ko e Laumālie ‘o ho‘omou Tamai̇́, te ne lea ‘iate kimoutolu.
Pea ʻe fakaʻilo ‘e ha taha hano tokoua ke tāmate‘i, mo ha tamai hano foha pē ko hano ‘ōfefine ke tāmate‘i̇́. Pea ‘e fakafepaki ha fānau ki he‘enau mātu‘á, ‘o ‘ai ke tāmate‘i kinautolu.
Pea tuʻunga ‘i hoku hingoá, ‘e fehi‘a ʻa e kakai̇́ kotoa kiate kimoutolu. Ka ko ia ‘e kātaki ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘angá, ‘e fakamoʻui ia.

Peá ka ngaohikovi‘i kimoutolu ‘i ha kolo, pea mou hiki atu ki ha kolo ‘e taha. He ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘e te‘eki ke ‘osi ʻa e ngaahi kolo kotoa ‘o ‘Isileli̇́ ‘i ho‘omou ‘a‘ahi ki ai, kuo a‘u mai ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá.
‘Oku ‘ikai ha tama ako ‘e tuʻunga mā‘olunga hake ‘i heʻene faiakó, pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha tamaioʻeiki ‘e tuʻunga mā‘olunga hake ‘i hono pulé.

‘Oku taau mo ha tama ako ke fiemālie ‘okapau ‘e tuʻunga tatau mo ʻene faiakó, pea fiemālie ha tamaioʻeiki ‘okapau ‘e tuʻunga tatau mo hono pulé. Kapau kuo ui ‘e ha ni‘ihi ʻa e ʻulu ‘o e fāmili̇́ ko Sētane, pea huanoa ha‘anau laukovi ʻe fai, ki he toenga ‘o e fāmili̇́.”
‟Ko ia, ʻoua ‘e manavahē ki ha taha ʻi he kakai ko iá. He ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘e fufūu‘i ka kuo pau ke fakahāa‘i. Ko e me‘a fakapulipuli kotoa pē kuo pau ke ‘ilo ki ai.
Ko e me‘a ‘oku ou tala poʻuli atu kiate kimoutolú, mou tala ho‘atā atu ia. Ko e me‘a kotoa ‘oku ou fanafanahi atú, mou kailangaki‘i atu ia mei he ngaahi funga falé.

Pea ʻoua te mou manavahē ki he fa‘ahinga, te nau lava ‘o tāmateʻi homou sinó pē, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau lava ‘o tāmate‘i homou laumālié, ka mou manavahē kimoutolu ki he ‘Otuá, ʻa ē ʻokú ne lava ke faka‘auha fakatou‘osi homou sinó mo homou laumālié, ‘i Heli.
‘Ikai ‘oku mahu‘inga tatau ha ongo ki‘i fo‘i manupuna mo ha sēniti ‘e taha? Ka ʻoka tō ha ki‘i fo‘i manupuna ‘e taha ki he kelekelé, ‘oku ʻafioʻi pē ia ‘e ho‘omou Tamai̇́.
Pea na‘á mo hoʻomou tu‘oni louʻulú tāutaha, kuó ne ‘osi lau fakalāutelau mo ia.
Ko ia, ‘oua te mou manavahē. He ‘oku mou mahu‘inga ange kimoutolu ki he ‘Otuá ‘i ha fanga ki‘i manupuna tokolahi!”
‟Pea ko ia kotoa pē te ne fakahā ʻi he haʻohaʻonga ʻo e kakai̇́ ʻene kau mo aú, te u fakahā foki ʻe au ki he‘eku Tamai ʻi Hēvani̇́ ʻeku kau mo iá.
Pea ko ia kotoa pē te ne faka‘ikai‘i au ʻi he haʻohaʻonga ʻo e kakai̇́, te u fakahā foki ki he‘eku Tamai ʻi hēvani̇́, ‘oku ‘ikai te u kau mo ia.”
‟‘Oua te mou fakakaukau ko ‘eku ha‘ú ke fakamelino ‘a māmani. Na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u au ke fakamelino, ka ke fakaheletā.
He ko ‘eku ha‘ú ke iku ʻo fehangahangai ai ha foha mo ʻene tamai̇́, ha ʻōfefine mo ʻene fa‘eé, ha fefine mali mo e fa‘ē ‘a hono mali̇́.
Pea ko e fili lahi tahá ʻo ha tangata, ʻakinautolu pē ʻoku nofo mo ia ʻi hono ʻapi̇́.
Ko ia ‘oku lahi ange ʻene ‘ofa ki heʻene tamai̇́ mo ʻene fa‘eé, pē ko hono fohá, pē ‘ōfefiné, ‘i heʻene ‘ofa kiate aú, ‘oku ‘ikai taau ia ke kau mo au.
Pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ne loto ke fua hono kolosi̇́ ‘o muimui mai kiate aú, ‘oku ‘ikai ke taau ia ke kau mo au.
ʻIlonga ha taha te ne feinga ke maʻu ʻene moʻui̇́, kuo pau ke mole ia. Pea ʻilonga ha taha te ne tuku ke mole ʻene moʻui̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, te ne toki ma‘u ai ʻene moʻui̇́.”
‟Ka talitali ‘e ha taha ʻakimoutolú, ko ʻene talitali ia aú, peá ka talitali ‘e ha taha au, ko ʻene talitali ai pē ia ʻa e toko taha na‘á ne fekau ke u ha‘ú.

ʻIlonga ha taha te ne talitali ha palōfita koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e palōfita ia, kuo pau ke fakapale‘i ʻaki ia ha totongi fakapalōfita. Pea ko ia te ne talitali ha taha māʻoniʻoni koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻene māʻoniʻoni̇́, kuo pau ke fakapale‘i ia ʻaki ʻa e totongi ʻa e māʻoniʻoni̇́.

Pea ʻilonga ‘a ia te ne ‘oange ha ipu vai momoko ki ha taha ʻi he‘eku kau ako ta‘etokangaekina tahá koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻene muimui ‘iate aú, ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito mole ʻene totongi̇ ʻaʻaná.”

11.text: Pea hili hono fakahinohino ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene toko hongofulu mā uá, naʻá ne hiki atu mei ai ‘o faiako mo malanga ‘i honau ngaahi kolo ofi mai̇́.
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei nofo pili̇̄sone ‘a Sione Papitaisó, na‘á ne fanongo talanoa ʻi he ngaahi me‘a ‘a Kalaisi kuo fai̇́, ko ia naʻá ne fekau ʻene kau akó ke nau ō kia Si̇̄sū;
‘O fehu‘i ange kiate ia: ‟Ko koe koā ʻa e toko taha ‘oku mau tatali ki ai̇́, pē te mau toe ʻamanaki ki ha taha kehe?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Mou foki ‘o tala kia Sione ʻa e me‘a kuo mou fanongo mo mamata ki ai̇́;
‘A e ʻā ʻa e kui̇́: ʻa e lava ʻa e heké ‘o ‘alu: ʻa e fakama‘a ‘o e kau kiliá: ʻa e fanongo ʻa e kau tuli̇́: ʻa e fakamoʻui ʻo e kau maté, mo hono malangaʻaki ‘o e ongoongo lelei̇́ ki he kau masivá.
Pea ʻoku monūʻia ʻa e kakai ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fehi‘a kiate aú koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ‘eku ngaahi me‘a ‘oku fai̇́.”
Pea ʻi he foki atu ʻa e kau ako ‘a Sioné, na‘e lea ange ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́ ‘o kau kia Sione:
Ko hai na‘á mou ō ke vakai̇́? Ko ha tangata teunga nāunauʻia? ‘Ikai! He ko e kakai ‘oku nau teunga pehēé, ‘oku nau nofo palasi kinautolu.

Ka ko e hā koā ia na‘á mou ō ko hono vakai̇́? Ko ha palōfita? ʻio! Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ko e tangata na‘á mou mamata ki ai̇́, ‘oku tuʻunga mā‘olunga ange ia ‘i ha palōfita.
He ko ʻeni ʻa e lau ʻa e Tohitapú kia Sioné: ‟Vakai, ʻe mu‘omu‘a ‘iate koe ‘eku talafekaú ke teuteu ho halá.”

Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ‘oku tuʻunga mā‘olunga ange ‘a Sione Papitaiso ‘i ha toe tangata kuo fanau‘i ‘i māmani. Ka neongo ia, ko ia ‘oku tuʻunga māʻulalo taha ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́, ‘oku mā‘olunga ange ia ‘ia Sione.
Talu mei he taimi ʻo Sione Papitaisó ‘o a‘u mai ki he ‘ahó ni mo hono tau‘i ʻo e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́, ko e feinga ʻa ha kau tangata ke ma‘u fakamālohi ia.
He na‘e kikite‘i ʻi he ngaahi tohi ʻa e kau palōfitá mo e Lao ‘a Mōsesé ʻa e me‘a kātoa ‘e hokó ‘o a‘u mai kia Sione.
Pea kapau ‘oku mou tali ʻa e ngaahi kikite ko iá, ko ‘Ilaisiā ‘a Sione, ko e palōfita kuo fuoloa ho‘omou fakaʻamu ke hoko mai̇́.
Ko kimoutolu ‘oku telingá, mou fanongoʻaki.
Pea ʻe fakatatau ki he hā ʻa e kakai ʻo e toʻutangata ko ʻeni̇́? Ko kimoutolu kuo mou hangē ha longa‘i fānau ‘oku fakavā mo fekālanga‘i ‘i hala pule‘angá;
‟Na‘á mau tā fasi tau‘olunga atu,
He na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sione, ko e tangata ‘oku ‘ikai ke fa‘a kai pē fa‘a inu, pea mou lau, ‟‘Okú ne puke fakatēvolo.”

Kae ha‘u ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ia ‘o kai mo inu mo kimoutolu, pea mou tala leva ‘e kimoutolu, ‟Ko e tangata fa‘a kai mo fa‘a konā, pea ko e kaungāme‘a ‘o e kau tānaki tukuhaú mo e kau angahalá!” Kaekehe, kuo pau ke fakatonuhia‘i ʻa e poto ‘o e ‘Otuá, ‘i heʻene ngaahi ngāue ‘oku fai̇́.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke fie tafoki ki he ‘Otuá ʻa e ngaahi kolo na‘e fai ai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene ngaahi mana lalahi̇́, pea mamahi ai ʻa e loto ‘o Si̇̄sūú ‘o ne valokiʻi kinautolu:

‟Tokanga‘i koe Kolesini! Tokanga‘i koe Petesaita! He ka naʻe fai ‘i Taia mo Saitoni ʻa e ngaahi mana na‘e fai ‘iate kimouá, kuo fuoloa ‘ena ‘ai tauangaʻa mo fakaefuefu, ke fakahaa‘i ʻaki ‘ena tafoki̇́.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ka hoko mai ʻa e ‘Aho Fakamaaú, pea ‘e faka‘atu‘i ange ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e kakai ‘o Taia mo Saitoni̇́ ‘iate kimoua!

Pea ko koe, ‘e Kāpaneume, ko ho‘o holi̇́ koā ke ‘ohake koe ki langi? Ka ko ʻeni ʻe li̇̄ hifo koe ki heli! He kapau na‘e fai ‘i Sōtoma ʻa e ngaahi mana na‘e fai ‘iate koé, na‘e tolonga mai ʻa e kolo ko ia ‘o a‘u ki he ‘ahó ni.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ka hoko mai ʻa e ‘Aho Fakamāaú, pea ‘e faka‘atu‘i ange ‘e he ‘Otuá ‘a Sōtoma ‘iate koe!”

Pea toki fai ai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene lotu, ʻi he taimi ko iāa: ‟‘E Tamai, ko e ‘Eiki koe ‘o hēvani mo māmani. ‘Oku ou fakafeta‘i atu, koeʻuhi̇̄ he kuó ke fakahā ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni ki he kainanga ‘o e fonuá, kae fufūu‘i mei he kau poto mo ‘ilo‘iló.
ʻIo, ʻe Tamai, ko ho finangaló pē ia ke pehē.”

Pea toe pehē ‘e Sīsū, ‟Kuo tuku mai ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́ ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē. Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne ‘ilo ʻa e ʻAló, ka ko e Tamai̇́ pe. Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne ‘ilo ʻa e Tamai̇́, ka ko e ʻAló pē pea mo kinautolu kuo fili ‘e he ʻAló ke fakahā ange ia ki ai̇́.
Mou omi kiate au ‘akimoutolu kotoa pē kuo ongosia mo mafasia ʻi he ngaahi kavenga mamafa ‘oku mou fuá, pea te mou ma‘u ha mālōlō meiate au.
Mou fua ʻa e kavenga ‘oku ou loto ke mou fuá, pea mo ako ‘iate au, he ‘oku ou angamalū mo angafaka‘atu‘i.
Pea ko e kavenga te u hilifaki atu kiate kimoutolú, he‘ikai te mou ongosia ai, he ko ‘eku kavengá ‘oku ma‘ama‘a.”

12.text: Pea ʻikai loko fuoloa mei ai, naʻe fou atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ‘i ha ngoue‘anga uite, ʻi ha ʻaho Sāpate. Pea kuo fiekaia ʻene kau akó, ‘o nau hanga ʻo kamata toli ʻa e uité ‘o kai.
Ka ʻi he sio ki ai ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́, naʻa nau pehē ange kia Sīsū: ‟Ko e hā ‘oku toli uite ai ho‘o kau akó he Sāpaté? Ko e me‘a ia ‘oku tapu ʻi he Laó!”
Pea tali ‘e Sīsū: ‟Kuo teʻeki koā ke mou lau ʻi he Tohitapú ʻa e talanoa ki he me‘a na‘e fai ‘e Tēvita mo ʻene kau tangatá, ‘i he‘enau fiekaia?
ʻA ʻenau hū ki he fale ‘o e ‘Otuá ‘o kai ʻa e maá, ʻa ia ko e kau taulaʻeiki̇́ pē na‘e ngofua ke nau kai̇́.

Pea kuo te‘eki koā ke mou lau hifo he kupu‘i Folofola ko ʻeni̇́ ʻi he Lao ‘a Mōsesé: ‘Oku maumau‘i ‘e he kau taulaʻeiki̇ ʻo e Temipalé ʻa e Lao ʻo e Sāpaté, ‘i he Sāpate kotoa pē, ka ‘oku ‘ikai fakahala‘i kinautolu ‘e ha taha?
Pea ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘oku ‘i heni ha meʻa ‘oku toe makehe ange ia ‘i he Temipalé.
He kapau naʻe mahino kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ʻuhinga ʻo e leá, ‛Ko e ‘ofá ‘oku ou fiema‘u, ‘o ‘ikai ko e feilaulaú’ pehē na‘e ‘ikai te mou fakahalaia‘i ʻa e kau tonuhia ko eni̇́.
He ko e Foha ‘o e Tangatá, ko e ‘Eiki ia ‘o e Sāpaté.”
Pea ‘alu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei ai ‘o hū ki ha falelotu ‘o e kakai Siú;

Pea kuo nofo mai ai ha tangata nima mamatea. Pea ʻeke ange ‘e ha niʻihi ʻi ai kia Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku ngofua koā he Laó ke fai ha faito‘o ‘i he ‘aho Sāpaté?” He naʻa nau kumi ki ha ʻuhinga, ke tukuakiʻi ai ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ha kovi.
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ka ‘i ai ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e tō ha‘ane sipi ki ha luo ʻi he ‘aho Sāpaté, ‘ikai te ne feinga‘i hake ia?
ʻOku mahu‘inga ange ʻa e tangatá he sipi̇́! Pea ko ia, ‘oku fakangofua ai ʻi he Laó ke tau fai ha lelei ʻi he Sāpaté.”
Pea folofola leva ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he tangata nima mamateá: ‟Fakahangatonu atu ho nimá.” Peá ne ‘ai atu hono nimá, pea tā kuo mo‘ui ia, ‘o tatau matematē mo hono nima ‘e tahá.
Pea mātuku atu ai ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ ‘o kamata faʻufaʻu ha founga ke nau tāmate‘i ai ‘a Si̇̄sū.

Pea ʻi he meaʻi leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e faʻufaʻu ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ ke tāmate‘i iá, naʻá ne ‘alu mei he feitu‘u ko ia. Pea kuo muimui kiate ia ʻi ai ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi, pea naʻá ne fakamoʻui honau kau mahakiʻiá;
Pea naʻe fekau ke ‘oua te nau tala ki ha taha ʻene ngaahi me‘a kuo fai̇́;
Pea naʻe fakamoʻoniʻi ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfita ko ‘Aiseá, ʻo pehē:
‟Ko ʻeni ia ʻa e sevāniti kuo u fili̇́.
He‘ikai fakakikihi mo kaikaila,
He‘ikai te ne fesiʻi ha vaʻa kofe kuo mapelu,
Pea ʻoku tuʻu ʻi hono huafá ʻa e ʻamanaki ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.”
Pea naʻe toki ‘omi kia Si̇̄sū ha tangata puke fakatēvolo ʻa ia na‘e toe kui mo noa, pea na‘e fakamo‘ui ia ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‘o ne lea mo ʻā.
Pea ofo kotoa ai ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘o nau pehē: ‟Ko e ‘Alo nai ʻeni ‘o Tēvitá?”
Pea fanongo ai ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ ʻo nau pehē: ‟Ko e kapusi tēvolo ‘a Sīsūú ‘oku faiʻaki e ivi ‘o e Pule ʻo e fanga tēvoló!”
Pea ‘ilo ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘enau fakakaukaú, pea naʻe pehē: ‟ʻIlonga ha fonua ‘e nofo fetuʻusi, ‘e ‘auha. ʻIlonga ha kolo pē ko ha fāmili ‘e vāvākovi, ‘e movete.
He kapau ‘oku vāvākovi ʻa e fale ‘o Sētané, pea ‘e tolonga fēfē hono pule‘angá?
Pea kapau ‘oku fai ‘eku kapusi tēvoló ʻaki ʻa e ivi ‘o e Pule ʻo e fanga tēvoló, pea ‘oku fai ‘ia hai ʻa e kapusi tēvolo ‘a ho‘omou kau akó? Tā ko ho‘omou kau akó pē te nau fakahalaia‘i kimoutolú.
Ka ʻokapau leva ‘oku faiʻaki ‘eku kapusi tēvoló ʻa e Laumālie ‘o e ‘Otuá, pea tā kuo ‘osi hoko mai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá kiate kimoutolu.
He ‘e lava fēfē ke hū ha taha ki ha fale ‘o ha tangata toʻa ‘o fa‘ao ‘ene koloá? ‘Ikai te ne tomu‘a ha‘i ia ka ne toki lava ‘o fa‘ao ʻene koloá?
ʻIlonga ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai kau mo aú, ‘oku angatu‘u ia kiate au. ʻIlonga ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai kau mo au ʻi he ututaʻú, ‘okú ne maumau‘i ʻa e ta‘ú.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́, ‘e ala fakamolemole‘i ha angahala kuo fai ‘e ha taha, pē ko ha‘ane lea kovi. Ka ko ia ‘oku lea kovi ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ‘e ‘ikai ala fakamolemole‘i ia.
Pea ʻilonga ‘a ia ‘oku lea kovi ki he Foha ‘o e Tangatá, ‘e ala fakamolemole‘i. Ka ko e lea kovi ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ‘e ‘ikai fakamolemole‘i ia ‘i he maama ko eni̇́, pea mo e maama kaha‘ú.”
‟ʻIlonga ha fu‘u ʻakau ‘oku mo‘ui lelei̇, ‘e fua lelei. Ka ai ha fu‘u ʻakau ‘oku ‘ikai mo‘ui lelei̇, ‘e fua kovi. ‘Oku ʻiloʻi ʻa e faʻahinga ‘akaú mei hono fuá.
ʻA e fanga ngata fekai! ‘E lava fēfē ke mou leaʻaki ha lelei, ‘osi angé ‘oku fonu homou lotó ʻi he kovi̇́? Kuo pau ke fakalea atu mei homou ngutú ʻa e me‘a ‘oku fonu ‘i homou lotó.
ʻIlonga ha taha lelei, ‘e ‘alu hake mei hono lotó ha ngaahi fakakaukau lelei. Pea ʻilonga ha taha kovi, ‘e ‘alu hake mei hono lotó ha ngaahi fakakaukau kovi.
Ko hono mo‘oní, ka hoko ʻa e ‘Aho Fakamāaú, ‘e ‘eke ki he taha kotoa pē ʻene lea noa kotoa pē naʻe fai.
He ko e me‘a kotoa pē naʻe leaʻaki ‘e ha taha, kuo pau ke sivi‘i ʻi he ‘aho ko ia pē ‘oku tonuhia ai pē halaia.”
Pea naʻe toki haʻu ai ha kau faiako Lao ‘a Mōsese ‘e ni‘ihi mo ha kau Fālesi ʻo nau pehē ange kia Si̇̄suú, ‟Tangata‘eiki, fai ange mu‘a ha fo‘i mana fakaofo ke mau mamata ki ai.”

Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟He toki kakai kovi mo ta‘etui ‘Otua ko kimoutolu! Ko ho‘omou kole mái koā ke u fai ha mana fakaofo? He‘ikai te u fai ki ai! Ko e mana pē taha te u fai̇́, ‘a ē na‘e hoko ki he palōfita ko Sioná.
He hangē tofu pē ko e nofo ‘a Siona he ‘aho ‘e tolu mo e pō ‘e tolu ‘i he kete ‘o e iká, ʻe pehē pē ʻa e nofo ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi he ‘aho ‘e tolu mo e pō ‘e tolu ‘i faʻitoká.

‘Oka hokomai ʻa e ‘Aho Fakamāaú, pea ‘e tutu‘u hake ‘a e kakai Ninivé ‘o talatalaaki‘i kimoutolu. He na‘á nau fanongo ʻi he malanga ‘a Sioná pea nau tafoki ki he ‘Otuá. Pea ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atu, ‘oku ‘i heni ha taha ‘oku toe makehe atu ia meia Siona.

Peá ka hoko mai ʻa e ‘Aho Fakamāaú, pea ‘e tu‘u hake ʻa e Kuini ‘o Sipá ‘o talatalaaki‘i kimoutolu. He na‘e hā‘ele mai ia mei he ngataʻanga ʻo māmani̇́ ke fanongo ki he poto ʻo Solomoné. Ka ‘oku ‘i heni ha taha ‘oku toe makehe ange ia meia Solomone!”
‟Peá ka mavahe ha laumālie ʻuli mei ha taha, kuo pau ke ‘alu holo ia ‘i ha ngaahi feitu‘u lala ‘o toe kumi ha feitu‘u ke mālōlō ai. Ko ʻene fiu pē ʻi hono kumi ha feitu‘u pehē:
Pea naʻe toki pehē leva ‘e ia, ‛Te u toe foki ki he fale na‘á ku mavahe mei ai̇́.’ Pea foki atu ia ki ai̇, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ke nofo‘i ʻa e falé ia, pea ‘oku kei ma‘a mo maau.

Peá te ne toe ‘alu ‘o ui mai mo ha laumālie ʻuli ‘e fitu kehe ʻa ia ‘oku toe kovi ange ‘iate ia, ke omi ke nau nofo. Pea ko e me‘a ‘oku hokó, ‘oku toe kovi ange ‘aupito ʻa e tuʻunga ‘oku ‘i ai ʻa e toko taha ko ia ‘i hono tuʻunga kimu‘á. ʻE pehē pē foki ʻa e fai kiate kimoutolu ʻo e toʻutangata angakovi̇́.”
Pea lolotonga ʻene kei lea ki he kakai̇́, mo e a‘u mai ʻene fa‘eé mo hono ngaahi tehiná ‘o tutu‘u mei tu‘a ko e fie lea ki ai.
Pea pehē ange ‘e he toko taha kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko ho‘o fa‘eé eni, mo ho ngaahi tehiná, ‘oku nau tutu‘u mei tu‘a ko e fie talanoa mo koe.”
Pea tali ange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟He ko hai ‘eku fa‘eé? Pea ko hai hoku ngaahi tehiná?”
Pea mafao atu ‘e Si̇̄sū hono nimá ki heʻene kau akó mo ne pehē: ‟Ko ‘eku fa‘eé ē mo hoku ngaahi tehiná!
ʻIlonga ha taha te ne fai ʻa e finangalo ‘o ‘eku Tamai fakalangi̇́, ko hoku tokoua ia, mo hoku tuofefiné, mo ‘eku fa‘ēé.”

13.text: Pea ‘alu ‘a Si̇̄sū ʻi he ‘aho ko iá mei he ‘api na‘e nofo ai̇́ ki he matātahi ʻo e Tahi Kāleli̇́, pea naʻá ne nofo hifo ai ke faiako ki he kakai̇́.
Pea tupu mei he fu‘u tokolahi ʻa e kakai na‘e fetaʻomi mai kiate iá, na‘á ne heka ki ha ki‘i vaka ‘o nofo mei ai, kae tutu‘u atu e kakai̇́ mei ʻuta.
Pea fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́ ʻene ngaahi talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni:
Pea naʻe laku atu ʻene pulopulá, ‘o ngangana ʻa e ni‘ihi he veʻehalá. Pea puna mai ʻa e fanga manupuná ‘o nau tosi ia ‘o ‘osi.
Pea ngangana ʻa e pulopula ʻe niʻihi he feitu‘u naʻe makamaka pea manifi ai ʻa e kelekelé.
Pea ʻi he hopo hake ʻa e laʻaá naʻe velahia ai ʻa e pulopulá koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e teʻeki ke loloto hono aká, pea vave ai ʻene mae hifo ‘o mate.
Pea ngangana ʻa e pulopula ʻe niʻihi ki he feitu‘u vao talatala‘ia, pea toe tupu mo ia. Kae teʻeki fuoloa, kuo kāsia ia ‘e he vao talatalá.
Ka ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he kelekele lelei̇́, na‘e tupu hake ia ‘o fua. Na‘e fuo teau ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea fuo onongofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea fuo tolungofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi.”
Pea toki pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́, ‟ʻIlonga ha taha ʻoku maʻu telingá, ke ne fanongo ke mahino ki ai.”
Pea omi ai ʻa e kau akó kia Si̇̄sū ‘o nau pehē ange: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga ‘okú ke faiako ʻaki ai ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātaá?”
Pea tali ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e ngaahi fakapulipuli ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́, kuo fakahā atu ia kiate kimoutolu, ka kuo te‘eki ke fakahā ki he kakai̇́.
He ka ʻilonga ha taha kuó ne ma‘u ha me‘a, ‘e toe ‘oange ki ai mo ha me‘a. Ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane me‘a ‘e ma‘ú, ‘e toʻo meiate ia ʻa e me‘a na‘á ne ‘osi ma‘ú, neongo ai pē ʻene si‘isi‘i̇́.
Ko e ʻuhinga ia ‘oku ou faiako ʻaki ai ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātaá.
Pea toki mo‘oni ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfita ko ‘Aiseá:
He kuo pāngata‘a honau lotó.
Ka ko e toki kakai monū‘ia kimoutolu! He ‘oku mou lava ‘o ‘ilo mo ongo‘i.

Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, na‘e tokolahi ʻa e kau palōfita mo e kakai ʻa e ‘Otuá na‘á nau mātuʻaki fakaʻamu ke mamata ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou mamata ki ai̇́, mo fanongo he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou fanongo ki ai̇́, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau ma‘u faingamālie.”
‟Ko ia, mou fanongo lelei mai, ka mou ‘ilo ʻa e ʻuhinga ‘o ‘eku talanoa fakatātā ki he tangata ngoué.

Ka ʻi ai ha taha kuo fanongo he ongoongo ‘o e Pule‘angá ka ‘oku ‘ikai ke mahino ia kiate ia, ‘okú ne hangē ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he veʻehalá. ‘Oku ha‘u ʻa e toko taha kovi̇́ ia ‘o taʻaki ʻa e pulopula ko iá.
Ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he kelekele makamaká, ko ha taha ia ‘oku fanongo ki he Folofolá pea naʻe tali leva ia mo e loto fiefia;

Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ‘oku ‘ikai ke aka loloto ia heʻene moʻui̇́, ko ia ai ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ‘o kātaki fuoloa. Pea ko ʻene fetaulaki pē mo ha faingata‘a, pē ko ha fakatanga, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e Folofolá, pea fo‘i.

Ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he loto vao talatalá, ko ha taha ia ‘oku fanongo ki he Folofolá, ka ‘oku hoha‘a ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻo māmani pea ‘ofa he koloá, pea kāsia leva ai ʻa e Folofolá, ‘o ‘ikai ma‘u hano fua.

Ka ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he kelekele lelei̇́, ko ha taha ia ‘oku fanongo ki he Folofolá pea mahino leva ia, pea ʻokú ne fua. ‘Oku a‘u ki he fuo teau ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea fuo onongofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea fuo tolungofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi.”
Na‘e fai foki ‘e Si̇̄sū mo e talanoa ko ʻeni̇́: ‟Ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvaní ‘oku hangē ko e lulu ‘e ha tangata ha pulopula lelei heʻene ngoué.
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei mohe ʻa e kakai̇́ he pō ‘e taha, kuo ha‘u ha fili ‘o lulu ha pulopula vao he ngoué, pea naʻe ‘alu.
Pea tupu hake ʻa e uité ‘o kamata fua; pea ‘asi ai foki mo e vaó.
Pea omi ʻa e kau tamaioʻeiki ʻa e tangata ngoué ‘o ‘eke ange: ‛Tangata‘eiki, ‘ikai koā ko e pulopula lelei na‘á ke lulu ‘i ho‘o ngoue‘angá? Ka ko e vao ʻeni mei fē?’
Pea naʻe talaange, Ko e ngāue ʻeni ‘a ha fili
Pea ne talaange, ‛‘Oua! Na‘á ‘iloangé ʻi hoʻomou ta‘aki ʻa e vaó pea mata‘aki ai mo e uité.

Tuku pē ke na tupu fakataha kae ‘oua kuo motu‘a ʻa e uité. Peá te u toki fekau ʻa e kau tānaki̇́ ke nau tomu‘a ta‘aki ʻa e vao kovi̇́ ‘o ha‘i ke ‘ave ‘o tutu, pea toki tānaki ʻa e uité ‘o fa‘oaki ki he tānakiʻanga uité.’ ”
Na‘e fai foki ‘e Si̇̄sū mo e talanoa ko ʻeni̇́: ‟Ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́ ‘oku hangē ha tengaʻi mūsita na‘e hanga ‘e ha tangata ‘o tō heʻene ngoué.

Ko e fōsi‘i taha ia ‘i he tengaʻi ʻakau kotoa pē. Ka ko e fu‘u ʻakau naʻe tupu mei ai̇́, ko e lahi taha ia ‘i hono fa‘ahingá. ‘Oku hoko ia ko e fu‘u ʻakau lahi, pea ‘oku puna mai ai ʻa e fanga manupuná ‘o ngaohi pununga ‘i hono ngaahivaʻá.”

Ko e talanoa fakatātā ʻeni ‘e taha na‘e toe fai ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku hangē ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́ ko ha me‘i lēvani na‘e toʻo ‘e ha fefine ‘o natu ʻaki ha ipu mahoa‘a ‘e tolu, kae‘oua kuo ma‘u kotoa ia ‘e he lēvani̇́, ‘o tupu.”
Ko e ngaahi akonaki ko ʻeni ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́, na‘e fai ʻaki pē ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātā. Ko ʻene fakahinohino kotoa pē, na‘e ‘oatu ʻaki ha talanoa fakatātā.
Pea mo‘oni ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfitá:
Pea mavahe ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he kakai̇́ ‘o hū ki loto fale, pea toki omi ʻene kau akó ‘o kole ange, ‟Fakamatala mai mu‘a ho‘o talanoa ki he uite mo e vao he ngoue‘angá.”
Pea tali ‘e Sīsuú, ‟Ko e toko taha na‘á ne lulu ʻa e pulopula lelei̇́, ko e Foha ia ʻo e Tangatá.
Ko e ngoue‘angá ko māmani ia, pea ko e pulopula lelei̇́ ko e kakai ia ‘o e Pule‘angá. Ko e vaó leva, ko e kakai ia ‘oku kau mo e toko taha kovi̇́.
Ko e fili na‘á ne lulu ʻa e pulopula vaó, ko e tēvoló ia. Ko e ututaʻú, ko e ‘aho fakamui̇́ ia. Pea ko e kau tānaki̇́, ko e kau ‘āngeló ia.
Pea hangē ko e tānaki ‘o e vaó ‘o tutú, ‘e pehē pē he ‘aho fakamui̇́.
He ‘e fekau atu ai ‘e he Foha ‘o e Tangatá ʻene kau ‘āngeló ke nau tānaki kotoa mai ʻa e kau fakakovi̇́ mo e kau faikovi̇́ mei hono pule‘angá.
Pea ‘e laku kinautolu ki he ngotoʻumu kakahá, ki he feitu‘u ‘e fai ai ʻa e tangi mo e fetoʻeaki.
Ka ‘e hangē ko e ulo ʻa e laʻaá: ʻa e ngingila ʻa e teunga ‘o e kakai ʻa e ‘Otuá ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o ‘enau Tamai̇́. Ko kimoutolu kuo fanongo ki he‘eku ngaahi fakahinohinó, mou ongo ki ai.”

‟Ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́ ‘oku hangē ko e me‘a ‘e hoko ‘oka fai angē kuo ‘ilo ‘e ha taha ha koloa na‘e tanu ‘i ha ngoue‘anga pea naʻe toe tanu pē ia ai, pea ko e meʻa heʻene fiefia lahi̇́, naʻá ne ‘alu ‘o fakatau atu ʻa e me‘a kotoa naʻá ne ma‘ú, ka naʻe fakatau mai ʻa e ngoue‘anga ko iá.”
‟Ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́, ‘oku hangē ko e me‘a ‘e hoko ‘oka ‘alu ha taha ‘o kumi mata‘itofe lelei.
Pea faifai kuó ne ‘ilo ha mata‘itofe ‘oku fu‘u mahu‘inga lahi, pea toki ‘alu ia ‘o fakatau atu ʻene me‘a kotoa ‘oku ma‘ú ka naʻe fakatau mai ʻa e mata‘itofe ko iá.”
‟Mo ʻeni foki, ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvaní, ‘oku hangē ko e me‘a ‘e hoko ‘oka toho ha kupenga ʻi tahi̇, ‘o ma‘u ai ʻa e faʻahinga ika kehekehe.
Pea ʻi heʻene fonu leva ʻa e kupengá, pea nau toho ia ki ʻuta. Pea nau toki nofo hifo ‘o vahe ʻa e iká, ‘o fa‘o kato ʻa e ika lelei̇́, kae liʻaki ʻa e ika ta‘e‘aongá.
‘E pehē tofu pē ‘o ka hoko mai ʻa e ‘aho fakamui̇́. ‘E ō atu ʻa e kau ‘āngeló ‘o tānaki ʻa e kakai kovi̇́ ‘o vahe‘i kinautolu mei he kakai lelei̇́.
Pea ‘e laku ʻa e kakai kovi̇́ ki he ngotoʻumu kakaha, ʻa e feitu‘u te nau tangi ai mo fetoʻeaki.”
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó, ‟Kuo mahino nai kiate kimoutolu ‘eku ngaahi fakahinohino kuo fai atú?” Pea nau talaange, ‟ʻio, kuo mahino.”

Pea talaange leva ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟ʻIlonga ha tama ako Folofola kuo toe hoko ko e tama ako he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́, ‘oku hangē ia ko ha taha ‘okú ne fakatou toʻo mai mei he ʻene tuku‘anga koloá ʻa e koloa fo‘ou mo e koloa motu‘a.”
Pea hili hono fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātā ko eni̇́, pea naʻe ‘alu mei he feitu‘u ko iá;
ʻO ne ʻalu atu ki he kolo na‘á ne nofo ai̇́. Pea ne faiako ai he falelotú. Pea ofoofo ʻa e kakai̇́ mo nau pehē: ‟Ko e poto mo e ivi mei fē fua ‘oku ma‘u ‘e he tangatá ni?
‘Ikai ko e foha ʻeni ‘o e tufungá? ‘Ikai koā ko Mele ʻene fa‘eé? Pea ko Siosifa, mo Saimone, mo Siutasi ‘a hono fanga tehiná?
‘Ikai ‘oku nofo heni mo hono fanga tuofāfiné? Ko ʻene ma‘u mei fē ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni?”
Pea na‘e ‘ikai ke tali lelei ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘e he kakai̇́.
Pea na‘e ‘ikai loko fai mana ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i ai, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻenau ta‘e tui̇́.

14.text: ʻI he taimi ko iá, na‘e fanongo ‘a Hēlota, ko e pule ‘i Kāleli̇́, ki he ongoongo ‘o kau kia Si̇̄suú;
peá ne talaange ki hʻene kau tamaioʻeiki̇́, ‟Ko Sione Papitaiso ʻeni kuo toetu‘u mei he maté. Ko e ʻuhinga ia ‘okú ne ma‘u ai ʻa e ivi fai mana ko eni̇́.”
He naʻe feʻunga iá kuo ‘osi tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Hēlota ke puke ‘a Sione ‘o fakahū ki he fale pōpulá koeʻuhi̇̄ ko Helotiasi, ko e uaifi ʻo Filipe, ko hono tokouá.
He na‘e talaange ʻe Sione Papitaiso kia Hēlota, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai totonu hoʻo mali mo Hēlotiasi̇́.”
Peá neongo na‘e loto ‘a Hēlota ke tāmate‘i ‘a Sione, ka na‘á naʻe manavahē ki he kakai Siú, he na‘á nau tui ko e palōfita ‘a Sione.
Pea hoko ʻa e ‘aho ‘o Hēlotá, pea tau‘olunga ai e tama fefine ‘a Hēlotiasi̇́ ‘i he lotolotonga ‘o e kau fakaafé. Pea na‘e fiefia lahi ai ‘a Hēlota;
Ko ia naʻá ne fuakava ange ki he ta‘ahiné, ‟Te u ‘oatu ma‘au ha me‘a pē te ke kole mai.”
Pea fakalotoʻi leva ia ‘e heʻene fa‘eé ke ne kole ange kia Hēlota, ‟‘Omai ʻa e ʻulu ‘o Sione Papitaisó ‘i ha laulau!”
Pea toe fakatomala ʻa e Tuʻi̇́ heʻene tukupā mo e fuakava na‘e fai he lotolotonga ‘o e kau fakaafé, ka na‘á ne fekau pē ʻene kau tangatá;
Ke nau ō ki he pilīsoné ‘o tuʻusi mai ʻa e ʻulu ‘o Sioné.
Pea nau ‘omi ʻa e ʻulu ‘o Sioné ‘i ha laulau ‘o ‘oange ki he ta‘ahiné, pea toki ‘oange ia ‘e he ta‘ahiné ki heʻene fa‘eé.
Pea toki omi ‘a e kau ako ‘a Sioné ‘o ‘ave hono sinó ‘o telio, pea nau ō ai ‘o fakahā kia Si̇̄sū ‘a e me‘a kuo hokó.
Pea fanongo ‘a Si̇̄sū he talanoa ‘o kau kia Sioné, pea naʻe heka vaka ‘o folau ki ha potu lala.
Pea ʻi he hifo atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei he vaká naʻá ne fakatokanga‘i ʻa e fu‘u kakaí, pea ake leva ‘i hono lotó ‘ene ‘ofa lahi kiate kinautolu, ‘o ne fakamo‘ui ‘akinautolu na‘e mahamahaki̇́.

Pea kuo efiafi hifo, naʻe omi ʻa e kau akó kia Si̇̄sū ‘o nau pehē ange, ‟Ko e feituʻu mamaʻo eni, pea kuo meimei poʻuli. Fekau ā mu‘a ‘a e kakai̇́ ke nau mātuku atu ki he ngaahi kolo ofi mai̇́ ‘o fakatau ai ha‘anau me‘akai.”
Kae talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Oua ‘e tuku ke nau ō. Mou ‘oange ‘ekimoutolu ha me‘a ke nau kai.”
Pea nau toe pehē ange, ‟Ko ‘emau me‘a pē ‘oku ma‘u heni̇́ ko e fo‘i mā ‘e nima mo e mata‘i ika ‘e ua.”
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Mou ‘omi ia.”

Pea naʻe fekau ‘a e kakai̇́ ke nau tangutu ki lalo, ka naʻe toʻo ʻa e fo‘i mā ‘e nimá mo e mata‘iika ‘e uá. Pea hanga hake ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he langi̇́ ‘o fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otuá. Pea naʻe toki pakipaki ‘a e ngaahi fo‘i maá, ‘o ne ‘oange ki he kau akó ke nau tufa ki he kakai̇́.
Pea na‘e kai kātoa ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘o mākona.
Ko e tokolahi ‘o e kakai na‘e kai̇́ ko e kakai tangata ‘e toko nima afe, tuku kehe ‘a e kakai fefiné mo e fānaú.
Pea hanga ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘o fekau fakato‘oto‘o ‘ene kau akó ke nau heka vaka ‘o mu‘omu‘a ki he kauvai ‘e tahá, ka naʻe tuku ange ‘a e kakai̇́ ke nau ō.
Pea hili ʻa e tuku ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́ ke mātukú, pea naʻe ‘alu hake toko taha pē ki ha funga moʻunga ‘o fai ai ‘ene lotu. Pea poʻuli hifó, ko Si̇̄sū toko taha pē ‘oku toe ‘i he potu ko iá.
Pea feʻunga iá, kuo mama‘o atu ʻa e vaká he loto tahi̇́, pea kuo angi mei muʻa ʻa e matangi̇́ ‘o lieliaki ʻa e vaká ‘e he peaú.
Pea ko e vahaʻataimi ia ‘o e hengihengi̇́ mo e maʻa ʻa e ʻahó, naʻe toki ‘alu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó ‘okú naʻe hā‘ele ʻi he fukahi tahi̇́.
Pea ʻi he‘enau sio kia Si̇̄sū ‘oku hāʻele atu he fukahi tahi̇́, naʻa nau manavahē pea nau kaikaila heʻenau manavahē, ‟Ko e fa‘ahikehe!”
Kae folofola mai leva ‘a Si̇̄sū, ‟Mou fiemālie pē, Ko au pē; ‘Oua ‘e manavahē!”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Pita, ‟‘Eiki, kapau moʻoni ko koe, peá ke fekau mai muʻa ke u laka atu kiate koe he fukahi tahi̇́.”
Pea pehē mai ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Haʻu!” Pea hifo atu ‘a Pita ‘o kamata laka atu kia Si̇̄sū he fukahi tahi̇́.
Ka ko e meʻa ʻi heʻene tokanga ki he mālohi ʻa e matangi̇́, naʻá ne manavahē ai, ‘o kamata ngoto. Pea naʻe kalanga atu leva kia Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Eiki ē, tokoni mai!”
Pea ala atu leva ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o puke hake ia, pea naʻe pehē ange, ‟‘E Pita, Ko e hā naʻe vaivai pehē ai ho‘o tui̇́? Ko e hā naʻá ke veiveiua ai̇́?”
Pea ʻi he‘ena heka pē ki he vaká, kuo tālolo ʻa e matangi̇́ ‘o malū.
Pea hū ai ʻa e kau akó kia Si̇̄sū, ‘o nau pehē: ‟Tā ko e mo‘oni pē, ko e ‘Alo koe ʻo e ‘Otuá.”
Pea faifai pea nau tūʻuta atu ki he fonua ko Kenesaleti̇́.
Pea ʻi he fakatokanga‘i ‘e he kakai ‘o e kolo ko iá, ʻa Si̇̄suú, naʻa nau fekau atu ki he kau mahakiʻia ‘i he feitu‘u ko iá, ke nau omi kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea nau kole kia Si̇̄sū ke tuku ke ala ange mu‘a ‘a e kau mahakiʻiá ki he kapa ‘o hono kofú. Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e lave kia Sīsuú, na‘á nau mo‘ui.

15.text: Pea na‘e toki omi mei Selusalema ha kau Fālesi mo ha kau faiako ʻo e Lao ‘a Mōsesé kia Si̇̄sū ‘o nau ‘eke ange,
‟Ko e hā ‘oku talangata‘a ai ho‘o kau akó ki he akonaki kuo tukufakaholo mai mei heʻetau ngaahi kui̇́? He ʻoku ‘ikai te nau tomu‘a fanofano pea toki kai!”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟He ko e hā ‘oku mou talangata‘a ai kimoutolu ki he fekau ‘a e ‘Otuá, ka mou angimui ki ho‘omou ngaahi tala tukufakaholó?
He ko e folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá, ‛Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai̇́, mo ho‘o fa‘eé. Pea ʻilonga ‘a ia ‘oku lea kovi ki heʻene tamai̇́ pē ko ‘ene fa‘eé, ‘e tautea mate ia.’

Ka ‘oku mou pehē ‘ekimoutolu, ‘ʻilonga ha taha ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane me‘a ke ne tokoni‘i ʻaki ʻene tamai̇́ pē ko ʻene fa‘eé, kapau te ne pehē ‘e ia, ‛Ko e me‘a na‘á mo mei ma‘u meiate aú, kuo foaki ia ma‘a e ‘Otuá;

Pea ko ia ‘e tuku ʻene tamai̇́ mo ʻene fa‘eé kae ‘ave ʻa e me‘á ia ma‘a e ‘Otuá.’ Ko e founga ia ‘oku mou faka‘ikai‘i ʻaki ʻa e folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá, ka mou angimui kimoutolu ki ho‘omou tala tukufakaholó.
ʻA e kau mālualoi! ‘Oku mo‘oni ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfita ko ʻAisea, heʻene palōfisai fekauʻaki mo kimoutolu;
‟Ko e kakai ni,
Ko e koto taʻeʻaonga pē ‘enau lotu kiate aú,
Pea toki ui ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́ ke nau ʻunuʻunu mai, pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou fanongo mai ʻo ʻai ke mahino ʻa e meʻa ni.
‘Oku ‘ikai ko e me‘a ‘oku hū ki loto he ngutú ‘oku ʻuli ai ha tahá, ka ko e me‘a ‘oku hū mai mei hono ngutú ‘oku ʻuli ai̇́.”
Pea omi kia Si̇̄sū ‘ene kau akó ‘o nau talaange, ‟‘Okú ke mea‘i na‘e lavea ‘a e loto ‘o e kau Fālesi̇́ ‘i ho‘o lau na‘e fai̇́?”
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e ‘ʻakau kotoa na‘e ‘ikai ke tō ‘e he‘eku Tamai fakalangi̇́, ‘e ta‘aki ia.
‘Oua te mou hoha‘a ki he kau Fālesi̇́. Ko e kau taki kinautolu ‘oku kui. Ka taki ‘e ha kui ha kui, pea te na fakatou tō ‘i ha luo.”
Pea talaange ‘e Pita kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Fakamatala mai mu‘a ‘a e talanoa fakatātaá ni kiate kimautolu.”
Pea tali ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟He ‘oku pehē fau hoʻomou taʻemahinó?
Kuo teʻeki koā ke mahino kiate kimoutolu: ʻIlonga ha me‘a ‘oku hū ki loto he ngutú, ‘oku ‘alu hifo ia ki he keté, pea toki hū ki tu‘a mei he sinó.
Ka ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ‘alu ki tu‘a mei he ngutú, ‘oku ‘alu hake ia mei he lotó. Ko e ngaahi me‘a ia ‘oku ʻuli ai ha taha.
He ‘oku fou mei he lotó ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau kovi ‘oku iku ki he tāmate, mo e tono, mo e fe‘auaki, mo e kaiha‘a, mo e fakamoʻoni loi, mo e lauʻikoviʻi.
Ko e ngaahi me‘a ia ‘oku ʻuli ai ha taha. Ka ko e kai teʻeki ke fanofanó, ‘oku ‘ikai ke ʻuli ai ha taha.”
Pea ‘alu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei he feitu‘u ko iá ‘o a‘u ki he kauʻāfonua ‘oku ofi ki he ongo kolo ko Taia mo Saitoni̇́.

Pea ko eni, na‘e nofo ai ha fefine Kēnani. Pea kalanga mai ia kia Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Eiki ē, Hako ‘o Tēvita, ke ke ‘alo‘ofa mai mu‘a kiate au! Ko si‘eku tama fefiné, kuo ma‘u ia ‘e ha tēvolo, pea ‘oku fu‘u faingata‘ā‘ia lahi.”
Kae fakalongolongo pē ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Kae talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Kuo fekau mai pē au ke u ‘alu ki he fanga sipi kuo mole mei he fale ‘o ‘Isileli̇́!”
Pea ha‘u ʻa e fefiné ‘o tūʻulutui atu ki he vaʻe ‘o Si̇̄suú pea naʻe pehē ange, ‟ʻEiki, tokoni mai mu‘a, kiate au.”
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai taau ke toʻo e mā ‘a e fānaú ‘o laku ki he fanga kulii̇́.”
Pea tali ʻe he fefiné, ‟ʻIo ʻEiki, ʻoku mo‘oni, ka na‘á mo e fanga kulii̇́ ‘oku nau kai pē foki he momo ‘oku ngangana mei he tēpile ‘a honau ‘eiki̇́.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he fefiné, ‟Fefine, tā ʻoku lahi pē hoʻo tui̇́! Ko e me‘a ‘okú ke kole mai̇́, ‘e fai ia ma‘au.” Pea naʻe moʻui leva ʻene ta‘ahiné mei he taimi ko iá.
Pea ‘alu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei ai ki he veʻe Tahi Kāleli̇́, pea naʻe ‘alu hake ki ha tafa moʻunga, ‘o taʻutu hifo ai.

Pea omi ʻa e fuʻu kakai tokolahi mo ‘enau kau heke, mo e kui, mo e kau toketu, mo e noa mo e kakai na‘e mo‘ua he alanga mahaki kehekehe, ‘o tuku atu kinautolu ki he vaʻé ‘o Sīsuú, pea naʻe fakamo‘ui kinautolu.
Pea ofoofo ai ʻa e kakai̇́ he‘enau sio ki he lea ‘a e kakai na‘e noá, mo e ‘alu lelei ʻa e kau toketú, mo e kau heké, mo e ʻā ‘a e faʻahinga naʻe kui̇́: pea nau fakamālō‘ia ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Isileli̇́.

Pea ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘ene kau akó, ‘o ne talaange, ‟‘Oku ou fu‘u tokanga ki he kakai̇́ ni; he kuo ‘osi ʻa e ‘aho ‘e tolu mo e ‘ikai ke nau ma‘u ha me‘atokoni. ‘Oku ou loto ke ‘oange ha me‘a ke nau kai, na‘á faifai ka nau pongia he hala ki ‘api̇́.”
Pea ‘eke ange ‘e he kau akó, ‟Te tau ma‘u mei fē ha me‘akai feʻunga ‘i he feitu‘u mamaʻó ni ke fafanga ʻaki kātoa ʻa e kakai̇́?”
Pea toe fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko ho‘omou fo‘i mā ‘e fiha ‘oku ma‘ú?”
Pea fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́ ke nau tangutu ki lalo.
Pea naʻe toʻo e fo‘i mā ‘e fitú mo e mata‘i iká, ‘o fai ʻene fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otuá, pea naʻe toki pakipaki ia ‘o ‘atu ki he kau akó ke nau tufaki ki he kakai̇́.
Pea nau kai kotoa ai ‘o mākona.
Ko e tokolahi ‘o e kakai na‘e fafangá, ko e toko fā afe nai, tukukehe ʻa e kakai fefiné mo e fānaú.
Pea tuku ange leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘a e kakai̇́ ke nau ō, pea naʻe toki heka vaka ‘o folau atu ki he feitu‘u Makatani̇́.

16.text: Pea omi ai ha kau Fālesi mo ha kau Sātusi kia Si̇̄sū ‘o nau tauhele‘i ia ʻaki ‘enau kole ke ne fai ange muʻa ha mana mei langi̇.
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Sīsū, ‟Ka tō ʻa e laʻaá, pea ʻoku mou pehē: ‘E ʻafua ‘apongipongi, he ‘oku kulokula ʻa e langi̇́.

Pea pongipongi haké, pea mou toe pehē: ‘E ‘alotāmaki ʻa e ‘ahó ni, he ‘oku kulokula mo pōpōʻuli ʻa e langi̇́. ‘Oku mou lava kimoutolu ‘o tala ʻa e me‘a ‘e hokó ʻaki pē ho‘omou sio hake ki he langi̇́, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou lava ‘o fakaʻuhingaʻi ʻa e ngaahi fakaʻilonga ‘o e kuongá ni.
He toki kakai kovi mo anga fakalielia kimoutolu ʻoku mou kumi ki ha mana fakaofo! Ka ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito fai atu ia. Ko e fakaʻilonga pē naʻe fai kia Sioná ‘e ‘atu maʻamoutolú!”
Pea ʻi he a‘u atu ʻa e kau akó ki he kauvai̇́, tā kuo ngalo ‘iate kinautolu ke ‘ave ha‘anau mā.
Pea folofola ange ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou tokanga pea vakavakai kimoutolu koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e lēvani ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau Sātusi̇́.”
Pea nau fepehēʻaki, ‟Ko ʻene lea peheé nai ko e ‘ikai te tau omi mo ha fo‘i maá?”
Pea ‘ilo ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘enau felāuaki̇́, pea naʻe ‘eke kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou felāuaki ai ʻiate kimoutolu, ‘i hoʻomou hala he foʻi maá? He meʻa tui vaivai moʻoni ko kimoutolu.
‘Oku ‘ikai koā ke mahino ki homou ‘atamaí, pē te mou manatu‘i ‘eku pakipaki e ngaahi fo‘i mā ʻe nimá ma‘a e toko nimaafé? Ko e kato ‘e fiha na‘á mou tānaki ‘o fakafonú?
Fēfē ʻa e fo‘i mā ‘e fitu ma‘a e toko fāafé? Ko e kato ‘e fiha na‘á mou tānaki mei ai̇́?
Kuo teʻeki koā ke mahino kiate kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku lau ki he maá? Ka ke mou lamalama kimoutolu koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e lēvani ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau Sātusi̇́.”
Pea toki mahino ai ki he kau akó ‘oku ‘ikai ko ʻene akonaki‘i kinautolu ke nau faka‘ehi‘ehi mei he lēvani fakatupú, ka ko e akonaki ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau Sātusi̇́.
Pea ʻi he fakaofiofi atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ki he feituʻu ʻo Sēsalia Filipai̇́, naʻá ne fehu‘i ange ki heʻene kau akó, ‟Ko hai nai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ‘i he lau ʻa e kakai̇́?”
Pea nau talaange, ‟ʻOku pehē ʻe he ni‘ihi ko Sione Papitaiso. Ka ʻoku lau ‘e he ni‘ihi ko ‘Ilaisiā. Pea ko e ni‘ihi, ko Selemaia, pē ko ha taha he kau palōfitá.”
Pea naʻe toki ‘eke ange kiate kinautolu, ‟Ka ko hai au ‘i he lau ʻamoutolú?”
Pea tali ange ‘e Saimone Pita, ‟Ko e Kalaisi̇́ koe, ko e ʻAlo ‘o e ‘Otua moʻui̇́.”
Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ‟‘Oku monū‘ia ʻa koe Saimone foha ‘o Sione! He ko e ‘ilo ko ená na‘e ‘ikai te ke ma‘u ‘iate koe pē, ka na‘e ‘oatu kiate koe ‘e he‘eku Tamai fakalangi̇́.
Pea ko hono mo‘oni̇́, ‘e Pita, ko Maka koe, pea te u langa hoku siasi̇́ ‘i he funga maká ni. Pea ‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e he ngaahi matapā ʻo Maté, ‘o ikuna‘i ia.
Te u ‘oatu kiate koe ʻa e ngaahi ki̇̄ ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́. ʻIlonga ha me‘a te ke ta‘ofi ‘i māmani, ‘e ta‘ofi ‘i Hēvani. Pea ʻilonga ha me‘a te ke faka‘atā ‘i māmani, ‘e faka‘atā ‘i Hēvani.”
Pea toki fakatokanga ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau akó ke ‘oua te nau tala ki ha taha ko e Kalaisi̇́ ia.

Pea kamata mei he taimi ko iá, naʻe fakahā ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki heʻene kau akó, ‟Kuo pau ke u ‘alu ki Selusalema pea ‘e lahi hoku fakamamahi‘i ai ‘e he kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú, mo e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́, pea mo e kau faiako ʻo e Lao ‘a Mōsesé. Peá te nau tāmate‘i ai au. Ka ‘oka hili ha ‘aho ‘e tolu, ‘e fokotu‘u hake au mei he maté.”
Pea taki ia ki he tafaʻaki̇́ ‘e Pita ‘o ne kamata valokiʻi: ‟‘Oua te ke lau pehē: ‘Eiki! ‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito hoko ha me‘a pehē kiate koe.”
Ka naʻe tafoki ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o ne pehē ange kia Pita, ‟Tu‘u ki mui Sētane! Ko e meʻa fakahumu koe ‘i hoku halá. He ‘oku ‘ikai ke faka-‘Otua ho‘o ngaahi fakakaukaú, ka ‘oku fakaetangata.”
Pea toki folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki heʻene kau akó, ‟ʻIlonga ha taha ‘e fiekau mo aú, kuo pau ke ne tuku hono lotó ka naʻe fua hono kolosi̇́ ‘o kaungāfononga mo au.
He ko ia ‘e loto ke fakahaofi ʻene moʻui̇́, ko ʻene tuku ia ke mole kotoa. Peá ka ʻilonga ha taha te ne foaki ʻene moʻui̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, ko ʻene haofaki̇́ ia.
He ka ma‘u ‘e ha taha ‘a māmani kātoa kae mole kotoa ai ʻene moʻui̇́, Ko e hā hano ʻaonga kiate ia? Ko e hā ha me‘a te ne toe lava ‘o foaki atu ke ma‘u ʻaki mai hono laumālié?

He kuo vave ke hoko mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻaki ʻa e lāngilangi ‘o ʻene Tamai̇́ mo ʻene kau ‘āngeló. Peá te ne toki fakapale‘i ʻa e toko taha kotoa pē ‘o fakatatau ki heʻene tō‘ongamoʻui naʻe fai.
