Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala atú, ‘e teʻeki ke mate ʻa e ni‘ihi ʻoku tuʻu ‘i heni̇́, kuo nau mamata ki he Foha ʻo e Tangatá ‘oku hoko mai mo hono Pule‘angá.”

17.text: Pea hili ʻa e ‘aho ‘e ono mei ai, pea taki hake ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘a Pita mo e ongo tautehina ko Sēmisi mo Sione ki ha funga moʻunga mā‘olunga ke nau mavahe atu fakaekinautolu pē.
Pea naʻe liliu ʻa e fōtunga ‘o Sīsuú, ʻi honau ʻaó, ‘o huhulu hono fofongá ‘o hangē ko e laʻaá. Pea ko hono kofú na‘e fetapaki ‘o hinehina ange he māamá.
Pea ‘iloangé naʻe ‘asi mai ʻa Mōsese mo ‘Ilaisiā ‘o nau talanoa mo Si̇̄sū.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Pita kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e me‘a lelei mo‘oni, ‘Eiki, ‘etau ‘i heni̇́! Tuku ke u langa ha palepale ‘e tolu. Ko e taha mo‘ou, pea taha mo‘o Mōsese, pea taha mo‘o ‘Ilaisiā.”

Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei lea ‘a Pitá mo e ngaʻunu mai ha konga ‘ao huhulu ‘o ʻufiʻufi kinautolu, pea ongo mai mei he ‘aó ha le‘o ‘oku pehē: ‟Ko hoku Foha ‘ofa‘angá ena. ‘Oku mātuʻaki leleiʻia ai hoku lotó. Mou fakaongo kiate ia!”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa e kau akó ki he le‘ó pea nau manavahē ‘aupito, ‘o nau tō fo‘ohifo ki he kelekelé.
Pea haʻu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ne ala hifo kiate kinautolu, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Tu‘u hake! ‘Oua ‘e manavahē!”
Pea nau hanga haké, ‘oku ‘ikai ke toe ‘iloa ha taha, ka ko Si̇̄sū pē.

Pea lolotonga ‘enau hifo mei he funga moʻungá, na‘e fakatokanga ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oua te mou tala ki ha taha ‘a e me‘a na‘á mou mamata ki ai̇́ kae‘oua kuo toetu‘u ‘a e Foha ʻo e Tangatá mei he maté.”
Pea ‘eke ange ‘e he kau akó kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā hono ʻuhinga ‘o e lau ‘a e kau faiako laó ‘o pehē kuo pau ke tōmuʻa hoko mai ‘a ‘Ilaisiaá?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Mo‘oni pē kuo pau ke mu‘omu‘a mai ‘a ‘Ilaisiā. Peá te ne fokotuʻufoʻou ‘e ia ‘a e me‘a kotoa.
Ka ko hono mo‘oni̇́, kuo ‘osi hokomai ‘a ‘Ilaisiā ia. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke fakatokanga‘i ia ‘e he kakai̇́, ka nau ngaohikovi‘i ia. Pea ‘e pehē pē foki mo ‘enau ngaohikovi‘i ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.”
Pea toki mahino ai ki he kau akó, tā ko Sione Papitaiso na‘e ʻuhinga ki ai ‘a Sīsuú.
Pea ʻi he foki mai ‘a Si̇̄sū mo e ongo akó ki he kakai̇́, naʻe ha‘u ha tangata kia Si̇̄sū ‘o tūʻulutui atu ki ai ʻo ne pehē ange,
‟‘Eiki, ʻalo‘ofa mai mu‘a ki hoku fohá! ‘Oku puke he mahaki moá, pea ‘oku lahi ʻene faingata‘a‘iá. Ko e taimi ʻe niʻihi kuo teka ki ha afi, pē tō ki ha vai.
Pea naʻá ku ‘omi ia ki ho‘o kau akó, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ‘o fakamo‘ui ia.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟He toki toʻutangata taʻe tui mo angakovi ʻeni! Te tau nofo ai pē mo kimoutolu ke a‘u ki fē? ʻE ngata ʻafē ʻeku kātakiʻi kimoutolú? ‘Omi e tamasiʻi̇́ ki heni!”
Pea naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he tēvoló ke mavahe mei he tamasiʻi̇́. Pea mavahe mai leva ʻa e tēvoló, pea mo‘ui ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́ mei he taimi pē ko iā.
Pea omi ʻa e kau akó ‘o nau talanoa fakaekinautolu mo Si̇̄sū, pea nau ‘eke ange, ‟Ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai te mau lava ai ‘o kapusi ‘a e tēvolo ko ʻeni̇́?”

Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko hono ʻuhingá, he ‘oku si‘isi‘i ho‘omou tui̇́. Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou talaatú, ka naʻe lahi tatau ho‘omou tui̇́ mo ha fo‘i tengaʻi mūsita, ‘e lava ke mou pehē atu ki he fu‘u moʻunga ko eé, ‛Hiki hake ki hē!’ pea ‘e mahiki ia. Pea ‘e ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘e faingata‘a kiate kimoutolu.”
Peá neonngo e faāhingá ni ʻoku ʻikai lva ke mahuʻi, ka ʻi he lotú pe mo e ʻaukai.
Pea ʻi he fakataha kotoa leva ‘a e kau akó ki Kāleli̇́, pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuo pau ke lavaki‘i ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ki ha ni‘ihi te nau tāmate‘i ia.
Ka ‘i he ‘aho hono tolu mei ai̇́ ‘e fakatoetu‘u ia mei he maté.” Pea loto mamahi ‘aupito ʻa e kau akó heʻene lau ko iá.
Pea a‘u atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó ki Kāpaneume. Pea omi ai ha kau tānaki tukuhau ‘o e temipalé kia Pita, ‘o nau ‘eke ange, ‟‘Oku totongi tukuhau koā ho‘omou faiakó?”
Pea tali atu ‘e Pitá, ‟‘Io, ‘oku totongi tukuhau.”
Pea tali ‘e Pita, ‟Ko e kakai kehé.”

Ka ‘oku tonú ke ‘oua te ta fakatupu ha maumau. ‘Alu koe ki tahi ‘o li̇̄ ho‘o afó. Pea ko e ʻuluaki ika te ne kai ho‘o māta‘ú, te ke fa‘ai hono ngutú ‘okú ne fa‘opuku ha foʻi pa‘anga siliva. Toʻo ia ‘e koe, peá ke ‘alu ‘o totongi ʻaki ‘eta tukuhaú.”

18.text: Pea feʻunga mo iá kuo omi ʻa e kau akó kia Si̇̄sū ‘o fai ki ai ʻa e fehu‘i ko eni̇́, ‟Ko hai ‘oku lahi ‘i he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́?”
Pea ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ha ki‘i tamasiʻi, ʻo ne fokotu‘u ‘i hono tafatafa‘aki̇́.
Pea naʻe toki pehē ange ki he kau akó, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou liliu ʻo hoko ʻo hangē ha longa‘i fānaú, ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te mou hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.
ʻIlonga ha taha ‘okú ne anga vaivai, ‘o hangē ko e ki‘i tamasiʻi ko eni̇́, ko ia ia ‘oku lahi he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.
Peá ka tali lelei ‘e ha taha ha ki‘i tamasiʻi pehē ni koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, ko ʻene tali ai pē ia aú.”
ʻIlonga ha taha te ne ‘ai ʻa e longa‘i fānau ko ʻeni ʻoku tui kiate aú, ke fai angahala, naʻe mei sai ange ke ha‘i ha fu‘u maka he kia ‘o e toko taha ko iá, ‘o ne toki hopo ki he loto moaná.

‘Oku malaʻia ʻa e kakai ‘o māmani̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻokú ne ʻai kinautolu ke fai angahalá. Kuo pau ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa fakatupu angahalá ia. Ka ʻoku mala‘ia ʻa e fa‘ahinga kotoa pē ʻoku hokomai ai̇́.

Kapau te ke fai angahala koe, ko e ngāue ‘a ho nimá, pē ko ho vaʻé, peá ke hanga ‘o tuʻusi atu ia ‘o li̇̄ʻaki. He ‘e sai ange kiate koe ha‘o ‘alu nima taha, pē veʻe-taha, ki he moʻui̇́, ‘i hano lī nima ua koe, pē veʻe-ua, ki he afi ‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e ha taha ‘o tāmate‘i̇́.
Pea kapau te ke fai angahala koe, ko e meʻa ʻi he sio ‘a ho matá, peá ke hanga ‘o taʻaki ia ‘o li̇̄ʻaki. He ‘e sai ange ha‘o ‘alu mata-taha ki he moʻui̇́, ‘i hano lī mata-ua koe ki he afi ‘o heli̇́.

‟Vakai na‘á ‘iloange kuo mou fakasi̇̄tu‘a‘i ha taha he longa‘i fānaú ni. He ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘oku mamata ma‘u ai pē honau kau ‘āngeló ki he fofonga ʻo ‘eku Tamai̇́ ʻi he Langi̇́.

‘Ai angé haʻamou lau. Ka ai ha tangata naʻe ‘i ai ha‘ane fanga sipi ‘e toko teau, pea ‘iloangé kuo hē ha ki‘i sipi ‘e taha ai, ‘ikai te ne tuku ʻene fanga sipi ‘e toko hivangofulu mā hiva ko eé ke nau kaikai atu pē he tafatafa moʻungá, kae ‘alu ia ‘o kumi ʻene ki‘i sipi kuo heé?
Peá ka faifai pea naʻe ma‘u mai ia, ko hono mo‘oni̇́, ‘e lahi ange ʻene fiefia koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e sipi ‘e taha ko iá, ‘i heʻene fiefia he fanga sipi ‘e hivangofulu mā hiva na‘e ‘ikai heé.
Pehē foki, ko e finangalo ia ‘o ho‘omou Tamai ‘i Hēvani̇́ ke ‘oua naʻa hē ha fo‘i toko taha ‘i he longa‘i fānaú ni.”
‟Peá ka ‘iloangé kuo faihala hao kāinga kiate koe, peá ke ‘alu ‘o fakahā ange ʻene halá. Ka mo fakaekimoua pē. He kapau ‘e fie ongo atu, ko ho‘o toe vālelei ia mo ho kāingá.
Peá ka ‘ikai fie ongo atu ia, pea mo ō ki ai mo ha toko taha, pē toko ua kehe, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakamo‘oni‘i ʻa e me‘a kotoa ‘e leaʻaki, ‘o fakatatau ki he Folofolá.
Pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai ai pē ke fie ongo atu, peá ke fakahoko leva ki he Siasi̇́. Peá ka ‘ikai ke fie ongo ki he Siasi̇́, pea lau ʻoku tatau ia mo ha taha taʻelotu pē tānaki tukuhau.”
‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ko e me‘a kotoa pē ‘oku mou faka‘atā ‘i māmani, ‘e faka‘atā foki ‘i langi. Pea ko e me‘a kotoa pē te mou ta‘ofi ‘i māmaní, ‘e ta‘ofi foki ia ‘i langi.
Pea ko ʻeni foki ‘oku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu, kapau ‘e felotoi ha toko ua ‘iate kimoutolu ‘i ha me‘a pē te na kole ki ai ‘i māmani, ‘e fai ia ma‘anaua ‘e he‘eku Tamai ʻoku ‘i Hēvani̇́.
He ka ʻilonga ha feitu‘u ‘e fakataha ai ha toko ua pē toko tolu koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, kuo pau ke u ‘i ai au ʻi honau lotolotongá.”
Pea ha‘u ‘a Pita kia Si̇̄sū ‘o ‘eke ange, ‟‘Eiki ‘e tu‘o fiha ha fai angahala mai hoku kāingá kiate au mo ‘eku kei fakamolemole‘i pē? ‘E tu‘o fitu nai?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Ikai! ‘E ‘ikai ke tu‘o fitu pē, ka ‘e tu‘o fitu liunga fitungofulu!
He ‘oku anga pehē ni ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́, ‘oku hangē ko ha tu‘i na‘e finangalo ke vakai‘i ʻa e fakamatala pa‘anga ha‘ane kau ngāue.
Pea ko ʻene kamata vakai‘i̇́, mo hono ʻomai kiate ia ha toko taha kuo lau mano hono mo‘ua pa‘anga mai ki ai̇́.

Ka na‘e ‘ikai ma‘u ‘e he tamaioʻeiki ko iá ha pa‘anga feʻunga ke totongi ʻaki hono moʻuá. Ko ia, naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ai ‘e he tu‘i̇́ ke fakatau atu ia ko e pōpula, pea pehē mo hono uaifi̇́, mo ‘ena fānaú, pea mo ʻene me‘a kotoa na‘e ma‘ú, ke totongi ʻaki hono fu‘u moʻuá.
Ka naʻe tō mape‘e hifo ʻa e tamaioʻeiki ko iá, ʻi he ʻao ʻo e tu‘i̇́ ʻo kole fakamātoato kiate ia, ‘Tuku mai mu‘a ha ku faingamālie, ‘e Ho‘o ʻAfio, ‛pea te u totongi kotoa hoku moʻuá!’
Pea langa ai ʻa e mafu ʻo e Tuʻi̇́ he ‘ofa ki heʻene tamaioʻeiki ko iá, pea naʻe fakamolemole‘i hono fu‘u moʻuá kotoa, ʻo ne tukuange ia ke ʻalu.

Ka ʻi he ‘alu atu leva ʻa e tangata na‘e fakamolemole‘i̇́ ‘o fetaulaki mo hono kaungāngāue na‘e ‘i ai hono moʻuá. mai ki ai, ko e pa‘anga ʻe lauafe pē. Pea naʻe puke ia ‘o fakasisina, mo ne talaange, Fei mo totongi mai ho moʻuá.
Pea tō fo‘ohifo ai hono kaungāngāué, mo ne kole fakamātoato kiate ia, Tuku mai mu‘a ha ku ki‘i faingamālie, pea te u totongi kotoa atu hoku moʻuá.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne tali siʻene kolé, ka naʻe puke ʻa e tangatá ʻo li̇̄ ia ki he pilīsoné, ke ne nofo ai kae ‘oua kuó ne totongi kotoa hono moʻuá.
Pea ʻi he sio ki ai ʻa e kaungāngāue ko eé, naʻa nau loto mamahi ‘aupito, ‘o nau felelei ki he tu‘i̇́ ‘o fakahoko kiate ia ʻa e meʻa kotoa kuo hokó.
Pea fekau leva ‘e he tu‘i̇́ ke ui mai ʻa e tamaioʻeiki̇́ ke ha‘u, pea naʻe talaange, Ko koé ko e tamaioʻeiki angakovi. He na‘á ku fakamolemole‘i koe koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ho‘o kole mai̇́.
ʻIkai na‘e mei totonu ke ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungāngāué ‘o hangē ko ‘eku ‘ofa kiate koé?
Pea houhau lahi ai ʻa e tu‘i̇́, ‘o naʻe fekau ke fakahū pili̇̄sone ʻa e tamaioʻeiki̇́ kae ‘oua kuó ne totongi kakato hono fu‘u moʻuá.”
‟‘E pehē pē foki ʻa e me‘a ‘e fai ‘e he‘eku Tamai ʻoku ‘i Hēvani̇́ kiate kimoutolu ‘o kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou fakamolemole‘i mo‘oni ha taha ‘e fai hala atu.”

19.text: Pea ʻi he ‘osi ʻa e faiako ‘a Sīsuú, naʻá ne ‘alu mei Kāleli ki Siutea ki he fonua he kauvai ‘o e vaitafe ko Soatani̇́.
Pea naʻe muimui atu ki ai ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi, pea naʻe fakamo‘ui kinautolu ʻi he feituʻu koiā.

Pea omi leva ha kau Fālesi ki ai, ‘o nau feinga ke ne leaʻaki ha me‘a ke ne ‘efihia ai he Laó. Na‘á nau fehu‘i ange, ‟‘Oku ngofua nai ki ha taha ‘i he‘etau Laó ke ne vete hono mali̇́ ‘i ha fa‘ahinga ʻuhinga pē?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Kuo teʻeki koā te mou lau ʻa e potu Folofola ko eni̇́, ‘I he kamata‘angá na‘e fakatupu ‘e he ‘Otuá ‘a e tangata mo e fefine?
Pea naʻe folofola, Ko hono ʻuhinga ia kuo pau ai ke tuku ange ‘e ha tangata ‘ene tamai̇́ mo ʻene fa‘eé, ka na hoko ‘o kakano taha mo hono uaifi̇́.
‘Oku ‘ikai ke na kei ua, ka kuo na hoko ko e kakano pē ‘e taha. Pea ko kinaua kuo fakahoko ‘e he ‘Otuá ‘o tahá, ke ‘oua na‘á toe fakamāvae ‘e ha taha.”
Pea toki pehē ange ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́, ‟Pea Ko e hā leva hono ʻuhinga na‘e pehē ai ‘e Mōsese he Laó ‘oku lava ke ‘oange ‘e ha tangata ha tohi vete ki hono uaifi̇́, pea fekau ke ‘alú?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Naʻe fakangofua pē ‘e Mōsese ke mou tuku ange homou uaifi̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e fefeka homou lotó. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke pehē ʻi he kamata‘angá.
Pea ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ka ‘ilonga ha tangata te ne vete mo hono uaifi̇́, ka na‘e ‘ikai ke fe‘auaki ia, kapau ‘e toe mali ʻa e tangatá, ko ʻene tono mali ia.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e he kau akó kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Kapau ko e ‘ātunga ia ‘o e vā ‘o ha tangata mo hono mali̇́, pea tā ‘oku sai ange pē ‘a e nofo ta‘emali̇́ ia!”

Pea talaange e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ʻuhinga ‘eku fakahinohino ko ʻeni̇́ ki he kakai kotoa pē. ‘Oku ʻuhinga pē ia ki he fa‘ahinga kuo teu‘i ‘e he ‘Otuá ke nau lava‘i ʻa e nofo ta‘e mali̇́.

He ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e ngaahi ʻuhinga kehekehe ‘oku fai ai ʻa e ta‘emali̇́. ‘Oku pehē ‘a e ni‘ihi naʻe fa‘u pehē pē honau sinó. Pea ko e ni‘ihi ko ha fa‘ahinga me‘a kuo fai ki honau sinó ʻe ha taha. Ka ko e ni‘ihi, ‘oku ‘ikai te nau mali koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́. Ko koe ‘okú ke lava ‘o tali ʻa e fakahinohino ko eni̇́, peá ke tali ia ‘e koe.”
Pea naʻe toki ‘omi kia Si̇̄sū ha fānaú ke ne hilifaki hono nimá kiate kinautolu ‘o tāpuaki‘i. Ka naʻe hanga ‘e heʻene kau akó ‘o valokiʻi kinautolu.
Kae talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Mou tuku e longa‘i fānaú ke omi kiate au. ‘Oua te mou ta‘ofi kinautolu, he ‘oku maʻae faʻahinga peheé, ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.”
Pea naʻe hilifaki hono nimá kiate kinautolu, pea naʻe toki mavahe mei he feitu‘u ko iá.
Pea ko eni, na‘e ‘i ai ha talavou na‘e ha‘u kia Si̇̄sū ‘o fehu‘i ange, ‟‘E tangata‘eiki, ko e hā ha me‘a lelei te u fai ka u ma‘u ai ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā ‘okú ke faka‘eke‘eke ai au ʻo kau ki he me‘a ‘oku lelei̇́? Ko e ‘Otuá pē ‘a e lelei̇́. Pea kapau ‘okú ke fiema‘u ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá, peá ke tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau ‘a e ‘Otuá.”
Pea ‘eke ange ‘e he talavoú kia Si̇̄sū, ‟‘A e fē fua?”
Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai̇́ mo ho‘o fa‘eé. Peá ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api̇́ ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koé.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e he talavoú kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Kuo fuoloa ‘eku tauhi kotoa e ngaahi fekau ko iá. ‘Oku kei toe nai ha fekau ke u fai?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Kapau ‘okú ke loto ke haohaoa ho‘o moʻui̇́, peá ke ‘alu ‘o fakatau atu ho‘o me‘a kotoa ‘oku ma‘ú, pea tufa ʻa e pa‘angá ki he masivá, ka ke ma‘u koloa ‘i Hēvani. Peá ke ha‘u leva ‘o muimui kiate au.”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa e talavoú he tali ‘a Si̇̄suú pea ‘alu leva ia kuo lotomamahi ‘aupito. He ko e tama koloa‘ia ia.
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘oku faingata‘a ‘aupito ke hū ha taha koloa‘ia ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́, ‘oku faingofua ange ke hū ha kāmeli ‘i ha ava‘i hui tuitui ‘i he hū ha taha koloa‘ia ki he Pule‘anga e ‘Otuá.”
Pea na‘e mātuʻaki ofo ai ʻa e kau akó, ‘o nau pehē: ‟Pea ko hai leva ai ‘e ala mo‘ui?”
Pea sio fakamama‘u ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, pea naʻe toki pehē: ‟‘Oku ‘i ai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ‘ekimoutolu. Ka ‘oku malava ‘e he ‘Otuá ‘a e me‘a kotoa pē.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Pita, ‟Kuo mau ‘osi liʻaki ‘emau me‘a kotoa ka mau muimui kiate koe. Ko e hā ha‘mau me‘a ‘e ma‘u ai̇́?”

Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ka nofo ‘a e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ‘i hono taloni lāngilangi‘iá, pea ko kimoutolu ‘a e toko hongofulumāua kuo mou kau he muimui kiate aú, te mou taki taha nofo ‘i ha taloni. Peá te mou fakamāau‘i ʻa e matakali ‘e hongofulumāua ʻo ʻIsileli̇́.

Pea ‘ilonga ha taha kuó ne liʻaki hano ‘api, pē ko hano tokoua, pē tuofāfine, pē tamai, pē fa‘ē, pē fānau, pē ngoue‘anga koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, ‘e fakakoloa ia ‘o liuliunga. Pea ‘e ‘oange mo‘ona mo e mo‘ui ta‘engatá.
Ka ko e tokolahi ‘oku nau lolotonga tu‘u ‘i he ‘otu mu‘á, te nau tu‘u he ‘otu mui̇́. Pea ko e tokolahi ‘oku nau lolotonga tu‘u he ‘otu mui̇́, te nau tu‘u he ‘otu mu‘á.”

20.text: ‟ʻOku tatau ʻa e Puleʻanga ʻo Hēvani̇́ mo ha tangata‘eiki na‘e ‘alu hengihengi atu ki he māketí ke unga ha kau ngāue, ki heʻene ngoue vainé.
Pea nau aleapau ki ha foʻi pa‘anga siliva ‘e taha, ko e totongi ‘enau ngāué, ki he ‘aho ‘e taha, ʻo ne fekau ke nau ō atu ‘o ngāue heʻene ngoue vainé.
Pea a‘u ki he hiva pongipongi̇́ pea toe ‘alu atu ʻa e tangatá ki he māketi̇́, ʻo ne sio ki ha niʻihi ʻoku toe tutu‘u noa ai.
Pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu, ‛Mou ō atu mo kimoutolu ki he‘eku ngoue vainé, pea te u ‘oatu ʻa e totongi ‘oku totonu ke mou ma‘ú.’ Pea nau ō mo kinautolu.
Pea toe ‘alu atu ʻa e tangatá he ho‘atā mālié, mo e tolu efiafi̇́, ‘o fai ai pē ʻa e alea tatau.

Pea ofi ki he nima efiafi̇́ pea naʻe toe ‘alu atu, tā ‘oku toe ‘i ai mo ha ni‘ihi ‘oku kei tutu‘u noa ai. Pea naʻe pehē ange kiate kinautolu, ‛Ko e hā hono ʻuhinga ho‘omou tutu‘u heni he ‘ahó ni kakató?’
Pea nau talaange, ‛Ko hono ʻuhingá, he kuo teʻeki ke fiema‘u kimautolu ‘e ha taha.’ Pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu, ‛Pe‘i mou ō leva mo kimoutolu ‘o ngāue he‘eku ngoue vainé.’

Pea a‘u ki he efiafi poʻuli̇́, pea talaange ‘e he tangata na‘e ʻaʻana ʻa e ngoue vainé ki heʻene pule ngāué, ‛Ui mai ʻa e kau ngāué ke nau ō mai, ka u totongi ‘enau ngāué, ‘o kamata mei he a‘u fakamuimui taha mai̇́ pea faka‘osi ki he mu‘omu‘a mai̇́.’
Pea omi ʻa e fa‘ahinga na‘e aʻu fakamuimui tahá, ‘o ma‘u ‘enau totongi̇́, ko e taki pa‘anga siliva ‘e taha.
Pea faifai pea omi ʻa e fa‘ahinga na‘e mu‘omu‘a mai̇́ ke ma‘u ‘enau totongi̇́. Pea naʻa nau ʻamanaki ‘e lahi ange kinautolu, ka naʻe ‘oange pē ‘e ia ‘enau taki pa‘anga siliva ‘e taha.
Pea ʻi heʻenau maʻu ʻenau totongi̇́, naʻa nau kamata lāunga ki he tangata na‘e ‘a‘ana ʻa e ngoue vainé;

‘O nau pehē ange, ‛Ko kinautolu na‘á ke alea‘i fakamuimui tahá, na‘á nau ngāue pē he houa ‘e taha, ka kuó ke totongi tatau kinautolu pea mo kimautolu, ‘osi angé, kuo talu ‘emau ngāue mei ‘aneuhu, pea ‘āsili ai̇́ mo ‘emau toe ngāue ʻamautolu he ʻafú!’
Ka naʻe tali ‘e he tangata na‘e ‘a‘ana ʻa e ngoue vainé, ki ha taha ʻokinautolu, ‛‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku kākaa‘i kimoutolu, kau tangata! Naʻá ta aleapaú ke ke ngāue ki ha foʻi paʻanga siliva pē ʻe taha.
Mou ō kimoutolu mo ho‘omou totongi ko ená. Kapau te u totongi tatau kinautolu naʻe haʻu fakamuimui̇́ mo kimoutolu naʻe haʻu ʻaneuhú, he ‘oku mou kau ai?
Te u fa‘iteliha pē au ki he‘eku pa‘angá. Ko e hā ‘oku mou meheka ai he‘eku ‘ofá?’
Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū, ‛‘E pehē pē. ‘E tuʻukimui ʻa e tuʻukimuʻá kae tuʻukimuʻa ʻa e tuʻukimui̇́.’”
Pea kuo ‘alu hake ‘a Si̇̄sū ki Selusalema. Pea naʻe ‘ave ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá ‘o nau fakaekinautolu, pea naʻe pehē ange kiate kinautolu,
‟Mou fanongo mai. Ko ‘etau ō ʻeni ki Selusalema. Pea ‘e lavaki‘i ai ʻa e Foha ʻa e Tangatá ki he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau faiako ʻo e Lao ‘a Mōsesé. Peá te nau tautea mate ia.
Ka te nau tomu‘a tuku atu ia ki he kakai̇́ ke manuki‘i mo kau‘imaeaʻi, pea ‘e tukifaʻo ki ha kolosi. Ka ‘i he ‘aho leva hono tolu mei ai̇́, ‘e fokotu‘u hake ia mei he maté.”
Na‘e ha‘u kia Si̇̄sū ʻa e faʻē ʻa e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti̇́, pea mo ʻene ongo tama tangatá. Pea tūʻulutui atu ʻa e fefiné kia Si̇̄sū ‘o ne fai ʻene kole ki ai.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘okú ke fiema‘u?”
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he ongo tama ʻa e fefiné, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te mo ‘ilo e me‘a ‘okú mo kole ki ai̇́. Te mo lava koā ‘o inu mei he ipu te u inu mei ai̇́?”

Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua, ‟Mo‘oni pē, te mo inu kimoua mei he ipu ‘a‘akú. Ka ko e nofo mei hoku toʻomataʻú mo hoku toʻohemá, ‘oku ‘ikai lava ke u ʻoatu, ka kiate kinautolu pē kuo teuteu ia ki ai ʻe heʻeku Tamai̇́.”
Pea fanongo ai ʻa e toko hongofulu ko eé pea nau ‘ita ‘aupito he ongo tautehiná.

Ka naʻe ui kinautolu ‘e Si̇̄sū ke nau ʻunuʻunu ange, pea naʻe talaange, ‟‘Oku holi foki ʻa e kau taki ʻi he ngaahi puleʻangá ke nau angi holo e kakai̇́. Pea ko e kau māʻolungá, ‘oku nau faʻa pule fakaaoao ki he kakai̇́.
Ka ‘e ‘ikai te mou pehē kimoutolu. ‘Ilonga ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e fie hoko ko homou taki̇́, kuo pau ke ne hoko ko ho‘omou sevāniti.
Pea ‘ilonga ha taha ‘oku fie tuʻukimuʻá, kuo pau ke ne hoko ko ho‘omou pōpula.
He na‘e ‘ikai ke ha‘u ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ke angi holo ha kau sevāniti. Ka ko ʻene ha‘ú, ke ne hoko ko ha sevāniti, mo liʻaki ʻene moʻui̇́ ke fetongi ʻaki ha tokolahi.”
Pea ʻi he fononga atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó mei Selikoó, naʻe muimui atu ‘iate ia ha kakai tokolahi.
Pea tā na‘e ai ha ongo tangata kui naʻe nofo he veʻehalá. Pea ʻi he‘ena fanongo ‘oku fou atu ai ‘a Sīsuú, naʻá na kaila ʻo pehē: ‟ʻEiki, ʻAlo ʻo Tēvita, ‘aloʻofa mai mu‘a kiate kimaua.”
Pea taʻofi kinaua ‘e he kakai̇́ ke na fakalongolongo. Kae toe fakautuutu ai ‘ena kaikaila, ʻo pehē: ‟ʻEiki ē, ʻAlo ʻo Tēvita ē, ke ke ʻaloʻofa mai mu‘a kiate kimaua.”
Pea toki tu‘u ai ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o naʻe fehu‘i ange, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘okú mo loto ke u fai ma‘a kimouá?”
Peá na talaange, ‟ʻEiki, ke ke falaʻā ange muʻa homa matá!”
Pea langa ʻa e mafu ʻo Si̇̄sū he ʻofa kiate kinauá, ‘o naʻe ala ki hona matá, pea ʻā leva ai hona matá ʻo na toe lava ʻo sio, peá na muimui ai pē kiate ia.

21.text: Pea ʻi he fakaofiofi atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ki Selusalemá, ‘o nau aʻu ki Pētefesi ‘i he Moʻunga ko ‘Ōlivé. Pea fekau atu ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e toko ua heʻene kau akó;
ʻO ne folofola kiate kinaua, ‟Mo ō ki he ki‘i kolo ko ena ‘oku hanga mai̇́, pea te mo sio ai ki ha ‘asi ‘oku nono‘o, mo hano kiʻi ʻuhiki. Mo vete ia ‘o taki mai kiate au.
Pea ka ‘i ai ha taha ‘e fakalea atu, pea mo talaange, ‘Oku fiema‘u kinaua ‘e he ‘Eiki̇́. Pea te ne toe fakafoki vave mai.”
Pea ʻe fakamo‘oni ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfitá, ʻo pehē:
‟Mou fanongonongo ki he taʻahine ko Saioné, ‛Ko eni, ko homou tu‘i̇́ ʻena ‘oku hā‘ele mai.
Pea ō ʻa e ongo tamá ‘o fai fakatatau ki he fekau ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Peá na taki mai ʻa e ‘asi̇́ mo hono ʻuhiki̇́ ‘o ‘ai ki ai honau ngaahi pulupulú ke heka ai ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Pea naʻe folahi foki ‘e ha tokolahi honau pulupulú ʻi he halá, kae hanga ‘e ha ni‘ihi ‘o fesi ha ngaahi vaʻa paame, ‘o falikiliki ʻaki ʻa e halá.
Pea ko e fu‘u kakai na‘e mu‘omu‘a atu ‘ia Sisuú, mo kinautolu na‘e muimui mai̇́, na‘á nau kaikaila ʻo pehē:
Pea ʻi he a‘u atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki Selusalemá, kuo ngaʻuta kātoa ʻa e koló, ‘o nau pehē: ‟Ko hai nai ʻeni?”
Pea tali ʻe he fu‘u kakai naʻe muimui fononga ‘ia Sīsuú, ʻo pehē, ‟Ko e palōfita ko Sīsū, mei Nāsaleti ‘i Kāleli̇́.”

Pea hū atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he Temipalé ‘o ne tuli mai ki tu‘a ʻa e kakai na‘e fefakatauʻaki ai̇́, mo ne fulihi ʻa e ngaahi tēpile ʻa e kau fakafetongi pa‘angá, mo e ngaahi nofoʻanga ‘o e kau fakatau lupé.
Peá ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuo tohi ʻi he Tohitapú,” ‟‘E ui hoku falé ko e fale fai‘anga lotu. Ka kuo mou ngaohi ia ko e fakataha‘anga ‘o e kau kaiha‘a!”
Pea na‘e omi ki he Temipalé, kia Si̇̄sū ha kau kui mo ha kau heke, peá ne fakamo‘ui kinautolu.

Ka ʻi he mamata ʻa e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau faiako ʻo e Laó, ki he ngaahi me‘a fakaofo kuo fai ʻe Si̇̄suú, pea mo e kalanga, ‟Hōsana ki he ‘Alo ‘o Tēvitá,” ʻa e fānaú, ʻi he temipalé, pea naʻa nau matalili ai;
‘O nau pehē ange kiate ia, ‟‘Okú ke fanongo ki he vālau ‘oku nau fai̇́?”
Pea mavahe leva ‘a Si̇̄sū meiate kinautolu, ʻo ne ʻalu atu ki he kolo ko Pētani̇́, ‘o mohe ai.
Pea ʻi he pongipongi haké, naʻe toe foki atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he koló. Pea naʻá ne fiekaia.

Pea ‘iloangē naʻá ne fakatokanga‘i ha fu‘u fiki ‘oku tu‘u he veʻehalá, peá ne afe atu ki ai. Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne ma‘u ai ha fua, ka ko e laú pē. Peá ne folofola ki he fu‘u fiki̇́, ‟Ke ʻoua naʻa toe ai hao fua ‘oʻou.” Pea mae hifo leva ʻa e fu‘u fiki̇́ ‘o mate.
Pea ʻi he sio ki ai ʻa e kau akó, naʻa nau ‘ohovale ‘aupito mo nau pehē: ‟Ko e hā kuo vave pehē ai ʻa e mae ʻa e fu‘u fiki̇́?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, kapau te mou tui ‘o ‘ikai ha tālaʻa, pea ‘e ‘ikai ngata ‘i ho‘omou lava ‘o fai ʻa e me‘a na‘á ku fai ki he fu‘u fiki̇́, ka te mou toe lava ‘o lea ki he fu‘u moʻunga ko eni̇́ ke mahiki atu‘o patū ki tahi, pea ‘e hoko ia.
Peá ka ‘ilonga ha me‘a te mou kole ki ai ‘i haʻamou lotu, mou tui, pea ‘e ‘oatu ia.”

Pea na‘e toe hū atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he Temipalé ‘o faiako ki he kakai̇́. Pea omi ʻa e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú ‘o ‘eke ange, ‟Ko e mafai mei fē ‘okú ke fai ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni? Ko hai na‘á naʻe ‘oatu kiate koe ʻa e mafai ko iā?”
Pea tali atu ‘e Sīsū, ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‟Te u tomu‘a fai atu ‘e au ‘eku fehu‘i. Pea kapau te mou tali mai, pea te u toki tala atu ʻa e faʻahinga mafai ‘oku ou lava ai ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni.
Na‘e ma‘u mei fē ‘e Sione ʻa e mafai ke fai papitaisó? Mei he Langi̇́, pē mei he tangatá?”
Pea kapau te tau talaange, ‛Ko e mafai mei he tangatá,’ ka na‘á fai ‘e he kakai̇́ ha me‘a kiate kitautolu. He ‘oku nau tui kotoa pē, ko e palōfita ‘a Sione.”
Pea talu ai ‘enau tali, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ʻekimautolu.”
‟Ko e hā haʻamou lau ki he meʻa ni? Naʻe ai ha tangata mo hano ongo foha ʻe toko ua.
Pea talaange ‘e he tamasiʻi̇́, ‛He‘ikai te u ʻalu.’ Kae fuoloa si‘i mei ai, kuo liliu hono lotó, ‘o ne ‘alu.
Pea toe ‘alu ange ʻa e tangatá ki hono foha ‘e tahá ‘o fai ʻa e fekau tatau ki ai. Pea pehē mai ‘e he tamasiʻi ko iā, ‛ʻIo, Tangata‘eiki, te u ‘alu.’ Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke ‘alu ia.
‟Ko e foha fē na‘á ne fai ʻa e loto ‘o ‘ena tamai̇́?”

He na‘e ha‘u ‘a Sione kiate kimoutolu ‘o fakahā atu ʻa e hala totonu ke mou fou ai̇́, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou tui ki ai. Kae tui ki ai ʻa e kau tānaki tukuhaú ia mo e kau fe‘auaki̇́. Pea neongo naʻa mou sio ki ai, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou fiefakatomala ai homou lotó, ‘o tui kiate ia.
‟Mou fanongo ka u toe fai atu ha talanoa ʻe taha.
Pea ʻi he ofi ʻa e toʻukai̇ kālepi̇́, naʻá ne fekau atu ha‘ane kau tamaioʻeiki ke nau ō ‘o ma‘u mei he mātu‘á tauhingoué, hono ‘inasi mei he fua ‘o e ngoue vainé.
Ka na‘e puke ‘e he mātu‘á tauhingoué ia ʻene kau tamaioʻeiki̇́, ‘o tā ʻa e toko taha, pea tāmate‘i ʻa e toko taha, pea tolomakaʻi ʻa e toko taha.
Pea toe fekau atu ‘e he matāpulé haʻane kau tamaioʻeiki̇ kehe ʻo tokolahi ange ʻia kinautolu ne tomuʻa ʻalu atú, ka naʻe ngaohikovi‘i pē mo kinautolu foki ‘e he mātu‘á tauhingoué.
Pea toki fekau faka‘osi atu ‘e he matāpulé, ʻa hono fohá, kiate kinautolu, he naʻá ne pehē ‘i hono lotó, ‛ʻOku pau pē te nau toka‘i hoku fohá.’
Ka ʻi he sio leva ʻa e mātu‘á tauhingoué, ko e fohá eni, naʻa nau alēlea, ʻo pehē: ‛Ko e foha hokó eni. Mou haʻu, tau tāmate‘i ia ‘ekitautolu, ka tau ma‘u hono kelekelé.’
Pea nau puke ia ‘o fakapuna ki he tu‘a ngouevainé ‘o nau tāmate‘i ia ai.
Peá ka ʻiloange leva kuo tu‘u atu ʻa e matāpulé ki heʻene ngoue vainé, Ko e hā nai haʻane me‘a ‘e fai ki he mātu‘á tauhingoué ko ʻeni̇́?”

Pea tali ‘e he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú kia Sīsū, ‟Te ne tāmate‘i ʻa e kakai kovi ko iā ka ne lisi atu ʻa e ngoue vainé ki ha kau mātu‘á te nau ‘oange hono ‘inasi̇́ ʻoka hokosia ʻa e faʻahitaʻu toli vainé.”
Pea pehē ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuo teʻeki koā ke mou lau ʻi he Tohitapú ʻa e potutohi ko eni̇́,
Pea ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘E fa‘ao meiate kimoutolu ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá kae ‘oange ma‘á ha kakai te nau ‘omai ʻa e fua ‘oku fiema‘ú.
Pea ‘ilonga ha taha ‘e tūkia he maka ko ʻeni̇́ ‘e mofesifesi. Peá ka tō ʻa e maká ni ‘i ha taha, pea ‘e lailai ʻa e toko taha ko iā.”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau Fālesi̇́ ki he ngaahi talanoa fakatātā ne fai ‘e Sīsuú, naʻa nau ‘ilo ko ʻene ʻuhingá kiate kinautolu.
Pea nau faʻufaʻu leva ke tāmate‘i ia. Ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ‘o puke ia ko ‘enau manavahē ki he kakai̇́. He na‘e tui ʻa e kakai̇́ ko e palōfita ‘a Si̇̄sū.

22.text: Pea toe fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene faiako kiate kinautolu ʻaki e talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni:
‟‘Oku hangē ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́ ko ha tu‘i na‘á ne teu ha kātoanga mali ma‘a hono foha.
Pea fekau ‘e he tu‘i̇́ ʻene kau tamaioʻeiki̇́ ke nau ō ‘o tala ki he kau fakaafé ke nau me‘a mai ā ki he kātoangá. Ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau fie omi.

Pea toe fekau atu ‘e he tu‘i̇́ ha kau tamaioʻeiki kehe, ʻo pehē: ‛Mou tala ki he kau fakaafé, kuo maau ‘eku kātoangá: Kuo ‘osi tāmate‘i ‘eku fanga pulú, pea mo e fanga pulu sisinó pea kuo maau mālie ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē. Mou me‘a mai ā ki he kātoangá.’
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke tokanga ki ai ʻa e kau fakaafé, ka nau taki taha tokanga ki heʻene ngaahi me‘a kehekehe, ko e taha ki heʻene ngoué, ko e taha ki heʻene fefakatauʻaki̇́.
Pea hanga ‘e ha ni‘ihi foki ‘o puke ʻa e kau tamaioʻeiki ʻa e tu‘i̇́ ‘o tā mo tāmate‘i hanau ni‘ihi.
Pea houhau lahi ai e tu‘i̇́. Pea naʻe fekau ʻene kau taú ke faka‘auha ʻa e kau tāmate ko iá, pea mo tutu honau koló.
Pea naʻe toki pehē ki heʻene kau tamaioʻeiki̇́, ‛Kuo maau ‘eku teu kātoangá, ka ko e kakai na‘á ku fakaafe‘i̇́, naʻe ‘ikai te nau taau kinautolu ke omi ki ai.
Ko ia, mou ō ā ki he ngaahi hala pule‘angá ‘o fakaafe‘i mai ha fa‘ahinga kakai pē te mou fetaulaki.’

Pea ō atu ʻa e kau tamaioʻeiki ʻa e tu‘i̇́ ki he ngaahi hala pule‘angá ‘o tānaki mai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē na‘á nau fetaulaki ai, ʻa e kau faikovi mo e kau failelei, pea naʻe fonu ʻa e fale kātoangá, he kakai̇́.
Pea ʻi he hā‘ele atu ʻa e tu‘i̇́ ke ʻafio ki he kau fakaafé, naʻá ne fakatokanga‘i ha tangata na‘e ‘ikai ke ne teunga kātoanga mali̇́.
Pea naʻe ‘eke ange leva, ‛Siana, naʻe ange fēfē ho‘o hūmai ki heni ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ʻai hao teunga kātoangá?’ Ka naʻe fakalongolongo pē ʻa e tangatá, ‘o ‘ikai ha‘ane tali.
Pea fekau ‘e he tu‘i̇́ ki heʻene kau tamaioʻeiki, ‛Ha‘i he nimá mo e vaʻé ‘o li̇̄ kitu‘a ki he fakapoʻuli̇́, ki he feitu‘u ia ‘e fai ai ʻa e fetāngihi mo e mamahi lahi.’”
‟He ʻoku ui ʻa e tokolahi, ka ‘e fili pē ʻa e tokosiʻi.”
Pea toki ō atu ai ʻa e kau Fālesí ‘o faʻufaʻu ke tauhele‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū ʻi haʻane lea ʻe fai.

Pea nau fekau atu kiate ia ‘enau kau akó, mo ha ni‘ihi he fa‘ahi ‘a Hēlotá, ‘o nau pehē ange ki ai, ‟Tangata‘eiki, ‘oku mau malave‘i ‘okú ke leaʻaki ʻa e mo‘oni̇́ pea ʻokú ke ako‘i mo‘oni ʻa e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otuá ki he kakai̇́, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te ke tokanga ki he lau ʻa e kakai̇́, he ‘oku ‘ikai te ke sio tuʻunga koe.
Ko ia, ‘ai ange mu‘a ha‘o lau: Te tau li̇̄ tukuhau kia Sisa, pē ‘ikai?”
Ka naʻe mahino kia Sisū ‘enau fakakaukau kovi̇́, pea naʻe talaange, ‟ʻA e hako‘i lotuloi! Ko e hā ‘oku mou feinga ai ke tauhele‘i aú?
Mou fakahā mai ʻa e pa‘anga ‘oku totongi ʻaki e tukuhaú.” Pea nau ‘oatu kiate ia ha foʻi paʻanga siliva.
Pea naʻe fehu‘i ange, ‟Ko e fofonga ‘o hai mo e hingoa ‘o hai ‘oku tu‘u ai̇́?”
Pea nau tali, ‟‘O Sisá.”
Pea ʻi heʻenau fanongo ki ai̇́, naʻa nau ‘ohovale kotoa heʻene tali̇́, pea nau mātuku atu ‘o ‘alu.
ʻI he ‘aho pē ko iá, naʻe omi ha kau Sātusi kia Si̇̄sū, ʻa e fa‘ahinga ‘oku nau taukaveʻi, ‘oku ‘ikai ha toetu‘u mei maté.
Pea nau pehē ange kia Sisū, ‟Tangata‘eiki, na‘e pehē ‘e Mōsesé, ‛Kapau ‘e mate ha tangata ‘oku teʻeki ha‘ane fānau, pea ‘e mali hano tokoua mo e uitoú ke ‘i ai ha hako ‘o si‘ono tokouá.’
Pea ko ʻeni: na‘e ‘i ai ha tautehina ‘e toko fitu na‘e nofo heni. Na‘e mali ʻa e ʻuluaki̇́ pea mate ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane fānau, pea kuo tuku hono uitoú ki hono tokouá.
Ko e me‘a tatau pē na‘e hoko ki he tehina ko iá, mo e fika tolú, pea pehē ai pē ‘o a‘u ki he fika fitú.
Pea toki mate ki mui ʻa e fefiné.
Ka hoko ʻa e ‘aho ‘o e toetu‘u ʻa e maté, ko hai he tokofitu ko iá te na malí? He na‘á nau mali kotoa pē mo e fefiné.”
Pea ko e tali ‘e Sīsuú, ‟‘Oku fehālaaki ho‘omou ma‘ú ko e ‘ikai te mou maheni mo e Tohitapú, pē ko e ivi māfimafi ʻo e ‘Otuá.
He ka toetu‘u ʻa e kakai kuo maté, he‘ikai ke nau toe nofo mali kinautolu, ka te nau hangē tofu pē ko e kau ‘āngelo ‘i Langi̇́.
Pea ko e me‘a ki he toetu‘u mei he maté, kuo teʻeki koā te mou lau he Tohitapú ʻa e meʻa naʻe folofolaʻaki atu ʻe he ʻOtuá kiate kimoutolú:
‛Ko aú ko e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Ēpalahame, mo e ‘Otua ‘o ‘Aisake, mo e ‘Otua ‘o Sēkope.’ Ko ia ai, ko e ‘Otua ia ‘o e kakai moʻui̇́, ‘o ‘ikai ko e ‘Otua ‘o e kakai maté.”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai e kakai̇́, naʻa nau fakatumutumu he anga ‘o e faiako ‘a Sīsuú.
Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa e kau Fālesí kuo fakasi̇̄longo‘i ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kau Sātusí, naʻa nau fakatahataha mai leva mo kinautolu.
Pea hanga ‘e he toko taha ‘iate kinautolu, ko e mataotao ʻi he laó, ‘o sivi‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū ʻaki ʻene fehu‘i ko ʻeni̇́:
‟Tangata‘eiki, ko e fekau fē he Laó ‘oku mahuʻinga tahá?”
Pea folofola ʻa Sīsū, ‛Te ke ‘ofa ki he ‘Eiki ko ho ‘Otuá ʻaki ho lotó kotoa, mo ho laumālié kotoa, pea mo ho ‘atamaí kotoa.’
Ko e fekau mahuʻinga tahá ʻeni mo tuʻukimuʻá.
Pea ko e hoko hake pē ki ai̇́, ‘oku tatau pē mo ia: ‛Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungā‘api̇́ ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koé.’
‘Oku fakatefito ki he ongo fekau ‘e ua ko iá ʻa e Lao ‘a Mōsesé, pea mo e ngaahi akonaki ʻa e kau palōfitá.”
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei fakataha mai ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́, naʻe fai atu ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e fehu‘i ko ʻeni̇́ kiate kinautolu:
‟Ko e hā haʻamou lau ki he Mīsaiá? Ko e hako ia ‘o hai?”
Pea pehē ange leva ‘e Sīsū, ‟Kae fēfē ʻa e nofo‘ia ‘a Tēvita ‘e he Laumālié, pea naʻe pehē ai ‘e ia,
‘Na‘e folofola ʻa e ‘Eiki̇́ ki hoku ‘Eiki̇́,
Kapau leva na‘e ui ia ‘e Tēvita ko hono ‘Eiki, ‘e anga fēfē ai ke lau ia ko hono foha?”
Pea na‘e ‘ikai ha taha te ne lava ke fai ha tali, pea talu mei he taimi ko iá mo e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e toe fakato‘oto‘a ke fai ha fehu‘i kiate ia.

23.text: Pea toki folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he fuʻu kakai̇́ mo ʻene kau akó,
Ko e kau faiako Laó mo e kau Fālesi̇́, ‘oku nau ma‘u mafai ke fakaʻuhigaʻi ʻa e Lao ‘a Mōsesé.
Ko ia, mou talangofua mo fai ʻa e me‘a kotoa ‘oku nau talaatú, kae ‘oua na‘á mou fa‘ifa‘itaki ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku nau fai̇́. He ‘oku ‘ikai te nau fai ki he me‘a ‘oku nau malanga‘aki̇́.
‘Oku nau hilifaki ʻa e ngaahi kavenga mamafa mo faingata‘a ki he kakai̇́, kae ‘ikai te nau fie ala atu ‘o tokoni‘i kinautolu.

He ʻoku nau fai pē ‘enau me‘a kotoa, ke mamata ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́. ‘Oku nau ha‘i ki honau la‘é mo honau nimá ha ngaahi veesi folofola laulalahi pea pao lōloa honau kofú, ke pehē ʻoku nau fai ki he folofolá!
‘Oku nau manako foki ke nofo mu‘a he ngaahi kātoangá mo e ngaahi fai‘angalotú.
Pea ‘oku nau saiʻia ke fakatapua kinautolu ‘e he kakai̇́ he feituʻu fakapuleʻangá, ʻo lau ko e Faiako Tohitapu.
Ka ko kimoutolu, ke ʻoua na‘a ui kimoutolu ko e ‟Faiako Tohitapu” he ko e kau tautehina pē ʻakimoutolu, pea ‘oku toko taha pē ho‘omou Faiakó.
Pea ‘oua na‘a ui ha mou taha ‘i māmani, ko e ‟Tamai” he ‘oku taha pē ho‘omou Tamai̇́, ‘a ia ‘oku ‘i he Langi̇́.
Pea mou tokanga foki ke ‘oua na‘a ui ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu ko homou Taki, he ‘oku taha pē homou Taki̇́, ko e Mīsaiá.
ʻIlonga ʻa ia ʻoku fiehoko ko e tuʻukimuʻa ‘iate kimoutolú, ke hoko ia ko ho‘omou sevāniti.
Pea ‘ilonga ha taha te ne fiemaʻu ha tuʻunga mā‘olunga, kuo pau ke ne fakavaivaiʻi ia, he ‘ilonga ha taha te ne fakavaivaiʻi iá, kuo pau ke hiki hake ia ki ha tuʻunga mā‘olunga.

ʻOku malaʻia ‘a kimoutolu kau faiako Lao mo e kau Fālesi. ʻA e hako‘i lotuloi! ‘Oku mou haʻaki tāpuni ʻa e matapā ki he Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́ kiate kinautolu naʻe mei hū ki ai̇́. He ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fie hū ki ai, pē te mou tuku ke hū ki ai ‘akinautolu ‘oku fie hū ki ai̇́.

‟ʻOku malaʻia ‘a kimoutolu kau faiako Lao mo e kau Fālesi! ʻA e hako‘i lotuloi! He ‘oku ‘osi ʻa e ngaahi fonuá mo e ngaahi ‘otu motú ho‘omou feinga holo ke fakaului mai ha fo‘i toko taha. Peá ka faifai angé kuo ului mai ha taha, pea ʻoku mou toki ngaohi ia ke liunga ua hake ʻene pau ke ‘alu ki Heli̇́, ‘iate kimoutolu!

ʻOku malaʻia ‘a kimoutolu kau takimuʻa kui! Ko e ‘ātunga ʻeni ho‘omou faiakó: Tokua ka ai ha taha ‘e fuakava ʻi he Temipalé, ko e me‘a noa pē ia. Ka ‘o ka ai ha taha ‘e fuakava ‘i he koula he Temipalé, kuo pau ke ne fai ki heʻene fuakavá!
ʻA e kau vale mo kui! He ko fē ‘oku mahu‘inga angé, ʻa e koulá pē ko e Temipalé ‘oku ʻuhinga ai ʻa e toputapu ʻa e koulá?

‘Oku mou pehē foki ‘ekimoutolu, ʻOka fuakava ha taha ‘i he ‘ōlitá, pea ‘oku ‘ikai mo‘ua ia ke ne fai ki heʻene fuakavá. Ka ‘okapau ‘e fuakava ha taha ia ‘o tuʻunga ‘i ha me‘a‘ofa kuo tuku he funga ‘ōlitá, pea kuo pau ke ne fai ki heʻene fuakavá.
He toki kau kui mo‘oni! Ko e fē ‘oku mahu‘inga angé; ʻa e me‘a‘ofá pē ko e ‘ōlita ‘oku toputapu ai ʻa e me‘a‘ofá?
He ka ai ha taha ʻe fuakava he ‘ōlitá, ko e fuakava ai pē ia he me‘a‘ofa kuo tuku ai̇́.
Peá ka ai ha taha ʻe fuakava ʻi he Temipalé, ko ʻene fuakava ai pē ia ki he ‘Otua ‘okú ne ʻafio ai.
Peá ka ai ha taha ʻe fuakava ki he Langi̇́, ko ʻene fuakava ai pē ia ki he taloni ‘o e ‘Otua ‘oku ʻafio ai̇́.

ʻOku malaʻia ‘a kimoutolu kau faiako Lao mo e kau Fālesi. ʻA e hako‘i lotuloi! ‘Oku mou ‘oange ma‘a e ‘Otuá ʻa e vahe hongofulu ‘o e ngaahi fa‘ahinga ʻakaú kai iiki̇́, ‘o hangē ko e miniti̇̄, mo e tili mo e kūmini. Ka ʻoku mou tukunoa‘i ʻa e talangofua ki he ngaahi fakahinohino mahu‘inga he Laó, ‘o hangē ko e faitotonú, mo e faimanava‘ofá, mo e faimoʻoni̇́. ʻOku sai ke fai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko eni̇́, pea ‘oua foki na‘a liʻaki ai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko ená.
He toki kau takimuʻa kui! ‘Oku mou heuʻi ʻa e langó mei ho‘omou ipú kae folofua ʻa e kāmeli̇́!
ʻOku malaʻia ‘a kimoutolu kau faiako Lao mo e kau Fālesi! ʻA e hako‘i lotuloi! ‘Oku mou fufulu ʻa e tu‘a ipú mo e tu‘a peleti̇́, ka ‘oku fonu homou lotó he mānumanú mo e siokitá.
He toki kau Fālesi kui! Tomu‘a fufulu ʻa e loto ipú mo e peleti̇́ kae fakatou ma‘a ‘a loto mo tu‘a.

ʻOku malaʻia ‘a kimoutolu kau faiako Laó mo e kau Fālesi! ʻA e hako‘i lotuloi! ‘Oku mou hangē ha ngaahi fonualoto kuo vali hiná, ʻa ia ʻoku hā faka‘ofo‘ofa ‘a tu‘a, ka ‘oku fonu hui mo e ‘anga‘anga ‘au‘aunga ‘a loto.
Ko homou ‘ātungá ia. ‘Oku mou hā matamatalelei ‘i tu‘a ʻi ho‘omou moʻui̇́ ki he sio atu ʻa e kakai, ka ʻoku fonu homou lotó he māʻoniʻoni loi̇́ mo e faikovi̇́.”

‟ʻOku malaʻia ‘a kimoutolu kau faiako Laó mo e kau Fālesi̇́. ʻA e hako‘i lotuloi! ‘Oku mou fokotu‘u ʻa e ngaahi maka fakamanatu ‘o e kau palōfitá, mo fakasanisani ʻa e ngaahi fonualoto ‘o e kakai lotú.
Pea mou toki pehē: ‛Kapau na‘e fanau‘i kimautolu he kuonga ‘o ‘emau fanga kui̇́, na‘e ‘ikai te mau kau mo kinautolu he lilingi ʻo e toto ‘o si‘i kau palōfitá.’
‘A ia ‘oku mou fakamo‘oni‘i aipē, ko e hako kimoutolu ‘o e kakai na‘á nau fakapoongi ʻa e kau palōfitá.
Pē‘i mou fai atu ā, ke mou fakakakato ʻa e ngāue kovi na‘e kamataʻi ‘e ho‘omou ngaahi kui̇́!
He toki kau lotuloi mo e hako‘i kākā. Te mou hao fēfē mei Heli̇́?

Ko ia, te u tuku atu kiate kimoutolu ha kau palōfita mo ha kau tangata poto mo ha kau faiako. Peá te mou tāmate‘i ʻa e ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu, pea tukifaʻo ʻa e ni‘ihi. Te mou tā ʻa e ni‘ihi ‘i homou ngaahi falelotú. Peá te mou fakatangaʻi kinautolu mei he kolo ki he kolo.

Pea ‘e ‘eke kiate kimoutolu ʻa e toto ‘o e kau māʻoniʻoni kotoa pē kuo tāmate‘i ‘i māmani, ‘o kamata meia ‘Ēpeli ʻo a‘u kia Sākalaiá, ʻa e foha ‘o Palakaiá, ‘a ē na‘a mou fakapoongi he vaha‘a ‘o e potu tapú mo e ‘ōlitá.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ko e kotoa ʻo e tautea ‘o e ngaahi tāmate kotoa ko ʻeni̇́ ‘e tō mai ki he toʻutangatá ko ʻeni̇́!”

‟‘E Selusalema! Selusalema ē! ‘A kimoutolu ‘oku mou tāmate‘i ʻa e kau palōfitá mo tolomakaʻi ʻakinautolu kuo tuku mai ‘e he ‘Otuá kiate kimoutolú. Kuo tā tu‘o fiha ʻeni ‘eku fie fakatahataha‘i mai ho‘o fānaú, ‘o hangē ko ha motu‘a moa ‘okú naʻe ‘ō‘ōfakiʻi hono fāngangá ki hono lalo kapakaú, ka na‘e ‘ikai te mou loto ki ai.
Pea ko ʻeni: Kuo pau ke li̇̄ ʻaki homou falé ʻo ʻikai ke toe nofoʻi.
Pea ʻoku ou talaatu foki kiate kimoutolu, ‘E ‘ikai te mou toe mamata kiate au, kae‘oua kuo mou leaʻaki ʻeni ‘ekimoutolu, ‛Tauange ke tāpuaki‘i ‘e he ‘Otuá,

24.text: Pea ‘alu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei he Temipalé, ke fai atu ʻene fonongá, mo e omi ʻene kau akó kiate ia ‘o nau fakatalanoa kiate ia ʻo kau ki he ngaahi lotoʻā ʻo e Temipalé.
Ka naʻe folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Oku mou sio ki he ngaahi lotoʻā ko ʻeni̇́? Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘e ‘ikai ha fo‘i maka heni ‘e kei hilifaki ‘i ha funga maka, he ‘e holoki kotoa.”

Pea ʻi he nofo hifo ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i he Moʻunga ‘Ōlive, pea omi kiate ia ʻene kau akó, ‘o nau fakaekinautolu mo ia. Pea nau ʻeke ange ki ai, ‟Talamai angē, ‘e hoko fakakū nai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ni, pea ko e hā ha faka‘ilonga kuo ofi ho‘o hā‘ele mai̇́, mo e ngataʻanga ʻo māmani̇́?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Mou tokanga na‘a takihala‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha taha.
He ‘e omi ha tokolahi ‘i hoku hingoá, ʻo nau tala, ‛Ko e Mīsaiá au!’ Peá te nau takihala‘i ha tokolahi.

Peá te mou fanongo talanoa ki ha ngaahi tau mo ha ngaahi fakalanga tau, kae tokanga na‘a mou ilifia ai. He kuo pau ke hoko ha ngaahi me‘a pehē: ka ‘e ‘ikai ʻuhinga ia kuo vave ʻa e ngata‘anga ‘o māmani̇́.
He ‘e tu‘u hake ʻa e fonua ko eé ke nau tau mo e fonua ko eé, mo e pule‘anga ko eé ke tau mo e pule‘anga ko eé. Pea ‘e hoko ha ngaahi honge mo ha ngaahi mofuike, he ngaahi feitu‘u kehekehe.
Ka ko e ngaahi me‘á ni kotoa, ko e kamata‘anga pē ia ‘o e ngaahi faingata‘a ‘e hokó.
Pea ‘e toki puke kimoutolu ‘o tuku atu ke tautea mo tāmate‘i, pea ‘e fehi‘anekina kimoutolu ‘e he kakai kotoa koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au.
‘I he taimi ko iā, ʻe tokolahi ʻa e kakai ‘e mole ‘enau tui̇́. Te nau fefakaʻiloʻaki mo fetāufehiʻaʻaki.
Pea ʻe tokolahi ʻa e kau palōfita loi̇́ ʻe haʻu, pea te nau takihala‘i ha tokolahi.
Pea koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e fakautuutu ʻa e kovi̇́, ‘e faka‘au ke mokoteilo ʻa e ʻofa ‘a e kakai tokolahi.
Kae ‘ilonga ha taha ‘e kātaki ‘o a‘u ki he ngata‘angá, ‘e fakamo‘ui ia.
Ka ko ʻene toki ‘osi pē ‘a māmani kātoa hono malanga‘i ki ai ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei ʻo e Pule‘angá, pea ‘e toki hokomai leva ʻa e ngata‘angá.”
Ko ia, ka faifai pea a‘u ki ha ‘aho kuo mou sio ai ki he Potu Tapú ʻoku tu‘u ai ʻa e ‟Me‘a Fakalieliá ‘a ē na‘e tala ‘e he palōfita ko Tānielá. (Tauange ke mahino ʻeni kiate koe ‘okú ke lau ení).”
Pea kapau ‘e a‘u ki he ‘aho ko iā ‘oku mou nofo ‘i Siutea, pea mou hola ki he moʻungá.
Pea ko ia kuo kaka ki hono funga falé, ke ‘oua te ne toe ‘alu hifo ke toʻo ha‘ane me‘a mei loto-fale.
Pea ko ia ‘oku ‘i ʻuta, ke ‘oua te ne toe foki ki kolo ke kumi hono pulupulú ke ‘alu mo ia.
Ka ʻe si‘i faka‘ofa ʻa e kau fefine feitamá he ngaahi ‘aho ko iā, pea mo e kau fā‘ele valevalé.
Ko ia, mou lotu ki he ‘Otuá ‘o kole ke ‘oua ‘e hoko ho‘omou holá ‘i he fa‘ahita‘u momokó, pē ko ha ‘aho Sāpate.
He ‘e lahi ‘aupito ʻa e ngaahi faingata‘a ‘e hoko ai̇́. Talu ʻa e kamata‘anga ‘o māmani, mo e teʻeki ha faingata‘a lahi pehē. Pea ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito hano ua he kaha‘ú.
Peá ka naʻe ‘ikai finangalo e ‘Otuá ke fakanounou ʻa e ngaahi ‘aho ko iā, pehē ‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e hao. Ka ‘e fakanounou ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e ngaahi ‘aho ko iā koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻene kakai fili̇́.
Pea ʻi he taimi ko iā, kapau ‘e pehē atu ‘e taha, ‟Ko e Mīsaiá eni” pē ‟Ko e Mīsaia ena” pea ‘oua ʻaupito te mou tui ki ai.
He ‘e hopo hake ha kau mi̇̄saia loi mo ha kau palōfita loi, pea te nau fai ha ngaahi mana lalahi mo ha ngaahi me‘a fakaofo ke takihala‘i ʻaki ‘a kimoutolu kuo fili ‘e he ‘Otuá.
Tokanga! He ko ʻeni kuo u ‘osi tala atu ia kiate kimoutolu.
Ko ia, kapau leva ‘e pehē atu ‘e ha ni‘ihi, ‟Sio atu! Ko ʻena he toafá!” pea ‘oua te mou ō ki ai. Pea kapau te nau pehē atu, ‟Ko ʻeni! ‘Oku toi ‘i hē!” ‘oua ʻaupito te mou tui ki ai.
He ko e hokomai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ‘e hangē ko e ʻuhilá, ʻene tapa he langi̇́ mei he hahaké ‘o a‘u ki he hihifó.
He ka ‘ilonga ha feitu‘u kuo li̇̄ ki ai ha ‘anga‘anga, kuo pau ke fakapotanga ki ai ha fanga ‘i̇̄kale.
‟Peá ka hili ange ʻa e ngaahi faingata‘a ‘o e ngaahi ‘aho ko iā,

Pea ‘e toki hā mai mei he langi̇́ ʻa e faka‘ilonga ‘o e Foha ʻo e Tangatá. Pea ‘e tangi mamahi ai ʻa e matakali kotoa pē ‘i māmani. Peá te nau hanga hake ‘oku hā‘ele mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá he ngaahi ‘aó mo e māfimafi mo e lāngilangi lahi.
Peá te ne fekau atu ʻene kau ‘āngeló, kuo ifi le‘olahi ha talamipite, pea te nau tānaki mai ʻene kakai fili̇́ mei he tapa kotoa pē ‘o māmani.”
‟Pea mou ako mei he fiki̇́. He ka fai lau pea talamuka hono ngaahi vaʻá, pea tā kuo ofi ʻa e fa‘ahita‘u māfaná.
‘E pehē pē foki mo kimoutolu ‘oka mou ka mamata ki he ngaahi me‘á ni. Te mou ‘ilo ai kuo vave pē ke kamata, he kuo aʻu mai ki he matapā.
‘Oku ou fakapapauʻi atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘e hoko ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni kotoa pē kuo teʻeki ke ʻosi ʻa e toʻutangata ʻoku lolotongá ni.
Pea ‘e mole ʻa e langi̇́ mo māmani, ka ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito mole ʻeku ngaahi leá.”
‟Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne ‘ilo pē ‘e hoko fakakū mai ʻa e ‘aho mo e houa ko iā; ‘oku ‘ikai ‘ilo ‘e he kau ‘āngelo ‘i Langi̇́, pea na‘á mo e Fohá, ka ko e Tamai̇́ toko taha pē ‘okú naʻe ʻafioʻi.
Ko e hokomai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ‘e hangē ko e me‘a na‘e hoko he kuonga ‘o Noá.
He ʻi he te‘eki ke hoko ʻa e lōmaki̇́, na‘e kai mo inu pē ʻa e kakai̇́, mo nau femaliʻaki, ‘o a‘u pē ki he ‘aho na‘e heka ai ‘a Noa ki he ‘A‘aké.
Na‘e ‘ikai te nau misi ‘e ai ha me‘a ‘e hoko, kae ʻoua kuo tō mai ʻa e lōmaki̇́ ‘o tafiʻi kotoa ai. ʻE pehē pē foki mo e hokomai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.
Ka a‘u ki he ‘aho ko iā, ‘oku ngāue ha ongo tangata ‘i ʻuta, pea ‘e ‘ave ʻa e taha, kae tuku pē ʻa e taha.
Ka a‘u ki ai̇́, ‘oku fai ‘e ha ongo fafine ha‘ana momosi uite, pea ‘e ‘ave ʻa e taha kae tuku pē ʻa e taha.
Mou tokanga! He ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ʻa e ‘aho ‘e ha‘u ai homou ‘Eiki̇́.
Ka mou ʻilo muʻa ʻeni: Ka naʻe lava ke ‘ilo ‘e ha taha pē ‘e ha‘u fakakū ʻa e kaiha‘á, ke hae hono falé, te ne le‘ohi ia pea ʻe ‘ikai te ne tuku ke haea hono falé.
Pehē foki mo kimoutolu, ke mou mateuteu ma‘u pē, he ‘e hokomai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ʻi ha taimi ʻe ʻikai te mou ʻamanaki ki ai.”
‘Ko fē leva ia ʻa e tangata ngāue falala‘anga mo fakapotopotó, ʻa ia kuo fakanofo ‘e he ʻeiki ʻo e ʻapi̇́, ke pule ki heʻene kau ngāué mo ʻange ʻenau meʻatokoni̇́ ʻi hono taimi̇́?
‘Oku monū‘ia ʻa e sevāniti, ʻa ia ‘e a‘u mai ʻa e ʻeiki ʻo e ‘api̇́, ʻokú ne fai honau fatongiá.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, te ne fakanofo ʻa e tangata ngāue ko iā ke pule ki heʻene koloá kotoa!
Ka ʻokapau leva ko ha tangata ngāue kovi ia, pea te ne pehē ‘i hono lotó, ‟‘Okú kei tuai ʻa e foki mai ‘a hoku pulé.”
Peá te ne taa‘i hono kaungāngāué, ka naʻe kai mo kaungāinu mo e kau fa‘a konaá.
Pea ‘e foki mai ʻa e ʻeiki ʻoku ʻaʻana ʻa e kau ngāue ko iā, ‘i ha ‘aho na‘e ‘ikai te ne ʻamanaki ki ai, pea ʻi ha houa naʻe ʻikai te ne ʻilo ki ai.
Peá te ne toki hanga ‘o haeua ia pea tuku atu ia ki he nofoʻanga ʻo e kau lotuloi̇́, ʻa ia ko e potu ia te nau toki tangi ai mo fengauʻutaki ai honau nifó.

25.text: ʻI he taimi ko iā, naʻá ne fakatatau ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o Hēvani̇́ ki ha ō atu ha tamaiki finemui ‘e toko hongofulu mo ha‘anau ngaahi māama ke talitali ʻa e fononga mai ʻa ha tangata na‘e teu ke mali.
Ko e toko nima ai ko e kau fakavalevale, pea ko e toko nima ko e kau fakapotopoto.
Ko e kau fakavalevalé, na‘á nau toʻo ‘enau ngaahi māamá, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau toʻo ha‘anau lolo.
Ka ko e kau fakapotopotó na‘á nau toʻo ‘enau māamá mo toe toʻo ‘enau ngaahi hinalolo kuo fonu.
Ka na‘e tuai mai ʻa e tangata mali̇́, pea ko ia naʻa nau tule mohe kotoa ‘o nau tō hifo ‘o mohe.
Pea a‘u ki he tu‘apoó kuo ongo mai ʻa e kaila, ‟Ko e tangata mali̇́ ʻeni! Mou omi ke tau fakafetaulaki ki ai!”
Pea ‘āhake kotoa ʻa e tamaiki finemui̇́ ‘o teu ‘enau ngaahi māamá.
Pea pehēange ‘e he kau fakavalevalé ki he kau fakapotopotó, ‟‘Omai mu‘a haʻamau me‘i lolo, he kuo mei maha ‘emau māamá.”
Pea tali ‘e he kau fakapotopotó, ‟‘Oua, he ‘e ‘ikai ke tau feʻunga kotoa ai. Mou ō atu ki he fakatauʻanga loló ‘o fakatau mei ai haʻamou me‘i lolo.”

Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei ō ʻa e tamaiki finemui fakavalevalé ‘o kumi loló, kuo aʻu mai ʻa e fononga ʻa e tangata mali̇́, pea ko e tamaiki finemui naʻe maau ʻenau teú, naʻa nau hūatu mo ia ki he kātoangá, pea tāpuni leva ʻa e matapaá.
Pea foki mai ʻa e tamaiki finemui fakavalevalé ʻo ʻilo kuo nau tōmui̇́, pea nau kaila atu mei tu‘a, ‟‘Eiki! ‘Eiki! Toʻo mai mu‘a ʻa e matapaá ke mau hū atu!”
Ka naʻe pehē mai ‘e he tangata mali̇́, ‘Oku ou tala moʻoni atu, ʻoku ‘ikai ʻaupito te u ‘ilo ‘e au kimoutolu!
‟Ko ia, mou tokanga ‘o le‘o! He ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ʻa e ‘ahó pē ko e houá.”
‟Ko ʻeni foki, ko e anga ‘o e Pule‘anga ʻo Hēvani̇́. ʻOku tatau mo ha tangata na‘e teu fononga ki ha fonua mama‘o, pea naʻe ui mai ʻene kau ngāué, ‘o ne tuku kiate kinautolu ʻene koloá ke nau pule‘i.

Ki ha taha, na‘á ne ‘oange ʻa e tangai koula ʻe nima, ki ha taha, naʻá ne ʻoange ha tangai koula ʻe ua, pea ki ha taha, ʻa e tangai koula ʻe taha, ʻo fakatatau pē ki honau mafai taki taha. Pea toki ‘alu atu ia ki muli.
Pea ‘alu leva ʻa e tamaioʻeiki na‘e tuku ai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe nimá, ‘o ne ngāue‘i, ‘o toe ma‘u ai ha tangai ʻe nima kehe.
Na‘e fai pehē mo e tamaioʻeiki na‘e tuku ai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe ua, pea naʻe toe ma‘u mai mo ha tangai ʻe ua kehe.
Ka ko e tamaioʻeiki na‘e tuku ai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe tahá, na‘e ‘alu atu ia ‘o keli ha luo, ‘o fufuu‘i ai ʻa e pa‘anga naʻe ʻoange ʻe hono ʻeiki̇́.
Pea fuoloa mei ai kuo foki mai ʻa e tangataʻeiki na‘e ‘a‘ana ʻa e kau ngāué. Pea naʻe fekau ke nau taki taha omi ʻo fakamatala ki he anga ʻene ngāue‘i ʻa e pa‘angá.

Pea ha‘u ʻa e tangata ngāue na‘e tuku ai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe nima ‘o ‘oatu ʻa e toe tangai ʻe nima kehe naʻá ne maʻú, mo ne pehē: ‛Tangata‘eiki, na‘á ke ‘omai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe nima, pea kuo u toe maʻu mei ai ha tangai ʻe nima kehe.’

Pea pehē ange ‘e he ‛Tangataʻeiki̇́, ‘Mālō e ngāue, siʻi tamaioʻeiki lelei mo falala‘anga! Kuó ke falala‘anga ʻi ha me‘a si‘i, ko ia te u fakanofo koe ke ke pule‘i ha ngaahi me‘a lahi. Ha‘u ā ʻo hū ki he fiefiaʻanga ʻo ho ʻeiki̇́!’

Pea ha‘u foki mo e toko taha na‘e tuku ai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe ua, ‘o ne pehē atu, ‛Tangata‘eiki, na‘á ke tuku mai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe ua, pea ko eni, kuo u toe ma‘u mei ai ha tangai koula ʻe ua kehe.’

Pea pehē ange ‘e he tangataʻeiki̇́: ‟‛E ngāue, siʻi tamaioʻeiki lelei mo falala‘anga. Kuó ke falala‘anga ʻi he pule‘i ʻo ha me‘a si‘i, ko ia te u fakanofo koe ke ke pule‘i ha ngaahi me‘a lahi. Ha‘u ā ʻo hū ki he fiefiaʻanga ʻo ho ʻeiki̇́!”

Pea toki ha‘u ʻa e tangata ngāue na‘e tuku ai ʻa e tangai koula ʻe tahá, ‘o ne pehē ange: ‟Tangata‘eiki, na‘á ku ‘ilo ‘e au ko e tangata faingata‘a koe. ‘Okú ke utu ʻa e me‘a na‘e ‘ikai te ke fakaheká, mo toli ʻa e me‘a na‘e ‘ikai te ke tō.
Peá u manavahē ai, ko ia naʻá ku ‘alu au ‘o tanu ho‘o koulá he kelekelé, pea ko ena, ko ho‘o meʻá ena.”
Pea tali ‘e he tangata‘eiki̇: ‟‘A e toki tamaioʻeiki kākā mo fakapikopiko! Naʻá ke ‘ilo koā ‘oku ou fa‘a utu ʻa e me‘a na‘e ‘ikai te u fakaheká mo toli ʻa e me‘a na‘e ‘ikai te u tō?
Pea ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai te ke ‘ave ai ‘eku pa‘angá ‘o fakahū he Pangikeé, hei‘ilo te u toe ma‘u kotoa mai ia mo hano tupu ‘i ha‘aku foki mai?
‛Mou toʻo ʻa e pa‘angá meiate ia ‘o ‘ange ki he tama ‘oku ‘i ai ʻa e tangai ʻe hongofulu!
He ko ia ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane me‘á, ‘e ‘oange ki ai mo ha me‘a, pea ʻe lahi ʻene koloá. Ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane me‘á, na‘á mo e me‘a ‘okú ne ma‘ú, ‘e fa‘ao mei ai.
Ka mou fakapuna ʻa e tangata ngāue pau‘u ko ená kitu‘a ki he fakapoʻuli, ki he feitu‘u ‘oku fai ai ʻa e tangi mo e mamahi lahi̇́.’”
‟He ʻoka faifai ‘o hā‘ele mai ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá mo hono lāngilangi̇́ mo ʻene kau ‘āngeló kotoa, ‘o ʻafio ‘i hono taloni fakatu‘i̇́.
Pea ‘e kātoa mai ʻa e kakai ‘o e ngaahi pule‘angá kiate ia, pea te ne vahevahe kinautolu, ‘o hangē ko e vahe‘i ‘e ha tauhisipi ʻene fanga sipi̇́ mei he fanga kosi̇́.
Peá te ne fokotu‘u ʻa e fanga sipi̇́ mei hono toʻomataʻú, mo e fanga kosi̇́ mei hono toʻohemá.

Pea ‘e toki folofola atu ʻa e Tu‘i̇́ ki he fa‘ahinga mei hono toʻomataʻú, ‘Mou omi ā, ‘a kimoutolu kuo tāpuekina ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́, ‘o ma‘u ʻa e pule‘anga kuo teu maʻamoutolu ‘e he ‘Otuá, talu mei he fakatupu ʻo māmani.
He na‘á ku fiekaia, pea naʻa mou fafanga au. Na‘á ku fieinua, pea naʻa mou ‘omi hoku inu. Na‘á ku ha‘u ko e muli, pea naʻa mou fakaafe‘i au ki homou ‘api̇́.
Na‘á ku tēlefua, pea naʻa mou ‘omi hoku vala. Na‘á ku puke, pea naʻa mou ʻaʻahi mai kiate au. Na‘á ku ‘i he pili̇̄sone, pea naʻa mou omi kiate au.
Pea tali ‘ekinautolu na‘e angatonú; ‛ʻEiki ē; na‘á mau sio ‘anefē ‘okú ke fiekaia pea mau ‘atu ha‘o me‘akai? Pea ʻanefē haʻo fieinua, ʻo mau ‘atu ai hao inú?
Na‘e ‘anefē ʻemau sio ko e muli koe, pea mau fakaafe‘i koe ki homau ‘api̇́? Pea ʻanefē ha‘o masiva kofu, pea mau fakakofu koe?
Pea ‘anefē haʻo mahakiʻia, pē nofo pili̇̄sone, pea mau ō atu ‘o vakai koe?’
Pea ʻe tali ‘e he Tu‘i̇́, ‛Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ko ho‘omou fai pehē ki he si‘i taha ‘i hoku ngaahi tokoua ko eni̇́, ko ho‘omou fai ia kiate au.’

Pea ‘e toki folofola ange ‘e he Tu‘i̇́ ki he fa‘ahinga mei hono toʻohemá, ‘Mou mavahe meiate au, ‘a kimoutolu kuo fakamala‘ia ‘e he ‘Otuá, ke tō ki he afi kuo teu mo‘oe Tēvoló mo ʻene kau ‘āngeló, ʻa ia ‘e ‘ikai ala matāmate‘i ‘e ha taha!
He na‘á ku fiekaia kae ‘ikai te mou ʻomi haʻaku meʻakai. Na‘á ku fieinua kae ‘ikai te mou ‘omi ha ku inu.
Na‘á ku ha‘u ko e muli kae ‘ikai te mou fakaafe‘i au ki homou ‘api̇́. Na‘á ku tēlefua, kae ‘ikai te mou ‘omi haku vala. Na‘á ku mahakiʻia mo nofo haʻisia, kae ‘ikai te mou omi ‘o vakai au.
Peá te nau toki tali ki ai; ‛ʻEiki na‘e ‘anefē haʻo fiekaia; pē fieinua, pē ko e muli koe, pē masiva kofu, pē mahakiʻia, pē nofo haʻisia, kae ‘ikai te mau tokoni atu kiate koe?’

Pea ‘e folofola ange ‘e he Tu‘i̇́ kiate kinautolu, ‛Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ko e ‘ikai ke mou tokoni ki he si‘i taha he ngaahi tokoua ko ʻeni ‘o‘okú, ko e ‘ikai ia te mou tokoni mai kiate aú.’”
‟‘E toki fekau ai ke hilifaki ki he fa‘ahinga ko iā ʻa e tautea taʻengata, kae hū ʻa e māʻoniʻoni̇́ ki he mo‘ui taʻengatá.”

26.text: ʻI he ‘osi leva ʻa e faiako ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, naʻá ne talaange kiate kinautolu,
‟‘Oku mou ʻilo pē ʻoku toe ha ‘aho ‘e ua pea fai ʻa e kātoanga Pāsová, pea ʻe tukuange ai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ke tukifaʻo ki ha kolosi.”
Pea ʻi he taimi ko iā, naʻe fakatahataha hake ʻa e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú, ki he ‘api ‘o Kaiafasi, ko e Taulaʻeiki Lahi̇́;
Pea naʻa nau faʻufaʻu ke puke fakafufū ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o tāmate‘i.
Ka na‘á nau pehē: ‟‘Oua ‘e fai he lolotonga ʻa e kātoangá, na‘a tupu ai ha moveuveu ʻi he kakai̇́.”
Pea lolotonga naʻe nofo ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i Pētani he fale ‘o e kilia ko Saimoné;
Kuo ha‘u ha fefine kiate ia mo ha‘ane hina ʻalapasita kuo fonu he lolo pani mahu‘inga ‘aupito, ʻo ne lilingi ia ʻi he fofonga ‘o Sīsuú, lolotonga ʻenau kai̇́.
Pea ʻi he sio ki ai ʻa e kau akó, naʻa nau kamata ‘ita mo nau pehē ange, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e maumau me‘a ko ʻeni̇́?
He ko e lolo ko ená, na‘e mei fakatau, ke ma‘u ai ha pa‘anga lahi, ke foaki ki he masivá.”
Ka naʻe meaʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘enau laú, pea ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou fakahoha‘asi ai si‘i fefiné ni? He kuó ne fai maʻaku, ha ngāue lelei.
He te mou fe‘ao ma‘u ai pē mo e masivá, ka ‘e ‘ikai te mou fe‘ao ma‘u ai pē mo au.
Ko ʻene lilingi ʻa e loló ni ki hoku sinó, ko ʻene teuteu ia au, ki hoku tanú.
Pea ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ‘ilonga ha tapa ‘o māmani ‘e malanga‘i ai ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei̇́, ‘e talanoa‘i ai foki, mo e me‘a kuó ne fai̇́, ko hono fakamanatu.”
ʻI he taimi ko iā, na‘e ‘alu atu ‘a Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ko e taha he toko hongofulu mā uá, ki he houʻeiki taulaʻeiki̇́;
‘O ne alea mo kinautolu ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e hā te mou ‘omi ma‘akú ‘okapau te u lavaki‘i atu ‘a Si̇̄sū?” Pea nau ‘oange kiate ia ha pa‘anga siliva ‘e tolungofulu.
Pea talu mei ai hono lama ‘e Siutasi hano faingamālie ke lavaki‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Pea na‘e omi ‘a e kau akó kia Si̇̄sū ʻi he ʻuluaki ‘aho ‘o e Kātoanga Mā Tapu Lēvani̇́, ‘o nau pehē ange, ‟Ko e fē feituʻu ‘okú ke loto ke mau teuteu, ke ke ʻilo ai ʻa e Pāsová?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Mou ō ki kolo ki ha tangata ʻoku nofo ai ‘o talaange, ʻOku fakahā mai ‘e he Faiakó: Kuo vave hoku taimi̇́. Peá te u kai ʻa e Pāsová mo ‘eku kau akó, ‘i ho ‘api̇́.”
Pea fai ʻe he kau akó ʻo hangē ko e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolú, ‘o nau teuteu ʻa e Pāsová.
Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi poʻuli̇́, naʻe tokoto atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he tēpilé mo e toko hongofulu mā uá.
Pea lolotonga ‘enau kai̇́, naʻe folofola ange ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟ ʻOkú ou fakapapau atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘E lavaki‘i au ‘e he toko taha ‘iate kimoutolu.”
Pea naʻa nau lotomamahi ‘aupito ai, ‘o nau ‘eke tāutaha kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko au nai, ‘Eiki?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo pehē: ‟‘E lavaki‘i au ‘e ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu kuó ne kai fakataha mo au, mei he tisi̇́.

Moʻoni pē, ʻe mate ʻa e Foha ‘o e tangatá ‘o fakatatau ki he lau ʻa e Folofolá, ka ‘e mala‘ia ʻa e toko taha te ne lavaki‘i ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá. Na‘e sai ange ʻokapau naʻe ʻikai fanau‘i ʻa e toko taha ko iā.”
Pea pehē ange leva ‘e Siutasi, ʻa ē naʻá ne lavakiʻi iá, kia Sisū, ‟He ko au ia koā, Tangata‘eiki?” Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko koe ʻeni kuó ke talamai̇́.”
Pea lolotonga ‘enau kei kai̇́, naʻe toʻo ‘e Si̇̄sū ha konga mā, pea naʻe tāpuaki‘i ia, ʻo ne toki pakipaki ‘o ʻange ki he‘ene kau akó, mo ne meʻa, ‟Mou toʻo ‘o kai. Ko hoku sinó eni.”
Pea toʻo foki ‘e Sisū mo ha ipu uaine ‘o ne fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otuá, pea naʻe toki ‘oange kiate kinautolu, mo ne meʻa, ‟Mou inu kotoa pē mei ai.
He ko hoku totó eni, ko e toto ʻo e fuakava fo‘ou, pea kuo lilingi ia maʻae tokolahi̇́ ke lava ai ʻa e fakamolemole angahalá.
Pea ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘E ‘ikai te u toe inu mei he uainé ni kae‘oua kuo hokosia ʻa e ‘aho te u toki inu uaine fo‘ou ai mo kimoutolu ʻi he Pule‘anga ‘o ‘eku Tamai̇́.”
Pea hili ‘enau hiva ha himi, naʻa nau toki ō atu mei he ‘api̇́, ki tu‘ākoló ki he Moʻunga ‘Ōlivé.
Pea toki folofola ʻa Sisū ki heʻene kau akó, ‟Ko e poó ni, te mou liʻaki kotoa pē au, ka mou hola, ‘o hangē ko e lau ʻa e Tohitapú,
Kae hili ʻeku toetuʻú, te u mu‘omu‘a ‘iate kimoutolu ki Kāleli.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Pita, ‟Neongo nai ʻe liʻaki koe ‘ekinautolu ni, ka ‘e ‘ikai ‘aupito te u liʻaki ‘e au koe.”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟Ko e mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ʻi he teʻeki ke ‘u‘ua ‘a e moá ‘ahengihengi̇́, kuo tu‘o tolu ho‘o fakahā ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo ‘ekoe au.”
Kae talaange pē ‘e Pita kiate ia, ‟‘E ‘ikai ‘aupito ha‘aku fakaʻikaiʻi koe, neongo ko ha me‘a ke ta mate fakataha ai.” Pea naʻe lea pehē foki, mo e kātoa ʻo e kau akó.
Pea a‘u atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó ki he feitu‘u na‘e ui ko Ketisemani, pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou nofo hifo heni ka u ‘alu ki hē, ‘o fai ‘eku lotu.”
Pea ō mo ia ‘a Pita mo e ongo foha ʻo Sēpeti̇́, ʻa Sēmisi mo Sione. Pea kamata mamahi lahi hono lotó mo mafasia ‘aupito.
Pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Oku mātuʻaki mamahi moʻoni hoku laumālié ‘o hangē ka u ka maté. Mou nofo mu‘a heni ke tau feʻao mo au.”

Pea laka si‘i atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o tō fo‘ohifo ki he kelekelé, ʻo ne lotu ʻo pehē: ‟‘E Tamai, kapau ‘e ala lava, peá ke ʻave muʻa meiate au ʻa e ipú ni. Ka neongo ia, ‘oua naʻa fai hoku lotó, kae fai pē ho finangaló.”
Pea toki foki atu ‘a Sisū ki he kau akó, tā kuo nau ‘osi kotoa he mohe. Pea naʻe pehē ange ai kia Pita, ‟ʻOku ‘ikai koā te mou lava ke ʻā mo au ‘i ha houa ‘e taha?
Mou ʻā ‘o le‘o mo lotu, ke ‘oua na‘a lava ‘e he Filí ‘o ‘ahi‘ahi‘i kimoutolu, he ʻoku loto pē ki ai̇ ʻa laumālie, ka ‘oku vaivai homou kakanó.”
Pea toe ‘alu ‘a Si̇̄sū, ko hono tuʻo uá ia, ‘o lotu, ʻo ne pehē: ‟‘E Tamai, kapau ‘oku ‘ikai lava ke ʻave ʻa e ipu ni, ka kuo pau ke u inu ia, pea fai pē ho finangaló.”
Pea ʻi he foki atu ‘a Si̇̄sū, tā kuo toe mohe pē kinautolu, he kuo nau ongosia ‘aupito.
Ko ia, naʻá ne tuku ai pē kinautolu ai, ʻo ne toe ‘alu, ko hono tuʻo tolú ia, ‘o fai ʻene lotú, ʻo ne leaʻaki ai pē ʻa e meʻa tatau.

Pea toki ha‘u ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó ‘o ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Oku mou kei mohe pē koā mo fakafiemālie? Vakai, kuo hoko mai ʻa e taimi̇́, ke lavaki‘i ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ki he kau angahalá.
Mou tu‘u ā ke tau ō! Vakai! Ko hoku lavaki̇́ ena kuo ofi mai.”

Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei lea ‘a Sīsuú, tā kuo a‘u mai ‘a Siutasi, ko e taha ʻi he toko hongofulu mā uá, mo ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi kuo toʻo heletā mo toʻo ʻakau, ko e fekau mai ʻe he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú.
Pea naʻe ‘osi tala ‘e Siutasi kiate kinautolu ʻa e faka‘ilongá, ʻo pehē: ‟Mou puke ʻa e tangata te u ʻuma ki ai̇́.”
Pea ʻalu atu leva ‘a Siutasi kia Si̇̄sū, ‘o ne pehē ange, ‟Tangata‘eiki!” Pea naʻe ʻuma ki ai.
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟Tangata, fai pē ʻa e meʻa ‘okú ke ha‘u ai̇́?”
Pea ko eni, naʻe ai ha toko taha ʻi he kau ako ‘a Sīsuú, na‘á ne unuhi ʻene heletaá ‘o taa‘i ʻaki ʻa e tamaioʻeiki ʻa e Taulaʻeiki Lahi̇́, ‘o motu hono telingá.
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟‘Ai ho‘o heletaá ki hono ‘ai‘angá! He ‘ilonga ʻakinautolu ʻoku toʻo heletaá, te nau mate pē ʻi he heletā.
Kuo teʻeki koā ke ke ‘ilo‘i te u lava ‘o kole tokoni ki he‘eku Tamai̇́, pea naʻe tuku mai ha kongakau ‘āngelo ‘e hongofulumāua pē lahi hake, ke tokoniʻi au?
Ka ‘e fakamo‘oni fēfē ai ʻa e ngaahi potu Folofola ‘oku hā ai, kuo pau ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni kiate au.”

ʻI he taimi ko iā, naʻe toki folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́, ‟Ko ho‘omou omi koā mo e heletā mo e ʻakaú ke puke atu ʻaki aú, he ko ha hiamatea au? Ko e ‘aho ki he ‘aho mo ‘eku nofo ʻo faiako ʻi he Temipalé, kae ‘ikai te mou puke ai au.
Ka kuo hoko kotoa ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ke fakamo‘oni ki he ngaahi me‘a na‘e tohi ‘e he kau palōfitá, ʻi he Tohitapú.”

Pea ko kinautolu naʻa nau puke ‘a Sīsuú, naʻa nau taki atu ia ki he ‘api ‘o Kaiafasi̇́, ʻa ia ko e Taulaʻeiki Lahi̇́, he kuo fakatahataha hake ki ai ʻa e kau faiako Lao ‘a Mōsesé mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú.
Ka naʻe muimui mama‘o atu ‘a Pita ‘o a‘u ki he ‘api ‘o e Taulaʻeiki Lahi̇́. Pea naʻe hū atu ki loto ‘o tangutu fakataha ai mo e kau le‘ó ke vakai pē ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘e hokó.
Pea feinga ‘a e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātuʻá ke ma‘u ha kau fakamo‘oni loi ke talatalaaki‘i ‘aki ‘a Si̇̄sū koeʻuhi̇̄ ke lava ai ke nau tāmate‘i ia.
Ka naʻe ʻikai te nau maʻu ha taha, neongo naʻe tokolahi ʻakinautolu naʻe tuʻu ko e fakamoʻoni loi̇́. Pea faifai, laka mai ha ongo tangata ‘e toko ua;
‘O na pehē: ‟Na‘e lau ‘e he sianá ni, Te u holoki ʻa e Temipale ‘o e ‘Otuá, pea te u toe langahake ia ‘i ha ‘aho ‘e tolu.”
Pea tu‘u hake ai ʻa e Taulaʻeiki Lahi̇́ ‘o ne pehē kia Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai koā ha‘o tali ki ho talatalaaki‘i kuo fai ‘e he ongo tangatá ni?”
Kae fakalongo pē ‘a Si̇̄sū. Pea toe lea ʻa e Taulaʻeiki Lahi̇́ kia Si̇̄sū, ‟ ʻOkú ou fakafuakavaʻi koe ʻi he ‘ao ‘o e ‘Otua moʻui̇́ ke ke talamai pē ko e Mīsaiá koe, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ‘Otuá!”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia, ‟Ko ia pē kuó ke lea‘aki mai̇́. Ko ia, ‘oku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu, mei he taimi̇́ ni, te mou mamata ki he Foha ʻo e Tangatá ‘oku nofo mei he toʻomataʻú ‘o e ‘Otua Māfimafi̇́, pea ‘okú naʻe heka ki he ngaahi ‘ao ‘o e langi̇́.”
Pea toki hae ‘e he Taulaʻeiki Lahi̇́ hono teungá mo ne pehē: ‟Kuo lea fie-‘otua ʻa e sianá ni. Ko e hā te tau toe hela ai he kumi fakamo‘oni? Ko eni, kuo mou fanongo tonu heʻene lea fie-ʻotuá!
Ko e hā haʻamou fakakaukau?” Pea nau talaange, ‟‘Okú ne halaia, pea ‘oku tuha ia ke tauteamate.”
Pea nau toki ‘anuhi ʻa e fofonga ‘o Sīsuú, pea nau tuki‘i ia, pea taaʻi ia ʻe ha niʻihi.
Pea nau pehē ange, ‟‘Ēi̇̄ Mi̇̄saia! Mate mai pē ko hai na‘á ne taa‘i koé!”

Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei tangutu ‘a Pita he loto ‘api ‘o e Taulaʻeiki Lahi kuo ha‘u kiate ia ha taha ʻo e kau kaunangá ʻo ne pehē ange kia Pita, ‟Ko koe foki, na‘á ke faʻa ʻalu holo mo e Kāleli̇ ko eni̇́, ʻa Si̇̄sū.”
Kae faka‘ikai‘i ia ‘e Pita he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai kotoa na‘e ‘i ai̇́, ‘o ne pehē: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ʻa e me‘a ‘okú ke laú.”
Pea hū atu ‘a Pita mei ai ki he matapā hū‘anga ‘o e ‘api̇́.
Pea toe faka‘ikai‘i pē ia ‘e Pita mo ʻene fuakava, ʻo ne pehē ange, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ʻaupito te u ‘ilo ʻa e siana ko ená.”
Pea fuoloa si‘i pē mei ai, pea mo e omi ʻa e kakai na‘e tutu‘u ai ‘o nau pehē ange kia Pita, ‟Ko e mo‘oni! Ko honau tokotaha koe! He ko ena ko ho‘o leá ‘oku tō faka-Kāleli.”
Pea hanga ʻe ia ʻo fakafuakava mo fakapapau, ‟Ko hoku nimá ē, ke tautea au ʻe he ʻOtua, ko e mo‘oni ʻa e me‘a ‘oku ou tala atú. ‘Oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ʻa e siana ko ená.”
Pea toki manatu‘i ai ‘e Pita ‘a e folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate iá, ‟‘E teʻeki ke ‘u‘ua ʻa e moá, kuo tu‘o tolu ho‘o fakafisinga‘i au.”

27.text: Pea pongipongi haké, kuo ʻosi alea‘i ‘e he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ kotoa mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú, ha me‘a ke lava ai hano tāmate‘i ‘o Si̇̄sū.
Pea nau toki ha‘i ia ‘o taki atu kia Pailato, ko e Kōvaná.

Pea ʻi he ʻilo leva ‘e Siutasi, ʻa ē naʻá ne lavakiʻi iá, kuo tuʻutuʻuni ke tāmate‘i ‘a Sīsuú, naʻá ne loto lavea ʻaupito ai, ʻo ne ‘alu ʻo fakafoki ʻa e pa‘anga siliva ‘e tolungofulú ki he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú;
Pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuó u faihala, ko ‘eku lavaki‘i ha tangata na‘e ‘ikai ha‘ane kovi ‘e fai.”
Pea laku atu leva ‘e Siutasi ʻa e pa‘anga silivá ki he loto Temipalé, pea naʻe toki ‘alu ‘o tautau ia.
Pea toʻo ‘e he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ ʻa e pa‘angá, pea nau pehē: ‟Ko e pa‘anga ʻeni na‘e ma‘u he lingitoto, ‘oku ‘ikai ngofua ‘i he‘etau Laó ke fakahū ia ki he pa‘anga fakasiasi̇́.”
Pea hili ha‘anau alea ki ai, naʻa nau tuʻutuʻuni ke fakatau ʻaki ʻa e ‘api ‘o ha tangata tufunga ipuʻumea, ke ngāueʻaki ko e fa‘itoka ‘o e kakai nofo mai mei muli.
Ko hono ʻuhinga ia ‘oku ui ai ʻa e mala‘e ko iā, ko Pangai Lingitoto, ʻo aʻu ki he ʻahó ni.
Pea na‘e toki fakamo‘oni ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfita ko Selemaiá, ʻo pehē:
Pea naʻa nau fakatau ʻaki ia ʻa e ʻapi ‘o e tufunga ipu ʻumea,
Pea nau taki atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he Kōvaná. Pea ‘eke ange ‘e he Kōvaná ki ai, ‟Ko e tu‘i koe ‘o e kakai Siú?”
Pea toki talatalaaki‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘e he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú, kae fakalongolongo pē ia.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Pailato ki ai, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai koā te ke tokanga ki he ngaahi me‘a ko ʻeni ‘oku nau tukuakiʻi ʻaki koé?”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne toe tali ‘e ia ʻaki ha fo‘i lea ‘e taha. Pea fakatumutumu ai ʻa e Kōvaná.
Pea ko e anga ‘o e Kōvaná, he kātoanga Pāsová, ko ʻene tukuange ha pōpula ‘e loto ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́.
Pea feʻunga mo iá, ‘oku ‘i ai ʻa e pōpula ‘iloa, ko Palāpasa hono hingoá.
Ko ia naʻe fakataha mai ʻa e kakai̇́, pea ʻeke ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko hai ‘oku mou loto ke u tukuange atú? Ko Palāpasa pē ko Si̇̄sū, ‘a ē ‘oku ui ko e Mi̇̄saiá?”
He naʻe mahino ki ai, ko e meheka pē kuo nau tukuange ai ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate iá.

Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei nofo ‘a Pailato ‘i he nofo‘anga fakamāú, mo e a‘u ange ʻa e fekau mei hono uaifi̇́ kiate ia, ‟‘Oua ‘aupito na‘á ke fai ha me‘a ki he tangata tonuhia ko ená. He ʻoku hoha‘a lahi ‘eku moʻui̇́ he ‘ahó ni, ko ‘eku misi naʻe kau kiate ia ‘anepō.”
Pea na‘e fakaloto‘i ‘e he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau mātu‘á ʻo e lotú, ʻa e kakai̇́, ke nau kole kia Pailato ke tukuange mai ‘a Palāpasa kae tāmate‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Pea toe ‘eke ange ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e fē he ongo tangatá ni ‘oku mou loto ke u tukuange atú?” Pea nau pehē: ‟Ko Palāpasa!”
Pea toe pehēange ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, ‟Ka ko e hā leva ʻeku meʻa ʻe fai kia Si̇̄sū, ‘a ē ‘oku ui ko e Mi̇̄saiá?”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, ‟He ko e hā ha‘ane kovi kuo fai?”

Pea ʻi he ʻilo ‘e Pailato ‘e ‘ikai toe lava ha‘ane me‘á, ka ‘e faifai pea hoko ha moveuveú, pea naʻe toʻo mai leva ha vai ‘o fanofano ai ke sio ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́, pea naʻe toki talaange kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuo ‘ʻata‘atā hoku konisēnisi̇́ mei he toto ‘o e tangata tonuhia ko eni̇́. Mou fa‘iteliha ā ki ai.”
Pea tali ‘e he kakai̇́ kotoa, ‟Tuku pē ke ‘eke hono totó kiate kimautolu mo ‘emau fānaú.”
Pea tukuange leva ‘e Pailato ‘a Palāpasa kiate kinautolu. Pea hili ‘ene fekau ke uipiʻi ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘aki ha maea, naʻá ne tuku atu ia ke tutuki ki he kolosi̇́.
Pea toki ‘ave ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘e he kau sōtia ‘a e Kōvaná ki he Palasi faka-kōvaná, pea kātoa mai ki ai ʻa e kau taú ʻo nau fehangahangai mo ia.
Pea nau vete ʻa e teunga ‘o Si̇̄suú ka nau ‘ai kiate ia ha pulupulu lanu kulokula ʻahoʻaho.

Pea nau fi̇̄ ha kalauni talatala ‘o ‘ai ki hono fofongá, mo nau ‘ai ha vaʻakau ki hono nima toʻomataʻu. Pea nau toki tūʻulutui atu ki ai mo manuki‘i ia, ʻaki ‘enau pehē ange, ‟Ke lākoifie fuoloa ʻa e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siú!”
Pea nau ‘anuhia ia, mo toutou taa‘i ‘aki hono fofongá ‘a e vaʻakaú.
Pea ‘osi ‘enau manuki‘i ‘a Sīsuú, pea nau hū‘i leva ʻa e pulupulú meiate ia. Pea nau toe ‘ai ki ai hono vala ‘o‘oná, pea nau toki taki atu ia ke tutuki ki he kolosi̇́.
Pea ʻi he‘enau hū atu kitu‘á, naʻa nau fetaulaki ai mo ha tangata Sailine, ko Saimone hono hingoá, pea nau fekau kiate ia, ke ne fua ʻa e kolosi ‘o Sīsuú.
Pea faifai̇́ pea nau a‘u ki he feitu‘u na‘e ui ko Kolokota, ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá ko ‘Feitu‘u ‟ʻUlupoko.”
Pea nau ‘oange ai kia Si̇̄sū ha uaine kuo hū‘i ‘aki ʻa e ʻakau kona, ke ne inu. Ka ʻi he kamata ‘ai hake pē ‘e Si̇̄sū, naʻá ne toe teke‘i atu.
Pea hili ‘enau tutuki ia ki he kolosi̇́, naʻa nau vahevahe hono teungá ʻaki ‘enau talotalo ki ai.
Pea nau nofo ki lalo ai ‘o le‘ohi ia.
Pea naʻa nau tohi ʻa e ngaahi lea ko ʻeni̇́ mei ‘olunga ‘o feʻunga hifo mo hono fofongá, ke mahino ʻa e ʻuhinga hono tauteá, ‟Ko Si̇̄sū eni, ko e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siú.”
Pea naʻa nau tutuki fakataha ia mo ha ongo tangata kaiha‘a fakamālohi, ko e taha mei toʻomataʻu, pea taha mei toʻohema.
Pea ko e kakai na‘a nau fou atu he feitu‘u ko iā na‘a nau ō pē mo manuki‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū, ʻo kalokalo honau ʻulú:
ʻO nau pehē: ‟Ko koe koā ia na‘á ke teu ke holoki ʻa e Temipalé pea toe langa ‘i ha ‘aho ‘e tolu! Fakamo‘ui koe. Kapau ko e ‘Alo koe ‘o e ‘Otuá, pē‘i ‘alu hifo mei he kolosi̇́.”
Na‘e pehē foki mo e manuki ʻa e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau faiako Laó mo e kau mātu‘a tauhi lotú;
‟Na‘á naʻe fakamo‘ui ʻa e kakai kehé, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ‘o fakamo‘ui ia. ‘Ikai ko e Tu‘i ‘Isileli̇́ ia? Kapau ko ia, tuku ke ne hifo mai mei he kolosi̇́, pea te tau toki tui kiate ia.
Na‘á ne falala ki he ‘Otuá, pea naʻe lau ko e ‘Alo ia ‘o e ‘Otuá. Tuku ke fakamo‘ui ia ‘e he ‘Otuá, ‘o kapau ko hono finangaló ia.”
Pea na‘á mo e ongo hiamatea na‘e tutuki fakataha mo iá, na‘á na kau foki mo kinaua he manuki kiate iá.
Pea ʻi heʻene a‘u ki he ho‘atā mālié, naʻe fakapoʻuli kātoa ʻa e funga ‘o e fonuá, ʻo faaiatu ai pē ‘o a‘u ki he hoko ʻa e tolu efiafi̇́.
Pea feʻunga nai mo e tolu efiafi̇́, naʻe kalanga le‘olahi ‘a Si̇̄sū, ‟ʻIlai! ʻIlai! Lama sapakatani,” ‘a ia ko hono ʻuhingá: ‟‘E hoku ‘Otua! ‘E hoku ‘Otua! Ko e hā kuó ke li‘aki ai aú?”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ha ni‘ihi na‘e tutuʻu ofi mai, naʻa nau pehē: ‟‘Okú ne ui kia ‘Ilaisiā!”
Pea lele leva ha toko taha ‘o ne toʻo ha konga oma ‘o unu ‘i ha uaine mahimahi, pea naʻe toki hunuki ‘i ha vaʻa kofe ‘o ‘ohake ‘aki kia Si̇̄sū ke ne inu.
Ka naʻe pehē ‘e ha ni‘ihi, ‟Tau tatali, ke sio angé, pē ‘e ha‘u ‘a ‘Ilaisiā ‘o fakahaofi ia.”
Pea ne toe kalanga le‘olahi ‘a Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne tukuange hono laumālié.
Pea ʻiloangé, naʻe mahae ʻa e puipui ‘o e Temipalé mei ‘olunga ki lalo, pea mofuike ʻa e fonuá ‘o mafahifahi ai ʻa e ngaahi makatu‘ú.
Pea ava ai mo ha ngaahi fonualoto, pea lahi ʻa e ngaahi sino ʻo e kakai ʻa e ‘Otuá, naʻe fokotuʻu hake ai;
Pea naʻa nau haʻu mei honau ngaahi fa‘itoká. Pea hili ʻa e toetu‘u ‘a Si̇̄sū, pea nau ō hake ki he Kolo Tapú, ‘o nau hā ai ki ha tokolahi.

Pea ko e kau sōtiá mo kinautolu na‘á nau le‘ohi ‘a Sīsuú, na‘á nau sio ki he mofuiké mo e me‘a kehekehe na‘e hokó, pea nau ilifia ‘aupito, pea nau pehē: ‟Tā ko e mo‘oni pē, ko e ‘Alo ʻeni ‘o e ‘Otuá!”
Pea na‘e ‘i ai mo ha kau fefine tokolahi na‘e tutuʻu ʻo sio mei he mama‘ó. Ko e kau fefine ia na‘e muimui fononga mai ‘ia Si̇̄sū mei Kāleli, ke tokoni kiate ia.
Ko e ni‘ihi ai ko Mele Makitaline, mo Mele ko e fa‘ē ‘a Sēmisi mo Siosifá, pea mo e fa‘ē ‘a e ongo foha ʻo Sēpeti̇́.
Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó, naʻe ha‘u ha tangata maʻumeʻa mei ‘Alematea, ko Siosifa hono hingoá, pea na‘á ne kau he kau ako ‘a Sīsuú.
Pea ‘alu ia kia Pailato ‘o kole ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú. Pea tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Pailato ke ‘oange ia kiate ia.
Pea ‘ave ia ‘e Siosifa ‘o ne teu ʻaki ha tupenu li̇̄neni ma‘a;
Pea ne toki ‘ave ia ‘o telio ‘i hono fonualoto ‘o‘ona kuó ne toki tā ‘i ha fu‘u makatu‘u. Pea naʻe teka‘i atu ha fu‘u maka lahi ‘o tāpuni ʻaki ʻa e hūʻanga ki he fonualotó, ʻo ne toki ‘alu.
Pea na‘e ‘i ai ‘a Mele Makitaline, mo Mele ʻe tahá, ‘okú na nofo mei he kauhala ʻe tahá, ‘o sio pē mei ai ki he fonualotó.
Pea a‘u ki he ‘aho hono hokó, ko e Sāpaté ia, pea fakataha hake ʻa e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau Fālesi̇́ kia Pailato;
‘O nau pehēange, ‟Tangata‘eiki, kuo mau toki manatu‘i, lolotonga na‘e kei mo‘ui ʻa e siana kākā ko ʻená, na‘á ne pehē ‘e ia; ‛‘E hili ha ‘aho ‘e tolu, te u toetu‘u mei he maté.’

Ko ia, ke ke tuʻutuʻuni muʻa ke malu‘i ʻa e fonualotó ‘o a‘u ki he ‘aho hono tolú. Na‘a faifai̇́ kuo omi ʻene kau akó ‘o kaiha‘asi hono sinó, ka nau tala ki he kakai̇́ kuo toetu‘u ia mei he maté, pea ʻe ‘ange‘ange ʻa e loi kimu‘á he loi kimui̇́!”
Pea pehē ʻe Pailato kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou ō mo haʻamou kau le‘o ‘o mātuʻaki malu‘i ʻa e fonualotó ʻaki homou lelei tahá.”
Pea nau ō ‘o sila‘i ʻa e maká mo fokotu‘u ai ʻa e kau le‘ó ke nau le‘ohi ʻa e fonualotó ke malu.

28.text: Pea hili ʻa e Sāpaté, pea kamata mafoa ʻa e atá he ʻuluaki ‘aho ‘o e uiké, naʻe ō atu ‘a Mele Makitaliné mo Mele ʻe tahá ke vakai ʻa e fonualotó.
Pea fakafokifā naʻe hoko ha mofuike lahi, he naʻe ‘alu hifo ha ‘āngelo ʻa e ‘Eiki̇́ mei he langi̇́ ʻo ne teka‘i ʻa e maká, ‘o hekeheka ai.
Pea na‘e hangē ko e tapa ʻa e ʻuhilá ʻene hā mai̇́, pea ko hono kofú na‘e hinapaki ‘o hangē ko e sinoú.
Peá tetetete ai ʻa e kau le‘ó he‘enau manavahé, ‘o hangē ka nau ka maté.
Pea pehē ange ‘e he ‘āngeló ki he ongo fafiné, ‟‘Oua te mo manavahē, he ‘oku ou ‘ilo ko ho‘omo kumi kia Si̇̄sū, ʻa ē na‘e tutuki ki he kolosi̇́.
‘Oku ‘ikai ke ne ‘i heni; he kuó ne toetuʻu mei he maté, ‘o hangē pē ko e me‘a na‘á ne tala atú. Mo omi ‘o mamata ki he feituʻu na‘e toka ai hono sinó.

Peá mo ō fakavave leva ‘o tala ki heʻene kau akó, kuo toetuʻu ia mei he pekiá, pea kuó ne mu‘omu‘a ‘iate kinautolu ki Kāleli. Ko e potu ia te mou fe‘iloaki ai mo iá. Ko e me‘a ia na‘á ku ha‘u ke tala kiate kimouá.”
Pea fakavave atu ʻa e ongo fafiné mei he fonualotó kuo manavahē hona lotó kae fiefia lahi, ‘o na feleleʻi atu ke tala ki he kau akó ʻa e me‘a kuo hokó.
Pea ‘iloangē kuo fakafetaulaki mai ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua, ʻo ne meʻa mai, Mālō e lelei! peá na ʻunuʻunu atu ki ai ‘o tukutāupe ‘i hono vaʻé ‘o hū kiate ia.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua, ‟‘Oua te mo manavahē! Mo ō ‘o tala ki siʻoku ngaahi tokouá ke nau ō hake ki Kāleli, pea te nau mamata ai kiate au.”
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei ō atu ʻa e ongo fafiné, mo e ō ki kolo ʻa e kau sōtia ‘e ni‘ihi naʻá nau leʻo ʻa e fonualotó, ‘o fakahā ki he hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē kuo hokó.
Pea fakataha leva ʻa e hou‘eiki taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e mātu‘a tauhi lotú, ‘o nau faʻufaʻu ke totongiʻi ʻa e kau sōtiá ʻaki ha pa‘anga lahi.
Pea nau tuʻutuʻuni kinautolu ʻo pehē: ‟Mou tala holo ‘ekimoutolu, ‛Na‘e lolotonga hoʻomou mohe he poʻuli̇́ kuo ʻalu atu ʻa e kau akó ‘o kaiha‘asi hono sinó.’
‘Oua te mou hoha‘a ‘okapau ‘e ongo atu ki he Kōvaná ʻa e me‘á ni, he te mau fakatuiʻi ia ki ai, ʻo haofaki kimoutolu mei hano fakahohaʻasi.”
Ko ia, na‘e toʻo leva ‘e he kau le‘ó ʻa e pa‘angá, pea nau fai ʻa e me‘a na‘e fekau ange kiate kinautolú. Pea ʻoku kei mafola ʻa e talanoa ko iā ‘i he kakai Siú ‘o aʻu mai ki he ‘ahó ni.
Pea na‘e ō atu ʻa e kau ako ‘e toko hongofulu mā tahá, ki Kāleli, ki he moʻunga na‘e tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Si̇̄sū ke nau ʻalu ki ai̇́,
Pea ʻi heʻenau mamata leva kia Si̇̄sū, naʻá nau lotu kiate ia. Ka na‘e ‘i ai ʻa e ni‘ihi ‘iate kinautolu na‘e kei taʻetui pē .
Pea ʻunuʻunu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ʻo ne folofola ʻo pehē: ‟ʻOku ʻaʻaku ʻa e mafai kotoa pē ‘i langi mo māmani.
Ko ia, mou ō ‘o ‘ai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ke hoko ko ‘eku kau ako, ʻo mou papitaiso kinautolu ‘i he huafa ‘o e Tamai mo e ‘Alo pea mo e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni,
mo ako‘i kinautolu ke nau tauhi ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē kuo u tuʻutuʻuni atu kiate kimoutolú. Peá te u nofo maʻu ai pē ‘i homou lotolotongá, ‘o aʻu ki he ngata‘anga ʻo e maama ko eni̇́.”

1.text: Ko e kamataʻanga ʻo e Ongoongo Lelei ʻo Si̇̄sū Kalaisi, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ‘Otuá.
ʻO hangē ko ia kuo tohi ‘e he palōfita ko ‘Aiseá, ‟Vakai, ʻoku ou fekau atu ʻeku talafekaú, ke ne muʻomuʻa kiate koe, ʻo teuteu ho halá.
Ko e leʻo ē ʻo ha toko taha ʻoku kalanga he toafá, ‛Mou teuteu ʻa e hāʻeleʻanga ʻo e ʻEiki̇́,
Naʻe toki hokomai ʻa Sione faipapitaiso ʻi he feituʻu toafá, ʻo ne malangaʻaki ki he kakai kotoa pē, ‟ʻa e papitaiso ki he fakatomalá koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakamolemole ʻenau ngaahi angahalá.”
Pea ō atu ʻa e kakai tokolahi mei he feituʻu Siuteá mo Selusalema, kiate ia. Pea nau vete ʻenau ngaahi angahalá kae fai honau papitaisó, ʻi he Vaitafe Soatani̇́.
Naʻe kofu fulufuluʻi kāmeli ʻa Sione pea leta kiliʻi manu. Ko ʻene meʻakai̇́, ko e he‘e mo e huhuʻaʻi hone vao.
Pea malanga ʻa Sione, ʻo pehē: ‟ʻOku muimui mai ha toko taha, ʻoku lahi ange hono mafai̇́ ʻiate au, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai te u taau ke vete ʻa e haʻi hono senitoló.
ʻOku ou papitaiso kimoutolu ʻe au ʻaki ʻa e vai, ka te ne papitaiso ‘e ia kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e Laumālie Maʻoniʻoni̇́!”
Pea ha‘u ai foki ʻa Si̇̄sū mei Nāsaleti ʻi Kāleli ke papitaiso ia ‘e Sione, ʻi he Vaitafe ko Soatani̇́.
Pea ʻi heʻene kei hake mai mei he vai̇́, naʻá ne mamata kuo mavaeua ʻa e langi̇́, pea hāʻele hifo ʻa e Laumālié kiate ia, ʻo tatau mo ha fōtunga ʻo ha lupe.
Pea ongo mai ha leʻo mei he langi̇́, ‟Ko hoku foha ‘ofaʻangá koe. ʻOku leleiʻia hoku lotó kiate koe.”
Pea taki atu leva ‘e he Laumālié ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he toafá.
Pea naʻe nofo ai ʻi ha ʻaho ‘e fāngofulu, ʻo ʻahiʻahiʻi ai ia ‘e Sētane. Pea neongo naʻe nofo fakataha ʻa Si̇̄sū mo e fanga manu kaivaó, ka naʻe tauhi ia ‘e he kau ʻāngeló.
Pea hili hono fakahū pili̇̄sone ʻo Sioné, pea ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Kāleli ʻo malangaʻaki ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei ʻo e ʻOtuá.
ʻO ne pehē: ‟Kuo hokosia ʻa e taimi̇́ pea kuo ofi ʻa e Puleʻanga ʻo e ‘Otuá: Mou tafoki ʻo tui ki he Ongoongo Lelei̇́.”
Pea ʻi he hāʻele atu ʻa Si̇̄sū he matātahi ʻo e Tahi Kāleli̇́, naʻá ne mamata kia Saimone mo hono tokouá, ko ʻAnitelū, ʻoku fai ʻena li̇̄ kupenga ʻi tahi, he ko e ongo toutai kinaua.
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua, ‟Mo omi ʻo muimui kiate au, ka u akoʻi kimoua ke mo hoko ko e ongo toutai kakai.”
Peá na liʻaki ai pē hona kupengá, ka na muimui kiate ia.
Pea fononga siʻi atu mei ai ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne mamata kia Sēmisi mo Sione, ko e ongo foha ʻo Sēpeti̇́, ʻoku fai ʻena monomono kupenga ʻi vaka.
Pea naʻe ui leva mo kinaua, peá na fakamāvae ai pē mo ʻena tamai̇́ ko Sēpeti̇́ he vaká, mo e kau ngāue totongi̇́, ka na muimui kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ki Kāpaneume. Pea aʻu ki he Sāpaté, naʻe ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he falelotú ke fai ʻene faiako.
Pea fakatumutumu ʻa e kakai̇́ heʻene faiakó. He naʻá ne faiako hangē ha taha ma‘u mafai̇́, kae ʻikai ke hangē ko e faiako ʻa e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé.
Pea tā kuo nofo ʻi honau falelotú ha tangata kuo ma‘u ‘e ha laumālie ʻuli.
Pea kalanga ʻa e tangatá, ‟Ko e hā hoʻo meʻa ‘e fai mai̇́, ‘e Si̇̄sū mei Nāsaleti̇́? Ko hoʻo ha‘u koā ke fakaʻauha kimautolu? ʻOku ou ‘ilo koe! Ko e Toko Taha Māʻoniʻoni koe ʻa e ‘Otuá.”
Pea valokiʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e laumālie ‘uli̇́, ʻo ne folofola, ‟Fakalongolongo! Peá ke hū kituʻa mei he tangatá!”
Pea hanga ‘e he laumālie ‘uli̇́ ʻo ʻai ke tetetete ʻa e tangatá, pea naʻe kaikaila leʻolahi, ʻo ne toki maluʻi meiate ia.
Pea ʻohovale kotoa ai ʻa e kakai̇́ mo nau fehufehuʻi, ‟Ko e hā ʻeni? Ko ha akonaki foʻou nai ʻeni? Vakai ange! Naʻa mo e ngaahi laumālie ‘uli̇́, ʻoku nau talangofua kiate ia!”
Pea toki mafola ʻi Kāleli kātoa, ʻa e ngaahi ongoongo ʻo kau kia Sīsuú.
Pea ʻi he foki leva ʻa Si̇̄sū mei falelotu, naʻa nau ō mo Sēmisi mo Sione ki he ʻapi ʻo Saimone mo ʻAniteluú.
Pea naʻe fakahā ange kia Si̇̄sū ʻoku tokoto ʻa e faʻē ʻa e mali ʻo Saimoné ko e puke he mofi̇́.
Pea laka atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he fefiné ʻo puke hono nimá ʻo fokotuʻu hake. Pea sai ai pē ʻa e mofi̇́. Pea tuʻu leva ʻa e fefiné ʻo feimeʻatokoni ma‘anautolu.
Pea hili ʻa e tō ʻa e laʻaá, naʻa nau fetuku mai kia Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai kotoa pē naʻe mahakiʻia, pē puke fakatēvolo.
Pea ʻosi kotoa mai ʻa e koló ki he matapā ʻo e falé.

Pea naʻe fakamoʻui ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻakinautolu kotoa naʻe puke he ngaahi mahaki kehekehe. Naʻá ne toe kapusi mo e fanga tēvolo tokolahi, pea naʻe ʻikai te ne tukuange ke lea ʻa e fanga tēvoló, he naʻa nau ʻilo ia.
Pea kei hengihengi ʻaupito, ofi ki he mafoa ʻa e atā, naʻe tuʻu hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ʻalu ki ha feituʻu lōngonoa ʻo fai ai ʻene lotu.
Pea ō atu ʻa Saimone mo kinautolu naʻa nau nofó, ʻo kumi kiate ia.
Pea nau ma‘u ia, ʻo nau pehēange, ‟ʻOku kumi koe ‘e he kakai kotoa pē!”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Tau ō atu ki he tukui kolo ko eé ke u malanga foki ai. He ko e meʻa ia naʻá ku ha‘u ai̇́.”
Pea fononga holo ai ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi Kāleli kātoa, ʻo malanga he ngaahi falelotú mo kapusi tēvolo.
Pea naʻe ha‘u ha tangata kilia kia Si̇̄sū ʻo ne tūʻulutui atu ʻo kole kiate ia, ‟Kapau te ke loto ki ai, te ke lava pē ke fakamaʻa au.”
Pea ake ʻa e ʻofá he loto ʻo Sīsuú, ʻo ne ‘ai atu hono nimá ki ai, pea naʻe folofola, ‟ ʻOkú ou loto pē ki ai, ke ke maʻa koe!”
Pea maʻa ai pē hono kiliá.
Pea fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e tangatá ke ʻalu, pea naʻe fakatokanga mamafa ki ai,

‟Vakai naʻá ke tala ʻa e meʻá ni ki ha taha. Ka ke ʻalu pē ʻo fakahā koe ki he taulaʻeiki̇́ ke ne siviʻi koe. Peá ke ‘oange ki ai ʻa e feilaulau naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Mōsesé, ko e fakamoʻoni kiate kinautolu, kuo fakamaʻa koe.”

Ka naʻe ʻalu atu ʻa e tangatá ia ʻo fakamafola holo mo talanoa he feituʻu kotoa pē, ki he meʻa naʻe hokó. Pea ʻi he fuʻu ongoongoa ai ʻa Sīsuú, naʻe ʻikai te ne kei lava ʻo ʻalu tauʻatāina ki ha kolo. Ka naʻá ne takai pē he ngaahi feituʻu ngaongaó, kaneongo iá, naʻe ō atu pē ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́, mei he feituʻu kotoa pē.

2.text: Pea ‘osi mei ai ha ngaahi ʻaho, pea toe ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Kāpaneume. Pea na‘e ongo atu kuó ne ʻi ʻapi.
Pea naʻe kātoa mai kiate ia ha kakai tokolahi, ʻo ‘ikai ha toe feitu‘u ‘e ‘atā, ʻi fale mo tuʻa. Pea malanga‘i ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu ʻa e Folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá.
Pea lolotonga iá, kuo fata mai ‘e ha toko fā ha tangata mamatea ʻi hono mohengá.

Ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava ʻo ofi kia Si̇̄sū koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e tokolahi ʻa e kakai̇́, ko ia, naʻa nau avangi ʻa e ʻató, feʻunga hifo mo Si̇̄sū. Pea nau toki tukutuku hifo ai ʻa e tangata mamateá, ʻi hono mohengá.
