Pea ʻi he meaʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e tui ʻa e kau tangatá, naʻá ne folofola ki he tangata mamateá, ‟Tangata, kuo fakamolemole‘i ho‘o ngaahi angahalá.”
Ka na‘e ʻi ai ha ni‘ihi he kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé na‘e nofo ai, pea nau fifili ʻi honau lotó,
‟Ko e hā ‘oku lea pehē ai ʻa e tangatá ni? Ko e lea fie‘otua ia! ‘Oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘e fakamolemole angahala, ka ko e ʻOtuá toko taha pē!”
Pea meaʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻi hono laumālié, ʻenau fifili̇́, pea naʻe pehē kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou fifili pehē ai ʻi homou lotó?
He ko e fē ʻa e me‘a ‘oku faingofua angé, ko ʻeku pehē ange ki he mamateá, ‛Kuo fakamolemole‘i ho‘o ngaahi angahalá’ pē ko ʻeku pehē ange, ‛Tuʻu ā ʻo to‘o ho mohengá, peá ke ʻalu.’
Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ke mahino kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku ma‘u mafai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi māmani ke fakamolemole angahala.” Pea naʻe pehē leva ki he mamateá,
‟Tuʻu hake, to‘o ho mohengá, peá ke ʻalu ki ʻapi.”

Pea tuʻu leva ia ki ‘olunga, ʻo to‘o hono mohengá mo laka fakatovave atu ʻi honau lotolotongá. Pea nau fakatumutumu kotoa pē mo fakamālōʻia ʻa e ‘Otuá, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Ko ʻetau toki mamata ʻeni ki ha me‘a pehē!”
Pea toe ʻalu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he matātahi ʻo e Tahi Kāleli̇́. Pea naʻe ʻi ai ha kakai tokolahi na‘e muimui ki ai, pea naʻá ne faiako kiate kinautolu.

Pea ʻi he ʻalu atu ʻa Sīsuú, naʻá ne fakatokanga‘i ha tangata tānaki tukuhau ko Li̇̄vai, ko e foha ʻo ‘Alefiusi, ‘oku nofo mai ʻi he ʻōfisi tānaki tukuhaú. Pea folofola ki ai ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‟Ha‘u ʻo muimui kiate au.” Pea tuʻu hake leva ʻa Līvai ʻo muimui kiate ia.

Pea lolotonga na‘e ma‘u me‘atokoni ʻa Si̇̄sū he ʻapi ʻo Līvai̇́, naʻe tokolahi ha kau tānaki tukuhau mo ha kau angahala na‘á nau kai fakataha mo ia mo ʻene kau akó, he naʻe muimui kia Si̇̄sū ha fuʻu tokolahi.

Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé mo e kau Fālesi̇́ ‘oku ma‘u me‘atokoni fakataha ʻa Si̇̄sū mo e kau tānaki tukuhaú mo e kau angahalá, pea nau fehuʻi ki he‘ene kau akó, ‟Ko e hā hono ‘uhinga ‘oku ma‘u me‘atokoni fakataha ai ʻa Si̇̄sū mo e kau tānaki tukuhaú mo e kau angahalá?”

Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he‘enau laú, pea naʻe pehē ange kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai fiema‘u toketā ʻa e kakai ‘oku mo‘ui lelei̇́, ka ko e kakai ‘oku mahamahaki̇́. Na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u aú, ke ui ʻa e kau mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ka ko e kau angahalá.”

Pea na‘e faʻa ʻaukai ʻa e kau ako ʻa Sione Papitaisó pea mo e kau Fālesi̇́. Pea omi ai ha ni‘ihi ʻo fehu‘i ange kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku ʻaukai ai pē ʻa e kau ako ʻa Sioné mo e kau ako ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́, ka ko ho‘o kau ako ʻa‘aú, ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ʻaukai kinautolu?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟He ‘oku ʻaukai koā ʻa e kakai̇́ ʻi ha kātoanga mali, lolotonga ʻoku kei nofo mo kinautolu ʻa e tangata ta‘ané? ‘E ‘ikai fai ha ʻaukai lolotonga ʻa e kei nofo mo kinautolu ʻa e tangata ta‘ané!
Ka ‘e hoko mai ha ʻaho, ʻa ia ‘e ‘ave ai ʻa e tangata ta‘ané meiate kinautolu, pea te nau toki ʻaukai leva he ʻaho ko iā.
‘Oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne monomono ha teunga motu‘a ʻaki ha konga tupenu fo‘ou. He ka pehē: pea ‘e mingi ia, ʻo toe mahae lahi ange ai ʻa e teunga motu‘á.

Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ʻutu ha uaine fo‘ou ki ha hina leta motu‘a. He ka pehē: pea ‘e pā ʻa e hina letá he ngāue ʻa e uainé, ʻo fakatou maumau ai ʻa e uainé mo e hiná. Ko e uaine fo‘oú, ke ʻutu pē ia ki ha hina leta fo‘ou.”
Pea ko e Sāpate ‘e taha, na‘e fou atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he ngoue‘anga uite, pea hanga ‘e he‘ene kau akó ʻo toli ʻa e ngaahi foʻi uité.
Pea pehē ange ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́ kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Sio ki ai! Ko e hā ‘oku maumau‘i ai ‘e ho‘o kau akó ʻa e tapu ʻo e Sāpaté?”
Pea tali ʻe Si̇̄sū, ‟Kuo te‘eki koā ke mou lau ʻa e talanoa ʻo e me‘a na‘e fai ‘e Tēvita mo ʻene kau tangatá, ʻi he‘enau faingata‘ā‘ia mo fiekaiá?

ʻA ʻene hū ki he Fale ʻo e ‘Otuá, ʻo kai ʻa e mā toputapú, ʻa ē na‘e ‘ikai ngofua ke kai ai ha taha, tukukehe pē ʻa e kau taula‘eiki̇́. Pea naʻe toe ‘oange foki ki heʻene kau tangatá ke nau kai mei ai mo kinautolu.”
Pea toki folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Na‘e fokotu‘u ʻa e Sāpaté maʻae faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá, ʻo ‘ikai ko e faʻahinga ʻo e tangatá maʻae Sāpaté.
Pea ʻi heʻene peheé, ko e Foha ʻo e tangatá, ko e ʻEiki ai pē ia ʻo e Sāpaté.”

3.text: Pea toe hū ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he falelotú, pea naʻe ʻi ai ha tangata kuo mamatea hono nimá.
Pea ko e ni‘ihi ʻo e kakai̇́ na‘á nau lamasi ʻa Si̇̄sū, pē te ne faito‘o e tangatá ʻi he Sāpaté, ke nau fakaʻilo ai ia.
Pea lea ange ai ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he tangatá, ‟Tuʻu hake ʻo laka mai ki loto.”

Pea naʻe toki pehē ki he kakai̇́, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘oku fakangofua he Laó ke fai ʻi he Sāpaté? Ke fai ha lelei, pē ko ha kovi? Ke fakahaofi ha mo‘ui, pē ke tāmateʻi?” Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke lea hake ha taha.

Pea naʻe sio takai kiate kinautolu heʻene tuputāmaki, mo ʻene fakameʻapangoʻia he ongongata‘a pehē honau lotó, pea naʻe toki folofola ki he tangatá, ‟Mafao mai ho nimá.” Pea naʻe fakahangatonu atu hono nimá, pea naʻe mo‘ui ia.
Pea ō leva ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ ʻo alea mo e ni‘ihi he fa‘ahi ʻa Hēlotá ki ha founga ke tāmate‘i ai ʻa Si̇̄sū.
Pea na‘e mavahe mei ai ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ʻo nau ō ki he matātahi̇́. Pea muimui atu ki ai ha tokolahi mei Kāleli pea mo Siutea foki.
Na‘e ʻi ai foki mo ha fuʻu tokolahi mei Selusalema, mo ‘Aitūmia, mo e ngaahi feituʻu ʻo e kauvai ‘e taha ʻo e Vaitafe Soatani̇́, pea mo e feitu‘u ʻo Taia mo Saitoni̇́, naʻa nau omi kiate ia.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e omi ʻa e kakai ko ʻeni̇́ kia Sīsuú, ko ia na‘á naʻe fekau ʻa e kau akó ke nau teuteu mai ha kiʻi vaka ke heka ki ai, he naʻe feteketekeʻi mai ʻa e kakai̇́ kiate ia.
He kuo fakamo‘ui ‘e Si̇̄sū ha kakai tokolahi, pea ko ia naʻe feta‘ota‘omi mai ai kiate ia ʻa e kakai mahaki kotoa pē, na‘a lava, ke nau ki‘i lave pē kiate ia.
Pea ka mamata kia Si̇̄sū ʻakinautolu na‘e ma‘u ‘e he ngaahi laumālie ‘uli̇́, naʻa nau fakatōmape‘e atu kiate ia ʻo kalanga, ‟Ko e ʻAlo koe ʻo e ‘Otuá!”
Ka na‘e fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e ngaahi laumālie ‘uli̇́ ke ‘oua te nau fakahāaʻi ia.
Pea ʻalu hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ha moʻunga, ʻo ne ui mai ʻakinautoluu na‘e finangalo ki ai̇́. Pea nau omi kiate ia.
Pea naʻe fakanofo ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá, ʻo ne fakahingoa ko e kau ʻApositolo, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke nau nofomaʻu ʻiate ia pea ke ne fekau atu kinautolu ke nau ō ki he kakai̇́ ʻo malanga.
Peá ke nau ma‘u foki ʻa e mafai ke kapusi tēvolo.
Ko ʻeni ia ʻa e toko hongofulu-mā-ua na‘á ne fili̇́: Ko Saimone (ʻa ia na‘á ne fakahingoa ko Pitá.)
Ko Sēmisi foha ʻo Sēpeti̇́ pea mo hono tokoua ko Sioné (na‘e fakahingoa kinaua ‘e Si̇̄sū ko e ongo Poanesi, ʻa ia ko e pehē: ko e ongo foha ʻo Fatulisi.)
Ko ʻAnitelū, mo Filipe, mo Pātolomiu, mo Mātiu, mo Tōmasi, mo Sēmisi ko e foha ʻo ‘Alefiusi̇́, mo Tatiusi, mo Saimone ko e mamahi‘i fonuá;
Pea mo Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ʻa ē na‘á ne lavakiʻi iá.
Pea naʻe hūatu ia ki ha fale, pea kuo toe fakatahamai ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi, ʻo ‘ikai maʻu ha faingamālie ʻo Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ke ma‘u ha me‘atokoni.
Pea fanongo ai hono fāmili̇́, pea nau omi leva ke ʻave ia, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻenau pehē: ‟Kuo hē hono ʻatamai̇́!”

Pea na‘e ʻi ai mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsese naʻe omi mei Selusalema ʻo nau pehē: ‟Kuo ma‘u ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘e he pule ʻo e fangatēvoló!” Pea pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi, ‟Ko e pule ʻo e fangatēvoló kuó ne ‘oange kia Si̇̄sū hono ivi kapusi tēvoló!”
Pea ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́, ʻo ne fai ange kiate kinautolu ʻa e talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni̇́: ‟‘E lava fēfē ‘e Sētane ke ne kapusi ʻa Sētane?
He ka ʻi ai ha pule‘anga ‘oku māvahevahe mo fetuʻusi, pea ‘e holo leva ʻa e pule‘anga ko iā.
Pea ka ai ha fāmili ‘oku māvahevahe mo fetuʻusi, pea ‘e ‘ikai tolonga ia, ka ‘e movete, pea ko hono ngatá ia.
Ko ia, ka fepaki ʻa Sētane mo Sētane, pea ko e ʻauha leva ia ʻa e pule‘anga ʻo Sētané.
‘E ‘ikai foki lava ke hū ha taha ki ha fale ʻo ha to‘a ʻo fa‘ao ʻene koloá ‘okapau kuo te‘eki ke ne ha‘i ʻa e to‘á. Ko ia ne ka toki ha‘i ʻa e to‘á, te ne lava ai ʻo faʻao ʻa e koloa ʻa e to‘á.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘e lava ke fakamolemole‘i ʻa e angahala kotoa pē ʻa ha taha, ʻo a‘u ki ha‘ane lea kovi ki he ‘Otuá.
Ka ‘okapau te ne lea kovi ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ‘e ‘ikai toe lava ke fakamolemole‘i ia. Kuó ne halaia ʻi ha angahala taʻengata.”
Naʻe lea pehē ʻa Sīsuú, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e pehē ‘e he kakai̇́, ‟Kuo ma‘u ia ‘e ha laumālie ʻuli!”
Pea na‘e omi kia Si̇̄sū ʻa ʻene fa‘eé mo hono ngaahi tokouá, ʻo nau tutuʻu pē mei tuʻa, ʻo fekau atu ki fale ke ne ha‘u.
Pea pehē ange ‘e he kakai na‘á nau nofo takatakai kiate iá, ‟Ko ho‘o fa‘eé ē mo ho ngaahi tokouá ʻi tuʻa. ‘Oku nau fiemaʻu mai koe!”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko hai koā ʻa ʻeku fa‘eé mo hoku ngaahi tokouá?”
Pea naʻe sio takai ki he kakai̇́, ʻo ne toki folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko ʻeni ia ʻeku fa‘eé mo hoku ngaahi tokouá.
Ka ai ha taha te ne fai ʻa e finangalo ʻo e ‘Otuá, ko hoku tokouá ia, mo hoku tuofefiné, pea mo ʻeku fa‘eé.”

4.text: Pea toe fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene faiako ʻi he matātahi ʻo e Tahi Kāleli̇́. Pea kuo fakataha mai kiate ia ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi. Ko ia, naʻe heka ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ha vaka ‘o nofo mei tahi, kae tutuʻu pē ʻa e kakai̇́ mei he matātahi̇́.
Pea na‘e lahi ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātā na‘á ne ako‘i ʻaki kinautolu. ʻI heʻene faiakó, naʻá ne pehē kiate kinautolu,
‟Mou fanongo mai! Tokua na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata na‘e ʻalu ko e fai ʻene ngoue.
Pea ʻi he laku atu ʻene pulopulá, naʻe ngangana ʻa e ni‘ihi ki he veʻehalá, pea puna mai ʻa e fanga manupuná ‘o kai ia ‘o ‘osi.
Pea ngangana ʻa e pulopula ‘e ni‘ihi ki ha feitu‘u makamaka, ʻaʻa ia na‘e manifi ai ʻa e kelekelé, pea vave ʻene tupú koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ʻikai matolu ai ʻa e kelekelé.
Ka ʻi he hopo hake ʻa e laʻaá, naʻe mae leva ia, he naʻe te‘eki ke loloto hono aká.
Pea ngangana ʻa e pulopula ‘e ni‘ihi ki ha loto vao talatala, pea tupu hake ia. Kae faifai̇́ pea kāsia ia ʻi he vao talatalá, ‘o ‘ikai ke fua.
Pea ngangana ʻa e pulopula ‘e ni‘ihi ki he kelekele lelei̇́. Pea fisiki hake ia ‘o tupu, pea fua lahi, ‘o fua tolungofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea onongofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea teau ʻa e ni‘ihi.”
Pea toki folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko kimoutolu ‘oku maʻu telingá, ke mou fanongo mai!”
Pea ʻi he nofo pē ʻa Si̇̄sū mo e toko hongofulu mā uá mo ʻene kau ako kehé, naʻa nau kole ange ki ai ke ne faka‘uhinga‘i ange mu‘a ʻene ngaahi talanoa fakatātā kuo fai̇́.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Kuo tuku kiate kimoutolu ke mou ‘ilo ʻa e meʻa fufū ‘o e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá. Ka ki he kakai ʻoku ʻi tuʻá, ‘oku tala fakatātā pē kiate kinautolu ʻa e me‘a kotoa;
Koeʻuhi̇̄ he,

Na‘e toki talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuo ʻikai koā ke mahino ʻa e talanoá ni? Kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ‘uhinga kiate kimoutolu ʻa e tala fakatātā ko eni̇́, pea ‘e toe mahino fēfē ai kiate kimoutolu ha talanoa fakatātā?
Ko ʻeni, ko e tangata ngoué, ‘okú ne laku atu ʻa e pulopulá, ʻa ia ko e Folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Pea ko e kakai ‘e ni‘ihi, ‘oku nau hangē ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he veʻehalá. Ko ʻenau fanongo pē ki he Folofolá, kuo ha‘u leva ʻa Sētane ‘o fa‘ao ia meiate kinautolu.
Ko e ni‘ihi, ‘oku nau hangē ko e pulopula ko ē na‘e ngangana ki he feitu‘u makamaká. Ko ʻenau fanongo pē ki he Folofolá, pea nau tali fiefia.
Ka ‘oku ‘ikai aka loloto ia ʻi heʻenau moʻui̇́, pea ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai tolonga. Ka tō mai ha faingata‘a pē ha fakatanga, pea vave leva ʻenau fo‘i̇́.
Ko e ni‘ihi, ‘oku nau hangē ko e pulopula na‘e laku ki he loto vao talatalá. ‘Oku nau fanongo ki he Folofolá.
Ka ko e lotomoʻua ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘o māmani̇́, mo e mānumanu ki he koloá mo e ngaahi me‘a kehekehé, ʻokú ne kāsia ʻa e Folofolá ‘o ‘ikai ai hano fua.

Ka ‘oku ʻi ai leva mo e kakai, ‘oku nau hangē ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he kelekele lelei̇́. ‘Oku nau fanongo ki he Folofolá ʻo nau tali fiefia, pea toki fua ia he‘enau moʻui̇́. ‘Oku fua tolungofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea fua onongofulu ʻa e ni‘ihi, pea a‘u pē ‘o fua teau ʻa e ni‘ihi.”

Pea folofola ʻa Sisu kiate kinautolu, ‘o pehē: ‟‘E tutu koā ‘e ha taha ha maama pea naʻe fakafo‘ohifo ai ha ngeʻesi puha? Pē te ne tuku ki ha lalo mohenga? ‘Ikai kuo pau te ne fokotu‘u ia ki he tuʻunga maamá?
‘Ilonga ha me‘a ‘oku fufū, ‘e ‘ilo. ‘Ilonga ha me‘a ‘e ʻufiʻufiʻi, ‘e toʻo hono ʻufiʻufiʻi.
Ko kimoutolu ʻoku maʻu telingá, ke mou fanongo mai!”

Pea naʻe hoko atu ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou tokanga ki he ngaahi me‘a ‘oku mou fanongo ki ai̇́! He ko e meʻafua te mou fua ʻaki ki ha taha kehe, ko ia pē ‘e fua ʻaki kimoutolu, pea ʻe toe lahi hake ai.
He ko ia ‘oku ʻi ai ha‘ane me‘á, ‘e toe ‘oange ki ai mo ha me‘a. Pea ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane me‘á, na‘á mo ʻene ki‘i me‘a ‘okú ne maʻú, ‘e fa‘ao meiate ia.”
Pea naʻe toe folofola, ‟Ko e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá, ‘oku hangē ko ha tangata na‘á ne tō ha pulopula heʻene ngoué.
Pea mohe pē ʻa e tangatá mo ʻā hake, kae fisiki hake pē ʻa e pulopulá ‘o tupu, ka ‘oku ‘ikai ‘ilo ‘e he tangatá pē ʻoku anga fēfē ʻene tupú.
‘Oku ‘ai pē ‘e he kelekelé ʻiate ia pē, ʻa e pulopulá, ke tupu hake ‘o fua; he ‘oku fuofua ʻasi ʻa e laú, pea fisi, pea toki fua leva.
Pea ʻi heʻene a‘u ki he ututaʻú, kuo motu‘a ʻa e fuá, pea toki hanga leva ‘e he tangatá, ‘o toli.”
Pea toe folofola ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Te tau fakatatau ki he hā ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá? Te tau fakatātā ʻaki ia ʻa e hā?
‘Oku hangē ia ko ha tenga‘i mūsitá, ʻa ia ko e tenga fuosi‘i taha ia, ʻe ala tō ki he kelekelé.

Ka ‘oka to‘o ia ‘e ha taha ‘o tō ki he kelekelé, pea fuoloa si‘i pē kuo tupu ia ‘o lahi ange he ʻakau kotoa pē ʻi hono fa‘ahingá, pea toki puna mai ʻa e fanga manupuná ‘o nofo ʻi he malumalu hono ngaahi va‘á.”
Na‘e lahi foki ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātā pehē na‘e fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́, ka na‘á ne ngāue‘aki pē ‘o fakatatau ki he‘enau lava ke maaʻusia hono ‘uhingá.
Na‘á ne ngāueʻaki ma‘u pē ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātā ʻi heʻene malangá. Pea ko ʻene nofo pē mo ʻene kau akó, pea naʻe toki faka‘uhingaʻi kiate kinautolu ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē.
Pea ʻi he efiafi hifo ʻa e ʻaho ko iā, pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, ‟Tau ō ki he kauvai ʻe tahá.”
Pea nau tukuange leva ʻa e kakai̇́ ke mātuku atu, ka nau heka ai pē mo Si̇̄sū ʻi he vaká, pea naʻe ai foki mo ha ngaahi vaka kehe naʻe folau fakataha mo ia.
Kae fakafokifā, naʻe tō mai ha matangi mālohi, pea fasi ʻa e peaú ‘o hake ki vaka, pea kamata ke ngoto ʻa e vaká.
Ka ‘oku mohe pē ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ʻolunga ki ha meʻa fakamolū, he taumuli̇́. Pea fafangu ia ‘e he kau akó, ʻo nau pehē kiate ia, ‟Tangata‘eiki! ‘Oku ‘ikai te ke tokanga koā ki he‘etau mei maté!”
Pea tuʻu hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o ne taʻofi ʻa e matangi̇́ pea mo e tahi̇́, ʻo ne folofola ki he peaú, ‟Nonga ā ʻoua ʻe toe ngaue.” Pea nonga leva ʻa e matangi̇́, pea malū mo e tahi̇́.
Pea toki pehē ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó, ‟Ko e hā naʻe pehē fau ai̇ hoʻomou manavaheé? Kuo teʻeki pē koā ke mou tui̇?”
Ka naʻa nau fu‘u manavahē ʻaupito, ‘o nau fepehēʻaki, ‟Ko hai nai ʻa e tangata ko ʻeni̇́? He na‘a mo e matangi̇́ mo e peaú ‘oku nau fakaongo kiate ia?”

5.text: Pea nau a‘u atu ki he kauvai ʻe tahá, ki he feituʻu ‘o e kau Kelasini̇́.
Pea ʻi he hifo atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mei vaká, naʻe fakafetaulaki mai kiate ia ha tangata mei honau ngaahi faʻitoká, ʻa ia naʻe uluisino ai ha laumālie ʻuli;
Ko e tangatá ni, na‘e nofo holo pē he ngaahi fa‘itoká, pea naʻe ʻikai lava ʻe ha taha ke haʻiʻaki ia ha meʻa, ʻo aʻu pē ki ha sēini ukamea.

He kuo tā tuʻo lahi hano ha‘i sēini hono nimá mo hono va‘é, mo ʻene toutou motuhi pē ʻe ia ʻa e seini̇́ pea mo e ngaahi ukamea na‘e ha‘i ʻaki hono ongo va‘é, pea na‘e ‘ikai ha taha te ne lava ke mapule‘i ia.
Pea ko e ʻaho mo e pō mo ʻene ʻalu takai pē he ngaahi fa‘itoká mo e ngaahi moʻungá ‘o kaikaila holo ai mo ne fakalaveaʻi pē ia ʻaki ʻa e maka.
Pea ʻi heʻene sio mei he mama‘ó kia Si̇̄sū, naʻá ne lele ‘o tō tūʻulutui atu kiate ia.
Pea naʻe kalanga le‘olahi, ʻo pehē: ‟‘E Si̇̄sū, ʻAlo ‘o e ‘Otua Fungani̇́! ‘Oku ou kole fakamātoato atu ʻi he huafa ‘o e ‘Otuá ke ʻoua te ke fakamamahi‘i au!”
Ko ʻene kaila peheé, he kuo ‘osi folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia, ‟ʻA e Laumālie ʻuli! Hū kitu‘a mei he tangatá!”
Pea ʻeke ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia, ‟Ko hai ho hingoá?” Pea naʻe talaange, ‟Ko hoku hingoá ko Kongakau, he ‘oku mau tokolahi.”
Pea naʻe toe kole fakamātoato kia Si̇̄sū ke ‘oua muʻa te ne fekau kinautolu ke nau mavahe mei he feituʻu ko iā.
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha fanga puaka tokolahi na‘e huohua he tafatafa moʻungá, he feitu‘u ko iā.
Pea kole ange ‘e he ngaahi laumālie ʻuli̇́ kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Fekau mu‘a ke mau hū ki he fanga puaká.”

Pea fakangofua kinautolu ‘e Si̇̄sū, ke nau mavahe mei he tangatá, ‘o hū ki he fanga puaká. Pea feleleʻi hifo leva ʻa e fanga puaká, he tafa moʻungá ki tahi̇, ‘o nau melemo ai. Ko e tokolahi‘o e fanga puaká, na‘e feʻunga nai mo e toko uaafe.
Pea feholaki ʻa e kau tauhi puaká ‘o tala ki he kakai̇́, ʻi kolo mo ʻuta, ʻa e me‘a kuo hokó. Pea naʻe omi ʻa e kakai̇́ ke vakai ki he meʻa kuo hokó.
Pea ʻi heʻenau a‘u mai kia Sīsuú, tā ‘oku tangutu lelei atu ai ʻa e tangata na‘e ma‘u ‘e he ngaahi kongakau laumālie ʻuli̇́, kuo ʻai vala pea kuo ʻatamai lelei. Pea na‘á nau manavahē ai.

Ko kinautolu na‘e sio ki he me‘a na‘e hokó, na‘á nau talanoa‘i ia ki he kakai kehé; ʻa e meʻa naʻe hoko ki he tangata naʻe uluisino ai ʻa e laumālie ʻuli̇́ pea pehē pē ki he me‘a na‘e hoko ki he fanga puaká.
Pea na‘á nau kole kia Si̇̄sū ke ne ʻalu atu mu‘a mei honau fonuá.
Pea ʻi he heka ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he vaká, naʻe kole ange ‘e he tangata na‘e ma‘u ‘e he ngaahi laumālie ʻuli̇́, ‟‘Ai mu‘a ke ta ō!”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai loto ʻa Si̇̄sū ke na ō, ‘o ne pehē kiate ia, ‟‘Oua! Foki pē koe ki ʻapi ki ho fāmili̇́ mo ho kakai̇́ ‘o tala kiate kinautolu ʻa e ‘ofa kuo fai ma‘au ‘e he ʻEiki̇́.”
Pea talu ai ʻa e foki ʻa e tangatá ‘o talanoa‘i holo ʻi Tikapolusi ʻa e ngāue lahi kuo fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ma‘á ná. Pea naʻe ‘ohovale lahi ʻa e kakai na‘e fanongo ai̇́.
Pea naʻe toe tuku folau ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kauvai ‘e tahá. Pea fakataha mai kiate ia ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi ki he matātahi̇́.
Pea ha‘u ai ʻa e taha ʻo e kau pule falelotú, ko Sailosi hono hingoá, pea ʻi heʻene mamata kia Si̇̄suú naʻá ne fakatōmape‘e atu ki hono vaʻé,
‘O ne kole fakamātoato kiate ia, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko si‘oku ki‘i ‘ōfefiné, ‘oku puke lahi ʻaupito. Me‘a mai muʻa ‘o hilifaki ho nimá kiate ia ka e mo‘ui!”
Peá na kamata ō atu mo Si̇̄sū. Pea naʻe muimui atu ha kakai tokolahi ʻo feteketeke‘i mai kiate ia.
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha fefine, kuo ta‘u ‘e hongofulu-mā-ua ʻene puke he ʻautotó.
Pea ko e kau toketā tokolahi kuo nau faito‘o ia, pea kuo ‘osi ʻene pa‘angá hono totongi kinautolu mo e ‘ikai pē ke sai, kae faka‘au pē ke toe lahi ange hono faingata‘a‘iá.
Pea kuo fanongo ʻa e fefiné he ngaahi talanoa kia Sīsuú, ‘o ne ʻalu atu mei hono tuʻá, he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai̇́, ‘o ala atu ki hono kofú.
He na‘á ne fakakaukau loto ‘o pehē: ‟Kapau te u ala atu pē ki hono kofú, te u mo‘ui ai pē.”
Tuaiekemo kuo matu‘u ʻene ʻautotó, pea naʻe ongo‘i hono sinó kuo fakamoʻui ia mei hono mahaki̇́.
Ka na‘e ongo‘i leva ‘e Si̇̄sū kuo ʻalu atu meiate ia ha ivi fakamo‘ui, pea naʻe tafoki hake ki he kakai̇́, ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko hai na‘e ala mai ki hoku kofú?”
Pea pehēange ‘e heʻene kau akó kiate ia, ‟‘Okú ke meʻa‘i pē ʻa e feteketekeʻi mai ʻa e kakai̇́. Ko e hā ‘okú ke toe fehu‘i ai pē ko hai na‘e ala mai̇́?”
Ka naʻe vakavakai holo pē ʻa Si̇̄sū pē ko hai na‘e ala ange kiate ia.
Pea ʻi he ‘ilo ‘e he fefiné ʻa e me‘a kuo hoko kiate iá, naʻá ne tetetete heʻene ilifiá, ‘o ne haʻu ʻo tō hifo he veʻe va‘e ‘o Si̇̄suú ‘o fakahā ange kotoa e mo‘oni ʻa e meʻa kuo hoko kiate iá.
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‟Fefine, kuo fakamo‘ui koe koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ho‘o tui̇́. ʻAlu fiemālie ā, he kuó ke mo‘ui mei ho mahaki̇́.”
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei lea ʻa Sīsuú, mo e omi ha ni‘ihi mei he ʻapi ʻo Sailosi̇́, ʻa e pule falelotú, ʻo fakahā ange, ‟Kuo mate ho ‘ōfefiné. ‘Oua te ke toe fakahoha‘asi ʻa e tangata‘eiki̇́!”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai tokanga ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he‘enau laú, ka naʻe talaange kia Sailosi, ‟‘Oua ‘e hoha‘a ho lotó, ka ke tui pē.”
Pea naʻe ‘ikai ke ne loto ke nau toe ō mo ha ni‘ihi, tukukehe pē ʻa Pita, mo Sēmisi, mo Sione ko e tokoua ʻo Sēmisi̇́.
Pea ʻi heʻenau a‘u ki he ʻapi ‘o e pule falelotú, naʻa nau mamata ki ha vālautuʻu, ko e kakai naʻa nau tangi mo tēngihia le‘olahi.
Pea hū atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki fale, ʻo ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e hā fua hoʻomou vālautuʻú? Ko e hā ‘oku mou tangi ai̇́? ‘Oku ‘ikai ke mate ʻa e ki‘i ta‘ahiné, ka ʻoku mohe pē.”

Pea kamata manuki‘i ia ‘e he kakai̇́, ka naʻá ne fekau ke nau hū kotoa kitu‘a. Pea naʻe ‘ave pē ʻa e tamai mo e fa‘ē ʻa e ki‘i ta‘ahiné, mo ʻene kau ako naʻa nau ōmai̇́, ‘o nau hū ki he loki na‘e tokoto ai ʻa e ki‘i ta‘ahiné.
Pea ala atu leva ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he nima ‘o e ki‘i ta‘ahiné, ʻo ne folofola, ‟Tālita kumi!” ʻA ia ko hono ‘uhingá, ‟Ta‘ahine, ʻoku ou tala kiate koe, ke ke tuʻu hake!”
Pea tuʻu hake leva ʻa e ki‘i ta‘ahiné ‘o kamata laka holo (naʻá ne taʻu taha-ua nai). Pea na‘e mātuʻaki fakatumutumu ai ʻa e kakai̇́.
Ka na‘e tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Si̇̄sū ke ‘oua na‘á nau talanoa ki ha taha ʻa e me‘a kuo hokó. Pea ne fekau ke nau ‘oange ki he ki‘i ta‘ahiné, ha me‘a ke ne kai.

6.text: Pea mavahe ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he feitu‘u ko iá ‘o naʻe ʻalu ki hono koló, pea muimui ai pē ʻene kau akó.

Pea a‘u ki he Sāpaté ko iā, pea kamata faiako ʻa Si̇̄sū he falelotú. Pea fakatumutumu ai ʻa e tokolahi na‘e fanongo ki he‘ene faiakó, ‘o nau fe‘ekenaki, ‟Naʻe maʻu mei fē ʻe he tangatá ni ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni? Na‘á ne ma‘u mei fē ʻa e fu‘u poto ko ʻeni ‘okú ne fai ʻaki ʻene ngaahi maná?

‘Ikai ko e tufungá eni, ʻa e tama ʻa Melé, pea ko e tokoua ‘o Sēmisi mo Siosifa mo Siutasi mo Saimoné? ‘Ikai ‘oku nofo heni hono tuofāfiné?” Pea naʻe faingataʻa ke nau tali ʻa e ngaahi meʻa naʻá ne fai̇́.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e palōfita kotoa pē, ‘oku faka‘apa‘apa‘i ia ‘e he kakai̇́, ʻi he feitu‘u kotoa, tukukehe pē hono kakai totonu ‘o‘oná, ʻa hono kāingá, mo hono fāmili̇́.”
Pea na‘e ‘ikai loko lava ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘o fai ha mana he koló. Ko e kiʻi ni‘ihi tokosi‘i pē na‘e puke, na‘á ne hilifaki hono nimá kiate kinautolu ‘o fakamo‘ui.
Pea na‘e fakatumutumu ʻaupito ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he‘enau ta‘e tuí. Ko ia, naʻe ʻalu takaiʻa Si̇̄sū mei he kolo ki he kolo, ʻo faiako.
Pea na‘e ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá, ‘o fekau ke nau tautau toko ua atu ki he kakai̇́. Pea naʻe ‘oange kiate kinautolu ʻa e mafai ke pule‘i ʻa e ngaahi laumālie ʻuli̇́.
Na‘á ne tuʻutuʻuni foki kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Oua te mou ō mo ha toe me‘a, ka ko homou tokotokó pē. ‘Oua te mou ō mo ha me‘akai, pē ko ha kato ‘oho, pē faʻo ha pa‘anga homou kató.
Mou tui pē ha senitolo, kae ʻoua te mou ō mo ha vala fetongi.”
Pea naʻe toe pehē kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Ilonga ha ʻapi ‘e talitali lelei ai kimoutolu, pea mou nofo ai, kae‘oua ke mou hiki mei he kolo ko iā.
‘Ilonga ha kolo ‘e ‘ikai talitali lelei ai kimoutolu mo ho‘omou malangá, pea mou hiki mei ai, ʻo mou tūtuuʻi ʻa e efu honau koló mei homou ʻaofivaʻé, ke hoko ko e faka‘ilonga kiate kinautolu.”
Pea ō atu ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá ‘o malanga ki he kakai kotoa pē ke nau tafoki mei he‘enau ngaahi angahalá.
Pea nau toe kapusi ʻa e fanga tēvolo tokolahi, mo tākai lolo ‘ōlive ʻa e tokolahi na‘e puke, ‘o fakamo‘ui kinautolu.

Pea fanongo ai ʻa e tuʻi ko Hēlotá, he kuo pavake atu ʻa e ongoongo ‘o Si̇̄suú ʻi he feitu‘u kotoa pē, he naʻe pehē ʻe he niʻihi, ko Sione Papitaiso ʻa Si̇̄sū kuo toetuʻu mei he maté, pea ko e ‘uhinga ia, tokua, ‘o ʻene faimaná.
Ka naʻe pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi, ko ‘Ilaisiā ia. Kae pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi ko e palōfitá, ‘o hangē ko ha palōfita he kuohili̇́.
Ka ʻi he fanongo ai ʻa Hēlota, naʻá ne pehē ‘e ia, ‟Ko Sione Papitaiso pē ia, ʻa ē na‘á ku tuʻutuʻuni ke tuʻusi hono ʻulú, ka ko ʻeni kuo toetuʻu!”
He na‘e tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Hēlota ke puke ʻa Sione ‘o ha‘i pea li̇̄ ki he pilīsoné koeʻuhi̇̄ ko Hēlotiasi, ʻa ia na‘á ne mali mo iá, ka ko e uaifi ia ‘o hono tokouá, ko Filipe.
He na‘e toutou tala pē ‘e Sione Papitaiso kia Hēlota, ‟‘Oku hala ho‘o nonofo mo e mali ho tokouá!”
Pea nofo ai pē ʻa Hēlotiasi ‘o lotokovi kia Sione, mo faka‘amu ke tāmate‘i mai ia. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke lava.
He na‘e teteki ʻa Hēlota kia Sione, ko ʻene ‘ilo ko e tangata angatonu ia mo mā‘oni‘oni, pea naʻe malu‘i ia. Na‘e loto pē ia ke fanongo malanga ‘ia Sione, neongo na‘e fa‘a puputuʻu ai hono lotó.

Pea faifai̇́ naʻe maʻu ha faingamālie ʻo Helōtiasi. He ʻi he hoko ʻa e ʻaho ‘o Hēlotá, na‘e teuteu ʻe ia ha kātoanga maʻa e kau maʻulakanga fakapule‘anga kotoa pē, mo e kau ʻEikitaú, mo e kau māʻolunga ‘o Kālelí.
Pea hū mai ʻa e tama ʻa Hēlotiasi̇́ ‘o tau‘olunga, pea mālie‘ia ai ʻa Hēlota mo ʻene kau fakaafé. Pea tō ai ʻa e folofola ʻa e tuʻi̇́ ki he ta‘ahiné, ‟Kole mai ha me‘a pē, pea te u ‘oatu ia ma‘au.”
Pea toki fuakava ange ʻa Hēlota ki ai, ‟Neongo pē ko e hā te ke kole mai̇́, te u ‘oatu ia ma‘au, ‘o a‘u pē ki he vaeuamālie hoku pule‘angá!”
Pea hū atu leva ʻa e ta‘ahiné kitu‘a ‘o ʻeke ange ki heʻene fa‘eé, ‟Ko e hā ha me‘a te u kolé?” Pea tali ‘e heʻene fa‘eé, ‟Kole ʻa e ʻulu ‘o Sione Papitaisó!”
Pea toe hū fakato‘oto‘o mai leva ʻa e ta‘ahiné ki he tuʻi̇́ ‘o talaange, ‟‘Oku ou loto ke ‘omi leva ma‘aku ʻa e ʻulu ‘o Sione Papitaisó ʻi ha laulau.”
Pea loto mamahi ʻaupito ai ʻa e tuʻi̇́, ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne lava ke fakafisi mei ai, koeʻuhi̇̄ he naʻe meʻa‘i ‘e he hou‘eiki̇́, ʻi he taumafá, ʻene fuakava naʻe fai̇́.
Ko ia, naʻá ne fekau atu leva ha ka‘ate ke ʻalu mo e tuʻutuʻuni, ke ‘omi ʻa e ʻulu ‘o Sioné. Pea ʻalu ʻa e ka‘até ki he pili̇̄soné, ‘o tuʻusi ʻa e ʻulu ‘o Sioné;
Pea naʻe ‘omi ia ʻi ha laulau, ‘o ‘oange ki he ta‘ahiné, pea toki ‘oange ia ‘e he ta‘ahiné, ki heʻene fa‘eé.
Pea fanongo ai ʻa e kau ako ʻa Sioné, pea nau omi leva ‘o ‘ave hono sinó ‘o tanu.
Pea fakatahataha mai leva ʻa e kau ʻApositoló kia Si̇̄sū ‘o nau talanoa kiate ia ʻa e ngaahi me‘a kotoa naʻa nau fai̇́ mo e ngaahi me‘a na‘á nau malanga‘aki̇́.

Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ naʻe kei fe‘alu‘aki ai ha kakai tokolahi, naʻe ‘ikai ai ha faingamālie ‘o Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ke ma‘u me‘atokoni. Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Tau ō mo au ki ha feitu‘u lōngonoá, ke tau ki‘i mālōlō ai.”
Pea nau tukufolau atu ʻi ha vaka ki he feitu‘u na‘e ngaongao ke fakaekinautolu pē.
Ka ko e tokolahi ʻo e kakai̇́, ʻi heʻenau fakatokanga‘i ʻenau mavahe atú, naʻa nau lele lalo hake kinautolu ʻi ʻuta, mei he kolo kotoa pē, ‘o nau fua a‘u atu ‘ia Si̇̄sū, ki he feitu‘u ko iā.

Pea ʻi he hifo atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he vaká, kuo tali mai ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi. Pea ake ai ʻa e ‘ofá ʻi hono lotó kiate kinautolu, he na‘á nau hangē ha fanga sipi ‘oku ‘ikai hanau tauhi̇́, ko ia, naʻá ne ako‘i ange kiate kinautolu ha ngaahi me‘a lahi.
Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó, pea omi ʻa e kau akó ‘o talaange kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Kuo tāito ʻa e laʻaá, pea ko e feituʻu mamaʻo eni.
Fekau atu mu‘a ʻa e kakai̇́ ke nau ō ki he ngaahi ngoue‘anga takatakai̇́, mo e fanga ki‘i kolo ofi mai̇́, ‘o fakatau mei ai ha me‘a ke nau kai.”

Kae tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou ‘oange ʻekimoutolu ha me‘a ke nau kai.” Pea nau pehēange, ‟Ko ho loto koā ke mau ō ‘o fakatau ha mā feʻunga mo e pa‘anga siliva ‘e uangeau ʻo ʻange ke nau kai?”
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko ho‘omou fo‘i mā ‘e fiha ‘oku maʻú? Mou ō ‘o vakai.” Pea nau vakai ʻo ʻilo, pea nau pehē: ‟Ko e fo‘i mā ‘e nima mo e mata‘iika ‘e ua.”
Pea naʻe fekau ke nau fakanofonofo fakapupunga ʻa e kakai̇́ kotoa, he ko e feitu‘u musie ma‘ui‘ui ia.
Ko ia naʻa nau tangutu ʻo tautau toko teau, mo tautau toko nimangofulu.

Pea to‘o ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e fo‘i mā ‘e nimá mo e ongo mata‘iiká, pea naʻe hanga hake ki he langi̇́ ʻo fai ʻene fakafetaʻi, pea naʻe toki pakipaki ʻa e ngaahi foʻi mā ‘o ‘oange ki he‘ene kau akó, ke nau tufa ki he kakaí. Na‘á ne tufotufa foki mo e ongo mata‘iiká, ‘o ‘inasi ai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.
Pea na‘e kai kātoa pē ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘o mākona.
Pea toki hanga ‘e heʻene kau akó ‘o tufi ʻa e toetoenga maá mo e iká, ‘o fonu ai ha ngaahi kato lalahi ‘e hongofulumāua.
Pea ko e toko lahi ‘o e kakai na‘e kai he ngaahi fo‘i maá, ko e kakai tangata ‘e toko nima afe.
Pea kouna leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau akó ke nau heka ki he vaká ‘o mu‘omu‘a atu ki he kauvai ‘e tahá, ki Petesaita, ka naʻe tukuange ‘e ia ʻa e kakai̇́ ke nau mātuku.
Pea hili ʻene tukuange ʻa e kakai̇́, pea naʻe toki ʻalu hake ki he moʻungá ke fai ʻene lotu.
Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi poʻuli hifó kuo a‘u atu ʻa e vaká ki he loto mālie ‘o e tahi̇́, kae toe toko taha pē ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi ʻuta.

Pea fakatokanga‘i atu ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘oku faingata‘ā‘ia ʻa e kau akó ʻi hono ʻaloʻalo ‘o e vaká, he kuo angi mei mu‘a ʻa e matangi̇́. Pea ʻi he ngaahi houa ʻo e hengihengi̇́, naʻe toki ʻalu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu ‘okú ne hā‘ele atu he fukahi tahi̇́, ‘o ne faaiatu ke fakalaka he vaká.
Ka ʻi he fakatokanga‘i atu ‘e he kau akó ʻene hāʻele he fukahi tahi̇́, naʻa nau mahalo ko ha tēvolo, ʻo nau fekālangaʻi.
He na‘á nau mamata kotoa pē ki ai ʻo nau manavahē. Kae folofola mai leva ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou fiemālie pē! Ko au pē ia! ‘Oua ‘e manavahē!”
Pea ʻi heʻene heka hake ki vaká, naʻe malū leva ʻa e matangi̇́. Pea toki fakatumutumu ai ʻa e kau akó.
He na‘e ‘ikai ke mahino kiate kinautolu ʻa e ‘uhinga ‘o e ngaahi fo‘i maá, koeʻuhi̇̄ he kuo mafasia honau lotó.
Pea nau folau ai pē ki he kauvai̇́, ‘o tau ki he feitu‘u Kenesaleti̇́, ‘o no‘o ai honau vaká.
Pea ʻi he‘enau hifo atu mei vaká, kuo ‘ilo ‘e he kakai̇́, ko Si̇̄sū eni.
Pea nau feleleʻi mai mei he ngaahi feitu‘u fonua ko iā, ‘o fata mai ʻenau kau mahaki̇́ honau ngaahi mohengá, ki ha feitu‘u pē na‘á nau fanongo, ‘oku ʻi ai ʻa Si̇̄sū.

‘Ilonga ha feituʻu naʻá ne ʻalu ki ai, ha kolo si‘i, pē kolo lahi, pē feituʻu tukuʻuta, na‘á nau ‘ave ʻenau kau mahaki̇́ ki he ngaahi feituʻu fefakatauʻaki̇́, ‘o kole kiate ia, ke tuku ke nau ki‘i ala muʻa he kapa hono pulupulú, pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e malave ki ai̇́, na‘e fakamo‘ui.

7.text: Pea haʻu kia Si̇̄sū mei Selusalema ha kau Fālesi mo ha ni‘ihi he kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé;
Pea nau fakatokanga‘i ʻa e niʻihi ʻene kau akó ʻoku nau maʻu meʻatokoni mo e nima ʻuli, ʻa ia naʻe teʻeki ke nau fanofano.
He ko e kau Fālesí mo e kakai Siu kotoa pē, na‘e ‘ikai te nau kai kae‘oua kuo nau tomuʻa fai ʻa e ouau fanofanó, he naʻa nau piki ki he tukufakaholo ʻa e kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú.

Ko ia, ka nau ka foki mei he māketi̇́, naʻe ʻikai te nau kai, kaeʻoua kuo tomuʻa papitaiso honau nimá. Pea naʻe lahi mo e ngaahi ouau tukufakaholo pehē na‘á nau fai̇, ‘o hangē ko e papitaiso ʻo e ngaahi ipu, mo e ʻū kulo, mo e ʻū tikatele.

Ko ia, naʻe ʻeke ange ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai ke talangofua ai ho‘o kau akó ki he ngaahi tukufakaholo ʻa ʻetau ngaahi kui̇́? Ko e hā ‘oku nau kai ai mo e nima ʻuli̇́?”
Pea tali ʻe ia kiate kinautolu, ‟Tā ko e mo‘oni ʻo e mo‘oni ʻa e lau ʻa ‘Aisea ʻo kau kiate kimoutolú! Ko e toki kakai lotuloi kimoutolu, ‘o hangē pē ko ia kuo tohi̇́,
Ko e koto taʻeʻaonga pē ʻenau lotu mai kiate aú.
‟‘Oku mou liʻaki ʻekimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi fekau ʻa e ‘Otuá ka mou pipiki he ngaahi tukufakaholo fakaetangatá.”
Pea naʻe folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e toki me‘a fakaʻulia ho‘omou teke‘i ʻa e folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá ka mou tauhi ho‘omou ngaahi tukufakaholo ʻamoutolu pē!
He naʻe pehē ʻe Mōsese, ‛Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai̇́ mo ho‘o fa‘eé,’ pea mo ʻeni foki, ‛Ka lea kovi ha taha ki heʻene tamai̇́ pē ko ʻene fa‘eé, kuo pau ke tāmate‘i ia.’

Ka ko kimoutolu ʻoku mou pehē: Ka ai ha me‘a ʻa ha taha na‘e mei ʻaonga ki heʻene tamai̇́ pē ko ʻene fa‘eé, ka kuó ne tala ‘e ia, ‛Kuo kōpano eni,’ (‛ʻa ia ko e pehē ‘Ko e me‘a‘ofa ia ma‘a e ‘Otuá,’) pea ‘e ʻataʻatā leva ia, ke ʻoua te ne toe ‘ave ma‘a ʻene ongo mātu‘á e me‘a ko iá.
ʻI hoʻomou fai pehē: ʻoku mou ta‘ofi ai ʻa e tokoni ʻa e kakai̇́ ki he‘enau mātu‘á.
‘Oku mou fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi ʻa e Folofolá ʻaki ho‘omou ngaahi talatukufakaholó. Pea ‘oku lahi mo ho‘omou ngaahi me‘a pehē ‘oku fai̇́.”
Pea toe ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́ kiate ia, pea naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou tokanga mai kotoa pē, pea ʻai ke mahino atu ʻeku fakamatalá.
‘Oku ‘ikai ha me‘a ‘e hū mei tuʻa ki ha taha, ‘e ʻuli ai ʻene moʻui̇́. Ko e ngaahi me‘a ‘e toki ʻuli ai ho‘omou moʻui̇́, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hū mai mei homou lotó.”
Pea mavahe atu ia mei he kakai̇́, ʻo ne hū ki fale. Pea kole ange leva ʻe heʻene kau akó ke ne fakamahino ange mu‘a ʻa e tala fakatātā ko iā.

Pea pehē ange ‘e ia kiate kinautolu, ‟ʻOku pehē fau koā hoʻomou ʻatamai̇́ tuai̇́? Kuo te‘eki koā ke mahino kiate kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai ha me‘a mei tuʻa ʻe hūatu ki ha taha, pea ʻuli mo‘oni ai ʻene moʻui̇́?

He ‘oku ‘ikai ʻalu hifo ia ki hono lotó, ka ki hono keté, pea toki ʻalu atu ia kituʻa, mei hono sinó.” (ʻI he folofola pehē ʻa Sīsuú, naʻá ne fakamahino ai, ‘oku maʻa ʻa e meʻakai kotoa pē, ke kai mei ai.)
Pea hokoatu leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene fakamatalá, ‟Ko e me‘a ‘e toki ʻuli moʻoni ai ʻa e mo‘ui ʻa ha tahá, ʻa e me‘a ko ē ‘oku ʻalu hake mei hono lotó.
He ‘oku ʻalu hake mei he loto ‘o ha taha, ʻa e ngaahi fakakaukau kovi, ʻa e feʻauaki̇́, ʻa e kaiha‘á, mo e tāmaté;
ʻA e mānumanú, ʻa e taaufehiʻá, ʻa e kākaá, mo e holikovi̇́, ʻa e lotokovi̇́, mo e lauʻikovi̇́, mo e hi̇̄kisiá, mo e fakavalevalé.
Ko ʻeni ia ʻa e ngaahi tō‘onga kovi ‘oku ʻalu hake mei he loto ‘o ha taha, ‘o ʻuli mo‘oni ai ʻene moʻui̇́.”

Pea mavahe atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mei ai, ‘o naʻe fononga ki he feitu‘u ofi ki Taiá. Pea naʻe afe ki ha ʻapi ‘o nofo ai ʻo ‘ikai te ne loto ke ‘ilo ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́, ka na‘e ‘ikai lava ke puli ʻene nofo ai̇́.
Pea na‘e ‘ilo ki ai ha fa‘ē, ʻa ia na‘e ma‘u ‘e ha laumālie ʻuli ʻene tama fefiné. Pea ha‘u ʻa e fa‘ē ko iā ‘o tūʻulutui atu ki he va‘e ‘o Sīsuú.
Ko e fefiné ko iā, ko e Kalisi, ka na‘e tupu he fonua ko Si̇̄lia-Fi̇̄nisia. Pea na‘á ne kole fakamātoato kia Si̇̄sū ke ne hanga mu‘a ‘o kapusi ʻa e tēvoló mei siʻene tamá.
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Sīsu kiate ia, ‟Tuku ke tomu‘a fafanga ʻa e fānaú, he ʻoku ‘ikai totonu ke ‘ave ʻa e mā ʻa e fānaú, ‘o laku ki he fanga kulii̇́.”
Pea tali ange leva ‘e he fefiné ʻo ne pehē kiate ia, ‟Ko e mo‘oni pē ʻEiki, ho‘o laú. Ka na‘á mo e fanga kulii̇́, ‘oku nau kai pē he momo mei he lalo tēpile ʻa e fānaú”
Pea naʻe folofola kiate ia, ‟Ko e me‘a ʻi ho‘o tali kuo fai̇́, ʻalu ā ki ʻapi, he kuo mavahe ʻa e laumālie ‘uli̇́, mei ho‘o tamá.”
Pea foki atu leva ʻa e fefiné ki hono ʻapi̇́, tā ‘oku tokoto lelei mai ʻene tamá ʻi hono mohengá, pea kuo mavahe ʻa e laumālie ʻuli̇́ meiate ia.
Pea toe mavahe mai ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he feitu‘u Taiá ‘o ne fononga mai ʻi Saitoni, ʻo ne aʻu ki he Tahi Kāleli̇́, ki he ngaahi feitu‘u ʻo Tikapolusi̇́.
Pea na‘e ‘omi kiate ia ‘e ha ni‘ihi ai, ha tangata na‘e tuli mo le‘ovale, ‘o nau kole ange ke hilifaki hono nimá ki ai.

Pea taki atu ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e tangatá ke ki‘i mavahe atu mei he kakai̇́, pea naʻe toki ‘ai atu hono ongo tuhú ki he ongo ava‘i telinga ‘o e tangatá. Pea naʻe toe ʻaʻanu ‘o ‘ai ʻa e me‘i fāvai ki hono ʻeleló.
Pea toki hanga hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he langi̇́, pea naʻe māpuhoi, ʻo ne folofola kiate ia, ‟ʻEfata,” ʻa ia ko hono ‘uhingá, ‟Ke ava mai!”
Pea naʻe ongo ai pē ʻa e tuli ‘o e tangatá, pea homo mo e haʻi ʻo hono ʻeleló, ʻo ne toe lava ‘o lea lelei.
Pea fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́ ke ‘oua te nau talanoa ki ha taha ʻa e me‘a kuo hokó. Ka ko e lahi ange ʻene ta‘ofi kinautolú, ko e lahi ange ai pē ia ʻenau talanoa‘i̇ iá.
Pea naʻe mātuʻaki ofo moʻoni pē ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘ia Sīsū, ‘o nau pehē: ‟Ko e tangatá ni, ‘oku mālie ʻene me‘a kotoa ‘oku fai̇́. Kuo a‘u ē ki heʻene ‘ai ʻa e tuli̇́ ke fanongo, mo e noá ke lea!”

8.text: ʻI he ngaahi ʻaho ko iā, naʻe toe fakataha mai ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi kia Si̇̄sū. Pea koeʻuhi̇̄ naʻe ‘ikai ha me‘a ke nau kai, naʻe ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau akó, pea naʻá ne pehē ange kiate kinautolu;
‟‘Oku fonu hoku lotó ʻi he ‘ofa ki he fuʻu kakai ko eni̇́, he kuo lava ʻeni ʻa e ʻaho ‘e tolu mo ʻenau nofo mo au, ka ‘oku teʻeki ha me‘a ke nau kai.
Kapau te u fekau ke nau foki fiekaia ki honau ngaahi ʻapi̇́, te nau si‘i pongia ʻi he halá, he ko e ni‘ihi ai, ko e ō mai mei he ngaahi feitu‘u mama ʻaupito.”
Pea pehēange ‘e he kau akó, ‟Ka ʻe ma‘u mei fē he fu‘u toafá ni ha me‘akai ‘e feʻunga mo ha kakai tokolahi pehē?”
Pea tali ‘e Sīsu, ‟Ko ho‘omou fo‘i mā ‘e fiha ‘oku maʻú.” Pea nau talaange, ‟‘E fitu pē!”

Pea fekau leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́ ke nau taʻutu ki lalo. Pea naʻe toki to‘o mai ʻa e fo‘i mā ‘e fitú ‘o fai ʻene fakafeta‘i. Pea naʻe pakipaki ‘o ‘ange ki he kau akó ke nau tufotufa ki he kakai̇́. Pea nau tufa.
Na‘e toe ʻi ai foki mo ʻenau fanga ki‘i mata‘i ika. Pea toe tāpuaki‘i mo ia ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne toki fekau ʻa e kau akó ke nau tufotufa mo ia ki he kakai̇́.
Pea na‘e kai kātoa ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘o mākona, pea hili iá naʻe tānaki ʻe he kau akó ʻa e toengá maá ʻo fonu ai ha kato lalahi ʻe fitu.
Naʻe feʻunga mo e toko fā afe ʻa e kinautolu naʻe kai̇́, pea naʻe toki tukuange kinautolu.
Pea naʻe heka leva ki ha vaka, ʻe ia mo ʻene kau akó, ‘o nau tuku folau ki he feitu‘u Talamanutá.
Pea na‘e omi ha kau Fālesi ‘o nau fakafehuʻi ʻa Si̇̄sū, ko ʻenau feinga ke tauhele‘i ia, ʻo nau kole ke ne fai ha mana ke fakamo‘oni kiate ia, mei langi.

Pea ‘ai leva ʻa e fu‘u māpuhoi ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne toki pehē: ‟Ko e hā fau ʻa e holi ʻa e kakai̇́ ni ke maʻu ha faka‘ilonga mei langi! Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘e ‘ikai teitei fai ha faka‘ilonga mei langi maʻae to‘utangata ko ʻeni̇́!”
Pea mavahe leva ʻa Si̇̄sū meiate kinautolu, ‘o ne heka ki he vaká ‘o folau ki he kauvai ‘e tahá.
Pea na‘e ngalo ʻi he kau akó ke nau ōmai mo ha mā ‘e feʻunga mo kinautolu, he ko e fo‘i mā pē ʻe taha naʻa nau maʻu ʻi he vaká.
Pea fakatokanga ai ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou tokanga! Malu‘i kimoutolu ke mou ‘ʻata‘atā mei he lēvani ʻa e kau Fālesí mo e lēvani ʻa Hēlotá!”
Pea fepehēʻaki ʻe he kau akó, ‟Na‘a ko ʻene lau peheé koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ‘ikai ke tau ōmai mo ha maá.”

Pea ‘ilo ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻenau muhumuhú, pea naʻe fehu‘i ange kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou felāuʻaki ai ʻi he ‘ikai ha‘amou fo‘i mā? ‘Oku te‘eki koā ke mahino kiate kimoutolu ʻa e maá? ‘Oku fefeka pehē koā homou lotó?
‘Oku mou mata pē koā ka ‘oku ʻikai te mou mamata? Pea ʻoku mou telinga pē koā ka ‘oku ʻikai te mou fanongo? Kuo ngalo vave leva ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e meʻa naʻá ku fai̇́?
ʻI he‘eku pakipaki ʻa e fo‘i mā ‘e nimá ma‘a e toko nimaafé, Ko e kato ‘e fiha na‘e fonu ʻi he mā na‘e toé?” Pea nau tali ange, ‟‘E hongofulumāua.”
‟Pea ʻi heʻeku pakipaki ʻa e fo‘i mā ‘e fitú ma‘a e toko fāafé, ko e kato ‘e fiha na‘e fonu ʻi he toetoenga mā na‘a mou tufi̇́?” Pea nau tali, ‟ʻE fitu.”
Pea pehē ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Pea ‘oku te‘eki ai koā ke mahino atu ʻa e me‘a ‘oku ou laú?”
Pea nau a‘u atu ki Petesaita, pea taki mai ai ‘e ha ni‘ihi kia Si̇̄sū ha tangata na‘e kui, ‘o nau kole ange ke ne ala ki ai.

Pea puke leva ‘e Si̇̄sū e nima ‘o e tangatá, ‘o taki ia ki tuʻa ‘ākolo. Pea naʻe ʻaʻanu ki he ongo fo‘i mata ‘o e tangatá, ʻo ne toki hilifaki hono nimá kiate ia. Pea naʻe folofola ki ai, ‟‘Okú ke lava ‘o sio ki ha me‘a?”
Pea hanga hake leva ʻa e tangatá, pea naʻe toki pehēange, ‟ʻio, ‘oku ou lava ‘o sio ki he kakai, ka ‘oku nau hangē mai ha ʻulu ʻakau ‘oku laka takai holó.”
Pea toe ala ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he mata ‘o e tangatá. Pea toki ʻā ai ʻa e tangatá, ‘o moʻui hono matá, ʻo ne lava ‘o sio lelei ki he me‘a kotoa pē.
Pea toki folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟ʻAlu ā ki ʻapi. ‘Oua te ke toe foki ki he koló.”

Pea mavahe ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó mei he feitu‘u ko iá ‘o nau ō ki he fanga ki‘i kolo he feitu‘u Sesalia Filipai̇́. Pea lolotonga ʻenau kei fononga atú, naʻe fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, ‟Ko hai au ʻi he lau ʻa e kakai̇́?”
Pea nau pehēange, ‟Ko e lau ʻa e ni‘ihi, ko Sione Papitaiso koe, pea lau ʻe he ni‘ihi ko ‘Ilaisiā. Pea toe lau ʻa e ni‘ihi, ko ha taha koe he kau palōfitá.”
Pea toki fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ka ko hai au ʻi ho‘omou lau ʻamoutolú?” Pea pehēange ‘e Pita, ‟Ko e Mi̇̄saiá koe.”
Pea tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu; ‟ʻOua te mou fakahā ʻa e meʻá ni ki ha taha.”

Pea kamata mei ai ʻa e fakahinohino ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau akó, ‟ Kuopau ke moʻua ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ʻi ha mamahi lahi, pea ‘e fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi ia ‘e he kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú, mo e kau taula‘eiki pulé, mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, pea ʻe tāmate‘i ia. Ka ʻi he ʻaho hono tolu mei ai̇́, te ne toetu‘u.”
Na‘e mātu‘aki mahino ʻaupito ʻene fakamatala naʻe fai̇́, pea hanga ai ‘e Pita ‘o taki ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he tafa‘aki̇́, ‘o valoki‘i ia.

Kae tafoki hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o hanga ki he‘ene kau akó, pea naʻe toki folofola kia Pita, ‟ʻAlu kituʻa, Sētane! He ‘oku ‘ikai ko e fakakaukau fakaʻotua ‘okú ke fai̇́, ka ko e fakakaukau fakaetangata pē!”

Pea ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e kakai̇́ mo e kau akó, ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‟Kapau ‘oku loto ha taha ke muimui mai kiate au, kuo pau ke ne fakangalongalo‘i ‘e ia ia, pea kuo pau ke ne fua hono kolosí ‘o ne muimui kiate au.
He ka ai ha taha te ne loto ke fakahaofi ʻene moʻui̇́ kuó ne tuku ia ke mole. Peá ka ai ha taha te ne loto ke mole ʻene moʻui̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au mo e Ongoongo Lelei̇́, kuó ne fakahaofi ia.
He ko e hā hano lelei ki ha taha ‘okapau te ne ma‘u ʻa māmani kātoa kae mole ai ʻene moʻui̇́?
He ko e hā ha me‘a ‘e lava ʻe ha taha ‘o ‘oatu ke fakatauʻaki mai hono laumālié?

Peá ka ai ha taha te ne maa‘i au mo ʻeku akonaki̇́ ʻi he kuonga taʻelotu mo faiangahala ko eni̇́, ‘e maa‘i foki ʻa e toko taha ko iā ‘e he Foha ‘o e Tangatá ʻi heʻene hā‘ele mai mo e lāngilangi ‘o ʻene Tamai̇́ mo e kau ʻāngelo mā‘oni‘oni̇́.”

9.text: Pea toe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ‘oku ʻi ai ʻa e ni‘ihi ‘oku tutuʻu heni ‘e ‘ikai te nau mate kae‘oua kuo nau mamata ki he hoko mai ʻa e pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otua mo hono māfimafi̇́.”

Pea hili e ʻaho ‘e ono mei ai, pea vahe‘i ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa Pita, mo Sēmisi, mo Sione, ‘o ne taki hake kinautolu ki ha funga moʻunga mā‘olunga fakaekinautolu pē. Pea naʻe liliu hono fōtungá ʻo fakakehe ʻi honau lotolotongá.
He ko hono kofú naʻe hina ekiaki. ‘E ‘ikai lava ‘e ha taha fō vala ʻi māmani ‘o fō ha meʻa ke hinehina pehē.
Pea toki ʻasi̇́ mai kiate kinautolu ʻa ‘Ilaisiā mo Mōsese ‘okú nau talanoa mo Si̇̄sū.
Pea pehēange ‘e Pita kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e toki me‘a lelei mo‘oni, Tangata‘eiki, ʻetau ʻi heni̇́, ka mau fokotu‘u ha palepale ‘e tolu, ko e taha mo‘ou, pea taha mo‘o Mōsese, pea taha mo‘o ‘Ilaisiā.”
Ka ko e lea noaʻia pē ia ʻa Pita, he kuo nau mate he manavaheé.
Pea ‘iloange kuo malu ʻaki mai kiate kinautolu ha konga ʻao. Pea ongo mai ha le‘o mei he loto ʻaó, ‟Ko hoku ʻAlo ‘ofaʻangá ena. mou talangofua kiate ia.”
Fakafokifā, ʻi he vakavakai holo ʻa e kau akó, naʻe ʻikai te nau toe sio ki ha taha, tā ko Si̇̄sū toko taha pē ‘oku tuʻú.

Pea lolotonga ʻenau hifo mei he moʻungá, naʻe fakatokanga ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟ ʻOua te mou talanoa ki ha taha ʻa e me‘a kuo mou mamata ki ai̇́, kae‘oua kuo toetu‘u ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá, mei he maté.”
Pea na‘á nau talangofua ki heʻene tuʻutuʻuni ko iā, ka na‘á nau faʻa fifili, pē ko e hā koā hono ‘uhinga ‘o e ‟toetu‘u mei he maté.”
Pea nau fehu‘i ange kiate ia, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku pehē ai ‘e he kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé kuo pau ke tomu‘a ha‘u ʻa ‘Ilaisiaá?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟ʻOku mo‘oni pē ‘e tomu‘a ha‘u ʻa ‘Ilaisiā ‘o fokotuʻufoʻou ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē. Ka ko e hā ‘oku toe ʻasi̇ ai he Tohitapú ʻa e lau ko eni, ‛‘E moʻua ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ʻi ha ngaahi mamahi lahi, pea ‘e fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi ia?’
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, kuo ‘osi ha‘u ʻa ‘Ilaisiā, pea naʻe fa‘iteliha pē ʻa e kakai̇́ ʻi he meʻa naʻa nau fie fai kiate iá, ‘o hangē ko e meʻa naʻe hikitohi ʻo kau kiate iá.”
Pea ʻi heʻenau a‘u mai ki he feitu‘u na‘e ʻi ai ʻa e toenga ‘o e kauakó, naʻa nau sio kuo tuʻu takai kiate kinautolu ha kakai tokolahi, pea ‘oku nau fakakikihi mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsese.
Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa e kakai̇́ kia Si̇̄suú naʻa nau ‘ohovale ʻaupito, ‘o nau feleleʻi atu ‘o fakafeʻiloaki kiate ia.
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ‘oku mou fakakikihi ai mo kinautolú?”
Pea lea mai ʻa e toko taha mei he kakai̇́, ‟Tangata‘eiki Faiako! Na‘á ku ‘omi hoku fohá kiate koe, he kuo ma‘u ia ‘e ha fa‘ahikehe, pea ‘oku noa ai.

Peá ka ʻiloangé kuo ‘ohofi ia ‘e he fa‘ahikehé ʻi ha feituʻu, pea ‘okú ne ha ʻaki ia, pea koá hono ngutú, mo fengai‘itaki hono nifó, mo hamu hono sinó. Na‘á ku kole ange ki ho‘o kau akó ke nau kapusi ʻa e fa‘ahikehé, ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau lava.”

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟He toki kakai taʻe tui mo‘oni kimoutolu! Te tau nofo ai pē mo kimoutolu ke a‘u ki ʻafē? Te u kātaki‘i ai pē kimoutolu ke a‘u ki ʻafē? ‘Omi ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́ kiate au!”
Pea nau ‘omi. Pea ʻi he sio atu pē ʻa e fa‘ahikehé kia Sīsuú, pea ʻai ʻene fuʻu fakatete ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́ ke hamu, ‘o ne tō ai ki lalo ‘o teketekefili holo he kelekelé mo koa hono ngutú.
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he tamai ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́, ‟Ko e hā hono fuoloa ʻene puke peheé?” Pea naʻe tali, ‟Talu pē mei heʻene kei si‘i.
Pea kuo tā tuʻo lahi ʻa e feinga ʻa e fa‘ahikehé ke tāmate‘i ia ʻaki ʻene li̇̄ ia ki he afi̇́ mo e vai̇́. ʻAloʻofa mu‘a ‘o tokoni mai, ‘okapau te ke lava.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga hoʻo pehē mai, ‘Okapau te ke lava! ‘Oku malava ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē ki ha taha ‘oku tui!”
Pea kalanga leva ʻa e tamai ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́ mo ʻene tangi̇́, ‟‘Oku ou tui pē au ia! Ka ke tokoni mai mu‘a ke u ikunaʻi ʻeku ta‘e tuí!”

Pea vakai atu ‘e Si̇̄sū kuo feta‘ota‘omi mai ʻa e kakai̇́, pea naʻe fekau leva ki he fa‘ahikehé, ‟ʻA e laumālie ʻo e noá mo e tuli̇́, ʻoku ou fekauʻi koe ke ke hū ki tuʻa, pea tapu ke ke toe hū kiate ia!”

Pea ‘ai ʻa e fuʻu kaila ʻa e fa‘ahikehé, pea naʻe toki fakateteʻi ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́ ‘o mātu ʻaki hamu tetetete ai, pea naʻe toki mavahe mei ai. Pea naʻe hangē ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́ ha taha kuo maté, ʻo pehē ‘e he kakai kotoa na‘e tutuʻu ai̇́, ‟Kuo mate ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́!”
Ka naʻe toki hanga ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘o puke hono nimá, ‘o ne fokotu‘u hake ia ki ‘olunga.
Pea ʻi he hū ʻa Si̇̄sū ki falé, naʻe fehu‘i ange ki ai ‘e heʻene kau akó fakaekinautolu pē, ‟Ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai ai ke mau lava ‘o kapusi ʻa e fa‘ahikehé?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e fa‘ahinga fa‘ahikehe ko eni̇́, ʻe ʻikai lava ia ʻo kapusi, ka ʻi he lotu pē.”
Pea na‘á nau mavahe leva mei he feitu‘u ko iā ‘o nau fou atu ʻi Kāleli. Ka na‘e ‘ikai loto ʻa Si̇̄sū, ke ‘ilo ‘e ha taha ʻa e feitu‘u naʻa nau ʻi ai̇́.

Koeʻuhi̇̄ he kuó ne toutou fakamahino ki heʻene kau akó, ʻo pehē: ‟‘E tukuange ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ki he kakai̇́, pea te nau tāmate‘i ia. Pea ʻi he ʻaho leva hono tolu mei ai̇́, te ne toetuʻu mei he maté.”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke mahino kinautolu ʻene laú, pea naʻa nau manavahē hano toe ʻeke ange.
Pea na‘e ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ki Kāpaneume ki hono ʻapi̇́. Pea fehu‘i ange leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e me‘a na‘á mou feki̇̄hiaki tuʻu mai ai he halá?”
Ka na‘á nau fakalongolongo pē. He ko ʻenau feki̇̄hiaki̇́, pē ko hai ‘oku lahi̇́.

Pea toki nofo hifo ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne ui mai ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá. Pea naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu, ‟Ka loto ha taha ke ne hoko ko e tuʻukimuʻa ʻiate kimoutolu, kuo pau ke ne toʻo ʻa e tuʻunga māʻulalo tahá, ʻo ne nofo ko e sevāniti ki he kakai kotoa pē.”
Pea toʻo ‘e Si̇̄sū ha ki‘i tamasi‘i ʻi honau lotolotongá, ʻo ne fua hake ia, pea naʻe toki pehē ange kiate kinautolu,

‟Ka ai ha taha te ne tali lelei ha taha he fānau iiki̇́ ni koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, ko ʻene tali ai pē ia aú. Pea ko ia te ne tali lelei aú, ‘oku ‘ikai ngata pē he‘ene tali aú, ka ‘okú ne tali ai pē foki mo ia na‘á ne fekau‘i mai aú.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Sione kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Tangata‘eiki Faiako, na‘a mau sio ki ha toko taha ‘okú ne kapusi tēvolo ʻaki ho huafá, pea mau ta‘ofi ia he ʻoku ʻikai te ne muimui holo ʻiate kitautolu.”
Kae tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Oua te mou ta‘ofi iá. He ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne fai ha mana ʻi hoku hingoá pea toe tafoki hake ‘o laukovi kiate au.
Ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai te ne fakafepaki kiate kitautolú, ‘oku kau ia mo kitautolu.
Pea ‘ilonga ha taha te ne ‘oatu ha ipu vai pē koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ho‘omou kau mo aú, kuo pau ke fakapale‘i ia.”
Ka ‘oka ai ha taha te ne ‘ai ke fai angahala ha ki‘i tamasi‘i pehē ni, ʻe sai ange ki ai hano haʻi ha fuʻu maka momosi uite ʻi hono kiá ‘o ne toki hopo ki he moaná.

Ko ia ai, ka ‘iloange kuo fakaangahalaʻi koe ʻe ho nimá, pea tuʻusi ho nimá! He ‘e sai ange ho‘o ʻalu nima taha ki he moʻui̇́ ʻi ha‘o ʻalu nima ua ki Heli, ʻa ia ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e afi ‘oku ‘ikai matāmate‘i̇́.
Peá ka ‘iloange kuo fakaangahalaʻi koe ʻe ho va‘é, peá ke tuʻusi ia ʻo liʻaki. He ‘e sai ange ho‘o hū ve‘e taha ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá ʻi ha‘o ʻalu ve‘e ua ki Heli.
Peá ka ‘iloange kuo fakaangahalaʻi koe ʻe ho matá, peá ke kape‘i ia ʻo liʻaki. He ‘e sai ange ho‘o hū mata taha ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá ʻi ha‘o ʻalu mata ua ki Heli.
He ‘oku ‘ikai mate ʻa e ‘uangá he feitu‘u ko iā, pea ‘oku ‘ikai foki mate ai ʻa e afi̇́.
Ko e toko taha kotoa pē ʻi ai ‘e fakamāsima ʻaki ʻa e afi.
Ko e me‘a ʻaonga ʻa e māsimá. Ka ‘oka mole hono konokoná, pea ‘e toe fakakonokona ia ʻaki ʻa e hā? Mou ‘ai ke ʻi ai ha māsima ʻi ho‘omou moʻui̇́, pea mou nonofo melino.

10.text: Pea mavahe leva ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he feitu‘u ko iā, ‘o ne ʻalu ki he feituʻu ʻo Siuteá pea mo e kauvai fakahahake ‘o Sioatani̇́. Pea fakatahataha mai kiate ia ha kakai tokolahi, ‘o ne toe fai ai pē ʻene faiako kiate kinautolu, hangē ko ʻene anga maheni̇́.
Pea na‘e haʻu ha kau Fālesi ai ʻo nau holi ke tauhele‘i ia. Pea nau ʻeke ange, ‟‘Oku ngofua nai ʻi he‘etau Laó ke vete ‘e ha tangata ʻa hono mali̇́?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻenau fehuʻi̇́ ʻaki ʻa e fehu‘i ko eni̇́, ‟He ko e hā koā e tuʻutuʻuni ʻa Mōsese kiate kimoutolú?”
Pea nau pehē ange, ‟Na‘e fakangofua ‘e Mōsese ke fai ‘e ha tangata ha tohi vete, pea fekau hono uaifi̇́ ke ʻalu.”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e tohi ‘e Mōsese ʻa e tuʻutuʻuni ko iā koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ongongata‘a homou lotó.
Ka na‘e hanga ‘e he ‘Otuá, ʻi he kamata‘angá ‘o e fakatupú, ‘o ngaohi ʻa e tangatá mo e fefiné.
Ko hono ‘uhinga ia kuo pau ai ke tukuange ‘e ha tangata ʻene tamai̇́ mo ʻene fa‘eé kae nofotaha ki hono uaifi̇́.
Pea ʻoku hoko ʻa e husipaniti̇́ mo hono uaifi̇́ ‘o sinotaha. ‘Oku ‘ikai ke na kei ua, ka kuo na kakanotaha.
Pea ko e me‘a kuo fakatahaʻi ‘e he ‘Otuá, ke ‘oua na‘a toe fakamāvae ‘e ha taha.”
Pea ʻi heʻenau toe hū ki falé, naʻe kole ange ‘e he kau akó kia Si̇̄sū ke ne fakamahino ange mu‘a ʻene lau ko iā.
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Ka vete ‘e ha tangata hono uaifi̇́ kae toe mali ia mo ha fefine kehe, ko e feʻauaki ia.
Pea kapau ‘e vete ‘e ha fefine hono husepānití, kae toe mali mo ha tangata kehe, ʻokú ne feʻauaki ai pē mo ia.”
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha ni‘ihi na‘á nau ‘omi ʻenau fānaú kia Si̇̄sū, ke ne hilifaki hono nimá kiate kinautolu ‘o tāpuaki‘i. Ka naʻe hanga ‘e he kau akó ‘o taʻofi kinautolu.
Ka ʻi he ʻafioʻi ʻe Si̇̄suú, naʻá ne tuputāmaki ai, ‘o ne folofola, ‟Tuku pē ʻa e fānau iiki̇́ ke omi kiate au! ‘Oua ‘e ta‘ofi kinautolu. He ko e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá ‘oku ma‘a e fa‘ahinga peheé.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ka ‘ikai tali ‘e ha taha ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá ‘o hangē ko ha taha ʻo e fanaú ni, ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito hū ia ki ai.”
Pea naʻe toki fua hake ʻa e fānaú, ʻo ne hilifaki hono nimá kiate kinautolu, ‘o tāpuaki‘i.
Pea ʻi he kamata fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū he halá, naʻe lele mai ha tangata ‘o tō tūʻulutui atu kiate ia, ʻo ne fehuʻi kiate ia, ‟Tangata‘eiki lelei. Ko e hā te u fai ka u ma‘u ai ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā ‘okú ke ui ai au ko e lelei̇́? Ko e ‘Otuá pē taha ‘oku lelei̇́.
‘Okú ke ‘ilo pē ʻa e ngaahi fekaú. ‛‘Oua ‘e tāmate. ‘Oua ‘e feʻauaki. ‘Oua ‘e kaiha‘a. ‘Oua ‘e fakamo‘oni loi. ‘Oua ‘e kākā. Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai̇́ mo ho‘o fa‘eé.’ ”
Pea pehēange ‘e he tangatá, ‟Tangata‘eiki Faiako, talu ʻeku kei siʻi mo ʻeku tauhi kātoa ʻa e ngaahi fekau ko iā.”

Pea sio fakamama‘u ki ai ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ne ‘ofa lahi ki ai, peá ne pehēange, ‟Ko e me‘a pē ‘e taha ‘oku kei toé. ʻAlu ‘o fakatau atu ho‘o koloa kotoa pē, pea foaki atu hono paʻanga maʻae kau masivá, ka ke ma‘u koloa ʻi he langi̇́. Peá ke ha‘u leva ‘o muimui kiate au.”
Pea na‘e ʻikai toe fiesio mai ia, ʻi he lea pehē ʻa Sīsuú. Pea naʻe ʻalu kuo mamahi hono loto. He ko e tangata tuʻumālie lahi ia.
Pea sio holo ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‘o ne pehēange ki heʻene kau akó, ‟Ko e toki meʻa faingataʻa moʻoni ke hū ha taha tuʻumālie ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá!”
Pea ofo ʻa e kau akó heʻene lea ko iā. Pea toe pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Siʻi fānau, ko e toki meʻa faingataʻa moʻoni ke hū ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́, ‘oku faingofua ange ke hū ha kāmeli ʻi ha ava‘i hui tuitui, ʻi he hū ha taha tuʻumālie ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
Pea fakautuutu ai ʻa e ofo ʻa e kau akó, ‘o nau fepehēʻaki, ‟Pea ko hai leva ai ‘e lava ke fakamoʻui?”
Pea sio fakamamaʻu ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, pea naʻe toki pehē: ‟ʻI he sio ʻa e tangatá, ʻoku taʻemalava. Ka ‘oku ʻikai ke pehē ʻa e ʻOtuá. He ‘oku malava ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē.”
Pea pehē ange ai ‘e Pita, ‟Tangata‘eiki, kuo mau li̇ʻaki ʻemau me‘a kotoa, ka mau muimui kiate koe.”

Pea pehē ‘e Sīsuú, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ka li̇ʻaki ‘e ha taha hono ngaahi ʻapi̇́, pē ko hono fanga tokouá, pē tuofāfine, pē ko ʻene fa‘eé, pē ko ʻene tamaí, pē ko ʻene fānaú, pē ko hono kelekelé, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au mo e Ongoongo Lelei̇́,

Te ne maʻu he maama ko ‘eni̇́, ʻo liunga teau, ha ʻapi, mo ha ngaahi tokoua, mo e tuofāfine, mo ha ngaahi fa‘ē, mo e fānau, mo e kelekele, ʻo maʻu fakataha ai pē mo ha fakatanga. Pea ‘oka a‘u ki he maama kahaʻú, te ne ma‘u ai mo e mo‘ui ta‘engatá.
He ko e tokolahi ‘oku lolotonga mu‘omu‘á, te nau muimui. Pea ko e tokolahi ‘oku lolotonga muimui̇́, te nau mu‘omu‘a.”

Pea naʻe fononga atu leva ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ʻi he hala ki Selusalemá. Pea ʻalu mu‘omu‘a atu pē ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o taki kinautolu, pea ofo ai honau lotó, kae manavahē ʻa e kakai na‘e muimui fonongá. Pea ʻave ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá ki he tafa‘aki̇́, ʻo ne toe talaange kiate kinautolu ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ʻamanaki ke hoko kiate iá.

Na‘á ne pehēange, ‟Ko ʻetau fononga hake ʻeni ki Selusalema, pea ‘e tuku atu ai ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, pea te nau tuʻutuʻuni ke tāmate‘i ia, pea tuku atu ia ki he kau Senitaile.
Pea te nau manuki‘i ia, mo ʻanuhi ia, mo uipiʻi ia, pea toki tāmate‘i. Ka ‘oka hili ʻa e ʻaho ʻe tolu, te ne toetu‘u.”
Pea toki ʻalu atu kia Si̇̄sū ʻa Sēmisi mo Sione, ko e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti̇́, ʻo na pehēange, ‟Tangata‘eiki Faiako, ‘oku ma fakaʻamu ke ke tali muʻa ha meʻa pē te ma kole.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘okú mo loto ke u fai ma‘amouá?”
Peá na pehēange kiate ia, ‟Tuku muʻa ke ma nofo mei ho toʻomataʻú mo ho to‘ohemá, ‘oka ke ka hā‘ele mai mo ho lāngilangi̇́.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ke mo ‘ilo ʻa e me‘a ‘okú mo kole ki ai̇́! Te mo lava koā ‘o inu he ipu te u inu ai̇́? Pē te mo lava koā ‘o papitaiso he papitaiso‘anga ‘e papitaiso ai aú?”
Peá na pehēange, ‟‘Io, te ma lava pē.” Pea pehēange leva ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Te mo inu pē he ipu te u inu ai̇́, mo papitaiso he papitaiso te u papitaiso ai aú.
Ka ko e nofo mei hoku toʻomataʻú, mo hoku to‘ohemá, ‘oku ‘ikai ha ku mafai ke fakangofua. He ko e ongo feituʻu ko iā, ʻoku tuku maʻa e kakai̇ kuo teuteuʻi ke nofo ai̇́.”
Pea ʻi he ‘ilo ‘e he kau ako ko ē ʻa e kole ʻa Sēmisi mo Sioné, naʻa nau ʻita kia Sēmisi mo Sione.

Pea ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau akó, ʻo ne pehēange kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuo mou ʻosi ʻilo, ko e fa‘ahinga ko ē ‘oku lau, tokua, ko e kau taki ‘o e Senitailé, ʻoku nau ma‘u mafai ke pule‘i honau kakai̇́. Pea ko honau kau māʻolungá, ʻoku nau pule fakaehaua ki honau kakai̇́.
Ka he‘ikai te mou pehē kimoutolu ʻi he anga ho‘omou feohi̇́. Ka ai ha taha 21 kimoutolu te ne loto ke maʻu ʻa e tuʻunga māʻolungá, kuo pau ke ne hoko ko ha sevāniti ki hono toé.
Pea ka loto ha taha ʻiate kimoutolu ke hoko ko e tuʻukimuʻa, pea kuo pau ke ne hoko ko ha taha faifatongia ki he kakai kotoa pē.

He na‘e ‘ikai ke ha‘u ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá, ke ngāue fakatamaio‘eiki ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́. Ko ʻene haʻú, ke ne ngāue fakatamaio‘eiki ki he kakai̇́, mo foaki ʻene moʻui̇́ ko e huhu‘i ʻaki ʻene fetongi ha tokolahi.”

Pea a‘u atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ki Selikō. Pea ʻi he mavahe atu ʻa Sisu mo ʻene kau ako mo ha kakai tokolahi mei he koló, na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata kui, ko Pātimiosi hono hingoá, ko e foha ‘o Timiosi̇́, naʻe nofo mai mei he veʻehalá ʻo fai ʻene kolekole.
Pea ʻi he ‘ilo ‘e Pātimiosi ko Si̇̄sū mei Nāsaleti̇́ ‘oku fononga haké, naʻá ne kalanga atu, ‟‘E Si̇̄sū ē! Hako ‘o Tēvita! ʻAloʻofa mai muʻa kiate au!”
Pea fekau ‘e he tokolahi ke tuku ʻene kaikailá, kae fakautuutu pē ʻene kailá, ‟Hako ʻo Tēvita ē, ke ke ʻaloʻofa mai muʻa kiate au!”
Pea tuʻu ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‘o ne folofola, ‟Ui atu ki ai ke ha‘u!” Pea nau ui leva ki he tangata kui̇́, ‟Maʻu ha nonga! Tuʻu ki ‘olunga! Ko ē ‘okú ne ui koe!”
Pea li̇̄ ai pē ‘e Pātimiosi hono pulupulú, ʻo ne puna ki ‘olunga ‘o ʻalu atu kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘okú ke loto ke u fai ma‘aú?” Pea pehēange ‘e Pātimiosi, ‟Tangataʻeiki, ke u ‘ā mu‘a!”
Pea toki folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟ʻAlu ā! Kuó ke mo‘ui koe koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ho‘o tui̇́.” Pea ʻā leva ʻa e tangatá ʻo sio, pea naʻe muimui fononga ai pē kia Sīsuú, ʻi he halá.

11.text: Pea ʻi he fakaofiofi atu ‘enau fonongá ki Selusalemá, ‘o nau a‘u ki Pētefesi mo Pētani̇́ ‘i he Moʻunga ‘Ōlivé, naʻe fekau atu ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘a e toko ua he‘ene kau akó ke na mu‘omu‘a atu ‘iate kinautolu.
Peá ne folofola kiate kinaua, ‟Mo ō ki he kolo ko ena ‘oku hanga mai̇́. Pea ʻi ho‘omo a‘u ki ai̇́, te mo sio ‘oku nono‘o ai ha ki‘i ‘asi, kuo te‘eki ke heka ai ha taha. Mo vete ia ‘o taki mai.
Pea kapau ‘e ‘eke atu ‘e ha taha pē ko e hā ‘oku mo vete ai iá, pea mo talaange; ‛‘Oku fiema‘u ia ‘e he ‘Eiki̇́, pea te ne toki fakafoki mai ia ki heni.’”
Pea ō atu ʻa e ongo me‘á, ‘oku nono‘o mai ʻa e ki‘i ʻasi̇́ ʻi he tuʻafalé he tafaʻaki ki halá. Peá na vete ia.
Pea pehē ange ‘e ha ni‘ihi na‘e tutuʻu ai, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mo vete ai ʻa e ki‘i ‘asi̇́?”
Peá na tali ange pē ʻo hangē ko ia na‘e fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinauá, pea nau toki fakaʻatā ke na vete ia.
Peá na taki mai ʻa e ki‘i ʻasi̇́ kia Si̇̄sū, pea nau hanga leva ‘o ‘ai honau ‘ū pulupulú ki he tuʻa ‘o e ki‘i ʻasi̇́, pea toki heka ki ai ʻa Si̇̄sū.
Pea fola ‘e he tokolahi honau pulupulú he halá, kae fesi mai ʻe ha ni‘ihi, ha ngaahi vaʻakau mei he ngaahi ngoue‘angá, ‘o falikiliki ʻaki ʻa e halá.
Pea ko e kakai na‘e mu‘omu‘á mo kinautolu naʻe muimui atu ‘ia Si̇̄suú, naʻa nau kalanga ʻo pehē:
Tauange ke fai tāpuekina,

Pea ʻi he hū atu leva ‘a Si̇̄sū ki Selusalemá, naʻá ne ‘alu ki he Temipalé ‘o ne vakaiʻi ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē, ka koeʻuhi̇̄ kuo kamata ke efiafi poʻuli, ko ia naʻá ne ʻalu mei ai ki Pētani mo e toko hongofulu mā uá.
Pea ʻi he pongipongi ʻe tahá, lolotonga ‘enau fononga atu mei Pētani̇́, naʻe fiekaia ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Pea ne fakatokanga‘i atu mei he mama‘ó ha fu‘u fiki kuo fai lau, ko ia naʻá nee afe ki ai ke vakai na‘a ma‘u ai ha fua. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ha meʻa te ne maʻu ai, he na‘e ‘ikai ko e to‘u fiki̇́ ia.
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he fu‘u fiki̇́, ‟‘E ‘ikai toe kai fiki ha taha meiate koe ‘o ta‘engata!” Pea na‘e ‘ilo ‘e he‘ene kau akó ‘ene lea ko iā.

Pea ʻi he a‘u atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó ki Selusalema, naʻá ne hū ki he Temipalé, ʻo ne kamata tuli ki tuʻa ʻa e kakai kotoa pē na‘e fai fefakatauʻaki he Temipalé, mo fulihi ʻa e ngaahi tēpile ‘a e kau fetongi pa‘angá mo e ngaahi sea ‘o e kau fakatau lupé.
Pea na‘á ne ta‘ofi ke toe fua kavenga holo ha taha he loto Temipalé.

Peá ne toki faiako ai, ʻo ne talaange kiate kinautolu, ‟Kuo tohi he Tohitapú, ‘E ui hoku falé ko e falelotu maʻae kakai ‘o e ngaahi pule‘angá kotoa pē! Ka kuo mou liliu ia ko e ‘ana ‘o ha kau kaiha‘a.”

Pea na‘e ongo atu ki he hou‘eiki taula‘eiki̇́ mo e kau tangata ʻo e Tohitapú ʻa e me‘a na‘e lea ʻaki ‘e Sīsuú, pea kamata ai ke nau kumi faingamālie ke tāmate‘i ia. Ka na‘á nau teteki ki ai, koeʻuhi̇̄ he naʻe mālieʻia ʻaupito ʻa e kakai̇́ heʻene tokāteliné.
Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó, naʻe foki atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó mei he koló.
Pea ʻi he pongipongi ‘e tahá, naʻa nau fononga atu he halá, pea nau fakatokanga‘i, tā kuo mōmoa ʻa e fu‘u fiki̇́ ‘o a‘u ki hono aká.
Pea manatu‘i ia ‘e Pita ʻo ne pehē ange kiate ia ‟Tangata‘eiki, ko e fu‘u fiki ena na‘á ke talatuki‘i̇́, kuo mate.”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó, ‟Mou tui ki he ‘Otuá!
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, kapau te mou tui ki he ‘Otuá, ʻo ʻikai ha veiveiua, te mou lava ke lea ki he moʻunga ko eé, ‛Mahiki atu koe ‘o tō ki tahi.’ pea ‘e hoko ia.
Ko ia, ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ko e me‘a kotoa pē te mou lotu ‘o kole ki ai̇́, mou tui te mou maʻu ia, pea ‘e ‘oatu ia kiate kimoutolu.
Peá ka mou ka tuʻu hake ke fai ha lotu, ka ‘oku kovi homou lotó ki ha taha, pea mou fakamolemole‘i ia, kae fakamolemole‘i ‘e ho‘omou Tamai ʻi he langi̇́, ‘a ho‘omou ngaahi faikovi̇́.”

Pea nau toe foki atu kinautolu ki Selusalema. Pea lolotonga ʻa e fou atu ‘a Si̇̄sū he loto Temipalé, kuo tutuʻu mai kiate ia ʻa e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki̇́ mo e kau tangata ʻo e Tohitapú, mo e kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú;
‘o nau pehē ange, ‟Ko e hā ho mafai ‘okú ke fai ai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko ‘eni̇́? Ko hai na‘á ne ‘oatu ʻa e mafai ko iā koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ke fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ni?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu, ‟Te u fai atu haʻaku fehu‘i, pea kapau te mou tali mai, pea te u toki fakahā atu ‘a e mafai ‘oku ou fai ai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko ‘eni̇́.
Ko e fai papitaiso ʻa Sioné? Ko e mafai mei̇́ he ‘Otuá pē mei̇́ he tangatá? Ko e hā hoʻomou laú.”
Pea nau kamata felāuaki ai ʻiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē, ‟Kapau te tau talaange, ‘Naʻe mei̇́ he ‘Otuá’ pea te ne pehē mai ‘e ia, ‘Ka ko e hā naʻe ‘ikai ai te mou tui kiate iá?”
Pea kapau te tau talaange, ‟Naʻe mei̇́ he tangatá, ka te tau fepaki ai mo e kakai̇́.” He na‘e tui ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ko e palōfita ‘a Sione.

Pea talu ai pē ʻenau pehēange, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo.” Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Mo au foki, he ‘ikai te u fakahā atu ‘e au pē ko e mafai mei fē ‘oku ou fai ai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko ‘eni̇́.”

12.text: Pea na‘e kamata fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e talanoa fakatātā ko eni̇́, ‟Na‘e ‘i ai tokua ha tangata na‘e tō ʻene ngoue kālepi, pea na‘á ne ʻāaʻi takai ia, ʻo ne toki fokotuʻu ai mo hano tatau‘anga uaine, mo langa ai hano fale le‘o. Pea naʻe lisi atu leva ia ki ha kau mātuʻa tauhingoue, kae ‘alu ia ki muli.
Pea a‘u ki he toʻukai kālepi̇́, pea naʻe fekau atu ha‘ane tamaio‘eiki ke ‘alu ‘o ‘omai hono ‘inasi̇́, he fua ‘o e kālepi̇́, mei he kau mātuʻa tauhingoue naʻe lisi ki ai̇́.
Ka na‘e puke ‘e he kau mātuʻa tauhingoué ʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́ ‘o taa‘i, pea nau fakafoki halaʻatā ia.
Peá ne toe fekau haʻane tamaio‘eiki ‘e taha ki he kau mātuʻa tauhingoué, kae toe hanga ‘ekinautolu ‘o tuki pohu hono ʻulú mo ngaohikovia ia.

Pea ne toe hanga ʻo fekau atu mo ʻene tamaio‘eiki ‘e taha kehe, ka naʻa nau tāmate‘i mo ia foki. Pea ai mo ha niʻihi kehe tokolahi naʻá ne toe fekau atu, pea ko honau niʻihi naʻa nau tāaʻi pea ko e niʻihi, naʻa nau tāmateʻi.
Pea na‘e kei toe hono foha ‘ofa‘angá. Peá ne fekau ke ‘alu fakamuimui ia ki he kau mātuʻa tauhingoué, heʻene pehē, ‛Te nau toka‘i ia he ko hoku foha.’
Ka ko e kau mātuʻa tauhingoue ko iā, naʻa nau fepehēʻaki, ‛Ko e foha ʻea ʻeni. Mou haʻu, tau tāmate‘i ia, ka tau ma‘u ʻekitautolu hono tofiʻá.’
Pea nau puke leva ia ‘o nau tāmate‘i, pea nau toki li̇̄ kituʻa ia mei he ngoueʻanga kālepi̇́.

ʻOku mou pehē nai, ko e hā ʻa e me‘a ‘e fai ‘e he tangataʻeiki na‘e ‘a‘ana e ngoue kālepi̇́? ʻIo, te ne toki hokomai ‘o faka‘auha ʻa e kau mātuʻa tauhingoue ko iā, ka ne foaki ʻa e ngoue‘anga kālepi̇́ ki ha ni‘ihi kehe.
‘Oku te‘eki ai koā te mou lau e potu folofola ko eni̇́:
Ko e ngāue ia ʻa e ʻEiki̇́,
Pea naʻá nau feinga ke puke ia, ka naʻa nau manavahē ki he kakai̇́. He na‘á nau ʻilo ko e ʻuhnga ange ʻa e talanoa fakatātā, kiate kinautolu. Ko ia, naʻá nau tuku ia ka nau ʻalu.
Pea na‘á nau fekau atu ha niʻihi mei̇́ he kau Fālesi pea mo e fa‘ahi ‘a Hēlotá ke nau feinga ke tauhele‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘aki ha ‘ū fehu‘i.

Ko ia, naʻá nau omi ʻo pehē ange kiate ia, ‟Tangata‘eiki, ‘oku mau lave‘i ko e tangata faitotonu koe pea ʻoku ‘ikai te ke tokanga ki he lau ʻa e kakai̇́, he ʻoku ʻikai te ke filifilimānako, ka ʻokú ke akonaki totonu ʻaki ʻa e finangalo ʻo e ‘Otuá. Ko e hā ha‘o lau, te mau totongi tukuhau kia Sisa, pē ‘ikai?”
Ka na‘e meaʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘enau fakamatamatalotú. Ko ia naʻá ne pehē ange kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e hā ʻoku mou feinga ai ke tauheleʻi aú? ‘Omi angē ha fo‘i pa‘anga ke u sio ki ai.”
Pea nau ʻomi ia. Pea ne pehē ange leva kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko e ʻimisi mo e hingoa ‘o hai ʻoku ʻasi ai̇́?” Pea nau talaange, ‟‘O Sisá.”
Pea tali ʻe Sīsū, ‟Pe‘i ‘oange kia Sisa ʻa e me‘a ‘a Sisá, kae ‘oange ki he ‘Otuá ʻa e me‘a ʻa e ‘Otuá.” Pea naʻa nau ʻohovale ‘aupito ʻiate ia.
Pea toki omi kia Si̇̄sū ha kau Sātusi, ʻa e fa‘ahinga naʻe tui ‘oku ʻikai ha toetu‘u mei he maté.

Pea nau fehuʻi ange kia Sīsū, ʻo pehē, ‟Tangata‘eiki Faiako, na‘e hikitohi ma‘atautolu ‘e Mōsese ʻo pehē, ‛Kapau ‘e mate ha tangata, ka ‘oku kei mo‘ui hono uaifi̇́ ka ne ‘ikai ha‘ana fānau, pea ke mali ʻa e tokoua ‘o e tangata ko iā mo e uitoú ke maʻu ai ha fānau, ‘o lau ko e hako ‘o hono tokoua kuo maté.’
Sai, na‘e ʻi ai ha kau tautehina ‘e toko fitu. Pea mali ʻa e lahi̇́, pea mate ia, kae ‘ikai ha‘ane fānau.
Pea mali ʻa e uitoú mo e hoko haké, pea toe mate pē mo ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane fānau. Pea hoko pehē pē ki he fika tolú.
Pea pehē ai pē ki hono toe ʻo e toko fitú. Na‘á nau mali kotoa mo e fefiné pea nau mate, kae ‘ikai ha hako ʻe maʻu ai. Pea faifai, pea toki mate ʻa e fefiné ki mui.
ʻOka hokosia ʻa e Toetuʻú, he ʻaho fakamui̇́, ko hai ʻe lau ko e husepāniti ʻo e fefiné, he naʻe mali kotoa ʻa e toko fitú mo ia?”
Pea tali ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Hono ʻikai ko e ʻuhinga ia hoʻomou hē! He ʻoku ʻangeʻange hoʻomou taʻe‘ilo ki he Tohitapú ʻi hoʻomou taʻeʻilo ki he māfimafi ‘o e ‘Otuá.
He ʻoka hokosia ʻa e toetuʻu mei he maté, he‘ikai te nau toe nofo mali, pe toe teu mali, ka te nau hangē ko e kau ʻāngelo ʻi he Langi̇́.

Pea ko e me‘a ki he fakatoetu‘u ‘o e kau pekiá, ‘oku te‘eki koā ke mou lau he Tohi ‘a Mōsesé, ʻa e talanoa ki he vao tatalaʻāmoá? He ʻoku ‘asi ai na‘e folofola ange ‘e he ‘Otuá kia Mōsese, ʻo pehē: ‛Ko e ‘Otua au ‘o ‘Ēpalahame, mo ‘Aisake, pea mo Sēkope.’
Ko ia, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ‘Otua ia ‘o e maté, ka ʻo e moʻui̇́. ‘Oku hala mamaʻo ‘aupito ho‘omou maʻú!”
Pea ha‘u ha toko taha he kau tangata ʻo e tohitapú, ‘o ne fanongo he mālie ʻo e tali ‘a Sīsuú, peá ne fehu‘i ange kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e fē nai ʻa e fekau ‘oku mahu‘inga tahá?”
Pea tali ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e fekau mahu‘inga tahá eni: ‛Fanongo mai, ʻa ‘Isileli̇́! Ko e ‘Eiki ko hotau ‘Otuá, ko e ʻEiki̇́ pē Taha ia.
Pea te ke ‘ofa ki he ʻEiki ko ho ʻOtuá, ʻaki ho lotó kotoa, pea mo ho laumālié kotoa, pea mo ho ‘atamai̇́ kotoa, pea mo ho ivi̇́ kotoa.’
Pea ʻoku hoko hake pē ki ai̇ eni: ‛Te ke ‘ofa ki ho kaungāʻapi̇́ ‘o hangē tofu pē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koé.’ ʻOku ʻikai ha toe fekau ʻe mahuʻinga ange he ongo fekau ko eni̇́.”
Pea tali ʻe he tangatá, ‟Mālie e tali, Tangata‘eiki Faiako. ‘Oku hangē pē ko ho‘o laú. Ko e ‘Otuá pē ʻa e ʻEiki̇́. Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha toe ‘Otua, ka ko ia pē taha.

Pea kuo pau ke te ‘ofa ki he ‘Otuá ʻaki hoto lotó kotoa, mo hoto laumālié kotoa, mo hoto ivi̇́ kotoa, mo ‘ofa ki hoto kāingá ‘o hangē pē ko ‘ete ‘ofa kiate kitá. ‘Oku mahu‘inga ange ʻa e talangofua ki he ongo fekau ko iā, ‘i he ngaahi feilaulau tutu kotoa pē mo e ngaahi feilaulau tukumoʻui kotoa pē.”

Pea ʻi he tokanga‘i ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e fakapotopoto ʻa e tali ʻa e tangatá, naʻá ne pehē ange, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te ke mama‘o koe mei he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.” Pea talu mei ai, mo e ‘ikai ha toe taha ʻe toʻa feʻunga ke ne fai ha fehu‘i kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea ʻi he kei faiako ‘a Si̇̄sū he Temipalé, naʻá ne fokotu‘u atu ʻa e fehu‘i, ʻo pehē, ‟ʻOku anga fēfē ‘a e lau ‘e he kau tangata ʻo e tohitapú, ko e ‘Alo ‘o Tēvita ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá?
He ʻi he fonu ʻa Tēvita ʻi he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, naʻá ne pehē:
Ko Tēvita ē ʻokú ne lau ia ko hono ʻEiki, pea ʻe anga fēfē haʻane hoko ko hono foha?’ Pea ko e fuʻu kakai tokolahi naʻe fanongo kiate iá, naʻá nau mālieʻia ai.”

Pea toki pehē ‘e ia kiate kinautolu ‘i heʻene faiakó, ‟Mou vakai na‘a mou hangē ko e kau tangata ʻo e tohitapú. He ‘oku nau manako ke teungaʻaki ʻa e kofu fakafaifekaú, pea ke lea faka‘apa‘apaʻi ‘e he kakai̇́ ‘i he māketi̇́.
Pea ke ʻange foki hanau nofo‘anga makehe he ngaahi falelotú mo e tuʻunga fakalangilangi̇́ ʻi he ngaahi kātoangá.
Ko e faʻahinga ‘oku nau ma‘u ʻi he founga kākā ʻa e kelekele ‘o si‘i kau uitoú, ka ʻoku nau fakamatamatalotu ʻaki ‘enau lotu lōloa. Ko e faʻahinga ko eni̇́, ʻe mamafa ange honau tauteá.”
Pea naʻá ne nofo hifo he ve‘e puha tānaki‘anga pa‘angá he Temipalé, ʻo ne mamata ki he anga ‘o e li̇̄ pa‘anga ʻa e kakai̇́. Na‘e tokolahi ʻa e kau maʻumeʻa na‘á nau li̇̄ pa‘anga lalahi.
Pea faifai̇́ naʻe ha‘u si‘a fine‘eiki uitou masiva, ‘o ne li̇̄ ‘e ia ha ongo pa‘anga kapa ‘e ua. Ko hono mahu‘ingá ko e lau sēniti pē.
Pea ui ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau akó, ʻo ne toki pehē ange kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ko e li̇̄ ʻa e si‘i uitou ko eni̇́, ‘oku hulu atu ia he li̇̄ ʻa e kakai kātoa ko ē.
He ʻoku li̇̄ ʻa e kakai ko ē mei he tupu ʻo e paʻanga ‘oku nau maʻú, ka ko si‘i uitoú ni, neongo ʻene masivá, ka ne li̇̄ ʻa e meʻa kotoa naʻá ne maʻú, ʻio; ʻa e kotoa ʻo ʻene moʻui̇́.”

13.text: Pea ʻi he kamata mavahe atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he Temipalé, naʻe pehē mai ‘e he toko taha heʻene kau akó, ‟Vakai atu, Tangata‘eiki Faiako, ki he faka‘ofo‘ofa ‘o e ngaahi maká mo e ngaahi falé!”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Okú ke tokanga‘i koā ʻa e ngaahi fu‘u fale ko ʻeni̇́? ʻi ai ʻa e ʻaho ‘e holoki ai. Pea ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito toe tuku ha foʻi maka heni ‘o taʻeholoki.”
Pea ʻi he nofo hifo ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he Moʻunga ko ‘Ōlivé, ‘o feʻunga atu mo e Temipalé, naʻe haʻu kiate ia ʻa Pita, mo Sione, mo Sēmisi, pea mo ʻAnitelū ‘o nau fehuʻi fakaekinautolu pē kiate ia.
Pea nau pehēange kia Sīsū, ‟Talamai muʻa pē ʻe hoko ʻafē ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘okú ke laú? Ko e hā ha fakaʻilonga ‘o e teu hokomai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Vakai na‘a takihala‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha taha!
He ‘e hū mai ha tokolahi ʻi hoku hingoá, ʻo talamai, Ko au ia, pea te nau takihēeʻi ha tokolahi.

Pea ka moú ka fanongo kuo fai ha ngaahi tau, pē ko ha talanoa ki ha tau, pea ‘oua te mou manavasi‘i ai. He ko e ngaahi me‘a pē ia kuo pau ke hoko. Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha faka‘ilonga ia kuo hoko mai ʻa e ngata‘angá.
He ʻe tau ʻa e fonua mo e fonua, ʻa e pule‘anga mo e pule‘anga. ‘E mofuike ʻa e ngaahi feitu‘u lahi, pea ʻe mate ha tokolahi ʻi he ngaahi honge. Ka ko e kamata‘anga pē ia ‘o e ngaahi mamahi̇́.

Ka mou tokanga! He ‘e puke kimoutolu ‘o ‘ave ki he ngaahi fale hopó, pea ʻe tāaʻi kimoutolu he ngaahi falelotú. Pea ‘e fakamaauʻi kimoutolu ʻe ha kau taki mo ha ngaahi Tuʻi koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au, kae lava ke nau fakamoʻoniʻi hoʻomou tui̇́.
He kuo pau ke tomu‘a malanga ʻaki ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei̇́ ki he fonua kotoa pē.

Pea ka puke kimoutolu ‘o ‘ave ki he fale hopó, pea ‘oua ‘e hoha‘a homou lotó pē ko e hā ha‘amou fakamatala ‘e fai. He ‘e ‘oatu pē ha fakamatala ke mou fai. Pea ko e ngaahi lea te mou lea‘aki̇́, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha ngaahi lea ʻamoutolu, ka ko e ngaahi lea mei he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́.

‘E hanga ‘e ha ni‘ihi ‘o lavaki‘i honau fanga tokoua ke ‘ave ‘o tāmate‘i. ‘E fai pehē mo ha ngaahi tamai ki he‘enau fānaú. ‘E ʻi ai ha fānau te nau fakasi̇̄tu‘a‘i ʻenau mātu‘á ‘o fekau ke ‘ave ‘o tāmate‘i.
‘E fehi‘a kiate kimoutolu ʻa e kakai kotoa pē koeʻuhi̇̄ ko au. Ka ko ia ‘e kātaki ke a‘u ki he ngata‘angá, ‘e fakamoʻui ia.”

‟Pea ‘e faifai̇́, te mou mamata ki he Me‘a Fakalielia ange fau ‘oku tuʻu he feitu‘u naʻe ‘ikai totonu ke tuʻu ai̇́. (Tauange ke mahino ia kiate koe ‘okú ke lau eni̇́.) Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku ʻi Siutea he ʻaho ko iā, ke mou hola ki he ngaahi moʻungá!
Pea ka ai ha taha ‘oku nofo ʻi ha funga falé he ʻaho ko iā, pea ‘oua ‘e toe hifo ki fale ke to‘o mei ai ha me‘a ke hola mo ia.
Pea ka ai ha taha ‘oku ʻalu ki ʻuta he ʻaho ko iā, pea ‘oua ‘e toe foki ki ʻapi ke to‘o hano pulupulu ke ʻalu mo ia.
‘E faka‘ofa ʻa e kakai fefine feitamá mo e kakai fefine toʻotamá!
Mou lotu ki he ‘Otuá ke ‘oua na‘a hoko ʻeni he fa‘ahi ta‘u momokó.
He ko e toki faingata‘a lahi ia talu mei he kamataʻangá, ʻi hono fakatupu ‘o māmani̇́, ‘o a‘u mai ki he ʻahó ni. Pea ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito toe ai hano ua.
Ka naʻe ‘ikai ke fakanounou ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e lahi ‘o e ngaahi ʻaho ko iā, pehē ‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e toe hao. Ka kuó ne hanga ‘o fakanounou ia, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e kakai kuó ne filí.
Pea kapau ‘e pehē atu ‘e ha taha, ‛Sio mai! Ko e Mi̇̄saiá ʻeni!’ pē te ne pehē: ‛Ko e Mi̇̄saiá ena!’ pea ‘oua te mou tui ki ai.

He ‘e hopo hake ha kau mi̇̄saia loi, mo ha kau palōfita loi. Peá te nau fai ha ngaahi mana mo ha ngaahi me‘a fakaofo ke takihala‘i ʻaki ʻa e kakai̇́. Pea na‘á mo e kakai ʻa e ‘Otuá, te nau tūkuingata ke takihala‘i.
Ka mou tokanga, kuo u ‘osi talaatu kei mama‘o ʻa e ngaahi me‘á ni!”
‟Peá ka hili ʻa e ngaahi faingata‘a he ngaahi ʻaho ko iā, pea ‘e fakapoʻuli leva ʻa e laʻaá, pea ‘e ‘ikai toe huhulu ʻa e māhiná.
‘E ngangana foki ʻa e ngaahi fetuʻú mei he langi̇́, pea ‘e ngalulululu ʻa e ngaahi mafai ‘oku ʻi he ngaahi langi̇́.
Pea ‘e toki ʻasi mai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá he ngaahi ʻaó kuó ne teunga ʻaki ʻa e mālohi lahi mo e lāngilangi.
Pea te ne toki fekau atu ʻene kau ʻāngeló ke tānaki mai ʻene kakai kuó ne fili̇́ mei he tapa kotoa pē ‘o māmani mo langi.”
‟Pea ko eni, mou ako mei he fu‘u fiki̇́. Ka muimuia mo talamuka hono laú, pea mahino, ko ʻene ofi ia ʻa e fa‘ahita‘u māfaná.
Ko ia, ka moú ka sio leva kuo kamata hoko ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou laú, pea mou ‘ilo kuo vave ʻene hoko mai̇́, he kuo mei aʻu mai ia ki he matapaá.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ‘e pau ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou lau ki ai̇́, ‘oku te‘eki ke mate kotoa ʻa e toʻutangata ko eni̇́.
‘E faifai pē pea ʻauha ʻa e langi̇́ mo māmani, ka ‘e tolonga pē ʻeku ngaahi leá ‘o ta‘engata.”
‟Ka ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha te ne ‘ilo pē ‘e hoko fakakū mai ʻa e ʻaho ko iā. Na‘a mo e kau ʻāngelo ʻi he langi̇́, mo e ʻAló foki, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ‘ilo, ko e Tamai̇́ pē toko taha ʻokú ne meaʻi̇́.
Mou tokanga pē, pea mou teuteu. He ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo pē ‘e hoko fakakū ʻa e taimi ko iā.

‘E hangē ko ha taha naʻe teu ʻalu ki muli, pea naʻe tukuange hono ʻapi̇́ ki heʻene kau tamaio‘eiki̇́ ke nau tokangaʻi, ʻo ne tuku ki he tamaio‘eiki takitaha hono fatongia, mo ne fekau ʻa e le‘o matapaá, ke ‘ā pē ‘o le‘o.
Ko ia, mou ‘ā ‘o le‘o! He ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo pē ‘e foki fakakū mai ʻa e ʻeiki ʻo e ʻapi̇́. Na‘a ha‘u efiafi ia, pē vaeuapō, pē ʻi he ‘uʻua ʻa e moá pē ʻi he hengihengi̇́.
Vakai na‘a fakafokifā pē kuo ha‘u ia, ʻo ʻilo ‘oku mou mohe!
Ko e fakatokanga ‘oku ou fai kiate kimoutolú, ‘oku ou fai ia ki he kakai kotoa pē. Mou le‘o!”

14.text: Pea naʻe toe pē ʻa e ʻaho ‘e ua pea a‘u ki he Pāsová mo e Kātoanga Kai Mā Tapulēvani̇́, pea kamata alea ʻa e hou‘eiki taula‘eiki̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé pē ‘e anga fēfē ha‘anau puke fakafufū ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o tāmate‘i.
He naʻa nau pehē: ‟‘Oua te tau puke ia he lolotonga ʻa e kātoangá, na‘a hoko ai ha moveuveu ʻi he kakai̇́.”

Pea lolotonga ʻa e ʻi Pētani ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻi he ʻapi ‘o Saimone, ko e tangata na‘e kilia, ʻo fai ʻenau maʻumeʻatokoni, kuo ha‘u ha fefine mo ha hina lolo tākai. Ko e hina ʻalapasita ia, pea ko e lolo na‘ati mahu‘inga ʻaupito. Pea hanga ‘e he fefiné ‘o foa‘i ʻa e hiná, ‘o lilingi ʻa e loló ki he ʻulu ‘o Sīsuú.
Pea felāuaki ai ʻa e ni‘ihi ‘o nau pehē: ‟Ko e maumau‘i pehe‘i ʻo e loló ke hā?
Na‘e mei fakatau atu ia ‘o ma‘u ai ha pa‘anga siliva ‘e tolungeau ke foaki ma‘a e kau masivá!” Pea nau ʻitangiʻi lahi ai ʻa siʻi fefiné.
Kae folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Tuku ai pē mu‘a ʻa e fefiné ni ia! Ko e hā ‘oku mou fakalotomamahi‘i ai iá? Ko e me‘a ke fakamālōʻia kuó ne fai ma‘akú.
Te mou nofoma‘u ai pē mo e kau masivá, pea ‘oku faingamālie pē ke mou tokoni‘i kinautolu. Ka he‘ikai te mou nofo ai pē mo au.
Kuo fai pē ʻe he fefiné ni ʻa e meʻa totonu ke ne fai̇́. He kuó ne tākai hoku sinó ko e teuteu ki fonualoto.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ko e feituʻu kotoa pē ‘e malanga‘i ai ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei̇́, ‘e talanoa‘i ai pē mo e me‘a kuo fai ‘e siʻi fefiné ni, ko e fakamanatu kiate ia.”
Pea toki ʻalu ʻa Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ko e toko taha ia he toko hongofulu mā uá, ‘o lavaki‘i ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́.
Pea fiefia ai honau lotó, ʻo nau palōmesi te nau ‘oange ha‘ane pa‘anga. Ko ia, naʻe toki kumi faingamālie leva ʻa Siutasi ke ne puke ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo tuku atu kiate kinautolu.

Pea ʻi heʻene a‘u ki he ʻuluaki ʻaho ‘o e Kātoanga Kai Mā Tapulēvani̇́, ʻa e ʻaho na‘e tāmate‘i ai e fanga lami̇́ ki he Pāsová, pea pehēange ‘e he kau akó kia Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Okú ke loto ke mau teuteu ʻa e Pāsová ʻifē?”
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he toko ua he‘ene kau akó, ‟Mo ō ki kolo, pea te mo fetaulaki ai mo ha tangata ‘okú ne fua ha hina vai. Mo muimui ai.
Pea ko e ʻapi ‘e ʻalu ki ai̇́, pea mo talaange ki he toko taha ‘oku ‘o‘ona ʻa e ʻapi̇́, ‛‘Oku ʻeke mai ‘e he Tangata‘eiki̇́, pē ko e fē ʻa e loki te ne kai ai ʻa e Pāsová mo ʻene kau akó?’
Peá te ne fakahā atu kiate kimoua ha loki ʻi ‘olunga kuo ‘osi maau, pea mo teuteu ai ʻa e Pāsová ma‘atautolu.”
Peá na ō atu ʻo hū ki he koló, pea ko e me‘a kotoa na‘e talaange ‘e Sīsuú, na‘e hoko. Peá na teuteu ai ʻa e Pāsová.
Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó, naʻe aʻumai ʻa Si̇̄sū mo e toko hongofulu mā uá.

Pea lolotonga ʻenau maʻumeʻatokoni he tēpilé, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ‘e lavaki‘i au ‘e ha taha ʻiate kimoutolu ko ʻeni̇́; ʻIo, ʻe he toko taha ‘oku lolotonga kai fakataha mo au.”
Pea lotomamahi ai ʻa e kau akó, ‘o nau ʻeke tahataha kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko au ʻapē ia?”
Pea naʻe tali kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e toko taha ʻiate kimoutolu, ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá, ʻa ia ‘okú ne unu fakataha mo au ʻene konga maá, ki he ipú.

Ko hono moʻoni̇́, ko e mate ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ‘e hangē pē ko ia kuo tohi ʻo kau kiate iá. Ka ‘e malaʻia ʻa e tangata te ne lavaki‘i ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá! Na‘e mei sai ange kapau naʻe ʻikai ke fanau‘i ʻa e tangata ko iā.”

Pea lolotonga ʻenau kei ma‘u me‘atokoni̇́, naʻe to‘o ‘e Si̇̄sū ha fo‘i mā. Pea hili ʻene lotu fakafeta‘i̇́, naʻá ne pakipaki ia ‘o ne ‘oatu ki he‘ene kau akó. Pea naʻe toki folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou to‘o ʻeni ‘o kai. Ko hoku sinó eni.”
Pea to‘o foki ‘e Si̇̄sū mo ha ipu uaine, ‘o ne fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otuá, pea ne toki ‘oatu ki he‘ene kau akó ʻo nau inu kotoa pē mei ai.
Peá ne toki folofola kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko hoku totó eni, ko e toto ʻo e fuakavá, ʻa ia ʻoku lilingi ko e fetongi ʻo e tokolahi.
Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ‘e ‘ikai te u toe inu mei he fua ʻo e vainé, kae‘oua ke u toki inu ai ia kuo fo‘ou, ʻi he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
Pea hili ʻa e fai ha‘anau hiva, pea nau ō leva ki Moʻunga ‘Ōlivé.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ‟Te mou feholaki kotoa pē ‘o li‘aki au. He hangē ko e lau ʻa e Tohitapú, ‛Te u taa‘i ʻa e tauhi sipi̇́, pea ‘e movete ai ʻa e fanga sipi̇́.’
Ka ʻoka hili hono fokotu‘u au mei he maté, pea te u mu‘omu‘a ʻiate kimoutolu ki Kāleli.”
Pea lea ange ʻa Pita kiate ia, ‟Hei‘ilo ki he fa‘ahinga ko eé mo ha‘anau li̇̄ʻaki koe. Ka he‘ikai pē te u li̇ʻaki ‘e au koe.”
Pea tali ʻe Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, ‘e te‘eki ai ke ʻuʻua tuʻo ua ʻa e moá he poó ni, kuó ke ‘osi fakafisinga‘i tuʻo tolu au.”
Kae vilitaki atu pē ʻa Pita ʻene laú, ‟He‘ikai pē te u fakafisinga‘i ‘e au koe, neongo ʻe iku ki haʻaku mate fakataha ai mo koe!” Pea naʻe pehē mo e lau ʻa e toenga ko eé.
Pea nau ʻalu atu ki ha feituʻu naʻe ui ko Ketisemani, pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, ‟Mou nofo heni, ka u ʻalu ‘o fai ʻeku lotu.”
Pea ʻave ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa Pita, mo Sēmisi, mo Sione, ‘o nau ō. Pea kamata leva ke mamahi fuʻu mo hoha‘a hono lotó;
‘O ne pehēange kiate kinautolu, ‟‘Oku mātuʻaki mamahi hoku laumālié, ‘o hangē kaú ka maté. Mou nofo pē hena ‘o le‘o.”
Pea toe tahataha atu ʻa Si̇̄sū meiate kinautolu, ‘o ne tō fo‘ohifo ki he kelekelé, ʻo fai leva ʻene lotu, ‘o kole kapau muʻa ʻe lava, pea tuku ke fakalaka atu ʻiate ia ʻa e houa ʻo e mamahi̇́.
Pea na‘á naʻe pehē: ‟ʻApā Tamai ē, ‘okú ke malava ‘e koe ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē. Ke ke fakalaka atu mu‘a ʻa e ipú ni meiate au. Kaekehe, ‘oua na‘a fai hoku lotó, kae fai pē ho finangaló.”

Pea ʻi he foki atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki heʻene kau akó, kuo nau ʻosi mohe kinautolu. Pea naʻe pehēange kia Pita, ‟‘E Saimone, ‘okú ke mohe koā koe? Kuo ‘ikai koā te ke lava ke ‘ā mo au ʻi ha fo‘i houa pē ‘e taha?
Mou ‘ā pē ‘o lotu, ke ‘oua te mou mo‘ua ʻi ha ʻahi‘ahi. He ‘oku vēkeveke fai ʻa e laumālié, ka ‘oku vaivai fuʻu ʻa e kakanó.”
Pea toe ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o ne fai ʻa e lotu pē ko ē na‘á ne ʻuluaki fai̇́.
Pea ʻi heʻene toe foki mai ki he kau akó, tā kuo nau toe mohe pē kinautolu, he na‘á nau mate he fiemoheá. Pea na‘e ‘ikai ha‘anau tali ‘e fai kia Si̇̄sū.
