Pea toe foki mai ʻa Sīsu, ko hono tuʻo tolú ia, ‘o ne pehēange kiate kinautolu, ‟ʻOku mou kei mohe pē koā mo mālōlō! Tuku ai ā! He kuo hokomai ʻeni ʻa e taimi̇́, ke tuku atu ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ki he nima ʻo e kau angahalá.
Mou tuʻu ke tau ō! He ko eni, ko hoku lavaki̇́ ʻeni kuo a‘u mai!”

Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei lea ʻa Sīsuú, fakafokifā, kuo aʻumai ʻa Siutasi, ko e toko taha ʻi he toko hongofulu mā uá, pea mo ha kakai tokolahi ‘oku nau toʻo heletā mo e ʻakau, ko ʻenau omi mei he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́, mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, mo e kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú.
Pea kuo ‘osi fakahā ‘e Siutasi kiate kinautolu ha faka‘ilonga, he na‘á ne talaange, ‟Ko e toko taha ko ē te u ʻuma ki ai̇́, ko e tangatá ia. Mou puke ia ‘o taki fakamālohiʻi atu.”
Pea ʻalu atu leva ʻa Siutasi kia Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne fakalea ange, ‟Tangata‘eiki,” pea naʻe ʻuma lolomi kiate ia.
Pea nau ala fakamālohi kiate ia ʻo nau puke atu ia.
Pea toki hanga ‘e he toko taha he fa‘ahinga na‘e tutuʻu ai̇́ ‘o unuhi ʻene heletaá ‘o taa‘i ʻaki ʻa e tamaio‘eiki ʻa e Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́, ‘o motu ai hono telingá.
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu ʻo pehē: ‟Ko ho‘omou ō mai koā mo e heletā mo e ʻakaú ke puke ʻaki aú, he ko ha taki au ʻo ha kau angatuʻu?
Ko e ʻaho ki he ʻaho mo ʻeku nofo homou lotolotongá ʻo faiako he Temipalé, kae ‘ikai ke mou puke ai au. Ka naʻe fai eni̇́, ke fakamoʻoni ʻa e me‘a kuo tohi ʻi he Tohitapú.”
Pea toki li̇̄ʻaki ia ‘e he kau akó kātoa, ka nau feholaki.
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha talavou na‘e muimui atu ‘ia Si̇̄sū, kuo ʻikai te ne ʻai vala, ka na‘á ne huluhulu pē ha tupenu li̇̄neni. Pea nau feinga‘i ke puke ia;
Pea homo ai ʻa e tupenú kae lele telefua ai pē ia.
Pea na‘á nau taki atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́, pea na‘e kātoa mai ki ai ʻa e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́, mo e kau mātu‘a ʻo e lotú, mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé.
Pea na‘e muimui atu kiate ia ʻa Pita mei̇ he mama‘ó, ʻo ne hū atu ki he loto‘ā ‘o e Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́, ‘o nofo fakataha atu mo e kau kaʻaté, ‘o mūmū he afi̇́.

Pea feinga ‘e he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ mo e kau fakataha ʻo e Sanetalimi̇́ ke ma‘u ha ngaahi fakamo‘oni ke talatalaaki‘i ʻaki ʻa Si̇̄sū, kae lava ke nau tāmate‘i ia. Ka na‘e ‘ikai te nau ma‘u ha me‘a ‘e taha.
Na‘e ai ha tokolahi naʻa nau tuʻu ko e fakamo‘oni loi ʻo kau kia Si̇̄sū, ka na‘e fepakipaki ʻenau ngaahi fakamatalá.
Pea toki tuʻu hake ai mo ha ni‘ihi ‘o fai ʻa e fakamo‘oni loi ko ʻeni̇́ ʻo kau kia Si̇̄sū, ʻo nau pehē:

‟Na‘a mau fanongo ki heʻene pehē: ‘Te u hanga ‘o holoki ʻa e Temipale ko ʻeni naʻe ngaohi pē ʻe he tangatá, peá ka hili ha ʻaho ‘e tolu, te u toe langahake ha Temipale, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ngāue ʻa ha tangata!”
Ka na‘á mo ia, na‘e ‘ikai tatau ai ʻenau ngaahi fakamo‘oni̇́.

Pea toki tuʻu hake ʻa e Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́, ʻi honau lotolotongá, ‘o ne fehu‘i ange kia Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai koā ha‘o tali ki ho talatalaaki‘i kuo fai̇́? Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku lau ʻe he kau tangata ko eni̇́, ʻo kau kia koé?”
Ka naʻe fakalongolongo pē ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‘o ‘ikai ha‘ane tali. Pea toe fehu‘i ange ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́, ‟Ko e Mi̇̄saiá koā koe, ko e ʻAlo ‘o e ‘Otua Mohu-monūʻiá?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko au ia. Pea te mou mamata kotoa pē ki he Foha ʻo e Tangatá ‘okú ne nofo mei he nima to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua Māfimafi̇́, pea ʻokú ne haʻu mo e ngaahi ʻao ‘o e langi̇́.”
Pea toki hae ai ‘e he Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́ hono pulupulú, ‘o ne pehē ‘e ia, ‟Kaeʻumaʻaki ha‘atau toe kumi ha kau fakamo‘oni?
Ko ena kuo mou ‘osi fanongo tonu ki heʻene lea fie-‘Otuá! Ko e hā ha‘amou lau ki ai?” Pea nau loto taha kotoa pē, ke hilifaki kiate ia ʻa e tautea maté.

Pea kamata ʻanuhi ‘e ha ni‘ihi ʻa Si̇̄sū, pea nau fakapūlou‘i ia ʻo tuki pohu ia. Pea nau toki ʻeke ange, ‟Mate‘i mai pē kohai na‘á ne tuki koe!” Pea taki atu ia ‘e he kau ka‘até ‘o fepākaki hono matá.
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei tangutu ʻa Pita ʻi he lotoʻaá mo e ha‘u ha fefine ngāue ʻa e Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́.

Pea naʻe fakatokanga‘i atu ʻa Pita ‘oku fakamāfana mai he ve‘e afi̇́, pea naʻe sio ke fakapapauʻi ko ia, ʻo ne toki pehēange, ‟Na‘á ke kau foki mo koe he faʻa ʻalu holo mo e tangata Nāsaleti ko ená, ʻa Si̇̄sū!”
Kae talaange ‘e Pita, ‟‘Ikai ʻaupito! ʻOku ʻikai te u ʻilo pē mahino kiate au ʻa e meʻa ʻokú ke lau ki ai̇́!” Pea ʻalu ia ki he matapaá. Pea feʻunga tonu mo iá mo e ‘u‘ua ʻa e moá.
Pea toe fakatokanga‘i atu ia ‘e he kaunangá, pea naʻe kamata fakahā ange ki he kakai na‘a nau tuʻu holo ai̇́, ‟Ko e siana ko ʻeni̇́ naʻe faʻa kau mo kinautolu!”
Ka naʻe toe fakaʻikaiʻi pē ʻe Pita. Pea fuoloa si‘i pē mei ai, kuo toe pehēange ‘e he ni‘ihi naʻe tuʻu holo ai̇́ kia Pita, ‟Ko e mo‘oni, naʻá ke faʻa kau mo kinautolu, he ko e Kāleli foki mo koe!”
Pea toki kamata hikinima ʻa Pita mo fakapapau, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ʻaupito te u ‘ilo ‘e au ʻa e toko taha ko ena ‘oku mou lau ki ai̇́.”

Pea ʻiloangé, naʻe ‘u‘ua ʻa e moá, ko hono tuʻo uá ia. Pea toki manatu‘i ‘e Pita ʻa e folofola ange ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ai, ‟‘E te‘eki ke ‘u‘ua tuʻo ua ʻa e moá, kuo tuʻo tolu hoʻo fakafisingaʻi au.” Pea naʻe fifili ki ai ʻo ne toki tangi mamahi.

15.text: Pea ʻi he pongipongi haké, kuo fakataha mai ʻa e taula‘eiki lahi̇́ mo e kau mātu‘a ʻo e lotú, mo e kau Faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, pea mo e Fakamaauʻanga Lahi ʻa e kakai Siú, ‘o nau toki ha‘i ʻa Si̇̄sū, pea nau taki atu ia ʻo tuku kia Pailato.
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Pailato kia Si̇̄sū, ‟Ko e Tuʻi koā koe ‘o e kakai Siú?” Pea naʻe tali kiate ia, ‟Ko ia pē ‘okú ke me‘a mai ʻaki̇́.”
Pea toki talatalaakiʻi ‘e he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ ʻa Si̇̄sū he ngaahi me‘a lahi.
Pea toe fehu‘i ange ‘e Pailato, ‟‘Oku ‘ikai koā ha‘o tali? Fanongo hake ki he ngaahi me‘a mamafa ‘oku nau tukuaki‘i ki ai koé!”
Ka naʻe fakalongolongo pē ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ʻikai haʻane tali. Pea na‘e ʻohovale ʻaupito ai ʻa Pailato.
Pea ko eni, ko e anga maheni ‘o Pailató, ʻi he Kātoanga Pāsova kotoa pē, ʻokú ne vete ange ha pōpula ‘e loto ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́.
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata ko Palāpasa hono hingoá, naʻe lolotonga fakahū pili̇̄sone fakataha mo ha kau angatu‘u, he na‘á nau fai ha tāmate ʻi ha fu‘u moveuveu na‘e hoko.
Pea omi ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘o nau kole kia Pailato ke ne tukuange mai ha taha, ‘o hangē ko ia na‘á ne angamaheni‘aki̇́.
Pea ʻeke ange leva ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, ‟Ko homou lotó koā ke u tukuange atu ʻa e Tuʻi ‘o e kakai Siú?”
He na‘e ‘ilo ‘e Pailato, ko hono tuku mai ‘o Si̇̄sū kiate ia ‘e he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́, ko ʻenau meheka pē kiate ia.
Ka kuo ʻosi faka‘ai‘ai ‘e he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ ʻa e kakai̇́, ke nau kole ke tukuange mai ʻa Palāpasa.
Pea toe ʻeke ange ‘e Pailato ki he kakai̇́, ‟Ka ko e hā ʻa e me‘a te u fai ki he toko taha ‘oku mou ui ko e Tuʻi ‘o e kakai Siú?”
Pea nau kalanga, ‟Tutuki ia ki ha kolosi!”
Pea pehē atu ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu, ‟He ko e hā ha‘ane kovi kuo fai?” Ka naʻe ʻā‘āsili pē ʻenau kalangá, ‟Tutuki ia ki ha kolosi!”

Pea fakakaukau leva ʻa Pailató ke fai ki he loto ‘o e kakai̇́, ko ia, naʻá ne tukuange atu kiate kinautolu ʻa Palāpasa, ka naʻe tuku atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ke taaʻi ʻaki ʻa e loholoho faka-Lomá, peá ke nau toki tutuki ia ki ha kolosi.
Pea taki atu ‘e he kau sōtiá ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o fakahū ki he loto‘ā ‘o e palasi ‘o e kōvaná, pea nau fekau ʻa e kātoa ‘o e kau taú ke nau fakataha mai.
Pea nau toki fakatui ʻia Si̇̄sū ha fu‘u kofu lanu fisiʻifekika, pea nau fi̇̄ hano kalauni talatala ‘o ‘ai ki hono ʻulú.
Pea nau toki lea manuki kiate ia, ‟Ke lākoifie lelei ʻa e Tuʻi ‘o e kakai Siú!”
Pea nau toutou taaʻi ʻaki hono ʻulú ha fuʻu vaʻakau, mo ʻanuhi ia, ʻo nau toki tūʻulutui mo punou manuki kiate ia.
Pea hili ʻenau va‘inga ʻaki ʻa Sīsuú, naʻa nau hu‘i meiate ia ʻa e fuʻu teunga lanu fisiʻifekiká, ka nau taki atu leva ia ke tutuki ki he kolosi̇́.
Pea na‘a nau fetaulaki mo ha tangata, naʻe haʻu he halá, ko ʻene foki mei ʻuta, ko Saimone mei Sailiné, ko e tamai ʻa ʻAlekisānita mo Lūfusi̇́. Pea nau fekau kiate ia ke ne fua ʻa e kolosi ‘o Sīsuú.
Na‘e ‘ave ‘e he kau sōtiá ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he feitu‘u ko Kolokota (ʻa ia, ko hono ‘uhingá, ko e Feituʻu ʻo e ʻUlupoko).
Pea nau ‘oange ai kiate ia ha uaine kuo hū‘i ʻaki ha meʻa fakakona ke ne inu. Ka na‘e ʻikai te ne fieinu ia.
Pea nau toki tutuki ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kolosi̇́. Pea nau tālotalo ke vakaiʻi pē ko hai te ne ma‘u hono valá.
Pea ko e hiva pongipongi̇́ ia naʻa nau kalusefai ai iá.
Pea na‘e tohi ʻi ‘olunga ʻi he kolosi̇́, ʻa e ‘uhinga hono tauteá: ‟Ko e Tuʻi ‘o e Kakai Siú.”
Pea na‘e tutuki fakataha mo Si̇̄sū ha ongo tangata fai hia, ko e toko taha mei hono toʻomataʻú, mo e toko taha mei hono to‘ohemá.

Pea ko e kakai naʻe fou ange he feituʻu ko iā, naʻa nau manuki kia Si̇̄sū mo nau kalokalo honau ʻulú, pea nau toki pehēange kiate ia, ‟Uē! Ko koe koā na‘á ke lau ke holoki ʻa e Temipalé pea te ke toe langahake ia ʻi ha ʻaho ‘e tolu?
Fakahaofi koe! Hifo mai mei he kolosi̇́!”
Naʻe pehē pē foki mo e manuki ʻa e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́, mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, he naʻa nau pehē: ‟Na‘á ne fakamo‘ui ʻa e kakai kehé! Ka ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ke fakamo‘ui ‘e ia ia!

Lau ko e Mi̇̄saiá koe ko e Tuʻi ‘Isileli̇́, hifo mai angē mei he kolosi̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ka mau sio ki ai, pea te mau toki tui atu kiate koe!” Pea kau foki mo e ongo tangata naʻe kaungā kalusefai mo iā, ʻi he laukovi kiate iá.
Pea ʻi heʻene a‘u ki he ho‘atā mālié, naʻe fakapoʻuli kātoa ʻa e fonuá, ‘o a‘u ki he tolu efiafi̇́.
Pea ʻi heʻene aʻu ki he tolu efiafi̇́, naʻe kalanga le‘o lahi ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‟‘Iloi̇̄! ‘Iloi̇̄! Lama sapakatani̇̄?” ʻA ia ko hono ‘uhingá, ‟‘E hoku ‘Otua! ‘E hoku ‘Otua! Ko e hā kuó ke li‘aki ai aú?”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ʻa e ni‘ihi na‘e tutuʻu ai, naʻa nau pehē: ‟Fanongo atu! Ko ʻeni kuó ne ui kia ‘Ilaisiā!”

Pea lele leva ha taha mo ha konga vavae ‘o ne unu ki ha uaine mahi, pea naʻe toki hunuki ʻi ha mui‘i ʻakau, ‘o mono hake kia Si̇̄sū mo ne pehē: ‟Tau vakai angē pē ‘e ha‘u ʻa ‘Ilaisiā ‘o ‘ohifo ia mei he kolosi̇́!”
Pea toe kaila leʻo lahi ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne toki pekia.
Pea ʻi he taimi pē ko iā naʻe mahae ʻa e puipui ‘o e Temipalé, mei ‘olunga ‘o a‘u ki lalo.
Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa e senituliō na‘e tuʻu he ve‘e kolosi̇́, ki he anga ‘o e pekia ʻa Sīsuú, naʻá ne pehē: ‟Tā ko e mo‘oni! Ko e tangatá ni, ko e ʻAlo ia ʻo e ʻOtuá!”
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha kau fefine na‘a nau sio atu ki ai mei he mama‘ó. Naʻe kau ai ʻa Mele mei Makitala, mo Mele ko e fa‘ē ʻa Sēmisi Si‘i̇ mo Siosifa, mo Sālomé.

Ko e kau fefine kinautolu na‘á nau muimui kia Si̇̄sū ʻi Kāleli ke tokoni ki heʻene ngaahi fiemaʻú. Na‘e ai foki mo ha kau fefine tokolahi na‘e kaungā fononga mai mo ia ki Selusalema, naʻa nau tutuʻu ai.
Pea ko e ʻaho Tokonaki ia ʻo e kau Siú, ʻa e ʻaho kimuʻa he Sāpaté, ko ia ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó;

Naʻe fakato‘oto‘a ʻa e tangata ko Siosifa mei ‘Alemateá ʻo ʻalu atu kia Pailato ‘o kole ange, ke ne tuku mai ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú. Ko e tangata faka‘apa‘apa‘ia ia, pea naʻá ne kau he Fakamaauʻanga Lahi ʻa e kakai Siú, pea kuó ne nofo ʻamanaki ki he hoko mai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.
Pea naʻe ʻohovale ʻa Pailato heʻene fanongo kuo ʻosi pekia iá, ko ia naʻá ne fekau ha ‘ōfisa ke ʻalu ‘o vakai pē kuo fuoloa ʻa e pekia ʻa Sīsuú.
Pea ʻi heʻene fanongo ki he fakamatala naʻe haʻu mo e ‘ōfisá, naʻá ne talaange kia Siosifa, ke ne ‘ave ā ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú.

Ko ia, na‘e fakatau ‘e Siosifa ha tupenu li̇̄neni mahuʻinga, pea naʻe toki ‘ohifo ʻa e sino ‘o Si̇̄suú mei he kolosi̇́ ‘o kofuʻaki ʻa e tupenu li̇̄není pea naʻe toki telio ia ki ha fonualoto naʻe ‘osi keli ʻi ha makatu‘u, pea naʻe tekaʻi mai ha fuʻu maka lahi ʻo tāpuniʻaki ʻa e matapā ʻo e fonualotó.
Pea na‘e mamata ki ai ʻa Mele Makitaline mo Mele ko e fa‘ē ʻa Siosifá, ki he me‘a naʻe fai ʻe Siosifa, ‘o na ‘ilo ki he feitu‘u na‘e telio ai ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú.

16.text: Pea ʻi he hili ʻa e Sāpaté, naʻe ō atu leva ʻa Mele Makitaline, mo Mele faʻē ʻa Sēmisi̇́, mo Sālome, ‘o fakatau mai ha ngaahi lolo fakanamulelei kehekehe, ke nau ʻave ‘o tākai ʻaki ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú.
Pea kei hengihengi ʻaupito ʻi he ʻuluaki ʻaho ‘o e uiké, naʻa nau uhu atu ki he fonualotó, kuo hopo hake ʻa e laʻaá.
Pea nau fepehēʻaki, ‟Ko hai nai te ne teka‘i ʻa e maka tāpuni̇́?”
Ka ʻi heʻenau hanga atu ki ai̇́, naʻa nau fakatokangaʻi tā kuo ‘osi teka‘i ʻa e maka tāpuni̇́ ia, he ko e fu‘u maka lahi ʻaupito.
Pea ʻi he hūatu ʻa e kau fefiné ki he fonualotó, naʻa nau mamata ai ki ha talavou, ʻoku tangutu ʻi he tafaʻaki toʻomataʻú, kuó ne tui ha kofu hinehina tōtōlofa. Pea kamata leva ke nau manavahē.

Ka naʻe lea mai ʻa e talavoú ki he kau fefiné, ‟‘Oua te mou manavahē! Ko ho‘omou omi̇́ ke kumi kia Si̇̄sū mei Nāsaleti̇́, ʻa ē na‘e tutuki ki he kolosi̇́, ‘oku ‘ikai ke ʻi heni ia, he kuó ne toetuʻu. Sio mai! Ko e feituʻu ē na‘e fakatokoto ai hono sinó.
Ka mou ō leva ‘o tala ki heʻene kau akó, pea kia Pita foki, ‛kuó ne ʻosi mu‘omu‘a atu ia ʻiate kinautolu ki Kāleli. Pea te nau toki sio ai kiate ia, ‘o hangē pē ko e me‘a na‘á ne folofolaʻaki atú.’ ”

Pea hola fakavave atu leva ʻa e kau fefiné mei he fonualotó, he kuo nau tetetete heʻenau fuʻu ʻohovalé. Pea na‘e ‘ikai te nau toe talanoa ki ha taha ʻa e me‘a kuo hokó, he ko e mo‘oni̇́ na‘á nau manavahē ʻaupito.
Pea hili ʻa e toetu‘u ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he maté, ʻi he hengihengi ‘o e ʻuluaki ʻaho ‘o e uiké, na‘á ne fuofua hā kia Mele Makitaline, ʻa ē na‘á ne kapusi mei ai ʻa e fanga tēvolo ‘e toko fitu.
Pea ʻalu leva ʻa Mele Makitaline ‘o fakahā ki he fa‘ahinga na‘e kau mo Sisu, ʻa ia naʻa nau lolotonga tangi mo tēngihia;
Pea ʻi heʻenau fanongo ki he‘ene pehē: Kuo toe mo‘ui ʻa Sīsuú, pea kuó ne mamata ki ai̇́, naʻe faingataʻa ke nau tui ki ai.
Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, pea toe hā ʻa Si̇̄sū, kuo fōtunga kehe ia, ki he tokoua ʻo ʻene kau akó naʻá na lolotonga fononga atu ki ʻuta.
Pea naʻe foki hake ʻa e toko ua ko iā ‘o fakahā ki he kau ako ko ē, ka na‘e ‘ikai pē foki te nau tui kiate kinaua.

Pea toki hā fakamuimui taha ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kau ako ‘e toko hongofulu mā tahá, lolotonga naʻe fai ʻenau ma‘u me‘atokoni. Pea na‘á ne valoki‘i kinautolu koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻenau ta‘e tuí mo ʻenau ta‘efiefalala ki he lau ʻa e fa‘ahinga na‘e siotonu kiate ia kuó ne toetuʻú.
Pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu, ‟Mou ō ‘o malanga ʻaki ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei̇́ ki he meʻafakatupu kotoa pē.
‘Ilonga ha taha ‘e tui̇́, pea papitaisó, ‘e fakamo‘ui ia. Peá ka ‘ilonga ha taha ‘e ‘ikai tui̇́, ‘e fakamalaʻiaʻi ia.
Pea ko e ngaahi me‘a fakaofo ʻeni kakai ‘e hoko kiate kinautolu ʻe tui kiate aú. Te nau kapusi tēvolo ʻaki hoku hingoá. Te nau lea ʻaki foki ha ngaahi lea kehekehe.
Pea kapau te nau ala ki ha ngata, pē inu ha me‘akona, ‘e ‘ikai te nau mate ai. Te nau hilifaki honau nimá ki ha kau mahaki, pea ‘e mo‘ui leva ʻa e kakai ko iā.”
Pea hili ʻa e folofola ʻaki ‘e he ʻEiki ko Si̇̄suú ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko iā kiate kinautolú, na‘e ‘ohake ia ki he langi̇́ ‘o ne ʻafio mei he nima to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otuá.
Ka na‘e ō atu ʻa e kau akó ‘o malanga ʻi he feitu‘u kotoa pē. Pea na‘e kaungāngāue fakataha mo kinautolu ʻa e ʻEiki̇́, ‘o naʻe fakamo‘oni‘i ʻenau malangá ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi mana na‘e hoko.

1.text: Kuo feinga ‘e ha tokolahi ke fa‘u ha fakamatala hokohoko ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kuo fakakakato ‘e he ʻOtuá, ʻi hotau lotolotongá.

ʻA ia foki naʻa nau hikitohi ʻo tuku mai kiate kitautolu, talu mei he kamataʻangá, ʻa e ngaahi fakamatala ʻa ha ni‘ihi naʻa nau mamata tonu he ngaahi meʻa na‘e hokó, ʻa ia naʻa nau hoko ko e kau faifekau ʻo e kōsipeli.
Ko ia ai, ʻeiki maʻulakanga Tiofilusi, naʻá ku fakatotolo tokanga ʻe au foki ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē, mei hono kamataʻangá, ke hokohoko lelei, ʻou hikotohi ia maʻau.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ke meʻa‘i kakato, ʻa e mo‘oni ʻo e ngaahi akonaki kotoa pē kuó ke ʻosi fanongo ai̇́.

ʻI he kuonga naʻe kei Tuʻi ai ʻa Hēlota ʻi Siuteá, na‘e ʻi ai ha faifekau ʻi he haʻa ʻĀpaiá, ʻa ia ko Sākalaiá hono hingoá. Pea ko hono mali̇́, ko ʻIlisapesi, ko e fefine mo ia foki mei̇́ he matakali ʻo ʻĒloné.
Ko e ongo mātúʻa lotumoʻoni kinaua ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, he naʻá na mātuʻaki tauhi ʻo haohaoa, ʻa e kotoa ʻo e ngaahi tuʻutuʻuni mo e ngaahi fekau ʻa e ʻEiki̇́.
Ka na‘e ʻikai ke na fanau, he na‘e paʻa ʻa ʻIlisapesi, pea kuo na fakatou motuʻa.
Pea ko e ʻaho ‘e taha, lolotonga naʻe fai ʻe Sākalaiá ʻene ngāue fakafaifekaú, he naʻe hokosia hono taimi ke faifatongia ai̇́.
He na‘e fai ʻa e founga maheni ʻo e ngāue fakafaifekaú, ko ʻenau toho ke vakaiʻi pē ko hai ‘e hū ki he loto Temipalé ʻo tutu ʻa e ʻinisēnisi̇́, pea naʻe ma‘u ‘e Sākalaiá.
Ko ia, naʻe lotu pē ʻa e kakai kotoa ʻi tuʻa, ʻi he taimi naʻe fai ai ʻa e tutu ʻinisēnisi̇́.
Pea fakafokifā naʻe hā mai kiate ia ha ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ he tafatafa ʻaki to‘omata‘u ʻo e ʻōlita tutu‘anga ʻinisēnisi̇́.
Pea ʻi he mamata ki ai ʻa Sākalaiá, naʻe kamata ke ne mātuʻaki ilifia ʻaupito.
Pea pehēmai ‘e he ʻāngeló kia Sākalaiá,: ‟‘E Sākalaiá, ʻoua te ke manavahē, he kuo ongoʻi ʻe he ʻOtuá ho‘o ngaahi kolé. Ko ia, ʻe fā‘ele‘i ‘e ʻIlisapesi ha tamasi‘i, pea te ke fakahingoa ia ko Sione.
Pea ʻe hoko ia ko ho fiefiaʻanga mo ho pōlepoleʻanga, pea ‘e fiefia lahi ai foki mo ha tokolahi ʻi hono fanauʻi̇́.

He ʻe hoko ho fohá ko ha tangata mahuʻinga ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻEiki̇́. Pea he‘ikai te ne inu uaine, pē inu kava mālohi, ka te ne fonu he ivi ʻo e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ʻo kamata pē mei heʻene kei ʻi he manava ʻo ʻene fa‘eé.
Peá te ne hanga ʻo fakatafoki mai ha kakai ʻIsileli tokolahi ki he ʻEiki ko honau ʻOtuá.

He te ne muʻomuʻa ʻi he ʻEiki̇́, ʻi he laumālie mo e mālohi na‘e ‘ia ʻIlaisiaá, ke ne fakatafoki ʻa e loto ʻo e mātuʻá ki he‘enau fānaú, pea mo e kakai ʻoku talangataʻa ki he ʻOtuá, ki he fakapotopoto ʻo e māʻoniʻoni̇́, ke teuteu‘i ai ha kakai maʻae ʻEiki̇́.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Sākalaiá ki he ʻāngeló: ‟Te u ʻilo fēfē ‘e malava ke hoko ʻa e meʻa kuó ke fakahā mai? He kuo u motuʻa au pea kuo taʻu motuʻa foki mo hoku hoá.”
Pea tali ‘e he ʻāngeló, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko Kēpaleli au, pea ʻoku ou tuʻu ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá, pea na‘e fekau mai aú, ke u ha‘u ʻo fakahā atu kiate koe, ʻa e ongoongo lelei ko eni̇́.
Ka ko eni, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ʻikai te ke tui ki heʻeku ngaahi leá, ko ia ai, te ke noa, ʻo aʻu ki he taimi ʻe toki fakakakato ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo u fakahā atú.”
Pea ko e talu ʻa e hū ʻa Sākalaiá ki he loto Temipalé mo e fakatatali ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́ mei tuʻa. Pea naʻá nau fifili pe ko e hā ʻokú ne fuoloa mai ai̇́.

Pea faifai̇́ pea hū mai ʻa Sākalaiá ki tuʻa, pea naʻe ʻikai ke ne lava ʻo lea, ka naʻe tuhutuhu ange pē kiate kinautolu. Pea mahino leva kiate kinautolu kuo mata vi̇̄sone ʻa Sākalaiá ʻi he loto Temipalé, he naʻe ʻikai te ne toe lava ke lea.
Pea ʻi he kakato ʻa e taimi fai fatongia ʻo Sākalaiá he Temipalé, naʻá ne foki leva ki hono ‘api̇́.
Pea fuoloa si‘i pē mei ai, kuo feitama ʻa ʻIlisapesi ko hono uaifi̇́. Pea ʻosi ha māhina ‘e nima mo ʻene nofomaʻu pē ʻi honau ʻapi, he naʻá ne pehē:
‟Kuo fai mai ‘e he ʻEiki̇́, ʻa e meʻá ni kiate au, he ʻi he taimi ni̇́, kuó ne fakahā ʻene ʻofá, ʻaki ʻene toʻo hoku māʻangá, ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kakai kotoa pē.”
Pea ʻi he ʻosi ha māhina ‘e ono mei ai, pea fekau atu ‘e he ʻOtuá ʻa Kēpaleli, ki ha kolo ko Nāsaleti, ʻi Kāleli̇́;
Ki ha finemui ko Mele hono hingoá, ʻa ia naʻe fakama‘u mo ha tangata naʻe hingoa ko Siosifa, ko e tangata ia mei he hako ʻo Tēvitá.
Pea ʻalu atu ʻa e ʻāngeló kia Mele, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Mālō e lelei, ʻa koe kuo toka mai ki ai ʻa e ʻaloʻofá! ʻOku kau mo koe ʻa e ʻEiki̇́!”
Ka na‘e fihitu‘u ʻa e fakakaukau ʻa Melé, he lea naʻe fai mai kiate iá, ʻo ne fifili pe ko e hā nai hono ʻuhinga ʻo e fakalea ʻa e ʻāngeló.
Pea pehēange ‘e he ʻāngeló kiate ia: ‟Mele, ʻoua te ke manavahē! He kuó ke maʻu kelesi ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea ko eni, te ke feitama ʻo ke fanauʻi ha tamasi‘i, pea te ke fakahingoa ia ko Si̇̄sū.
ʻE hoko ia ko e tangata lahi, pea ʻe ui ia ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtua ʻo Langi̇́, pea ʻe fakanofo ia ʻe he ʻEiki ʻOtuá, ki he taloni ʻo ʻene kui ko Tēvita.
Peá te ne pule ki he hako ʻo Sēkopé ʻo ta‘engata. Pea ko hono pule‘angá he‘ikai hano ngata‘anga.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Mele ki he ʻāngeló: ‟‘E lava fēfē ke hoko ʻa e meʻa ni, he kuo te‘eki te u feohi fakamali mo ha tangata?”

Pea tali ‘e he ʻāngeló, ʻo ne pehē kiate ia: ‟‘E hā‘ele hifo ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́ ʻo nofoʻia koe, pea ko e māfimafi ʻo Langi̇́ te ne fakamalumalu kiate koe, ko ia, ‘e ui ai ʻa e tama māʻoniʻoni te ke fanauʻi̇́, ko e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea ko ʻeni foki, ʻoku ʻamanaki ke fanauʻi ha tama ʻe ʻIlisapesi, ko ho kāingá, neongo kuó ne ta‘u motuʻa. ʻIo, ko hono ono māhina ʻeni ʻo ia ko ē, naʻe ʻikai toe ʻamanaki ha taha te ne maʻu fānaú.
He ʻoku ʻikai ha meʻa ‘e faingataʻa ki he ʻOtuá.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Mele ki he ʻāngeló: ‟Ko eni, ko e kaunanga au ʻa e ʻEiki̇́: Tuku muʻa ke hokomai kiate au ʻo hangē tofu pē ko e lea kuó ke fai mai̇́.” Pea toki mavahe atu leva ʻa e ʻāngeló meiate ia.
Pea tuʻu hake ʻa Mele, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iā, ʻo ʻalu fakavave atu ki ha kolo he feitu‘u mo‘unga ʻo Siuteá.
Pea naʻe aʻu atu ki he ʻapi ʻo Sākalaiá, ʻo ne fakafe‘iloaki atu kia ʻIlisapesi.
Pea ʻiloangē, ʻi he ongo atu leva kia ʻIlisapesi ʻa e fakalea ʻa Melé, kuo hopohopo ʻene tamá ʻi hono manavá, pea hifo mai ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́ ʻo nofoʻia ʻa ʻIlisapesi.
Pea naʻe kalanga le‘olahi, ʻo pehē: ‟Kuo tāpuaki‘i koe ‘e he ʻOtuá ʻo laka hake ʻi ha toe fefine! Pea kuó ne tāpuaki‘i mo e tama ʻi ho manavá.
Pea ko e hā kuo hoko ai kiate au ʻa e meʻa ni, ke ʻaʻahi mai kiate au ʻa e fa‘ē ʻa hoku ʻEiki̇́?
He ko eni, ʻi he ongo mai pē kiate au ho‘o fakaleá, kuo hopohopo fiefia ʻeku tamá, ʻi hoku manavá.
Pea ʻoku monūʻia ʻa e faʻahinga hangē ko koé, ʻa ē ʻoku tui pi̇̄kitai, ʻe fakakakato ʻe he ʻEiki̇́, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó ne folofola ʻaki mai̇́.”
Pea pehē ‘e Mele: ‟ʻOku fakahi̇̄kihikiʻi ʻe hoku laumālié ʻa e ʻEiki̇́,
Pea ʻoku mātuʻaki fiefia ʻeku mo‘ui̇́, ʻo makatuʻunga ʻi he ʻOtuá,
He kuo toka‘i ‘e he ʻEiki̇́,
He kuo fai ‘e he Māfimafi̇́,
Pea ʻokú ne fai manava‘ofa ma‘u ai pē,
Kuo fai meʻa lalahi ‘e he ʻEiki̇́,
Mo naʻe haʻaki hifo ʻa e kau taki̇́,
ʻOku foaki ʻo lahi ʻaupito ‘e he ʻEiki̇́ ki he kau fiekaiá
ʻOku tokoni‘i ‘e he ʻEiki̇́ ʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́, ʻa ʻIsileli.
He ko e palōmesi ia naʻá ne fai ki hotau tupu‘angá,
Pea na‘e nofo ai pē ʻa Mele mo ʻIlisapesi ʻi ha māhina ‘e tolu nai, pea naʻe toki foki ki hono ‘api̇́.
Pea faifai pea hokosia ʻa e taimi ke fā‘ele ai ʻa ʻIlisapesi, pea naʻe fanauʻi ha tamasi‘i tangata.
Pea fanongo ai hono kaungā‘api mo hono kāingá, ki he ʻaloʻofa lahi kuo fai kiate ia ʻe he ʻEiki̇́, pea nau fiefia ai pē mo kinautolu foki.
Pea naʻe pehē: ʻi he hili ha ʻaho ‘e valu mei ai, naʻa nau ʻomi ke fai ʻa e ouau fakakau ʻo e tamasiʻi̇́ ki he kakai ʻa e ʻEiki̇́, pea naʻa nau ‘ai ke fakahingoa ia ki heʻene tamai̇́, kia Sākalaiá,
Ka naʻe pehēange ‘e ʻIlisapesi: ‟‘ʻIkai! Ka ʻe fakahingoa ia ko Sione!”
Pea nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Ka ʻoku te‘eki ai ha mou kāinga ‘e fakahingoa ko Sione!”
Pea nau tuhu ange kia Sākalaiá pē ko e fē ʻa e hingoa te ne loto ke ‘ai ki hono fohá.
Pea fekau leva ‘e Sākalaiá ke ʻomai ha meʻa ke ne tohi ai, pea naʻa nau ʻohovale kotoa pē, heʻene tohi ai, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko hono hingoá ko Sione.”
Pea fakafokifā pē kuo veteange hono ʻeleló, pea naʻe fai ʻene fakamālō ki he ʻOtuá.
Pea na‘e hoko ha manavahē lahi ki honau ngaahi kaungā‘api̇́, pea na‘e ʻosi kotoa ʻa e feitu‘u mo‘unga ʻo Siuteá hono fai holo ai ʻa e talanoa ki he ngaahi meʻa na‘e hokó.
Pea ko e faʻahinga kotoa pē na‘e fanongo ai̇́, naʻá nau fifili loto pē ʻo pehē: ‟Peá ka lahi hake ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́ ni, ‘e hoko ia ko e hā?” He naʻe mahino kiate kinautolu ʻoku kau mo ia ʻa e ʻEiki̇́.
Pea naʻe fakafonu ʻe he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́ ʻa Sākalaiá, pea naʻá ne palōfisai ʻo pehē:
‟Ke mālōʻia ai pē ʻa e ʻEiki̇́, ko e ʻOtua ʻo ʻIsileli̇́,
ʻIo, kuo fakanofo ‘e hotau ʻOtuá
ʻO hangē tofu pē ko e meʻa naʻe talaʻofaʻaki mai ‘e he ʻEiki̇́ ʻi he kuonga muʻá,
Te naʻe fakamoʻui kitautolu mei hotau ngaahi fili̇́,
Ke ne ʻaloʻofa ki heʻetau ngaahi kui̇́,
ʻA e fuakava naʻá ne fakapapauʻi ange ki hotau tupu‘angá,
Te naʻe fakahaofi kitautolu mei̇́ he nima ʻo hotau ngaahi fili̇́,
ʻO fai ʻi he haohaoa mo e māʻoniʻoni,
Pea ko koe, si‘oku foha,
ʻAki hoʻo foaki ange ki hono kakai̇́,
Ko e meʻa ʻi he fonu ʻalo‘ofa ʻa hotau ʻOtuá,
Ke māamangia ai ʻakitautolu ʻoku nofo he poʻuli̇́,
Pea na‘e tupu fakautuutu ʻa e mo‘ui fakalaumālie ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́, pea naʻá ne nofo ʻi toafa ʻo aʻu ai pē ki he ʻaho naʻá ne toki hopo hake ai ʻi ʻIsileli̇́, ʻo kamata ke fai ʻene ngāué.

2.text: Pea naʻe hoko ʻi he kuonga ko iā, ha tuʻutuʻuni fakapuleʻanga ʻa Sisa ʻAkosito, ke fai ha tohi kakai, peá ke kau ki ai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ʻo māmani.
Ko e fuofua tohi kakai ia naʻe fakahoko, lolotonga ʻoku kei Kōvana ʻa Kilinio ʻi Si̇̄liá.
Ko ia, na‘e takitaha foki ʻa e tangata mo e fefine ki hono kolo tupu‘anga ʻo tohi kakai ai.
Pea ʻalu hake ai foki ʻa Siosifa mei Nāsaleti ʻi Kāleli̇́, ki Pētelihema ʻi Siuteá, ʻa e kolo tupu‘anga ʻo Tēvitá, he ko Siosifá, naʻá ne kau ki he hako ʻo Tēvitá.
Pea naʻe fononga ʻa Siosifa mo Mele, ke na tohi kakai ai, he naʻe ʻosi fakapapauʻi ʻena mali̇́, pea kuo feitama ia.
Pea lolotonga ʻena kei ʻi ai̇́, kuo hokosia ʻa e taimi fā‘ele ʻo Melé;

Pea naʻe fā‘ele‘i ha tamasi‘i tangata, ko e ʻuluaki tama ia hono manavá, pea fakakofu ‘e Mele ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́, ʻo ne fakatokoto ia ʻi he ʻaiʻangakai ʻo e fanga manú, he naʻe ʻikai maʻu ha feituʻu ke nau nofo ai, ʻi ha fale talitaliʻanga kakai.
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha kau tauhisipi naʻa nau le‘ohi ʻenau fanga sipi̇́ ʻi he ngaahi feituʻu ‘uta ʻo Pētelihemá, ʻi he pō ko iā.
Pea fakafokifā naʻe tu‘u mai ha ʻāngelo mei he ʻEiki̇́ kiate kinautolu, pea na‘e malama atu kiate kinautolu ʻa e lāngilangi ʻo e ʻEiki̇́, pea naʻe manavahē lahi ʻaupito ai ʻa e kau tauhisipi̇́,
Ka naʻe pehēange leva ‘e he ʻāngeló kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oua te mou manavahē! He ko eni, ko ʻeku ha‘ú, ke fakahā atu ha ongoongolelei, ko e ongoongo ‘e fiefia ai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.
He na‘e ʻaloʻi he ʻahó ni ʻi he kolo ʻo Tēvitá ʻa homou Fakamo‘ui̇́, ʻa ia ko e Mi̇̄saia ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ ia.
Pea ko e faka‘ilonga ʻeni kiate kimoutolu, ʻoka mou ka ʻilo ia: Kuo kofukofu‘i ia ʻaki ha ngaahi motuʻi kofu, pea ‘okú naʻe tokoto he ʻaiʻangakai ʻo e fanga manú.”
Pea fakafokifā naʻe tutu‘u mai ha kau ʻāngelo tokolahi mei langi ʻo kau fakataha he fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otuá, ʻo nau pehē:
‟Ko e lāngilangi̇́, ke ʻo e ‘Otuá ʻo Langi Taupotú ia!

Pea ʻi he foki hake ʻa e kau ʻāngeló, meiate kinautolu ki he langi̇́, naʻe fepehēʻaki ‘e he kau tauhisipi̇́: ‟Tau ō ā ki Pētelihema ke tau mamata he meʻa kuo hokó, ʻa ʻeni kuo fakahā mai kiate kitautolu ‘e he ʻEiki̇́.”
Pea naʻa nau fakato‘oto‘o atu, ʻo nau ʻilo fakatouʻosi ʻa Mele mo Siosifa, pea mo e tamasiʻi̇ valevalé, ʻokú ne tokoto ʻi he ʻaiʻangakai ʻo e fanga manú.
Pea ʻi he mamata leva ʻa e kau tauhisipi̇́ kia Sīsuú, naʻa nau talanoa ange ki heʻene ongo mātuá ʻa e lau ʻa e kau ʻāngeló ʻo kau ki he tamasiʻi̇́ ni.
Pea naʻe ofo ʻaupito ʻa e kakai kotoa pē naʻa nau fanongo ki he talanoa ʻa e kau tauhisipi̇́ kiate kinautolu.
Ka na‘e tānaki pē ʻe Mele ʻa e ‘ū meʻa kotoa ko ʻeni kuo hokó, ʻo ne fifili ki ai ʻi hono lotó.

Pea foki atu leva ʻa e kau tauhisipi̇́ ‘oku nau fakahi̇̄kihikiʻi mo fakamālōʻia ʻa e ‘Otuá, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ngaahi meʻa kotoa naʻa nau mamata mo fanongo ki ai̇́, he na‘e hoko ʻo hangē tofu pē ko e meʻa naʻe lau ‘e he ʻāngeló.

Pea hili ha ʻaho ‘e valu mei ai, pea fai leva ‘e Mele mo Siosifa kia Sīsū, ʻa e ouau faka-Siu, ko hono kaukauʻi ʻo e tamaiki tangatá, peá na fakahingoa ia ko Sīsū, ʻo hangē ko e tu‘utu‘uni ʻa e ʻāngeló kia Melé, ʻi heʻene fakahā ange ‘e feitamá.

Pea faifai pea aʻu ki he taimi na‘e kakato ai ʻa e ouau ‘oku tuʻutuʻuni ‘e he Lao ʻa Mōsesé ke fakamaʻaʻaki ha fefine, ‘oka hili ha‘ane fā‘ele, pea ‘ave ‘e Siosifa mo Mele ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Selusalema ki he Temipalé ʻo fakatāpui ia ai maʻa e ʻEiki̇́;
Ko ʻena talangofua ia ki he tuʻutuʻuni ʻi he Lao ʻa e ʻEiki̇́‘oku pehē: ‟Ko e ʻinasi ʻo e ʻEiki̇́ ʻa e ʻuluaki tama tangata kotoa pē.”
Pea naʻe fai ʻa e feilaulaú ʻo hangē ko ia ʻoku tuʻutuʻuni he Lao ʻa e ʻEiki̇́, ke fai ‘e he ongo mātuʻá, ʻa ia ko ha ongo fo‘i lupe pē ko ha ongo fo‘i kulukulu mui ʻe ua.

Pea ko eni, naʻe nofo ʻi Selusalema ha tangata‘eiki ko Simione hono hingoá, ʻa ia ko e tangata‘eiki faitotonu mo ‘ofa mo‘oni ki he ‘Otuá. Pea na‘e kau ia ki he faʻahinga na‘e ʻamanaki kuo toe si‘i pea fakamoʻui ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa ‘Isileli̇́. Pea naʻe nofoʻia ia ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoni̇́;
Pea kuo fakahā ange kiate ia ʻe he Laumālie Māʻoniʻoni̇́, ʻe ʻikai te ne mate kae‘oua kuó ne mamata ki he Mi̇̄saia ʻa e ʻEiki̇́.

Pea ʻi hono tataki ia ʻe he Laumālié, naʻá ne ʻalu atu ki he Temipalé, lolotonga ia mo hono ʻomi ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻe he ongo mātuʻá ke fakahoko kiate ia ʻa e tu‘utu‘uni ʻa e Laó, ki he fānau toki fā‘ele‘i̇́.
Pea toʻo ‘e Simione ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne fua hake mo ne fakamālōʻia ʻa e ‘Otuá, ʻo ne pehē:
‟To‘o atu ā he taimi ni, ʻEiki,
He ko ʻeni kuo mamata tonu hoku matá ni
ʻA ia foki kuó ke tokonaki ke mamata ki ai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.
Ko e māama‘anga ia te ne fakahinohino ʻa e pule‘anga kotoa pē.
Pea na‘e ‘ohovale ‘aupito ʻa e ongo mātuʻa ʻa Sīsuú, he ngaahi meʻa na‘e lea ʻaki ‘e Simioné, ʻo kau ki he tamasiʻi̇́.
Pea toki tāpuaki‘i ‘e Simione ʻa Siosifa mo Mele, ʻo ne pehēange kia Mele:
Pea ko koe foki,

Pea na‘e nofo foki ʻi he Temipalé mo ha palōfita fefine, ko ʻAna, ko e ‘ōfefine ia ʻo Fānueli, mei he haʻa ʻĀseli; pea kuo taʻu motuʻa ia. Naʻá ne mali ‘oku kei finemui, ʻo ne nofo mo hono mali̇́ ʻi ha ta‘u ‘e fitu pea toki mālōlō hono husepāniti̇́.
Pea kuó ne nofo fakauitou ai pē ʻo aʻu mai ʻeni ki hono ta‘u valu ngofulu mā fā. Pea ko e ʻaho mo e pō, mo ʻene nofo ai pē ki he ‘Otuá he Temipalé, ʻo lotu mo ‘aukai.

Pea tu‘u mai leva ʻa ʻAna, ʻi he taimi ko iā, ʻo fai ʻene fakamālō ki he ‘Otuá, pea naʻe lea ʻo kau ki he tamasi‘i̇́, ki he kakai kotoa naʻa nau nofo ʻo ʻamanaki ki hono fakatau‘atāina‘i ʻo Selusalemá.
Pea hili hono fakahoko ‘e Siosifa mo Mele ʻa e ngaahi ouau kotoa naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he Laó, naʻá na foki leva ki Kāleli̇́, ki honau ʻapi̇́ ʻi Nāsaleti.
Pea naʻe fakautuutu ʻa e tupu ʻa e tamasiʻi̇́ ʻi he ivi, pea naʻe fakafonuʻaki ia ʻa e potó, pea nofoʻia foki ia ʻe he ʻofa ʻa e ʻOtuá.
Pea na‘e ō ʻa e ongo mātuʻa ʻa Si̇̄suú ki Selusalema ʻi he ta‘u kotoa, ʻo kau ki he kātoanga Pāsová.
Pea ʻi he hoko ʻa e ta‘u hongofulumāua ʻo Sīsuú, naʻa nau ō hake mo ia, ʻo hangē ko e tuʻutuʻuni ʻo e kātoanga ko iā.
Pea ʻi he hili ʻa e kātoangá, pea kuo fononga atu ʻa e ongo matuʻa ʻa Sīsuú, ke foki ki ʻapi, kae ʻikai ke na fakatokanga‘i naʻe kei nofo pē ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi Selusalema.
Ka naʻá na fakakaukau pē ‘oku ha‘u fakataha ia mo honau ngaahi kaungāfonongá. Pea hili ha ʻaho kakato ‘e taha peá na toki kamata ke kumi holo ia ʻi honau ngaahi kāingá mo honau kaungāfononga.
Pea ʻi heʻena fiu kumi iá, naʻá na toe foki ki Selusalema ʻo kumi holo ia ai.
Pea hili ha ʻaho ‘e tolu, naʻá na toki ma‘u atu ia, ʻi he Temipalé, ‘okú naʻe ʻi he lotolotonga ʻo e kau faiako Laó, ʻo fakafanongo mo ʻekeʻeke kiate kinautolu ha ngaahi meʻa.
Pea ko kinautolu kotoa naʻe fanongo kiate iá, naʻa nau ofo kotoa pē he lahi ʻene ʻiló, pea mo e anga ʻo ʻene tali fehu‘i̇́.

Ka ʻi he mamata kiate ia ʻene ongo mātuʻá, na‘e ‘osi ʻena tumú ‘iate ia. Pea lea ange ʻene fa‘eé: ‟Tamasi‘i, Ko e hā kuó ke pehe‘i ai kimauá? Ko au mo hoʻo tangataʻeiki̇́, kuo hohaʻa lahi homa lotó, heʻema kumi holo koé!”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua: ‟Ko e hā naʻá mo kumi ai aú? Na‘e ʻikai koā te mo ʻilo kuo pau ke u ʻi he fale ʻo ʻeku Tamai̇́?”
Ka na‘e ʻikai ke mahino kiate kinaua ʻene laú.
Ko ia, na‘e foki ai pē ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene ongo mātuʻá ki Nāsaleti, ʻo ne nofo talangofua kiate kinaua. Ka na‘e tānaki pē ‘e Mele ʻa e ngaahi meʻa na‘e hokó ʻo ne faʻa fifili ki ai ʻi hono lotó.
Pea tupu fakautuutu ai pē ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he potó mo ʻene mo‘ui fakasinó. Pea na‘e ʻofeina ʻene mo‘ui̇́ ʻi he ʻafio ʻa e ‘Otuá pea mo e ʻao ʻo e kakai̇́.

3.text: Pea ʻi he ta‘u hongofulu mā nima ʻo e pule ʻa Sisa Taipiliō he tapa ko ia ʻo māmani̇́, lolotonga ʻoku Kōvana ʻa Ponitō Pailato ʻi Siutea, kae Tuʻi ʻa Hēlota ʻi Kāleli̇́, pea Tuʻi hono tehiná, ʻa Filipe, ʻi ʻAitūlia mo Telakonaitisi, pea Tuʻi leva ʻa Li̇̄saniasi ‘i̇ ʻApiline;
Ko e taimi ia naʻe Taula‘eiki Lahi ai ʻa ʻĀnasi mo Kaiafasi he kakai Siú, naʻe hoko ha folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá kia Sione foha ʻo Sākalaiá ʻi he toafá.

Pea na‘e ʻalu atu ia ki he kakai na‘e nofo he tafatafa ʻaki ʻo e Vaitafe Soatani̇́, ʻo ne malangaʻaki ke nau papitaiso ke fakahā ʻenau fakatomalá ʻo tafoki ki he ʻOtuá ke maʻu ʻa e fakamolemole angahalá.
ʻO hangē ko ia ʻoku hiki tohi ʻe he palōfita ko ʻAisea:
Mou tanu ʻa e teleʻa kotoa pē.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ kae mamata ʻa e kakai kotoa

Ko ia, naʻe talaange ‘e Sione ki he kakai tokolahi naʻe omi ke papitaiso ʻiate ia: ‟ʻA e fanga ngata fekai! Ko hai naʻá ne fakatokanga kimoutolu ke mou hola mei he houhau ʻo e ʻOtuá ‘oku ʻamanaki ke tō mai̇́?

Mou ngāue ke hā mahino ai kuo mou tafoki moʻoni mei hoʻomou angahalá! Pea vakai naʻa mou lau, Ko e hako kimautolu ia ʻo ʻĒpalahame, he ‘okú ou tala fakamātoato atu kiate kimoutolu, naʻa mo e ngaahi fo‘i maka ko eni̇́, ‘e lava noa ‘e he ‘Otuá ke fakatupu mei ai ha fānau ʻa ʻĒpalahame.
Kuo ‘osi hiki hake ʻa e toki̇́ ke tā ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi ʻakau mei hono tefitó, pea ‘ ʻilonga ha fu‘u ʻakau ‘oku ʻikai ke fua lelei̇́, ‘e tuʻusi hifo ʻo li̇̄ ki he afi̇́.”
Pea pehēange ‘e he kakai̇́ kia Sione: ‟Ko e hā leva ʻemau meʻa ‘e fai̇́?”
Pea tali ‘e Sione: ‟Kapau ‘oku ua ho koté, peá ke ‘ave ho kote ‘e taha maʻa haʻa taha ‘oku hala mo ha kote. Pea kapau ‘oku lahi hoʻo me‘atokoni̇́, peá ke ‘ave ha meʻa maʻa haʻa taha kehe.”
Na‘e omi foki mo ha kau tānaki tukuhau ke papitaiso, pea nau pehēange kia Sione: ‟Faiako, ko e hā ʻemau meʻa ʻamautolu ‘e fai̇́?”
Pea tali ‘e Sione: ‟ʻOua te mou fakamālohi‘i ʻa e kakai̇́ ke totongi tukuhau ʻo hulu atu he meʻa kuo tu‘utu‘uni̇́.”

Pea haʻu ha kau sōtia ʻo fehuʻi kiate ia: ‟Fēfē kimautolu? Ko e hā ʻemau meʻa ʻamautolu ‘e fai̇́?” Pea talaange ‘e Sione kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOua naʻa mou toʻo fakamālohi ha paʻanga mei ha taha, pea ʻoua te mou tukuakiʻi ha taha ʻaki ha loi, pea mou fiemālie pē he vāhenga ‘oku mou maʻú.”
Pea naʻe nofo ʻamanaki ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ki he hokomai ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá, ko ia naʻa nau fifili loto pē, naʻa ko Sione koā ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá.

Kae talaange ‘e Sione kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko au ‘oku ou papitaiso kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e vai, ka ‘oku ha‘u ha toko taha ‘oku mafai lahi ange ‘iate au, ʻa ia ‘oku ʻikai te u taau au ke vete hono senitoló. Ko e tokotaha ko iā, te ne papitaiso ‘e ia kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oní mo e afi.

Kuó ne ‘osi to‘o ‘e ia ʻa e huotata uité ʻi hono nimá, ke fakamavaheʻi ʻaki ʻa e uité mei hono kafukafú. Peá te ne tānaki ʻa e uité ki hono Peitó ka naʻe tutu ʻa e kafukafú ʻaki ha afi ‘e ʻikai toe lava ʻo tāmate‘i.”
Pea ai mo ha ngaahi founga kehekehe, naʻe faiʻaki ʻe Sione ʻene malangaʻi ʻa e ongoongolelei̇́ ki he kakai̇́
Pea naʻe lea fefeka foki ‘e ia ki he tu‘i ko Hēlotá, koeʻuhi̇̄ he naʻá ne nonofo mo Hēlotiasi, ko e mali ʻo hono tehiná, pea mo ha ngaahi kovi kehekehe pē naʻe fai ‘e Hēlota.
Pea naʻe iku pē foki ʻo fakahū pili̇̄sone ia ‘e Hēlota, ko e tumutumu ia ʻo ʻene ngaahi faikovi̇́.
Pea ʻi he ‘osi kātoa ʻa e kakai̇́ hono papitaisó, pea kuo papitaiso foki mo Sīsū, pea lolotonga ʻa e kei fai ʻene lotu, naʻe mavaeua hake ʻa e langi̇́.

Pea na‘e toki hifo mai kia Si̇̄sū ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ʻi he fōtungá ʻo ha fo‘i lupe, pea ongo mai mo ha le‘o mei he langi̇́ ‘oku pehē: ‟Ko hoku Foha ‘ofa‘angá koe, pea ko ho‘o mo‘ui̇́, ‘oku hoa mo hoku finangaló.”
Na‘e toki kamata ngāue ʻa Si̇̄sū kuo ta‘u tolungofulu nai, pea na‘e fakakaukau ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ko e foha ia ʻo Siosifa, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Hēlai,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Mātati, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Li̇̄vai, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Melikai, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Sānai, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Siosifa,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Mataiasi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻĒmosi̇́, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Nēhumi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ‘Esilai, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Nākai,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Ma‘ati, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Mataiasi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Semaini, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Sioseki, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Siota,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Sioanani, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Lesa, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Seluipēpeli, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Saletili, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Nēlai,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Melikai, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻAtai, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Kōsame, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻElimatami, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻEa,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Siosiua, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻEliesa, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Siolimi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Matati, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Li̇̄vai,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Simione, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Siuta, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Siosifa, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Sionami, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻIlaiakimi,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Melea, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Mena, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Mātata, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Nētani, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Tēvita,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Sese, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ‘Ōpeti, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Pōasi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Salemone, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Nāsoni,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻAminatapi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻAtamini, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ‘Ālani, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻEsilome, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Fēlesi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Siuta,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Sēkope, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻAisake, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻĒpalahame, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Tela, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Nēhoa,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Seluki, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Le‘u, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Pēleki, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Hēpelū, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Sila,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Kēnani, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻĀfakisate, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Semi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Noa, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Lēmeki,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Mētuisela, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻInoke, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Seleti, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Mehālelieli, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Kēnani,
ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo ʻInasi, ʻa ia ko e foha ʻo Seti. Ko Seti̇́ ko e foha ia ʻo ʻĀtama. Pea ko ʻĀtamá ko e foha ia ʻo e ‘Otuá.

4.text: Pea foki mai ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he Vaitafe Soatani̇́ kuo fakaivia ia ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, pea na‘e taki atu ia ‘e he Laumālié ki he toafá;
Ke ʻahiʻahi‘i ai ia ‘e he tēvoló, ʻo fe‘unga mo ha ʻaho ‘e fāngofulu. Pea na‘e ʻikai ke ne ma‘u ha me‘atokoni, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iā, pea ʻosi ange iá, naʻá ne fu‘u fiekaia ‘aupito.
Pea pehēange ‘e he tēvoló kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Kapau ko e ʻAlo koe ʻo e ‘Otuá, peá ke lea ki he ngaahi fo‘i maká ni ke liliu ʻo hoko ko e ngaahi foʻi mā.”
Ka naʻe tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Kuo tohi ʻi he Tohitapú, ‘Oku ʻikai ko e mo‘ui‘anga pē ʻo e kakai̇́ ʻa e maá.”
Pea taki hake ‘e he tēvoló ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ha feitu‘u māʻolunga, ʻo ne faka‘ali‘ali ange ki ai, ʻa e ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa pē ʻo māmani.

Pea naʻe toki pehēange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Te u ‘oatu mo‘ou ʻa e mafai ke pule ki honau kotoa pea mo e lāngilangi ʻonautolú, he ʻoku ʻoʻoku ia ke u fa‘iteliha ki ai, ke u ‘oange maʻa haʻa taha te u loto ki ai.
Ko ia, kapau te ke punou ʻo lotu mai kiate au, te u ‘atu kotoa ia ma‘au.”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne pehē kiate ia: ‟Kuo tohi ʻi he Tohitapú, Te ke lotu ki he ʻEiki ko ho ‘Otuá pea ko ia toko taha pē te ke tauhi ki ai̇́.”
Pea toki taki hake ia ‘e he tēvoló, ʻo fokotu‘u ki he tumutumu ʻo e Temipalé. Pea naʻe pehēange: ‟Kapau ko e ʻAlo koe ʻo e ‘Otuá, peá ke hopo ki lalo mei hena.
He kuo tohi ʻi he Tohitapú,
Peá te nau hapo koe,
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne pehē kiate ia: ‟Kuo folofolaʻaki ʻe he ʻOtuá, ‘Oua naʻá ke holi ke ke ʻahiʻahiʻi ʻa e ʻEiki ko ho ‘Otuá!”
Pea ʻi he kakato hono ʻahiʻahiʻi ‘e he tēvoló ʻa Sīsuú, he meʻa kotoa naʻá ne ala lavá, pea ne mavahe atu mei ai ʻo lama ke toe maʻu hano faingamālie.
Pea foki mai ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Kāleli mo ha mālohi mei̇́ he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, pea na‘e mafola atu hono ongoongó ki he feitu‘u kotoa pē.
Pea naʻá ne faiako he ngaahi falelotu ʻos e kakai Siú, pea na‘e fakahi̇̄kihiki‘i ia ‘e he kakai kotoa pē.
Pea foki ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Nāsaleti, ʻa e kolo naʻá ne tupu ai̇́. Pea ʻi heʻene aʻu ki he Sāpaté, naʻá ne ʻalu ai pē ki falelotu ʻo hangē ko ʻene anga maheni̇́, pea naʻe tu‘u hake ke lau ʻa e Folofolá;
Pea naʻe ‘oange kiate ia ʻa e tohi ʻa e palōfita ko ʻAiseá. Pea ʻi heʻene fakaava hake ʻa e tohi̇́, naʻá ne maʻu ʻa e potu tohi ko ʻeni̇́:
‟Ko e Laumālie ʻo Sihová kuo fakafonu ʻaki au,
Ke u fanongonongo atu,
Pea tāpuni leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e tohi̇́ ʻo fakafoki ki he sētuatá, kae nofo hifo ki lalo. Pea sio fakamama‘u ʻa e kakai kotoa pē he falelotú kiate ia.
Pea kamata folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e ʻaho ni̇́, kuo fakakakato ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo mou fanongo ki ai mei he Tohitapú.”
Pea naʻe talanoa taha ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ‘ia Si̇̄sū, mo ofoofo he ngaahi meʻa mālie naʻá ne lea‘aki̇́, ʻo nau pehē: ‟ʻIkai ko e foha ʻeni ʻo Siosifá?”

Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Kuo pau ke mou ‘ai mai kiate au ʻa e lau ‘oku pehē: ‛Toketā, tomuʻa faitoʻo koe!’ Peá te mou pehē mai foki, ‛Fei mo fai heni ʻi ho kolo tupu‘angá, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo mau fanongo ai naʻá ke fai ʻi Kāpaneumé.’”
Ka ‘oku ou tala fakamātoato atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku te‘eki ai ha palōfita ‘e tali ‘e he kakai ʻo hono kolo tupu‘angá.

‟Ko ʻeku moʻoni eni, ʻi he kuonga ʻo ʻIlaisiaá, na‘e tokolahi pē ʻa e kau fefine uitou ʻi ‘Isileli, ʻi he taimi ko iā, lolotonga naʻe ʻikai ke toe tō ha ʻuha, ʻi ha taʻu ʻe tolu mo e konga, pea honge lahi ʻa e fonua;
Ka na‘e ʻikai fekau atu ʻa ʻIlaisiā ke ʻalu ki ha taha ʻo kinautolu, ka ki ha uitou na‘e tupu he kolo ko Salepita, he feitu‘u Saitoni̇́.
Pea na‘e tokolahi pē ʻa e kau kiliá he kuonga ʻo e palōfita ko ʻIlaisá, ka na‘e ʻikai fakamaʻa hanau taha, tukukehe pē ʻa Neamani, ko e tangata Si̇̄lia.”
Pea na‘e fakapo‘uli ‘aupito ai ʻa e kakai kotoa naʻe ʻi he falelotú, he lau ko ia ʻa Si̇̄suú;
Pea naʻa nau tutu‘u hake ʻo toho atu ia ki tuʻa kolo, ki he ngutu lilifá, ʻi he moʻunga naʻe tuʻu ai honau koló, ke li̇̄ hifo ia ai ki lalo.
Ka naʻe moulu atu pē ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi honau lotolotongá, ʻo ʻalu.
Pea toki ʻalu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kolo ko Kāpaneumé, ʻi Kāleli, ʻo faiako ai ʻi he falelotú, ʻi he ʻaho Sāpaté.
Pea naʻa nau ‘ohovale ‘aupito ʻi heʻene faiakó, koe‘uhi̇̄ naʻe ai ha mālohi ʻi heʻene malangá.
Pea naʻe ʻi he falelotú ha tangata kuo maʻu ʻe ha ivi fakatēvolo. Pea kaila le‘olahi mai ʻa e tangatá,
‟ʻEi, ʻe Si̇̄sū! ʻA koe mei Nāsaleti̇́! Ko hoʻo haʻú koā ke faka‘auha kimautolu? ‘Oku ou ʻilo ‘e au koe! Ko e Toko taha Mā‘oni‘oni koe ʻa e ‘Otuá!”

Pea taʻofi atu ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e tēvoló ʻo ne pehē: ‟Fakalongolongo! Peá ke mavahe mai leva mei he tangatá.” Pea toki hanga ‘e he tēvoló ʻo hiki ha‘aki ʻa e tangatá he lotolotonga ʻo e kakai̇́, ʻo ne mavahe meiate ia, ka naʻe ʻikai ha lavea ‘e taha ʻi he tangatá.
Pea ofo ai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e faʻahinga malanga ko ʻeni̇́? He tā ‘oku ma‘u mafai ʻa e tangatá ni ke ne kapusi ʻa e ivi fakatēvoló mei he kakai̇́!”
Pea toki mafola atu ai ʻa e ongoongo ʻo kau kia Si̇̄suú ki he tapa kotoa pē ʻo e vahefonua ko iā.

Pea tuʻu hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ʻalu mei he falelotú ki he ʻapi ʻo Saimoné. Pea ko eni, ʻi heʻene aʻu atu ki he ‘api̇́, tā ‘oku tokoto ʻa e fa‘ē ʻa e mali ʻo Saimoné, ko e mofi lahi, pea nau kole kia Si̇̄sū ke ne tokoni kiate ia.
Pea tu‘u atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ai ʻo ne fekau ʻa e mofi̇́ ke mahu‘i meiate ia, pea mo‘ui leva ʻa e fefiné, pea ne tu‘u hake ai pē ʻo talitali kinautolu.

Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi poʻuli̇́, naʻe fetuku mai ‘e he kakai̇́ kia Si̇̄sū ha faʻahinga na‘e puke he ngaahi mahaki kehekehe, pea ne hilifaki nima ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu taki taha, ʻo fakamo‘ui kinautolu.

Pea naʻe ʻi ai foki mo e fanga tēvolo naʻá ne kapusi mei he tokolahi, ʻo nau hū mai mo e kaikaila, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e ʻAlo koe ʻo e ‘Otuá!” Ka na‘e fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ke nau longo, he naʻa nau ʻilo ko e Mi̇̄saiá ia.

Pea ʻi he kei hengihengi he ʻaho ‘e tahá, naʻe uhu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ha feitu‘u lōngonoa ʻo nofo toko taha pē ai. Ka na‘e kumi mai kiate ia ‘e ha kakai tokolahi. Pea ʻi heʻenau aʻu mai ki ai̇́, naʻa nau feinga‘i ke ‘oua te ne toe mavahe mei honau fonuá.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Kuo pau ke u malanga‘i ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei ʻo e Pule‘anga ʻo e ‘Otuá ki he kakai ʻo e ngaahi kolo ko eé foki. He ko e fatongia ia na‘e fekau mai au ke fai̇́.”
Ko ia, naʻe hokohoko atu ai pē ʻa e malanga ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he ngaahi falelotu ʻo Siuteá.

5.text: Pea ko e ʻaho ‘e taha, na‘e faiako ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ha kakai tokolahi he matātahi ʻo e Tahi Kenesaleti̇́, pea naʻe feteketekeʻi mai ʻa e kakai̇́, ko ʻenau fie fanongo ki he Folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá.
Pea fakatokanga‘i ‘e Si̇̄sū ha ongo ki‘i vaka kuo tau ofi atu ai, kau kuo hifo atu ʻa e kau toutai ke fō honau ngaahi kupengá.
Pea naʻe heka ki ha vaka ‘e taha, ko e vaka ʻo Saimoné, ʻo ne kole ange kia Saimone ke ki‘i teke‘i si‘i atu ʻa e vaká mei he matātahi̇́. Pea taʻutu ai pē ʻa Si̇̄sū mei vaka ʻo faiako ki he kakai̇́.
Pea ʻi he ‘osi ʻene faiakó, naʻá ne pehēange kia Saimone: ‟Toe tahataha atu ki he lolotó, pea li̇̄ ai ʻa e kupengá ke fusi ha‘amou ika.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Saimone: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ko e talu ʻeni ʻemau toutai mei ʻanepō mo e hala ha meʻa ‘e ma‘u. Kaekehe, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko hoʻo fekaú, te u toe li̇̄ pē ʻa e kupengá.”
Pea ʻi heʻenau li̇̄ ʻa e kupengá, ko e ika lahi mo‘oni na‘e ma‘ú, pea kamata mahae ai ʻa e kupengá.

Pea nau ta‘alo atu ki honau kaungātoutai he vaka ‘e tahá ke nau haʻu ʻo tokoni mai. Pea ʻi he aʻu mai ʻa e kau tangata ko iā, naʻa nau ʻaʻau fakataha ʻa e kupengá ki he ongo vaká, pea naʻe tangotongoto ʻa e ongo vaká he lahi ʻa e ika naʻe ma‘ú.
Pea ʻi he mamata leva ʻa Saimone Pita ki he meʻa kuo hokó, naʻá ne tū‘ulutui atu ki he vaʻe ʻo Si̇̄suú ʻo ne pehē: ‟ʻEiki, ʻalu atu muʻa meiate au he ko e tangata angahala au.”
He na‘e ‘ohovale lahi ʻa Pita, mo kinautolu kotoa na‘e ʻi ai̇́, ʻi he lahi ʻa e ika na‘e ma‘ú.

Pea ‘ohovale ai foki mo e ongo kaungātoutai ʻo Pitá, ʻa Sēmisi mo Sione, ko e ongo foha ʻo Sēpeti̇́. Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kia Saimone: ‟‘Oua te ke manavahē! He ‘e kamata he ʻahó ni hoʻo toutai kakai.”
Pea naʻe toho leva ‘e he kau tangatá ʻa e ongo vaká ki ‘uta, pea nau li‘aki ai pē ʻenau meʻa kotoa ka nau muimui kia Si̇̄sū.

Pea lolotonga naʻá ne ʻi ha kolo ʻe taha, naʻe nofo ai ha tangata kilia. Pea ʻi he sio ʻa e tangata kiliá kia Sīsuú, naʻá ne tō tū‘ulutui ʻo kole kiate ia: ‟ʻEiki, kapau te ke loto ki ai, te ke lava pē ke fakamaʻa au.”
Pea ala atu leva ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia, mo ne pehēange: ‟‘Oku ou loto pē ke fakamaʻa koe!” Pea mavahe leva ʻa e kiliá meiate ia.

Pea tuʻutuʻuni ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he tangatá: ‟Vakai naʻá ke talanoa ki ha taha ʻa e meʻa kuo hokó, ka ke ʻalu pē ki he taula‘eiki, peá ke ‘ave ʻa e feilaulau ʻa ē naʻe tu‘utu‘uni ‘e Mōsesé, ke ʻiloʻi ʻaki ‘e he kakai̇́ kuo ʻosi fakamaʻa koe.”
Ka na‘e fakautuutu ai pē ʻa e mafola ʻa e ongoongo ʻo Sīsuú, pea ko e kakai tokolahi ‘aupito na‘e omi ʻo fanongo malanga mo fakamo‘ui honau ngaahi alanga mahaki ʻiate ia.
Ka na‘e faʻa ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo kumi ha feitu‘u lōngonoa ke fai ai ʻene lotu lilo.

Pea ko e ʻaho ʻe taha, na‘e faiako ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‘oku ʻi ai ha kau Fālesi mo ha kau mataotao he Lao ʻa Mōsesé, ʻa ia kuo nau ō mai mei Selusalema pea mo e ngaahi kolo kotoa ʻi Kāleli mo Siutea, pea naʻa nau fanongo malanga ai. Pea ko e mafai ʻo e ʻEiki̇́, ke fakamoʻui mahaki̇́ naʻe ʻia Si̇̄sū.
Pea ʻiloangé naʻe fata mai ‘e ha ni‘ihi ha mamatea ʻi ha fala ʻo feinga ke fakahū atu ki fale ke ʻoatu kia Si̇̄sū.

Ka na‘e ʻikai te nau lava, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e fu‘u tokolahi ʻa e kakai̇́. Pea talu ai ʻenau kaka ki he funga falé ʻo ta ʻaki ha konga ʻo e ʻató, ʻo tukutuku hifo ai ʻa e fala naʻe tokoto ai ʻa e tangatá, kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he lahi ʻenau tui̇́, naʻá ne pehēange ki he tangata mamateá: ‟Tangata, kuo fakamolemole‘i ho‘o ngaahi angahalá!”

Pea kamata fifililoto ai ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau mataotao he Laó, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Ko hai ʻa e tangatá ni, ʻokú ne lea pehē ai̇́! He ko e ‘Otuá pē taha ‘oku ʻi ai hono mafai ke fakamolemole angahalá!”
Ka kuo ‘osi ʻafioʻi ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻa e anga ʻenau fakakaukaú, ko ia naʻá ne ʻeke ange kiate kinautolu:: ‟Ko e hā ‘oku pehē ai hoʻomou fakakaukaú?
Ko fē ʻoku faingofua ange kiate aú, ke u talaange ki he tangata mamateá ni kuo fakamolemole‘i ʻene ngaahi angahalá, pē ko ʻeku talaange ke tu‘u ki ‘olunga ʻo ʻalu?

Ka ko ʻeku ‘ai ʻeni ke mahino kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku mafai ʻe he Foha ʻo e Tangatá ke ne fakamolemole angahala ʻi māmani.” Pea pehēange leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he mamateá: ‟Tu‘u ki ‘olunga! pea takai ho falá ʻo ʻalu ki homou ‘api̇́.”
Pea tu‘u hake leva ʻa e tangatá ki ‘olunga, ʻo nau sio kotoa pē ki ai. Pea naʻe toki takai hono falá ʻo lue atu ʻo ʻalu ki hono ‘api̇́ mo fakamālō ki he ‘Otuá.

Pea na‘e fakatumutumu ai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē mo fakalāngilangi‘i ʻa e ‘Otuá. Na‘e faka‘ohovale ‘aupito ki he kakai̇́ ʻa e meʻa naʻa nau mamata ai̇́, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Ko e mana fakaofo moʻoni kuo tau sio ai he ʻahó ni!”

Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, pea ʻalu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne fakatokanga‘i ha tangata tānaki tukuhau ko Li̇̄vai hono hingoá, ‘oku ta‘utu mai ʻi he ʻōfisi totongi tukuhaú. Pea naʻe folofola kiate ia: ‟Ha‘u ʻo muimui kiate au!”
Pea li̇̄ ʻaki leva ‘e Li̇̄vai ʻa e meʻa kotoa, ʻo ne muimui kiate ia.
Pea naʻe fai ‘e Līvai ha fu‘u fakaafe ʻi hono ‘api̇́ ke talitali ki ai ʻa Si̇̄sū. Pea na‘e omi ki ai mo ha kau tānaki tukuhau tokolahi mo ha kau fakaafe kehe ʻo nau kai fakataha ai.
Ka naʻe lāunga ʻa e kau Fālesi mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé ki he kau ako ʻa Sīsuú, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou kai mo inu fakataha ai mo e kau tānaki tukuhau ko ʻená mo e kau angahalá?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku ʻikai ko e kakai mo‘ui lelei̇́ ‘oku ʻaonga ki ai ʻa e toketaá, ka ko e kakai mahamahaki̇́.
Na‘e ʻikai te u ha‘ú ke fakaafe‘i ʻa e kau failelei̇́, ka ko e kau angahalá ke nau fakatomala.”
Pea pehēange ‘e ha ni‘ihi kia Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku faʻa lotu mo ‘aukai ʻa e kau ako ʻa Sioné, pea ‘oku pehē pē mo e kau ako ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́, ka ko e kau ako ʻaʻaú ‘oku nau kai pē mo inu.”
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘E ʻikai faifai pea ‘aukai ʻa e ngaahi kaungāmeʻá ʻo ha tangata ‘oku teu mali̇́, ʻi he kei nofo ʻa e tangata teu mali̇́ mo kinautolú.
Ka kuo pau ke hoko mai ʻa e ʻaho ‘e ‘ave ai meiate kinautolu, ʻa e tangata teu mali̇́, pea te nau toki ‘aukai leva he taimi ko iā.”

Na‘e fai foki ‘e Si̇̄sū mo e talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni̇́ kiate kinautolu: ‟He‘ikai hanga ‘e ha taha ʻo tuʻusi mai ha konga tupenu foʻou ke monomono ʻaki ha kofu motuʻa. He kapau te ne fai pehē: ‘e mahae ʻa e konga tupenu fo‘oú, pea ʻe ʻikai hoatatau ʻa e konga tupenu foʻou mo e kofu motuʻa.

Pea he‘ikai hanga ‘e ha taha ʻo ‘utu ha uaine fo‘ou ki ha ngeʻesi hina uaine motuʻa. He kapau te ne fai pehē: ‘e tupu ʻa e uaine fo‘oú ia ʻo pā ai ʻa e hina uaine motuʻá pea maumau ai ʻa e uainé, pea ta‘e‘aonga ai mo e ngeʻesi hina uainé.
Ko e uaine fo‘oú, ke ‘utu pē ia ki ha ngeʻesi hina uaine fo‘ou.
Pea ‘oku ʻikai foki ha taha ʻe holi ke inu uaine fo‘ou, ʻoka ‘osi ʻene inu he uaine motuʻá. He kuo pau ke ne talamai ‘e ia, ‛‘Oku ifo ange pē ʻa e uaine motuʻá ia.’”

6.text: Pea ʻi ha ʻaho Sāpate ‘e taha, naʻe fou atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ʻi ha ngoueʻanga uite, pea kamata toli uite ai ʻa e kau akó ʻo milihi ke matoʻo e nge‘esi̇́, ka nau kai ʻa e ngaahi fo‘i uité.
Pea pehēange ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́ ki he kau ako ʻa Sīsuú: ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou toli uite ai he Sāpaté? ‘Oku ʻikai ngofua he Laó ho‘omou meʻa ‘oku fai̇́!”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kau Fālesi̇́: ‟Naʻe ʻikai koā te mou lau ʻa e talanoa he Tohitapú ki he meʻa na‘e fai ‘e Tēvita, he ʻaho na‘e fiekaia ai mo ʻene kau tangatá?
He naʻá ne hū ki he fale ʻo e ‘Otuá pea ne to‘o ʻa e ngaahi fo‘i mā fakatāpui ʻo kai, ʻa ē ko e kau taula‘eiki̇́ pē naʻe ngofua ke nau kai̇́. Pea naʻá ne ʻange foki ʻo kai ai mo ʻene kau tangatá.”
Pea toki folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Naʻa mo e Sāpaté, ‘oku ʻeiki ki ai foki, ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.”
Pea ʻoku pehē: ʻi ha Sāpate ʻe taha, naʻe hū atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo faiako ʻi he falelotu ʻo e kakai Siú ‘oku lolotonga ʻi ai ha tangata na‘e mamatea hono nima to‘omata‘ú.
Pea na‘e siofi ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé pē te ne fakamo‘ui ʻa e tangatá, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke nau ma‘u ai ha meʻa ke faka‘ilo ʻaki ʻa Si̇̄sū.
Ka na‘e ʻilo ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e anga ʻenau fakakaukaú, pea naʻe fekau ki he tangata naʻe mate hono nimá: ‟Tu‘u ki ‘olunga ke lava ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ʻo sio kiate koe.” Pea tu‘u hake ʻa e tangatá.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko ʻeku fehuʻi atu kiate kimoutolú, ko e fē ʻa e meʻa ʻe ngofua he Sāpaté; ke fai ai ha ngāue lelei, pē ko ha ngāue kovi? Ke fakamoʻui pē ke faka‘auha?”
Pea sio takai ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu hono kotoa, pea naʻe toki pehēange ki he tangatá: ‟‘Ai atu ho nimá ʻo fakahangatonu!” Pea naʻe ‘ai atu, pea tā kuo mo‘ui ia.
Pea ‘ita ‘aupito ai ʻa e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé mo e kau Fālesi̇́, ʻo nau kamata ke talanoaʻi fakaekinautolu, ki ha meʻa te nau fai kia Si̇̄sū
Pea naʻe hoko ʻo pehē ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iā, naʻe ʻalu hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ha funga mo‘unga ke fai ʻene lotu lilo, pea naʻe lotu ai pē ʻo aʻu ki he maʻa ʻa e ʻahó.
Pea ʻi he pongipongi haké, naʻá ne ui mai leva ʻene kau akó ke nau kātoa mai, pea naʻe toki fili ʻa e toko hongofulumāua, ʻa ia naʻá ne lau ko ʻene kau ʻApositolo.
Ko Saimone, ʻa ia naʻá ne toe fakahingoa ko Pitá pea mo hono tehiná, ko ʻAnitelū, ko Sēmisi, Sione, Filipe, Pātolomiu;
Ko Mātiu, Tōmasi, pea mo Sēmisi ko e foha ʻo ʻAlefiusi̇́, mo Saimone, ʻa ē naʻe ui ko e Mamahi‘i Fonuá;
Ko Siutasi foha ʻo Sēmisi̇́, pea mo Siutasi ʻIisikāliote, ʻa ē naʻá ne lavaki‘i ʻa Sīsuú.

Pea toki hifo ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó mei he funga mo‘ungá, ʻo nau tuʻu ʻi ha feitu‘u tokalelei. Pea na‘e fakafetaulaki mai ai kia Si̇̄sū ha tokolahi ʻo ʻene kau akó, mo ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi mei Siutea kātoa, mo Selusalema, mo e ngaahi kolo matātahi ʻo Taia mo Saitoni̇́.
Ko e faʻahingá ni, naʻe omi̇ ke fanongo kia Si̇̄sū mo fakamo‘ui ai honau ngaahi alanga mahaki̇́. Pea ko e faʻahinga kotoa na‘e faingataʻaʻia ʻi ha ivi fakatēvolo, naʻá ne fakamo‘ui.
Pea na‘e feinga ʻa e kakai kotoa ke pā kia Si̇̄sū, he na‘e ʻalu atu maʻu pē meiate ia ha ivi naʻá ne fakamoʻui honau ngaahi alanga mahaki̇́.
Pea hanga hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ne siofia ʻene kau akó, ʻo ne folofola kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ‟‘Oku monūʻia ʻa kimoutolu ‘oku masivá. He te mou maʻu ʻa e puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá.
‘Oku monūʻia ʻa kimoutolu ‘oku fiekaiá he maama ko eni̇́, he ‘e fakamākona kimoutolu ʻe he ʻOtuá. ʻOku monūʻia ʻa kimoutolu ‘oku tangi he maama ko eni̇́. He ʻe fakafiefiaʻi kimoutolu.

‘Oku moniūʻia ʻa kimoutolu ‘oka fehi‘anekinaʻi kimoutolu ʻe he kakai̇́ mo nau fakamama‘o meiate kimoutolu, ʻo lauʻikoviʻi mo taʻetokaʻi homou hingoá, hangē ha taha faikovi̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ pē ko ho‘omou kau mo e Foha ʻo e Tangatá!
Mou fiefia mo hākailangitau, he ‘e lahi ai homou fakapaleʻi ʻi Langi̇. He naʻe pehē tofu pē ʻa e meʻa naʻe fai ʻe heʻenau ngaahi kui̇́, ki he kau palōfitá.
Ka ʻoku malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu ‘oku tu‘umālié,
ʻOku malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kakai kuo mākona he maama ko eni̇́,
ʻOku malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu ‘oka lea lelei atu ʻa e kakai kotoa pē: He na‘e pehē tofu pē ʻa e fai ʻenau ngaahi kui̇́ ki he kau palōfita loi̇́ he kuohili̇́.
Ka ko ʻeku akonaki ʻeni kiate kimoutolu kotoa ʻoku fakaongo mai kiate aú: ‘Ofa ki homou ngaahi fili̇́, pea fai lelei ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘oku nau fehiʻa mai kiate kimoutolú.
Mou kole ha tāpuaki maʻa e taha ‘e kape mai kiate kimoutolu, pea mou lotua ʻa e kakai kotoa pē te nau ngaohikovi‘i kimoutolú.
Ka paa‘i ‘e ha taha ho kouʻahe ko eé, pea tuku ke ne paa‘i foki mo ho kouʻahe ʻe tahá. Peá ka holi ha taha ke fa‘oa ho koté, pea tuku ke ne ‘ave mo ho soté.
Foaki ki ha taha pē ‘e kole atu kiate koe, pea ‘oua te ke holi ke fakafoki atu ha meʻa na‘e kole ‘e ha taha meiate koe.
Fai ki he kakai kehé ʻa e meʻa tatau ‘okú ke loto ke nau fai kiate koé.
He kapau te ke ‘ofa pē ki ha taha ‘oku ‘ofa atu kiate koe, ko e hā ha lelei te ke maʻu ai̇́? Naʻa mo e kau faikovi̇́ foki ‘oku nau ‘ofa ki he faʻahinga ‘oku ‘ofa kiate kinautolú!

Pea kapau te ke failelei pē ki ha taha ʻoku failelei mai kiate koe, ko e hā ha lelei te ke maʻu ai? Naʻa mo e kau faikovi̇́ foki ‘oku nau failelei pē ki he faʻahinga ‘oku failelei mai kiate kinautolú!

Pea kapau te ke toki fie nō atu pē hoʻo pa‘angá ki ha taha ‘oku mahino te ne toe totongi fakafoki atú, ko e hā ha lelei te ke maʻu ai̇́? Naʻa mo e kau faikovi̇́ foki ‘oku nau tuku ke nō atu ʻenau pa‘angá, ki he kau faikovi̇́, ʻi he mahino te nau toe ma‘u mai kotoa!

Ka mou ‘ofaʻi ʻe kimoutolu homou ngaahi fili̇́, mo failelei kiate kinautolu, pea mou tali ʻa e ngaahi kole nō ‘oku fai atú, ʻo ‘oua ‘e hohaʻa homou lotó pē ‘e toe fakafoki atu. He ‘e fakapale‘i lahi ai kimoutolu, pea te mou toki hoko ai ko e fānau mo‘oni ʻa e ‘Otua ʻo Langi̇́, he ‘oku ‘ofa ʻa e ‘Otuá foki ki he kakai mo‘ui ta‘ehounga mo faikovi̇́.
Mou faimanava‘ofa ki he kakai kehé, ʻo hangē tofu pē ko e faimanava‘ofa ho‘omou Tamai̇́ kiate kimoutolú.”

‟Pea ʻoua ‘e fakamāau‘i ʻa e kakai̇́, pea ‘e ʻikai fakamāau‘i kimoutolu. Pea ʻoua ʻe fakahalaiaʻi ʻa e kakai̇́ pea ʻe ʻikai fakahalaiaʻi kimoutolu. Mou fakamolemole‘i ʻa e kakai̇́ pea ʻe fakamolemole‘i kimoutolu foki.

Faʻa foaki ki he kakai̇́, pea ‘e faʻa foaki atu kiate kimoutolu. ‘ʻIo, ‘e foki atu hoʻo meʻaʻofá ko ha fuʻu tāpuaki, pea te ke fiu hono lolo hifo, mo toutou lulu ke hao, pea ‘e aʻu ai pē ʻo toe mahua atu ʻa e lelei̇́ ki ho fungá. He ko e fua naʻe faiʻaki hoʻo foaki̇́ ko ia pē ʻe fuaʻaki atu kiate koe ho tāpuaki̇́.”
Na‘e fai foki ‘e Si̇̄sū mo e talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni̇́ kiate kinautolu: ‟E lava koā ‘e ha taha kui ke ne taki atu ha taha kui̇́? ʻIkai te na iku ʻo fakatou tō lōua ki ha luo?
ʻOku ʻikai ke fakalaka ʻa e toko taha akó ʻi heʻene faiakó, ka ʻoka kakato ʻa e ako ʻa ha taha, te ne hangē tofu pē ko ʻene faiakó.
Ko e hā ʻokú ke tokanga ai koe ki he me‘i efu ʻoku ʻasi mei̇́ he kano‘imata ʻo ho kāingá, kae ʻikai te ke tomuʻa tokanga ki he fu‘u potu‘i ʻakau ʻoku tu‘u ʻi ho kano‘imata ‘o‘oú?

‘Oku anga fēfē ho‘o lava ke ke pehē ange ki ho kāingá, ʻEi, tuku ke u to‘o ʻa e me‘i efu ʻoku tau ʻi ho kano‘imatá, ka ‘oku ʻikai te ke fakatokanga‘i ʻe koe ʻa e fu‘u potu‘i ʻakau ʻoku tu‘u ʻi ho kano‘i mata ʻoʻoú? ʻA e kau lotuloi! Tomuʻa to‘o ʻa e fu‘u potu‘i ʻakau ʻoku tu‘u ʻi ho kano‘i mata ‘o‘oú kae lava ke ke sio lelei, ke ke to‘o ʻa e me‘i efu he kano‘i mata ʻo ho kāingá!
He ʻe ʻikai fua kovi ha fu‘u ʻakau lelei, pea ‘e ʻikai foki fua lelei ha fu‘u ʻakau kovi.
‘Oku ʻiloʻi ʻa e ʻakau kotoa pē mei hono fuá. He‘ikai te ke toli fiki mei̇́ ha pota ʻakau talatala, pē toli kālepi mei̇́ ha pota ʻakau veli.

Ka ai ha taha lelei, pea te ne fakahāaʻi pē ʻa e koloa lelei ‘oku fā‘ofale ʻi hono lotó, peá ka ai ha taha kovi, pea te ne fakahāaʻi pē ʻa e koloa kovi ‘oku fā‘ofale ʻi hono lotó. He ʻe ʻiloʻi pē ʻa e meʻa ‘oku fā‘ofale ʻi homou lotó mei̇́ he meʻa ‘oku mou lea‘aki̇́.
Ko e hā ‘oku mou faʻa ui ai kiate au, ʻEiki, ʻEiki, kae ‘osi ange ko iā ‘oku ʻikai te mou fie fai ki he ngaahi meʻa ‘oku ou leaʻaki̇ atú?
ʻIlonga ha taha kuo ha‘u ʻo fanongo ki he‘eku ngaahi akonaki̇́ mo talangofua ki ai̇́, te u fakahinohino atu kiate kimoutolu ʻa e meʻa ʻoku tatau mo iá;

‘Oku hangē ia ko ha tufunga naʻá ne langa ha fale, ʻo ne keli hono fakava‘é ʻo tau ki he maká. Pea ʻe fā ʻa e vaitafé ʻo faʻafaʻaki he fale ko iā, ka ‘e ʻikai momo‘i ngāue ai ʻa e falé, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e mālohi hono fakava‘é.

Ka ʻilonga leva ha taha kuo fanongo ki he‘eku ngaahi akonaki̇́ kae ʻikai talangofua ki ai̇́, ‘oku hangē ia ko ha tufunga na‘e langa hono falé he kelekelé kae ʻikai te ne keli ha fakava‘e ʻo e falé. Pea ko ʻene hake mai pē ʻa e vaitafé ʻo faʻaki he fale ko iā, kuo holofa leva ia, pea ko e holo ʻa e fale ko iā, ko e maumau lahi moʻoni.”

7.text: Pea kuo kakato ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē naʻe akonakiʻaki ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́, pea naʻe ʻalu atu ki Kāpaneume.
Pea na‘e nofo he kolo ko iá ha ʻeikitau ʻa ia na‘e puke lahi ʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́ ʻo mei mate. Ka naʻe ʻofa ʻaupito ʻa e ʻeikitaú heʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́.
Pea naʻá ne fanongo he ngaahi ongoongo ʻo kau kia Sīsuú, pea naʻe fekau atu ha mātuʻa Siu ke nau ō muʻa ʻo kole kia Si̇̄sū ke ʻalu ange ʻo fakamo‘ui ʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́.
Pea ʻi he aʻu mai ʻa e mātuʻá kia Sīsuú, naʻa nau kole fakamātoato kiate ia ke ne fai muʻa ha muʻa, ʻo nau pehēange: ‟Ko e tangata ʻeni ‘oku taau ke ke tokoni‘i!
He ‘okú naʻe ‘ofa ʻi hotau fonuá, pea naʻá ne langa homau falelotú.”

Pea ʻalu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo kinautolu. Pea ʻi heʻene fakaofiofi atu ki he ‘api̇́, kuo toe fekau ‘e he ʻeikitaú hano ngaahi kaungāmeʻa ke nau ō ʻo fakahoko ki ai: ‟ʻEiki, ‘oua te ke ongosia mai koe‘uhi̇̄ ko au, he ‘oku ʻikai te u taau au ke ke afe mai ki hoku ‘api̇́.
Ko hono ʻuhinga ia naʻe ʻikai ai te u ongoʻi taau ke lele atu kiate koe. Ka ke fai mai pē ha‘o folofola, pea ‘e mo‘ui ai pē ʻeku tamaio‘eiki̇́.

He ko au foki, ‘oku ou fakaongo ki ha pule, pea ‘oku ʻi ai mo ha kau tau ‘oku nau fakaongo mai kiate au. Kapau te u pehēange ki ha taha, ‛ʻAlu!’ Pea ʻe ʻalu. Pea kapau te u pehē ki ha taha, ‛Ha‘u!’ Pea ʻe ha‘u. Pea kapau te u pehē ki he‘eku tamaio‘eiki̇́, ‛Fai ē!’ pea ʻokú ne fai leva ia.”

Pea ‘ohovale ‘aupito ʻa Si̇̄sū, heʻene fanongo ki he lau ʻa e ʻeikitaú, pea naʻe tafoki ʻo hanga ki he kakai̇ naʻa nau muimui mai̇́, ʻo ne pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟ ʻOkú ou talaatu, kuo te‘eki ke u fetaulaki mo ha tui mālohi pehē ʻi ‘Isileli̇́!”
Pea ʻi he foki atu ʻa e ngaahi kaungāmeʻa ʻo e ʻeikitaú, ki hono ʻapi̇́, tā kuo mo‘ui ʻa e tamaio‘eiki̇́.
Pea ʻi he ʻaho hono hokó, naʻe fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó, mo ha toe kakai tokolahi, ki ha kolo, naʻe ui ko Nēini.
Pea ʻi heʻene fakaofiofi atu ki he hū‘anga ki he koló, naʻe fata mai ‘e ha ni‘ihi ha meʻa faka‘eiki, ko e tamasi‘i pē taha ʻa ha fefine uitou. Pea kuo holo mai ai mo ha tokolahi mei he koló.
Pea ʻi he fetaulaki ʻa Si̇̄sū mo e fefiné, naʻá ne ongo‘i ‘aupito ʻi loto ʻa e meʻa kuo hoko ki ai̇́, ʻo ne pehēange kiate ia: ‟Tuku ho‘o tangi̇́.”
Pea ʻalu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo ala atu ki he meʻafakaʻeiki̇́. Pea tu‘u hifo ʻakinautolu naʻa nau fata mai iá. Pea folofola atu ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟Tamasi‘i, ʻoku ou tala kiate koe, ke ke tu‘u ki ‘olunga!”
Pea ta‘utu hake leva ʻa e tamasi‘i̇́, ʻo ne kamata lea. Pea fakafoki atu ia ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene fa‘eé.

Pea manavahē kotoa ai ʻa e kakai̇́, pea nau fakahi̇̄kihikiʻi ʻa e ‘Otuá, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Tā ko ha palōfita lahi ʻeni kuo haʻu kiate kitautolu, pea kuo afe mai ai foki ʻa e ‘Otuá ke tokoni ki hono kakai̇́.”
Pea na‘e mafola atu leva ʻa e ongoongo ʻo kau kia Si̇̄suú ki he feituʻu kotoa pē ʻo Siutea pea mo e ngaahi feituʻu takatakai̇́.
Pea fakahoko ange ‘e he kau ako ʻa Sioné kia Sione ʻa e ngaahi talanoa kuo fai holo ʻo kau kia Sīsuú, pea ui mai ʻe Sione ha toko ua ʻo ʻene kau akó;
ʻO ne fekau atu ke na ō ʻo fehu‘i ki he ʻEiki̇́, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko koe nai ia naʻa mau nofo ʻamanaki ki ai̇́? Pē te mau toe tatali ki ha taha kehe?”

Pea ʻi he aʻu atu ʻa e ongo talafekaú kia Sīsuú, naʻá na talaange: ‟Na‘e fekau ‘e Sione Papitaiso ke ma ō mai ʻo ʻeke atu, pē ko koe ʻapē ia naʻa mau ʻamanaki ki ai̇́? Pē te mau toe tatali ki ha taha kehe?”
ʻI he taimi ko iā, ‘oku lolotonga fakamo‘ui ai ‘e Si̇̄sū ha tokolahi na‘e mahakiʻia, mo faingataʻaʻia, pea mo puke ‘e ha fanga tēvoló, mo ne toe fakaʻā mo ha tokolahi na‘e kui.

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he ongo talafekau ʻa Sioné: ‟Mo ō ʻo tala kia Sione ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo mo mamata ki ai̇́ pea mo fanongo ki ai̇́: Ko e faʻahinga naʻe kui̇́, kuo ʻā, ko kinautolu naʻe heké, kuo ʻalu lelei, kuo fakamaʻa ʻa e kau kiliaá, ko e faʻahinga naʻe tuli̇́, kuo fanongo lelei, kuo fakamoʻui ʻa e kau pekiá, pea kuo malanga‘aki foki ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei̇́ ki he kau masivá.
Pea ‘oku monūʻia ha taha ‘e ʻikai te ne taʻetui kiate au.”

Pea ʻi he foki atu ʻa e ongo talafekau ʻa Sioné, naʻe toki fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́ ʻene fakamatala ʻo kau kia Sione: ‟Ko e tangata fēfē naʻa mou ō atu ki he toafá ʻo mamata ai̇́? Ko ha tangata ‘oku hangē ha va‘ʻakau popo kuo feʻaveaki ʻe he matangi̇́?

Ka ko e faʻahinga tangata fēfē naʻa mou ʻamanakite mou ō atu ʻo sio ki ai̇́? Ko ha tangata teunga faka‘ofo‘ofa? ʻOku mou ʻilo pē, ko e kakai teunga naunauʻiá ʻoku nau nofo kinautolu he palasi ʻo e haʻa tuʻi̇́.
Ka ko e hā leva ʻa e meʻa naʻa mou ō atu ke mamata ki ai̇́? Ko ha palōfita koā? ‘ʻio, ko e palōfita! Ka ‘oku ou tala fakamātoato atu kiate kimoutolu, ‘oku ʻikai ko ha palōfita pē.
He ko Sione ia ʻoku lau ki ai ʻa e Tohitapú, ʻo pehē: ‛Ko eni, te u fekau atu ʻeku talafekau ke muʻomuʻa ‘iate koe, ʻo teuteu ho halá.’

ʻOkú ou talaatu foki, kuo te‘eki ke fanau‘i ‘e ha fefine he maama ko eni̇́, ha taha ‘e māʻolunga ange ‘ia Sione. Ka ko eni, ko ia ‘oku mā‘ulalo taha he Pule‘anga ʻo e ‘Otuá, ‘oku mā‘olunga ange ia ‘ia Sione.”

Pea ko kinautolu kotoa ʻa e kakai̇́, ʻo kau ai foki ʻa e kau tānaki tukuhaú, ʻi heʻenau fanongo leva ki he folofola pehē ʻa Si̇̄suú, naʻa nau fakahā naʻe tonu pē ʻa e finangalo ʻo e ʻOtuá, he naʻe papitaiso kinautolu ‘e Sione.
Ka ko e kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, naʻe ʻikai te nau tali ʻa e finangalo ʻo e ʻOtuá, he na‘e ʻikai te nau tali ke papitaiso kinautolu ‘e Sione.
‟Ka ko e hā te u fakatatau ki ai ʻa e kakai ʻo e toʻutangata ko ʻeni̇́? ʻOku nau hangē nai ko e hā?
ʻOku nau hangē ko ha longa‘i fānau ‘oku fakamuna ʻi ha māketi mo feui ʻaki, ʻo pehē:
He na‘e ʻikai ke faʻa kai fakaafe ʻa Sione, pē inu kava mālohi, pea mou lau ʻekimautolu, ‛Kuo puke ia ‘e ha tēvolo!’
Pea haʻu ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangata ʻo kai fakaafe mo inu kava mālohi, pea mou lau ʻekimautolu, ‛Ko e tangata faʻa kai mo faʻa konā, pea ko e kaungāmeʻa ʻo e kau tānaki tukuhaú mo e kau angahalá!’
Kaekehe, ‘oku hā tonuhia ʻa Potó ʻi he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ‘oku fai ‘e he faʻahinga ‘oku kau mo iá.”
Pea na‘e fakaafe‘i ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘e ha Fālesi ke na ma‘u me‘atokoni ʻi hono ‘api̇́, ko ia naʻe ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he ʻapi ʻo e Fālesi̇́ ʻo nofo hifo ai ke ma‘u me‘atokoni.

Pea tā naʻe ʻi ai ha fefine, ko e taha ʻo e kau angahala ʻo e koló, pea kuó ne ʻilo ʻa e afe ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he ʻapi ʻo e Fālesi̇́. Ko ia, na‘e haʻu ʻa e fefiné mo ha fo‘i hina naʻe fonu ʻi he lolo ʻalapasita mahu‘inga;

Pea naʻe ha‘u ʻo tu‘u he veʻe vaʻe ʻo Sīsuú, ʻo tangi ai, pea ʻi heʻene tangi̇́ naʻe ngangana hono loʻimatá he va‘e ʻo Si̇̄suú pea naʻe holoholoʻi ʻaki ia hono lou‘ulú, ʻo ne toutou ‘uma ki he va‘e ʻo Si̇̄suú mo tākai ʻaki ia ʻa e loló.

Pea ʻi he mamata ki ai ʻa e Fālesi naʻá ne fakaafe‘i ʻa Sīsuú, naʻá ne pehē ʻi hono lotó: ‟Kapau ko ha palōfita mo‘oni ʻa e tangatá ni, naʻá ne ʻilo ʻa e toko taha ʻoku ala kiate iá; naʻá ne ʻilo hono ʻulungaanga ʻo e fefine ʻoku ala kiate iá, he ko e fefine angahala ia.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he Fālesi̇́: ‟Saimone! ‘Oku ʻi ai ʻa e meʻa ‘oku ou fie lea atu ai kiate koe.” Pea pehē ange ‘e Saimone: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ‘okú ke tokanga mai ki ai̇́, Tangata‘eiki?”

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Na‘e ʻi ai ha ongo tangata naʻá na moʻua pa‘anga ki ha motuʻa naʻá na nō mei ai. Ko e mo‘ua ʻo e toko taha, ko e paʻanga siliva ʻe nimangeau, pea nima ngofulu ʻa e mo‘ua ʻo e tangata ʻe tahá.
Ka na‘e ʻikai te na lava ʻo totongi hona mo‘uá, ko ia naʻe tāmate‘i ai pē ‘e he motuʻá, hona mo‘uá fakatouʻosi. ʻOkú ke pehē ko hai ʻi he ongo meʻá ‘e lahi ange ʻene ‘ofa ki he motuʻá?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Saimone: ‟Mahalo ko e toko taha na‘e lahi ange hono moʻua naʻe tāmateʻi̇́.” Pea pehēange ʻe Si̇̄sū: ‟Tonu hoʻo tali.”

Pea naʻe tafoki ʻo hanga ki he fefiné, mo ne pehēange kia Saimone: ‟ʻOkú ke tokanga‘i ʻa siʻi fefiné ni? Naʻá ku hū mai ki ho falé, ka na‘e ʻikai te ke ‘omi ha me‘i vai ke fufulu ʻaki hoku va‘é, ka kuo fufulu ‘e he fefiné ni hoku va‘é, ʻaki hono lo‘imatá, mo holoholo ʻaki hono lou‘ulú.
Na‘e ʻikai te ke ‘uma fakafe‘iloaki mai kiate au, ka ko siʻi fefiné ni, talu ʻeku hū mai, kuo teʻeki ke tuku ʻene ʻuma ki hoku va‘é.
Na‘e ʻikai foki te ke pani lolo hoku ‘ulú, ka ko siʻi fefiné ni, kuó ne tākai hoku va‘é ʻaki ʻa e lolo mahu‘inga.

Ko ia, ‘oku ou talaatu kiate koe, ko e ngaahi angahala kotoa pē ʻa e fefiné ni, kuo fakamolemole‘i. Pea ko e ‘uhinga ia ‘oku lahi pehē ai ʻene ‘ofá. Ka ko ia kuo fakamolemole‘i he meʻa si‘isi‘i, ‘e si‘isi‘i pē ʻene ‘ofá.”
Pea toki pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he fefiné: ‟Ko ho‘o ngaahi angahalá, kuo ‘osi fakamolemole‘i.”
Pea kamata felāuaki ai ʻa e kau fakaafe kehé: ‟ʻOku pehē nai ʻe he tangatá ni ko hai ia, ke ne fakamolemole angahalá!”
Pea toe pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he fefiné: ‟Kuo fakamo‘ui koe koe‘uhi̇́ ko ho‘o tui̇́. ʻAlu ʻo fiemālie ā!”

8.text: Pea fuoloa si‘i pē mei ai, pea ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he ngaahi kolo lalahi̇́ mo e ngaahi kolo iiki̇́ ʻo malanga‘i ai ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei ʻo kau ki he Pule‘anga ʻo e ‘Otuá. Pea naʻa ne fononga holo ai pē mo ʻene kau ʻApositolo ‘e toko hongofulu mā uá;
Pea naʻe ai foki mo ha kau fefine naʻá ne kapusi mei ai ha fanga tēvolo mo fakamo‘ui honau ngaahi alanga mahaki: Ko Mele Mākitala, ʻa ia naʻe kapusi meiate ia ‘e Si̇̄sū ha tēvolo ʻe fitu.
Peá mo Sōana foki, ko e mali ʻo Kusá, ʻa ia naʻe pule ki he koloa ʻa Hēlotá; ko Sūsana, pea mo ha kau fefine kehe, naʻa nau tokoni‘i ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó, ʻaki ʻa e koloa naʻa nau maʻú.
Pea na‘e holo mai kia Si̇̄sū ha tokolahi mei he ngaahi kolo kotoa pē, pea naʻe fai kiate kinautolu ʻa e talanoa ko ʻeni̇́:
‟Na‘e ʻalu atu ha tangata ngoue ke laku ʻene pulopula. Pea ʻi heʻene lakú, naʻe ngangana ʻa e pulopula ‘e ni‘ihi he veʻehalá, pea tā moloki ia ʻe he kakai̇́, mo kai ‘e he fanga manupuná.
Pea ngangana ʻa e pulopula ‘e ni‘ihi ki he kelekele makamaká, pea kamata tupu hake ia, ka ko e meʻa ʻi he si‘isi‘i ai ʻa e vai̇́, naʻe toe mae hifo ai pē ʻa e pulopula ko iā.
Pea ngangana ʻa e pulopula ‘e ni‘ihi he pota vao talatala. Pea tupu fakataha hake ai pē ʻa e vao talatalá mo e pulopula ko iā ʻo malumalungia ai ʻa e pulopula lelei̇́.

Ka na‘e ngangana ʻa e pulopula ‘e ni‘ihi ki he kelekele lelei, pea na‘e tupu hake ʻa e pulopula ko iā ʻo fua teau.” Pea naʻe toki pehēange ki he kakaí: ‟Ko kimoutolu ‘oku lava ʻo fanongó, pea mou fanongo lelei mai!”
Pea na‘e toki fehuʻi ange ‘e he kau akó kia Si̇̄sū ʻa e ‘uhinga ʻo e talanoa ki he pulopulá.

Pea naʻe pehēange: ‟Kuó u ‘osi fakamahino atu kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻafufū ʻo e Pule‘anga ʻo e ‘Otuá, ka ki he kakai kehé, ʻoku ou fai ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi talanoa fakatātā koeʻuhi̇̄ ke nau sio mai, kae ʻikai ke nau fakatokanga‘i ha meʻa, pea nau fanongo mai, kae ʻikai ke nau ongo‘i ha meʻa.”
Ko e ‘uhinga leva ʻeni ʻo e talanoá: Ko e pulopulá, ko e Folofola ia ʻa e ‘Otuá.
Pea ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana he veʻehalá, ko e kakai ia kuo nau fanongo ki he Folofolá, pea ‘oku ha‘u ʻa e tēvoló ʻo fa‘ao ʻa e Folofolá mei honau lotó, naʻa faifai ka nau tui ki ai ʻo mo‘ui.

Ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana ki he kelekele makamaká, ko e kakai ia naʻa nau fanongo fiefia ki he Folofolá, pea nau tali, ka ko e meʻa ʻi he ʻikai ke aka loloto ʻi he‘enau mo‘ui̇́, ko ia ʻoku fuonounou pē ʻenau tui̇́ peá ka hokosia ha ʻahiʻahi pea ʻoku nau holomui leva.

Pea ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana he pota vao talatalá, ko e kakai mo kinautolu kuo nau fanongo ki he Folofolá, ka koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e lahi ʻenau tokanga ki he koloá mo e ngaahi mālie ʻo māmani̇́, pea ko ia ai ʻoku ʻikai ke motuʻa honau fuá.

Ka ko e pulopula na‘e ngangana he kelekele lelei̇́, ko e kakai ia kuo nau fanongo ki he Folofolá, pea nau puke loto lelei ia mo loto maʻa, pea ko e meʻa ʻi heʻenau faʻa kātaki̇́, ʻoku fua lelei ʻa e Folofolá ʻi he‘enau mo‘ui̇́.

‘E ʻikai faifai angé pea tutu ‘e ha taha ha maama ʻo fakapūlou‘i ʻaki ha puha, pē te ne ‘ave ʻo fokotu‘u ʻi ha lalo mohenga. Ko e māamá, ke tutu ʻo fokotu‘u ki ha tu‘unga maamá, koe‘uhi̇̄ ʻoka hū mai ha taha ki lotofale, ‘okú naʻe maamangia ai.
He ko e meʻa kotoa pē kuo fufuú, kuo pau ke hā. Pea ko e fakapulipuli kotoa pē, kuo pau ke ʻilo.

‟Ko ia, mou tokanga lelei ki he anga ho‘omou fanongó! ʻIlonga ha taha ‘oku ʻi ai ha‘ane meʻa ‘oku ma‘u, ‘e toe ‘oange ki ai mo ha meʻa. Pea ʻilonga ha taha ‘oku hala mo ha meʻa, naʻá mo ʻene ki‘i meʻa ‘oku ma‘ú, ‘e fa‘ao mo ia meiate ia.”
Pea na‘e kumi mai kia Si̇̄sū ʻa ʻene fa‘eé mo hono ngaahi tokouá, ka na‘e fu‘u tokolahi ʻa e kakai̇́, ʻo nau fiu feinga ai ke aʻu mai kiate ia.
Pea pehēange ‘e ha toko taha kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko ho‘o fa‘eé ē ʻi tuʻa, mo ho ngaahi tokouá. ‘Oku nau fie feʻiloaki mo koe.”
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko ʻeku fa‘eé mo hoku ngaahi tokouá ʻa e kakai kuo fanongo ki he Folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá pea talangofua ki ai.”
Pea ko e ʻaho ʻe taha, naʻá ne heka ʻi ha vaka mo ʻene kau akó pea naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟Tau folau ki he kauvai̇́.” Pea nau tuku folau atu.
Pea lolotonga ʻenau folaú, pea tō hifo ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo mohe. Fakafokitā naʻe tō mai ha ʻahiohio ki he tahi̇́, pea kamata ke ngoto ʻa e vaká, pea kuo nau mei tuʻutāmaki.

Pea feinga ʻa e kau akó ke fafangu ʻo Si̇̄sū mo nau kaikaila: ‟Tangata‘eiki! Tangata‘eiki! Te tau ‘auha!” Pea malanga hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo fekau ʻa e matangi̇́ mo e tahi̇́ ke nonga. Pea na‘e tuku ai ʻa e hou ʻa e tahi̇́, ʻo tofu ʻa e meʻa kotoa.

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó: ‟Kuo hā ho‘omou tui̇́?” Pea naʻa nau manavahē ‘aupito mo ‘ohovale, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Ko hai nai ʻa e tangatá ni? He ʻoku fakaongo ʻa e tahi̇́ mo e matangi̇́ ki heʻene fekaú!”
Pea na‘e tau atu ʻa e folau ʻa Si̇̄suú mo ʻene kau akó ki he fonua ʻo e kau Kelasini̇́, ʻa ē ʻoku hanga mai ki Kāleli̇́, mei he kauvai ʻe tahá.

Pea ʻi he hifo atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ‘utá, naʻe fakafetaulaki mai ha tangata mei he koló, ʻa ia na‘e ma‘u ‘e ha tēvolo. Pea kuo fuoloa mai mo e ʻikai ke ne toe tui hano vala, pē nofo ʻi ha fale, kae nofo holo pē ʻi he ngaahi fa‘itoká.

Pea ʻi he sio atu ʻa e tangatá kia Sīsuú, naʻá ne kekē, ʻo ne tō tū‘ulutui atu kia Si̇̄sū mo kaila: ‟‘E Si̇̄sū! ʻAlo ʻo e ‘Otua ʻo Langi̇́! Ko e hā ‘okú ke tokanga mai ai kiate aú? ‘Oua muʻa te ke fakamamahi‘i au!”

Naʻá ne lea peheé, he kuo ‘osi fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e tēvoló, ke mavahe meiate ia. He kuo tā tu‘o lahi ʻa e faʻa ‘ohofi ʻo e tangatá ni ‘e he tēvoló. Peá neongo hono faʻa ha‘i sēini he nima mo e va‘e, mo le‘ohi ia, ka naʻe laiki pē ‘e ia ʻa e meʻa kotoa, pea toki takilele atu ia ‘e he tēvoló ki he ngaahi feitu‘u toafá.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he tangatá: ‟Ko hai ho hingoá?” Pea naʻe tali mai: ‟Ko Kongakau au!” He ko e fanga tēvolo tokolahi naʻa nau ma‘u iá.
Pea naʻa nau kole fakamātoato kia Si̇̄sū ke ‘oua muʻa te ne kapusi kinautolu ki Lalofonuá.
Pea naʻe huohua ha fanga puaka he tafatafa mo‘unga ofi mai̇́. Pea kole ange ʻe he fanga tēvoló kia Si̇̄sū ke tukuange muʻa ke nau hū he fanga puaká, pea naʻá ne fakangofua kinautolu.
Pea nau mahu‘i mai leva mei he tangatá ʻo hū he fanga puaká. Pea ‘oho ai ʻa e fanga puaká ʻo nau felelei hifo he tahifohifó ki tahi, ʻo ngangana ai pē ki ai ʻo melemo.
Pea ʻi he sio ki ai ʻa e kau tauhi puaká, naʻa nau felelei atu ki he koló mo e ngaahi nofo vaó, ʻo tala ki he kakai̇ ʻi he koló mo e feituʻu ʻutá, ʻa e meʻa kuo hokó.

Pea toki fakaholo mai ʻa e kakai̇́ ke mamata ki he meʻa kuo hokó. Pea ʻi heʻenau aʻu mai kia Sīsuú, naʻa nau ʻilo ai ʻa e tangatá, kuo mavahe mei ai ʻa e fanga tēvoló, pea kuó ne ta‘utu he tafatafa ʻaki ʻo Si̇̄suú kuo ʻosi tui hono valá pea kuo ʻatamai lelei. Pea na‘e manavahē ‘aupito ai ʻa e kakai̇́.
Pea ko e kakai na‘e sio tonu he fakamo‘ui ʻo e tangatá, naʻa nau talanoa ange ki he faʻahinga na‘e toki aʻu mai̇́, ʻa e anga hono fakamoʻui̇́.

Pea kole ange leva ʻe he kakai ʻo e ngaahi feituʻu kotoa ʻo Kelasini̇́ kia Si̇̄sū, ke ʻalu atu muʻa mei honau fonuá, he naʻa nau fu‘u manavahē ‘aupito. Pea heka leva ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he vaká ke tuku folau atú,
Ka naʻe kole ange ‘e he tangata na‘e fakamo‘ui̇́ ke nau ō muʻa mo ia. Kae fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai ke foki, ʻo ne pehēange,

‟Foki koe ki ʻapi ʻo tala ki he kakai kotoa pē ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo fai ‘e he ‘Otuá ma‘aú.” Ko ia, naʻe ʻalu ʻa e tangatá ki he tukui koló kotoa, ʻo talanoa holo ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ma‘aná.
Pea kuo tatali ʻa e kakai kotoa pē he kauvai̇ ʻe tahá ke aʻu ange ʻa Si̇̄sū. Ko ia, ʻi he tū‘uta atu ʻa e folaú, naʻe talitali fiefia ia ‘e ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi.

Pea ʻiloangé kuo aʻu mai ʻa e tangata naʻá ne tauhi ʻa e falelotu ʻo e kakai Siú, he feitu‘u ko iá, ko hono hingoá ko Sailosi, ʻo ne tō tū‘ulutui atu kia Si̇̄sū ʻo kole fakamātoato ke ne ʻalu ange muʻa ki hono ‘api̇́.
He ko hono kiʻi ʻōfefine, ʻa ia naʻe toko taha pē, pea naʻe ta‘u hongofulumāua, ka kuo mei mate. Pea ʻi he fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū he halá, naʻe feta‘ota‘omi mai kiate ia ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi.

Pea tā naʻe ʻi ai siʻa fefine he kakai na‘e feta‘ota‘omi mai kia Sīsuú, kuo fe‘unga mo ha ta‘u ‘e hongofulumāua ʻene puke he ‘au totó. Pea kuo ‘osi‘osingamālie ʻene pa‘angá hono totongi ʻa e kau fai faito‘ó, mo e ʻikai pē ke sai.
Pea tutui mai siʻi fefiné he tuʻa ʻo Si̇̄suú ʻo ala ki he tapa hono kofú, pea fakafokifā naʻe matu‘u ai pē ʻene ‘au totó.

Pea pehē mai ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko hai na‘e ala mai kiate aú?” Ka naʻe ʻikai ha taha te ne fakahā mai ko ia. Pea lea ange ai ʻa Pita kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Tangata‘eiki! Kuo feteketekeʻi mai ʻa e kakai̇́ kiate koe mo pā atu mei he tafa‘aki kotoa pē!”
Kae pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Na‘e ʻi ai pē ʻa e toko taha na‘e ala kiate au. He naʻá ku ongo‘i ‘oku tafe atu ha ivi fakamo‘ui meiate au.”

Pea ʻi he mahino ki he fefiné he‘ikai te ne lava ʻo fufuu‘i ʻa e meʻa naʻá ne fai̇́, naʻá ne haʻu tetetete ki muʻa ʻo tō tū‘ulutui atu kia Si̇̄sū, pea naʻe toki fakamatalaange kiate kinautolu kotoa ʻa e ‘uhinga ʻo ʻene ala kia Sīsuú, pea mo e mo‘ui fakafokifā ai hono alanga mahaki̇́.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Fefine, ko ho‘o tui̇́ kuó ke mo‘ui ai̇́. ʻAlu ʻo fiemālie ā!”
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei lea ʻa Sīsuú, mo e aʻu mai ha taha mei he ʻapi ʻo Sailosi̇́ ʻo talaange kia Sailosi: ‟Kuo pekia ho ‘ōfefiné! ‘Oua te ke toe fakahoha‘asi e Tangata‘eiki̇́!”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ʻa Sīsuú, naʻá ne pehēange kia Sailosi: ‟‘Oua te ke lotosi‘i! Tui pē koe, pea ‘e mo‘ui ai ho ‘ōfefiné.”
Pea ʻi he aʻu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he ‘api̇́, na‘e ʻikai te ne tali ke hū atu ha taha mo ia, tukukehe pē ʻa Pita mo Sione mo Sēmisi, pea mo e ongo mātuʻa ʻa e ki‘i taʻahiné.
Pea kuo fetāngihi ʻa e kakai kotoa pē koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ki‘i taʻahiné. Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Tuku ho‘omou tangi̇́, he ‘oku ʻikai mate ʻa e ki‘i taʻahiné, ka ʻoku mohe pē ia.”
Pea kata manuki kiate ia ‘e he kakai̇́, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻenau fakakaukau kuo ‘osi mate ʻa e ki‘i taʻahiné.
Ka naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he ki‘i taʻahiné mo ne ala atu ʻo puke hono nimá, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Taʻahine, tu‘u hake!”
Pea toe mo‘ui ai pē ʻa e ki‘i taʻahiné, ʻo ta‘utu hake. Pea fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ke ‘oange ha me‘atokoni ke ne kai.
Pea ‘ohovale ‘aupito ai ʻa e ongo mātuʻa ʻa e ki‘i taʻahiné. Ka na‘e fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ke ‘oua te na talanoa ki ha taha ʻa e meʻa kuo hokó.

9.text: Pea ʻi he ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene toko hongofulu mā uá, naʻá ne fakamafai‘i kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e mālohi kotoa pē ke nau kapusi tēvolo mo fakamo‘ui mahaki.
Pea naʻe toki fekau atu kinautolu ke nau ō ‘o malanga‘i ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá mo fakamo‘ui ʻa e kau mahakiʻiá.
Pea naʻe talaange kiate kinautolu: ‟Vakai naʻa mou ‘ave ha meʻa ki hoʻomou fonongá! ‘Oua ‘e to‘o ha tokotoko, pē ko ha kato ‘oho, pē ko ha pa‘anga, pē vala fetongi.
Kapau ʻe talitali lelei kimoutolu ‘e ha ʻapi, pea mou nofo pē ai ‘o aʻu ki ho‘omou hiki mei he kolo ko iá.
Pea kapau leva ‘e ʻikai ke talitali lelei kimoutolu ‘e he kakai ‘o ha kolo, pea mou tūtuu‘i ʻa e efu ‘o e kolo ko iá mei homou va‘é ko e fakamoʻoni ʻo ʻenau taʻetui̇́.”
Pea mātuku atu ʻa e kau ʻApositoló, ‘o malanga‘i ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei̇́ ʻo fai mei he ki he kolo ki he kolo, he feitu‘u kotoa pē, mo fakamo‘ui ʻa e kau mahakiʻiá.

Pea naʻe aʻu mai ki he tu‘i ko Hēlotá, ʻa e ongoongo ‘o kau ki he ngaahi meʻa kuo hokó, pea hohaʻa lahi ai hono lotó, he na‘e ʻi ai ʻa e ni‘ihi naʻa pehē: ‟Ko Sione Papitaiso ʻeni kuo toetu‘u mei he maté.”
Pea ai foki mo ha ni‘ihi naʻa nau pehē: ‟Ko ʻIlaisiā ʻeni kuo toefoki mai,” pē ‟Ko e taha ʻeni he kau palōfita ʻo e kuonga muʻá kuo toe mo‘ui.”
Pea pehē ai ‘e Hēlota: ‟Ko hai nai ia ‘oku fai ki ai ʻa e ngaahi lau ko ʻeni̇́? He naʻá ku ‘osi tu‘usi ʻa e ‘ulu ‘o Sioné!” Pea ko ia, naʻe feinga ʻa Hēlota ke fe‘iloaki mo Si̇̄sū.

Pea ʻi he foki mai ʻa e kau ʻApositoló ‘o fakamatala kia Si̇̄sū ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa naʻá nau fai̇́, na‘e ʻave kinautolu ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻo ne taki atu ki he kolo ko Petesaitá, ke ai hanau taimi fakaekinautolu pē.

Ka naʻe ʻilo ‘e he tokolahi ʻenau oó, ʻo nau muimui atu. Pea na‘e talitali lelei pē ‘e Si̇̄sū kinautolu, ʻo ne malanga‘i kiate kinautolu ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá, mo fakamo‘ui ʻa e faʻahinga ‘iate kinautolu na‘e mahakiʻiá.

Pea kuo mei tō ʻa e laʻaá, pea ‘unu‘unu mai ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá kia Si̇̄sū ‘o talaange: ‟Fekau ʻa e kakai̇́ ke ō ki he ngaahi koló mo e ngaahi ʻapi ‘uta ofi mai̇́ ‘o kumi ha feitu‘u ke nau mālōlō ai, mo ha meʻa ke nau kai, he ʻoku ʻikai ha meʻa ‘e ma‘u heni, he ko e feituʻu toafa ʻeni ʻoku tau ʻi ai̇́!”

Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou ‘oange ʻekimoutolu ha meʻa ke nau kai!” Pea nau tali ʻo pehē: ‟Ko meʻa pē ‘oku mau ma‘ú, ko ha fo‘i mā ‘e nima mo e ongo mata‘i ika ‘e ua, tukukehe ‘okapau te mau ō ‘o fakatau mai ha meʻakai ke feʻunga mo e fuʻu kakai̇́ ni.”
