He na‘e ʻi he toko nima afe ʻa e tokolahi ‘o e kakai tangatá, ʻo ʻikai lau ki ai ʻa e kakai fefiné mo e fānaú. Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó: ‟Fekau ʻa e kakai̇́ ke nau nofo tautau toko nima ngofulu.”
Pea naʻe fai pehē ʻe he kau akó, ʻenau fakanofonofo ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.

Pea to‘o leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e fo‘i mā ‘e nimá mo e ongo mata‘i ika ‘e uá, ʻo ne hanga hake ki he langi̇́ ‘o tāpuaki‘i. Pea naʻe toki pakipaki ʻa e maá mo e iká ‘o ‘oange ki he kau akó ke nau tufotufa ki he kakai̇́.
Pea nau kai kātoa pē ‘o mākona. Pea na‘e tānaki ʻe he kau akó, ʻo fonu ha ngaahi kato ‘e hongofulumāua, he toenga me‘akai̇́.
Pea ʻoku pehē naʻe mavahe atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o fai ʻene lotu, pea kuo aʻu mai ʻene kau akó, naʻá ne fehu‘i ange kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e lau ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘o kau kiate aú?”
Pea nau talaange: ‟Ko e lau ʻa e kakai ʻe niʻihi, ko Sione Papitaiso koe, pea ko e niʻihi, ko ʻIlaisiā, pē ko ha palōfita he kuonga muʻá kuo toetu‘u mei he maté.”
Pea toki fehu‘i ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ka ko hai au, ʻi hoʻomou laú?” Pea tali ‘e Pita: ‟Ko e Mi̇̄saia koe ʻa e ʻOtuá.”
Pea na‘e fakatokanga leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻene kau akó ke ‘oua ‘aupito te nau toe talanoa ki ha taha ʻa e meʻa ko iā.

Na‘e pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó: ‟Kuo pau ke fakamamahi‘i lahi mo fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ‘e he kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú, mo e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́, mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, pea te nau tāmate‘i ia, ka te ne toetu‘u ʻe ia mei he maté, ʻi hono ʻaho tolú.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai kotoa: ‟Ka ai ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e fie muimui mai kiate au, kuo pau ke tuku hono lotó, peá ke ne fua hono kolosi̇́ he ʻaho kotoa pē ‘o muimui mai kiate au.
He ʻilonga ʻa ia ʻe holi ke fakahaofi ʻene mo‘ui̇́, ko ʻene tukuange ia ke molé. Kae ʻilonga ʻa ia te ne tali ke mole ʻene mo‘ui̇́ koe‘uhi̇̄ ko aú, ko ʻene fakahaofi ia ʻene mo‘ui̇́.
He ko e hā hano ʻaonga ki ha taha ke ne ma‘u ʻa māmani kātoa maʻana, kae mole ai ʻene mo‘ui̇́?

He ko ia te ne māa‘i au mo ʻeku ngaahi akonaki̇́, ‘e māa‘i ʻa e taha ko iā ‘e he Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻi ha‘ane hā‘ele mai mo hono lāngilangi̇́, mo e lāngilangi ‘o ʻene Tamai̇́, mo e lāngilangi ‘o e kau ʻāngelo mā‘oni‘oni̇́.
Ka ‘oku ou tala mo‘oni atu, ‘oku ʻi ai ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kimoutolu ʻoku tuʻu hená, ʻa ia ‘e ʻikai te nau mate kae‘oua kuo nau mamata ki he pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
Pea hili mei ai ha ʻaho ‘e valu nai, pea ʻohake ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻa Pita mo Sione mo Sēmisi ki ha mo‘unga, ʻo nau ʻalu hake ke fai haʻanau lotu.
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei fai ʻene lotú, kuo liliu hono fofongá, pea ko hono kofú naʻe huhulu ‘o hangē ha māamá.
Pea fakafokifā kuo ʻasi mai ha ongo tangata ʻe toko ua, ʻa ia ko Mōsese mo ʻIlaisiā.
Pea ‘okú na fotu mai mo hona nāunau fakalangi̇́ ʻo femeʻaʻaki mo Si̇̄sū. Ko ʻenau talanoá ki he ‘uhinga ‘o e pekia ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻa ia ʻoku teu ke fai ʻi Selusalemá.
Ka ko Pita mo e toko ua ko eé, naʻa nau fetūleaki ʻo meimei mohe, pea ʻi heʻenau ʻāʻā lelei haké, naʻa nau mamata ki he lāngilangi ‘o Sīsuú, pea nau fakatokanga‘i mo e ongo tangata ‘oku tutu‘u mo iá.

Pea ʻi he kamata mavahe atu ʻa Mōsese mo ʻIlaisiā, naʻe pehēange ‘e Pita kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Tangata‘eiki! Tuku muʻa ke mau ngaohi ha kiʻi palepale ‘e tolu, ko e taha mo‘ou, pea taha mo‘o Mōsese, pea taha mo‘o ʻIlaisiā.” Ka na‘e ʻikai ke mahino kia Pita ʻa e meʻa naʻá ne lea‘aki̇́.
Pea lolotonga pē ʻa e kei lea ʻa Pitá, kuo fakamalumalu kinautolu ʻe ha konga ʻao, pea naʻa nau manavahē ‘aupito ʻi heʻenau hū atu ki he loto ʻaó.
Pea ongo mei he loto ʻaó ha le‘o ‘oku pehē mai: ‟Ko hoku Foha ʻena kuo u fili̇́! Mou fakaongoongo kiate ia!”
Pea ʻi heʻene longo pē ʻa e le‘ó, ko Si̇̄sū pē ‘oku kei ʻiloa mai̇́. Pea fuoloa ‘aupito mei ai, pea toki lea‘aki ‘e Pita mo Sione mo Sēmisi ʻa e meʻa naʻá nau mamata ki ai̇́.
Pea ʻoku pehē ʻi he ʻaho hono hokó, ʻi he hifo mai ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he funga mo‘ungá, na‘e fakafetaulaki atu ki ai ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi.
Pea ʻiloangé naʻe kaila mai ha tangata mei he kakai̇́: ‟Tangata‘eiki! Anga‘ofa muʻa ‘o tokoni mai ki hoku ki‘i fohá, he ko hoku fohá pē ia ʻe taha.

‘Oku faʻa ‘ohofi ia ‘e ha tēvolo, ‘o naʻe si‘i valevalelau ai. Pea ‘oku faʻa tetetete ‘o aʻu ki he koá hono ngutú. Pea ‘oku toki faʻa mavahe ʻa e tēvoló mei ai kuo ‘osi‘osingamālie ʻa e ivi ‘o e tamasi‘i̇́.
Naʻá ku kole fakamātoato ange ki ho‘o kau akó ke nau kapusi ʻa e tēvoló meiate ia, ka na‘e ʻikai te nau lava.”

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟He toki kakai ongongataʻa mo taʻe tui kimoutolu! Te u nofo ai pē mo kimoutolú ke aʻu ki fē? ʻE ngata ʻafē ʻeku kātaki‘i kimoutolú?” Pea toki pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he tangatá: ‟Taki mai ho fohá ki heni.”

Pea lolotonga hono kei taki atu ʻo e tamasi‘i̇́, kuo ‘ohofi ia ‘e he tēvoló ‘o ha‘aki ki lalo ‘o si‘i tetetete ai. Ka naʻe ta‘ofi ‘e Si̇̄sū e tēvoló, pea naʻe toki fakamo‘ui e tamasi‘i̇́, ‘o fakafoki ange ki he‘ene tamai̇́.
Pea naʻe mātuʻaki ofo kātoa ai ʻa e kakai̇́ ʻi he fu‘u ivi ‘o e ‘Otuá kuo nau mātā.
‟Mou tokanga mai ki he meʻa ko ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú: He ‘oku teu ke tukuange ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ke fa‘iteliha ki ai hono ngaahi fili̇́.”

Ka na‘e ʻikai ke mahino ki he kau akó ʻa e ‘uhinga ‘o ʻene laú. He naʻe fufū ia meiate kinautolu, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ʻoua naʻa mahu‘ingamālie kiate kinautolu ʻene laú, pea naʻa nau ilifia foki ke feingaʻi ke mahino kiate kinautolu.
Pea na‘e hoko ha felāuaki ʻa e kau akó pē ko hai ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku tuʻukimuʻá.
Pea ʻi he ʻiloʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e anga ‘o ʻenau fakakaukaú, naʻá ne puke mai ha ki‘i tamasi‘i, ‘o fokotu‘u ʻi hono tafa‘aki̇́.

Pea naʻe toki pehēange ki he kau akó: ‟Ka ai ha taha te ne tali ʻa e ki‘i tamasi‘i̇́ ni koe‘uhi̇̄ ko au, ko ʻene tali ia au. Peá ka tali ‘e ha taha au, ko ʻene tali ia ʻa e Toko Taha naʻa nefekau ke u ha‘u ki māmani. Ko ia ‘e fakatōkilalo ‘iate kimoutolú, ko ia ia ‘e hoko ko homou tuʻukimuʻá.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Sione kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Tangata‘eiki, naʻa mau sio ki ha taha ‘okú naʻe kapusi tēvolo ʻaki ho hingoá, pea mau ta‘ofi ia. He ‘oku ʻikai ke ne kau mo kitautolu.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oua te mou ta‘ofi ia! He ko ia ‘oku ʻikai ke fakafepaki kiate kimoutolú, ‘oku kau ia mo kimoutolu.”
Pea hoko ʻo pehē: naʻe panaki ʻa e ngaahi ʻaho ke ‘ohake ai ʻa Si̇̄sū mei māmani̇́, pea naʻe fakapapau‘i hono lotó ʻo hanga hono fofongá, ke fononga ki Selusalema;
Pea naʻe fekau ha kau talafekau ke nau muʻomuʻa atu ki ha kolo ʻi Samēlia, ‘o teuteu ki ha‘ane aʻu atu.
Ka na‘e ʻikai ke tali ia ‘e he kakai ‘o e koló, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e taumuʻa ʻa e fononga ʻa Sīsuú, ki Selusalema.
Pea ʻi he mamata ki ai ʻa e toko ua he‘ene kau akó, ʻa Sione mo Sēmisi, naʻá na talaange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟ʻEiki! ‘Okú ke loto ke ma kole ke ʻalu hifo ha afi mei langi ‘o faka‘auha ʻa e kakai̇́ ni?”
Ka na‘e hanga ʻe Si̇̄sū ‘o taʻofi kinaua.
Pea afe leva ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ki ha kolo ‘e taha.
Pea lolotonga ʻenau kei fononga atu he halá, kuo pehēange ‘e he toko taha kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko e fē pē ha feitu‘u te ke ʻalu ki ai, te u muimui ai pē kiate koe.”

Ka naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟Naʻa mo e fanga fōkisi̇́ ‘oku ʻi ai pē honau nofo‘anga, pea ko e fanga manupuná, ‘oku ʻi ai honau pununga, ka ko e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, ‘oku ʻikai ha feitu‘u ke ne nofo ai.”
Pea folofola ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ha toko taha kehe: ‟Haʻu ʻo muimui kiate au.” Kae pehēange ‘e he toko taha ko iā kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Tuku muʻa, ʻEiki, ke u tomuʻa ʻalu ‘o tanu si‘eku tangata‘eiki̇́.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Tuku ʻa e kau maté ke nau tokanga‘i ʻenau kau maté, ka ke ʻalu koe ‘o malanga‘i ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
Pea toe pehēange ‘e he toko taha kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Te u muimui kiate koe, kae tuku mai muʻa ke u ‘uluaki ʻalu ‘o fakamāvae mo homau ‘api̇́.”
Kae tali ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟Ko ia ‘oku ala ki he kau ‘o e palaú mo toe fakasio ki mui̇́, ‘oku ʻikai taau ia mo e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”

10.text: Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, pea fili ‘e he ʻEiki̇́, haʻane kau ako ‘e toko fitungofulu mā ua kehe, ʻo ne fekau ke nau tautau toko ua ʻo muʻomuʻa atu ʻiate ia, ki he ngaahi koló pea mo e ngaahi feitu‘u, na‘e ʻamanaki ke ne fou atu ai̇́.
Pea naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟Kuo ‘osi lahi ʻa e ta‘u ke utu, ka ‘oku kaungatāmaki ʻa e kau utú. Mou kole ki he ʻEiki ‘oku ʻaʻana ʻa e ta‘ú, ke fakatokolahi mai ʻa e kau ngāue ke utu hono taʻú.
Mou ʻalu atu. Ko eni, ʻoku ou fekau atu kimoutolu ke mou hangē ha fanga lami he lotolotonga ‘o ha fanga ulofi̇́.
ʻOua naʻa mou to‘o ha kato pa‘anga, pē ko ha kato meʻakai, pē ko ha sū. Pea ‘oua te mou toe fepōpoaki ʻaki mo ha taha he halá.
ʻOka moú ka afe ki ha ʻapi, pea mou tomuʻa fai atu ki ai ʻa e lea ko eni̇́, ‛Ke tāpuaki‘i mai ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e ‘api̇́ ni.’
Pea kapau ko e kakai ʻo e ʻapi ko iā ko e faʻahinga ‘oku mo‘ui ʻaki ʻa e melinó, pea ‘e tāpuaki‘i kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otuá. Pea kapau ‘oku ʻikai, pea ‘e toe foki atu pē ʻa e tāpuaki̇́ kiate kimoutolu.
Pea mou nofo pē ʻi he ʻapi ko iā, ʻo kai mo inu ai he meʻa ‘oku nau ma‘ú. He ‘oku taau ke maʻu ʻe he taha ngāué, ʻene totongi̇́. ʻOua naʻa mou hikihiki holo he tukui ‘api̇́.
Pea kapau te mou aʻu atu ki ha kolo pea talitali lelei ai kimoutolu ‘e ha ʻapi ʻi he koló, pea mou kai pē ʻa e meʻakai te nau ʻoatú.
Pea mou fakamo‘ui ha faʻahinga ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku mahakiʻia, pea mou tala kiate kinautolu, ‛Kuo vave pē ke hoko mai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.’
Pea kapau te mou hūatu ki ha kolo, pea ʻikai ke talitali lelei ai kimoutolu, pea mou ʻalu atu ki honau ngaahi halá, ʻo mou pehē:
‛Naʻa mo e efu kuo pipiki homau va‘é, ‘oku mau tuʻu‘i atu heni, ko e fakaʻilonga kiate kimoutolu. He ‘oku mau fakapapau atu: Kuo vave pē ke hoko mai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá!’
Ko ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatu, ‘oka hoko mai ʻa e ʻAho Fakamāaú, ‘e ala faka‘atu‘i ange ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa Sōtoma, ʻi he kolo ko iā!

ʻOku malaʻia ʻa koe Kolesini! ʻOku malaʻia foki mo koe Petesaita! He kapau na‘e fai ʻi Taia mo Saitoni ʻa e ngaahi mana na‘e fai ʻi homou ongo koló, pehē kuo fuoloa ʻa e fakatomala ʻa e kakai ‘o e ongo kolo ko iā, ʻo nau ‘ai tauangaʻa mo fakaefuefu.
Ka ʻoka hoko mai ʻa e ʻAho Fakamāaú, ‘e faka‘atu‘i ange ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e kakai ‘o Taia mo Saitoni̇́, ‘iate kimoutolu.
Pea ko koe foki Kāpaneume! ‘Okú ke pehē koā ʻe hiki hake koe ki he ngaahi langi̇́? ʻE ʻikai ʻaupito! Ka te mou tō hifo ki Heli!

Ka ʻilonga ha taha ‘e fakaongo kiate kimoutolu, ko ʻene fakaongo ia kiate aú. Peá ka ʻilonga ha taha te ne fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi kimoutolu, ko ʻene taʻetali ai pē ia aú. Pea ko ia te ne fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi aú, ko ʻene fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi ai pē ia ʻa e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.”
Pea foki fiefia mai ʻa e toko fitungofulu mā uá, ‘o tala kia Si̇̄sū: ‟ʻEiki, naʻa mo e fanga tēvoló, naʻa nau fakaongo kiate kimautolu, ʻi he‘emau lea‘aki ho hingoá.”
Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Naʻá ku sio kia Sētane ‘oku tū‘ulu hifo mei̇́ he langi̇́, ʻo hangē ko e tapa ʻa e ʻuhilá.
Ko eni, kuo u tuku kiate kimoutolu ʻa e mafai ke tāmoloki ʻa e fanga ngata mo e manu huhu kona, pea mo e kotoa ʻo e mālohi ʻo homou fili̇́, ka he‘ikai faifai ange pea mou lavea ai ʻi ha meʻa.
Kaekehe, ‘oua te mou fiefia he fakavaivai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi faʻahikehé, ka mou fiefia ʻi he tohi homou hingoá ʻi he Tohi ʻi Langi̇́.”

ʻI he taimi ko iā, naʻe mātuʻaki fiefia ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, pea naʻe lotu ai, ‘o pehē: ‟‘Oku ou fakamālō atu kiate koe, ‘e Tamai, ko e ʻEiki ‘o langi mo māmani, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ho‘o fufū ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni̇́ mei he kakai poto mo ʻiloʻiló, ka ke fakahā ia ki he lāauvale ʻo e fonuá. ‘ʻio, ‘e Tamai, pea naʻe hā lelei kiate koe, ke pehē ho finangaló.

Kuo tuku kiate au ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́ ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē pea ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloʻi ʻe ha taha ʻa e Fohá, ka ko e Tamai̇́ toko taha pē. Pea ʻoku ʻikai ʻiloʻi ʻe ha taha ʻa e Tamai̇́, ka ko e Fohá toko taha pē, pea mo ha taha ʻe loto ʻa e Fohá ke fakahāaʻi ange ia ki .”
Pea tafoki ange ʻa Si̇̄sū ki heʻene kau akó, ‘o naʻe lea ange fakaekinautolu pē, ʻo pehē: ‟ʻOku monūʻia ʻakinautolu ʻoku mamata ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku mou mamata ki ai̇́.

He ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu, naʻe tokolahi ʻa e kau palōfita mo e ngaahi Tuʻi naʻa nau fie mamata ki he ngaahi meʻa kuo mou mamata ki ai̇́, ka naʻe ʻikai te nau mamata ki ai, mo fanongo ki he ngaahi meʻa kuo mou fanongo ki ai̇́, ka na‘e ʻikai hanau faingamālie.”
Pea ko eni, na‘e tu‘u hake ha tangata faiako he Lao ʻa Mōsese, ko ʻene fie tauheleʻi ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne ʻeke kiate ia, ʻo pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki, Ko e hā te u fai, ka u ma‘u ai ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa kuo tohi he Laó? Ko e hā ho‘o ma‘u ki ai̇́?”

Pea tali ‘e he tangatá, ʻo pehē: ‟Te ke ʻofa ki he ʻEiki ko ho ‘Otuá, ʻaki ʻa e kotoa ʻo ho lotó, mo e kotoa ʻo ho laumālié, mo e kotoa ʻo ho ivi̇́, pea mo e kotoa ʻo ho ʻatamai. Peá mo ʻeni foki, ‛Te ke ʻofa ki ho kaungā‘api̇́ ‘o hangē ko ho‘o ‘ofa kiate koé.’”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟ʻOku tonu ho‘o tali̇́. ʻAlu ʻo fai pehē: pea te ke mo‘ui.”
Ka ʻi heʻene fie fakatonuhiaʻi iá, naʻá ne toe ʻeke ange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟He ko hai ia koā ʻa hoku kaungā‘api̇́?”

Pea tali ‘e Sīsū, ʻo pehē: ‟Lau tokua na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata na‘e fononga hifo mei Selusalema ki Sēlikō. Pea fakafokifā, naʻe ‘ohofi ia ‘e ha kau kaihaʻa, ‘o nau fa‘ao ʻene meʻa kotoa pē pea nau taaʻi ia, pea nau toki hola leva kae li̇̄ ʻaki ʻa e tangatá he ve‘ehalá kuo meimei mate.
Pea naʻe fou atu ha faifekau, he hala ko iā. Ka ʻi heʻene sio ki he tangatá, naʻá ne afe ki he kauhala ‘e tahá, ‘o hoko atu ai ʻene fonongá.
Pehē foki, naʻe fou atu ai mo ha tangata na‘e ngāue fakataula‘eiki. Ka ʻi heʻene mamata ki he tangatá, naʻá ne afe ki he kauhala ‘e tahá ʻo fai atu ai hono fononga.
Ka naʻe fononga mai ha tangata Samēlia he hala ko iā. Pea ʻi heʻene mamata ki he tangatá, na‘e fonu hono lotó ʻi he ʻofa kiate ia.
Ko ia, naʻá ne afe atu ‘o haʻihaʻi hono ngaahi laveá ʻo ne tuluʻiʻaki ha lolo mo ha uaine. Pea naʻe toki fakaheka ʻa e tangatá ki heʻene ʻasi̇́ ‘o ‘ave ki he fale tali-fononga ‘o tauhi ia ai.

Pea maʻa hake ʻa e ʻaho ‘e tahá, naʻá ne ‘oange ki he tauhi fale tali-fonongá ha pa‘anga siliva ‘e ua, mo ne talaange ki ai, ‛Tauhi pē muʻa ʻa e tangatá, pea kapau ‘e toe lahi ange ho‘o fakamolé ʻi he pa‘anga ko eni̇́, pea te u totongi atu ia ʻi ha‘aku foki mai.’”
‟Ko hai ʻi he toko tolu ko ʻeni̇́ ‘okú ke pehē: ko e kaungā‘api mo‘oni ia ‘o e tangata na‘e ‘ohofi ‘e he kau kaihaʻá?”
Pea talaange ‘e he faiako Laó: ‟Ko e tangata na‘e ʻaloʻofa kiate iá.” Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟ʻAlu mo koe foki ʻo fai pehē!”
Pea ʻi he fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó he halá, naʻa nau aʻu ki ha kolo ʻa ia na‘e nofo ai ha fefine ko Mā‘ata, pea talitali ‘e Mā‘ʻata ʻa Si̇̄sū ki hono ‘api̇́.
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha tehina ‘o Mā‘ata, ko Mele hono hingoá, ʻa ia na‘e fāite atu ia he vaʻe ʻo Si̇̄suú ‘o fanongo ki heʻene ngaahi folofolá.

Ka na‘e femo‘uekina pē ʻa Mā‘ʻata hono teu ʻa e talitali maʻae ʻEiki̇́. Pea ha‘u ia ‘o fakalea ange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟ʻEiki, ‘oku ʻikai te ke tokanga koā ki he nofo pē ʻa hoku tokouá, ka u fai toko taha pē ʻa e meʻa kotoa? Ko ia, ke ke fekau ki ai, ke ha‘u ‘o tokoni mai!”
Ka naʻe tali ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟‘E Mā‘ata, ʻE Mā‘ʻata! ‘Okú ke lotomo‘ua mo hohaʻa ki ha ngaahi meʻa kehekehe ke fai.
Ka ko e meʻa pē ‘e taha ‘oku mahu‘ingá. Pea ko e meʻa ia kuo fili ‘e Melé, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai ke toe to‘o meiate ia.”

11.text: Pea na‘e fai ʻa e lotu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi ha ʻaho ‘e taha. Pea ʻi he ‘osi ʻene lotú, naʻe lea ange ha toko taha ʻi heʻene kau akó kiate ia: ‟ʻEiki, fakahinohino ange muʻa kimautolu ke mau lava ‘o lotu, ‘o hangē ko e fakahinohino ‘e Sione ʻene kau ako ʻaʻaná.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ka moú ka lotu, pea mou pehē:
Ke ke foaki mai ʻemau meʻakai fakaʻahó
Ke ke fakamolemole ʻemau ngaahi angahalá,

Pea naʻe pehē foki ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Tau lau, tokua, ko ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu naʻe ai hano kaungāmeʻa, pea ʻalu ia ki ai ʻi he tuʻuapō ‘o kole ange, ‘Ofa mai muʻa ‘o ‘omai ha fo‘i mā ‘e tolu ka u toki totongi atu.
He ko hoku kaumeʻa naʻe fai hano fononga, pea kuo afe ange ki ʻapi, pea ‘oku ʻikai ha‘aku meʻa ke talitali ʻaki.
Ka naʻe pehēange ʻe hono kaungāmeʻa mei fale, Tuku ho‘o fakahoha‘asi aú! Kuo ‘osi loka ʻa e matapaá, pea kuo mau mohe kimautolu mo e fānaú. He‘ikai toe lava ke u tu‘u hake ke ‘oatu ha meʻa!

ʻOkú ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu, mahalo pē nai he‘ikai te ne tu‘u ‘o ‘oange ha fo‘i mā koe‘uhi̇̄ ko hona maheni̇́. Ka koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻene vili ta‘e‘unuá, te ne tuʻu hake, pea te ne ʻoatu ʻo fakatatau ki heʻene fiemaʻú.
Ko ia ‘oku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu, mou kole pea ‘e ‘oatu kiate kimoutolu. Kumi, pea te mou ma‘u. Tukituki he matapaá, pea ‘e to‘o kiate kimoutolu.
He ko kinautolu ‘e kolé, ‘e foaki kiate kinautolu. Pea ko kinautolu ‘e kumi̇́, te nau ma‘u. Pea ko kinautolu ‘e tukituki̇́, ‘e to‘o kiate kinautolu ʻa e matapaá.
He ko fē ha tamai ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e tangi kai ika atu ki ai ha‘ane tamasi‘i, pea naʻe ‘oange ʻe ia ha ngata?
Pea ʻoka tangi kai fo‘i moa atu ki ai ha‘ane tamasi‘i, pea naʻe ‘oange ʻe ia ha sikopio?

He neongo kuo mou pehē ko kimoutolu ʻoku mou kovi! Kā ʻoku mou lava lelei pe ʻo ʻave ha meʻaʻofa fakaofoʻof ai hoʻo mou fānaú. Huanoa ai ho‘omou Tamai fakalangi̇́, ʻa ʻene fie foaki ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́ kiate kinautolu ʻoku kole kiate iá.”
Pea na‘e kapusi ‘e Si̇̄sū ha faʻahikehe mei ha tangata na‘e noa. Pea ʻi he mavahe leva ʻa e faʻahikehé mei̇́ he tangatá, naʻe toe lea ia. Pea ofo ‘aupito ai ʻa e kakai̇́.
Ka naʻe pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi: ‟ʻOkú naʻe lava ʻa e kapusi tēvoló, he ‘oku kau mo ia ʻa Pelisipupe, ko e pule ‘o e fanga tēvoló!”
Pea na‘e ʻi ai mo ha ni‘ihi naʻa nau holi ke sivi‘i ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‘o nau toutou vili ange ke ne fai muʻa ha mana mei he langi̇́.

Ka na‘e ʻafioʻi ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻa e anga ʻenau fakakaukaú, pea naʻe folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟Ka ʻi ai ha pule‘anga ‘e fesiosiofaki hono kakai̇́, ‘e ‘auha! Peá ka ʻi ai ha kāinga ‘e fevākoviʻaki, kuo pau ke nau movete.
Kapau ʻe tau pē ʻa Sētane mo Sētane, pea ‘e lava fēfē ke tu‘uloa hono pule‘angá? He kuo mou tukuaki‘i ʻekimoutolu ko ʻeku kapusi tēvoló ʻoku fai ʻaki ʻa e ivi ‘o e ʻeiki ‘o e fanga tēvoló!
Pea kapau ko e mo‘oni̇́ ia, pea ko e mafai leva ‘o hai ‘oku fai ʻaki ʻa e kapusi tēvolo ʻa ho‘omou fānaú? ʻAua, tā ko kinautolu pē te nau fakahalaia‘i kimoutolú.
Ka ʻokapau leva ko e mafai ia ‘o e ‘Otuá ‘oku ou kapusi tēvolo ʻaki̇́, pea tā ko e fakamo‘oni ia kuo hokomai ki homou lotolotongá, ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.
Ka to‘o mahafu ʻe ha toʻa ke malu‘i ʻaki hono ‘api̇́, pea ‘e malu kotoa ai ʻene koloá.
Ka ʻoka ʻiloangé ʻe ikuna‘i ia ‘e ha taha ‘oku toʻa ange ʻiate ia, kuo pau ke ne fa‘ao ʻa e mahafu na‘e falala ki ai ʻa e toʻá, pea naʻe toki vahevahe ʻene koloá mo ha ni‘ihi kehe.
Ka ʻi ai ha taha ‘oku ʻikai ke kau mo au, ʻokú ne fakafepaki kiate au. Pea ko ia ‘oku ʻikai ke ututa‘u mo aú, ʻokú ne veuki ʻe ia ʻa e ta‘ú.

Ka mavahe ha faʻahikehe mei ha taha, pea ‘oku faai holo ʻa e faʻahikehe ko iā he toafá ‘o kumi hano nofo‘anga ke mālōlō ai. Pea ʻi he ʻikai ke ma‘u hano nofo‘anga, naʻá ne pehē leva ‘e ia, ‘Te u toe foki pē au ki he ʻapi naʻá ku ha‘u mei ai̇́!
Pea ʻi heʻene aʻu mai ki he ʻapi ko iā, naʻá ne ʻilo ai, kuo ʻosi tafi ia ʻo maʻa mo maau.

Pea toe ʻalu leva ia ‘o uki mai mo ha faʻahikehe ‘e toko fitu ‘oku kovi ange ʻiate ia, ke nau ōmai ‘o fā‘ofale he toko taha ko iā. Pea naʻe kovi ange ʻa e tōʻongamoʻui ʻa e taha ko iā kimui̇́, heʻene tōʻongamoʻui kimuʻá.”
Pea ʻoku pehē: lolotonga ʻa e kei fakamatala ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ni, mo e fakalea mai ha fefine mei he kakai̇́ ʻo ne pehē kiate ia: ‟ʻOku monū‘ia ʻa e fefine naʻá ne fā‘ele‘i mo ‘ohake koe!”
Ka naʻe pehēange ‘e Sīsū: ‟Ko e moʻoni, ka ʻoku monū‘ia lahi ange ʻa e kakai ‘oku nau fanongo ki he Folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá pea tauhi ki ai̇́.”

Pea ʻi he kamata ke tokolahi mai ʻa e kakai̇́ kia Sīsuú, pea naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e toʻutangata kovi ʻo e ʻahó ni! ‘Oku nau fie mamata ki ha mana mei he ‘Otuá. Ka he‘ikai ‘oange kiate kinautolu ha mana, ngata pē he mana na‘e hoko kia Sioná.
He hangē ko e hoko ʻa Siona ko e mana ki he kakai Ninivé, ‘e pehē pē ʻa e hoko e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ko e mana ia ki he kakai ‘o e ʻahó ni.

Ka hoko mai ʻa e ʻahó fakamāú, ‘e toetuʻu fakataha mei he maté ʻa e Kuini ‘o Sipá mo e toʻutangata ‘o e ʻahó ni, pea te ne fakahalaia‘i kinautolu. He naʻá ne fononga mai mei he mamaʻó, ke vakai‘i ʻa e poto ‘o Solomoné. Ka ‘oku ʻi heni ha taha ‘oku hulu atu ‘ia Solomone!

‘E toetuʻu fakataha foki mei he maté ʻa e kakai ʻo Ninivé mo e toʻutangata ‘o e ʻaho ni̇́, pea te nau fakahalaia‘i ʻa e kakai ‘o e ʻahó ni. He naʻa nau fakatomala kinautolu ʻi he malanga ʻa Sioná. Ka ‘oku ʻi heni ha taha ‘oku hulu atu ‘ia Siona.
‘Oku ʻikai ha taha te ne tutu ha maama pea ‘ufi‘ufi‘i ʻaki ha nge‘esi puha. Ka ʻokú ne fokotu‘u ia ki ha tu‘unga maama ke māmangia kotoa ai e kakai ‘oku hūmai ki he falé.
Ko ho matá, ko e maamaʻanga ia ki ho sinó. Kapau ʻe sai ʻa e sio ho matá, pea ʻoku maamangia ʻa ho sinó kotoa. Peá ka kovi ʻa e sio ho matá, pea ʻoku fakapo‘ulituʻu ʻa ho sinó.
Ko ia ai, mou fakapapauʻi, ʻoku ʻikai ke fakapoʻuli ʻa e meʻa ʻoku taau ke ne fakamaama kimoutolú.
Ko ia, kapau ʻoku maamangia ho sinó kotoa, ‘o ʻikai ha me‘i fakapo‘uli ‘e taha ai, pea ‘e māmangia leva ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē, ‘o hangē kuo hulungia koe ʻe ha fu‘u maama lahi.”
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei fakamatala ʻa Sīsuú, naʻe fakaafe‘i ia ‘e ha tangata‘eiki Fālesi ke na ma‘u me‘atokoni ʻi hono ‘api̇́. Pea ʻalu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o nofo hifo mo ia ke ma‘u me‘atokoni̇́.
Ka na‘e ‘ohovale ‘aupito ʻa e tangata‘eiki Fālesi̇́ ‘ia Si̇̄sū, ʻi he ʻikai ke ne tomuʻa fanofano pea naʻe toki ma‘u me‘atokoni̇́.
Pea pehēange ‘e he ʻEiki̇́ kiate ia: ‟Siomai, ko kimoutolu, kau Fālesi̇́, ‘oku mou fufulu ʻa e tuʻa ipú, mo e peleti̇́. Ka ‘oku fonu homou lotó he mānumanú mo e kovi kehekehe.
ʻA e vale matolu! ʻIkai ko e ‘Otuá pē naʻá ne fakatou fakatupu ʻa loto mo tuʻá?
Ka mou foaki ho‘omou koloá ʻoku maʻu ʻi lotó maʻa e kau masivá, koe‘uhi̇̄ kae maʻa ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē kiate kimoutolu.

‘Oku malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ ‘oku mou foaki ki he ‘Otuá ʻa e vahe hongofulu ho‘omou ngoué, ʻa e sipaisi̇́ mo e sinamoni̇́, mo e ngaahi la‘i ʻakau kehekehe, ka ʻoku ʻikai te mou faitotonu pea mo ‘ofa ki he ‘Otuá. Ka na‘e totonu ke mou fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, mo kei foaki ai pē maʻae ‘Otuá ʻa e vahe hongofulú.
‘Oku malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu kau Fālesi̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ he ‘oku mou holi ke nofo ʻi ha ngaahi nofoʻanga makehe ʻi falelotu, mo holi ke fetapa faka‘ei‘eiki atu e kakai̇́ ʻi loto kolo.
ʻOku mou malaʻia he ‘oku mou hangē ha ngaahi fa‘itoka kuo holofá pea ‘oku tāmolo noa‘ia ai ʻa e kakai̇́.”
Pea lea hake ai ha toko taha he kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, kiate ia: ‟‘E Tangata‘eiki, ko e ngaahi lea ʻokú ke fai̇́ ‘oku mau lavea ai foki mo kimautolu!”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟‘Oku mou malaʻiá, he ‘oku mou hilifaki ʻa e ngaahi kavenga mamafa he uma ‘o e kakai̇́, ka ‘oku ʻikai te mou momo‘i ala atu ke tokoni‘i kinautolu!
ʻOku mou malaʻiá he kuo mou langa ha ngaahi maka fakamanatu ʻi faʻitoka ke fakalāngilangi‘i ʻaki ʻa e kau palōfita na‘e fakapoongi ‘e ho‘omou fanga kui̇́ he kuonga muʻá.

Pea ʻi hoʻomou fai peheé, ‘oku mou fakamahino ‘aupito ho‘omou tui na‘e tonu pē ʻenau meʻa na‘e fai̇́. He naʻa nau tāmateʻi ʻa e kau palōfitá ka mou langa maka fakamanatu ʻe kimoutolu maʻae kau palōfita naʻa nau fakapōongi̇́.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e meʻa ko iā, naʻe pehē ai ‘e he Poto-‘o-e-‘Otuá, ‛Te u tuku atu kiate kinautolu ha kau palōfita mo ha kau ʻApositolo. Ka te nau fakapoongi hanau ni‘ihi mo ngaohikovia hanau ni‘ihi.’
Ko ia, ʻe hilifaki ki he to‘utangata ko ʻeni̇́ ʻa e tautea koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e toto ʻo e kau palōfita kotoa pē kuo fakapoongi talu mei he kamata‘anga ‘o māmani;
ʻE lau meia ʻĒpeli ‘o aʻu kia Sākalaiá, ʻa ia na‘e fakapoongi he vahaʻa ‘o e ‘ōlitá pea mo e Potutapú. ‘ʻio, ʻoku ou talaatu, kuo pau ke ʻeke honau totó ki he toʻutangata ko eni̇́.

ʻOku malaʻia ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsese, he ʻoku ‘iate kimoutolu e ki̇̄ ‘o e matapā ki he ʻilo ‘Otuá, ka ‘oku ʻikai te mou fie hū kimoutolu ai, pea ʻoku mou toe ta‘ofi foki mo kinautolu ‘oku fie hū ai̇́.”
Pea ʻi he ʻalu atu ʻa Sīsuú, naʻe kamata mei ai ʻa e feinga ʻa e kau faiako Laó mo e kau Fālesi̇́, ke nau ʻeke ʻa e ngaahi fehuʻi fakatupuʻita, ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻa lahi.
Naʻa nau faʻufaʻu foki ke fakangalivaleʻi ia ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi lea kuó ne fai̇́.

12.text: Pea ʻi he taimi ko iā, naʻe feta‘ota‘omi mai ha fuʻu kakai ‘e lauiafe kia Sīsū, pea iku ai ‘o nau tāmoloki hanau ni‘ihi. Pea kamata lea ʻa Sīsū, ʻo ne fuofua fai ki heʻene kau akó: ‟Mou tokanga naʻa mou tō ki he faʻahinga akonaki hala ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́, ʻa ia ‘oku nau takihēeʻi ʻaki ʻa e kakai̇́.
He ko e meʻa kotoa pē kuo fufū, ‘e fakaeʻa. Pea ko e meʻa fakapulipuli kotoa pē, ‘e ʻiloʻi.
Ka ai ha meʻa te mou lea ʻaki he fakapo‘uli̇́, ‘e fanongonongo atu ia ʻi heʻene ʻaho haké. Peá ka ai ha meʻa te mou fanafana ʻaki ʻi ha loki kuo tātāpuni, ‘e kailangaki‘i atu ia mei he tuʻafale.
Pea ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu si‘oku ngaahi kaungāmeʻa, ‘oua te mou manavahē ki he kakai ʻoku nau tāmate‘i ʻa e sinó, pea ko e ngata‘anga pē ia ‘o e meʻa te nau ala fai kiate kimoutolú.

Ka u fakahā atu ʻa e Toko Taha totonu ke mou manavahē ki ai̇́: Mou manavahē kiate Ia, ‘okú naʻe malava ke to‘o ho‘omou mo‘ui̇́, pea ʻokú ne toe mafai foki ke li̇̄ kimoutolu ki Heli. ‘ʻio, ‘oku ou tala fakamātoato kiate kimoutolu, mou manavahē kiate Ia!
ʻIkai ko e mahuʻinga ʻo ha fanga ki‘i manupuna iiki ‘e nimá, ko ha sēniti pē ʻe ua? Kaneongo ia, ‘e ‘ikai mangalo ʻi he ‘Otuá, ha taha ‘iate kinautolu.
ʻIo, naʻa mo homou ngaahi tu‘oni lou‘ulú, kuo ‘osi lau fakalāutelau ‘e he ‘Otuá. Ko ia, ‘oua te mou manavahē! He ‘oku mou mahu‘inga ange kimoutolu, ʻi ha fanga kiʻi manupuna tokolahi.

Pea ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu, ka ʻi ai ha taha te ne fakahā ki he kakai kotoa ʻene kau mo aú, ‘e fakahā foki ‘e he Foha ‘o e Tangatá ki he kau ʻāngelo ʻa e ‘Otuá, ʻene kau mo e toko taha ko iā.
Pea ko ia te ne fakafisingaʻi au ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kakai kotoa, ʻe fakafisinga foki ‘e he Foha ‘o e Tangatá, ʻi he ʻao ʻo e kau ʻāngelo ‘o e ‘Otuá, ʻa ʻene kau mo iá.
Pea ʻe ala fakamolemole‘i pē ha taha ‘e lau kovi ki he Foha ‘o e Tangatá. Ka ‘oka ai ha taha ‘e lau kovi ki he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ʻe ʻikai ala fakamolemoleʻi ia.

Peá ka naú ka ‘ave kimoutolu ‘o fakamāau‘i ʻi he fakamāu‘anga ‘o honau ngaahi Siasi̇́, pea mo honau kau taki̇́ pea mo e kau maʻumafai̇́, ‘oua te mou hohaʻa pē ʻe anga fēfē pea ko e hā ha‘amou fakamatala ‘e fai̇́.
He ‘e fakahā atu ‘e he Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, ʻi he taimi pē ko iā, ʻa e meʻa ke mou lea‘aki̇́.”
Pea kole ange kia Si̇̄sū ha toko taha mei̇́ he fuʻu kakai̇́: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ke ke lea ange muʻa ki hoku tokouá ke ne tuku mai ha ku ʻinasi he koloa tukufakaholo ʻa e fāmili̇́.”
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Tangata, ko hai naʻá ne fakamafai‘i au ke u fakamaau ʻo fakatonutonu hoʻomou koloa tukufakaholó?”

Pea toki pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou tokanga ʻo vakavakai ke maluʻi kimoutolu mei̇́ he faʻahinga kehekehe ʻo e mānumānú! He ‘oku ‘ikai makatuʻunga ʻa e mahuʻinga hoʻo moʻui̇́, ko e lahi hoʻo koloá.”
Pea fai atu ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu ʻa e talanoa fakatātā ko eni̇́, ʻo pehē: ‟Lau tokua na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata tu‘umālie, na‘e fualelei ‘aupito ʻene ngoué.
Pea faifai pea naʻe pehē ʻi hono lotó, ‛Ko e hā nai ʻeku meʻa ‘e fai̇́? Ko ʻeku tukuʻanga koloá ‘oku fu‘u si‘isi‘i ʻo ʻikai ke kei hao ki ai ʻeku ngoué.’

Pea naʻe toki pehē: ‘Ko e meʻa ʻeni te u fai̇́. Te u holoki hoku ki‘i tukuʻanga koloa ko eni̇́, ka u toe langa ha ‘ū fale tukuʻanga koloa ‘oku lalahi angé, ke hao ki ai ʻa e fua ʻeku ngoué mo ʻeku ‘ū koloa kehé.
Peá te u toki pehē leva ki hoku lotó, ‛Ko ʻena kuó ke tokonaki ma‘au ha ngaahi meʻa lelei ‘o fe‘unga mo ha ngaahi ta‘u lahi. Mālōlō ā. Kai mo inu, mo ke fakafiefia!’
Ka na‘e folofola ange kiate ia ʻa e ‘Otuá, ‘He toki vale matolu! Ko e poó ni pē, te u tala kiate koe ke tukumai hoʻo moʻui̇́. Pea ko hai leva te ne ma‘u ho ngaahi fu‘u fale tukuʻanga koloá?”
‟ʻE pehē tofu pē ʻa e meʻa ia ‘e hoko ki he kakai ‘oku nau tānaki koloa pē ma‘anautolú, ka ‘oku ʻikai te nau koloaʻia ʻi he ʻafio mai ʻa e ‘Otuá.”

Pea toki pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki heʻene kau akó: ‟Ko ia, ‘oku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu, ‘oua te mou lotomo‘ua ki he anga ho‘omou moʻui̇́, pē ko e hā ha meʻa ke mou kai, pea mo homou sinó, pē ko e hā ha meʻa ke mou vala!
He ‘oku mahuʻinga ange ʻa e mo‘ui̇́ ʻi he me‘atokoni̇́, pea mahuʻinga ange ʻa e sinó ʻi he valá.

Mou sio ki he fanga lēveni̇́! ‘Oku ‘ikai ke nau tōta‘u, pē ututa‘u. Pea ‘oku ‘ikai hanau peito pē tukuʻanga koloa. Ka ‘oku fafanga kinautolu ‘e he ‘Otuá. ʻIkai ʻoku mou mahu‘inga lahi ange kimoutolu ʻi he fanga manupuna kotoa pē?
Kohai ʻiate kimoutolu te ne lava ke toe fakalōloa atu ʻene mo‘ui̇́ ʻaki ha foʻi houa, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻene lotomo‘ua ki ai̇́?
Pea kapau leva ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ha ki‘i meʻa si‘isi‘i pehē: ko e hā ‘oku mou lotomo‘ua ai ki he ngaahi meʻa kehé?

Vakai ki he tupu faka‘ofo‘ofa ‘o e ngaahi ʻakau kakalá! ʻOku ʻikai te nau lālanga pē tuitui. Ka ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, naʻá mo e tu‘i ko Solomoné, ʻi he kotoa hono ngaahi nāunau, naʻe ʻikai faka‘ofo‘ofa ia ‘o hangē ko e ngaahi ʻakau kakala ko eni̇́.

Pea kapau ʻoku pehē ʻa hono fakateunga ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e ʻakau kakala ʻo e vaotaá, ʻa ia ‘oku matala pē he ʻahó ni, kae laku ki he afi̇́ ʻapongipongi, huanoa ʻa e mahulu atu ʻene fakateunga kimoutolú, ʻa kimoutolu ʻa e kau tui vaivai!
Ko ia, ‘oua te mou feinga holo ke ma‘u ha meʻa ke mou kai pē ha meʻa ke mou inu, pea ʻoua foki te mou lotomoʻua ki ai̇́.
He ko e ngaahi meʻa ko iā ‘oku feinga ki ai ʻa e kakai ta‘elotú. Ka ‘oku ʻafioʻi pē ‘e ho‘omou Tamai̇́, ‘oku mou fiemaʻu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā.
Ka mou fakamuʻomuʻa ʻi hoʻomou moʻui̇́ ʻa e kumi ki hono Puleʻangá, pea ‘e ‘oatu ma‘amoutolu foki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kātoa ko iā.
Si‘i fanga sipi toko siʻi, ‘oua te mou manavahē, he kuo finangalo lelei ‘e ho‘omou Tamai̇́ ke foaki atu ma‘amoutolu ʻa hono Pule‘angá.

Mou fakatau atu leva ʻa e meʻa kotoa ‘oku mou ma‘ú, pea foaki maʻae masivá ʻa e pa‘anga ‘e ma‘u mei ai̇́. Kumi maʻa moutolu ha kato pa‘anga ‘e ‘ikai popo, tānaki koloa ʻi he Langi̇́, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai ʻauhá, pea malu foki mei he kau kaihaʻá, mo hao mei hono kai ʻe he ʻinisēkité.
He ko e feitu‘u ‘oku ʻi ai ho‘omou koloá, ‘e nofo pē ki ai foki mo homou lotó.
Mou nofo kuo ʻosi mateuteu ma‘u pē, pea ʻai ke ulo ma‘u ai pē ho‘omou māamá;
ʻO mou hangē ha kau tamaio‘eiki ‘oku nofo ʻaki tali ki he foki mai honau ʻeiki̇́ mei ha kātoanga mali, koeʻuhi̇̄ ʻoka naʻe ka aʻu mai ʻo tukituki ʻi he matapaá, pea ʻoku nau fakaava leva kiate ia.

ʻE monū‘ia ha kau tamaio‘eiki pehē: ʻa ia, ‘oka foki mai honau ʻeiki̇́ ‘o ʻilo, ʻoku nau kei ʻā ʻo talitali atu. Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ʻe ʻai ʻe he ʻeiki̇́ hano teunga fakasevāniti̇, pea te ne fakanofonofo kinautolu ki he tēpilé, ka naʻe toki nofo atu ʻo tauhi kinautolu.
Peá neongo pē ʻe foki mai honau ʻeiki̇́ ʻi he tuʻuʻapoó pē ko e tolu hengihengi̇́ ʻo ne ʻilo ʻoku nau mateuteu atu, ko e toki kau tamaioʻeiki monūʻia moʻoni ʻakinautolu.
Pea ʻoku mou ʻiloʻi ʻa e meʻa ni: Kapau ʻe ʻilo ʻe he tangata ʻo e ʻapi̇́ ʻa e taimi ʻe haʻu ai ʻa e kaihaʻá, ʻe ʻikai te ne tuku ke hae hono falé.
Pehē foki mo kimoutolu, ke mou mateuteu ma‘u pē, he ‘e hokomai ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ʻi ha taimi ʻe ʻikai te mou mateuteu ki ai.”
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Pita: ‟ʻEiki, ko ho‘o lea peheé, ko ho‘o ‘uhinga mai pē kiate kimautolu, pē ʻoku kau ki ai mo e kakai kotoa pē?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Sīsuú: ‟Ko hai ʻa e tamaioʻeiki faitotonu mo fakapotopoto, ʻa ia ‘e fili ‘e hono ʻeiki̇́ ke ne tufotufa ʻa e me‘atokoni ʻa ʻene kau ngāué, ‘oka hokosia ʻa e taimi ma‘u me‘atokoni̇́?
ʻE monūʻia ʻa e tamaio‘eiki ko iā ‘oka foki mai hono pulé, ʻo ʻilo ‘okú naʻe kei fai atu pē hono fatongiá.
ʻio, ‘oku ou tala mo‘oni atu, ‘e hanga ‘e hono ʻeiki̇́ ‘o tuku atu kotoa ʻene koloá kiate ia, ke ne pule ki ai.

Ka ʻokapau ‘e fakakaukau ʻa e tamaio‘eiki ko iā, ʻi hono loto, ʻo ne pehē: ‘Oku tuai mai hoku ʻeiki̇́, pea kamata ke ne tā ʻa e kau tamaioʻeiki̇́ mo e kau kaunangá, mo moʻui faʻa kai, faʻa inu, mo faʻa konā;

Pea ‘e toki hokomai ʻa e ʻeiki ʻo e tamaioʻeiki ko iā, ʻi ha ʻaho ʻe ʻikai te ne ʻamanaki ki ai, mo ha houa ʻe ʻikai te ne ʻilo ki ai, pea te ne fahifahi ia, ‘o laku atu ki tuʻa ki he feituʻu ʻo e kau taʻe lotú.
Peá ka ʻi ai ha tamaio‘eiki ‘okú naʻe ʻilo ki he finangalo ʻo ʻene ʻeiki̇́, kae ʻikai te ne mateuteu ki ai, pea ‘ikai ke ne fie fai ki he finangalo ʻo e ʻeiki̇́, ‘e taa‘i lahi ia.

Ka ‘oka ʻi ai ha tamaio‘eiki ‘oku ‘ikai ke ne ʻilo ʻa e finangalo ʻo hono ʻeiki̇́, ʻo ne fai ai ha meʻa ‘oku taau ke tautea ai ia, pea ‘e tautea‘i ia ʻaki ha ngaahi tā si‘isi‘i pē. He ko ia kuo foaki ki ai ha meʻa lahi̇́, ‘e lahi foki mo e meʻa ‘e ʻeke meiate iá. Pea ko ia kuo foaki ki ai ha meʻa lahi angé, ‘e lahi ange ʻa e meʻa ‘e tonu ke maʻu meiate iá.
Naʻá ku ha‘u ki māmani̇́ ke fakaʻuha hifo ki ai ha afi. Pea pehēange mai kuo ‘osi vela ia!
Ka ʻoku ʻi ai ʻa e papitaiso‘anga ke u papitaiso ai, pea ko ia ʻoku ou fakamaʻumaʻu pē, kae‘oua kuo lava ia.
‘Oku mou pehē koā naʻá ku ha‘u ki māmani̇́ ke fakatupu ha melinó? ʻOkú ou tala kiate kimoutolu, naʻe ʻikai. Naʻá ku ha‘ú, ke māvahevahe ʻa māmani.
He ka ʻi ai ha fāmili ‘oku toko nima, pea ‘e faʻahi ua ia. ‘E fakafepaki ʻa e toko tolu ki he toko ua, pea fakafepaki ʻa e toko ua ki he toko tolu.

Te nau fakafaʻafaʻahi; ʻa e tamai mo hono foha, pea mo e foha mo ʻene tamai, ʻa e fa‘ē mo ʻene fānau fefine, mo e fānau fefine mo ʻenau faʻē, ʻa e faʻē mo e mali ʻo ʻene tama tangatá, ʻa e ʻōfefine-mali, mo e fāʻe ʻa hono mali̇́.”
Pea toe pehē ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he fuʻu kakai̇́: ‟Ka mou ka sio ki ha konga ʻao ʻoku ʻalu hake mei he hihifó pea ʻoku mou pehē leva, ‘E ‘uha, pea ‘oku ‘uha.
Peá ka angi ʻa e matangi̇́ mei he tongá, pea ʻoku mou tala leva, ‘E ʻafu, pea ‘oku ʻafu.

He toki kau lotuloi! ʻOku mou lava kimoutolu ʻo fakaʻuhingaʻi ʻa e anga ʻo e tuʻu ʻa e ʻataá mo e ʻātakai, ka ko e hā ʻoku ʻikai te mou lava ai ke ʻiloʻi ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku hoko ʻi he kuonga ko ʻeni̇́?
Pea ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai ke mou fei mo fakapapau‘i ai ʻa e meʻa ‘oku totonu ke mou fai̇́?

He kuo ʻosi fakaʻilo pea ʻoku lolotonga ʻave koe ki he fakamaauʻangá. Fai ho tūkuingatá ke ke fakalelei mo ho fili̇́ lolotonga ‘oku te‘eki ke fai ʻa e hopó. He ka ‘ikai, te ne taki atu koe ki he fakamāaú, pea ‘e tuku atu koe ‘e he fakamāaú ki he kau polisi̇́. Pea ‘e fakahū pili̇̄sone koe ʻe he polisi̇́.
ʻOkú ou talaatu, he‘ikai te ke ʻatā mai kae‘oua kuó ke totongi ʻa e kihiʻi sēniti kotoa pē ki ho moʻuá.”

13.text: Pea na‘e ai ha faʻahinga ʻi he taimi ko iā naʻa nau fakahā kia Si̇̄sū ʻa e meʻa naʻe hoko ki he kau Kāleli ʻa ia naʻe hanga ʻe Pailato ʻo huʻiʻaki honau totó ʻenau feilaulaú.
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolú: ‟‘Oku mou pehē koā ko e hoko ʻa e meʻá ni ki he kau Kāleli ko iā koe‘uhi̇̄ he naʻe lahi ange ʻenau faiangahalá he toenga ʻo e kau Kāleli̇́?
Ko ʻeni ʻoku ou talaatú, naʻe ʻikai ʻaupito! Ka ʻokapau ʻe ‘ikai te mou fakatomala, te mou ʻauha pehē pē foki mo kimoutolu hono kotoa.
Pea fēfē ʻa e toko hongofulu mā valu na‘e mate he holo ‘iate kinautolu ʻa e Taua ʻi Sailoamé? ‘Oku mou fakakaukau koā naʻá nau kovi ange kinautolu ʻi he toenga ʻo e kakai ‘o Selusalemá?
Ko ʻeni ʻoku ou talaatú, naʻe ʻikai ʻaupito! Ka ʻokapau ʻe ʻikai te mou tafoki fakatomala ʻo tafoki ki he ʻOtuá, te mou ʻauha pehē pē foki mo kimoutolu hono kotoa.”

Pea fai ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu ʻa e fo‘i talanoa ko eni̇́: ‟Tau lau naʻe ʻi ai ha tangata ngoue naʻá ne tō ha fu‘u fiki he‘ene ngoue‘angá. Pea ʻalu atu ia he ʻaho ‘e taha ke toli fiki. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke ʻi ai ha fo‘i fua he fu‘u fiki̇́.
Ko ia, naʻá ne fakalea ange ki he tangata tauhi ngoué, ‛Ko e ta‘u ʻeni ‘e tolu hokohoko mo ʻeku haʻu ʻo kumi ha fua mei he fu‘u fiki̇́ ni mo e ʻikai pē maʻu ha meʻa! Tā ia mo e maumau kelekele!’
Ka naʻe kole ange ‘e he tauhingoué, ‛Tangata‘eiki, toe tuku mai pē muʻa ia he taʻú ni, ka u keli takai hono tefitó mo fafanga kelekele ia;
Naʻa faifai pea fua ia he ta‘u kaha‘ú. Peá ka ‘ikai, peá ke toki tā ia.’”
Pea ʻi ha Sāpate ʻe taha, naʻe faiako ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi ha falelotu o e kakai Siú.
Pea ko eni, na‘e ʻi ai ha fefine kuo ta‘u ‘e hongofulu mā valu ʻene nofo tu‘apiko, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko hono ma‘u ia ‘e ha faʻahikehe. Pea kuo ‘ikai ke ne toe lava ‘o tu‘u tonu.
Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he fefiné, naʻá ne ui ange ke ne haʻu ki muʻa, pea naʻe folofola kiate ia: ‟Fefine, kuo fakatauʻatāina koe mei ho faingataʻaʻiá!”
Pea naʻe toki hilifaki hono nimá ki he fefiné, pea naʻe toe tu‘u tonu hake ‘o fakamālō ki he ‘Otuá.

Ka na‘e ‘ita lahi ai ʻa e pule falelotú he fakamo‘ui mahaki ʻa Si̇̄sū he Sāpaté. Pea naʻe pehēange ki he kakai̇́: ‟Ko e uike kotoa pē, ‘oku ʻi ai ʻa e ʻaho ‘e ono ke tau ngaūe ai. Mou omi ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ko iā ke fakamo‘ui ai homou ngaahi alanga mahaki̇́, kae tuku ho‘omou omi he Sāpaté.”
Pea tali ʻe he ʻEiki̇́ kiate ia: ‟ʻA e kau lotuloi! Ko hai ‘iate kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai ke ne vete ʻene pulú, pē ʻasi̇́, he Sāpaté ‘o taki atu ke fakainu?
Pea ko si‘i fefiné ni, ʻa e hako ʻo ʻĒpalahame ko eni̇́, ko e ta‘u ʻeni ‘e hongofulu mā valu hono haʻihaʻi ia ‘e Sētane. Ko e hā leva hano maumau hono fakatau‘atāinaʻi ia he Sāpaté?”
Pea ʻi heʻene lea pehē na‘e mā ‘aupito ai hono ngaahi fili̇́, ka na‘e fiefia lahi ʻa e toenga ‘o e kakai̇́ ʻi he ngaahi meʻa mālie kuó ne fai̇́.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́: ‟Ko e hā ha meʻa ʻe fakatatau ki ai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá? Te u fakatatau nai ia ki he hā?
‘Oku hangē ia ha taha kuó ne tō ha tenga‘i mūsita heʻene ngoue‘angá. Pea ʻoku tupu hake ia ‘o hoko ko e fu‘u ʻakau lahi, pea haʻu ʻa e fanga manupuná ʻo ngaohi honau punungá ʻi hono ngaahi vaʻá.”
Pea toe pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́: ‟Ko e hā nai te u fakatatau ki ai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá?
‘Oku tatau ia mo ha fefine naʻá ne toʻo ha meʻi lēvani ʻo ne natuʻaki ia ha falukunga mahoaʻa ‘e tolu, pea tupu kotoa ʻa e mahoaʻa ko iā.”
Pea fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo fou atu he ngaahi kolo lalahi̇́ mo e ngaahi kolo iiki̇́, ʻo ne faiako ai, heʻene ʻalu atu ʻo fakataumuʻa ki Selusalema.
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e ha toko taha ki ai: ‟ʻEiki, ‘oku tokosi‘i pē koā ʻa e kakai ‘e fakamoʻui̇́?” Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū,
‟Mou tūkuingata ke hū atu he matapā fāsi‘i̇́! He ‘oku tokolahi ʻa e kakai ‘e feinga ke huú, ka ‘e ‘ikai ke nau lava ke hū.

He ka tu‘u mai leva ʻa e tangata ‘oku ‘o‘ona ʻa e falé ‘o tāpuni ʻa e matapaá pea te mou tuʻu ʻi tuʻa ʻo tukituki ai mo ui atu, ‛ʻEiki ē, to‘o atu muʻa ʻa e matapaá!’ Ka te ne toki tali mai, ‘Oku ‘ikai ʻaupito te u ʻilo ‘e au kimoutolu pē ko hoʻomou haʻu mei fē.
Peá te mou toki pehēange ai, ‛Ka naʻa tau faʻa kai mo inu fakataha mo koe pea naʻá ke faiako ʻi homau ngaahi koló.’
Peá te ne pehē mai ‘e ia, ‘Oku ‘ikai ʻaupito te u teitei ʻilo ‘e au kimoutolu! Mou ʻalu meiate au, ʻa e kau faikovi!

Peá te mou toki tangi mamahi ai pea te mou uʻuuʻunifo hoʻomou ʻitá, he te mou sio kia ʻĒpalahame, mo ʻAisake, mo Sēkope pea mo e kau palōfita kotoa, ‘oku nau ʻi he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá, ka kuo li̇̄ kimoutolu ia kituʻaʻā.
Pea ‘e toki ‘aukau mai ʻa e kakai̇́ mei he feitu‘u kotoa pē ‘o ma‘u honau nofo‘angá, ʻi he kātoanga ʻi he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.
Pea ko eni, ʻoku ʻi ai ha faʻahinga ‘oku li‘ekina ʻi he ʻahó ni, ka te nau nofomuʻa ʻi he kātoanga ko iā, mo ha faʻahinga ‘oku tuʻukimuʻa ʻi he ʻahó ni, ka ʻe li‘ekina ʻi he kātoanga ko iā.”
Pea ʻi he taimi ko iā, naʻe ha‘u ha kau Fālesi ‘o talaange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Fei mo ke hola mei heni ʻo ʻalu ki ha feituʻu kehe! He ‘oku fakaʻamu ʻa Hēlota ke ne tāmate‘i koe.”

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou ō ‘o tala ki he fōkisi ko iá, ‛Ko au ʻeni te u kei kapusi faʻahikehe pē mo fakamo‘ui mahaki he ʻahó ni mo ʻapongipongi, pea ‘e toki kakato ʻeku ngāué ʻi he ʻaho hono tolú.’
He ko hono moʻoni̇́, te u kei fononga pē he ʻahó ni, mo ʻapongipongi, mo e ʻaho hono hokó, ʻi hoku fononga‘angá he ʻoku ʻikai tāmateʻi ha palōfita ʻi ha feituʻu kehe, ka ʻi Selusalema pē.

‘E Selusalema! ʻE Selusalema ē! ʻA kimoutolu ʻa e faʻahinga na‘e fakapoongi ʻa e kau palōfitá, mo tolomaka‘i ʻa e kau talafekau na‘e fekau atu kiate kimoutolú. Kuo tā tu‘o fiha ʻeku faka‘amu ke tātānaki mai kimoutolu, ‘o hangē ko e ‘ō‘ōfaki ‘e ha motuʻa moa hono fāngangá ki hono lalo kapakaú. Kae ‘ikai pē te mou loto ki ai.
Pea ko eni, ‘e li̇̄ ʻaki homou Temipalé. Pea ʻoku ou tala moʻoni atu, he‘ikai te mou toe mamata kiate au kae ‘oua kuo hoko mai ʻa e ʻaho te mou toki pehē ai,

14.text: Pea ʻi he ʻaho Sāpate ‘e taha, ʻi haʻane ʻalu atu ki ha ʻapi ʻo ha taha ʻo e kau Taki ʻo e Fālesi, naʻá nau siosiofi ia ai.
Pea ʻiloangé, naʻe ʻi ai ʻi he ʻapi ko iā ha tangata na‘e fefulofulai hono sinó.
Pea fehuʻi ange ʻe Si̇̄sū ki he kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé mo e kau Fālesi, ʻo pehē: ‟‘Oku ngofua koā ke fai ha ngāue fakamoʻui mahaki ʻi he Sāpaté pē ʻikai?”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke lea mai ha taha. Pea ala atu leva ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he tangatá ‘o fakamo‘ui ia, pea naʻe talaange ke ʻalu ā.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kakai̇́: ‟Kapau ko ha taha ʻokimoutolu ʻe ai hano foha pē ko ha‘ane pulu, kuo tō ʻi ha vaitupu, he ʻaho Sāpate, ʻikai te ke fusi hake ia, neongo ko e ʻAho Sāpaté?”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai pē ha‘anau tali ‘e fai kiate ia.
Pea ʻi heʻene fakatokanga‘i ʻa e feinga ʻa e ni‘ihi ke ma‘u ʻa e ngaahi nofo‘anga ʻi muʻa ʻi he fakaafé, naʻá ne fai ʻa e talanoa fakatātā ko eni̇́, ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu,
‟Ka fakaafe‘i koe ki ha kātoanga mali, ‘oua te ke ʻalu ʻo feinga ki he ngaahi nofo‘anga ʻi muʻá, naʻa kuo fakaafe‘i mai ki ai ha taha ʻoku mā‘olunga ange ʻiate koe.

He ka pehē: ʻe ha‘u ʻa e toko taha naʻá ne fakaafe‘i koé ‘o pehē atu, ‛Faka‘atā ange muʻa ʻa e nofoʻanga ko ʻená maʻae toko taha ko eni̇́.’ Peá te ke toki mā ai, ʻo ke hiki ki he nofo‘anga mā‘ulalo tahá.

Ka ʻoka fakaafe‘i koe ‘e ha taha, peá ke ʻalu ‘o nofo ʻi he nofo‘anga mā‘ulalo tahá, koeʻuhi̇̄ ka haʻu leva ʻa e toko taha naʻá ne fakaafe‘i koé, te ne toki pehē atu kiate koe, ‛iʻoku kāinga, kātaki mai koe ki muʻa!’ Peá te ke toki lāngilangi‘ia ai ʻi he ha‘oha‘onga ‘o e kau fakaafe ki he kātoangá.
He ko ia kotoa pē ʻoku māʻolunga ʻene fakakaukau kiate iá, ‘e tuku hifo ki lalo. Pea ko ia ʻoku anga fakatōkilalo, ‘e hākeakiʻi ia.”

Pea toki pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he tangata naʻá ne fakaafe‘i iá: ‟Ka fai leva ha‘o fakaafe, pē kātoanga kai, pea ‘oua te ke fakaafe‘i pē ho ngaahi kaungāmeʻá, mo ho kāingá, pea mo ho ngaahi kaungā‘api tu‘umālié. He te nau toe fakaafe‘i pē koe ki haʻanau kātoanga, ko e fetongi ho‘o ‘ofá.
Ka ʻoka ke ka fai leva ha‘o kātoanga, peá ke fakaafe‘i mai ʻa e kau masivá mo e kau mamateá, mo e heké, mo e kui̇́.
Pea ‘e tāpuaki‘i ai koe. He neongo ʻe ʻikai te nau toe lava ke totongi atu kiate koe, ʻe toki totongi kiate koe ‘e he ‘Otuá, ʻi he ʻaho ‘o e toetuʻu ʻa e kau lotumoʻoni̇́.”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ha toko taha naʻe kau he kau fakaafé, naʻá ne pehē kiate ia: ‟Ko ha taha monūʻia ia ʻe kau he kai kātoanga ʻi he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá!”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata naʻá ne tokonaki ha fu‘u kātoanga kai, pea naʻe fakaafe‘i ha tokolahi ki ai.
Pea ʻi he maau ʻa e fakaafé, naʻá ne fekau atu ʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́, ke ʻalu ‘o tala ki he kau fakaafé, ‛Kuo maau ʻa e meʻa kotoa! Mou meʻa mai ā ki he kātoangá.’

Ka naʻa nau poaki tahataha mai, ʻe ʻikai te nau lava mai ki he fakaafé. Na‘e pehē ‘e he ‘uluaki̇́, ‛Kātaki, ko aú, naʻá ku toki fakatau ha ku konga kelekele, pea kuo pau ke u ʻalu au ‘o sio ki ai. Ko ia, he‘ikai te u lava atu ki he fakaafé.’
Pea ko hono uá, naʻá ne pehē: ‛Kātaki, ko aú, naʻá ku toki fakatau mai ʻeku hoa‘i fanga pulu toho palau ‘e nima! Pea kuo pau ke u ʻalu ‘o ʻahiʻahiʻi ia. Ko ia, he‘ikai te u lava atu ki he fakaafé.’
Pea ko hono tolú, naʻá ne pehē: ‛Kātaki, naʻá ku toki mali au. Ko ia, he‘ikai ke u lava atu ki he fakaafé.’

Pea foki ʻa e tamaio‘eiki̇́ ‘o fakahoko ʻenau ngaahi li̇̄pooti ki hono ʻeiki̇́. Pea tuputāmaki ai hono ʻeiki̇́, ʻo ne talaange ki heʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́, ‛Fakato‘oto‘o atu ki he ngaahi hala pule‘anga kotoa pē mo e ngaahi hala loto koló! Fakaafe‘i kātoa mai ʻa e kau masivá, mo e kau mamateá, pea mo e kau kui̇́, mo e kau heké, ke nau haʻu ki heni.’
Pea foki mai ʻa e tamaio‘eiki̇́ ‘o tala ki hono ʻeiki̇́, ‛Tangata‘eiki, ko ʻeni kuo ‘osi fai ʻa e meʻa kotoa naʻá ke tu‘utu‘uni mai̇́. Ka ‘oku kei ʻatā pē ʻa e kātoangá ki ha kau fakaafe.’
Pea talaange ‘e hono ʻeiki̇́, ‛ʻalu atu ki he ngaahi hala ‘utá mo e ‘ū hala lotó ‘o toe fakaafe mai mei ai ha kakai kae‘oua leva kuo fonu hakehake hoku ‘api̇́.
He ko ʻeni ‘oku ou tala moʻoni atu, he‘ikai pē ke toe ʻinasi ʻi heʻeku kātoangá, ha taha he faʻahinga naʻá ku fuofua fakaafe‘i̇́.’”
Pea fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi, pea naʻe tafoki ‘o talaange kiate kinautolu,

‟Ka ʻi ai ha taha ʻoku haʻu kiate au kae ‘ikai hulu atu ʻene ‘ofa kiate aú ʻi heʻene ‘ofa ki heʻene tamai̇́ mo ʻene faʻeé, mo hono mali̇́, mo ʻene fanaú, pea mo hono fanga tokouá mo hono fanga tuofāfiné, pea naʻá mo ʻene mo‘ui̇́, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito lava ʻe ia ke hoko ko e tokotaha ako ʻaʻaku.
Peá ka ʻi ai ha taha ʻoku ʻikai te ne fua hono kolosí ‘o muimui mai kiate au, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito lava ʻe ia ke hoko ko e tokotaha ako ʻaʻaku.

Tau lau ko ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu ‘okú naʻe fakakaukau ke ne langa taua. ‘Ikai te ne tomuʻa ta‘utu hifo ‘o fika‘i pē ‘e fiha ʻene fakamolé, mo vakai pē ‘oku fe‘unga ʻene pa‘angá ki hono fakakakato ʻo e ngāue ʻe fai̇́?
He kapau te ne kamata ʻene langa tauá, kae ‘ikai te ne lava ke fakakakato, ‘e kata‘i ia ‘e he kakai kotoa pē te nau sio ki ai.
Peá te nau pehē: ‛Ko e tangatá ni naʻá ne kamata ʻene langá, ka kuo ‘ikai lava ke ne faka‘osi.’

Pea kapau ko ha Tuʻi ‘oku teu laka atu ke faitau mo ha tu‘i ‘e taha. ‘Ikai te ne tomuʻa nofo hifo ke fakapapau‘i pē ‘e fe‘unga ʻene kau tau ‘e toko taha manó ke ikuna‘i ʻa ia ‘oku ha‘u mo ʻene kau tau ‘e toko ua mano?
Pea kapau te ne pehē ‘e ia ‘e ‘ikai ke ne lava ‘o ikuna‘i hono fili̇́, ‘ikai te ne fekau atu ha kau talafekau ke nau ō ‘o alea melino, lolotonga ʻoku kei mama‘o ʻa e tu‘i ‘e tahá?
Pehē foki, kapau he‘ikai ke mou lava ‘o tukuange kotoa ho‘omou koloá, he‘ikai ke mou lava kimoutolu ‘o kau he‘eku kau akó.
Ko e meʻa ʻaonga ʻa e māsimá. Ka ‘oka mole hono konokoná, pea ‘e fēfē hano toe fakakonokona‘i ia?
‘Oku ‘ikai kei ʻaonga ia ki he kelekelé, pē ki he tuʻungavevé, ka ʻoku laku atu ia kituʻa. Ko ia ‘oku lava ‘o fanongó, peá ke ne tokanga ki he meʻa ʻoku ou leaʻaki̇́.”

15.text: Pea haha‘o mai kia Si̇̄sū ʻa e kotoa ʻo e kau tānaki tukuhaú mo e kau angahalá ke fanongo malanga ‘iate ia.
Pea femuhumuhuʻi ai ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e siana ko eni̇́, ‘okú naʻe talitali lelei ʻa e kau angahalá, ʻo ne ma‘u me‘atokoni fakataha mo kinautolu!”
Pea fai ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu ʻa e talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni̇́:

‟Tau pehē ko ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu na‘e ʻi ai ha‘ane fanga sipi ‘e toko teau, pea hē mei ai ha ki‘i toko taha. ‘Ikai te ne tuku ʻa e fanga sipi ʻe toko hivangofulu mā hivá ʻi honau kaikai‘angá, ka naʻe ʻalu atu ‘o kumi ʻa e sipi na‘e heé, kae ‘oua leva kuó ne ma‘u ia?
Peá ka ma‘u leva ia, pea ʻokú ne fua hake ia ʻo ʻai ki hono umá kuó ne fiefia lahi.
Pea naʻe ʻalu atu ki hono ʻapi̇́, ʻo ne toki ui mai hono ngaahi maheni̇́ mo hono ngaahi kaungā‘api̇́ ‘o tala kiate kinautolu, ‘Mou omi ke tau fakafiefia! He kuo toe ma‘u mai ʻeku sipi na‘e heé!”
ʻOkú ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu: ‟‘E pehē tofu pē ʻa e lahi ʻa e fiefia ʻi he langi̇́ ʻi he fakatomala ha toko taha, ʻi ha toko hivangofulu mā hiva ‘oku ‘ikai ha fiemaʻu ke nau fakatomala.”

‟Pea tau pehē ko ha fine‘eiki na‘e ʻi ai ʻene pa‘anga siliva ‘e hongofulu, pea ʻiloangé kuo mole haʻane pa‘anga siliva ‘e taha. ‘Ikai te ne tutu ʻene māamá, pea tafi hono falé ‘o kumi fakamātoato kae‘oua leva kuó ne ma‘u ʻene pa‘anga na‘e molé?
Pea ʻi heʻene maʻu iá, ʻokú ne ui mai leva hono ngaahi maheni̇́ mo hono ngaahi kaungā‘api̇́ ‘o tala kiate kinautolu, ‘Tau fakafiefia muʻa! He ko ʻeni kuo maʻu ʻeku pa‘anga na‘e molé!”
ʻOkú ou talaatu: ‟‘E pehē tofu pē ʻa e fiefia ʻa e kau ʻāngeló ʻa e ʻOtuá ʻi ha fakatomala ʻa ha foʻi angahala ʻe toko taha.”
Pea toe fai ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu mo e fo‘i talanoa fakatātā ko eni̇́: ‟Lau tokua na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata mo hano ongo foha.
Pea lea ange ʻe he foha si‘i̇́ ki heʻene tangata‘eiki̇́, ‛Tuku mai muʻa hoku ʻinasi̇́ ʻi ho‘o koloá.’ Ko ia naʻe hanga ‘e he tangata‘eiki̇́ ‘o vaeua ʻene koloá maʻa hono ongo fohá.
Pea fuoloa pē si‘i mei ai, naʻe fakamā‘opo‘opo kotoa ‘e he foha si‘i̇́ hono ʻinasi he koloá, ʻo ne fetukutuku atu ki ha fonua mama‘o, ‘o naʻe fakamoleki ai ʻene koloá he mo‘ui fakalusá.
Pea ʻi he ʻosi kotoa ʻene koloá, naʻe tō ha fu‘u honge he fonuá, pea kuo ‘ikai ke ne toe ma‘u ha meʻa ke kai.
Pea ʻalu leva ia ‘o ngāue totongi ki ha tangata he fonua ko iā. Pea fekau ‘e he tangatá, ke ne ʻalu ki heʻene ngoueʻangá, ‘o tokanga‘i ʻene fanga puaká.
Pea naʻe faʻa faka‘amu ʻe ia ke ne kai mai ʻa e me‘akai ʻa e fanga puaká, ka na‘e ‘ikai ke ‘oange ‘e ha taha ha meʻa ke ne kai.
Pea faifai pea haʻu kiate ia hono ʻatamai̇́, pea naʻe toki pehē: ‛‘Oku tokolahi pē ʻa e kau ngāue ʻa ʻeku tangata‘eiki̇́, ka ʻoku nau kai pea toe pē, ka ko ʻeni te u mate au heni he fiekaiá.
Te u tuʻu ʻo foki ki he‘eku tangata‘eiki̇́ ‘o talaange, ‘E Tamai, kuo u faiangahala ki he ‘Otuá ʻi langi, pea kiate koe foki.
‘Oku ‘ikai kei taau ke lau au ko ho foha. Ka ke lau pē muʻa au ko e toko taha ʻi ho‘o kau ngāue totongi̇́.’

Pea tuʻu hake ia ʻo ne ʻalu atu ke foki ki heʻene tangata‘eiki̇́. Kae lolotonga ʻene kei mamaʻó, naʻe mamata kiate ia ‘e heʻene tangata‘eiki̇́ pea ake ʻa e ʻofá ʻi hono lotó, ‘o naʻe lele atu ‘o fā‘ofua mo ‘uma kiate ia.
Pea lea ange hono fohá kiate ia, ‛ʻE tamai, kuo u faiangahala ki he ‘Otuá ʻi langi, pea mo koe foki. Pea ‘oku ‘ikai kei taau ke lau au ko ho foha.’
Ka naʻe tala ‘e he tangata‘eiki̇́ ki heʻene kau ngāué, ‛Mou fakavavevave ‘o to‘o mai ʻa e pulupulu fakalāngilangi ‘o ‘ai kiate ia. Pea ‘ai ha mama ki hono nimá mo ha sū ki hono vaʻé.
Pea taki mai mo e ki‘i pulu sino tahá ‘o tāmateʻi ke tau kai fakafiefia.
He ko hoku foha ʻeni na‘e maté kuo toe moʻui, na‘e hē, ka kuo toe foki mai.’ Pea ko ia naʻe kamata leva ʻenau fakafiefiá.
Kae lolotonga iá ‘oku kei ʻi ‘uta e foha lahi̇́. Pea ʻi heʻene foki atu ‘o fakaofiofi atu ki ‘api̇́, naʻá ne fanongo ki he hiva mo e fakafiefiá.
Pea naʻe ui ange ʻa e tamaio‘eiki ‘e taha ʻi honau ‘api̇́, ‘o naʻe ʻeke ki ai pē ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ‘oku hokó.
Pea naʻe talaange kiate ia, ‛Ko ho tehiná, kuo foki mo‘ui mai ki ʻapi. Pea kuo tāmateʻi ‘e ho‘o tangata‘eiki̇́ ʻa e ki‘i pulu sino tahá koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻene toefoki moʻui mai̇́.’
Pea ‘ita lahi ai ia, ʻo ‘ikai ke ne fie hū ki fale. Ko ia naʻe hū kituʻa ʻa e tangata‘eiki̇́ ‘o fakakolekole kiate ia ke ne hū ange muʻa ki fale.

Kae talitu‘u pē ʻe ia ki heʻene tangata‘eiki̇́, ʻo pehē: ‛Ko e ta‘u ʻeni ‘e fiha ʻeku ngāue kiate koe ‘o hangē ha pōpulá, mo fakaongo ai pē kiate koe! Kae hala‘atā ke ke tuku mai ha ki‘i kosi ke u fakafiefia ʻaki mo hoku ngaahi kaungāmeʻá.
Ka ʻi he foki mai leva ho foha ko ē naʻá ne maumauʻi noa ho‘o pa‘angá he kau fe‘auaki, kuó ke tu‘utu‘uni ke tāmate‘i ʻa e ki‘i pulu faka‘ofo‘ofa tahá, mo fai ha kātoanga fakafiefia kiate ia.’
Pea pehēange ‘e he tangata‘eiki̇́, ‛Si‘oku foha. Ko koé, ‘okú ta nofo ma‘u pē, pea ko ʻeku meʻa kotoa pē, ko ho‘o meʻa.
Ka ʻoku totonu pē ke tau fiefia mo fai kātoanga koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ho tehina na‘e maté, kuo toe mo‘ui; na‘e mole, ka kuo toe maʻu mai ia.’”

16.text: Pea toe fai foki ‘e Si̇̄sū mo e talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni̇́ ki heʻene kau akó: ‟Na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata koloaʻia, ʻa ia naʻe lāunga‘i mai ki ai, ‘oku kai ‘e heʻene tangata tauhi koloá, ʻene koloá.

Ko ia, naʻe ui mai ʻe he tangata koloaʻiá ʻene tauhi koloá, pea naʻe ʻeke ange, ʻo pehē: ‛Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ko ʻeni kuo fakahā mai kiate au, ‘o kau kiate koé? ʻOmai ha fakamatala hoʻo ngaué, he ko eni, he‘ikai te ke kei hoko ko ʻeku tauhi koloa.’

Pea pehē ‘e he tauhi koloá ʻi hono lotó, ‛Ko e hā nai ʻeku meʻa ‘e fai he taimi ni̇́? He ko ʻeni ‘e tuli au, ʻe hoko pulé, mei̇́ he ngāué! Ka ‘oku ou nima mamahi he ngoué, pea ʻoku ou mā foki he kolekolé.’
Ko eni, ‘oku ou ʻiloʻeku meʻa ke fai̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ ka tuli au he ngāué, pea ʻe kei tali lelei pē au ‘e he kakai̇́, ki honau ngaahi ‘api̇́.
Ko ia, naʻá ne ui tahataha mai leva ʻa e kakai na‘e mo‘ua ki he tangata koloa‘iá, ʻo ne fehu‘i ange ki he ‘uluaki̇́, ‛Naʻe fiha ho mo‘ua ki hoku pulé?’
Pea talaange ‘e he toko taha ko iā, ‛Ko e hina lolo ‘ōlive ‘e teau.’ Pea naʻe talaange kiate ia, ‛Ha‘u vave ‘o ‘atu ʻa e tohi mo‘uá, peá ke nofo hifo ʻo tohi ai, ko e hina pē ‘e nimangofulu!’
Hili ia, pea naʻe toe fehu‘i ange ki ha tangata ko hono uá, ‛‘Oku fiha ho mo‘uá ‘ou?’

Pea mālie‘ia ʻaupito ʻa e tangata koloʻiá heʻene tauhi koloa kākaá, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻene poto he fakakaukaú. He ʻoku poto ange ʻa e kakai ‘o maama ko ʻeni̇́ he kakai ‘o e māama kahaʻú, ʻi hono fakakaukauʻi ʻo e kahaʻú!

Ko ia ʻoku tala moʻoni atu kiate kimoutolu, Mou faka‘aonga‘i ʻa e koloa fakamāmani̇́ ke ma‘u ʻaki mai ha mou ngaahi kaungāmeʻa koeʻuhi̇̄ ʻoka ‘osi ʻa e koloa ko iā, pea talitali fiefia kimoutolu ki he nofoʻanga ta‘engatá.
Ka ai ha taha ‘oku falala‘anga ʻi ha meʻa si‘isi‘i̇, ‘e falala‘anga foki ia ʻi ha meʻa lahi peá ka ai ha taha ‘oku faihala ʻi ha meʻa siʻi̇, ‘e faihala foki ia ʻi ha meʻa lahi.
Ko ia, kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ke mou falala‘anga ʻi hono ngāueʻaki ʻa e koloa fakamāmani̇́, pea ko hai te ne fie fakafalala atu ʻa e koloa mo‘oni̇́?
Pea kapau ‘oku ‘ikai ke mou falalaʻanga ʻi he tauhi ʻo e koloa kehé, pea ko hai te ne fie foaki atu ha koloa ma‘amoutolu pē?

‘E ‘ikai lava ‘e ha tamaio‘eiki ‘o fakaongoongo ki ha ongo ʻeiki ‘e toko ua. He kuo pau ke ne fehiʻa ki he taha kae ʻofa ki he taha, pea te ne faimoʻoni ki he taha kae faikākā ki he taha. ‘Oku taʻemalava ke mou fakatou tauhi ki he ‘Otuá pea mo e koloá.”
Pea kau Fālesi, ʻa ia naʻa nau ʻofa ki he paʻanga, naʻa nau fanongo ki he lau ko ia ʻa Sīsuú, pea nau manuki ki ai.

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku mou fai maʻu pē ke hā lelei ki he sio ʻa e kakai̇́, ka ‘oku ʻafioʻi ʻe he ‘Otuá ia ʻa e anga homou lotó. He ko e ngaahi meʻa ‘oku hā mahu‘inga ki he sio ʻa e kakai̇́ ‘oku ‘ikai hano mahu‘inga ʻoʻona ki he ʻafio mai ʻa e ‘Otuá.

Ko e Lao ʻa Mōsesé mo e ngaahi Tohi ʻa e kau Palōfitá naʻa nau lea ʻo aʻu mai kia Sione. Pea hili ʻa e taimi ko iā, kuo malanga ʻaki ʻeni ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá, pea ʻoku nimamoeva‘e ʻa e taha kotoa ke hū ki ai.
‘E faingofua ange ke mole ʻa e langi̇́ mo māmani ʻi ha mole ha foʻi koma pē piliote ‘e taha ‘o e Folofolá.
Ko ia kotoa pē ʻe vete mo hono mali̇́ pea naʻe toe mali mo ha taha kehe, ʻokú ne feʻauaki, pea ko e tangata ʻe toe mali mo ha fefine kuo vete mo hono mali̇́, ʻokú ne feʻauaki.”
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata tu‘umālie pea teunga fakaʻofoʻofa mo kai kātoanga he ʻaho kotoa pē.
Pea ai foki mo ha motuʻa masiva, ko Lāsalosi hono hingoá, naʻe faʻa nofo atu ʻi he veʻe matapā ki hono ʻapi̇́, ʻa ia naʻe papala kotoa siʻono sinó.
Pea faka‘amu ʻa Lāsalosi ke kai mai he ngaahi momo naʻe ngangana ki he lalo tēpile ʻa e tangata tu‘umālié. He ko e fanga kulii̇́ foki naʻa nau ʻemo hono papalá.
Pea faifai, pea mate ʻa e tangata masivá, pea naʻe ‘ave ia ‘e he kau ʻāngeló ke nofo ʻi he tafatafa ʻaki ‘o ʻĒpalahamé. Pea mate mo e tangata tu‘umālié foki, pea tanu ia.
Pea ʻi heʻene ʻi heli̇́, ‘o faingataʻaʻia lahi ai̇́, naʻá ne sio hake, ‘oku ʻasi mama‘o mai ʻa ʻĒpalahame pea mo Lāsalosi ʻoku nofo ʻi hono tafatafa‘aki̇́.

Pea naʻe kaila atu ia kia ʻĒpalahame: ‟Tangataʻeiki ʻĒpalahame, ʻaloʻofa mai kiate au! Fekau ange muʻa ʻa Lāsalosi ke unu hono muʻatuhú he vai̇́ ‘o ʻai mai ke fakamokomoko ʻaki hoku ʻeleló ni, he ‘oku ou faingataʻaʻia ‘aupito he afi ko eni̇́.”

Ka naʻe tali ʻa ʻĒpalahamé ki ai: ‟Tangata, manatu‘i naʻá ke ma‘u ʻe koe ʻa e meʻa lelei kotoa pē, ʻi ho‘o kei mo‘ui̇́! Pea ko Lāsalosi, naʻá ne ma‘u ʻa e ngaahi kovi̇́. Ka ko eni, ʻi he feituʻu ni, kuo maʻu nonga ia ka ke maʻu ʻe koe ʻa e mamahi̇́.
Pea ʻāsili ai̇́, he kuo ʻosi fokotuʻu ha fuʻu lilifa ʻi hotau vahaʻá koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ʻoua pē naʻa toe lava ha taha ia ‘o laka atu mei heni ki hena, pē laka mai mei hena ki heni.”
Pea pehē mai ‘e he tangata tu‘umālié: ‟Tangataʻeiki, kapau ko iā pea ʻoku ou kole ke ke fekau atu muʻa ʻa Lāsalosi ke ʻalu ki homau ‘api̇́,
He ʻoku ʻi ai hoku ngaahi tokoua ai ‘e toko nima, ke ne fakatokanga kiate kinautolu ke ‘oua naʻá nau toe haʻu mo kinautolu foki ki he feitu‘u fakamamahi ko eni̇́.”
Ka naʻe pehē ange ‘e ʻĒpalahame: ‟‘Oku nau maʻu pē ʻa e ngaahi Tohi ʻa Mōsesé pea mo e kau Palōfitá. ʻOku taau ke nau tokanga muʻa ʻo fakaongo ki ai.”
Pea pehēange ‘e he tangata tu‘umālié: ‟‘Ikai! ‘E Tangataʻeiki ʻĒpalahame, ka ‘okapau ‘e toefoki atu ha taha mei he maté kiate kinautolu, te nau fakatomala ʻo tafoki ki he ‘Otuá.”
Ka naʻe pehēange ‘e ʻĒpalahame ki ai: ‟Kapau ‘e ‘ikai ke nau tokanga ki he lau ʻa Mōsese mo e kau palōfitá, he‘ikai ‘aupito lava ke fakalotoʻi kinautolu neongo ʻe toetuʻu ha taha mei he maté.”

17.text: Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó: ‟‘E ʻi ai ma‘u pē ha ngaahi meʻa fakatupu angahala ki he kakai̇́, ka ʻoku malaʻia ʻa e toko taha ‘e tupu mei ai ʻa e angahalá.
Na‘e mei sai ange kiate ia, ʻokapau naʻe nono‘o ha fu‘u makakafu ʻi hono kiá, pea li̇̄ ia ki he moana lolotó, heʻene hoko ko e fakatupu angahala ki ha taha ʻo e faʻahinga iiki̇́ ni ʻoku lotú.
Ko ia, mou tokanga kiate kimoutolu. Kapau ʻe fai ʻe ha taha ʻi he kāingalotú, ha angahala, pea mou fakatonutonu ia. Peá ka naʻe ka fakatomala ai, pea fakamolemole‘i ia.
Pea kapau ʻe faikovi kiate koe ha taha ‘o tu‘o fitu he ʻaho pea tuʻo fitu ai pē ʻene toutou pehē atu kiate koe, ‘Oku ou fakatomala, ke ke fakamolemole‘i pē ia.”
Pea pehēange ʻa e kau ʻApositoló ki he ʻEiki̇́: ‟Ke ke fakalahi ange muʻa ʻemau tui̇́!”

Pea folofola ange ʻa e ʻEiki̇́: ‟Kapau na‘e lahi tatau ho‘omou tui̇́ mo ha tenga‘i mūsita, pea ‘e lava pē ke mou pehē ki he fu‘u molipeli ko eni̇́, Mataʻaki koe pea hiki ʻo tō ʻi tahi, pea ‘e talangofua ia kiate kimoutolu.
Pea ko hai ‘iate kimoutolu, ‘e foki mai ha‘ane tamaio‘eiki ki ʻapi, ‘oka hili ha‘ane palau pē tauhisipi ʻi ‘uta, peá ke pehēange ki ai, Ha‘u ā ki fale ‘o ma‘u ha‘o me‘atokoni?
ʻIkai te ke tomuʻa talaange, Haʻu ‘o teuteu mai ʻeku me‘atokoni̇ efiafi̇́ peá ke fetongi ho valá ‘o teuteu ʻa e tēpilé, ka u kai au mo inu peá ka hili iá, peá ke toki kai koe mo inu?
He ‘e toe fakamālōʻia makehe koā ha tamaio‘eiki koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻene fai pē ʻa e ngaahi meʻa naʻe totonu ke ne fai̇́?

Pehē foki mo kimoutolu. ʻOka lava kotoa ʻa e ngaahi ngāue na‘e totonu ke mou fai̇́, peá ke mou toki pehē: Ko e kau tamaioʻeiki taʻetaau pē ʻa kimautolu, kuo mau fai pē ʻa e fatongia naʻe totonu ke mau fai̇́.”
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Selusalemá, naʻá ne fou atu ʻi he kauʻā fonua ‘o Samēlia mo Kāleli̇́.
Pea ʻi heʻene fakaofiofi atu ki ha ki‘i kolo ai, naʻe fakafetaulaki mai kiate ia ha kau kilia ‘e toko hongofulu, ʻoku nau tutuʻu mai pē mei he mama‘ó,
Pea nau kaila leʻolahi mai kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟ʻEiki Si̇̄sū, ke ke meesi mai muʻa kiate kimautolu.”
Pea ʻi he mamata atu ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolú, naʻá ne folofol: ‟Mou ō atu, ʻo fakahā kimoutolu ki he kau taulaʻeiki̇́.” Pea ʻoku pehē: lolotonga ʻenau kei fononga atú, kuo fakamaʻa honau kiliá.
Pea ʻi he fakatokanga‘i hifo ‘e ha toko taha ‘iate kinautolu, tā kuo maʻa hono kiliá, naʻá ne foki mai mo ne fakafeta‘i le‘olahi ki he ‘Otuá.
Pea naʻe tō foʻohifo atu ki he va‘e ‘o Si̇̄suú ‘o fakamālō ange kiate ia. Pea ko e tangata Samēlia ia.
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Ikai koā ko e toko hongofulu na‘e fakamaʻá? Pea ko e fē ʻa e toko hivá ia ko eé?
Kuo ʻikai koā ha taha ke ne fie foki mai ʻo fakamālōʻia ʻa e ʻOtuá, ka ko e muli pē ko ʻeni̇́?”
Pea naʻe folofola kiate ia: ‟Tu‘u hake ʻo ʻalu. Kuo fakamo‘ui koe koe‘uhi̇́ ko ho‘o tui̇́.”

Pea na‘e fehu‘i ange ‘e ha kau Fālesi kia Si̇̄sū, pē ‘e hoko fakakū mai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá. Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟ʻE ʻikai hokomai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá ʻi ha founga ʻe ala ke te mamata ki ai.
Pea ʻe ‘ikai lava ke pehē ‘e ha taha, ‛Ko ʻeni ia! Sio mai ki heni!’ pē ‛Ko ʻena ia! Sio atu ki hē!’ He ko e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá ‘oku ʻi homou lotolotongá.”
Pea toe pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó: ‟‘E hokomai ha taimi, ʻa ia te mou faka‘amu ai ke mou mamata ki ha fo‘i ʻaho pē ‘e taha ʻo e Foha ‘o e Tangatá, ka he‘ikai te mou lava.
Pea ʻe pehēatu ‘e he kakai̇́, ‛Ko ʻena ia! Sio atu ki hena!’ pē ‛Ko ʻeni ia! Sio mai ki heni!’ kae ʻoua ʻaupito naʻa mou muimui ki ai pē kumi ki ai.
He ko e hokomai ʻa e ʻaho ʻo e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ʻe hangē tofu pē ko e ʻuhilá ʻene tapa ʻo maamangia ai ʻa e langi̇́, mei hono tuliki ʻe taha ki hono tuliki ʻe taha.
Ka kuo pau ke tomuʻa fakamamahi‘i lahi ia pea fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi ia ‘e he kakai ‘o e kuonga ko eni̇́.
Pea hangē tofu pē ko e meʻa naʻe hoko he kuonga ‘o Noá, ʻe pehē tofu pē ʻene hoko, ʻi he ngaahi ʻaho ʻo e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.
He na‘e kai, mo inu, mo alea mali ʻa e kakai̇́ ʻo aʻu pē ki he ʻaho ʻo e fakahekeheka ʻa Noa ki he ʻAʻaké. Pea tō leva ʻa e lōmaki ki he fonuá ‘o nau melemo kotoa ai.
Naʻe pehē pē foki mo e meʻa na‘e hoko he kuonga ‘o Loté. Na‘e kai pē mo inu ʻa e kakai̇́ pea nau fakatau koloa mai mo fakatau koloa atu pea nau tō ngoue, mo langa fale.
Ka ʻi he ʻaho pē na‘e mavahe ai ʻa Lote mei Sōtomá, naʻe tō hifo ha ʻuha afi mo ha maka vela mei he langi̇́, ‘o nau mate kātoa ai.
‘E pehē tofu pē ʻi he ʻaho ‘e hāʻele mai ai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.

ʻOka hokomai ʻa e ʻaho ko iā, ʻoku ʻi ai ha taha ‘oku nofo he funga ʻato hono falé, peá ke ‘oua te ne toe hifo ke to‘o ha meʻa mei lotofale. Pehē foki, ka ai ha taha ‘oku ʻi ‘uta, ke ʻoua naʻá ne toe foki ki kolo ke ʻomai ha meʻa mei ai.
Manatu‘i ʻa e meʻa na‘e hoko ki he hoa ‘o Loté.
Ko ia ‘e feinga ke fakahaofi ʻene mo‘ui̇́, ko ʻene tuku ia ke mole ʻene mo‘ui̇́. Pea ko ia ‘e loto ke mole ʻene mo‘ui̇́, ko ʻene fakahaofi̇́ ia.
‘Oku ou tala moʻoni atu, ʻi he pō ko iā, ʻe ai ha toko ua te na tākoto ʻi ha mohenga pē ʻe taha pea ‘e ‘ave ʻa e taha kae tuku pē ʻa e taha.
ʻE ai ha ongo fafine, te na feimeʻatokoni fakataha, pea ‘e ‘ave ʻa e taha kae tuku pē ʻa e taha.

Pea ʻeke ange ‘e he kau ako ‘o pehē: ‛Ko e fē feituʻu ‘e hoko ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, ʻEiki?’ Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, Ko e feitu‘u ‘oku li̇̄ ki ai ha ʻangaʻanga, ‘e fakapotanga ki ai ʻa e fanga ‘i̇̄kalé,”

18.text: Pea fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ha talanoa fakatātā ki he‘ene kau akó, ko ʻene fakahinohino kinautolu ke nau lotu ma‘u pē ʻo ‘oua ‘e fiu he faʻa lotú,
Pea naʻe pehē: ‟Na‘e ʻi ai ha fakamaau ʻi ha ki‘i kolo ‘e taha. Pea ko e fakamāau ko iā na‘e ‘ikai ke ne ʻapasia ki he ‘Otuá, pē te ne toka‘i ha taha.
Pea na‘e ʻi ai foki ha uitou he kolo ko iā, na‘e faʻa ʻalu ‘o tangi ange ki he fakamāaú, ʻo pehē: ‛Ke ke fai muʻa ʻa e fakamaau totonú ʻi hoku vā mo hoku fili̇́!’
Pea na‘e fuoloa mo e ta‘etali ‘e he fakamāaú ʻa e kole ʻa e uitoú. Kae faifai̇́ pea naʻe pehē ʻi hono lotó, ‛Neongo ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘aku momo‘i ʻapasia ki he ‘Otuá, pē te u tokaʻi ha taha;
Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e toutou tuʻu mai ʻa e uitou ko eni̇́, te u fai maʻana ʻa e fakamaau totonú, naʻa ‘ikai tuku ʻene toutou fakahoha‘asi aú pea u pāhia ai.’”
Pea folofola ʻa e ʻEiki̇́: ‟Mou fanongo ange ā ki he lau ʻa e fakamaau faikovi ko eni̇́.
Pea ʻe ʻikai koā ke fai ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e fakamaau totonú ki heʻene kakai fili̇́, ʻa ia ‘oku nau lotu kiate ia he ʻaho mo e pō, neongo ʻene faituai kiate kinautolú?
‘Oku ou tala moʻoni atu kiate kimoutolu, ʻe vave pē ʻene fai ʻa e fakamaau totonú kiate kinautolú. Ka ‘oka hoko mai ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ki māmani, te ne kei ma‘u ha kakai ‘oku tui pehē?”
Pea naʻá ne fai mo e talanoa fakatātā ko eni̇́, ke fanongo ki ai ʻa e kakai naʻe falala heʻenau mā‘oni‘oni ʻanautolú pē, ka nau sio lalo ki he kakai kehé.
‟Tokua na‘e ʻalu hake ha ongo tangata ki he Temipalé, ke fai ha‘ana lotu. Ko e toko taha ko ha Fālesi, pea ko e toko taha ko ha tangata tānaki tukuhau.

Pea tu‘u mavahe atu ʻa e Fālesi̇́ ‘o fai ai ʻene lotú, ʻo ne pehē: ‛‘E ‘Otua, ‘oku ou fakamālō atu ʻi he ‘ikai te u hangē ko e kakai kehé, ʻo mānumanu, pē kākā, pē fe‘auaki, pea ‘ikai foki ke u hangē ko e motuʻa tānaki tukuhau ko eni̇́.
‘Oku ou ‘aukai tuʻo ua ʻi he uike, pea u foaki ʻa e vahe hongofulu ‘o e koloa kotoa ‘oku ou ma‘u!’

Ka ko e tangata tānaki tukuhaú, naʻá ne tuʻu pē mei he mama‘ó, ʻo ʻikai te ne faʻa lava ke hiki hake hono matá ʻo sio ki langi, pea mamahi moʻon hono lotó, ʻo ne pehē: ‘E ʻOtua, ke ke fakamolemoleʻi ange muʻa au, he ko e angahala.”

‟‘Oku ou tala moʻoni atu kiate kimoutolu, na‘e foki ʻa e tangatá ko iā ki hono ‘api̇́, kuó ne maʻu ʻa e fakatonuhia mei̇́ he ʻOtua. He ko ia kotoa pē ‘okú naʻe hiki hake iá, ‘e fakamā‘ulaloʻi. Ka ko ia kotoa pē ‘okú naʻe fakatōkilaloʻi iá, ‘e fakalāngilangi‘i.”
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha mātuʻa naʻa nau fetuku mai ʻenau fānaú kia Si̇̄sū, ke ne tāpuaki‘i. Pea ʻi he mamata ki ai ʻa e kau akó, naʻa nau tafulu‘i kinautolu.

Ka naʻe ui mai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e longa‘i fānaú kiate ia, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Tuku pē ke ōmai kiate au ʻa e longa‘i fānaú ʻo ʻoua ‘e ta‘ofi kinautolu, he ko e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá, ʻoku maʻae faʻahinga ʻoku hangē ko e fānaú.
‘Oku ou tala moʻoni atu kiate kimoutolu, kapau ʻe ‘ikai ke mou tali ʻa e Puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá hangē ha fānau iikí, he‘ikai ‘aupito te mou lava ke hū ki ai!”
Pea na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata mei he houʻeiki̇́ naʻá ne fehu‘i ange kiate ia, ʻo pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki lelei, Ko e hā te u fai ka u ma‘u ai ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Ko e hā ‘okú ke ui ai au ko e lelei̇́? Ko e ‘Otuá pē taha ‘oku lelei̇́.
‘Okú ke ʻiloʻi pē ʻa e ngaahi fekaú, ‛‘Oua naʻá ke fe‘auaki. ‘Oua naʻá ke fakapō. ‘Oua naʻá ke kaihaʻa. ‘Oua naʻá ke fakamo‘oni loi. Faka‘apa‘apa ki ho‘o tamai̇́ mo ho‘o fa‘eé.’”
Pea pehēange ‘e he tangatá: ‟Talu ʻeku kei si‘i mo ʻeku tauhi ʻa e ngaahi fekau ko eni̇́.”

Pea ʻi he fanongo ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai̇́, naʻá ne pehēange kiate ia: ‟‘Oku toe pē ha meʻa ‘e taha ke ke fai! ʻAlu ‘o fakatau atu kotoa ʻa e koloa ‘okú ke ma‘ú, pea foaki hono paʻangá maʻae masivá, pea te ke ma‘u ha fuʻu koloa ʻi langi, peá ke ha‘u ‘o muimui kiate au.”
Pea ʻi heʻene fanongo ki ai̇́, naʻá ne loto mamahi ‘aupito ai, he ko e tangata ia na‘e lahi ʻene koloá.
Pea vakai atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘oku mata mamahi ‘aupito ʻa e tangatá, ʻo ne pehēange: ‟‘Oku faingataʻa ‘aupito ke hū ha taha koloa‘ia ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.
He ko hono mo‘oni̇́, ‘oku faingofua ange ke hū ha kāmeli ʻi ha ava‘i hui tuitui, ʻi he hū ha taha koloa‘ia, ki he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
Pea ko e ni‘ihi na‘e fanongo ki heʻene lau ko iā, naʻa nau pehēange: ‟Pea ko hai leva ai ‘e lava ke fakamoʻui?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku taʻemalava ʻi he vakai ʻa e tangatá, ‘oku malava pē ia ‘e he ‘Otuá.”
Pea pehēange ai ‘e Pita kiate ia: ‟Ko eni, kuo mau li̇̄ ʻaki ʻemau meʻa kotoa, ka mau muimui kiate koe.”

Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku ou tala moʻoni atu kiate kimoutolu, ka ʻi ai ha taha te ne tukuange hono ‘api̇́, pē ko hono uaifi̇́, pē ko hono ngaahi tokouá, pē ko ʻene ongo mātuʻá, pē ko ʻene fānaú, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá;
Te naʻe toe ma‘u pē ʻi he mo‘ui ko ʻeni̇́ ‘o liunga lahi. Pea ʻi he maama kahaʻú, te ne maʻu ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá.”

Pea taki atu ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e toko hongofulu mā uá, ‘o naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko ʻetau ō hake ʻeni ki Selusalema, pea ko e meʻa kotoa pē na‘e tohi ‘e he kau Palōfitá ‘o kau ki he Foha ‘o e Tangatá, kuo pau ke fakakakato.
He ʻe tuku atu ia ki he kau Senitailé, pea te nau fakakata ʻaki ia, mo ngaohikovia, mo ʻanuhia!
Peá te nau tāaʻi ia, pea mo tāmate‘i ia, ka ʻi he ʻaho hono tolu mei ai̇́ te ne toetu‘u mei he maté.”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke mahino kiate kinautolu ʻa e lau ko ia ʻa Sīsuú, he kuo fufū hono ‘uhingá meiate kinautolu ʻo ʻikai mahino kiate kinautolu ʻa e meʻa naʻá ne folofolaʻaki̇́.
Pea ʻi he fakaofiofi atu ʻa e fononga ʻa Sīsuú, ki Sēlikoó, naʻe ʻi ai ha tangata kui naʻe ta‘utu mai he veʻehalá, ʻo fai ʻene kolekole.
Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa e tangatá ki he longolongoaʻa mai ʻa e fonongá, naʻá ne ʻeke holo pē ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ‘oku hokó.
Pea nau talaange kiate ia: ‟Ko Si̇̄sū mei Nāsaleti̇́ ʻoku fou mai heni.”
Pea kalanga atu leva ʻa e tangata kui̇́: ‟Si̇̄sū, ʻAlo ‘o Tēvita ē! ʻAloʻofa mai muʻa kiate au!”
Ka naʻe fekau ʻekinautolu naʻe muʻomuʻa kia Si̇̄suú ke ne longo mo e longoaʻa. Kae toe taha hake ʻene kailá ʻaʻana: ‟ʻAlo ‘o Tēvita ē! ʻAloʻofa mai muʻa kiate au!”
Pea tu‘u hifo ai ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o naʻe fekau ke taki mai ʻa e tangata kui̇́ kiate ia. Pea ʻi heʻene fakaofiofi mai, naʻá ne ʻeke ange kiate ia,
‟Ko e hā ‘okú ke loto ke u fai ma‘au?” Pea pehēange ‘e he tangata kui̇́: ‟ʻEiki, ‘oku ou fakaʻamu ke u ʻā.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ke ke ʻā! Kuo fakamo‘ui koe ʻe ho‘o tui̇́!”
Pea naʻe ʻā ai pē ʻa e mata ‘o e tangatá, ʻo ne muimui kia Sīsuú, mo fakamālōʻia ʻa e ‘Otuá. Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa e kakai̇́ kotoa pē, ki he meʻa kuo hokó, naʻa nau fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otuá.

19.text: Pea hū atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Sēlikō ʻo ne fou atu ʻi he loto koló.
Pea tā na‘e nofo ai ha tangata ko Sākeasi, hono hingoá, ʻa ia ko e pule tānaki tukuhau ia, pea ko e tangata tu‘umālie ʻaupito.
Pea na‘e faka‘amu ʻa Sākeasi ke sio kia Si̇̄sū pē ko hai ia, ka na‘e ‘ikai ke ne lava, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e tokolahi ʻa e fuʻu kakai̇́, he ko e tangata pukupuku ia.
Ko ia, naʻá ne lele muʻomuʻa atu ‘o naʻe kaka ʻi ha fu‘u sukamino koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ne mamata kiate ia, he naʻe fou atu ʻa Si̇̄sū he feituʻu ko iā.
Pea ʻi he aʻu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki ai̇́, naʻá ne hanga hake ‘o naʻe pehē kiate ia: ‟Sākeasi, hifo ke vave! He kuo pau ke u afe atu ʻo nofo ʻi ho ‘api̇́ he ʻahó ni.”
Pea hifo fakavave leva ʻa Sākeasi ‘o naʻe talitali fiefia ʻa Si̇̄sū.
Pea ko e kakai kotoa pē naʻa nau sio ki ai̇́ naʻa nau lāunga, ʻo pehē: ‟Kuo ʻalu ʻa e sianá ni ‘o nofo he ʻapi ‘o ha tangata angahala.”

Ka naʻe tu‘u hake ʻa Sākeasi ‘o lea ki he ʻEiki̇́: ‟ʻEiki! Ko au eni, te u foaki ʻa e vaeua ‘o ʻeku koloá maʻae masivá! Peá te u totongi fakafoki ‘o liunga fā, ʻa e pa‘anga ʻa ha taha pē naʻá ku kākaa‘i.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kia Sākeasi: ‟Ko e ʻaho ni̇́, kuo hoko mai ʻa e fakamo‘ui̇́ ki he ʻapi ko eni̇́, he ko e tangatá ni foki ko e hako moʻoni ia ‘o ʻĒpalahame.
He naʻe ha‘u ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ke kumi ‘o fakamoʻui ʻa e faʻahinga kuo molé.”

Lolotonga ʻa e kei fanongo ʻa e kakai̇́ ki heʻene ngaahi fakahinohinó, naʻá ne toe lea kiate kinautolu ʻi ha talanoa fakatātā ʻe taha, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ʻamanaki ʻa e tokolahi, kuo vave ke hoko mai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.
Ko ia naʻá ne pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟Na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata ko ha ʻeiki, naʻá ne ʻalu ki ha fonua mama‘o ke hilifaki kalauni ia ai, pea hili iá peá ke ne toefoki mai.

Ko ia, naʻá ne ui mai haʻane kau tamaioʻeiki ‘e toko hongofulu, ʻo ne ʻange kiate kinautolu ha pa‘anga mina ʻe hongofulu, ʻo ne talaange kiate kinautolu, Mou fakatupu ʻa e pa‘angá ni, ʻo aʻu ki haʻaku toefoki mai̇.
Ka na‘e fehiʻa ‘aupito kiate ia ʻa e kakai ‘o hono fonuá, pea nau tukuatu ha kau talafekau ke nau ʻalu ʻo tala, ʻo pehē: ‘Oku ‘ikai te mau loto ke tu‘i ʻa e tangata ko ʻená kiate kimautolu.

Ka naʻe fakanofo Tuʻi ʻa e tangatá, pea naʻe foki mai ki hono fonuá. Naʻá ne toki fekau ke ui mai ʻene kau tamaio‘eiki̇́, ʻa ia naʻá ne ʻange ki ai ʻa e paʻangá, ke vakai pē ko e hā ʻa e tupu naʻe maʻu, mei̇́ he paʻangá.
Pea ha‘u ʻa e ‘uluaki tamaio‘eiki̇́ ‘o naʻe pehēange, Tangata‘eiki, ko e pa‘anga ko ē naʻá ke tuku mai kiate aú, ko ʻeni kuo liunga hongofulu ʻa e tupu naʻe maʻu ai̇́.
Pea folofola ange ‘e he tu‘i̇́, Mālō e ngāue lelei, siʻi tamaio‘eiki falala‘anga. Koeʻuhi̇̄ kuó ke falalaʻanga ʻi ha meʻa siʻi, ha‘u koe ‘o pule ki ha kolo ‘e hongofulu.
Pea tu‘u mai mo e tamaio‘eiki hono uá ‘o pehēange, Tangata‘eiki, ko e pa‘anga naʻá ke tuku mai kiate aú, kuo tupu ‘o liunga nima.
Pea folofola ange ‘e he tu‘i̇́, ‘E tuku atu kiate koe foki ke ke pule ki ha kolo ‘e nima.
Pea ha‘u ʻa e tamaio‘eiki ‘e taha, ‘o pehēange, ‛Tangata‘eiki, ko ho‘o pa‘angá ʻena. Naʻá ku nono‘o pē ‘e au ʻi ha holoholó ‘o fufuu‘i.
He naʻá ku manavahē kiate koe, he ko e tangata anga faingataʻa koe. ‘Okú ke faʻa to‘o ʻa e meʻa naʻe ‘ikai ko ho‘o meʻá, mo ta ʻaki ʻa e meʻa na‘e ‘ikai te ke tō.’

Pea tali ki ai ‘e he tu‘i̇́, ‛He toki tamaioʻeiki faikovi. ‘Okú ke halaia pē koe ʻi ho‘o lau pē ʻaʻaú. Tā naʻá ke ‘osi ʻilo pē ko e tangata anga faingataʻa au, ‘oku ou faʻa to‘o ʻa e meʻa ‘oku ‘ikai ko ʻeku meʻá, pea u ta ʻaki ʻa e meʻa na‘e ‘ikai te u tō?
Pea ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai te ke fakahū ai ʻeku pa‘angá he pangikeé? He naʻá ku mei foki mai ko ʻeni̇́ ‘ou ma‘u mai ia, mo hano tupu.’
Pea toki folofola ʻa e tu‘i̇́ kiate kinautolu na‘e tutu‘u ai̇́, ‛Mou to‘o ʻa e pa‘angá mei ai ‘o ‘oange ki he tamaio‘eiki na‘e liunga hongofulu ʻene tupú!’
Pea nau pehēange, Tangata‘eiki, kuo ‘osi liunga hongofulu hono ʻinasi̇́ ʻo‘ona ia.

Pea tali ‘e he tu‘i̇́, ʻOkú ou tala moʻoni atu, ka ai ha taha ʻoku maʻu haʻá ne meʻa, ‘e toe ‘oange ki ai mo ha meʻa. Ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘ane meʻa ‘e ma‘u, naʻá mo e ki‘i meʻa ‘okú naʻe ngali ma‘ú, ‘e toe fa‘ao pē meiate ia.
Ka ko hoku ngaahi fili ko ē, ʻa e faʻahinga na‘e ‘ikai ke nau loto ke u hoko ko honau tu‘i̇́, mou taki mai kinautolu ki heni, ke tāmate‘i kinautolu ke u sio ki ai!”
Pea hili ʻa e fakamatala ko ia ʻa Sīsuú, pea naʻe takimuʻa atu ʻa ʻenau fononga hake ki Selusalemá.
Pea ʻi heʻene fakaofiofi atu ki Pētefesi mo Pētani̇́, ʻi he ve‘e Mo‘unga ʻoku ui ko ‘Ōlive, naʻá ne fekau atu ha toko ua heʻene kau akó, ʻo ne pehē:
‟Mo ō atu ki he kolo ‘oku hoko mai̇́. Pea ʻi hoʻomo aʻu atú, te mo ʻilo ‘oku nono‘o ai ha ki‘i ʻasi, kuo te‘eki ke heka ai ha taha. Mo vete ia ‘o taki mai kiate au.”
‟Pea kapau ‘e ʻeke atu ‘e ha taha pē ko e hā ho‘omo meʻa ‘oku fai̇́, pea mo talaange, ‛‘Oku fiema‘u ia ‘e he ʻEiki̇́.’”
Pea ō atu leva ʻa e toko ua ko iā, ʻo na ʻilo, ʻo hangē tofu pē ko e meʻa naʻe tala ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate kinauá.
Pea lolotonga ʻena vete ʻa e ki‘i ʻasi̇́, mo e lea mai ʻa e kau tangata na‘e ʻaʻana iá: ‟Ko e hā ‘okú mo vete ai ʻa e kiʻi ʻasi̇́?”
Peá na talaange: ‟‘Oku fiema‘u ia ‘e he ʻEiki̇́.”
Peá na taki atu ʻa e ki‘i ʻasi̇́ kia Si̇̄sū. Pea hanga ‘e he kau akó ‘o li̇̄ honau pulupulú he tuʻa ‘o e ʻasi̇́, pea nau fakaheka ai ʻa Si̇̄sū.
Pea ʻi heʻene fononga atú, naʻe fola ‘e he kakai̇́ honau ngaahi pulupulú he loto halá.

Pea ʻi heʻene fakaofi atu ki he tahifohifo ʻa e halá ki he Mo‘unga ko ‘Ōlivé. Pea na‘e kamata fakamālō fiefia mo le‘olahi ki he ‘Otuá, ʻa e kau ako tokolahi naʻa nau kaungāfononga mo iá, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e ngaahi mana lalahi kuo nau mamata ki ai̇́.
Pea naʻa nau kalanga ʻo pehē:
Pea leaange ha niʻihi ʻo e kau Fālesi mei̇́ he kakai̇́, ʻo pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ke ke taʻofi muʻa hoʻo kau akó!”
Ka naʻe tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo pehē: ‟Kapau ‘e longo ʻeku kau akó, ‘e kaikaila ʻa e ngaahi maká ni.”
Pea ʻi he fakaofiofi atu ʻene fonongá ki Selusalema, ‘o naʻe mamata atu ki he koló, naʻá ne tangi koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ia.
He naʻá ne pehē: ‟Pehēange mai naʻe mahino kiate koe he ʻahó ni, ʻa e meʻa ‘e makatuʻunga ai hoʻo maʻu melinó. ‘ʻio, ka kuo fufū ia meiate koe.
‘E hoko mai ha ngaahi ʻaho, ʻa ia ‘e ʻākoloʻi ai kimoutolu ‘e homou ngaahi fili̇́, pea te nau ta‘ofi ho‘omou hūatú mo ho‘omou hūmai̇́, pea te nau ‘ohofi koe mei he tafatafa ʻaki kotoa pē.
Te nau laiki homou ngaahi falé, mo tāmate‘i kimoutolu. ‘E ‘ikai ha foʻi maka ‘e tuku taʻeholoki koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e ‘ikai ke mou fakatokanga‘i ʻa e taimi naʻa haʻu ai homou fakamoʻui̇́.”
Pea hūatu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he Temipalé ‘o ne kamata ke tuli ki tuʻa ʻa e kakai na‘e fefakatauʻaki ai̇́.
ʻO ne talaange kiate kinautolu: ‟Kuo tohi ʻi he Tohitapu, Ko hoku falé, ko e fale faiʻanga lotu! Ka kuo mou ngaohi ia ko e tānaki‘anga ‘o ha kau kaihaʻa.”
Pea faiako ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he Temipalé he ʻaho kotoa pē. Ka na‘e loto ʻa e kau taulaʻeiki lahi̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé mo e kau taki̇́ ke tāmate‘i ia.
Ka neongo iá, naʻa nau fiu lama ha faingamālie, he na‘e kei fie fanongo ʻa e kakai̇́ kotoa, ki heʻene ngaahi akonaki̇́.

20.text: Pea ʻi he ʻaho ʻe taha na‘e faiako ʻa Si̇̄sū he Temipalé mo malanga ʻaki ʻa e Ongoongo Lelei̇́. Pea ō mai ʻa e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́, mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, pea mo e kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú,
Pea naʻa nau ʻeke kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e mafai mei fē ‘okú ke fai ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni̇́? Ko hai naʻa ne fakamafai‘i koé?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ‟Ka u tomuʻa fai atu ha fehu‘i, pea mou tali mai.
Ko hai naʻá ne fakamafai‘i ʻa Sione ke fai papitaisó? Ko e ‘Otua ʻi Langi̇́, pē ko ha taha ʻi māmani?”
Pea nau kamata felāuaki fakaekinautolu pē, ʻo pehē: Kapau te tau talaange: ‟Mei he ‘Otuá” pea te ne pehē mai ‘e ia: ‟Ka Ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai te mou tui ai kiate iá?”
Pea kapau te tau talaange: ‟Mei ha taha ʻi māmani pea ‘e tolomaka‘i kitautolu ‘e he kakai̇́. He ‘oku nau tui ko e palōfita ʻa Sione.”
Pea talu ai pē ʻenau talaange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te mau ʻilo ‘kimautolu pē ko hai naʻá ne fakamafai‘i ʻa Sione ke fai papitaisó.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Peá mo au foki, he‘ikai te u tala atu pē ko e mafai mei fē ʻoku ou fai ai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko eni̇́.”

Pea kamata fai ʻe ia ʻa e talanoa fakatātā ko ʻeni̇́ ki he kakai̇́: ‟Tokua ko ha tangata naʻá ne tō ʻene ngoue kālepi, pea naʻe lisi atu ia ki ha kau ngoue, kae fononga atu ia ‘o nofo fuoloa ʻi ha feitu‘u kehe.

Pea ʻi he motuʻa ʻa e kālepi̇́, naʻá ne fekau ha‘ane tamaio‘eiki ke ʻalu ki he kau ngoué ‘o ‘omai hono ʻinasi̇́, he fua ʻo e kālepi̇́. Ka na‘e tā ‘e he kau ngoué ia ʻene tamaio‘eiki̇́ ‘o fakafoki hala‘atā atu.
Pea toe fekau atu ‘e he tangata na‘e ʻaʻana ʻa e ngoue kālepi̇́ haʻane tamaio‘eiki ‘e taha, ka naʻá nau tā mo ia foki mo nau ngaohikovia, pea nau toe fakafoki hala‘atā atu ia.
Pea toe fekau atu ‘e he tangatá haʻane tamaio‘eiki ‘e taha, ko hono tolú ia! Ka naʻa nau tā ia ‘o lavea pea nau toki li̇̄ ia kituʻa mei he ngoue‘angá.
Pea pehē leva ‘e he tangata haʻana e ngoue vainé ʻi hono lotó, ‛Ko e hā nai ʻeku meʻa ‘e toe fai̇́?’ Ko eni, te u fekau atu hoku foha ‘ofa‘angá ke ʻalu, heiʻilo naʻa nau faka‘apa‘apa kiate ia?
Ka ʻi he sio atu leva ʻa e kau ngoué kiate iá, pea nau fepehēʻaki, ‛Ko e tama ʻeni te ne ma‘u ʻa e ngoue‘angá ʻi ha ʻaho. Tau tāmate‘i ia, ka tau ma‘u ʻekitautolu ʻa e ngoue‘angá.’
Pea nau li̇̄ ia kituʻa mei he ngoue‘anga kālepi̇́ ‘o tāmate‘i. ʻOku mou pehē ‛ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ‘e fai ‘e he tangata na‘e ʻaʻana e ngoue‘angá ki he kau ngoué?’”
‟Te naʻe ha‘u ‘o faka‘auha ʻa e kau ngoue ko iā kae tukuange ʻa e ngoue‘angá maʻá ha kakai kehe.” Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ʻa e kakai̇́ naʻa nau pehē hake kotoa pē: ‟Tauange ke ʻoua naʻa hoko pehē!”
Ka naʻe sio fakamama‘u ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, pea naʻe pehē atu: ‟Ka ‘oku ‘uhinga ki he hā ʻa e lau ko ʻeni ʻa e Folofolá:
Ka ʻi ai ha taha ‘e tūkia he maka ko iā,

Pea na‘e mahino ki he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ mo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé, ‘oku ‘uhinga mai kiate kinautolu ʻa e talanoa na‘e fai ‘e Sīsuú. Pea naʻa nau loto ke puke ai leva ia ‘o fakahū pili̇̄sone, ka naʻa nau teteki ki he kakai̇́.

Pea naʻa nau lamalamasi ai pē ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo nau fekau atu ha kau tangata ke nau fakapuli ʻo ō atu kia Si̇̄sū ‘o fakafehufehu‘i ia, hei‘ilo ‘e ma‘ungatāmakia ia ha‘ane lea, ka nau toki tukuange ki he Kōvana Lomá, ke fakamāau‘i.

Pea fehuʻi ange ‘e he kau tangata kākā ko iā kiate ia, ʻo pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ‘oku mau malave‘i pē ‘oku mo‘oni ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ‘okú ke lea‘aki̇́, mo malanga‘aki̇́, pea ʻoku ‘ikai te ke toe afe mei ha taha, ‘o tatau ai pē kohai, ka ʻokú ke ako‘i ʻa e moʻoni ʻa e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otuá.
‘Oku totonu koā ke mau kei totongi tukuhau kia Sisa, pē ‘ikai?”
Pea mahino kiate ia ʻenau kākaá, ʻo ne pehēange kiate kinautolu,
‟Fakahā mai angé ha foʻi pa‘anga: Ko e ‘i̇̄misi mo e hingoa ‘o hai ‘oku tu‘u ai̇́?” Pea nau tali: ‟‘O Sisá.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Kapau ko ia, pē‘i ‘ave kia Sisa ʻa e meʻa ʻa Sisá, kae ‘ave ki he ‘Otuá ʻa e meʻa ʻa e ‘Otuá.”
Ko ia, naʻe ‘ikai ke lava ‘e he ngaahi fili ‘o Si̇̄suú ke nau ma‘u ia ʻi ha meʻa ‘e taha naʻá ne akonakiʻaki, ʻi he lotolotonga ‘o e kakai̇́, he naʻa nau ʻohovale ʻaupito heʻene tali na‘e fai̇́.
Pea ō mai ha niʻihi ʻo e kau Sātusi, ʻa e faʻahinga ‘oku ‘ikai ke nau tui ‘oku ai ha toetu‘u mei he maté, ʻo nau ʻeke ange kia Si̇̄sū:

‟Tangata‘eiki, ‛na‘e hikitohi ‘e Mōsese ma‘atautolu, ʻokapau ‘e mate ha tangata, ka ‘oku kei mo‘ui hono mali̇́ kae ‘ikai ha‘ana fānau, pea kuo pau ke mali ʻa e tehina ‘o e tangata ko iā mo e uitoú, ke ʻi ai ha fānau ke lau ko e hako ‘o hono tokoua kuo maté.’
Ko ia, na‘e ʻi ai ha tautehina ‘e toko fitu. Na‘e mali ʻa e lahi̇́ mo e fefiné, pea mate ia kuo ʻikai ke fanau.
Pea mali ʻa e uitoú mo e hoko haké.
Pea toe mali mo e fika tolú, pea pehē ai pē ʻo aʻu ki he mate kotoa ʻa e toko fitú kae ‘ikai pē ha fānau.
Pea faifai̇́ pea toki mate mo e fefiné foki.
