Ko ia, ka aʻu ki he ʻaho ‘o e toetuʻu mei he maté, ko hai ʻe mali mo e fefiné, he na‘e mali kātoa ʻa e toko fitú, mo ia.”
Pea ko e tali ʻa Si̇̄suú kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku nofo mali ʻa e kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, pea nau alea mali.
Ka ko kinautolu ʻoku taau mo e moʻui ʻo e maama kaha‘ú pea mo e toetuʻu mei̇́ he maté, ʻe ʻikai te nau nofo mali pē alea mali.
He te nau hangē tofu pē ko e kau ʻāngeló he ko e fānau kinautolu ʻa e ‘Otuá, koeʻuhi̇̄ kuo fokotuʻu kinautolu mei he maté.
Ka naʻe fakamo‘oni ʻa Mōsese ki he toetuʻu mei̇́ he maté ʻi he talanoa ki he vao talatalaʻāmoa na‘e velá, heʻene lau, ‛Ko e ʻEiki̇́, ko e ‘Otua ‘o ʻĒpalahame, mo ʻAisake mo Sēkopé.’
He ko e ʻOtuá ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ‘Otua ‘o e kakai maté, ka ko e ‘Otua ‘o e kakai mo‘ui, he ‘oku nau moʻui kotoa pē, ʻi he ʻao ʻo e ‘Otuá.”
Pea lea ange ha niʻihi ʻo e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsese, ʻo pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ko e tali lelei moʻoni kuó ke fai̇́!”
Pea na‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e toe fakatoʻotoʻoʻa ke fakafehu‘i ʻa Si̇̄sū.
Pea fehu‘i ange leva ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e hā hono ‘uhinga ‘oku lau ai ‘e he kakai̇́ ʻa e Mīsaiá, ko e ʻAlo ‘o Tēvitá?
He ‘oku tu‘u he Tohi Saamé, ʻa e lau ko ʻeni ʻa Tēvita,
Ka u ngaohi ho ngaahi fili̇́,
Kapau ʻoku lau ʻe Tēvita ʻa e Mīsaiá ko hono ʻEiki, pea ‘oku lava fēfē ai ke lau ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá, ko hono ʻAlo?”
Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei fakafanongo kātoa ʻa e kakai̇́ kia Sīsuú, naʻe pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki heʻene kau akó,

‟Tokanga ke ʻoua te mou hangē ko e kau faiako Lao ʻa Mōsesé. ‘Oku nau manako ke ʻai ha kofu fakalāngilangi, pea nau tokanga ke fakalea faka‘ei‘eiki ange ʻa e kakai̇́ ʻi loto koló, peá ke nofo mavahe he ngaahi falelotú, pea mo e nofoʻanga mahuʻinga he ngaahi kātoangá.
Ka ‘oku nau faʻao fakamālohi ʻa e kelekele ‘o e kau uitoú, pea faka‘aliʻali ʻenau māʻoniʻoni̇́ ʻaki ʻa e faʻa lotu lōloá. ʻE maʻu ʻekinautolu ha tautea lahi.”

21.text: Pea ʻi he hanga hake ʻa Si̇̄sū naʻá ne fakatokanga‘i ʻa e anga ʻo e li̇̄ meʻaʻofa ʻa e kau tuʻumālié ki he puha tānaki‘anga meʻaʻofa he Temipalé.
Naʻá ne fakatokanga‘i foki mo ha uitou masiva ʻokú ne li̇̄ ha ongo foʻi sēniti ʻe ua ki he puhá.
Pea naʻe pehēange: ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolú, ‘oku laka hake ʻa e li̇̄ ʻa siʻi fefine uitou masiva ko ʻeni̇́ ʻi he kakai kātoa ko eé.
He ʻoku li̇̄ ʻa e kakai ko eé ʻenau meʻaʻofá, mei he tupu ʻo ʻenau koloá. Ka ko e uitou ko eni̇́, neongo siʻene masivá, ka ʻokú ne foaki kakato ʻene meʻa na‘e ma‘u ke tauhiʻaki ʻene moʻui̇́.”

Pea ko e ni‘ihi ʻo e kau akó naʻa nau lau ki he faka‘ofo‘ofa ‘o e ngaahi maka lalahi na‘e langa ʻaki ʻa e Temipalé, pea mo e ngaahi meʻaʻofa mahu‘inga kuo fakasanisani ʻaki. Ka naʻe pehēange ʻe Si̇̄sū,
‟ʻOku mou vakai ki he ngaahi fu‘u langa ko eni̇́, ʻoku vave mai ha taimi ʻa ia ‘e ‘ikai kei hilifaki ai ha foʻi maka ʻi ha foʻi maka, he ‘e holoki kotoa ki lalo.”
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e ha ni‘ihi kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ‘e hoko ʻafē ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ‘okú ke laú? Pea ko e hā ha fakaʻilonga kuo mei hokomai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Vakai naʻa takihēeʻi kimoutolu! He ‘e haʻu ha tokolahi ʻo talaatu, ko ʻenau haʻu meiate au, pea te nau pehē atu, Ko au ia, mo nau talaatu, Kuo ofi ʻa e ʻahó. ‘Oua te mou tui kiate kinautolu.
Ka mou ka fanongo ʻi ha ngaahi tau, mo ha ngaahi liukava; ‘oua te mou manavahē. He kuo pau ke tomuʻa hoko ha ngaahi meʻa pehē: ka ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘uhinga ia kuo ofi ʻa e ngata‘anga ‘o māmani̇́.”
Pea hoko atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻene fakamatalá: ‟ʻE tau ʻa e fonua mo e fonua. ‘E ‘ohofi ʻe ha pule‘anga ʻa e pule‘anga ʻe taha.
‘E tō mo ha ngaahi mofuike lalahi, pea hoko mo ha ngaahi honge, mo ha ngaahi mahaki fakalilifu. Pea ‘e ʻasi ha ngaahi faka‘ilonga fakailifia kehekehe ʻi he langi̇́.

Kae kimuʻa ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ni, te nau tomuʻa ala kiate kimoutolu ʻo fakatangaʻi. Te nau taki atu kimoutolu ki he ngaahi falelotú, pea fakahū pilīsone. ‘E fakamāu‘i kimoutolu ‘e ha ngaahi Tuʻi mo ha kau kōvana, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko hoʻomou kau mo aú.
Ka ‘e hoko ia ko ha faingamālie ke mou fakamoʻoni ai kiate au.
Ka mou fakapapau‘i kimuʻa homou lotó ke ‘oua te mou hohaʻa pē ko e hā ha‘amou fakamatala ‘e fai̇́.
He te u ‘oatu ‘e au ha ngaahi lea mo ha poto ʻa ia ‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e homou ngaahi fili̇́ ‘o matatali, pē fakafepakiʻi.
Ka ʻe lavaki‘i kimoutolu ‘e ho‘omou matuʻá, mo homou ngaahi tokouá, ʻe homou ngaahi kāingá, mo homou ngaahi kaungāmeʻá foki, pea te nau tāmate‘i ha mou niʻihi.
‘E fehi‘anekina kimoutolu ‘e he kakai kotoa pē koe‘uhi̇̄ ko au.
Kae ʻoua te mou loto hohaʻa ai.
He ʻi ho‘omou kātaki mamahi̇́, te mou haofaki ai hoʻomou moʻui̇́.
Peá ka moú ka sio kuo ʻākilotoa ʻa Selusalema ‘e ha ngaahi kau tau, pea mahino leva kiate kimoutolu kuo ofi mai hono faka‘auhá.

Pea ko kinautolu ‘e ʻi Siutea he ʻaho ko iā, ke nau hola ki he ngaahi mo‘ungá. Ko kinautolu ‘e ʻi loto kolo he ʻaho ko iā, ke nau mavahe leva mei ai. Pea ko kinautolu ‘oku ʻi ‘uta he ʻaho ko iā, ke ‘oua te nau toe foki ʻo hū ki koló.
He ko e taimi ia ‘o e faitautea, ke fakamoʻoni ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē kuo hikitohi he Tohitapú.
ʻE malaʻia ʻakinautolu ʻa e kau fefine feitamá, mo e kau fefine ʻe kei iiki ʻenau fānaú ʻi he ngaahi taimi ko iā. ‘E faingataʻaʻia ‘aupito ʻa māmani he ʻe tō mai ʻa e houhaú ki he kakai̇́ ni.

‘E tāmate‘i ha ni‘ihi ʻaki ʻa e heletaá, pea ʻe fakahee‘i ha ni‘ihi ki he ngaahi fonua muli̇́. Pea ‘e maʻu ʻa Selusalema ‘e he kau Senitailé, kae ‘oua leva kuo kakato ʻa e ngaahi taimi ʻo e Senitailé.

Pea ʻe hoko foki mo ha ngaahi fakaʻilonga makehe mei̇́ he laʻaá, mo e māhiná, pea mo e ngaahi fetu‘ú pea ʻe teteki ʻa e ngaahi pule‘anga ‘o māmani̇́ mo nau manavahē he ʻuʻulu mo e ʻoho mai ʻa e tahi̇́.

‘E lotosiʻi ʻa e kakai̇́ he te nau manavahē koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e ngaahi meʻa fakalilifu ‘e hoko ki māmani kātoa pea ʻe aʻu ʻo mole ʻa e ʻamanaki moʻui̇́ meiate kinautolu, he naʻá mo e ngaahi makatuʻunga ‘o e langi̇́ ‘e mātuʻaki luluʻi.
Peá ka hili iá, te nau toki mamata ki he Foha ‘o e Tangatá ‘oku hā‘ele mai he ʻaó, kuo ʻoʻona ʻa e mafai̇́ mo e lāngilangi lahi.
Pea ʻi he kamata ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko eni̇́, pea mou hanga hake leva ki ‘olunga, he kuo ofi mai homou huhuʻi̇́.”
Pea fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e talanoa ko ʻeni̇́ kiate kinautolu: ‟Ka mou ka sio ki he fiki̇́, pea mo e ngaahi ʻakau kotoa pē.
Ko ʻene kamata pē ke nau failau pea mahino kiate kimoutolu ai, kuo ofi ʻa e faʻahitaʻu māfaná.
Pehē foki, ka mou ka vakai kuo hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, pea mou ʻilo ai, tā kuo ofi ke hokomai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.
Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou talaatú, ʻe te‘eki ai ke mate ʻa e kakai kotoa ‘o e toʻutangata ko eni̇́, kuo hokomai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ni.
‘E mole ʻa e langi̇́ mo māmani, ka ko ʻeku ngaahi leá, ‘e tu‘u ʻo taʻengata.

Ko ia, mou tokanga naʻa faifai̇́ pea mamafa homou lotó ki he faʻa fakafiefiá mo e faʻa konaá mo e ngaahi kavenga ʻo e moʻui̇́, pea hoko fakafokifā mai ʻa e ʻaho fakamui̇́, pea ma‘ungatāmaki ai kimoutolu hangē ha tauhelé.
He ‘e hoko mai ʻa e meʻá ni ki he kakai kotoa pē ‘o māmani.
Ko ia, mou le‘o mo lotu ma‘u pē, ke mou ma‘u ha ivi ke haofaki ʻaki kimoutolu mei̇́ he uhouhonga ‘o e ngaahi meʻa ʻe hokó, peá ke mou lava foki ke tuʻu ʻi he ʻao ʻo e Foha ‘o e Tangatá.”
Pea ʻi he ʻaho kotoa pē naʻe faiako ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi he Temipalé. Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó naʻá ne ʻalu atu ‘o mohe ʻi he Mo‘unga ko ‘Ōlivé.
Pea uhu pongipongi atu ʻa e kakai kotoa pē ki he Temipalé, ke fanongo kiate ia.

22.text: Pea na‘e ofi ʻa e Kātoanga Kaimāta‘elēvani̇́, ʻa ē ‘oku ui ko e Pāsová.
Pea kuo alēlea ʻa e kau faifekaú mo e kau mataotao ʻo e Tohitapú pē ‘e anga fēfē ha‘anau fakapoongi fakafufū ʻa Si̇̄sū, ka naʻa nau manavahē ki he kakai̇́.
Pea toki hū ʻa Sētane ‘ia Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ko e toko taha ʻo e toko hongofulu mā uá.
Pea ʻalu atu ʻa Siutasi ki he kau faifekaú, mo e kau leʻo matapā ʻo e Temipalé, ‘o nau alea ki ha founga ‘e lava ke ne lavaki‘i ai ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu.
Pea naʻa nau fiefia lahi ai, pea nau talaʻofa, te nau ‘oange ha pa‘anga kiate ia.
Pea na‘e loto ki ai ʻa Siutasi, ʻo ne toki kumi ha faingamālie, ha mamaʻo ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he kakai̇́, ke ne lavakiʻi ai ia.
Pea ʻi he aʻu ki he ʻaho ʻo e Kātoanga Kaimāta‘elēvani̇́, ʻa ē ‘oku tāmateʻi ai ʻa e Lami Pāsová,
Pea naʻe fekau atu ʻa Pita mo Sione, ʻo ne pehēange: ‟Mo ō atu ʻo teuteu ʻa e Pāsová ma‘atautolu, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke tau kai ia.”
Peá na ʻeke ange: ‟Ko fē ʻa e feitu‘u ‘okú ke loto ke ma teuteu ai iá?”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua: ‟Ko eni, ʻi ho‘omo aʻu atu ki he koló, te mo fetaulaki mo ha tangata, ‘okú naʻe fua mai ha hina vai. Mo muimui ai, ʻo aʻu ki he ʻapi ‘oku ʻalu ki ai̇́,
Peá mo tala ki he toko taha ‘oku ‘o‘ona ʻa e ‘api̇́, ‘Oku ʻeke mai ‘e he tangata‘eiki̇́, pē ko fē ʻa e loki te ne kai ai ʻa e Pāsová, mo ʻene kau akó?
Peá te ne taki kimoua ki ha loki lahi ʻi ‘olunga kuo ‘osi maau. Mo teuteu ai ʻetau Pāsová.”
Pea ō atu ʻa Pita mo Sione, ʻo na ʻilo ʻo hangē tofu pē ko e meʻa naʻe folofolaʻaki ʻe Sīsuú. Peá na teuteu ai ʻa e Pāsová.
Pea ʻi he hokosia ʻa e taimi ke kai ai ʻa e Pāsová, pea nofo hifo fakataha ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau ʻApositoló ʻi he tēpilé.
Pea naʻe folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟Naʻe mātuʻaki faka‘amu ʻa hoku lotó ke tau kai fakataha ʻa e Pāsova ko ʻeni̇́ kimuʻa pea toki hoko mai hoku fakamamahiʻi̇́.
He ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, he‘ikai te u toe kai ʻi he kātoangá ni, kae‘oua kuo fakakakato ia ʻi he Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
Pea to‘o ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e ipú, ‘o naʻe fai ha fakafeta‘i, ʻo ne folofola: ‟Mou toʻo eni, pea mou inu kotoa pē mei ai ʻekimoutolu.
He ‘oku ou talaatu, he‘ikai te u toe inu mei he fua ʻo e vainé, kae‘oua kuo hokomai ʻa e Pule‘anga ‘o e ‘Otuá.”

Pea naʻe to‘o foki ha fo‘i mā, ‘o naʻe fai ha fakafeta‘i. Pea naʻe pakipaki ia ‘o naʻe ʻoatu kiate kinautolu, ʻo ne folofola: ‟Ko hoku sinó eni, ʻa ia ʻoku foaki ko homou fetongi. Mou fai eni, ko e fakamanatu kiate au.”
Pehē foki ʻene toʻo ʻa e ipú, hili ʻenau kai ʻa e Pāsová, ʻo ne folofola: ‟Ko e ipu ko eni̇́, ko e kovinānite fo‘ou ia, ʻoku fai ʻaki hoku totó, ʻa ia ʻoku lilingi ko homou fetongi.
Ka ko eni, ko e nima ʻo e toko taha te ne lavaki‘i aú, ‘okú ma kai fakataha, ʻi he keinangaʻangá ni!
He ko e Foha ‘o e Tangatá, ʻe ʻalu atu ia ‘o hangē tofu pē ko e meʻa kuo tu‘utu‘uni ke ne fou ai̇́. Ka ʻe malaʻia ʻa e toko taha te ne lavaki‘i iá!”
Pea nau kamata fe‘ekenaki fakaekinautolu ai, pē ko hai nai ʻiate kinautolu te ne fai ha meʻa pehē.
Pea na‘e hoko ha feki̇̄hiaki ʻi he kau akó fakaekinautolu pē, pē ko hai ‘iate kinautolu ‘oku taumuʻa tahá.

Pea lea ange ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e ngaahi haʻa tu‘i ‘o māmani̇́, ʻoku nau fakafieʻeiki ki he kakai̇́ pea ko kinautolu ʻoku fakaaoao ki he kakai̇́, ʻoku nau ui ʻakinautolu, ko e kau Fietokoni!
Ka ko kimoutolu, ke ʻoua te mou fai pehē: ka ko ia te ne fie hoko ko e lahi ‘iate kimoutolú, ke ne hoko ʻo tatau mo ha tamasiʻi, pea ko ia ʻoku taki̇́, ke ne tatau mo ha sevāniti.
He ko hai ‘oku lahi̇́? Ko ia nofo ki he tēpilé pē ko ia ‘okú tauhi ki he tēpilé? ʻIkai ko e toko taha ʻoku nofo ki he tēpilé? Ko ia! Ka ‘oku ou ʻi heni aú, ko e sevāniti!
He ko kimoutolu, kuo mou ʻiate au maʻu pē, ʻi hoku ngaahi ʻahiʻahi ʻoʻokú.
Pea kuo u tuʻutuʻuni maʻamoutolu ha puleʻanga, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko e finangalo ʻeku Tamai̇́, ke ʻoʻoku foki ha puleʻanga.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ke mou kai mo inu mei heʻeku tēpilé, ʻi hoku puleʻangá, pea te mou nofo ki ha ngaahi taloni ‘e hongofulumāua, ‘o mou fakamaaua ʻa e matakali ‘e hongofulumāua ʻo ʻIsileli̇́.”
‟‘E Saimone, Saimone ē! Ko eni, kuo tuʻu mai ʻa Sētane ke ne sivi‘i kimoutolu tāutaha, ‘o hangē ko hono sivi ‘o e uité.
Ka kuo u hūfia koe, ke ‘oua naʻa vaivai ho‘o tui̇́, pea ko koe, ʻoka ke ka foki mai leva, peá ke tokoni‘i ho ngaahi tokouá.”
Ka naʻe pehēange ‘e Pita: ‟ʻEiki, kuo u ʻosi mateuteu ke fakahū pili̇̄sone fakataha au mo koe, pē ka aʻu ki hano tāmate‘i au, te u fiemālie pē ke fou ai.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku ou talaatu kiate koe, Pita, ‘e te‘eki ke ʻuʻua ʻa e moá he poó ni, kuo ‘osi tu‘o tolu hoʻo fakahā, ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ʻilo ‘e koe au.”

Pea naʻe fehu‘i ange kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻI he taimi naʻá ku fekau ai ke mou ō atu, pea ‘oua ʻe toʻo ha kato pa‘anga, pē ha kato vala, pē ha senitoló, naʻa mou masiva ʻi ha meʻa?” Pea nau pehēange: ‟‘Ikai!”

Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ka ko eni, kapau ‘oku ʻi ai ha‘o kato pa‘anga, pē kato meʻakai, ʻalu mo ia. Peá ka ‘oku ‘ikai haʻo heletā, pea fakatau atu ho pulupulú ʻo kumi ʻaki mai ha heletā!

He ‘oku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu, ko e meʻa ko ʻeni naʻe hikitohi he Tohitapú, kuo pau ke fakakakato ʻiate au, ʻa e pehē: Pea naʻe lau ia ko e taha ʻo e kau maumaulaó. He ko e meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku kau kiate aú, ʻe hoko ia ʻo moʻoni.”
Pea nau pehēange: ‟ʻEiki, Ko eni, ko e heletā ‘ʻeni ‘e ua!” Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOku feʻunga pē ia.”
Pea ʻalu atu ia hangē ko ʻene anga maheni̇́ ʻo fononga ki he Mo‘unga ‘Ōlivé, pea muimui atu kiate ia ʻene kau akó.
Pea ʻi heʻene aʻu ki Mo‘unga ‘Ōlivé, naʻá ne talaange kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou lotu ke ‘oua naʻa mou tō ki ha ʻahiʻahi.”
Pea ki‘i laka si‘i atu ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo tatau mo e mamaʻo ʻo hano tolongi ha foʻi maka, ‘o naʻe tū‘ulutui ai ‘o lotu.
ʻO ne pehē: ‟‘E Tamai, kapau te ke finangalo ki ai, ke ke to‘o ange muʻa meiate au ʻa e ipu ko eni̇́, ka neongo iá, kae ʻoua naʻa fai hoku lotó, ka ke fai pē ho finangaló.”
Pea naʻe ʻalu hifo kiate ia ha ʻāngelo mei langi ke tokoniʻi ia.
Pea ʻi he lahi ʻene mamahi̇́ naʻe fakautuutu ai pē ʻene lotú, pea naʻe hoko hono pupuhá, ʻo hangē ha ngaahi tulutā taʻataʻá, naʻe ngangana ki he kelekelé.
Pea tu‘u hake ia mei heʻene lotú, ‘o foki atu ki heʻene kau akó, ʻo ne ʻilo, tā kuo nau ʻosi māʻumohe kinautolu, koe‘uhi̇̄ he kuo nau ongosia.
Pea pehēange ‘e ia kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e hā kuo mou mohe ai̇́? Mou ʻā ‘o lotu ke ‘oua naʻa ʻahiʻahiʻi kimoutolu!”

Pea lolotonga ʻene kei lea peheé, ʻiloangē kuo aʻumai ha fuʻu kakai, ‘oku taki mai ‘e he toko taha ʻo e toko hongofulu mā uá, naʻe hingoa ko Siutasi̇́. Pea ʻunuʻunu atu ʻa Siutasi kia Si̇̄sū, ‘o naʻe ‘uma kiate ia.
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟‘E Siutasi, ko e ‘uma koā ‘okú ke lavaki‘i ʻaki ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá?”
Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa e kakai naʻe kau mo iá, ki he meʻa kuo hokó, naʻa nau pehēange: ‟ʻEiki, te mau taaʻiʻaki ia ʻa e heletaá?”
Pea taa‘i leva ‘e hanau toko taha, ʻa e sevāniti ʻa e Taula‘eiki Lahi̇́, ‘o naʻe tuʻusi hono telinga to‘omata‘ú.
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne pehē: ‟Tukuā! Kuo feʻunga pē ia.” Pea naʻe ala ki he telinga ‘o e tamaio‘eiki̇́ ʻo ne fakamoʻui.
Pea pehēange ʻe Si̇̄sū ki he kau faifekaú, mo e kau leʻo matapā ʻo e Temipalé, pea mo e kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú na‘e ōmai ko hono puke iá: ‟Ko ho‘omou to‘o heletā mai mo e ʻakaú, he ko ha hiamatea aú?
Ko e ʻaho kotoa pē mo ʻetau ʻi he Temipalé, kae ‘ikai te mou ala ʻo puke ai au. Ka ko homou taimi̇́ eni, he ko e pule ia ʻa e fakapo‘uli̇́.”
Pea naʻa nau puke ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‘o taki atu ia ki he ʻapi ‘o e Faifekau Pulé. Pea naʻe muimui atu ʻa Pita, mei he mamaʻó.
Pea kuo tafu ha afi he lotoʻā ‘o e ‘api̇́. Pea ʻalu atu ʻa Pita ‘o taʻutu fakataha mo kinautolu naʻe fakamāmāfana ai̇́.

Pea naʻe fakatokanga‘i ia ‘e ha fefine ngāue naʻe nofo ai, mei̇́ he tapua ʻa e maama ʻo e afi̇́, ʻo ne sio fakamama‘u kiate ia, pea naʻe toki pehēange: ‟Ko e siana ko ʻeni̇́ foki, na‘e faʻa ʻiate iá!”
Ka naʻá ne fakaʻikaiʻi ia, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Fefine, ‘oku ‘ikai te u ʻilo ʻa e tangata ko ʻená!”
Pea fuoloa si‘i mei ai, kuo toe mamata kiate ia ha toko taha kehe, ʻo ne pehēange: ‟Ko koe foki, ko e taha ʻokinautolu.” Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Pita: ‟Tangata! ʻOku ʻikai ko au ʻena ia!”
Pea ‘osi nai ha houa ‘e taha mei ai, kuo toe fakapapauʻi ange ʻe ha taha kehe, ʻo pehē: ‟ʻOku moʻoni ʻaupito ia! Na‘e faʻa kau ʻa e tangatá ni mo ia, he ko e tangata Kāleli foki ʻeni!”
Pea pehēange ‘e Pitá: ‟Tangata! ‘Oku ‘ikai ke mahino kiate au ʻa e meʻa ʻokú ke laú.” Pea lolotonga ʻene kei leá, mo e ʻuʻua ʻa e moá.

Pea tafoki mai ʻa e ʻEiki̇́ ‘o sio fakahangatonu atu kia Pita. Pea toki manatu‘i ‘e Pita ʻa e folofola ʻa e ʻEiki̇́, heʻene pehē kiate ia: ‟‘E te‘eki ke ʻuʻua ʻa e moá he poó ni, kuo ʻosi tu‘o tolu hoʻo fakahā, ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ʻiloʻi ʻe koe au.”
Pea ʻalu atu ʻa Pita ki tuʻa ‘o naʻe tangi mamahi ai.
Pea ko e kau tangata naʻa nau le‘ohi ʻa Si̇̄suú, naʻa nau vaʻingaʻaki ia ʻo nau toutou taaʻi ia.
Pea naʻa nau fakapūlouʻi ia, pea nau toki fehuʻi ange, ʻo pehē: ‟Talamai angé pē ko hai naʻá ne taa‘i koé!”
Pea na‘e lahi mo e ngaahi lea kovi kehekehe naʻá nau fai kiate ia.
Pea ʻi he pongipongi haké, naʻe fakataha mai ʻa e kau mātuʻa ʻo e lotú, mo e kau faifekaú, mo e kau mataotao ʻo e Tohitapú pea naʻe taki atu ʻa Si̇̄sū, ‘o fokotu‘u ʻi honau lotolotongá.
Pea nau ʻeke ange: ‟Kapau ko e Mi̇̄saiá koe, fei mo ke fakahā mai!” Pea pehēange ‘e Sīsuú: ‟Kapau te u ʻio atu, he‘ikai te mou tui ki ai.
Pea kapau te u ʻeke atu kiate kimoutolu, he‘ikai te mou tali mai!
Ka mei̇́ he taimi̇́ ni, ʻe fakanofo ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ki he to‘omata‘u ‘o e ‘Otua Māfimafi̇́.”
Pea nau pehēange kotoa pē: ‟Tā ko e ʻAlo koe ‘o e ‘Otuá?” Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko kimoutolu ʻena ʻoku mou lau, ko au ia.”
Pea nau kaila kotoa pē: ‟Tā ʻoku ʻikai te tau toe fiemaʻu ha kau fakamo‘oni! He kuo tau fanongo tonu kotoa pē, ki he lea kuó ne fai̇́!”

23.text: Pea tutu‘u kātoa hake ʻa e kau fakatahá ‘o nau tataki atu ʻa Si̇̄sū kia Pailato.

Pea kamata ke nau talatalaaki‘i ange ia, ʻo pehē: ‟Naʻa mau ma‘u ʻa e sianá ni ‘okú ne fakatupu moveuveu mo fakaloto‘i ʻa e kakai̇́ ke ‘oua te nau totongi tukuhau kia Sisa. Pea naʻe tala holo foki, ko e Mi̇̄saiá ia, ko e tu‘i.”
Pea fehu‘i ange ‘e Pailato kia Si̇̄sū, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e Tuʻi koā koe ‘o e kakai Siú?” Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ko ia pē ʻokú ke laú.”
Pea talaange ‘e Pailato ki he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ pea mo e kakai̇́: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te u ma‘u ‘e au ha makatuʻunga ke fakahalaia ai ʻa e tangatá ni.”
Ka naʻa nau vilitaki atu pē, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Kuó ne ueʻi ʻa e kakai̇́ ʻaki ʻene faiako takai holo ʻi Siutea kātoa, ʻo kamata mei Kāleli, pea kuo aʻu mai ʻeni ki heni.”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ʻa Pailato ki he lau ko iā, naʻá ne fehuʻi ange, pē ko e Kāleli koā ʻa e tangatá ni.
Pea ʻi heʻene ʻilo ko Si̇̄suú ʻoku mei he vāhenga ‘o Hēlotá, naʻá ne fekau ke nau ‘ave ia kia Hēlota, he naʻe ʻi Selusalema ʻa Hēlota feʻunga mo e taimi ko iā.

Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa Hēlota kia Sīsuú, naʻá ne fiefia lahi ʻaupito, he kuo fuoloa ʻene fie mamata kiate ia, he naʻá ne fanongo ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau kiate iá, pea naʻá ne fie mamata ki ha mana te ne fai.
Pea na‘e lahi ʻene fakafehuʻi iá, ka na‘e ‘ikai ha tali ‘e taha ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia.
Pea toki tuʻu hake ʻa e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ mo e kau tangata ʻo e Tohitapú, ‘o nau talatalaaki‘i ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻi ha ngaahi meʻa lahi.
Pea hanga ‘e Hēlota mo ʻene kau sōtiá ‘o ngaohikovi‘i ia, ʻo nau toki fakakofuʻaki ia ha pulupulu faka‘ofo‘ofa, pea nau fakafoki atu ia kia Pailato.
Pea talu mei ai, mo e kaumeʻa lelei ʻa Hēlota mo Pailato, ka naʻá na vātamaki kinaua kimuʻa.
Pea ui ‘e Pailato ke kātoa mai ʻa e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́, mo e kau taki̇́, pea mo e kakai̇́.

Pea naʻe pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟Naʻa mou taki mai ʻa e tangatá ni kiate au, ‘o talamai naʻá ne fakatupu moveuveu ki he kakai̇́. Pea ko ʻeni kuo u faka‘eke‘eke ia ʻo mou fanongo ki ai, pea kuo ‘ikai te u ma‘u ‘e au ha makatuʻunga mei he ngaahi meʻa kuo mou tukuakiʻi ʻaki iá, ke fakahalaiaʻi ai ia.
Pea pehē pē foki mo Hēlota, he kuó ne fekau ke fakafoki mai ia kiate kitautolu, pea ko eni, kuo mahino naʻe ʻikai ke fai ‘e he tangatá ni ha meʻa ‘e taau ke tautea mate ai ia.
ʻI heʻene pehē: te u hilifaki pē hano tautea tā, pea tukuange ia ke ʻalu.”
Ka naʻa nau kaikaila kotoa pē, ʻo pehē: ‟Tāmate‘i ʻa e tangatá ni, kae tukuange mai kiate kimautolu ʻa Palāpasa ia!”
Ko Palāpasá, ko e tangata ia na‘e fakahū pili̇̄sone koe‘uhi̇̄ ko haʻane fakatupu moveuveu ʻi he koló, pea mo ʻene fakapoongi ha tangata.
Ka naʻe toe kole ʻa Pailató kiate kinautolu heʻene fakaʻamu ke tukuange ʻa Sīsuú.
Ka naʻa nau kaikaila mai pē kinautolu ʻo pehē: ‟Tutuki ia ki ha kolosi! Tutuki ia ki ha kolosi!”

Pea naʻá ne toe lea kiate kinautolu, ko hono tuʻo tolú ia: ‟He ko e hā ha hia kuo fai ʻe he tangatá ni? Kuo ʻikai te u maʻu ha makatuʻunga ke tautea mate ai ia, ko ia ai, te u hilifaki pē hano tautea tā, pea tukuange ia.”
Ka naʻe toe le‘o lahi ange ʻa e kaila ʻa e kakai̇́ o nau vilitaki pē ke tutuki ia ki ha kolosi, pea naʻe mālohi honau leʻó.
Ko ia, naʻe pehē ʻe Pailato ke hilifaki ʻa e tautea naʻa nau vilitaki ki ai̇́.
Pea veteange leva ‘e Pailato ʻa e tangata na‘e fakahū pilīsone ko e fakatupu moveuveu mo e tāmaté, ʻa ia naʻa nau kole ki ai̇́, ka naʻe tuku atu ʻa Si̇̄sū, ke nau fa‘iteliha ki ai.
Pea ʻi heʻenau taki atu ʻa Sīsuú, naʻa nau puke mai ʻa Saimone, ko e tangata Sailine, kuó ne ha‘u mei ‘uta, ʻo nau hilifaki ʻa e kolosi̇́ kiate ia, ke ne fua ‘o muimui atu kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea naʻe muimui atu foki kiate ia mo ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi, pea mo ha kau fefine ʻa ia naʻa nau tangi mamahi koe‘uhi̇̄ ko Si̇̄sū.
Pea tafoki ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o lea kiate kinautolu: ‟Kau fefine ʻo Selusalema, ʻoua te mou tangi koe‘uhi̇̄ ko au, ka mou tangi pē koe‘uhi̇̄ ko kimoutolu mo ho‘omou fānaú.

He ko eni, ʻoku vave mai ha taimi, ʻa ia te mou toki pehē ai, ‘Oku monūʻia ʻa e kau fefine ʻoku ʻikai haʻanau fānaú, mo e ngaahi manava kuo te‘eki ke fanaú, pea mo kinautolu kuo ʻikai fakahuhu ha fānaú.
Peá te nau toki kaila ki he ngaahi mo‘ungá, Mou holo mai ‘o tanu kimautolu. Pea ki he ngaahi tafungofungá, Mou ʻufi‘ufi‘i kimautolu.
He kapau ‘oku lava ke nau fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ki he ʻakau matá, pea huanoa ʻa e meʻa ʻe ala fai ki he ʻakau mōmoá.”
Pea naʻe taki atu ai mo ha ongo tangata faihia kehe ʻe toko ua, ke tāmate‘i fakataha mo ia.
Pea ʻi heʻenau aʻu atu ki he feitu‘u ʻoku ui ko ‘Ulupokó, naʻa nau tutuki ai ia ki he kolosi̇́, fakataha mo e ongo tangata faihiá, ko e taha mei hono to‘omata‘ú, pea taha mei hono to‘ohemá.

Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟‘E Tamai, fakamolemole‘i ange muʻa kinautolu, he ‘oku ‘ikai te nau ʻilo ʻa e meʻa ‘oku nau fai̇́!” Pea naʻa nau vahevahe ʻa hono valá, ʻaki ʻenau talotalo pē kohai te ne maʻú.

Pea tuʻu pē ʻa e kakai̇́ ai ʻo mamata. Pea laukovi kiate ia ʻa e kau taki̇́, ‘o nau pehē: ‟Naʻá ne fakahaofi ʻa e kakai kehé, tuku ke ne fakahaofi ‘e ia ia, ‘okapau moʻoni ko e Mīsaia ʻeni ʻa e ‘Otuá, ko e toko taha kuó ne fili̇́.”
Pea kau foki mo e kau sōtiá hono vaʻingaʻaki iá, ʻaki ʻenau omi ʻo ‘ohake kiate ia ha vinika;
Mo nau pehēange: ‟Kapau ko e Tuʻi koe ‘o e kakai Siú, peá ke fakahaofi koe!”
Pea na‘e tohi foki ʻi ʻolunga ʻi hono kolosi̇́, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e Tuʻi ʻeni ‘o e kakai Siú.”
Pea ko e taha ʻo e ongo hiamatea na‘e tutuki fakataha mo iá, naʻá ne kau he laukovi kiate ia ʻo ne pehē: ‟‘Ikai ko e Mi̇̄saiá koe? Peʻi ke fakahaofi koe, mo kimaua foki!”
Ka naʻe tali ʻe he hiamatea ‘e tahá, ʻo ne valokiʻi ia, ʻo pehē: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai koā te ke ʻapasia ki he ‘Otuá, he ʻoku tautea‘i fakataha koe mo ia?
Pea ko hota tauteá, ‘oku tuha pē ia mo e kovi naʻá ta fai̇́. Ka ko e toko taha ko eni̇́, na‘e ‘ikai te ne fai ‘e ia ha kovi ‘e taha.”
Pea naʻe lea ange: ‟ʻE Si̇̄sū, manatu‘i muʻa au, ‘oka ke ka hokomai kuó ke Tuʻi ʻi ho puleʻangá.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate koé, ko e ʻahó ni, te ke ʻi Palataisi mo au.”
Pea ʻi heʻene aʻu ki he ho‘atā mālié, fakafokifā naʻe tō ha poʻuli ki he funga ʻo māmani kotoa pē, ‘o aʻu ki he taimi tolu efiafi̇́.
He naʻe ʻikai toe ulo mai ʻa e laʻaá, pea naʻe mahae mo e puipui ʻo e Temipalé mei ‘olunga ‘o aʻu ki lalo.
Pea kaila le‘olahi ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo pehē: ‟‘E Tamai, ʻoku ou tuku atu hoku laumālié ki ho ʻaofonnima!” Pea hili ʻene leá pehē: naʻá ne mānava fakaʻosi.
Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa e ʻeikitau Lomá, ki he meʻa kuo hokó, naʻá ne fakahi̇̄kihikiʻi ʻa e ‘Otuá, ʻo ne pehē: ‟Tā ko e mo‘oni pē, ko e tangata māʻoniʻoni ʻeni!”
Pea ko e kotoa ʻo e fuʻu kakai naʻa nau tuʻu ai ʻo mamata ki he meʻa fakalilifu na‘e hokó, naʻe mamahi honau lotó, pea nau foki atu ki honau ngaahi ‘api̇́.
Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē ʻa e ngaahi maheni ‘o Sīsuú, ‘o kau ai mo siʻi kau fefine kuo nau muimui mai kiate ia mei Kāleli̇́, naʻa nau tutuʻu pē mei he mamaʻó, ʻo mamata mei ai ki he ngaahi meʻa ni.
Pea ko eni, na‘e ʻi ai ha tangata ko Siosifa, hono hingoá, ʻa ia naʻá ne kau ki he Fakataha Tokoni̇́, ko e tangata failelei ia mo māʻoniʻoni.

Ko e toko taha ko iā, na‘e ‘ikai te ne loto ki he tu‘utu‘uni na‘e fai ‘e he Fakatahá pea mo hono fakahoko ʻenau tuʻutuʻuni̇́. Ko e tangata ia mei he kolo ʻo Siutea, ko ʻAlematea, ʻa ia naʻá ne nofo ʻamanaki, ki he hokomai ʻa e Puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Pea ʻalu ʻa e tangata ko iā kia Pailato, ‘o naʻe kole ke tuku mai muʻa ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú.
Pea naʻe fakahā‘ele hifo ia mei he kolosi̇́, ‘o naʻe kofuʻaki ia ha tupenu li̇̄neni mahu‘inga, pea naʻe toki telio ia ʻi ha fonualoto kuo tā ʻi ha makatu‘u, pea kuo te‘eki ke tanu ai ha taha.
Pea ko e ʻaho teuteu ia ki he kamataʻanga ʻo e Sāpate ʻo haʻa Siú.
Pea muimui atu ai pē ʻa siʻi kau fefine na‘e fononga fakataha mai mo Si̇̄sū mei Kāleli̇́, ‘o nau mamata ki he fonualotó, pea mo e anga hono fakatoka ki ai ‘o e sino ‘o Sīsuú.
Pea toki foki ʻa e kau fefiné ki ʻapi, ‘o nau teu ha ngaahi ʻakau kakala mo ha ngaahi lolo tākai. Ka naʻa nau mālōlō he Sāpaté, ‘o talangofua ki he Laó.

24.text: Pea ʻi he ‘uluaki ʻaho ‘o e uiké, kei hengihengi ʻaupito, na‘e uhu atu ʻa e kau fefiné ki he fonualotó mo e ngaahi kakala kuo nau teú.
Pea ʻi heʻenau aʻu atú, tā kuo ‘osi teka‘i ʻa e maka tāpuni ‘o e fonualotó.
Pea ʻi heʻenau hū atu ki he fonualotó, tā kuo ‘ikai ke kei ʻi ai ʻa e sino ‘o e ʻEiki ko Sīsū.
Pea lolotonga ʻa e hangē ʻoku molé ʻenau fakakaukaú, fakafokifā kuo tutu‘u mai kiate kinautolu ha ongo tangata ‘oku ngingila hona teungá.
Pea manavahē ‘aupito ai ʻa e kau fefiné, ‘o nau fepūnou‘i ki lalo. Kae pehē ange ‘e he ongo tangatá, ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou kumi ai ʻa ia ʻoku mo‘ui̇́ ki he feitu‘u ‘o e kau maté?
‘Oku ‘ikai ke ne ʻi heni! Ka kuo toetuʻu ia! Manatu‘i ʻene folofola naʻe fai atu lolotonga hoʻomou kei ʻi Kāleli̇́;
‛‘E tuku atu ʻa e Foha ‘o e Tangatá ki he nima ʻo e kau angahalá, pea te nau tutuki ia ki he kolosi̇́, ka te ne toetuʻu mei he maté ʻi he ʻaho hono tolú.’”
Pea toki manatu‘i ai ‘e he kau fefiné ʻa ʻene folofola ko iā.
Pea foki ʻa e kau fefiné mei he fonualotó ‘o nau tala ki he toko hongofulu mā tahá, mo hono toé, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa kuo hokó.
Pea ko e kau fefine naʻá nau fakamatala ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni ki he kau ʻApositoló, ko Mele Mākitala, mo Sōana, mo Mele ko e fa‘ē ʻa Sēmisi̇́, pea mo ha ni‘ihi kehe.
Ka na‘e hangē ʻa e fakamatala ʻa e kau fefiné, ha launoa pē, ki he kau ʻApositoló, he na‘e ‘ikai te nau tui ki ai.

Ka na‘e tuʻu hake ʻa Pita ʻo lele ki he fonualotó, pea ne aʻu atu ki ai, ʻo punou hifo ‘o sio ki loto, tā ko e meʻa pē na‘e tuku ai̇́, ko e ngaahi konga tupenu na‘e kofuʻaki ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú, pea talu ai pē ʻene foki ki ʻapi mo fifili ʻi hono lotó, pē ko e hā ʻa e meʻa kuo hokó.
Pea ko eni, ʻi he ʻaho pē ko iā, na‘e fononga atu hanau toko ua ki he ki‘i kolo ko ʻEmeasi, ʻa ia na‘e kilomita ‘e hongofulu mā taha nai mei Selusalema.
Pea naʻá na fononga pē mo talatalanoa ki he ngaahi meʻa kotoa kuo toki hokó;
Pea lolotonga ʻena talatalanoa mo fifili ki he ngaahi meʻá ni mo e fakaofiofi atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o fononga fakataha mo kinaua.
Ka na‘e taʻofi kinaua, ke ʻoua te na ʻiloʻi ko Si̇̄sū ia.
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua, ‟Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ʻoku mo talanoa ki ai ʻi ho‘omo fonongá?” Peá na tu‘u si‘i hifo, kuo na fakatou fofonga mamahi ‘aupito.
Pea pehēange ‘e he toko taha naʻe hingoa ko Kaliopasi: ‟Ko e muli ʻapē koe kuó ke toki haʻu ki Selusalema ‘oku ‘ikai ai te ke ʻilo ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo toki hoko he ngaahi ʻaho ko ʻeni̇́?”

Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‟He ko e hā ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuo hokó?” Peá na pehē ange, ‟ʻA e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau kia Si̇̄sū ʻo Nāsaleti̇́! Ko e tangata ko iā ko e palōfita naʻe hā ha mālohi ʻi heʻene ngāué mo e leá, ʻo fakahōifua ki he ‘Otuá mo fakafiefia ki he kakai̇́.
Ka na‘e hanga ‘e he‘etau kau taulaʻeiki lahi̇́ mo hotau kau taki̇́ ‘o hilifaki kiate ia ʻa e tautea maté, pea nau tutuki ia ki ha kolosi.
Ka naʻa mau nofo ʻamanaki, ko ia ia te ne fakatau‘atāina ʻa ‘Isileli̇́! Pea ʻāsili ai̇́, ko e ʻaho ʻeni hono tolu talu ʻa e hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā.
Pea kuo faka‘ohovale‘i kimautolu ‘e ha niʻihi ʻo ʻemau kau fefiné, ʻa ia naʻá nau uhu atu ʻane hengihengi ki he fonualotó.
Ka ʻi heʻenau aʻu atú, tā ‘oku ‘ikai ke kei ʻi ai hono sinó. Pea nau foki mai ‘o tala, naʻá nau mata vi̇̄sone ki ha kau ʻāngelo, ʻa ia naʻá nau fakahā ange, kuo toe mo‘ui ia.
Pea naʻe ō mo ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kimautolu ki he fonualotó, ʻo nau ʻilo ai, tā ‘oku moʻoni pē ʻa e lau ʻa e kau fefiné, he na‘e ‘ikai foki te nau sio mo kinautolu kiate ia.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinaua, ‟He toki meʻa vale mo‘oni ko kimoutolu mo faingataʻa ke mou tui ki he ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo leaʻaki ʻe he kau palōfitá!
Na‘e ‘ikai koā ke mahino, ʻa e pau ke tomuʻa fakamamahia ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá pea ne toki hoko ki hono lāngilangi̇ʻiá?”
Pea ne kamata mei he ngaahi tohi ʻa Mōsesé ‘o aʻu ki he ngaahi tohi kotoa ʻa e kau palōfitá, ʻa ʻene fakamatala kiate kinaua, mei he Tohitapu Kātoa, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku kau kiate iá.
Pea ʻi he fakaofiofi atu ʻenau fonongá ki ʻEmeasi̇́, naʻe hangē ka hoko atu pē ʻa e fononga ia ʻa Sīsuú.
Ka naʻe ta‘ofituʻu ia ‘e he ongo tangatá, ‘o na pehē kiate ia: ‟Afe mai muʻa ke tau ki‘i nofo mo kimaua! He kuo efiafi, pea kuo mei ʻosi ʻa e ʻahó!” Pea afe ai ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he ‘api̇́ mo kinaua.
Pea ʻi heʻenau nofo hifo ke maʻu ʻa e fakaefiafi̇́, naʻe to‘o ‘e Si̇̄sū ha mā ‘o naʻe tāpuaki‘i, pea naʻe toki pakipaki ia ‘o naʻe ‘oange kiate kinaua.
Pea ʻā ai hona matá, ʻo na ʻilo tā ko Si̇̄sū ia. Ka naʻe puli leva ia meiate kinaua.
Peá na fepehēʻaki: ‟Ne‘ine‘i ke vela hota lotó ʻi heʻene fakamatalamai mo fakaʻuhinga kiate kitaua ʻa e Tohitapú, ʻi he halá.”
Peá na tutu‘u hake , ‘o na foki leva ki Selusalema. Pea ʻi heʻena aʻu atú, tā kuo kātoa mai ʻa e toko hongofulu mā tahá, pea mo hono toenga ‘o e kau akó.
Pea nau talamai: ‟tā ʻoku mo‘oni pē! Kuo toe tu‘u ʻa e ʻEiki̇́, pea kuó ne hā kia Saimone.”
Pea toki fakamatalaange ‘e he ongo tangatá ʻa e meʻa na‘e hoko ʻi he halá, pea mo ʻena toki ʻiloʻi tā ko e ʻEiki̇́ ia, ʻi heʻene pakipaki ʻa e foʻi maá.

Pea lolotonga ʻa e kei talanoa ʻa e kau akó ki he ngaahi meʻa kuo hokó, fakafokifā kuo tu‘u ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻi honau lotolotongá, ‘o naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟Tauange ke nofoʻia kimoutolu ʻe he melinó!”
Pea manavahē ‘aupito ʻa e kau akó mo tetetete, koe‘uhi̇̄ he naʻa nau pehē ko ha faʻahikehe ‘oku nau mamata ki ai̇́.
Kae folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e hā ‘oku mou manavahē ai̇́, pea ko e hā ʻoku veiveiua ai homou lotó?
Mou vakai mai, ko hoku ongo nimá ē mo hoku va‘é, he ko au moʻoni pē ia. Ala mai kiate au ka mou ʻilo, he ko e faʻahikehé, ‘oku ‘ikai kakano mo hui ‘o hangē ʻoku mou mamata ki ai ʻiate aú.”
Pea ʻi heʻene lea pehē naʻá ne fakahā ange kiate kinautolu ʻa hono ongo nimá, pea mo hono ongo va‘é.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai pē ke nau tui, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e hulu tuʻa ʻenau fiefiá mo ʻenau ofoofó. Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku ʻi ai ha‘amou me‘akai heni?”
Pea nau ‘oange kiate ia ha konga ika tunu.
Pea toʻo ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e konga iká ʻo ne kai, ka nau mamata pē.

Pea naʻe pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻeni naʻá ku tala kiate kimoutolu, lolotonga ʻetau kei fononga holó, ʻa e pau ke fakahoko kotoa ʻa e ngaahi meʻa naʻe hikitohi ʻo kau kiate au, ʻi he Lao ʻa Mōsesé, mo e ngaahi Tohi ʻa e kau palōfitá, pea mo e Tohi Saamé.”
Pea toki tatala ‘e ia ʻa honau ʻatamai̇́ ke mahino kiate kinautolu ʻa e Tohitapú;
ʻO ne talaange kiate kinautolu: ‟Naʻe pehē ʻa e meʻa kuo hikitohi̇́: Kuo pau ke fou ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá ʻi ha mamahi lahi, pea ʻi hono ʻaho tolú, te ne toetu‘u mei he maté.
Pea ʻe malanga ʻaki ʻi hono hingoá ʻa e fakatomalá ke maʻu ʻa e fakamolemole angahalá, ki he ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa pē, ‘o kamata mei Selusalema.
Ko kimoutolu ʻa e kau fakamoʻoni ki he ngaahi meʻá ni.

Pea ko eni, te u fekau atu ʻa e Toko Taha naʻe tala‘ofa ʻaki kiate kimoutolu ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́, ko ia, mou tatali pē ʻi Selusalema kae‘oua leva kuo fakafonu kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e mālohi mei he Langi̇́.”
Pea taki atu kinautolu ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo aʻu atu ki Pētani. Pea naʻe toki hiki hake hono nimá ‘o naʻe tāpuaki‘i kinautolu.
Pea fakafokifā, lolotonga ʻene kei tāpuakiʻi kinautolú, naʻe ʻohake ia meiate kinautolu ʻo fakahāʻele hake ia ʻe ha ʻao ki he Langi̇́.
Pea naʻa nau lotu kiate ia, pea nau toki foki ki Selusalema kuo nau fiefia lahi ʻaupito.
Pea naʻa nau ō ma‘u pē ki he Temipalé ‘o fai ai ʻenau fakafeta‘i ki he ‘Otuá.

1.text: ʻI he kamata‘angá,
Ko e Toko Taha ia naʻe ʻi ai ʻi he kamata‘angá
Na‘e fou mai ʻiate ia,
ʻOku ʻiate ia ʻa e moʻui̇́.
Pea ʻoku ulo ʻa e maama ko iā,
Na‘e hoko mai ha tangata, ko e fekau mei he ‘Otuá, ʻa ia ko hono hingoá ko Sione.
Naʻe haʻu ʻa e Toko Taha ko iā, ke ne fakamo‘oni ki he maamá,
Na‘e ʻikai ko ia ʻa e māamá.
Pea naʻe ʻi ai ʻa e maama moʻoniá,
Naʻá ne ʻi māmani,
Naʻá ne haʻu ki heʻene meʻa ʻaʻana tonu,
Ka ko kinautolu naʻa nau tali iá,
Na‘e ʻikai ko ha faʻahinga naʻe tupu fakaenatula,
Pea hoko ʻa Folofola

Naʻe fakamo‘oni ʻa Sione, ʻo kau kiate ia, ʻaki ʻene kalanga, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko ʻeni ia ʻa e Toko Taha naʻá ku lea ʻo kau ki ai̇́, ʻa e Toko Taha ʻoku haʻu, ki mui mai ʻiate aú, ka naʻá ne ʻi ai pē ʻe ia, kimuʻa ʻiate au, koeʻuhi̇̄ he te ne tuʻukimuʻa ʻiate au.”
He ʻoku tau maʻu ʻekitautolu kotoa pē, mei he matavai moʻui ʻaʻaná, ʻo toutoumoliliu ha kelesi mo ha kelesi.
He ko Mōsese naʻá ne foaki mai ʻa e Laó, kae hokomai ʻa e kelesi̇́ mo e moʻoni̇́, ʻia Si̇̄sū Kalaisi.
Kuo te‘eki ai ʻaupito ke mamata ha taha ki he ‘Otuá, ka ko e Fohá pē taha, ʻa ē naʻe ʻafioʻanga taha mo e Tamai̇́, ko ia ia, ʻokú ne fakamatala iá.
Pea ko e fakamoʻoni ʻeni ʻa Sioné, ʻi hono fekau atu ki ai ʻe he kau Siu mei Selusalemá ha kau taula‘eiki mo ha kau Li̇̄vai, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke nau ō ‘o fehu‘i kiate ia, pē ko hai ia.
Pea naʻe fakahā totonu ange pē, ʻo ʻikai te ne fakaʻikaiʻi: ‟‘Oku ʻikai ko au ia ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá.”
Pea nau ʻeke kiate ia: ‟Pea ko hai leva koe?” ‟Ko ʻIlaisiā koe?” Pea naʻe talaange: ‟‘Oku ʻikai!”
Ko ia naʻa nau toki pehē kiate ia: ‟Ka ko hai leva koe? Koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ai haʻamau tali ʻe fai, kiate kinautolu naʻa nau fekau mai kimautolu.” ‟Ko e hā hoʻo lau ʻaʻau, ʻo kau kiate koé?”
Peá ne pehē: ‟Ko au ʻa e leʻo ʻoku kalanga, ʻi he toafá, Mou fakatonutonu ʻa e hā‘ele‘anga ‘o e ʻEiki̇́, ʻo hangē ko e lau ʻa e palōfita ko ʻAiseá.”
Pea ko kinautolu naʻe fekau mai̇́, naʻe kau ai mo ha kau Fālesi.
Pea nau ʻeke kiate ia, ʻo pehē: ‟Pea ko e hā leva ‘okú ke faipapitaiso ai̇́, ʻokapau ʻoku ʻikai ko e Mi̇̄saiá koe, pē ko ʻIlaisiā, pē ko e Palōfitá?”
Pea tali ‘e Sione kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku ou faipapitaiso vai au. Ka ʻoku hokomai ki homou lotolotongá, ha toko taha ʻa ia ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻiloʻi.
Ko e Toko Taha ia ʻoku haʻu ki mui mai ʻiate au, ka neongo ia, ‘oku ʻikai te u taau au ke vete ʻa e ha‘i ʻo hono suú.”
Ko e ngaahi fakafehuʻi ko eni̇́, naʻe fakahoko ia, lolotonga ʻokú ne faipapitaiso ʻi Pētani, ʻi he ve‘e kauvai fakahahake ‘o e Vaitafe Soataní.
ʻI he ʻaho naʻe hokó, naʻá ne sio kia Si̇̄sū ʻoku haʻu kiate ia, pea ne pehēange: ‟Ko ena ʻa e Lami ʻa e ʻOtua, ʻa ia ‘okú ne ʻave ʻa e angahala ʻa māmani̇́.
Ko e Toko Taha ʻeni naʻá ku lea ki ai̇́, ‛‘E haʻu ki mui mai ʻiate au ha tangata, ʻa ia naʻá ne ʻi ai, ʻi muʻa ʻiate au, koeʻuhi̇̄ te ne hoko ʻo tuʻukimuʻa ʻiate au.’
Pea na‘e ʻikai te u ʻilo ‘e au ia, ka ko ʻeku ʻi heni̇́, ke fakahāaʻi ʻa e Toko Taha ko iā, ki ʻIsileli̇́, he ko e ʻuhinga ia naʻá ku haʻu ai ʻo papitaiso vai̇́.”
Pea toki fakamoʻoni ʻa Sione ʻo pehē: ‟Kuo u mamata ki he Laumālié, kuo ʻalu hifo hangē ha lupe mei he langi̇́, ʻo ne nofomaʻu ʻi he Toko Taha ko iā.

He naʻe ʻikai te u mei ʻilo pē ko hai ʻa e Toko taha ko iā, ka ko ia naʻá ne fekau mai au ke papitaiso vai ʻa e kakai̇́, naʻá ne pehē: Te ke ʻilo ʻa e Toko Taha te ne papitaiso ʻa e kakai̇́, ʻaki ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́, he te ke mamata ki he Laumālié ʻoku hifo ʻo nofoʻia ia.
Pea kuo u mamata tonu ki ai, pea ‘oku ou fakamoʻoni atu ko e Toko Taha ko iā, ko e ʻAlo ia ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
ʻI he ʻaho hono hokó, na‘e toe tutuʻu ai ʻa Sione fakataha mo ha toko ua ʻo ʻene kau akó.
Pea ʻi heʻene mamata ki he hāʻele ange ʻa Sīsuú, naʻá ne pehē ange: ‟Vakai, ko e Lami ena ʻa e ‘Otuá!”
Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai ʻa e toko ua ko ē, mei heʻene kau akó, naʻá na muimui kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea ʻi he tafoki ange ʻa Si̇̄sū ‘o tokanga‘i ‘ena muimui mai̇́, naʻá ne folofola kiate kinaua: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ‘okú mo tokanga ki ai̇́?”
Pea ne pehē kiate kinaua: ‟Mo omi pea te mo mamata ki ai!” Ko ia, naʻa nau ō ʻo mamata ki he feituʻu naʻá ne nofo ai̇́ pea naʻa nau nofo ai mo ia, ʻi he ʻaho ko iā.
Na‘e kau ai ʻa ʻAnitelū, ko e tokoua ‘o Saimone Pitá, ko e toko taha ia ʻi he toko ua naʻá na fanongo meia Sione, ʻo na muimui kiate iá.
Pea ko e ‘uluaki meʻa naʻá ne fai̇́, ko ʻene kumi ki hono tokoua ʻoʻoná, ʻa Saimone, ʻo ne tala kiate ia: ‟Kuó ma feʻiloaki mo e Mi̇̄saiá” (ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá, ko e ‘Kalaisi̇́).
Pea taki mai ‘e ia hono tokouá kia Si̇̄sū. Pea ʻi heʻene mamata kiate iá, na‘e folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟‘E Saimone, foha ‘o Sione, ‘e ui koe ko Ki̇̄fasi” (ʻa ia ko hono ʻuhingá, ko ‟Pita.”)
ʻI he ʻaho hono hokó, na‘e finangalo ʻa Si̇̄sū ke hāʻele atu ki Kāleli. Pea ʻi he aʻu atu ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Kālelí, naʻá ne fe‘iloaki ai mo Filipe. Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Muimui mai kiate au.”
Pea ko Filipé, ko e tangata ia mei Petesaita, ʻa e kolo na‘e haʻu mei ai ʻa ʻAnitelū mo Pitá.
Pea fetaulaki ʻa Filipe mo Natāniela. Pea ne tala kiate ia: ‟Ko e Toko Taha na‘e lau ki ai ʻa Mōsese ʻi he Laó mo e kau Palōfitá kuo mau feʻiloaki̇́, ko Si̇̄sū, ko e foha ‘o Siosifa mei Nāsaleti̇́.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Natānielá ki ai: ‟He ‘e lava koā ke maʻu ha lelei mei Nāsaleti?”
ʻI he mamata ʻa Si̇̄sū kia Natāniela ʻoku haʻu kiate iá, naʻá ne folofola ʻo kau kiate ia: ‟Ko ena ia, ha ʻIsileli moʻoni, he ʻoku ʻikai ha kākā ʻiate ia.”
Pea ʻeke ange ‘e Natāniela: ‟Na‘e anga fēfē ho‘o ʻiloʻi aú?”
Pea tali ‘e Natāniela kiate ia: ‟Lāpai, ko koe ia ʻa e ʻAlo ‘o e ‘Otuá, ko e Tuʻi ʻIsileli̇́ koe!”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Kuó ke tui koā koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻeku pehē atu naʻá ku mamata kiate koe ʻi ho‘o nofo he lalo fiki̇́? Te ke mamata ki ha ngaahi meʻa ‘oku fakaofo ange ai.

Pea naʻe folofola kiate ia, Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atu kiate kimoutolu, te mou mamata ki he langi̇́, kuo fakaava, pea ko e kau ʻāngelo ʻa e ʻOtuá, ‘oku ʻalu hake mo ʻalu hifo, ʻi he Foha ʻo e Tangatá.”

2.text: Pea ‘i hono ʻaho tolú, naʻe fai ha mali ‘i he kolo ko Kena ‘i Kāleli̇́, pea naʻe ʻi ai ʻa Mele, ko e fa‘ē ʻa Sīsuú.
Pea na‘e fakaafe‘i foki ki he mali̇́, ʻa Si̇̄sū pea mo ‘ene kau akó.
Pea faifai pea maha ʻa e uainé, pea lea ange ʻa e faʻē ʻa Si̇̄suú kiate ia: ‟Kuo ‘osi ‘enau uainé.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Fineʻeiki, he ko e hā, ‘eta kaunga ki ai̇́? ʻOku te‘eki ke hokosia hoku taimi̇́!”
Pea lea ange ʻene faʻeé ki he kau ngāue he ‘api̇́: ‟Ko e hā pē ha meʻa te ne tala kiate kimoutolu, mou fai ki ai.”
Pea na‘e tu‘u ai ha ‘ū hina vai maka lalahi ‘e ono ʻa ia naʻe faʻa ngāueʻaki ki he ouau fakamaʻa ʻa e kau Siú. Na‘e fe‘unga ʻa e ‘ū hina ko iā mo e taki lita ‘e valungofulu ki he teau uofulu.
Pea fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou fakafonu ʻa e ‘ū hiná ʻaki ha vai.” Pea nau fakafonu ʻa e ʻū hiná, ʻo fonu mahuohua.
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou ʻutu ā, ʻo ʻave ki he matāpule ‘oku faitu‘utu‘uni he kātoangá, pea nau ʻutu ia ʻo ʻave.”

Pea ʻahiʻahiʻi ‘e he matāpule na‘e tu‘utu‘uni he kātoangá ʻa e vai kuo ‘osi liliu ko e uainé, ka naʻe ‘ikai te ne ‘ilo pē ko e uaine ia mei fē, he ko e kau ngāué pē naʻa nau tou ʻa e vai̇́. Ko ia, naʻe ui ange ʻe he tangata naʻe tuʻutuʻuni ʻi he kātoangá, ʻa e ʻeikitaʻané.

Pea ne lea kiate ia: ‟Ko e tokotaha kotoa pe ʻokú ne ʻuluaki tufa ʻa e uaine lelei̇́, pea ʻi he maʻu ʻe he kau fakaafe haʻanau uaine he uaine lelei̇́, pea te ne toki tufa leva ʻa e uaine anga maheni̇́. Ka kuó ke tuku ʻe koe ʻa e uaine lelei̇́ ke toki tufa mai ia hangē ko ʻeni̇́!”
Na‘e fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘ene fuofua mana ko eni̇́, ‘i Kena ‘i Kāleli̇́, pea naʻá ne fakahā ai hono lāngilangi̇́ ʻo tui ai kiate ia ‘ene kau akó.
Pea hili ʻa e meʻa ko iā, pea fononga atu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene fa‘eé, mo hono ngaahi tehiná, mo ‘ene kau akó, ki he kolo ko Kāpaneume, ‘o nau nofo ai, kae ʻikai ke fuʻu fuoloa.
Pea ʻi he ofi mai ʻa e kātoanga Pāsova ʻa e kau Siú, naʻe fononga hake ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Selusalema.
Pea ʻi he Temipalé, naʻá ne ʻilo ai ha ni‘ihi ʻoku fefakatauʻaki pulu, mo e sipi mo e fanga lupe, pea nofo ai foki mo ha kau liliu pa‘anga.
Pea ngaohi ‘e Si̇̄sū ha uipi, ʻaki ha ngaahi kafa, ʻo ne toki tuliʻaki kituʻa mei he temipalé ʻa e fanga sipi̇́ mo e fanga pulú, ʻo ne veteki ʻa e paʻangá mo fulihi ʻenau ‘ū tēpilé.
Pea naʻe tala ki he kau fakatau lupé, ʻo pehē: ‟Mou ʻave ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni mei heni, pea ʻoua te mou ngaohi ʻa e fale ‘o ‘eku Tamai̇́, ko ha fale fefakatauʻaki.”
Pea manatu ʻa ʻene kau akó, kuo tohi ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e mamahiʻi ʻo ho falé, te ne fakaʻauha au.”
Ko ia, na‘e ‘eke ange ‘e he kau Siú ʻo nau pehē kiate ia: ‟Ko e hā ha fakaʻilonga ʻokú ke tuku mai kiate kimautolu, ʻaki hoʻo fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ni?”
Pea tali ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Holoki ʻa e Temipale ni̇, pea ‘i ha ʻaho ‘e tolu, te u toe fokotuʻu ai ia!”
Ka naʻe pehē ange ‘e he kau Siú: ‟Ko e ta‘u ʻeni ‘e fāngofulu mā ono ʻa hono langa ‘o e Temipalé ni, pea te ke toe fokotuʻu ia koā ‘e koe ‘i ha ʻaho pē ‘e tolu?”
Ka ko ʻene laú, naʻe kau ki he Temipale ʻa ia ko hono sinó.
Ko ia, ʻi he hili ʻa e toetu‘u ʻa Si̇̄sū mei he maté, naʻe manatu ‘ene kau akó ki he‘ene lea ko eni̇́, pea nau tui ai ki he Tohitapú pea mo e meʻa na‘e folofola‘aki ‘e Sīsuú.
Pea lolotonga naʻá ne ʻi Selusalema he Kātoanga Pāsová, na‘e tui ha tokolahi kiate ia koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ‘enau sio ki he ngaahi mana naʻá ne fai̇́.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke fakafalala ‘e Si̇̄sū ia kiate kinautolu koeʻuhi̇̄ he naʻá ne ʻafioʻi ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē.
He na‘e ʻikai te ne fiemaʻu ke talaange ʻe ha taha ha ngaahi meʻa ʻo kau ki he tangatá, he ʻokú ne ʻafioʻi pē ʻe ia, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ʻi he loto ʻo e tangatá.

3.text: Pea naʻe ai ha tangata Fālesi ko Nikotimasi hono hingoá, ko e taha ʻo e kau taki ʻo haʻa Siú.

Naʻe haʻu poʻuli ʻa e tangata ko iā kia Si̇̄sū ‘o ne talaange kiate ia: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ‘oku mau lave‘i kuó ke hokomai mei̇́ he ‘Otuá ke fakahinohino kimautolu, he ʻoku ‘ikai ke lava ʻe ha taha ‘o fai e ngaahi mana ko ʻeni ʻokú ke fai̇́, ‘o kapau ʻe ‘ikai ke kau mo ia ʻa e ‘Otuá.”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne folofola kiate ia: ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatú, kapau he‘ikai fanau‘i ha taha mei ʻolunga, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito te ne lava ke mamata ki he Puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá.”
Pea ‘eke ange ‘e Nikotimasi kiate ia: ‟‘O lava fēfē ha tangata ke toe fanau‘i mai, kapau kuo motuʻa? ʻE lava koā ke ne toe hū ki he manava ʻo ʻene faʻeé, ke toe fanauʻi tuʻo ua mai ia?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko e moʻoni ʻo e moʻoni ʻa e meʻa ko ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ‘okapau ʻe ʻikai fanau‘i ha taha mei̇́ he vaí mo e Laumālié, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito ke hū ia ki he Puleʻanga ʻo e ʻOtuá.
Ko e meʻa ʻoku fanauʻi fakakakanó, ko e kakano ia, ka ko e meʻa ʻoku fanau‘i fakalaumālié, ko e laumālie ia.
‘Oua te ke ofo he‘eku talaatú, kuo pau ke mou fanau‘i fo‘ou.

ʻOku angi ʻa e matangi̇́ heʻene faʻiteliha ʻaʻaná pea ʻokú ke fanongo ki heʻene feangi‘aki̇́, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te ke ‘ilo pē ko ʻene angi̇́ mei fē, pē ‘okú ne angi ki fē. Pehē foki mo kinautolu kotoa pē kuo fanau‘i mei̇́ he Laumālié.”
Pea tali ‘e Nikotimasi: ‟‘E lava fēfē ke hoko ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni̇́?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne folofola kiate ia: ‟Ko koé ko e faiako ‘o ‘Isileli̇́, pea kuo teʻeki koā ke mahino kiate koe ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni̇́?

Ko e moʻoni ʻo e moʻoni ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, he ‘oku mau leaʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ‘oku mau ‘ilo pau, mo mau fakamatala ki he ngaahi meʻa kuo mau mamata pau ki ai, ka kuo ‘ikai te mou tali ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ‘oku mau tala atú.
Kapau kuo u fakamatala atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻo māmani̇́ kae ʻikai te mou tui ki ai, pea fēfē ai haʻamou tui ʻokapau te u fakamatala atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻo Hēvani̇́?
Kuo te‘eki ai ha taha ‘e ‘alu hake ki Hēvani, tukukehe pē ʻa e Toko Taha kuo ‘alu hifo mei Hēvani̇́, ʻa ia ko e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.”
Pea hangē naʻe hiki ki ʻolunga ‘e Mōsese ʻa e ngata palasá he toafá, pehē foki kuo pau ke hiki ki ʻolunga ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ia kotoa pē ʻe tui kiate iá, ke ne maʻu ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá.
Pehē foki, naʻe ‘ofa ʻa e ‘Otuá ki māmani̇, ko ia, naʻá ne foaki hono ʻAlo pē ‘e taha mei ʻitāniti̇́, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ia kotoa pē ‘e tui kiate iá, ke ʻoua naʻa ‘auha, ka ne ma‘u ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá.
He naʻe ‘ikai ke fekau mai ‘e he ‘Otuá hono ʻAló koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ne fakamāau‘i ʻa māmani, ka ke fakamo‘ui ʻa māmani ʻiate ia.

Ka ai ha taha ‘oku tui kiate ia, ʻe ʻikai ke toe fakamāauʻi ia, peá ka ai ha taha ‘e ‘ikai ke tui, kuo ‘osi fakamāau‘i ia, koe‘uhi̇̄ kuo ʻikai te ne tui ki he ʻAlo pē ‘e taha ‘o e ‘Otuá mei ʻitāniti̇́.
Pea ko e tuʻutuʻuni ia ʻa e fakamāaú, he kuo hoko mai ʻa e māamá ki māmani, kae kei ʻofa ange pē ʻa e kakai̇́ ki he fakapo‘uli̇́ ‘i he māamá koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ‘enau tō‘onga mo‘ui̇́, ‘oku kovi.
He ko ia kotoa pē ʻoku ngāue kovi̇́, ʻokú ne fehiʻa ki he māamá, pea ‘e ‘ikai te ne fie haʻu ki he māamá, naʻa ‘iloʻi ai ‘enau tō‘onga mo‘ui̇́.
Ka ko ia ʻokú ne mo‘ui ‘aki ʻa e mo‘oní, ‘okú na haʻu ki he māamá koe‘uhi̇̄ ke hā ai, ʻoku fai ʻene moʻui̇́, ʻi he ʻOtuá.
Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, naʻe ʻalu ʻa Si̇̄sū mo ʻene kau akó ki he fonua ko Siuteá, ‘o nau nofo ai, pea naʻá ne faipapitaiso ai.
Pea naʻe faipapitaiso foki mo Sione ‘i ‘Ēnoni, ofi ki Selemi, he naʻe lahi ʻa e vai̇́ ʻi he feituʻu ko iā, pea na‘e holo mai ʻa e kakai̇́ ki ai ʻo papitaiso.
He naʻe pehē ʻene meʻa naʻe fai̇́, ʻi he te‘eki ai ke fakahū pili̇̄sone ʻa Sioné.
Ko ia, naʻe hoko ha fakakikihi ʻi he kau ako ʻa Sione mo ha taha mei̇́ he kau Siú, ‘o fekauʻaki mo e ouau fakamaʻa ʻo e lotu faka-Siú.

Pea naʻa nau omi kia Sione ʻo nau pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ko e Toko Taha ko ē naʻá mo feohi, ʻi he kauvai fakahahake ‘o e Vaitafe Soatani̇́, ʻa ē naʻá ke fakahāaʻi̇́, vakai, ko e Toko Taha ko iā, ‘oku fai papitaiso mo ia foki, pea kuo ‘osi kotoa ki ai, ʻa e kakai̇́.”
Pea tali ‘e Sione ʻo ne pehē: ‟‘Oku ʻikai lava ke maʻu ʻe ha tangata ha meʻa ʻe taha, kae ʻoua kuo foaki kiate ia mei he langi̇́.
Ko kimoutolu foki te mou fakamoʻoni naʻá ku talaatu, ‘Oku ‘ikai ko e Mi̇̄saiá au, ka naʻe fekau mai au, ke u muʻomuʻa mai ʻi he Toko Taha ko ʻená.

Ko e toko taha ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e taʻahine mali̇́, ko e tangata mali̇́ ia. Ko e fakafeʻao ʻo e tangata mali̇́, ʻokú ne tuʻu pē ʻo fanongo fiefia lahi ʻaupito, ki he leʻo ʻo e tangata mali̇́. Ko ia, ko ʻeku fiefia ʻaʻakú, kuo kakato.
Ko e Toko Taha ko iā, kuo pau ke fakaʻaʻau ai pē ia kimuʻa, ka te u fakaʻaʻau ai pē au ki mui.”

‟Ko e Toko Taha ʻoku ʻalu hifo mei ʻolungá, ʻokú ne māʻolunga noa pe, pea ko e Toko Taha ‘oku tupu mei māmani, ‘e lea pē ia ʻo kau ki he ngaahi meʻa ‘o māmani̇́. Ka ko e Toko Taha na‘e ‘alu hifo mei he langi̇́, ‘oku mā‘olunga hake ia ʻi he meʻa kotoa pē.
‘Ilonga ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kuó ne mamata tonu mo fanongo tonu ki ai̇́, te ne fakamoʻoni ki he ngaahi meʻa ko iā. Ka ko e fakamoʻoni ʻaʻaná ʻe ʻikai tali ʻe ha taha.
Ka ko ia ʻokú ne tali ʻene fakamoʻoni̇́, ‘okú ne fakapapauʻi ʻoku falalaʻanga ʻa e ʻOtuá.
He ko e Toko Taha naʻe fekau mai ‘e he ‘Otuá, ʻokú ne leaʻaki ʻa e ngaahi folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá, he ʻoku taʻefakangatangata ʻene foaki ʻa e Laumālié.
‘Oku ‘ofa ʻa e Tamai̇́ ki he ʻAló pea kuó ne tukuange ke ne pule ki he meʻa kotoa pē.
Ko ia ‘oku tui ki he ʻAló, ʻokú ne maʻu ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá, ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke tui ki he ʻAló, he‘ikai mamata ia ki he mo‘ui̇́, he ʻoku nofomaʻu ʻiate ia ʻa e houhau ‘o e ‘Otuá.”

4.text: Ko ia ʻi he meaʻi ʻe Si̇̄sū kuo fanongo ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ ʻi he faka‘au ke tokolahi ange ʻa e kau ako ‘okú ne ma‘u mo papitaisó, ‘ia Sioné:
Neongo ko hono moʻoni̇́, naʻe ʻikai papitaiso ʻe Si̇̄sū ia ha taha, ka ko ʻene kau akó pē.
Naʻá ne mavahe atu mei Siutea, ʻo ne toe ʻalu atu ki Kāleli.
Pea na‘e pau ke ne fononga ʻo fou atu ‘i Samēlia.
Ko ia, naʻá ne aʻu atu ki ha kolo ʻo Samēlia ʻoku ʻiloa ko Saika, ʻa ia ‘oku ofi atu ki he konga kelekele na‘e ‘oange ‘e Sēkope maʻa hono foha ko Siosifá.
Pea na‘e kei tu‘u ai ha vaitupu na‘e keli ‘e Sēkopé. Pea koeʻuhi̇̄ kuo ongosia ʻa Si̇̄sū mei̇ he fonongá, naʻá ne ta‘utu hifo ai pē he ve‘e vaitupú, fe‘unga ʻeni̇́ kuo ho‘atā mālie.
Mo e haʻu ha fefine Samēlia ke ʻutu vai.
He kuo ʻalu atu ʻene kau akó ki he koló, ke fakatau mai haʻanau meʻakai.

Ka naʻe pehē ange ‘e he fefine Samēliá kiate ia: ‟Ko e Siu koe ka ko e fefine Samēlia au. ʻOku anga fēfē hoʻo kole mai ke ʻoatu hao inú?” (He na‘e ‘ikai ke feʻofofani ʻa e kakai Siú mo e kakai Samēliá.)

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne pehē kiate ia: ‟Kapau naʻá ke ‘ilo‘i ʻa e meʻaʻofa ʻa e ‘Otuá, pea mo e toko taha ‘oku lea atu kiate koe; ‟ʻOmi ha ku inú,” pehē kuó ke kole ‘e koe kiate ia, pea te ne ‘oatu ma‘au ha vai moʻui.”
Pea pehē ange ʻe he fefiné kiate ia: ‟ʻEiki, ʻoku ʻikai haʻo meʻaʻutuvai, pea ʻoku loloto fau ʻa e vaitupú, ka ko hoʻo vai moʻui ʻaʻau mei fē?
ʻOkú ke lahi koā koe ʻi heʻemau kui ko Sēkopé, ʻa ia naʻá ne foaki mai maʻa mautolu ʻa e vaitupú, pea naʻá ne inu mei ai mo ʻene fānaú mo ʻene fanga manú?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne folofola kiate ia: ‟Ko ia kotoa pē ‘e inu mei̇́ he vai ko eni̇́, te ne toe fieinua.

Ka ʻoka ai ha taha ‘e inu mei̇́ he vai te u ‘oange kiate iá, he‘ikai ke toe fieinua ia ‘o ta‘engata, ka ko e vai te u ʻoange maʻaná, ʻe hoko ia ‘i heʻene moʻui̇́, ko e matavai ʻe tafe mālohi maʻu pē ʻo aʻu ki he mo‘ui ta‘engatá.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e he fefiné kiate ia: ‟ʻEiki, ‘omai muʻa ma‘aku ʻa e vai ko iā, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ʻoua te u toe fieinua, pē te u toe hela mai ki heni ke ʻutu ange.”
Pea ne folofola kiate ia: ‟‘Alu ‘o ui mai ho husepāniti̇́ pea mo ōmai ki heni.”
Pea tali ʻe he fefiné ʻo ne pehē kiate ia: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ha ku husepāniti.”
He kuo tuʻo nima hoʻo maʻu husepāniti, pea ko e tangata ʻokú ke lolotonga nonofo mo iá, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ho mali ia. ‘Oku mo‘oni ‘aupito ho‘o lau ko iā.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e he fefiné kiate ia: ‟ʻEiki, ʻoku hangehangē kiate au ko ha palōfita koe!
Ko ‘emau ngaahi kui̇́, na‘e fai ʻenau lotú ʻi he mo‘unga ko eni̇́. Ka ko kimoutolu, ‘oku mou lau, ko Selusalema ʻa e feitu‘u totonu ke fai ki ai ʻa e lotú.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Fefine, tui mai kiate au, he ʻoku vave mai ha taimi ʻa ia ‘e ‘ikai kei fai ʻa e lotu ki he Tamai̇́ ʻi he mo‘unga ko eni̇́, pē ko Selusalema.
Ko kimoutolú, ʻoku mou lotu ki he meʻa ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo moʻoni ki ai. Ka ko kimautolú, ‘oku mau lotu ki he meʻa ʻoku maʻu ʻilo lelei ki ai, he ko e fakamo‘ui̇́, ʻoku haʻu mei̇́ he kakai Siú.

Ka ʻoku vave mai ha taimi, ʻa ʻeni kuo hokosia he taimi ni̇́, ʻa ia ko kinautolu ʻoku lotu moʻoni ki he Tamai̇́, ʻe fai ʻi laumālie mo moʻoni ʻenau lotú, he ʻoku kumi ʻe he Tamai̇́ foki ki he faʻahinga ʻe fai pehē ʻenau lotuhū kiate iá.
Ko e ‘Otuá ko e Laumālie, pea ko kinautolu ʻoku lotu kiate iá, kuo pau ke fai ʻi he laumālié mo e moʻoní ʻenau lotuhuú.”

Pea pehē ange ‘e he fefiné kiate ia: ‟‘Oku ou ‘ilo ‘oku hoko mai ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá, ʻa ē ‘oku ui ko e Kalaisi̇́; Pea ʻoka hokomai ʻa e Toko Taha ko iá, te ne toki fakahā kiate kimautolu ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ko au ia, ʻa ʻeni ‘oku lolotonga talanoa mo koé.”

Pea fe‘unga iá mo e aʻu mai ʻene kau akó, ‘o nau ‘ohovale he‘enau sio ‘okú ne talanoa mo ha fefine. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ha taha te ne ʻeke ange pē ko e hā ʻa e meʻa naʻá ne tokanga ki ai̇́, pea ko e hā ʻa e ‘uhinga ʻene talanoa mo iá.
Ko ia, naʻe tuku pē ai ‘e he fefiné ʻene meʻaʻutuvai̇́, ka ne foki ki he koló ‘o tala holo ki he kakai̇́:
‟Mou ōmi angē ‘o mamata ki he tangata, ʻa ia kuó ne fakamatala mai kiate au, ʻa e kotoa ʻo e ngaahi meʻa kuo u fai̇́. ʻOku ʻikai nai ko e Mi̇̄saiá ʻeni?”
Pea ʻalu atu ʻa e kakai̇́ mei he koló, ʻo nau ōatu kiate ia.
Kae lolotonga iá, naʻe fakakolekole ‘e he kau akó ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo pehē: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ‘ofa mai ‘o ma‘u ha me‘atokoni!”
Ka naʻá ne pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku ‘i ai ‘eku me‘atokoni ʻa ia ‘oku ‘ikai ha‘amou ‘ilo ki ai.”
Ko ia, naʻe fepehēʻaki ‘e he kau akó: ‟Na‘e ‘oange nai ‘e ha taha ha‘ane me‘atokoni?”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko ‘eku me‘atokoni̇́, ko e fai ʻa e finangalo ‘o e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú peá ke fakakakato ʻene ngaahi ngāué.

ʻIkai ʻoku mou faʻa pehē: ‛‘Oku toe pē ʻa e māhina ‘e fā pea fai ʻa e ututaʻu uité?’ Ko ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, mou hanga ʻo mamata atu ki he ngaahi ngoueʻangá, he kuo ‘osi motu‘a lelei ʻa e uité mo fe‘unga ke toli leva!
Ko e tokotaha ʻokú ne toli ʻa e uité, kuó ne ʻosi maʻu ʻa e totongi̇́, pea ʻokú ne tānaki ʻa e fuá, ki he moʻui taʻengatá, koe‘uhi̇̄ ke fakafiefia fakataha ai ʻa e kau ngoue uité mo e kau toli uité.
He ‘oku toki mo‘oni̇ ʻa e laú, ʻi he meʻa ni, ‘Oku tō ‘e ha ni‘ihi, kae utu ‘e ha ni‘ihi kehe.

Naʻá ku fekau atu kimoutolu ke mou ō ‘o toli ha ngaahi ngoue‘anga na‘e ‘ikai te mou fakaongosia ai. Ko ha niʻihi kehe na‘e fakaongosia ai̇́, ka mou ōatu kimoutolu ‘o ma‘u fiefia ʻi heʻenau fakaongosiá.”
Pea naʻe tui kiate ia ha kau Samēlia tokolahi mei̇́ he kolo ko iā koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e lea ʻa e fefiné ʻo ne talalotoʻaki, ʻo pehē: ‟Naʻá ne fakamatalamai kiate au ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē kuo u fai.”
Ko ia, ʻi he omi leva kiate ia ʻa e kakai ʻo Samēliá, naʻa nau kole ange kia Si̇̄sū ke ne nofo pē mu‘a ai mo kinautolu. Ko ia, naʻá ne nofo ai ‘i ha ʻaho ‘e ua.
Pea tokolahi foki mo ha kakai kehe naʻe tui kia Si̇̄sū koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ‘ene folofolá.

Pea nau talaange ki he fefiné, ʻo pehē: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te mau kei tui ʻo tuʻunga he me‘a naʻá ke talamai̇́. He kuo mau fanongo tonu kiate ia, pea kuo mau ‘ilo pau, ʻoku mo‘oni pē, ko ʻeni ia ʻa e Fakamo‘ui ‘o māmani̇́.”
Pea hili ha ʻaho ʻe ua mei ai pea naʻe toki mavahe mei ai, ‘o ‘alu ki Kāleli.
Ko Si̇̄sū pē foki naʻá ne lau ʻo pehē: ‟ʻoku ʻikai ha palōfita ‘e faka‘apa‘apa‘i ‘i hono kolo tupu‘angá.”

Ko ia, ʻi heʻene a‘u atu ki Kāleli̇́, naʻe talitali lelei ia ‘e he kau Kāleli̇́, he kuo nau mamata ki he ngaahi meʻa lahi naʻá ne fai ʻi Selusalema lolotonga ʻa e Kātoanga Pāsová, he naʻa nau ʻi ai foki mo kinautolu.
Pea toe ʻalu ia ki Kena ʻi Kāleli̇́, ʻa e kolo ia naʻá ne liliu ai ʻa e vai̇́ ko e uainé.
Pea ʻi heʻene fanongo kuo a‘u mai ʻa Si̇̄sū ki Kāleli mei Siuteá, naʻá ne ʻalu atu leva kiate ia ‘o kole ke ne ʻalu hifo mu‘a ‘o faito‘o hono fohá, he kuo mei mate.
Ka naʻe pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Kapau naʻe ʻikai te mou mamata ki he maná pea mo e me‘a fakaofó, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito te mou tui.”
Pea lea kiate ia ʻe he matāpule ʻa e tuʻi̇́: ‟ʻEiki, meʻa mai muʻa, telia naʻa mate ʻeku tamasiʻi̇́.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟‘Alu pē koe, he kuo mo‘ui ho fohá!”
Pea lolotonga ʻene kei fononga atú, kuo fakafetaulaki mai ʻene kau ngāué ʻo fakahā ange, ʻo pehē: ‟Kuo mo‘ui ho fohá!”
Pea ʻi he fehu‘i ange ʻe he tangatá pē na‘e mo‘ui fakakū hono fohá, naʻa nau talaange: ‟Na‘e mahu‘i hono mofi̇́, he taimi tahá ‘aneafi.”
Pea ʻiloʻi leva ‘e he tangatá, ko e taimi pē ia na‘e folofola ange ai ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟Kuo mo‘ui ho fohá.” Ko ia, naʻá ne mātuʻaki tui kiate ia mo hono fāmili̇́ kātoa.
Ko e mana hono ua ia naʻe fai ʻe Si̇̄sū, hili ‘ene hiki mei Siutea ki Kāleli̇́.

5.text: Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko eni̇́, na‘e ‘alu hake ‘a Si̇̄sū ki Selusalema, ke kau ‘i ha kātoanga ʻa e kakai Siú.
Pea na‘e ‘i ai ha vai ‘i Selusalema, na‘e tu‘u he ve‘e Matapā ʻo e Fangasipi̇́, ʻa ia na‘e ui faka-Hēpelū ko Pēteseta, pea naʻe ʻātakaiʻi ia ʻe ha fakafaletolo ʻe nima.
ʻI he ngaahi fakafaletolo ko eni̇́, naʻe tokolahi ha kau mahakiʻia na‘á nau fetākoto‘i ai, ko e faʻahinga naʻe kui, mo e faʻahinga naʻe heke, mo e kau mamatea.
Pea naʻe kau ai foki ha tangata, kuo ta‘u ‘e tolungofulu mā valu ʻene mahakiʻiá.
Pea ʻi he mamata ‘a Si̇̄sū ki heʻene tokotó, ʻo ne ʻafioʻi kuo fuoloa ʻene mahakiʻiá, naʻá ne folofola kiate ia: ‟‘Okú ke fie mo‘ui?”

Pea tali ʻe he tangata mahaki̇́ kiate ia: ‟‘Eiki, ʻoku ‘ikai te u maʻu ha taha ke li̇̄ au ki he vai̇́, ‘i heʻene taimi ʻoku fa‘a ngaueue ai̇́, he ko e lolotonga ‘eku kei feinga atu ki he vai̇́, kuo tomu‘a a‘u atu ha taha ia ‘iate au.”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Tu‘u hake ‘o takai ho mohengá, peá ke ‘alu.”
Pea naʻe moʻui leva ʻa e tangatá, ʻo ne takai hono mohengá ‘o naʻe ʻalu.
Ko ia, naʻe lea ʻa e kau taki ‘o e kakai Siú ki he tangata kuo fakamoʻui̇́: ‟Ko e ʻaho Sāpate ʻeni! Pea ‘oku ʻikai ngofua ‘i he‘etau laó ke ke toʻo ho mohengá ʻi he Sāpaté!”
Pea tali ʻe he tangatá kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e Toko Taha naʻá ne fakamo‘ui aú, ko ia ia naʻá ne fekauʻi au, ʻo pehē: ‛Toʻo ho mohengá peá ke ‘alu.’”
Pea nau ‘eke ange kiate ia: ‟Ko hai ʻa e tangata ko iā, ʻa ē naʻá ne pehē kiate koe, Toʻo ho mohengá ʻo ʻalú?”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke ‘ilo ‘e he tangata naʻe fakamoʻui̇́, pē ko hai naʻá ne faitoʻo iá, he kuo moulu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ia, ʻo ʻalu fakataha atu mo e fuʻu kakai naʻe ʻi ai̇́.

Hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, naʻe toki ma‘u ‘e Si̇̄sū e tangatá ʻi he Temipalé, pea naʻe pehēange ki ai: ‟Ko ena kuó ke mo‘ui. ʻOua naʻá ke toe faiangahalá, na‘a faifai kae toe hoko atu kiate koe ha kovi ‘oku lahi angé.”
Pea ‘alu atu ʻa e tangatá ‘o fakahā ki he kau taki ‘o e kakai Siú, tā ko Si̇̄sū naʻá ne fakamo‘ui iá.
Pea koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e fai ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko ʻeni̇́ ʻi he Sāpaté, na‘e fakatangaʻi ia ‘e he kau Siú.
Ka naʻe folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko ‘eku Tamai̇́, ‘oku ngāue ma‘u ai pē ia ʻo aʻu mai ki he taimi ni, pea ko au foki, kuo pau ke u ngāue ai pē mo au.”

Koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, naʻe fakautuutu ai pē ʻa e loto ‘o e kau Siú ke tāmate‘i ‘a Sīsuú, he na‘e ‘ikai ngata pē heʻene maumau‘i ʻa e Sāpaté, ka naʻá ne toe lau foki ʻa e ‘Otuá ko ʻene Tamai̇́ ia, ‘o ne fakatatau ai ia ki he ‘Otuá.

Ko ia, naʻe tali ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ‘oku ‘ikai lava ʻa e ʻAló ‘o fai ha meʻa ʻe taha ‘iate ia pē, ʻokapau ‘oku ʻikai te ne mamata ‘oku fai ‘e heʻene Tamai̇́ ʻa e meʻa tatau, he ko e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku fai ʻe he Tamai̇́, ʻoku fai foki mo ia ʻe he ʻAló.
He ‘oku ‘ofa ʻa e Tamai̇́ ki he ʻAló, pea kuó ne fakahā kiate ia ʻene me‘a kotoa pē ʻokú ne fai. ʻIo, te mou ʻohovale foki, he te ne fakahā kiate ia mo ha ngaahi me‘a lalahi ange.
He hangē ʻe fakatoetu‘u ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́ ʻa e faʻahinga kuo maté, mo ngaohi kinautolu ke toe moʻui. Pehē foki ʻe foaki moʻui ʻe he ʻAló ki he kakai ‘okú ne loto ke ngaohi ke moʻui̇́.
He ʻoku ‘ikai ke fakamāau‘i ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́ ha taha, ka kuó ne tuku ki he ʻAló ke ne fakamaaua ʻa e kakai kotoa pē.

Koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakalāngilangiʻi ʻa e ʻAló foki ʻo hangē tofu pē ko hono fakalāngilangiʻi ʻo e Tamai̇́. Ka ai ha taha ‘oku ‘ikai ke ne fakalāngilangi‘i ʻa e ʻAló, ʻoku ‘ikai foki ke ne fakalāngilangi‘i ʻa e Tamai̇́, ʻa ē naʻá ne fekau mai ʻa e ʻAló.

Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, ka ai ha taha ʻe fanongo ki heʻeku ngaahi leá, pea tui ki he Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ‘okú ne ma‘u ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá, pea ʻe ʻikai ke toe fakamāauʻi ia, he kuó ne ‘osi hiki mei he maté ki he mo‘ui.

Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ‘oku vave mai ha ʻaho, ʻa ʻeni kuo kamatá, ʻa ia ʻe ongona ai ʻe he kau pekiá ʻa e leʻo ‘o e ʻAlo ʻo e ‘Otuá, pea ko kinautolu te nau fanongo ki hono le‘ó, te nau toe mo‘ui.
He hangē ʻoku nofoʻia ʻa e Tamai̇́ ʻe he moʻui̇́ ʻiate ia pē, pehē foki kuó ne ʻange ki he ʻAló ke ne moʻui ʻiate ia pē.
Pea kuó ne fakamafai‘i ʻa e ʻAló ke fai fakamāau, he ko ia ia ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.
ʻOua naʻa mou ‘ohovale ʻi he meʻa ko iā, he ʻoku vavé ni mai ha taimi, ʻa ia ko e faʻahinga kotoa pē ʻi fonualoto, te nau fanongo ki hono leʻó.
Peá te nau hūmai mei fa‘itoka: Ko e faʻahinga na‘e failelei̇́, ki he toetuʻu ke moʻui̇́, ka ko e faʻahinga na‘e faikovi̇́, ki he toetuʻu ke fakamalaʻiaʻi̇́.

‘Oku ‘ikai lava ke u fai ʻe au ha me‘a ‘e taha, ‘iate au pē. ʻOkú ou fai fakamāau pē ‘o fakatatau ki he me‘a ʻoku ou fanongo ki ai̇́, ka ko ‘eku fai fakamāaú ʻoku totonu, he ‘oku ‘ikai te u fai ki hoku lotó, ka ko e finangalo ‘o e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
Kapau te u fakamoʻoni pē ʻe au kiate au, ‘e ʻikai falalaʻanga ʻeku fakamoʻoni ʻaʻakú.
Ka ‘oku ʻi ai ha taha ‘okú ne fakamoʻoni ʻo kau kiate au, pea ‘oku ou ‘ilo ko ʻene fakamoʻoni ʻaʻana ʻo kau kiate aú, ʻoku falalaʻanga.
Naʻa mou fekau atu ke faka‘eke‘eke ʻa Sione, pea kuó ne fakahā atu ʻa e moʻoní.
ʻOku ‘ikai ke pehē: ʻoku ou falala ki he fakamoʻoni ‘a ha taha, ka ‘oku ou talaatu ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakamo‘ui kimoutolu.
Ko e toko taha ko iā ko e maama na‘e tutu pea ulo atu. Pea na‘a mou fiefia ʻi hono maamá, ʻi ha ngaahi taimi.

Ka ‘oku ‘i ai ʻeku fakamo‘oni ʻaʻaku ‘oku mahulu hake ʻia Sione. He ko e ngaahi ngāue kuo tuku mai ‘e he Tamai̇́ ke u fakakakató, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa pē ko ʻeni ʻoku ou lolotonga fai̇́, ko e fakamo‘oni ia ʻo kau kiate au, ki hono fekau mai au ʻe he Tamai̇́.
Pea ko e Tamaí, ‘a ē naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ko ia ia ʻoku fakamoʻoni ʻo kau kiate aú. Ka kuo te‘eki te mou ongona hono le‘ó pē mamata tonu ki hono fofongá.
Pea ‘oku ‘ikai foki ke mou maʻu ʻene folofolá ke nofomaʻu ‘i homou lotó, he ko e Toko Taha kuó ne fekau mai̇́, ko ʻeni ia ʻoku ʻikai te mou tui kimoutolu ki ai.
‘Oku mou fakatotolo ki he Tohitapú, he ‘oku mou fakakaukau ʻe tuʻunga ai hoʻomou maʻu ʻa e moʻui taʻengatá, pea ko e ngaahi tohi ia ʻoku fakamoʻoni ʻo kau kiate aú.
Ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou loto ke haʻu kiate au, ke mou maʻu ai ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá.
‘Oku ‘ikai te u tali ʻa e fakalāngilangi ʻoku fai mai ʻe ha taha.
He ‘oku ou ‘ilo‘i lelei kimoutolu, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te mou maʻu ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e ʻofa ki he ‘Otuá.
Ko au ʻeni kuo u haʻu ʻi he huafa ʻo ʻeku Tamai̇́, pea kuo ʻikai te mou tali au. Ka ʻoka ha‘u ha taha kehe ʻi hono hingoa pē ‘o‘ona, te mou tali ʻa e taha ko iā.
Ka ‘e lava fēfē ke mou tui, lolotonga iá ‘oku mou manako ke fefakalāngilangi ʻaki fakaekimoutolu pē, kae ʻikai te mou kumi atu ki he lāngilangi ‘oku maʻu mei he ʻOtuá Toko Taha pē.
‘Oua te mou fakakaukau ko au te u talatalaaki‘i kimoutolu ki he Tamai̇́ he ko Mōsese, ‘a ē ‘oku tu‘unga ki ai ho‘omou ʻamanaki̇́, ko ia ia te ne talatalaakiʻi kimoutolú.
He kapau na‘a mou tui kia Mōsese, te mou tui foki kiate au. He na‘e tohi ‘a Mōsesé, ʻo kau kiate au.
Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ʻoku ʻikai te mou tui ki he ngaahi me‘a naʻá ne hikitohi̇́, ʻe anga fēfē ai haʻamou tui mai ki heʻeku ngaahi leá?”

6.text: Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, naʻe folau atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he kauvai ‘o e Tahi Kāleli̇́, ʻa ia na‘e toe ʻiloa pē, ko e Tahi ʻo Taipiliō.
Pea muimui kiate ia ha kakai tokolahi, koe‘uhi̇̄ he naʻa nau mamata ki heʻene ngaahi mana naʻe hoko heʻene fakamo‘ui mahaki̇́.
Pea ʻalu hake ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ha funga mo‘unga, pea naʻe nofo hifo ai mo ʻene kau akó.
Pea naʻe ofi ke fai ʻa e Pāsová, ko e kātoanga fakalotu ʻa e kakai Siú.
Pea ʻi he vakai ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘oku fakaholo mai ha fu‘u kakai tokolahi kiate iá, naʻá ne fehu‘i ange kia Filipe: ‟Te tau ma‘u mei fē ha me‘atokoni ke fafanga ‘aki ʻa e fu‘u kakai ko ʻeni̇́?”
Ka ko ʻene folofola peheé, ke siviʻi ʻaki ‘a Filipe, he kuó ne ‘osiʻ ʻafioʻi pē ʻe ia, ʻa e me‘a te ne fai̇́.
Pea pehēange ‘e Filipe kiate ia: ‟Na‘a mo haʻamau ngāue totongi ki ha māhina ʻe valu, ʻe ʻikai feʻunga ʻa e paʻanga ʻe maʻu ai̇́, ke fafangaʻaki kinautolu.”
Pea lea kiate ia ʻa e toko taha heʻene kau akó, ʻa ia ko ‘Anitelū, ko e tokoua ‘o Saimone Pitá,
‟‘Oku ‘i ai ha tamasi‘i heni, ‘oku ‘i ai ha‘ane fo‘i mā uite ‘e nima mo ha ongo kiʻi mata‘i ika ‘e ua, ka ʻe ʻikai totofu ai ʻa e fu‘u kakai̇́ ni.”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū: ‟Fekau ʻa e kakai̇́ ke nau nofo ki lalo.” Pea ko e feitu‘u musie‘ia ia, naʻa nau nofo hifo ai̇́, pea ko e tokolahi ʻo e mātuʻa tangatá, ko e toko nima afe.
Ko ia naʻe to‘o ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e maá, ʻo fai ʻene fakafetaʻi̇́, pea naʻe toki tufotufa ia ki he kakai naʻe nofo ai̇́. Naʻá ne fai pehē pē foki ki he iká, pea na‘e kai ʻa e fuʻu kakai̇́, ‘o nau mākona.
Pea ʻi heʻenau mākona kotoa pē, naʻe fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘ene kau akó, ke nau tānaki ʻa e toengá, ke ‘oua na‘a maumau ha meʻa.
Ko ia, naʻa nau tātānaki ʻa e toetoenga ʻo e foʻi mā ‘e nima naʻa nau kai̇́, ʻo fonu ai ha ngaahi kato lalahi ʻe hongofulumāua.
Pea ʻi he mamata ʻa e kakai̇́ ki he mana kuo fai ‘e Si̇̄suú na‘a nau pehē: ‟Tā ko e Palōfita mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni, ʻa ē naʻe lau ke ha‘u ki māmani̇́!”
Ko ia, ʻi he ʻafioʻi ʻe Si̇̄sū ‘e omi ‘a e kakai̇́ ʻo feinga ke ʻave ia ʻo fakanofo ko honau Tuʻi̇́, naʻe toe ‘alu ia ki ha moʻunga ‘o nofo toko taha ai.
Pea ʻi heʻene efiafi hifó, naʻe ʻalu atu ʻene kau akó ki tahi;
‘O nau heka ai ki ha vaka ʻo tuku folau atu ki he kauvai ʻe tahá, ki Kāpaneume. Pea kuo poʻuli ʻi he taimi ko iā, mo e te‘eki pē ke a‘u mai ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu.
Pea tō mai ha matangi mālohi pea houtuʻu ʻa e tahi̇́.
Pea hili ʻenau ʻaʻalo ʻi ha kilomita ‘e nima pē ono nai, naʻa nau mamata kia Si̇̄sū ʻoku hāʻele mai ʻi he fukahi tahi̇́, ‘o fakaofiofi mai ki he vaká, pea naʻa nau manavahē ‘aupito.
Ka naʻá ne folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOua ʻe manavahē. Ko au pē.”
Pea nau loto leva ke fakaheka ia ki he vaká.

Pea ʻi he ʻaho hono hokó, ko e fuʻu kakai na‘e kei nofo ʻi he kauvai ʻe tahá, naʻa nau fakatokangaʻi, tā ko e vaka pē ‘e taha na‘e tau ai̇́, pea naʻe ʻikai ke heka ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he vaka ko iā mo ʻene kau akó, ka ko ʻene kau akó pē naʻa nau folau atu ai̇́.
Ka naʻe tau ofi mai ai ha fanga ki‘i vaka mei Taipiliō, ki he feitu‘u na‘e kai ai ‘e he kakai̇́ ʻa e mā ko ē naʻe fai fakafetaʻi ai ʻa e ʻEiki̇́.
Pea ‘i he mamata ‘e he kakai̇́ kuo ‘ikai ke ‘i ai ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó he feitu‘u ko iā, naʻá nau heka leva ki he fanga ki‘i vaká, ‘o nau ō ki Kāpaneume ko e kumi kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea ʻi heʻenau maʻu ia ki he kauvai ‘e tahá, naʻa nau ‘eke ange: ‟Tangata‘eiki, naʻá ke ha‘u fakakū ki heni̇́?”

Pea pehē ange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolú, ‘oku mou kumi kiate au ʻo ʻikai koe‘uhi̇̄ kuo mou mahinoʻi ʻeku ngaahi maná, ka ko e meʻa ʻi ho‘omou kai ʻo mākona ʻi he maá.

ʻOua te mou ngāue ki he me‘atokoni ‘e ʻauha, ka ki he me‘atokoni ʻe tolonga ʻo aʻu ki he mo‘ui ta‘engatá, ʻa ia ʻe ‘oatu ʻe he Foha ʻo e Tangatá kiate kimoutolu, he ko e meʻa ia kuo fakamafai‘i ia ‘e he Tamai̇́, ke ne ‘oatu.”
Ko ia, naʻa nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Ko e hā leva ʻa e meʻa te mau fai kae lava ke mau fai ai ʻa e ngāue ʻa e ‘Otuá?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e ngāue ʻeni ʻa e ‘Otuá: Ke mou tui ki he Toko Taha kuó ne fekau mai̇́.”
Ko ia naʻa nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Ko e hā ha mana te ke fai ke mau sio ki ai ka mau tui ai kiate koe? Ko e hā ho‘o me‘a ‘e fai̇́?
Ko ʻetau ngaahi kui̇́, na‘a nau kai ʻa e mā mana ʻi he toafá, ‘o fakatatau ki he lau ʻa e Tohitapú, Naʻá ne ‘oange ʻa e mā mei he langi̇́ kiate kinautolu ke nau kai mei ai.”

Ko ia, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolú, na‘e ‘ikai ko Mōsese naʻá ne foaki kiate kimoutolu ʻa e mā mei he langi̇́ ka ko ʻeku Tamai̇́ te ne foaki kiate kimoutolu ʻa e mā moʻonia mei he langi̇́.
He ko e mā ʻa e ʻOtuá, ko e Toko Taha ia kuo ʻalu hifo mei he langi̇́, ke ne foaki mo‘ui ma‘a māmani.”
Ko ia naʻa nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟‘Eiki, ke ke foaki mai maʻu pē ʻa e mā ko iā kiate kimautolu.”

Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko au pē ‘a e mā ‘o e mo‘ui̇́. Ka ai ha taha ʻe haʻu kiate au, ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito te ne toe fiekaia ‘o ta‘engata, pea ko ia ʻe tui kiate au, ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito te ne toe fieinua ‘o ta‘engata.
Ka kuo u talaatu kiate kimoutolu, pea kuo mou mamata foki kiate au ka kuo ʻikai te mou tui.
Ko ia kotoa pē kuo foaki kiate au ‘e he Tamai̇́, ʻe haʻu ia kiate au, peá ka ai ha taha ʻe haʻu kiate aú, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito te u tuli ia ke ʻalu.
He na‘e ‘ikai te u ‘alu hifo mei he langi̇́, ke fai hoku lotó, ka ke fai ʻa e finangalo ‘o e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.

Pea ko ʻeni ia ʻa e finangalo ‘o e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ke ‘oua naʻa ‘auha ha taha he faʻahinga kuó ne foaki mai kiate aú, ka te u fokotu‘u hake kinautolu kotoa mei he maté, ‘i he ʻaho fakamui̇́.

He ko e finangalo ʻeni ‘o ‘eku Tamai̇́, ko kinautolu kotoa pē te nau mamata ki he ʻAló, pea tui falala kiate iá, ke nau maʻu moʻui taʻengata, pea te u toe fakatoetuʻu hake kinautolu mei he maté, ‘i he ʻaho fakamui̇́.”
Ko ia, naʻe felāuaki ai ʻa e kau Siú ʻo kau kiate ia koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻene pehē: ‟Ko aú, ko e mā kuo ‘alu hifo mei he langi̇́.”
Pea nau pehē: ‟‘Ikai ko Si̇̄sū eni, ko e foha ‘o Siosifá, ʻa ia ʻoku tau maheni mo ‘ene tamai̇́ mo ‘ene fa‘eé? ‘Oku anga fēfē ai ke ne talamai eni, na‘e ‘alu hifo ia mei he langi̇́?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOua te mou felāuaki ʻiate kimoutolu.
‘Oku ‘ikai lava ha taha ke haʻu kiate au, kae‘oua kuo taki mai ia kiate au ‘e he Tamai̇́, ʻa ia naʻá ne fekau mai aú, pea te u fokotu‘u hake ia mei he maté, ‘i he ʻaho fakamui̇́.
ʻOku hikitohi ʻi he Kau Palōfitá, ‛Pea ʻe akonekina ʻa e kakai kotoa pē, ‘e he ‘Otuá.’ Pea ko kinautolu kotoa pē kuo fanongo ki he le‘o ‘o e Tamai̇́ ʻo ako meiate iá, te ne haʻu kiate au.
He kuo teʻeki ke mamata tonu ʻe ha taha ki he Tamai̇́, tukukehe pē ʻa e Toko Taha naʻe haʻu mei̇́ he Tamai̇́, ko ia Toko Taha pē kuo femātaaki mo e Tamai̇́.
Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ko ia ‘oku tui̇́, ‘okú ne ma‘u ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá.
Ko au pē ko e mā ‘o e mo‘ui̇́!
Ko ho‘omou ngaahi kui̇́, naʻa nau kai ʻa e mā maná, ʻi he toafá, ka nau mate pē.
Ka ko e mā ʻeni kuo ‘alu hifo mei langi̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke kai ai ha taha, peá ke ʻoua naʻa toe mate.

Ko au, ko e mā ʻo e mo‘ui, ʻa ia kuo ‘alu hifo mei he langi̇́. Ka ai ha taha te ne kai mei he mā ko eni̇́, te nau mo‘ui pē ‘o ta‘engata, pea ko e mā ʻa ia te u ‘oatú, ko hoku sinó ia, ʻa ia ʻoku foaki ke moʻui ai ʻa māmani.”
Pea naʻe felāuaki leva ʻa e kau Siú fakaekinautolu pē, ʻo pehē: ‟‘E lava fēfē ‘e he tangatá ni, ke foaki mai hono sinó ke tau kai?”

Ko ia, naʻe folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, kapau ʻe ‘ikai te mou kai he sino ‘o e Foha ‘o e Tangatá, mo inu hono totó, ʻe ʻikai te mou ma‘u ʻa e moʻui̇́, ʻiate kimoutolu.
Ko ia ʻokú ne kai hoku sinó mo inu hoku totó, ʻokú ne ma‘u ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá, pea te u fokotu‘u hake ia mei he maté, ‘i he ʻaho fakamui̇́.
He ko hoku sinó, ko e me‘akai mo‘onia, pea ko hoku totó, ko e me‘ainu mo‘onia.
Ka ai ha taha te ne kai hoku sinó mo inu hoku totó, te ne nofomaʻu ʻiate au pea mo au ʻiate ia.
Hangē ʻoku moʻui ʻa e Tamai̇́, ʻa ia naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ko au foki ‘oku ou mo‘ui koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e Tamai̇́, ko ia, ka ai ha taha te ne kai hoku sinó, ‘e mo‘ui foki ʻa e taha ko iā koe‘uhi̇̄ ko au.
Ko ʻeni ia ʻa e mā na‘e ‘alu hifo mei langi̇́. ʻOku ‘ikai hangē ia mo e mā na‘e kai ‘e ho‘omou ngaahi kui̇́, ka nau mate pē. Ko ia te ne kai ʻa e mā ko eni̇́, te ne mo‘ui pē ‘o ta‘engata.”
Ko e ngaahi meʻa ni, naʻá ne folofolaʻaki, ʻi he falelotú, ‘i heʻene faiako ‘i Kāpaneume.
Ko ia, ko e tokolahi ʻokinautolu heʻene kau akó na‘a nau fanongo kiate iá, naʻa nau pehē: ‟Ko e toki akonaki faingataʻa eni. Ko hai ʻoku fie fanongo ki ai?”
Pea ʻafioʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻiate ia pē ʻoku felāuaki ‘ene kau akó ʻo kau ki he meʻa ni, pea naʻe folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOku mou mamahi mo kimoutolu koā koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ‘eku lea na‘e fai̇́?
Kapau ko ia, ʻe fēfē ‘oka mou ka mamata ki he Foha ‘o e Tangatá ‘oku ʻalu hake ki he feitu‘u naʻá ne ʻi ai kimuʻa pea toki hokomai̇́?
Ko e Laumālié ʻokú ne ngaohi ke moʻui, ka ko e kakanó, ‘oku ‘ikai te ne lava ha me‘a. Ko e ngaahi lea kuo u fai kiate kimoutolú, ko e Laumālie ia pea mo e moʻui.
Ka ‘oku ‘i ai ha ni‘ihi ‘iate kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai tui kiate au.” He naʻe ʻafioʻi ʻe Si̇̄sū, talu pē mei he kamataʻangá, ‘a e faʻahinga ʻe ʻikai te nau tui kiate iá, pea mo ia te ne lavaki‘i iá.
Pea ne toki pehē ange: ‟Ko hono ‘uhinga ia naʻá ku talaatu ai, ‘e ‘ikai lava ʻe ha taha ke haʻu kiate au kae‘oua kuo tuku kiate ia ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́.”
Pea tokolahi ʻa e kau ako ‘a Si̇̄sū na‘a nau liʻaki ʻenau muimui kiate iá, ʻo ‘ikai te nau toe fononga holo mo ia.
Ko ia, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he toko hongofulu mā uá: ‟Fēfē kimoutolu? ‘Oku mou fie foki atu mo kimoutolu?”
Pea tali kiate ia ‘e Saimone Pita: ‟‘Eiki, ke mau toe ō kia hai? Ko e ngaahi lea ʻo e moʻui taʻengatá, ʻoku meiate koe pē ia.
Pea ʻoku mau tui kiate koe, he ʻoku mau ʻilo, ko koe ia, ʻa e Toko Taha Mā‘oni‘oni ʻa e ‘Otuá.”
Pea tali ʻe Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó: ‟ʻIkai ko au naʻá ku fili kimoutolu ko e toko hongofulu mā uá? Kaneongo ia, ko homou toko taha, ko e tēvolo!”
Ka ko ʻene lau ko iā, naʻe kau kia Siutasi, ʻa e foha ‘o Saimone ‘Isikālioté. He ko ia ia te ne lavaki‘i iá, ko e taha ʻo e toko hongofulu mā uá.

7.text: Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, naʻe fononga takai ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i Kāleli, ʻo ne fakamamaʻo mei Siutea, koeʻuhi̇̄ he naʻe feinga ai ʻa e kau Siú ke tāmateʻi ia.
Pea naʻe ofi ke fai ʻa e Kātoanga Nofo Falefakataimi ʻa e kau Siú,
Ko ia, na‘e talaange ‘e hono ngaahi tehiná kiate ia: ‟Kuo tonu ke ke mavahe mei heni ʻo fononga atu ki Siutea, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke mamata ʻa hoʻo kau akó ki he ngaahi ngāue fakaofo ʻokú ke fai̇́.
He ʻoku ʻikai ha taha te ne fai fakapulipuli ʻene ngāué pea ʻiloa ia ʻe he kakai̇́. Kapau ko e ngaahi ngāue ʻeni ʻokú ke fai̇́, pea fei mo ke fakahāaʻi koe ki māmani.”
He naʻá mo e ngaahi tehina ‘o Sīsuú, naʻe ʻikai ke nau tui kiate ia.
Ko ia, naʻe talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOku te‘eki ke hokosia hoku taimi̇́. Ka ko homou taimi̇́, ‘oku hoko ma‘u ai pē ia.
‘E ‘ikai faifai pea fehi‘a kiate kimoutolu ʻa e kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, ka ‘oku nau fehi‘a maʻu ai pē kiate au, koeʻuhi̇̄ ‘oku ou tala ma‘u pē kiate kinautolu, ʻoku kovi ʻenau ngaahi ngāué.
Mou ‘alu hake kimoutolu ki he kātoangá. ʻE ʻikai te u ʻalu hake leva ki he Kātoanga ko eni̇́, he kuo teʻeki ke kakato hoku taimi̇́.”
Pea ʻi heʻene folofolaʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, naʻá ne toe nofo atu pē ‘i Kāleli.
Ka ʻi he ʻalu hake leva ‘a hono ngaahi tehina ki he Kātoangá, na‘e ‘alu hake foki mo ia, ka na‘e ʻikai te ne ʻai ke ʻilo ia ‘e ha taha, kae fakapulipuli pē.
Kaneongo iá, ʻi he lolotonga ʻa e Kātoangá, naʻe kumi kiate ia ‘e he kau Siú mo nau faka‘eke‘eke holo: ‟Kofe‘ia ʻa e tangata ko iā?”
Pea naʻe fepōtalanoaʻaki ʻa e tokolahi ʻo e kakai̇́, ʻo kau kiate ia, ʻo pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi: ‟Ko e tangata lelei ia,” kae pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi: ‟Ko e tangata ia ‘okú ne takihala‘i ʻa e kakai̇́.”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ha taha te ne fai fakahāhā ʻene talanoa ʻo kau kiate iá, koe‘uhi̇̄ na‘a nau manavahē ki he kau Siú.
Pea ʻi he meimei vaeua ʻa e Kātoangá, naʻe ʻalu hake ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he Temipalé, ‘o kamata fai ai ʻene malanga.
Ko ia, naʻe ofo ʻaupito ai ʻa e kau Siú, ‘o nau pehē: ‟Naʻe anga fēfē hono maʻu ʻe he tangatá ni ha fuʻu poto pehē: ka naʻe ʻikai te ne ʻi ha akoʻanga?”
Ko ia, naʻe tali ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻo ne folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko ʻeku ngaahi akonaki̇́, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e maʻu meiate au, ka mei̇́ he Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
‘Ilonga ha taha te ne loto ke fai ʻa e finangalo ‘o e ‘Otuá, ‘e toki mahino kiate ia, pē ko e akonaki ‘oku ou fai̇́, ko e meʻa mei he ‘Otuá, pē ko ʻeku lea pē meiate au.

Ko ia ʻokú ne lea meiate ia pē, ʻokú ne kumi ki hono lāngilangi pē ʻoʻona. Ka ko ia, ʻokú ne kumi ki he lāngilangi ʻo e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ko e moʻoni̇́ ia, pea ʻoku ʻikai ha loi ʻiate ia.
‘Ikai na‘e foaki atu ‘e Mōsese ʻa e Laó kiate kimoutolu? Kaneongo iá, ‘oku ‘ikai ha taha ‘iate kimoutolu ‘e talangofua ki he Laó. Ko e hā ʻoku mou feinga ai ke tāmateʻi aú?”
Pea tali ‘e he kakai̇́: ‟‘Okú ke puke fakatēvolo? He ko hai ‘oku feinga ke tāmate‘i koé?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e ngāue mana pē ʻeni ‘e taha kuo u fai̇́, pea ʻoku mou ofo kotoa ai.

Ko hono ʻuhinga ʻeni naʻe foaki ai ʻe Mōsese kiate kimoutolu ʻa e kamú (neongo na‘e ‘ikai ko Mōsese tonu naʻá ne ʻoatu iā, ka ko ho‘omou ngaahi kui̇́) ka ʻoku a‘u pē ki he Sāpaté ‘a hoʻomou kamu ʻa e fānau tangatá.
Kapau leva ʻoku kamu ʻa e fānau tangatá ʻi he Sāpaté koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ʻoua naʻa maumauʻi ʻa e Lao ʻa Mōsesé, pea ko e hā ‘oku mou ‘ita ai ‘iate au he‘eku ngāue ke fakamoʻui ha tangata ʻi he Sāpaté?
ʻOua ʻe fai fakatu‘asino ho‘omou faifakamaaú, ka mou fai ke totonu hoʻomou faifakamaaú.”
Ko ia naʻe lea ai ha niʻihi, ko e faʻahinga mei Selusalema: ‟‘Ikai ko e tangata ʻeni ʻa ia ‘oku nau feinga ke tāmate‘i̇́?
Pea ko ʻeni ia ‘oku malanga holo heni, ka ʻoku ʻikai ke nau lea hake kiate ia. Kuo ʻilo koā ʻe he kau taki̇́, ʻoku mo‘oni pē, ko e Toko Tahá ni, ko e Mi̇̄saiá ia?
Ka ‘oku tau ʻilo ʻekitautolu ʻa e feituʻu ʻoku haʻu mei ai ʻa e tangatá ni, ka ʻoka hokomai ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá, ʻe ‘ikai ke ‘ilo ‘e ha taha, pē ko ʻene haʻu mei fē.”

Ko ia naʻe kalanga leʻolahi ʻa Si̇̄sū, lolotonga ʻene faiako ʻi he Temipalé, ʻo pehē: ‟‘Oku mou pehē koā, ‘oku mou ‘ilo‘i au pea mo e feituʻu kuo u haʻu mei ai̇́? Kuo ‘ikai te u haʻu aú, ko ho ku loto pē ʻoʻoku. Ka ko e mo‘oni̇́, ko e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ‘a ia ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻiloʻi ia ʻekimoutolu.
Ka ‘okú ou ʻilo ʻe au ʻa e Toko Taha ko iā, he ko aú, kuo u haʻu meiate ia, pea ko ia ia kuó ne fekau mai aú.”
Ko ia, naʻa nau feinga ke puke ia, ka na‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e ala hono nimá kiate ia, he kuo te‘eki ke hokosia hono taimi̇́.
Ka na‘e tui kiate ia ha tokolahi ʻo e fuʻu kakai̇́, pea nau pehē: ‟ʻOka hoko mai ʻa e Mi̇̄saiá, te ne toe fai koā ha ngaahi mana ʻo lahi ange, he ngaahi meʻa kuo fai ʻe he tangatá ni?”
Pea fanongo ʻa e kau Fālesi̇́ ‘i he fetūkuaki pehē ʻa e kakai̇́, ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku kau kiate iá, pea nau fekau atu ha kau Sētuata fale ke nau ō ‘o puke mai ia.
Ko ia, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku ou ʻiate kimoutolu pē ʻi ha kiʻi taimi siʻi, pea u foki leva au ki he Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
Te mou kumi kiate au, ka he‘ikai te mou toe ma‘u au, pea ko e feitu‘u ‘oku ou teu ‘alu ki ai̇́, ʻe ʻikai te mou lava ke ʻalu ki ai.”

Ko ia, naʻe fe‘ekenaki ʻe he kau Siú: ‟Ko ʻene teu ‘alu ki fē ʻa e tangatá ni, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai ai ke tau lava ke toe maʻu iá? Te ne ʻalu nai ki he feitu‘u ‘oku nofo movetevete holo ai hotau kakai̇́, ʻi he ngaahi puleʻangá? Te ne ‘alu koā ‘o faiako ki he kau Kalisi̇́?
Ko e hā ʻa e ‘uhinga ‘o ʻene pehē: ‛Te mou kumi kiate au ka he‘ikai te mou toe ma‘u au,’ mo ʻene pehē: ‛Ko e feituʻu te u ʻi ai̇́, he‘ikai te mou lava ke ‘alu ki ai̇́?’”
Pea ʻi he ʻaho faka‘osi ‘o e Kātoangá, ʻa e ʻaho molumalu tahá, naʻe tu‘u hake ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘o naʻe kaila le‘olahi: ‟Ka ai ha taha ‘oku fieinua, ke ne haʻu kiate au ʻo inu.
Ko ia ʻe tui falala kiate aú, hangē kuo hikitohi ʻi he Tohitapú, ʻE tafe maʻu ai pē mei heʻene moʻui̇́, ha matavai moʻui.”

Ka ko ʻene folofola ko eni̇́, naʻe kau ki he Laumālié, ‘a ē na‘e ‘amanaki ke toki maʻu ʻekinautolu kotoa pē ʻoku tui kiate ia. He na‘e te‘eki ai ke lilingi mai ʻa e Laumālié koeʻuhi̇̄ kuo teʻeki ke fakalāngilangi‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Ko ia, ʻi he fanongo ʻa e fuʻu kakai̇́ ki heʻene ngaahi lea ko eni̇́, naʻa nau pehē: ‟Tā ʻoku mo‘oni pē, ko e palōfitá ʻeni!”
Ka naʻe pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi: ‟Ko e Mi̇̄saiá ʻeni!”
‘Ikai ʻoku pehē ʻe he Tohitapú, ʻE haʻu ʻa e Mi̇̄saia mei he hako ʻo Tēvitá, pea mei Pētelihema, ʻa e kolo na‘e tupu ai ‘a Tēvitá.”
Ko ia, naʻe hoko ha fakafaʻafaʻahi ʻi he kakai̇́, ko e meʻa ‘ia Si̇̄sū.
He na‘e loto ʻa e ni‘ihi ke fei mo nau puke ia, ka na‘e ‘ikai fie ala ha taha ke puke ia.
Ko ia, naʻe foki atu ʻa e kau Sētuata falé ki he kau taulaʻeiki̇́ mo e kau Fālesi̇́, pea naʻa nau pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e hā na‘e ‘ikai ai ke mou taki mai iá?”
Pea tali ʻe kau sētuatá: ‟Kuo te‘eki te mau ʻilo ha taha ‘oku lea ʻo hangē ko e tangata ko iā.”
Pea tali ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́ kiate kinautolu: ‟Kuo takihēeʻi koā mo kimoutolu foki?”
‟Kuo ai koā ha fo‘i toko taha he kau taki̇́ pē ko e kau Fālesi̇́ kuo tui kiate ia?
‘Ikai ʻaupito! Ka ko e fuʻu kakai pē ko ena ʻoku nau taʻeʻilo ki he Laó, ʻa ia ʻoku nau malaʻiá.”
Pea lea ʻa Nikotimasi kiate kinautolu, ʻa e toko taha na‘e ‘alu atu kia Sīsuú, he taimi ki muʻá, ʻa ia ko e taha ia ʻokinautolu;
‟ʻIkai ‘oku tapu heʻetau Laó, ke fakamāau‘i ha taha, ‘okapau kuo te‘eki ke tomuʻa ʻange hano faingamālie ke fai ha‘ane fakamatala, ke tau ʻilo ai ʻene me‘a na‘e fai̇́?”
Pea nau tali ʻo pehē kiate ia: ‟Ko e Kāleli koā mo koe foki? Fekumi muʻa ke ke ‘ilo, ‘oku ‘ikai ha palōfita ‘e tupu mei Kāleli.”

8.text: Pea naʻe foki e tokotaha kotoa ki honau ngaahi ʻapi ka ko Si̇̄suú naʻe ʻalu ia ki he moʻunga ʻOlivé.
ʻI he hengihengi hokó, naʻá ne foki atu ki he temipalé. Ko e kotoa e kakai naʻa nau nofo takai ʻiate ia pea ne toe tangutu hifo ai mo kamata ke ne faiako.
Naʻe haʻu ʻa e kau faiako laó pe mo e fālesi̇́ ʻo ʻomai ha fefine naʻe maʻu ʻokú ne fai feʻauaki, pea nau ʻai ke tuʻu ʻa e fefine ʻi muʻa ʻiate kinautolu.
