‟Faiako,” ko ʻenau lea ia kia Si̇̄suú: ‟ko e fefine ko ēni̇́ naʻe maʻu ia ʻokú ne fakahoko ʻa e feʻauaki.
Ko e Lao ʻa Mōsese ʻoku hā mahino ai koe faʻahinga fefine peheé ko hono tuhá ke tolomakaʻi ki he maté. He taimi ni, koehā hoʻo lau'?”
Na'ā nau fai ʻeni ke nau maʻu ai ʻa Si̇̄sū, ke nau lava ai ʻo tukuakiʻi ia. Ka naʻá ne punou ia ʻo ne tohitohi he kelekele ʻaki hono tuhú.

ʻI he ʻenau kei tuʻu ai mo ʻeke fehuʻi̇́, naʻá ne tuʻu hangatonu hake mo ʻeke kiate kinautolu: ‟kohai pe ia ha taha ʻiate kimoutolu ʻoku ʻikai ke ʻi ai haʻa ne angahala. ʻe ngfua ke ke toʻo ʻa e ʻuluaki foʻi maká ʻo tolongi ia.”
Pea ne punou hifo ʻo toe tohitohi pe he kelekelé.
ʻI heʻenau fanongo ki heni̇́, naʻa nau kamata ke nau puli atu tahataha pe, ʻo kamata mei kau matuʻotuʻá. Pea naʻe toe pe ʻa Si̇̄sū moe fefine ʻo nau tuʻu pe ai.
Naʻá ne tuʻu fakahangatonu hake mo ne lea ki he fefiné: ʻoku ʻikai ha taha ia ke ne tukuakiʻi koe?
‟ʻIkai ha taha, tangata” ko ʻene tali ia.

Ko ia, naʻe toe folofola ai ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kau Fālesi̇́ ʻo pehē: ‟Ko aú pē ko e māama‘anga ‘o māmani. Ka ai ha taha te ne muimui kiate aú, ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito te ne toe fononga he poʻuli̇́, ka te ne maʻu ʻa e maama ‘o e mo‘ui̇́.”
Pea pehēange ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́ kiate ia: ‟‘Okú ke fakamoʻoni pē koe ʻo kau kiate koe, ʻoku ʻikai hano moʻoni ʻo hoʻo fakamoʻoni̇́.”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟Neongo ‘oku ou fakamoʻoni pē au ʻo kau kiate au, ka ‘oku mo‘oni ‘eku fakamoʻoni̇́, he ‘oku ou ‘ilo ʻa e feitu‘u naʻá ku ha‘u mei ai̇́, mo e feitu‘u ‘oku ou ‘alu atu ki ai̇́. Ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ‘ekimoutolu ʻa e feitu‘u naʻá ku ha‘u mei ai̇́, mo e feitu‘u ‘oku ou ‘alu atu ki ai̇́.
Ko ho‘omou faifakamaaú, ʻoku fakatatau pē ia ki he meʻa fakakakanó, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te u fakamaau‘i ‘e au ha taha.
Pea kapau te u fakamaau‘i ha taha, ko ‘eku fakamaaú ʻoku totonu, koe‘uhi̇̄ he ‘oku ‘ikai ko au toko taha pē ia, ka ko au ia mo e Tamai̇́, ‘a ia naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
Kuo hikitohi foki ʻi hoʻomou Laó, ‘o ka fakamoʻoni ha ongo tangata ʻe toko ua, pea lau ʻoku falalaʻanga ia.
Ko au ʻa e Toko Taha ʻoku fakamo‘oni ʻo kau kiate aú, pea ko ʻeku fakamoʻoni ʻe tahá, ko e Tamai̇́, ʻa ia naʻá ne fekau mai aú.”
Pea nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Pea ko e fē‘ia ho‘o tamai̇́?”

Ko e ngaahi meʻa ko eni̇́, naʻá ne folofolaʻaki, lolotonga haʻane faiako ‘i he Temipalé, ʻi he feitu‘u na‘e tānaki ki ai ʻa e paʻangá. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ha taha ‘e fie ala ki ai, he kuo te‘eki ke hokosia hono taimi̇́.

Ko ia, naʻe toe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko aú, te u ‘alu, pea te mou kumi kiate au, ka te mou mate pē ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi angahalá. Ko e feituʻu ʻoku ou ʻalu ki ai̇́, ʻe ʻikai te mou lava ke ʻalu ki ai.”
Pea pehē ʻe he kau Siú: ‟Te ne tāmate‘i nai pē ‘e ia, ʻa ia? Na‘a ko e ‘uhinga koā ia ‘o ʻene pehē: Ko e feitu‘u ‘okú ou teu ‘alu ki ai̇́ ʻe ʻikai te mou lava ke ʻalu ki ai?”

Pea naʻe folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko kimoutolú, ko hoʻomou haʻu pē mei lalo ni, ka ko aú, ko ʻeku haʻu ʻaʻaku mei ‘olunga. Ko kimoutolú, ko e faʻahinga ʻo e maama ko eni̇́. Ka ko aú, naʻe ʻikai te u haʻu mei he maama ko eni̇́.
Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ʻeku talaatu, te mou mate pē ho‘omou ngaahi angahalá, he kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou tui ko au ia, te mou mate pē ho‘omou ngaahi angahalá.”
Ko ia, naʻa nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟He ko hai koā koe?”

‘Oku kei toe lahi mo e ngaahi me‘a ke u lea ki ai, ko hono fakamāau‘i kimoutolú. Ka ko e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ko e moʻoni̇́ ia, pea ko e ngaahi me‘a pē kuo u maʻu meiate iá, ko ia pē ‘oku ou leaʻaki ki māmani̇́.”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke mahino ki ha taha, ko ʻene lea kiate kinautolú, ʻoku kau ki he Tamai̇́.

Ko ia naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e taimi te mou hiki hake ai ki ‘olunga ‘a e Foha ʻo e Tangatá, pea te mou toki ʻilo ai ko au ia, he ʻoku ‘ikai te u fai pē ‘iate au ha me‘a ʻe taha, ka ko e ngaahi me‘a pē kuo ako‘i mai ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́, ko e ngaahi meʻa pē ia ʻoku ou leaʻaki̇́.
Pea ko e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú, ʻokú ne ʻiate au maʻu pē. Heʻikai te ne liʻaki tokotaha au, he ʻoku ou fai maʻu ai pē ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻoku fakahōifua kiate ia.”
Pea ʻi heʻene folofolaʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, naʻe tui ha fuʻu tokolahi kiate ia.
Ko ia, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kau Siu na‘e tui kiate iá: ‟Kapau te mou pukemaʻu ki heʻeku ngaahi akonaki̇́, te mou hoko mo‘oni ai ko e kau ako ʻaʻaku.
He te mou toki ʻilo ai ʻa e mo‘oní, pea ‘e fakatau‘atāina‘i kimoutolu ‘e he mo‘oni̇́.”
Pea nau tali kiate ia: ‟Ko e hako kimautolu ia ‘o ‘Ēpalahame, pea kuo te‘eki ai ke mau pōpula ki ha taha, ʻi ha taimi. Ko e hā hoʻo ‘uhinga, ʻi ho‘o pehē: ‘E toki fakatau‘atāina‘i kimoutolú?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolú: ‟Ko e mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ko ia kotoa pē ‘oku fai angahalá, ko e pōpula ia ‘a Angahala.
Pea ‘oku ‘ikai ha pōpula te ne kau ai pē ki he fāmili̇́ ʻo taʻengata. Ko e fohá pē ʻokú ne kau maʻu ai pē ki ai ‘o ta‘engatá.
Ko ia, kapau ʻe toki fakatau‘atāina‘i kimoutolu ‘e he Fohá, ko ho‘omou toki tau‘atāina mo‘oni̇́ ia.
‘Oku ou ʻiloʻi pē ko e hako kimoutolu ‘o ‘Ēpalahame. Ka ‘oku mou feinga ʻeni ke tāmate‘i au, he ‘oku ‘ikai ke mou loto ke tali ‘eku akonaki̇́.
Ko e ngaahi me‘a kuó u mamata ai ʻi heʻeku Tamai̇́, ʻoku ou leaʻaki ia kiate kimoutolu. Ka kimoutolú, ʻoku mou fai pē ʻa e ngaahi me‘a kuo mou maʻu mei ho‘omou tamai̇́.”
Pea nau tali kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟Ko ‘Ēpalahame, ʻemau tamai̇́.”
Ko e lolotongá ni, ʻoku mou feinga ke tāmateʻi ha tangata, ʻa ia ʻokú ne talaatu kiate kimoutolu ʻa e mo‘oni kuó ne fanongo ai mei he ‘Otuá. Naʻe ‘ikai ke fai ‘e ‘Ēpalahame ha me‘a pehē.
ʻOku mou fai pē ʻe kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi ngāue ‘oku fai ‘e ho‘omou tamai̇́.” Pea nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟‘Oku ʻikai ko ha fānau tu‘utāmaki kimautolu. ‘Oku taha pē ‘emau Tamai̇́, ko e ‘Otuá pē.”

Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ka ne ko e ‘Otuá hoʻomou tamai̇́, pehē ne mou mei ‘ofa kiate au. He kuo u ha‘u mei he ‘Otuá, pea ‘oku ou ‘i heni. Na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u ‘iate au pē, ka ko ia ia naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
Ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai ke mahino kiate kimoutolu ʻa e meʻa ʻoku ou leaʻaki̇́? Ko hono ʻuhingá pē, he ʻoku ʻikai te mou lava ke tali ʻeku akonaki̇́.

Ko ho‘omou tamai̇́ ʻamoutolu, ko e tēvoló, pea ʻoku mou moʻuiʻaki pē, ʻa e fai ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku loto hoʻomou tamai̇́, ke fai̇́. Ko e toko taha tāmate ia, talu pē mei he kamataʻangá, pea ʻoku ʻikai te ne tuʻu ʻi he moʻoni̇́, he ʻoku ʻikai ha moʻoni ʻiate ia, Ka ne ka lea loi, ʻokú ne leaʻaki pē ʻene meʻa ʻaʻaná, he ko e loi ia, pea ko e tamai ia ‘amoutolú.
Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ʻoku ou leaʻaki ʻe au ʻa e moʻoní, ko ia, ʻoku ʻikai ai te mou tui mai kiate au.
Ko hai ‘iate kimoutolu te ne lava ke fakamoʻoni ʻo kau ki ha angahala kuo u fai? Kapau ‘oku ou leaʻaki ʻa e moʻoni̇́, pea ko e hā leva ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui mai ai kiate aú?
Ko ia ‘okú ne ʻi he ʻOtuá, ‘okú ne talangofua ki he ngaahi folofola ʻa e ʻOtuá. Ko hono ʻuhinga ia ‘oku ‘ikai te mou talangofua ai̇́, he ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻi he ʻOtuá ʻakimoutolu.”
Pea tali ‘e he kau Siú ʻo nau pehē kiate ia: ‟Tā na‘e moʻoni pē ‘emau pehē: ko e Samēlia koe, pea ʻokú ke puke fakatēvolo.”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai te u puke fakatēvolo, he ʻoku ou fakalāngilangi‘i ‘e au ‘eku Tamai̇́, ka ʻoku mou fakangalivaleʻi ʻe kimoutolu au.
Pea ʻoku ‘ikai te u kumi ki ha ku lāngilangi. Ka ‘oku ‘i ai ʻa e toko taha ‘okú naʻe finangalo ke u lāngilangiʻia, pea ko ia ia ʻa e fakamāaú.
Ko e moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ka ai ha taha te ne tauhi ʻeku akonaki̇́, ‘e ‘ikai ʻaupito te ne mate ‘o ta‘engata.”

Ko ia, naʻe lea kiate ia ʻa e kau Siú: ‟Ko ʻeni kuo mau ʻilo ʻokú ke puke fakatēvolo. Kuo pekia ʻa ‘Ēpalahame, pea pekia foki mo e kau palōfitá, ka ko ʻeni ʻokú ke talamai ‘e koe, ʻo ka tauhi ʻe ha taha ʻeku akonaki̇́, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito te ne aʻusia ʻa e maté, ʻo taʻengata.
Ko e lahi koā koe ‘i heʻetau kui ko ‘Ēpalahamé, he kuo pekia ia, pea pekia foki mo e kau palōfitá. Ko hai koe, ʻi he anga hoʻo laú?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Kapau ko ‘eku fakalāngilangi‘i pē ‘e au ʻa au, tā ko e koto maumau taimi pē hoku lāngilangi̇́. Ka ko ‘eku Tamai̇́ ʻokú ne fakalāngilangiʻi aú, ʻa ia ko ē ‘oku mou pehē: ko homou ‘Otuá ia.

Ka ʻoku ʻikai te mou ʻiloʻi ia, ka ʻoku ou ʻilo ʻe au kiate ia, he kapau te u pehē atu ‘oku ‘ikai te u ʻiloʻi ia, te u faitatau ai mo kimoutolu, ʻo loi. Ka ‘oku ou ʻiloʻi ʻe au ia, pea ʻoku ou tauhi ʻene folofolá.
Na‘e fiefia lahi ʻa e loto ‘o ho‘omou kui ko ‘Ēpalahamé, ʻi heʻene mamata mai ki hoku taimi̇́. ʻIo, naʻá ne mamata mai ki ai ʻo ne fiefia.”
Ko ia, naʻe talaange ʻe he kau Siú kiate ia: ‟Kuo te‘eki ke ke ta‘u nimangofulu, ka kuó ke mamata koā koe kia ‘Ēpalahame?”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku tala kiate kimoutolú, na‘e te‘eki ke fanau‘i ‘a ‘Ēpalahamé, kuo u ‘osi ‘i ai au.”
Ko ia, naʻe tufi maka leva ʻa e kakai̇́ ke tolongi ʻaki ia. Ka na‘e toitoi pē ʻa Si̇̄sū, ʻo ne toki moulu atu ʻo ʻalu mei he Temipalé.

9.text: Pea ʻi he fai atu ʻene fonongá, naʻá ne mamata ki ha tangata na‘e fanau‘i mai pē ‘oku kui.
Pea ʻeke ange ‘e heʻene kau akó kiate ia: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ko e angahala ʻa hai na‘e fanau‘i mai ai ʻa e tangatá ni ‘oku kui̇́? ʻA‘ana pē, pē ko ʻene ongo mātuʻá?”
Pea tali ‘e Sīsū: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ko ha angahala ʻa e toko tahá ni, pē ko ʻene ongo mātuá, ka koe‘uhi̇̄ ke fakahāaʻi ‘iate ia ʻa e ngaahi ngāue ʻa e ‘Otuá.
Kuo pau ke tau fai ʻa e ngaahi ngāue ʻa e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú lolotonga ʻoku kei ʻahó, he ʻoku haʻu ʻa e poʻuli̇́, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai toe lava ai ha taha ke fai ha ngāue.
Lolotonga ʻoku ou kei ‘i māmani̇́, ko e māama au ‘o māmani.”
Pea hili ʻene ngaahi lea ko iā, naʻá ne ‘a‘anu ki he kelekelé, ʻo ne ngaohiʻaki ha meʻi pelepela ʻa hono fāvai̇́, pea naʻe vali ʻaki ʻa e mata ʻo e tangata kui̇́.

Pea naʻe toki folofola kiate ia: ‟‘Alu ‘o fufulu ʻa e pelepelá mei ho matá, ʻi he Vai ko Sailoamé” (ʻa ia ko hono ‘uhingá, ko e ‟Fekau atu.”) Ko ia, naʻá ne ‘alu atu ‘o fufulu ʻa e pelepelá, pea naʻe foki mai, kuo ‘ā hono matá.
Pea ko hono kaungā‘api̇́ mo e kakai na‘a nau ‘ilo ʻene mo‘ui kolekole ki muʻá, naʻa nau pehē: ‟‘Ikai koā ko e tangata ʻeni na‘e faʻa kolekolé?”
Pea pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi: ‟Ko ia pē.” Kae pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ko ia. Ka ‘oku mata tatau mo e tangata ko iā.”
Pea nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Ka na‘e anga fēfē leva ho‘o lava ‘o sió?”

Pea tali ‘e he tangatá: ‟Ko e tangata ʻoku ui ko Si̇̄sū, naʻá ne ngaohi ha me‘i pelepela ‘o vali ‘aki hoku matá, pea naʻe talamai kiate au, ʻAlu ki he Vai ko Sailoamé ‘o fufulu ai ʻa e pelepelá. Peá u ‘alu ‘o fufulu hoku matá, pea u ‘ā.”
Pea nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Pea ko fē ʻa e tangata ko iā?”
Pea nau taki atu ʻa e tangata naʻe kui̇́, ʻo ʻave ki he kau Fālesi̇́.
He tā ko e Sāpate ia ʻa ia naʻe ngaohi ai ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻa e pelepela ʻo ne fakaʻāʻaki ʻa hono matá.

Ko ia, naʻe toe ‘eke ange ‘e he kau Fālesí kiate ia, pē na‘e anga fēfē ʻene toe lava ‘o sió. Pea pehē ange kiate kinautolu: ‟Na‘a ne ʻai ha me‘i pelepela ‘o vali ʻaki hoku matá, pea u fufulu ia, pea ko ʻeni kuo u ʻā.”
Ko ia, naʻe pehē ‘e ha niʻihi ʻo e kau Fālesi̇́: ‟Tā ko e tangata ko ʻeni̇́ ʻoku ‘ikai ko ʻene hokomai mei he ʻOtuá, he ‘oku ʻikai te ne tauhi ʻa e tapu ʻo e Sāpaté.”
Ko ia, naʻa nau toe pehēange ki he tangata kui̇́: ‟Ko e hā ho‘o lau ‘aʻau ki he tangata naʻá ne faka‘ā ho matá?” Pea pehēange ‘e ia: ‟Ko e palōfita ia!”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai pē ke tui ʻa e kau Siú, ki he lau, ko e tangata ia na‘e kui kimuʻá, ka kuo ʻā. Ko ia naʻa nau ui mai ʻene ongo matuʻá.
Pea nau ‘eke ange kiate kinaua: ‟Ko ho‘omo tama koā eni, ʻa ia ʻoku mo pehē: na‘e fanau‘i mai ‘oku kui̇́? Na‘e anga fēfē leva ʻa e ‘ā hono matá?”
Pea tali ‘e he ongo mātu‘a ʻa e tangatá, ʻo na pehē: ‟‘Okú ma ʻilopau, ko ‘ema tamá eni. Pea ‘okú ma ‘ilopau na‘e fanau‘i mai ia ‘oku kui.

Ka ko e me‘a ki he ‘ā ko ʻeni hono matá, pea mo hai naʻá ne fakaʻā hono matá, ‘oku ‘ikai ʻaupito te ma ‘ilo ‘ekimaua ki ai. Mou ‘eke ange pē ki ai, he ʻokú ne matuʻotuʻa feʻunga pē ke ne fai haʻane tali.”

Naʻe tali pehē ʻa e ongo mātu‘a ʻa e tangatá, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ‘ena ilifia ki he kau Siú, he kuo ʻosi tuʻutuʻuni ʻe he kau Siú, ka ai ha taha te ne fakamoʻoni ko Si̇̄suú ko e Kalaisi̇́ ia, pea ʻe tuli ia mei falelotu.
Pea ko e ʻuhinga ia ʻa e pehē ʻe heʻene ongo mātuʻá: ‟ʻOkú naʻe matuʻotuʻa feʻunga pē ke mou ʻeke kiate ia.”
Ko ia, naʻa nau toe ui mai ʻa e tangata naʻe kui̇́, ko hono tuʻo uá ia, pea nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Tuku kolōlia ki he ʻOtua! He ‘oku mau ‘ilopau ko e tangatá ni ko e angahala.”
Ko ia, naʻe tali ‘e he tangatá: ‟Kapau ko ha tangata angahala ia, ʻoku ʻikai te u ʻilo ki ai. Ko e me‘a pē ‘oku ou ‘iló, naʻá ku kui, ka kuo u ‘ā.”
Ko ia, naʻa nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟Ko e hā e me‘a naʻá ne fai kiate koé? Na‘e anga fēfē ʻene fakaʻā ho matá?”

Pea naʻe tali kiate kinautolu: ‟Kuó u ‘osi talaatu kiate kimoutolu, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou fie fanongo ki ai. Ko e hā ‘oku mou holi ai ke u toe fakamatala atú? Kuo mou fie hoko mo kimoutolu foki ko ʻene kau ako?”
Pea nau toki leakovi kiate ia, ‘o nau pehēange: ‟Ko koe pē ‘okú ke kau heʻene kau akó. Ko e kau ako kimautolu ia ‘a Mōsese!
‘Oku mau ʻilopau naʻe folofola ʻa e ‘Otuá kia Mōsese, ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ‘kimautolu pē ko e tangata ena mei fē.”
Pea tali ʻe he tangatá, ʻo ne pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e toki me‘a faikehe ia. ‘Oku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo pē ko e tangata ia mei fē, ka naʻá ne fakaʻā ʻe ia hoku matá.
‘Oku tau ‘ilo kotoa pē ‘oku ‘ikai ke fanongo ʻa e ‘Otuá ki ha angahala, ka ʻoka lotu ʻa e faʻahinga ‘oku ‘apasia kiate ia mo fai hono finangaló, ʻokú ne fanongo ki ai̇.
Talu ʻa e tupu ‘a māmani, mo e te‘eki ke tau fanongo kuo fakaʻā ha taha na‘e fanau‘i mai ‘oku kui.
Kapau na‘e ‘ikai ko e tangata ʻeni mei he ‘Otuá, ‘e ‘ikai te ne lava ke fai ha me‘a ‘e taha.”
Pea nau tali kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟Naʻe fanauʻi pē koe, ko e angahala. ʻOku anga fēfē ai hoʻo ʻai ke faiakonaki mai kiate kimautolu.” Pea nau tuli ia kituʻa mei he falelotú.
Pea fanongo ‘a Si̇̄sū kuo nau tuli ia kituʻá, pea naʻe maʻu ʻa e tangatá, ʻo ne pehēange kiate ia: ‟‘Okú ke tui ki he Foha ʻo e Tangatá?”
Pea tali ʻe he tangatá ʻo ne pehē: ‟He ko hai ia, ʻEiki, koeʻuhi̇̄ ka u tui leva ki ai.”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Kuó ke ‘osi mamata ki ai, he ko ia ia ‘okú ke lolotonga talanoa mo iá.”
Pea lea ai ʻa e tangatá: ‟‘Eiki, ‘oku ou tui atu,” pea naʻe tūʻulutui ʻo lotu kiate ia.
Pea folofola ‘a Sīsū: ‟Ko e fai fakamaaú, naʻe ʻuhinga ai ʻeku hokomai ʻaʻaku ki he maama ko eni̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ʻā ʻa e mata ʻo e kui̇́, kae hoko ‘o kui ʻa e kakai ‘oku ʻā.”
Naʻe fanongo ai ha niʻihi ʻo e kau Fālesi̇́, pea nau pehēange kiate ia: ‟ʻA ia, ʻoku mau kui mo kimautolu foki?”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟Kapau na‘a mou kui, naʻe ʻikai haʻamou angahala; ka ko ʻeni ‘oku mou lau ‘oku mou lava ‘o sio, pea tā ‘oku nofomaʻu pē hoʻomou angahalá.”

10.text: ‟Ko e moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolú, ko ia ʻe ʻikai ke hū ki he lotoʻā sipi̇́ ʻi he matapaá kae kaka mai ia mei ha feituʻu kehé, ko e toko taha ko iā, ko e kaihaʻa mo kākā.
Ko ia ʻoku hū he matapā ‘o e loto‘ā sipi̇́, ko e tauhi ia ʻo e fanga sipi̇́.

‘Oku fakaava ʻe he leʻo matapaá ki he toko taha ko iā, pea ʻoku fakaongo ʻa e fanga sipi̇́ ki hono leʻó. ‘Okú naʻe ui mai ʻene fanga sipi̇ ʻaʻaná ʻaki honau taki taha hingoa, pea naʻe toki tataki atu kinautolu ki tuʻaʻā.
Ka ‘osi leva ʻene fakahū kotoa atu kinautolu ki tuʻá, ʻokú ne mu‘omu‘a atu ‘iate kinautolu ka nau muimui atu, he ʻoku nau ‘ilo hono le‘ó.
Ka ʻe ‘ikai te nau muimui ki ha taha kehe, ka te nau hola meiate ia, he ‘oku ‘ikai te nau maheni mo hono leʻó.”
Naʻe fai ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻa e tala fakatātā ko ʻeni̇́ kiate kinautolu, ka na‘e ‘ikai ke mahino kiate kinautolu ʻa e meʻa naʻá ne tala kiate kinautolú.
Ko ia, naʻá ne toe folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, Ko au ʻa e matapā ‘oku hū ai ʻa e fanga sipi̇́ ki he loto‘ā sipi̇́.
Ko kinautolu kotoa pē na‘e muʻomu‘a mai ‘iate aú, ko e kau kaiha‘a kinautolu mo e kau kākā, pea na‘e ‘ikai ke fakaongo ʻa e fanga sipi̇́ ki honau le‘ó.
Ko au ko e matapā, ka ai ha taha ʻe hū atu ʻiate au, ʻe fakamo‘ui ʻa e toko taha ko iā, pea te ne hū atu, mo hū mai ʻo kaikai ʻi ha ngaahi feitu‘u laumaʻuiʻui.
Ko e kaihaʻá, ʻoku haʻu pē ia ke kaiha‘a, mo tāmate, mo faka‘auha. Ka naʻá ku ha‘u aú ke mou ma‘u ʻa e mo‘ui̇́, pea mou maʻu ia ‘o lahi ʻaupito.
Ko au ko e tauhisipi lelei̇́. Pea ko e tauhisipi̇ lelei̇́, ʻokú ne tuku ʻene moʻui̇́ ke mole ko e fetongi ʻo e fanga sipi̇́.

Kapau ko ha tauhisipi ngāue totongi, ‘oku ‘ikai hangē ia ko e tauhisipi ʻoku ʻaʻana tonu ʻa e fanga sipi̇́. He ka sio atu ia ‘oku ha‘u ha ulofi, ʻe hola leva ia kae li̇̄ ʻaki ʻa e fanga sipi̇́. Pea ʻoku ‘ohofi ʻa e fanga sipi̇́ ʻe he ulofi̇́ ‘o naʻe veteveteki.
ʻOku hola ʻa e tauhisipi ngāue totongi̇́, he ‘oku ‘ikai ke ne ongoʻi ʻe ia ʻa e fanga sipi̇́.
Ko au ʻa e tauhisipi lelei̇́, he ʻoku ou ʻilo ʻe aʻu ‘eku fanga sipi̇́, pea ‘oku ʻilo foki au ʻe he‘eku fanga sipi̇́.
Hangē tofu pē ʻoku ʻilo au ʻe he Tamai̇́ pea mo ʻeku ʻilo ʻe au ʻa e Tamai̇́, pehē foki ʻeku tuku ʻeku moʻui̇́ ke mole ko e fetongi ʻo e fanga sipi̇́.

Pea ʻoku ‘i ai mo ‘eku fanga sipi kehe, kuo te‘eki ke fakahū mai ki he loto‘ā ko eni̇́. Pea kuo pau ke u fakahū mai mo kinautolu foki, he te nau fakaongo mo kinautolu ki hoku le‘ó, pea ‘e taha pē ʻa e tākanga sipi̇́, pea taha pē mo e tauhisipi̇́.
Ko e ʻuhinga ia ʻa e ‘ofa ʻa e Tamai̇́ kiate aú koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ‘eku fie tuku ‘eku mo‘ui̇́ ke mole ka u toe ma‘u mai ia.

‘Oku ‘ikai ke toʻo ia ‘e ha taha meiate au, ka ko hoku loto pē ke u foaki ‘eku mo‘ui̇́. ‘Oku ou maʻu pē ʻa e mafai ke foaki ‘eku mo‘ui̇́, pea u toe ma‘u pē mo e mafai ke fakafoki mai ia. Ko e fatongia ia kuo tuku mai ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́ kiate au.”
Pea toe hoko ha fakafaʻafaʻahi ʻi he kau Siú koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e ngaahi lea ko ʻeni ‘a Sīsuú.
He na‘e pehē ‘e hanau tokolahi: ‟ʻOkú naʻe puke fakatēvolo, pea ‘oku hē hono ʻatamai̇́. ‘Oua ‘e fai ha tui ki ai.”
Kae pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi: ‟He ‘e lava fēfē ke lea pehē ha taha kuo puke fakatēvolo? ‘E lava koā ‘e ha taha pehē ke fakaʻā ʻa e mata ʻo ha taha kui?”
Pea naʻe hokosia ʻa e Kātoanga Fakamanatu ‘o hono Huufifoʻou ʻo e Temipalé ʻi Selusalema. Pea ko e faʻahitaʻu momokó ia.
Pea fou atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ʻi he ʻaho ‘e taha he feituʻu ʻo e Temipalé na‘e ui ko e Fakafaletolo ‘o Solomoné;
Ko ia, naʻe fakatahataha mai ha kau Siu kiate ia, ʻo nau ‘eke ange: ‟Talamai angé ke mahinó pē ko e Mi̇̄saiá koe pē ‘ikai. Me‘a ni̇́ te ke tuku ai pē ke mau veiveiua?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Naʻá ku ‘osi talaatu pē kiate kimoutolu, ka ʻoku ‘ikai te mou fie tui kiate au. Ko e ngaahi ngāue ‘oku ou fai ʻi he huafa ʻo ʻeku Tamai̇́, ko ia ia ʻoku fakamo‘oni kiate aú.
Ka ‘oku ‘ikai te mou tui mai kiate aú koeʻuhi̇̄ ‘oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku fanga sipi kimoutolu.
Ko ‘eku fanga sipi̇́, ‘oku nau fanongo ki hoku le‘ó, pea ʻoku ou ‘ilo ‘e au kinautolu, he ʻoku nau muimui kiate au.
Pea ʻoku ou ‘oange ma‘anautolu ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá pea ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito te nau ʻauha ‘o ta‘engata, he ʻe ‘ikai lava ‘e ha taha ‘o hamusi kinautolu meiate au.
Ko ‘eku Tamai̇́, ʻa ia naʻá ne foaki kotoa mai kinautolu kiate aú, ‘oku mafai lahi ange ia ‘i ha toe taha. Ko ia, ʻe ‘ikai lava ʻe ha taha ke hamusi kinautolu mei he nima ʻo e Tamai̇́.
Ko e Tamai̇́ mo au, ‘okú ma taha pē.”
Pea toe tufi maka mai ʻa e kakai̇́ ke tolongi ‘aki ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Kuo u fakahāaʻi kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi ngāue lelei mei he Tamai̇́. Ko e hā ʻa e meʻa ‘oku ‘ai ai ke mou tolongi aú?”

Pea tali kiate ia ʻe he kau Siú: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘emau teu tolongi koé ko ha lelei naʻá ke fai. Ko ‘emau teu tolongi koé koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ho‘o lea fieʻotuá. He ko e tangata pē koe, ka kuó ke lau ko e ‘Otuá koe.”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Ikai kuo tohi he Tohitapú, ʻOkú ou lau ko e ngaahi ‘otua kimoutolu?
Kapau ‘oku ui ‘e he ‘Otuá ʻa e kakai naʻá ne tuku ki ai ʻa e folofolá, ko e ngaahi ‘otua, pea ʻoku ʻikai lava ʻe ha taha ke fakahalaʻi ʻa e Tohitapú.
Fēfē leva ai ʻa e toko taha naʻe fakatāpui ʻe he Tamai̇́ pea naʻe toki fekau mai ki māmani̇́? Ko e hā ʻoku mou tukuakiʻi ai au, ʻoku ou leafieʻotuá, heʻeku pehē: Ko e ʻAlo au ʻo e ʻOtuá?
Kapau ʻoku ‘ikai ko e ngāue ia ‘a ʻeku Tamai̇́ ʻoku ou fai̇́, pea ‘oua te mou tui mai kiate au.

Ka ʻokapau ʻoku ou fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa pē ko iā, neongo ʻoku ʻikai te mou tui mai kiate au, pea mou tui pē ā ki he ngaahi meʻa ʻoku ou fai̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ te mou toki ‘ilo ai ‘oku nofoʻia au ʻe he Tamai̇́, pea ʻoku ou nofomaʻu ʻi he Tamai̇́.”
Pea toe feinga ʻa e kakai ke ala fakamālohi kiate ia, ka naʻe ʻikai te nau lava ʻo puke ia.
Pea toe ‘alu ia ki he kauvai ‘o e Vaitafe ko Soatani̇́, ki he feitu‘u na‘e fai papitaiso ai ‘a Sione kimu‘a atú, ʻo ne nofo ai.
Pea holo mai ha fuʻu kakai tokolahi kiate ia, ʻo nau pehē: ‟Neongo na‘e ‘ikai ke fai ʻe Sione ha mana fakaofo, ka ko ʻene fakamatala kotoa pē ‘o kau ki he tangatá ni, ʻoku mo‘oni.”
Pea na‘e tui ai kia Si̇̄sū ha tokolahi he kakai ʻo e feituʻu ko iā.

11.text: Pea naʻe ‘i ai ha tangata ko Lāsalosi he kolo ko Pētani̇́, ʻa e kolo na‘e nofo ai ʻa Mele mo hono tokouá, ko Māʻata
Ko Mele ko iā, ʻa ē naʻe puke hono tuongaʻane ko Lāsalosi̇́, ko ia naʻá ne tākai lolo ʻa e ‘Eiki̇́ mo holo ʻaki hono lou‘ulú ‘a hono va‘é.
Ko ia naʻe fekau atu ʻe he ongo tuofāfiné kia Si̇̄sū, ʻo na pehē kiate ia: ‟‘Eiki, ko eni, ko ho kaumeʻá, ‘a Lāsalosi, ‘oku siʻi puke.”

Pea ʻi he fanongo ki ai Sīsuú, naʻá ne folofola: ‟Ko e mahaki ko eni̇́, ‘e ‘ikai te ne mate ai. Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakalāngilangi‘i ai ʻa e ‘Otuá, peá ke fakalāngilangiʻi foki ʻa e ʻAlo ʻo e ʻOtuá, ʻiate ia.”
Pea naʻe ‘ofa ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘ia Mā‘ʻata mo hono tokouá, pea mo Lāsalosi foki.
Ko ia, ʻi heʻene fanongo ʻoku puke iá, naʻá ne nofo atu pē ʻi he feitu‘u naʻá ne ʻi ai̇́, ‘i ha toe ʻaho ‘e ua.
Kae hili ʻa e meʻa ko iā, naʻá ne toki folofola ki heʻene kau akó: ‟Tau toe foki ki Siutea.”
Pea pehēange ‘e heʻene kau akó kiate ia: ‟Tangata‘eiki, ko ʻeni naʻe toki ʻosi pē ʻa e feinga ʻa e kau Siú ke tolomaka‘i koe, pea ko e hā hono ‘uhinga hoʻo toe foki ki ai̇́?”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Ikai ‘oku houa ‘e hongofulumāua ‘a e ʻahó? Kapau ʻe ʻalu holo ha taha he taimi ʻahó, ‘e ʻikai te ne humu, he ʻokú ne mamata ki he maamaʻanga ʻo māmani.
Ka ʻoka ‘alu holo ha taha he poʻuli̇́, te ne humu. He ‘oku ‘ikai ha maamaʻanga ʻiate ia.”
Naʻá ne folofolaʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, pea hili iá pea naʻe toki pehēange kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko hotau kaume‘a ko Lāsalosi̇́, kuó ne mohe, ka ko ‘eku ‘alu atu ʻeni ke fafangu ia.”
Ko ia naʻe pehēange ʻe heʻene kau akó kiate ia: ‟ʻEiki, kapau ‘okú ne mohe, te ne moʻui ai.”
Ka ko e folofola ‘a Sīsuú, naʻe kau ki heʻene pekiá, kae pehē ‘e he kau akó, ko ʻene ʻuhingá, ‘oku mohe pē ia.
Ko ia, naʻe toki folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo fakamahino kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko Lāsalosi̇́, kuo pekia.
Ka ‘oku ou fiefia ‘i he ʻikai te u ʻi ai̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ko kimoutolu, ke mou tui ai. Ka tau ō ā ki ai.”
Ko ia, naʻe pehēange ‘e Tōmasi (‘a ē na‘e ui ko Titimasi̇́) ki he toenga ʻo e kau akó: ‟Tau ō mo kitautolu foki, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke tau mate fakataha mo ia.”
Ko ia, ʻi he a‘u atu ‘a Sīsuú, naʻá ne ʻilo ai, tā kuo ʻosi ha ʻaho ʻe fā, hono tanu ‘o Lāsalosi̇ ʻi he fonualotó.
Pea naʻe ofi pē ʻa Pētani ki Selusalemá, he ko hono mamaʻó, naʻe feʻunga nai mo e kilomita ʻe tolu.
Pea kuo tokolahi ʻa e kau Siu naʻe omi kia Mele mo Maʻata, ko ʻenau fie kaungāmamahi mo kinaua, ‘i he mole hona tuongaʻané.
Pea ʻi he fanongo leva ‘a Mā‘ʻata kuo meʻa mai ‘a Sīsuú, naʻá ne ʻalu atu ke fakafe‘iloaki kiate ia. Ka ko Mele, naʻá ne nofo pē ‘i fale.
Pea pehēange ‘e Māʻata kia Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Eiki, kapau naʻá ke ‘i heni, na‘e ‘ikai ke mei pekia siʻoku tuongaʻané!
Ka neongo iá, ‘oku ou ‘iloʻi pē ‘e au, ko e hā pē ha me‘a te ke kole ki he ʻOtuá, ʻe foaki atu ia maʻau ʻe he ʻOtuá.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟ʻE toetuʻu ho tuongaʻané.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Ma‘ata kiate ia: ‟‘Oku ou ʻiloʻi pē, te ne toetuʻu ʻi he ʻaho fakamui̇́.”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ko au pē ko e toetuʻu mo e mo‘ui. Ko ia ʻe tui kiate aú, neongo te ne mate, ka te ne toe moʻui.
Pea ko ia kotoa pē ʻe moʻui mo tui kiate aú, ʻe ʻikai ʻaupito te ne mate ʻo taʻengata. ‘Okú ke tui ki he meʻa ni?”
Pea naʻa ne pehē ange kiate ia: ‟‘Io, ‘Eiki! ‘Oku ou tui ko e Mi̇̄saiá koe, ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otuá, ʻa ia naʻe pau ke hokomai ki māmani̇́.”
Pea hili ʻene lea ko iā, pea naʻe ʻalu atu ‘o ui mai hono tokouá, ko Mele, ʻo ne fafana kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟Ko e Tangata‘eiki̇́ eni, kuo meʻa mai, pea ‘okú ne fiemaʻu koe.”
Pea ʻi heʻene fanongo ki he meʻa ko iā, naʻá ne tu‘u hake leva ‘o fakatovave atu ke ʻalu kiate ia.
Pea kuo teʻeki ke aʻu atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ki he koló, ka naʻá ne kei ‘i he feitu‘u naʻá na fe‘iloaki ai mo Mā‘atá.

Ko ia, ko e kau Siú, ʻa ia naʻa nau nofo fakataha mo ia ʻi he falé, ko e kaungāmamahi mo iá, na‘a nau fakatokanga‘i ʻa e fakavave atu ʻa Mele mei falé, pea nau tutuʻu hake ʻo ʻalu atu, ʻo nau muimui kiate ia, he naʻa nau pehē: ko ʻene ʻalu atu ki he fonualotó, ke tangi ai.

Ko ia, ʻi he aʻu atu ‘a Mele ki he feitu‘u na‘e ‘i ai ‘a Sīsuú, naʻá ne mamata kiate ia ʻo ne tū‘ulutui atu ki hono va‘é, ʻo ne pehē kiate ia: ‟‘Eiki, kapau pē naʻá ke ‘i heni, pehē na‘e ‘ikai ke pekia siʻoku tuongaʻané.”
Pea ʻi he meʻa atu Si̇̄sū ki heʻene tangi̇́ pea mo e fetāngihi ʻa e kau Siu na‘e omi fakataha mo iá, na‘e tangi hono laumālié ʻo ne mamahi ʻaupito ʻiate ia.
Pea naʻe folofola: ‟Ko e fē ʻa e feitu‘u naʻa mou tanu ai iá?”
Naʻe tutulu ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Ko ia naʻe pehē ‘e he kau Siú: ‟Vakaiangeā ki he lahi ʻene ‘ofa kiate iá.”
Kae pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi ʻo kinautolu: ‟‘Ikai ʻoku mafai ʻe he Toko Taha naʻá ne faka‘ā ʻa e kui̇́, ke ne ta‘ofi foki ʻa e tangatá ni, mei haʻane pekia?”
Ko ia, naʻe toe tangi ʻa e loto ʻo Si̇̄suú, pea naʻe ‘alu leva ki he fonualotó.
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū: ‟Mou to‘o ʻa e fuʻu maká.” Ka naʻe talaange ‘e Māʻata, ʻa e tuofefine ʻo ia kuo pekiá: ‟‘Eiki, kuo ʻi ai hono anga, he ko hono ʻaho fā ʻeni ai.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟‘Ikai naʻá ku talaatu kiate koe, kapau te ke tui, te ke mamata ki he lāngilangi ‘o e ‘Otuá?”
Ko ia, naʻa nau to‘o ʻa e maká. Pea toki hanga hake ‘a e fofonga ʻo Si̇̄sū ki langi, ‘o ne folofola: ‟ʻE Tamai, ʻoku ou fakafetaʻi kiate koe, ʻi ho‘o tali ‘eku lotú.
He ʻoku ou ʻilo, ʻokú ke tali ma‘u pē ‘eku lotú, ka ʻoku ou lea atú, ko e meʻa ʻi he fuʻu kakai ʻoku tutuʻu takai ko eni̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke nau tui ko koe ia naʻá ke fekau mai aú.”
Pea ‘i heʻene folofola pehē: naʻá ne kalanga leʻolahi atu: ‟‘E Lāsalosi, hūmai kitu‘a.”
Pea hū mai leva kitu‘a ʻa e tangata naʻe pekiá, ‘oku kei haʻiʻaki ʻa e kafa hono vaʻé mo hono nimá, pea kei haʻi mo hono matá foki ʻaki ha konga tupenu.
Ko ia, ko e tokolahi ʻo e kau Siu naʻe haʻu ke kaungā kaungā mamahi mo Melé, na‘a nau mamata tonu he me‘a na‘e fai ʻe Si̇̄suú, pea nau tui ai kiate ia.
Ka naʻe ō hanau ni‘ihi ki he kau Fālesi̇́, ‘o tala kiate kinautolu ʻa e me‘a na‘e fai ‘e Sīsuú.

Ko ia, naʻe ui ‘e he kau Fālesi̇́ mo e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ ha fakataha ʻa e Fakamaauʻanga faka-Siú, ‘o nau fehu‘i ai: ‟Ko e hā ha‘atau me‘a ‘e fai̇́, he ko e tangata ko eni̇́, kuo lahi ʻa e ngaahi ngāue mana kuó ne fai̇́?
Kapau te tau tuku ai pē ia ke pehē: ʻe faifai pea tui ʻa e kakai kotoa pē kiate ia, pea ʻe haʻu ʻa e kau Lomá ‘o faka‘auha fakataha pē hotau fonuá mo hotau puleʻangá.”
Pea ko honau toko taha, ko Kaiafasi, ko e taulaʻeiki lahi ia he ta‘u ko iā, naʻá ne pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOku ‘ikai te mou ‘ilo ʻe kimoutolu ha me‘a ʻe taha.
Kuo te‘eki koā ke mou fakakaukau, ‘oku sai ange kiate kimoutolu ke mate ha toko taha maʻae kakai̇́, ‘i hano faka‘auha kotoa hotau puleʻangá?”
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ko ‘ene leá meiate ia pē, ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e Taula‘eiki Lahi ia he ta‘u ko iā, naʻá ne kikiteʻi ‘a e teu ke pekia ‘a Si̇̄sū maʻae puleʻangá.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e puleʻangá pē ka ko e meʻa ʻi he fānau kotoa ʻa e ‘Otuá, ‘a ia kuo movetevete holo ‘i māmani, ke fakatahatahaʻi kinautolu ke nau taha.
Pea talu ai pē mei he ʻaho ko iā, mo ʻenau fa‘ufa‘u ke tāmateʻi ia.
Ko ia, na‘e ‘ikai ke toe fononga tau‘atāina holo ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i Siutea, ka naʻá ne ‘alu atu ki he feituʻu ʻutá, ofi atu ki he toafá, ki ha kolo naʻe ui ko ʻIfalemi, ‘o ne nofo ai mo ‘ene kau akó.
Pea ʻi he ofi ʻa e Kātoanga Pāsova ʻa e kau Siú, naʻe ʻalu hake ha tokolahi mei ʻuta ki Selusalema, ke kau he ouau fakamaʻa na‘e fai, ko e teu ki he kātoanga ko iā.
Pea na‘a nau kumi holo ‘a Si̇̄sū, ʻi heʻenau fakataha atu ki he Temipalé, ʻo nau fe‘ekenaki: ‟Ko e hā haʻamou lau, ʻoku mou pehē te ne ha‘u ki he kātoangá?”
He kuo fekau ‘e he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ mo e kau Fālesi̇́, ka faifai pea ‘ilo ʻe ha taha ʻa e feitu‘u ‘oku ʻi ai ‘a Sīsuú, pea fakahā ange kiate kinautolu, ka nau puke ia ‘o fakahū pili̇̄sone.

12.text: Ko ia, ʻi he toe ʻa e ʻaho ‘e ono ki he Kātoanga Pāsová, naʻá ne ʻalu atu ki Pētani, ʻa e feituʻu naʻe nofo ai ʻa Lāsalosi̇́, ‘a ia na‘e fokotu‘u ‘e Si̇̄sū mei he pekiá.
Pea naʻa nau teuteu ai ha meʻatokoni efiafi ma‘ana. Pea ko Māʻata, naʻá ne tokangaʻi ʻa e tēpilé, ka ko Lāsalosi, ko e taha ia he faʻahinga na‘e tokoto mo Si̇̄sū ʻi he kai̇́.
Ko ia, naʻe to‘o mai ‘e Mele ha hina lolo, ko e na‘ati mahuʻinga, ‘o ne tākai ʻaki ʻa e va‘e ‘o Sīsuú, pea ne toki holoholo ʻaki ia hono lou‘ulú. Pea naʻe ‘alaha ʻa e loló ʻi he kotoa ʻo e falé.
Pea lea ki ai ʻa Siutasi ‘Isikāliote, ko e taha ʻo ʻene kau akó, ʻa e tangata na‘e ‘amanaki ke ne lavaki‘i iá,
‟Ko e hā naʻe ʻikai ke fakatau atu ai ʻa e loló, ke ma‘u ai ha pa‘anga ‘e tolungeau ke foaki maʻae masivá.”

Ka naʻe ʻikai ko ʻene lea peheé, ko haʻane ‘ofa mo‘oni ki he masivá, ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e kaiha‘a ia, he ko ia ia naʻá ne tauhi ‘enau kato pa‘angá, pea naʻá ne faʻa kaihaʻa pē mei he paʻanga naʻe tuku ai̇́.
Ko ia, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū: ‟Tuku pē ʻa e fefiné, he kuó ne tauhi mai ia, ke fai ʻaki hoku teuteú, ki he ʻaho ‘e tanu ai aú.
He ko e kau masivá, te mou nofo ma‘u pē mo kinautolu, ka he‘ikai te mou nofo ma‘u ai pē mo au.”

Ko ia, naʻe fanongo ʻa e tokolahi ʻo e kau Siú, ‘oku ‘i he feituʻu ko iā ‘a Si̇̄sū, pea nau ō hake ki ai, ʻo ʻikai koeʻuhi̇̄ ko Si̇̄sū pē, ka na‘a nau fie sio foki kia Lāsalosi, ʻa ia kuó ne fokotu‘u mei he maté.
Pea alēlea leva ʻa e kau taulaʻeiki lahi̇́ ke tāmate‘i foki mo Lāsalosi.
He ko e meʻa ʻiate iá, kuo tafoki mai ai ha kau Siu tokolahi ‘o tui kia Si̇̄sū.
ʻI he ʻaho hono hokó, ko e fuʻu kakai tokolahi naʻe omi ki he Pāsová, naʻa nau fanongo kuo ha‘u ‘a Si̇̄sū ki Selusalemá,
ʻO nau tā mai ha ngaahi va‘a paame pea nau ō atu mo ia ke fakafeʻiloaki kiate ia, pea nau kalakalanga,
Pea maʻu ‘e Si̇̄sū ha kiʻi ‘asi, ʻo ne heka ki ai, ‘o hangē pē ko e lau ‘a e Tohitapú,
‟‘Oua ‘e manavahē, taʻahine Saione!

Ko e ngaahi me‘a ko eni̇́, na‘e ‘ikai ke mahino leva ki heʻene kau akó, ʻi he taimi ko iā, ka ʻi he hili hono fakalāngilangi‘i ‘o Sīsuú, pea nau toki manatu‘i tā ko e ngaahi me‘a ʻeni na‘e hikitohi ʻo kau kiate iá, pea kuo nau fai pē kiate ia, ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā.
Ko ia, ko e kakai tokolahi, ʻa ē naʻa nau ʻi ai tonu ʻi heʻene ui ‘a Lāsalosi ke hūmai mei he fonualotó, ʻa ʻene fokotuʻu ia mei he pekiá, naʻa nau kei talanoaʻi ia.
Pea koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e meʻa ko iā, naʻe fie feʻiloaki mo ia ʻa e fuʻu kakai̇́, he kuo nau fanongo, ko e tangata ia naʻá ne fai ʻa e maná.
Ko ia, ko e kau Fālesi̇́ naʻa nau fepehēʻaki: ‟Mou vakai ange ā, kuo ʻikai ʻaupito haʻatau meʻa ʻe lava. Ko eni, ʻe ‘osi ‘a māmani he muimui kiate ia.”
Pea na‘e ‘i ai ha kau Kalisi ʻe niʻihi, mei he faʻahinga na‘e ō hake ke kau ki he ouau lotu ʻo e Kātoangá, ʻi Selusalemá.
Pea naʻe omi ʻa e faʻahinga ko iā kia Filipe, ko e tangata mei Petesaita ‘i Kāleli̇́, ‘o kole kiate ia ʻo pehē: ‟Matāpule, ‘oku mau fie fe‘iloaki mo Si̇̄sū.”
Pea ‘alu ‘a Filipe ‘o fakahoko kia ‘Anitelū. Pea toki ō ʻa ʻAnitelū mo Filipe ‘o fakahoko ange kia Si̇̄sū.
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ‟Kuo hokosia ʻa e taimi̇́, ke fakalāngilangiʻi ai ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá.
Ko e mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ka ‘ikai tō ha fo‘i uite ki he kelekelé ‘o mate, pea ‘e kei nofo ai pē ia ko e fo‘i uite ‘e taha. Ka ‘oka mate, pea ‘e toki fua lahi.
Ko ia ʻoku ‘ofa ki heʻene moʻui ʻaʻana pē, ʻe mole ia. Pea ko ia ʻokú ne fehiʻa ki heʻene mo‘ui̇́, ʻi he maama ko eni̇́, te ne tauhi ia ʻo aʻu ki he mo‘ui ta‘engatá.

Ka ai ha taha te ne fie nofo ʻo tauhi kiate au, kuo pau ke ne muimui mai, pea ko e feituʻu te u ʻi ai̇́, ʻe ʻi ai foki ʻeku sevāniti̇́. Ka ʻi ai ha taha ʻokú ne fie tauhi kiate au, ʻe fakalāngilangi‘i ia ‘e he Tamai̇́.

Ka ko eni, ‘oku mafasia hoku lotó, pea ko e hā ai ha‘aku toe lea ‘e fai? ʻE Tamai ke ke haofaki‘i au mei he houa ko ʻeni̇́? ʻIkai, he naʻe ʻuhinga ‘eku ha‘u ki māmani̇́, ke u aʻusia ʻa e houa ko eni̇́.
ʻE Tamai, ke ke fakalāngilangi‘i muʻa ho huafá.”
Pea ko e tokolahi naʻe tutuʻu ai ʻo fanongo ki he le‘ó, naʻa nau pehē: ko e ‘u‘ulu pē ‘o ha mana, kae pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi, ko ha ‘āngelo naʻe lea mai kiate ia.
Kae tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne folofola: ‟Na‘e ‘ikai ko e ongo mai ʻa e le‘ó koe‘uhi̇̄ ko au, ka koe‘uhi̇̄ ko kimoutolu.
Ko eni, kuo hokosia ʻa e fakamāau‘i ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, pea ko e ʻeiki ‘o maama ko eni̇́, kuo kapusi kituʻa.
Ka ko au, ʻoka hiki hake au ki ‘olunga mei māmani, pea te u toki tohoaki mai ʻa e kakai kotoa pē kiate au.”
Ka ko ʻene lau pehē: ko ʻene fakahā atu ia, ʻa e anga ‘o e mate‘anga te ne mate ai̇́.

Pea pehē ange ʻe he kakai̇́ kiate ia: ‟ʻOku mau ʻilo mei he Folofolá, ko e Mi̇̄saiá ‘e mo‘ui ai pē ‘o ta‘engata, pea ʻe anga fēfē ai hoʻo pehē: Kuo pau ke hiki ki ʻolunga ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá? Kohai koā ia, ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá?”

Ko ia naʻe tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟‘E kiʻi fuoloa siʻi atu pē ‘a e nofo ʻa e maamá mo kimoutolú. Mou fononga, lolotonga hoʻomou kei maʻu ʻa e maamá, teʻeki ke tō mai ʻa e poʻuli ʻo ne kāpui kimoutolu, he ko ia ʻoku fononga ʻi he poʻuli̇́, ʻoku ʻikai te ne ʻilo pē ko ʻene ʻalu ki fē.
ʻI hoʻomou kei maʻu ʻa e maamá, mou tui falala ki he maamá, ka mou hoko ai ko e fānau ‘o e maamá.”
Neongo naʻe lahi ʻa e ngaahi mana ‘a Si̇̄sū na‘e fai ʻi honau lotolotongá, ka na‘e ‘ikai pē ke nau tui kiate ia;
Koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakamo‘oni ai ʻa e lau ʻa e palōfita ko ‘Aiseá, ʻo pehē:
Ko e ʻuhinga ia ʻa e taʻemalava ke nau tui̇́, ke toe fakamo‘oni mo e lau ko ʻeni ‘e taha ‘a ‘Aisea, ʻo pehē:
‟Kuo fakakuihi ‘e he ‘Eikí
Naʻe lea pehē ‘a ‘Aiseá, he naʻá ne mamata ki he lāngilangi ‘o Sīsuú, pea naʻe lea ʻo kau kiate ia.

ʻI he taimi tatau, naʻe tokolahi ha niʻihi he kau taki̇́ naʻe nau tui kiate ia. Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e kau Fālesi̇́, na‘e ‘ikai ke nau lava ‘o fakahā ki ha taha, he naʻa nau manavahē naʻa tuli kinautolu kituʻa mei he falelotú.
He naʻe kei mahu‘inga ange ki he kau taki ko iā, ʻa e mālieʻia mai ʻa e kakai̇́, ‘i he finangalo ʻofa mai ʻa e ‘Otuá.
Pea toki kalanga le‘olahi ‘a Si̇̄sū, ‘o naʻe pehē: ‟Ko ia ʻe tui kiate aú, ʻoku ʻikai ko au pē ʻoku tui ki ai̇́, ka ʻokú ne tui ai foki ki he Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
Pea ko ia ʻoku mamata kiate aú, ʻokú ne mamata ai foki ki he Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
Ko au, kuo u ha‘u ko e maama ʻo māmani koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ia kotoa pē ʻe tui kiate aú, ke ʻoua te ne kei nofo he poʻuli̇́.
He ʻoka ai ha taha ʻe fanongo ki heʻeku ngaahi leá pea ʻikai te ne tauhi ki ai, ʻe ‘ikai te u fakamāau‘i ia ʻe au, he na‘e ‘ikai te u ha‘u ke fakamāau‘i ‘a māmani, ka ke fakamoʻui ‘a māmani.
Ko ia te ne fakasi̇̄tuʻaʻi au pea ʻikai te ne tali ʻeku ngaahi leá, ʻoku ʻi ai ha fakamaau kiate ia. Ko e ngaahi lea pē ko ē naʻá ku leaʻaki̇́, ʻe fakahalaiaʻiʻaki ia ʻi he ʻaho fakamui̇́.
He ʻoku ‘ikai ko ʻeku lea pē meiate au, ka ko e Tamai̇́ naʻá ne fekauʻi au ke u lea ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi me‘a kuo u lea‘aki̇́.
Pea ʻoku ou ‘ilo‘i ko ʻene ngaahi fekaú, ‘oku ma‘u ai ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá. Ko ia, ko e meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku ou lea ʻaki, ko e meʻa pē ʻoku leaʻaki mai ʻe he Tamai̇́, pea ko ia pē ʻoku ou leaʻaki̇́.”

13.text: Pea ʻi he teu ke fai ʻa e Kātoanga Pāsová, na‘e ʻafioʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū kuo hokosia ʻa e taimi̇́, ke ne mavahe ai mei māmani, ‘o foki ki he Tamai̇́, ko ia naʻá ne ‘ofa ki he faʻahinga na‘e kau mo ia ‘i māmani̇́, ‘o ne fai pē ʻene ʻofa kiate kinautolú, ke a‘u ki he ngata‘angá.
Pea ʻi he teu ke kamata ʻa e ma‘u me‘atokoni̇́, kuo ‘osi fakahū ‘e he tēvoló ki he loto ‘o Siutasi, ko e foha ʻo Saimone ʻIsikālioté, ke ne lavaki‘i ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Pea kuo ʻafioʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū, kuo foaki ʻe he ʻOtuá ke ne pule ki he meʻa kotoa pē, pea ko e ‘Otuá pē kuó ne haʻu mei ai pea te ne toefoki ki ai̇́.
Ko ia, naʻá ne tu‘u hake mei he kai̇́, ‘o ne to‘o hono pulupulú, pea naʻe ha‘i ha taueli ‘i hono kongalotó.
Hili iá naʻá ne toki lingi ha vai ki he pēsoni̇́, ‘o ne kamata ke fufulu ʻa e va‘e ‘o ʻene kau akó mo holo mātu‘u ʻaki ʻa e taueli naʻe haʻi ʻi hono kongalotó.
Pea naʻe a‘u atu kia Saimone Pitá, naʻe pehē ange ‘e ia: ‟‘Eiki, ko e ʻai koā ke ke fufulu hoku va‘é?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia : ‟‘E ‘ikai mahino leva kiate koe he taimi̇́ ni, ʻa e me‘a ‘oku ou fai̇́, ka ʻe toki mahino atu ‘amui ange.”
Pea lea ʻa Pita kiate ia: ‟He‘ikai ʻaupito te ke fufulu ‘e koe hoku va‘é ʻo taʻengata.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Saimone Pita kiate ia: ‟‘Eiki, ‘oua ʻe ngata pē ʻi hoku va‘é, ka ke fulufulu mo hoku ongo nimá mo hoku ‘ulú foki.”
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ko ia kuo ‘osi kaukaú, ko hono va‘é pē ‘oku fiema‘u ke fufulú. Pea kuo mou ‘osi ma‘a kimoutolu, neongo ʻoku ʻikai te mou maʻa kotoa pē.”
He na‘e ʻafioʻi pē ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e toko taha ‘okú naʻe teu lavaki‘i iá, pea ko e ʻuhinga ia ‘ene pehē: ‟ʻOku ʻikai te mou maʻa kotoa pē.”

Pea hili hono fufulu ‘e Si̇̄sū honau va‘é, naʻá ne tui hono pulupulú, pea naʻe toe nofo hifo ki he maʻu meʻatokoni̇́, ʻo ne pehē ange kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻOku mahino atu ʻa e meʻa kuo u fai kiate kimoutolú?”
‟‘Oku mou ui au ko e faiako mo e ‘Eiki, pea ‘oku taau pē ke pehē: he ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ia.
Ko ia kapau kuo u fufulu ‘e au homou va‘é, ka ko e faiakó au mo e ‘Eiki̇́, pea mou fai pehē mo kimoutolu ‘iate kimoutolu pē, ʻo mou fefufuluʻaki homou vaʻé.
Kuo u tuku atu ha si̇̄pinga ma‘amoutolu, ke mou fai foki ʻa e meʻa kuo u fai kiate kimoutolú.
He ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ʻoku ʻikai ke mā‘olunga ange ha tamaio‘eiki ‘i hono ‘eiki̇́, pea ʻoku ʻikai ke mā‘olunga ange ha faifekau ‘iate ia naʻá ne fekau atu iá.
Ko ʻeni kuo mahino kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni, ko e toki kakai monūʻia moʻoni kimoutolu ʻoka mou ka fai ki ai.

‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku lau ʻeni kiate kimoutolu kotoa pē. He ‘oku ou ‘ilo ‘e au ʻa e faʻahinga kuo u filí. Ka kuo pau ke fakakakato ʻa e me‘a ʻa e Tohitapú, ‛Ko e tangata naʻá ma ma‘u me‘atokoni fakatahá, kuó ne angatuʻu kiate au.’
Ko ʻeni ʻoku ou fakahā atu kiate kimoutolu kimuʻa ke hokó ʻa e meʻa ni, koe‘uhi̇̄ ka toki hoko ia, pea mou tui leva ko au ia.

Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ko ia te ne talitali lelei ha taha pē te u fekau atú, ʻokú ne talitali lelei au, pea ko ia te ne talitali lelei aú, kuó ne talitali lelei ai foki ‘a e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.”

Pea hili hono lea‘aki ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko iā, naʻe mafasia lahi hono lotó, pea naʻe folofola ki he‘ene kau akó: ‟Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala atú, ko e toko taha ‘iate kimoutolu, te ne lavaki‘i au.”
Pea fesiofaki ai ʻa e kau akó ‘o nau mo‘ulongoa heʻenau fifili pē kohai ʻoku ʻuhinga ki ai ʻene leá.
Pea ko honau toko taha, ko e akonga naʻá ne ‘ofa taha ai̇́, naʻá ne tokoto ofi atu ki he nofoʻanga ʻo Si̇̄sū.
Ko ia, naʻe kamo ange ‘a Saimone Pita ki he toko taha ko iā, ke ne ‘eke ange kia Si̇̄sū, pē ko ‘ene laú kia hai.
Pea ʻunuʻunu atu ʻa e toko taha ko iā, ʻo ofi atu ki he fatafata ʻo Si̇̄sū, ‘o ne pehē ange kiate ia: ‟Ko hai ia, ‘Eiki?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko e toko taha ia te u ʻange ki ai ‘a e konga mā ko eni̇́, hili ʻeku unu ia ki he tisi̇́.” Pea toki hanga ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘o unu ‘ene konga maá, pea naʻe ‘oange kia Siutasi, ‘a e foha ‘o Saimone ‘Isikālioté.
Pea hili hono toʻo ʻe Siutasi ʻa e konga maá, naʻe hū leva ‘a Sētane kiate ia.
Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke mahino ki ha taha ʻokinautolu naʻe ʻi he maʻumeʻatokoni̇́, pē ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga ʻo ʻene lau ki ai̇́.

He na‘e pehē ‘e he ni‘ihi, koeʻuhi̇̄ ko Siutasi naʻá ne tauhi ‘enau pa‘angá, ko ʻene fekaú, ke ne ʻalu ʻo fakatau mai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ki he Kātoangá, pē ke ne ‘alu atu ‘o tufa ha sēniti maʻae kau masivá.
Ko ia, ʻi he to‘o pē ‘e Siutasi ʻa e konga maá, naʻá ne hū atu leva ki tu‘a. Pea kuo poʻuli̇.
Pea hili ʻa e ‘alu atu ‘a Siutasi̇́, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu,
Kapau ʻe fakalāngilangi‘i ʻa e ‘Otuá ‘iate ia, pea ‘e fakalāngilangi‘i ʻe he ʻOtuá ʻa e Foha ʻo e Tangatá ʻiate ia pē, ʻio, te ne fakalāngilangi‘i leva ia.

Siʻi fānau, ʻoku toesiʻi pē ʻeku nofo mo kimoutolú, pea hangē ko e meʻa naʻá ku tala ki he kau Siú, pea ʻoku ou tala ʻeni foki kiate kimoutolu, Ko e feitu‘u ‘oku ou teu ‘alu ki ai̇́, ʻe ʻikai te mou lava ke ʻalu ki ai.
Ko e fekau fo‘ou ʻeni ‘oku ou ʻoatu kiate kimoutolu, ke mou fe‘ofo‘ofani. Hangē ko ‘eku ‘ofa‘i kimoutolú, ‛ko ia ke mou feʻofaʻaki foki.’
Ko e meʻa ʻeni ʻe toki mahino ai ki he kakai kotoa pē ko ‘eku kau ako kimoutolu, ʻokapau ʻe ʻi ai haʻamou feʻofaʻaki.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Saimone Pita: ‟‘Eiki, ko e ʻai ke ke meʻa ki fē?”
Pea pehē ange ʻe Pita kiate ia: ‟ʻEiki, ko e hā ʻa e ‘uhinga ‘oku ‘ikai lava ai ke u muimui kiate koe he taimi ni̇́? Te u tuku ‘eku mo‘ui̇́ ke mole koeʻuhi̇̄ ko koe.”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Te ke fie tuku koā ho‘o mo‘ui̇́ ma‘aku? Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate koé, ‘e ʻikai ke ‘u‘ua ʻa e moá, kaeʻoua kuo tuʻo tolu hoʻo fakafisingaʻi au.”

14.text: ‟‘Oua naʻa hohaʻa homou lotó ki ha meʻa, ka mou tui falala ki he ‘Otuá, pea mou tui pi̇̄kitai foki kiate au.
‘Oku lahi ʻa e ngaahi nofo‘angá ʻi he fale ‘o ‘eku Tamai̇́. Kapau naʻe ʻikai moʻoni, ʻoku mou pehē te u talaatu, ko ʻeku ʻalu ʻeni ʻo teuteu ha feituʻu ai maʻamoutolu?
Pea kapau ko ‘eku ‘alu ʻeni ‘o teu ha feituʻu ai maʻamoutolu, te u toe foki mai ‘o ‘ave kimoutolu ke tau nofo fakataha ʻi he feituʻu ʻoku ou ʻi ai̇́.
Pea ‘oku mou ‘ilo pē ʻa e hala ki he feitu‘u ‘oku ‘ou ‘alu ki ai̇́.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Tōmasi: ‟‘Eiki, ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo ʻa e feituʻu ʻokú ke ʻalu ki ai̇́, pea ‘e anga fēfē ha‘amau ‘ilo ʻa e hala ki ai̇́?”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ko au pē ko e hala, mo e mo‘oni, mo e mo‘ui. ‘Oku ‘ikai lava ke ha‘u ha taha ki he Tamai̇́, ‘okapau ‘e ‘ikai fou mai ‘iate au.
Ka ne mou ‘ilo‘i lelei au, na‘a mou ‘ilo‘i lelei foki ʻa e Tamai̇́. Ka ‘e kamata mei̇́ he taimi̇́ ni, te mou ‘ilo‘i lelei ia, he kuo mou mamata tonu kiate ia.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Filipe: ‟‘Eiki, fakahā mai muʻa ʻa e Tamai̇́ kiate kimautolu, ka mau toki fiemālie.”

Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Ko e talu ʻeni ‘etau nofo mei ‘anefē, Filipe, mo e te‘eki pē ke ke ‘ilo ‘e koe au? Ko ia kuó ne mamata kiate aú, kuó ne mamata tonu ki he Tamai̇́. Ko e hā ʻa e ʻuhinga ho‘o toe pehē: ke u fakahā atu ʻa e Tamai̇́?

‘Oku ‘ikai koā te ke tui, ‘oku ou ʻi he Tamai̇́, pea ‘oku ʻiate au ʻa e Tamai̇́? Ko e ngaahi lea ʻoku ou fai atú, ‘oku ‘ikai ko e ngaahi lea pē ia ʻaʻaku, ka ko e Tamai̇́ ʻoku nofomaʻu mo au, ‘o ne fai ʻene ngaahi ngāué ‘iate au.
Tui mai kiate au, he ko aú ʻoku ou ʻi he Tamai̇́ pea ko e Tamai̇́ ʻoku ʻiate au. Peá ka ‘ikai, pea mou tui pē ā koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e ngaahi ngāue‘oku ou fai̇́.

Ko hono mo‘oni̇́ ʻeni ‘oku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, ka ai ha taha ʻe tui pi̇̄kitai kiate au, te ne fai foki ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku ou fai ʻe aú. ‘ʻio, ka ko e toko taha ko iā, te ne fai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ʻoku toe lahi ange ʻi he ngaahi meʻa ko eni̇́, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ‘eku ʻalu hake ʻeni ki he Tamai̇́.
Peá ka ai ha ngaahi me‘a te mou kole mai ʻi hoku huafá, te u fai ia foki ‘e au, koe‘uhi̇̄ ke fakalāngilangiʻi ʻa e Tamai̇́ ‘i he Fohá.
ʻIlonga ha me‘a te mou kole mai ke u fai ʻi hoku huafá, te u fai ia ma‘amoutolu.”
‟Kapau ‘oku mou ‘ofa kiate au, pea mou talangofua ki heʻeku ngaahi fekaú.
Pea te u kole ki he Tamai̇́, pea te ne foaki atu ha mou Tokoniofi ʻe taha, ke ne nofoma‘u mo kimoutolu ʻo taʻengata.

Ko e Laumālie ‘o e moʻoní, ʻa ia ʻoku ‘ikai lava ke tali ‘e he maama ko eni̇́, he ‘oku ‘ikai lava ke nau mamata kiate ia, pē ke nau ‘iloʻi ia, ka ‘okú ne ʻi homou lotolotongá, pea te ne nofoma‘u ai pē ʻiate kimoutolu.
He‘ikai te u tuku kimoutolu ke mou liʻekina, ka te u toefoki mai pē kiate kimoutolu.
Kuo vavé ni pē ʻa e ‘ikai ke toe sio kiate au ʻa e kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, ka te mou sio ai pē kimoutolu kiate au, koeʻuhi̇̄ he ‘oku ou mo‘ui pea te mou moʻui foki ʻakimoutolu.
‘I he taimi ko iā, te mou toki ʻiloʻi ai, ko au ʻoku ou ʻi heʻeku Tamai̇́, pea ko kimoutolu ʻoku mou ʻiate au, pea ʻoku ou ʻiate kimoutolu ʻe au.

Ko ia ʻokú ne maʻu ʻeku ngaahi fekaú mo talangofua ki ai̇́, ko e toko taha ia ʻoku ʻofa kiate au. Pea ko ia ʻoku ʻofa kiate aú, ʻe ʻofeina ia ʻe heʻeku Tamai̇́, pea te u ʻofa mo au foki kiate ia, pea te u fakahāaʻi au kiate ia.”
Pea pehēange ‘e Siutasi (ka na‘e ‘ikai ko Siutasi ‘Isikāliote) ‟ʻEiki, ko e hā hono ‘uhinga ho‘o pehē te ke fakahāmai koe kiate kimautolu, kae ‘ikai ki he kakai ‘o e maama ko ʻeni̇́?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻo ne folofola kiate ia: ‟Ka ‘i ai ha taha ‘e ‘ofa kiate au, te ne talangofua ki he‘eku ngaahi leá, pea ‘e ‘ofeina ia ʻe he‘eku Tamai̇́, pea te ma omi ‘o ngaohi ʻa e toko taha ko iā, ko homa nofoʻanga.
Ka ko ia ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘ofa kiate aú, ‘e ‘ikai te ne talangofua ki he‘eku ngaahi leá. Pea ko e akonaki ‘oku mou maʻú, ‘oku ‘ikai ‘a‘aku pē ia, ka ko e ʻomai mei he Tamai̇́.
Ko e ngaahi meʻá ni, ʻoku ou talaatu kiate kimoutolu lolotonga ‘eku kei ʻiate kimoutolú.

Ka ko e Tokoniofi̇́, ʻa e Laumālie Māʻoniʻoni̇́, ʻa ia ʻe fekau mai ‘e he Tamai̇́ ʻi hoku hingoá. Ko e Toko Taha ko iā, te ne fakahinohino atu ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē, mo fakamanatu atu ʻa e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē kuo u leaʻaki kiate kimoutolu.

Ko e nongá ē ʻoku ou tuku kiate kimoutolu, kau ʻalu. Ko e nonga meiate au ʻoku ou foaki maʻamoutolu. ‘Oku ‘ikai hangē ko e nonga ‘oku ‘atu ‘e māmani̇́, ʻa e nonga ʻoku ou foaki atú. Ko ia, ‘oua te mou manavasiʻi pē te mou lotosiʻi.

Kuo mou fanongo ki he‘eku talaatu, te u ‘alu ka te u toefoki mai pē kiate kimoutolu. Kapau ʻoku mou ‘ofa kiate au, te mou mātuʻaki fiefia he‘eku ‘alu ki he Tamai̇́, koeʻuhi̇̄ he ʻoku lahi ʻa e Tamai̇́ ʻiate au.
Pea ʻoku ou talaatu ʻa e meʻá ni kiate kimoutolu, he taimi̇́ ni, kimu‘a pea toki hokomai ia, koe‘uhi̇̄ ʻoka hokosia ia, pea mou tui kiate au.
ʻOku ‘ikai kei toe lahi ha ngaahi meʻa ke u talanoa ai kiate kimoutolu, he kuo haʻu ʻa e ʻeiki ʻo e maama ko eni̇́, ka ʻe ʻikai haʻane meʻa ʻe lava kiate au.
Ka koe‘uhi̇̄ ke mahino ki he maama ko ʻeni̇́ ʻa ‘eku ‘ofa ki he Tamai̇́, ko ia, ko e ngaahi meʻa kotoa pē ʻoku tuʻutuʻuni kiate au ʻe he Tamai̇́, ko ia pē te u fai ki ai̇́.

15.text: ‟Ko au pē ko e vaine mo‘oni̇́, pea ko ‘eku Tamai̇́, ko e tauhingoué ia.
Ko e vaʻa kotoa pē ʻiate au ‘oku ‘ikai ke fuá, ʻokú ne tuʻusi ia, pea ko e va‘a kotoa pē ‘oku fuá, ‘okú naʻe fakamaʻa ia ke toe lahi ange ʻene fuá.
Kuo ‘osi fakamaʻa kimoutolu ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi lea naʻá ku fai atu kiate kimoutolú.

Mou nofomaʻu ʻiate au, pea te u nofomaʻu ʻiate kimoutolu. Hangē foki ʻoku ‘ikai malava ke fua ha va‘a vaine ‘iate ia pē ʻokapau ʻe ʻikai piki ki he fuʻu vainé, pehē foki ‘e ‘ikai te mou lava ke fua ‘okapau ‘e ‘ikai ke mou nofomaʻu ʻiate au.

Ko au ʻa e vainé, ko kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi vaʻá. Ko ia te ne nofomaʻu ʻiate aú pea mo au ʻiate iá, ko e toko taha ko iā, ʻe fua lahi, he ʻe ‘ikai te mou malava ha me‘a, ‘okapau te mou mavahe meiate au.
Ka ai ha taha ʻe ʻikai nofomaʻu ʻiate au, ‘e liʻaki atu ia ki tuʻaʻā pea ʻoku iku ʻo mōmoa ia, pea ‘oku nau tufi mai ia ʻo laku ki he afi pea ʻoku vela.
Kapau te mou nofomaʻu ʻiate au, pea kapau ʻe nofomaʻu ʻeku ngaahi akonaki̇́ ʻiate kimoutolu, pea neongo pē ko e hā ha meʻa te mou loto ki ai, mou kole pea ʻe fai ia kiate kimoutolu.
Ko e meʻa ʻeni ʻe fakalāngilangi‘i ai ‘eku Tamai̇́ ‘okapau te mou fua lahi ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻomou hoko ko ‘eku kau akó.
Hangē naʻe ʻofaʻi au ʻe he Tamai̇́, pea u ‘ofa‘i ‘e au foki ʻakimoutolu, mou nofomaʻu ʻi he ʻofa ʻaʻakú.
Kapau te mou tauhi ʻeku ngaahi fekaú, te mou nofomaʻu ʻi heʻeku ʻofá, ʻo hangē ko ‘eku tauhi ʻe au ʻa e ngaahi fekau ‘a ʻeku Tamai̇́ pea u nofomaʻu foki ʻi heʻene ʻofá.
Ko e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻoku ou leaʻaki kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhi̇̄ ke u fiefia ʻiate kimoutolu, peá ke kakato foki hoʻomou fiefiá.
Ko ʻeku tuʻutuʻuni̇́ eni, ke mou feʻofo‘ofani, ‘o hangē ko ‘eku ‘ofa kiate kimoutolú.
ʻOku ʻikai ha ʻofa ʻe toe lahi ange he ʻofa ko eni̇́, ke hanga ʻe ha taha ʻo liʻaki ʻene mo‘ui̇́ ko e fetongi ʻo hono ngaahi kaumeʻá.
Ko hoku ngaahi kaume‘a kimoutolu ‘okapau ‘oku mou fai ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ʻoku ou fekau atu kiate kimoutolú.

‘Oku ‘ikai te u kei lau kimoutolu ko ‘eku kau sevāniti, he ‘oku ‘ikai ke ‘ilo ‘e ha sevāniti ia ʻa e me‘a ‘oku fai ‘e hono ʻeiki̇́. Ka ‘oku ou lau kimoutolu ko hoku ngaahi kaumeʻa, he ko e meʻa kotoa kuo u fanongo ai mei heʻeku Tamai̇́, kuo u fakahā atu kiate kimoutolu.

Na‘e ‘ikai ko kimoutolu naʻa mou fili aú, ka ko au naʻá ku fili kimoutolú, ʻou fakanofo kimoutolu ke mou ō atu ‘o fua lahi peá ke tuʻumaʻu homou fuá, koeʻuhi̇̄ neongo pē ko e hā ha me‘a te mou lotu ki ai ‘i hoku hingoá, ʻe fai ia kiate kimoutolu ʻe he Tamai̇́.
Ko e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻoku ou tuʻutuʻuni atu kiate kimoutolú, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke mou fe‘ofaʻaki.
Kapau ʻe fehiʻa ʻa e kakai ʻo e maama ko ‘eni̇́ ʻiate kimoutolu, pea mou manatu‘i, naʻa nau tomu‘a fehi‘a kinautolu ʻiate aú.

Kapau naʻa mou kau ki he kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, te nau ‘ofa kiate kimoutolu hangē tofu pē hanau kakai̇ tonú. Ka ko eni, ‘oku ‘ikai te mou kau ki he kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, he naʻá ku fili kimoutolu ke mou mavahe mei̇́ he maama ko eni̇́. Ko hono ‘uhinga ia ‘oku fehiʻa ai kiate kimoutolu ʻa e kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́.

Manatu‘i, ʻa e lea naʻá ku fai kiate kimoutolu, ‘E ‘ikai ke laka hake ha sevāniti ‘i hono ʻeiki̇́. Kapau naʻa nau ngaohikovia au, te nau ngaohikovia foki mo kimoutolú. Pea kapau te nau tauhi ʻeku ngaahi akonaki̇́, te nau tauhi foki ʻa e ngaahi akonaki ʻamoutolú.
Ka ko e ngaahi meʻá ni hono kotoa, te nau fai kiate kimoutolu koe‘uhi̇̄ ko hoku huafá, pea koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e ‘ikai te nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú.
Ka naʻe ‘ikai te u haʻu ʻo lea kiate kinautolu, na‘e ‘ikai te nau halaia heʻenau ngaahi angahalá. Ka ko eni, kuo ʻikai toe ai hanau haoʻanga koeʻuhi̇̄ ko ʻenau ngaahi angahalá.
Ko ia ‘oku fehi‘a kiate aú, ʻokú ne fehi‘a ki he‘eku Tamai̇́ foki.

Kapau naʻe ʻikai te u fai ʻi honau lotolotongá ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ʻe ʻikai toe lava ʻe ha taha ke fai, na‘e ‘ikai ke nau halaia heʻenau angahalá. Ka ko ʻeni kuo nau sio tonu ai, ka neongo ia, ʻoku nau fehi‘a kiate au mo ‘eku Tamai̇́.
Ka naʻe pau ke fakamoʻoni ʻa e lau ʻa e folofola kuo hikitohi heʻenau Tohitapú, ‛naʻá nau fehi‘a tu‘unga‘a pē kiate au.’

Ka ʻoka hokomai ʻa e Tokoniofi̇́, ‘a ia te u fekau mai kiate kimoutolu mei he Tamai̇́, ko e Laumālie ʻo e Moʻoní ʻa ia ʻokú ne ʻalu atu mei̇́ he Tamai̇́, te ne fakamatala ʻe he Toko Taha ko iā ʻo kau kiate au.
Pea ko kimoutolu foki, te mou fakamatala, he kuo talu pē mei he kamata‘angá mo ho‘omou feohi mo au.”

16.text: ‟Ko e ngaahi meʻa ni, ʻoku ou leaʻaki kiate kimoutolú koeʻuhi̇̄ ke ‘oua naʻa takihēeʻi kimoutolu.
He ‘e tuli kimoutolu mei he ngaahi falelotu ‘o haʻa Siú, pea ʻoku hokomai ha taimi, ʻa ia ko ia kotoa pē te ne tāmate‘i kimoutolu, te ne lau tokua, ko ʻene fai ia ha feilaulau ki he ‘Otuá.
Te nau fai ʻa e ngaahi meʻa peheé koe‘uhi̇̄ kuo ʻikai te nau ʻiloʻi ʻa e Tamai̇́ pea mo au.
Ka ko e ngaahi meʻa ni, ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, koe‘uhi̇̄ ʻoka hokosia leva ʻa e taimi ko iā, pea mou manatu‘i naʻá ku ‘osi talaatu ia ʻe au kiate kimoutolu.”
‟Pea ko eni, te u foki au ki he Toko Taha naʻá ne fekau mai aú, pea kuo te‘eki ai ke ‘eke mai ‘e ha mou taha kiate au, Ko hoʻo ‘alú ki fē?
Ka koeʻuhi̇̄ kuo u leaʻaki ʻa e ngaahi meʻá ni kiate kimoutolu, kuo fonu leva ai homou lotó he mamahi.

Ka ko e moʻoni̇́ pē ʻeni ʻoku ou leaʻaki kiate kimoutolú, ‘e lelei ange kiate kimoutolu ‘eku ‘alú. He kapau ‘e ‘ikai te u ʻalu, pea ʻe ʻikai ke ha‘u ʻa e Tokoniofi̇́ kiate kimoutolu, ka ʻoka u ka ‘alu, pea te u fekau mai ia kiate kimoutolu.
Peá ka ha‘u leva ia, te ne lea ke fakahalaia ʻa e maama ko ʻeni̇́ koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e angahalá, mo e māʻoniʻoni̇́, pea mo e fakamaau ʻa e ‘Otuá.
Fekauʻaki mo e angahalá, he ‘oku ‘ikai te nau tui kiate au.
Fekauʻaki mo e māʻoniʻoni̇́, he ko ‘eku ‘alu ʻeni ki he Tamai̇́, pea he‘ikai te mou toe sio kiate au.
Pea fekauʻaki mo e fakamaau ʻa e ‘Otuá, he kuo ‘osi fakamaau‘i ʻa e ʻEiki ‘o e maama ko eni̇́.
‘Oku lahi ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘oku kei toe ke u leaʻaki kiate kimoutolu, ka ‘e ʻikai te mou lava ke matuʻuaki ia ʻi he taimi̇́ ni.

Ka ʻoka hokomai ʻa e Toko Taha ko iā, ʻa e Laumālie ʻo e Moʻoni̇́, te ne tataki kimoutolu ki he mo‘oni hono kotoa pē. ‘E ‘ikai te ne lea ʻaki ‘e ia ha‘ane ngaahi me‘a ‘a‘ana pē, ka te ne leaʻaki atu pē, ʻa e ngaahi me‘a kuó ne fanongo ai, pea te ne fakahā atu foki kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ‘e hoko ‘amui ange.
‘E fakalāngilangi‘i au ‘e he Toko Taha ko iā, ʻaki ʻene fakahā atu kiate kimoutolu ʻa e ngaahi me‘a kuó ne ma‘u meiate aú.
Ko e me‘a kotoa pē ʻa e Tamai̇́, ʻoku ʻaʻaku. Ko hono ‘uhinga ia naʻá ku talaatu ai, ‘e fakahā atu ‘e he Laumālié, ʻa e ngaahi me‘a kuó ne ma‘u meiate aú.”
‟Ko e taimi si‘i pē mei heni, pea ‘e ‘ikai te mou toe sio kiate au, pea ‘e fuoloa si‘i pē mei ai, pea te mou toe sio kiate au.”

Ko ia, naʻe fepehēʻaki leva ʻe he niʻihi ʻo ʻene kau akó: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e ‘uhinga ‘o ʻene pehē: ‘E fuoloa si‘i pē mei heni, pea ‘e ‘ikai te mou toe sio kiate au, ka ‘e fuoloa si‘i pē mei ai, pea te mou toe sio kiate au? Pea, Ko ʻeku ‘alu ʻeni ki he Tamai̇́?
Ko ia naʻa nau pehē: Ko e hā ʻa e ki‘i taimi si‘i ko ʻeni ‘okú naʻe lau ki ai̇́? ‘Oku ‘ikai mahino kiate kitautolu ʻene laú.”

Pea ʻafioʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ‘oku nau fie fehu‘i ange, ʻo kau ki he meʻa ni, pea naʻe folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟‘Oku mou fifili koā ʻi homou lotó pē ko e hā ʻa e ‘uhinga ‘o ‘eku pehē: ‘E fuoloa si‘i pē pea ‘e ‘ikai te mou toe sio kiate au, pea ‘e fuoloa si‘i pē mei ai, pea te mou toe sio kiate au.
Ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolú, te mou tangi mo fakamamahi lolotonga iá, ʻoku fakafiefia ‘a māmani. Te mou fakamamahi kimoutolu, ka ʻe liliu hoʻomou mamahi̇́ ko e koto fiefia.

ʻOka langā ha fefine ke fā‘ele, pea ‘okú naʻe mamahi‘ia lahi koeʻuhi̇̄ kuo hokosia hono taimi̇́, ka ʻoka fanau‘i mai ʻene tamá, pea kuo ngalo leva ʻiate ia ʻene mamahi‘iá koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e fiefia ʻo hono fanauʻi mai ha tangata ki māmani.

Pehē pē mo kimoutolu, te mou loto mamahi he taimi̇́ ni, ka te tau toe fe‘iloaki pē, pea ‘e fonu homou lotó ʻi he fiefiá, pea he‘ikai toe lava ‘e ha taha ke toʻo meiate kimoutolu, ho‘omou fiefia ko iā.

Peá ka hokosia ʻa e ʻaho ko iā, he‘ikai te mou toe fehuʻi mai ha me‘a. He ko hono moʻoni̇́ ʻeni ʻoku tala kiate kimoutolú, neongo pē ko e hā ha me‘a te mou kole ki he Tamai̇́, ‘i hoku hingoá, te ne ʻoatu ia kiate kimoutolu.
ʻOku aʻu pē ki he taimi̇́ ni, kuo te‘eki ke mou kole ha meʻa ʻi hoku hingoá. Kole pea ʻe foaki kiate kimoutolu koeʻuhi̇̄ ke kakato ai ho‘omou fiefiá.”

‟Ko e ngaahi meʻá ni, ‘oku ou leaʻaki kiate kimoutolu ʻo fai ʻaki ʻa e ngaahi tala fakatātā, ka ʻoku vave mai ha taimi, ʻa ia ʻe ʻikai te u toe lea fakatātā ai, ka te u fakamatala hangatonu atu, ʻo kau ki he Tamai̇́.
ʻI he ʻaho ko iā, te mou toki kole ‘i hoku hingoá, pea ʻoku ʻikai ko ʻeku lea kiate kimoutolú, he te u kole ʻe au ki he Tamai̇́ maʻa moutolu.
He ‘oku ‘ofa ʻa e Tamai̇́ ʻe ia kiate kimoutolu, he ko ʻene ‘ofa‘i kimoutolú koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ho‘omou ‘ofa‘i aú mo ho‘omou tui ki he‘eku ha‘u mei he ‘Otuá.
Kuo u haʻu mei he Tamai̇́ ʻou hokomai ki māmani; ko eni, te u toe mavahe mei māmani ʻou ‘alu atu ki he Tamai̇́.”
Pea pehē ange ‘e heʻene kau akó: ‟Vakai, ko ʻeni ʻokú ke toki lea mahinó mai, pea kuo ‘ikai te ke kei lea fakatātā mai.

Ko ʻeni kuo mau toki ‘ilo, ʻokú ke ʻafioʻi ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē, pea ʻoku ʻikai te ke fiemaʻu ke fai ʻe ha taha ha fehuʻi kiate koe. Pea ʻi heʻene peheé, kuo mau toki tui eni, ko ho‘o ha‘ú mei he ʻOtuá.”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolú: ‟Kuo mou toki tui koā ʻeni?”

‟Vakai, ‘oku vave mai ha taimi, pea ko ʻeni kuo hokosia, ʻa ia te mou movete atu ai ʻo takitaha foki ki hono ‘api pea te mou liʻaki toko taha pē au. Ka ʻe ‘ikai tuku toko taha pē au, he ‘oku nofo ma‘u pē ʻa e Tamai̇́, mo au.

Ko e ngaahi meʻá ni ʻoku ou tala kiate kimoutolu, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke mou maʻu ha nonga meiate au. ʻI he maama ko eni̇́, ʻe maʻu ʻe kimoutolu ha ngaahi mamahi lahi, ka neongo ia, mou fiefia pē, he kuo u ʻosi ikuna ‘e au ‘a māmani.”

17.text: Pea hili hono fai ʻe Si̇̄sū ʻa e ngaahi lea ko ʻeni̇́ ki heʻene kau akó, naʻá ne hanga hake ki langi ‘o lotu, ʻo pehē: ‟‘E Tamai, kuo hokosia ʻa e taimi̇́, ke ke fakalāngilangi‘i ho Fohá, kae fakalāngilangi‘i ai foki koe ‘e ho Fohá.
Hangē foki naʻá ke ‘oange kiate ia ʻa e mafai ke pule ki he kakai kotoa pē, koe‘uhi̇̄ ke ne foaki ʻa e mo‘ui ta‘engatá maʻae kakai kotoa pē kuó ke foaki ange kiate iá.
Pea ko e mo‘ui ta‘engatá ʻeni: Ko hono ‘ilo‘i koe, ko e ‘Otua mo‘oni pē taha, pea mo Si̇̄sū Kalaisi, ‘a ia naʻá ke fekau mai ki māmani̇́.
Kuo u fakalāngilangi‘i koe ‘i māmani, he kuo u fakakakato ʻa e fatongia naʻá ke tuku mai ke u fai̇́.
Pea ko eni, ʻe Tamai, ke ke fakalāngilangiʻi muʻa au, ʻaki ʻa e lāngilangi naʻá ku maʻu, ʻi heʻeku kei ʻiate koe, ‘i he te‘eki ke fakatupu ‘a māmani̇́.
Kuo u fakahāaʻi ho huafá ki he kakai naʻá ke foaki mai ma‘aku mei māmani̇́. Ko ho kakai kinautolu, ka naʻá ke tuku mai kinautolu ma‘aku, pea kuo nau tauhi ʻeni ki hoʻo folofolá.
Ko ʻeni kuo mahino kiate kinautolu, ko ‘eku me‘a kotoa pē ko e foaki mei̇́ he ʻAfiona.
Ko e ngaahi folofola naʻá ke tuku mai kiate au, kuo u ʻange kiate kinautolu foki, pea kuo nau tali ia, pea kuo mahino ai kiate kinautolu ko e mo‘oni̇́ ia, ko koe ia naʻá ke fekau mai aú.
‘Oku ou hūfia atu ʻakinautolu. ‘Oku ‘ikai te u hūfia ʻa e kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, ka ko e kakai pē naʻá ke foaki mai ma‘akú, he ko ho kakai̇́ kinautolu.
Pea ko ‘eku me‘a kotoa pē ko ho‘o me‘a, pea ko ho‘o me‘a kotoa pē, ko ‘eku me‘a. Pea kuo u lāngilangi‘ia ‘iate kinautolu.

Pea ko eni, ‘e ‘ikai te u kei nofo ai pē ‘i māmani. Ka te nau kei nofo ai pē kinautolu ‘i māmani, he te u foki atu au kiate koe. ʻE Tamai Māʻoniʻoni, ke ke malu‘i ange muʻa kinautolu ʻaki ho huafá, ʻa e huafa ko ē naʻá ke foaki mai kiate aú, koe‘uhi̇̄ ke nau taha, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko ‘eta tahá.

Lolotonga ‘eku nofo mo kinautolú, naʻá ku malu‘i kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e huafa ʻoʻoú naʻá ke foaki mai̇́ kiate aú. Naʻá ku le‘ohi kinautolu, pea na‘e ‘ikai mole ha taha ‘iate kinautolu, tukukehe pē ʻa e tangata na‘e pau ke ‘auhá, koe‘uhi̇̄ ke fakamo‘oni ai ʻa e lau ʻa e Tohitapú.
Pea ko ʻeni te u ‘alu atu au kiate koe.

Kuo u tuku kiate kinautolu ʻa hoʻo folofolá, ka na‘e fehi‘a kiate kinautolu ʻa e kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, koe‘uhi̇̄ he ʻoku ʻikai te nau kei ʻo e maama ko eni̇́, ‘o hangē pē foki ʻoku ‘ikai te u kei ʻo māmani ʻe au.
‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku kolé, ke ke to‘o kinautolu mei māmani, ka ko ‘eku kole atú ke ke malu‘i kinautolu mei he Fili̇́.
‘Oku ‘ikai kei ‘o e maama ko ʻeni̇́ ʻakinautolu ʻo hangē pē foki ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘o e maama ko ʻeni̇́ ʻe au.
Fakatāpui kinautolu ʻaki ʻa e mo‘oni̇́. Ko hoʻo folofolá, ko ia ia ʻa e moʻoní.
Hangē tofu pē ko ho‘o fekau mai au ke u ha‘u ki māmani̇́, pehē foki ʻeku fekau atu kinautolu ki māmani̇.
ʻOkú ou fakatāpui au ko e fetongi ʻokinautolu, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakatāpui ʻakinautolu foki ʻaki ʻa e moʻoní.
‘Oku ‘ikai ko ‘eku hūfia pē ‘eku kau ako ko eni̇́, ka ʻoku ou lotu foki maʻa kinautolu kotoa pē te nau tui kiate au, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻenau malangaʻaki aú.

Koeʻuhi̇̄ pē ke nau taha, ‘o hangē pē ko hoʻo ʻiate au, ʻe Tamai, pea mo ʻeku ʻiate koe ʻe aú, ke pehē foki ʻenau nofomaʻu ʻiate kitauá, kae tui ʻa e kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, ko koe naʻá ke fekau mai aú.
Pea ko e lāngilangi naʻá ke foaki mai kiate aú, kuo u foaki atu foki kiate kinautolu koeʻuhi̇̄ ke nau taha, ‘o hangē tofu pē ko ‘eta tahá.

Ko au ʻiate kinautolu pea mo koe ʻiate au koeʻuhi̇̄ kae lava ke mahino ki he kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, ko koe ia naʻá ke fekau mai aú, pea kuo u ʻofaʻi kinautolu, ʻo tatau tofu pē mo ho‘o ‘ofa kiate aú.

‘E Tamai, ko hoku loto ki he kakai kuó ke foaki mai ma‘akú, ke nau nofo fakataha mo au ‘i he feitu‘u te u ‘i ai aú, koe‘uhi̇̄ ke nau mamata ki hoku lāngilangi̇́, ʻa e lāngilangi naʻá ke foaki mai, ko e meʻa ʻi hoʻo ʻofa kiate au, te‘eki ke fakatupu ‘a māmani̇́.
ʻE Tamai Māʻoniʻoni, ʻoku ‘ikai ke ʻiloʻi koe ʻe he kakai ‘o e maama ko eni̇́, ka ʻoku ou ʻiloʻi ʻe au koe, pea ʻoku ʻiloʻi ʻekinautolú ni koe, ʻoku nau ʻilo naʻá ke fekau mai au.

Pea kuo u fakahāaʻi kiate kinautolu ho huafá pea te u kei fakahāaʻi pē kiate kinautolu, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke nofoʻia kinautolu ʻe he ʻofa, naʻá ke ʻofaʻiʻaki aú, koeʻuhi̇̄ ke u nofomaʻu ʻiate kinautolu foki mo au.”

18.text: Pea hili ‘a e lotu ‘a Sīsuú, naʻá ne ‘alu atu mo ‘ene kau akó ki he tafa‘aki ‘e taha ‘o e Tele‘a ko Kitiloné, ʻa ia na‘e tu‘u ai ha ngouetapu, pea hū atu ki ai ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó.
Ka na‘e ‘ilo foki ‘e Siutasi ʻa e feitu‘u ko iā, he na‘e fa‘a fakataha ki ai ‘a Si̇̄sū mo ‘ene kau akó.

Ko ia, naʻe ‘alu atu ‘a Siutasi ki he feitu‘u ko iā, ‘o naʻe taki atu ki ai ha kau sōtia Loma mo ha kau ʻōfisa ʻo e Temipalé, na‘e fekau ‘e he kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ mo e kau Fālesi̇́, ke nau ō fakataha mo Siutasi. Pea naʻá nau ō atu mo ha ngaahi maama, mo ha ngaahi mataafi kuo tutu, mo to‘o atu ʻenau ngaahi mahafu.
Peá neongo naʻe ʻafioʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e me‘a kotoa pē ‘e hoko kiate iá, naʻá ne ‘alu atu pē kiate kinautolu ‘o naʻe fehu‘i atu: ‟Ko hai ‘oku mou kumi̇ ki ai̇́?”
Pea nau talaange: ‟Ko Si̇̄sū mei Nāsaleti̇́.”
Pea ʻi heʻene pehē kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko au eni̇́,” naʻa nau malele kotoa pē ‘o tō mape‘e ki lalo.
Pea toe pehē atu ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko hai ‘oku mou kumi ki ai̇́?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Naʻá ku ‘osi talaatu, ko Si̇̄sū au. Kapau ko au ‘oku mou kumi̇́, pea mou tukuange ʻa e kau tangata ko ʻeni̇́ ke nau ʻalu.”
Ko ʻene lea peheé koe‘uhi̇̄ ke fakamo‘oni ai ʻene folofola ʻo pehē: ‟Na‘e ‘ikai ke mole meiate au ha fo‘i toko taha, he faʻahinga naʻá ke foaki mai̇́.”
Ka na‘e ‘i ai ha heletā ‘a Saimone Pita, ko ia naʻá ne unuhi ia ‘o taa‘i ʻaki ʻa e tamaio‘eiki ʻa e taula‘eiki lahi̇́, ‘o motu hono telinga to‘omata‘ú. Ko Malekusi ʻa e hingoa ‘o e tamaio‘eiki̇́.
Pea fekau ‘e Si̇̄sū kia Pita: ‟Faʻo hoʻo heletaá ki hono ‘ai‘angá, he kuo pau ke u inu he ipu kuo tuku mai ‘e he‘eku Tamai̇́ ke u inu ai̇́.”
Pea toki puke ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘e he sōtia Lomá mo ‘ene kau tangatá mo e kau ʻofisa ʻo haʻa Siú, ‘o nau ha‘i hono ongo nimá;
Pea nau tomu‘a taki atu ia kia ‘Ānasi, ko e tamai ʻa e mali ‘o Kaiafasi̇́, ʻa ia na‘e taula‘eiki lahi he ta‘u ko iā.
Ko Kaiafasi ia ko ē naʻá ne talaange ki he kau taki ‘o e kakai Siú, ʻe sai ange ke mate ha toko taha kae hao ʻa e kakai.

Pea na‘e muimui atu ‘ia Si̇̄sū ‘a Saimone Pita mo ha toko taha he kau akó. Ko e toko taha ako ko iā, na‘e maheni ia mo e taula‘eiki lahi̇́, ko ia, naʻe ʻalu atu ai pē ia mo Si̇̄sū ki he loto‘ā ‘o e taula‘eiki lahi̇́;
Kae nofo pē ‘a Pita ‘i tu‘a ‘i he ve‘e matapā hū‘anga ki he ‘api̇́. Pea toe hū atu ʻa e toko taha ako ko eé ki tu‘a, ‘o fakalea ange ki he taʻahine le‘o matapaá, ʻo ne fakahū mai ‘a Pita ki loto.
Pea pehēange ‘e he taʻahiné kia Pita: ‟‘Ikai koā ko e toko taha foki koe he kau ako ʻa e tangata ko ená?”
Pea ko e pō momoko ia, pea kuo tafu ‘e he kau ngāué mo e kau ʻofisá, ‘enau afi ke nau fakamāfana ai. Pea ‘naʻá nealu atu ‘a Pita ‘o kau he fakamāfana he afi̇́.
Pea kuo faka‘eke‘eke ‘e he taula‘eiki lahi̇́, ‘a Si̇̄sū, ‘o fekau‘aki mo ‘ene kau akó pea mo ‘ene akonaki̇́.

Pea talaange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Ko e ngaahi me‘a naʻá ku lea‘aki̇́, na‘e ‘ikai te u fufuu‘i mei ha taha. Pea naʻá ku faiako maʻu pē ʻi falelotu pea mo e Temipalé, ʻa ē ʻoku faʻa fakatahataha ki ai ʻa e kau Siú. Na‘e ‘ikai te u lea‘aki ha meʻa ʻo fakapulipuli.
Ka ko e hā ‘oku mou faka‘eke‘eke ai aú? Mou ō ‘o faka‘eke‘eke ʻa e kakai na‘a nau fanongo ki heʻeku ngaahi leá, he ‘oku nau ‘ilo ‘ekinautolu ʻa e ngaahi me‘a naʻá ku lea‘aki̇́.”
Pea ʻi he lea pehē ‘a Sīsuú, naʻe pāaʻi ia ‘e ha toko taha ‘i he kau ʻofisá, ʻo ne pehēange: ‟ʻOku pehē ha tali ke fai ki he taula‘eiki lahi̇́.”
Kae tali ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Kapau na‘e kovi ‘eku leá, peá ke fakamahino mai pē ko e hā ʻa e meʻa naʻe kovi̇́. Pea kapau na‘e ‘ikai ke kovi ‘eku leá, ko e hā naʻá ke taaʻi ai aú?”
Pea fekau atu ‘e ‘Ānasi ke ‘ave ia kia Kaiafasi ko e taula‘eiki lahi̇́, ʻoku kei haʻi pē hono ongo nimá.

Ka naʻe kei tuʻu pē ʻa Saimone Pita, ‘o fakamāfana he afi na‘e tafu he ‘api ‘o ‘Ānasi̇́, pea nau pehēange: ‟‘Ikai ko koe foki, ko e toko taha he kau ako ‘a Si̇̄suú?” Pea naʻe toe fakafisingaʻi ia mo ne pehē: ‟‘Oku ‘ikai ko au ia.”
Pea ko e tamaio‘eiki ‘e taha ʻa e taula‘eiki lahi̇́, ko e kāinga ia ʻo e tangata na‘e tuʻusi ‘e Pita hono telingá, naʻá ne talaange: ‟‘Ikai naʻá ku sio kiate koe he ngouetapú mo e siana ko ená?”
Pea toe faka‘ikai‘i ai pē ‘e Pita.

Pea ʻi heʻene hengihengi haké, naʻa nau taki atu ‘a Si̇̄sū mei he ‘api ‘o Kaiafasi̇́ ki he loto‘ā ‘o e Kōvana Lomá. Ka na‘e ‘ikai ke hū ki loto ‘a e kau taki ‘o e kakai Siú, koe‘uhi̇̄ ke nau kei ma‘a fakalao ai pē, ka nau lava ‘o kai ‘a e Pāsová.
Pea hū mai ‘a Pailato ki tu‘a ‘o ‘eke ange kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e hā ʻa e hia ‘oku mou faka‘ilo mai ki ai ʻa e tangatá ni?”
Pea nau talaange: ‟Kapau naʻe ʻikai fai ʻe he toko tahá ni ha kovi, naʻe ʻikai te mau taki mai ia kiate koé!”
Pea talaange ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu: ‟Pe‘i ‘ave ia ‘o fakamāau‘i ʻaki ho‘omou lao ‘amoutolú.”
Ko ‘enau lea ko iā, na‘e fakamo‘oni ai ‘a e folofola naʻe fai ‘e Si̇̄sū, ‘o kau ki he mate‘anga te ne mate ai̇́.
Pea foki ‘a Pailato ki loto‘ā ‘o naʻe ui mai ʻa Sisu ʻo ‘eke kiate ia: ‟Ko e Tuʻi koā koe ‘o e kakai Siú?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko e fehu‘i ia ‘a‘au? Pē, na‘e fakamatala atu au ‘e ha taha kehe kiate koe?”
Pea pehē ange ‘e Pailato: ‟He ko ha Siu au? Ko e kakai pē ‘o‘oú mo e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ kuo nau taki mai koe kiate aú. Ko e hā ho‘o me‘a na‘e fai̇́?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko hoku pule‘angá ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha pule‘anga faka-e-maama-ko-eni. He ka naʻe ko ha pule‘anga pehē ia, na‘e mei faitau ‘eku kau taú, ke ‘oua ‘e tukuange au ki he kau taki ‘o e kakai Siú. Ka ko eni, ko hoku pule‘angá, ‘oku ‘ikai ko ha pule‘anga faka-e-maama-ko-eni.”
Pea toki pehēange ‘e Pailato: ‟Tā ko e Tuʻi koe?”
Pea pehēange ʻe Pailato: ‟He ko e hā ‘a e mo‘oni̇́?”
Ka ‘oku ai ha mou anga maheni, ʻa ia ko hoʻomou faʻa loto ke u tukuange atu ha pōpula he taimi ʻo e Pāsová. Fēfē kapau te u tukuange atu ʻa e Tuʻi ‘o e kakai Siú?”
Pea nau kaila mai: ‟‘Oua ‘e tukuange ia! Tukuange mai ‘a Palāpasa!” Ka ko Palāpasá ko ha tangata naʻe kau ʻi ha angatuʻu.

19.text: Pea toki fekau leva ‘e Pailato ke taaʻi ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘aki ha maea.
Pea na‘e hanga ‘e he kau sōtiá ‘o fi̇̄ ha kalauni ʻaki ha ngaahi vaʻa ʻo ha ʻakau talatala, ‘o nau ‘ai ki hono ‘ulú. Pea nau toe ‘ai kiate ia mo ha pulupulu lanu kulokula fakapoʻupoʻuli.
Pea nau pehēange: ‟Ke lākoifie ʻa e tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siú!” Pea nau ʻai hano tākituʻa ia.
Pea toe hūmai ‘a Pailato ‘o talaange ki he kakai̇́: ‟Ko eni, te u fekau ke taki mai ia ki heni kiate kimoutolu, pea ‘e toki mahino ai kiate kimoutolu ‘oku ‘ikai te u ‘ilo ‘e au haʻane kovi.”
Pea hūmai ‘a Si̇̄sū ki tu‘a kuo kalauni talatala mo pulupulu lanu kulokula fakapoʻupoʻuli. Pea pehēange ‘e Pailato ki he kakai̇́: ‟Ko ena, ko e tangatá ena!”
Pea ʻi he sio leva ki ai ʻa e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ mo e kau ʻōfisa ʻo e Temipalé, naʻa nau fekailangakiʻi leva: ‟Tukifaʻo ia ki ha kolosi! Tukifaʻo ia!”
Pea tali ʻe he kakai̇́: ‟‘Oku ‘i ai ‘emau lao, pea ‘oku tu‘utu‘uni ai ke tāmate‘i ia, koe‘uhi̇̄ he kuó ne tala, ko e ‘Alo ia ‘o e ‘Otuá.”
Pea manavahē lahi ‘a Pailato ‘i he‘enau lau ko iā.
Pea naʻe toe hū ki loto‘ā ‘o ‘eke ange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Ko ho‘o ha‘ú mei fē?”
Pea pehēange ‘e Pailato: ‟Ko e hā ‘oku ‘ikai te ke lea mai ai̇́? ʻOku ʻikai koā te ke ʻilo, ‘oku ʻiate au ʻa e mafai ke tukuange koe, mo e mafai ke tukifaʻo koe ki ha kolosi?”

Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟Na‘e ‘ikai te ke mei ma‘u ha mafai ‘e taha ke fai ha meʻa kiate au, ka ko hono foaki atu kiate koe mei he ʻOtuá. Ko hono ʻuhinga ia, ‘oku halaia lahi ange ai ʻa e toko taha naʻá ne tuku atu au kiate koé.”

‘I he lau pehē ‘a Sīsuú, na‘e feinga leva ‘a Pailato ke tukuange ia. Ka naʻe kaikaila atu pē ʻa e kakai̇́ kia Pailato: ‟Kapau te ke tukuange ʻa e tangata ko ená, ‘oku ‘ikai te ke kau koe mo Sisa! He ka pehē ‘e ha taha ko e tu‘i ia, ko ʻene fakafepaki ia kia Sisa.”

Pea ‘i he fanongo ʻe Pailato ki he kaikaila pehē ʻa e kakai̇́, naʻá ne taki atu leva ‘a Si̇̄sū kitu‘a, ʻo ne toki nofo hifo he sea fai‘anga fakamaau, ʻa ia ko ‟Falikimaka,” ‘a ia ko hono faka-Hepeluú, ko ‟Kāpata.”
Pea fe‘unga mo iá, kuo ofi ki he ho‘atā mālie ʻo e ʻaho naʻa nau tokonaki ai ʻo teu ki he ʻaho Pāsová.
Ka naʻa nau kaikaila: ‟Tāmate‘i ia! Tāmate‘i ia! Tukifaʻo ia ki ha kolosi!”
Pea toki tukuange ‘e Pailato ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ke nau ‘ave ia ‘o tukifaʻo ki he kolosi̇́.
Pea nau taki atu ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘okú naʻe fua atu hono kolosi̇́, pea nau a‘u ki he feitu‘u ko ‟‘Ulupoko,” ʻa ia ko hono faka-Hepeluú, ko ‟Kolokota.”
Pea naʻa nau tutuki ai ia ki he kolosi̇́, fakataha mo ha ongo tangata ‘e toko ua, ‘o na taki taha ʻa e ongo tafatafa ʻaki ‘o Sīsuú.
Pea naʻe tohi ʻe Pailato ‘i ha konga papa ‘a ia naʻe fakapipiki ki he funga kolosi̇́, ʻo pehē: ‟Ko Si̇̄sū mei Nāsaleti̇́, ko e Tu‘i ‘o e kakai Siú.”
Pea na‘e tohi ia ‘i he lea faka-Hepeluú, faka-Latiná mo e faka-Kalisi̇́.

Ko ia, naʻe ō ʻa e kau taula‘eiki lahi̇́ kia Pailato ‘o talaange: ‟Ko e hā naʻá ke tohi ai he konga papá, ko e Tuʻi ia ‘o e kakai Siú? Na‘e tonú ke ke tohi, ‛Na‘e lau ‘e he tangatá ni, ko e Tu‘i ia ‘o e kakai Siú.’”
Kae talaange ‘e Pailato kiate kinautolu: ‟Ko e me‘a kuo u tohi̇́, ko e meʻa pē ia ʻe tohi̇́.”
Pea hili hono tukifaʻo ‘e he kau sōtiá ‘a Sīsuú, naʻa nau vahe fā hono valá ke nau taki taha ha tuʻunga. Pea ko e anga ʻo hono pulupulú, na‘e lālanga to‘ofua pē, ‘o ‘ikai ke ai hano hokoʻanga.
Pea pehē ‘e he kau sōtiá: ‟‘Oua te tau hae ia, ka tau toho ke vakaiʻi pē ko hai ‘iate kitautolu te ne ma‘ú.” Naʻa nau fai pehē: ke fakamoʻoni ai ki he lau ʻa e Tohitapu, ‘oku pehē:
Pea na‘e tutuʻu ofi atu ki he ve‘e kolosi̇́ ʻa e fa‘ē ‘a Sīsuú, mo e tokoua ‘o ʻene fa‘eé, mo Mele ko e uaifi ‘o Kaliopasi̇́, pea mo Mele Makitaline.
Pea ʻi he sio atu leva ‘a Si̇̄sū ki heʻene fa‘eé mo e toko taha naʻá ne ‘ofa taha ai ‘i heʻene kau akó, naʻá ne pehē ange ki heʻene fa‘eé: ‟Siʻeku faʻē, ko ena hoʻo tama.”
Pea naʻe pehēange ki heʻene akongá: ‟Tangata, ko ena hoʻo faʻē.” Pea talu mei ai, mo e nofo ʻa e fa‘ē ‘a Sīsuú, he ‘api ‘o e tangata ako ko iā.
Pea hili iá, ʻi he ʻafioʻi ‘e Si̇̄sū kuo kakato ʻa e meʻa kotoa pē, pea koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakamoʻoniʻi ʻa e lau ʻa e Tohitapú, naʻá ne folofola: ‟‘Oku ou fieinua.”
Pea na‘e tu‘u ai ha hina uaine mahimahi, ko ia, na‘e hanga ‘e he toko taha ‘o unu ai ha konga oma ‘o velo hake ‘aki ha va‘a ‘i̇̄sope ke inu mei ai ‘a Si̇̄sū.
Pea ʻi he inu leva ‘e Si̇̄sū ʻa e uainé, pea naʻe toki pehē: ‟Kuo kakato!”

Pea ko e ʻaho ia naʻa nau tokonaki ai ʻo teuteu ki ha Sāpate mahuʻinga ʻo haʻa Siú, pea koeʻuhi̇̄ na‘e ‘ikai te nau loto ke tautau ha sino ʻi he kolosi̇́ he Sāpaté, ko ia, naʻa nau kole kia Pailato, ke fesiʻi ʻa e vaʻe ʻokinautolu naʻe tutuki ki he kolosi̇́, pea toki ʻohifo honau sinó ke tanu.
Ko ia, naʻe omi ʻa e kau sōtia ʻo nau ‘uluaki fesi‘i ʻa e va‘e ‘o e ongo tangata na‘e tukifaʻo fakataha mo Sīsuú.
Ka ʻi heʻenau a‘u atu kia Sīsuú, naʻa nau ʻilo kuo ‘osi pekia ia, ko ia, na‘e ‘ikai te nau fesi‘i hono va‘é.
Kae hanga ‘e he sōtia ‘e taha, ‘o hoka‘i ʻa e vakavaka ‘o Si̇̄suú ʻaki hono taó, pea na‘e tafe leva mei ai ʻa e taʻataʻa mo e vai.

Pea ko e toko taha na‘e mamata tonu ki ai̇́, ko ia ʻeni ʻokú ne fakamoʻoni atu, pea ʻoku mo‘oni̇ ʻene fakamoʻoni̇́. ‘Okú naʻe fakapapauʻi ʻa e mo‘oni ʻene fakamatalá, pea ko ʻene fakamoʻoni̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ke mou tui ki ai.
He naʻe hoko ʻa e ngaahi me‘a ko ʻeni̇́ koeʻuhi̇̄ ke fakamoʻoni ki he lau ʻa e Tohitapú, ‘oku pehē: ‟‘E ‘ikai fesiʻi hano hui ‘e taha.”
Mo e Folofola ʻe taha ʻoku pehē: ‟Te nau toki sio ki ai, ki he toko taha na‘a nau hoka‘i̇́.”

Pea hili iá, na‘e ‘i ai ha tangata mei ‘Alematea, ko Siosifa, ʻa ia na‘e muimui fakafufū pē ‘ia Sīsū, koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ʻene ilifia ki he kau taki ‘o e kakai Siú. Pea ‘alu ʻa e tangata ko iā kia Pailato ‘o kole ke tukuange mu‘a ke ne ‘ave ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú. Pea naʻe loto ki ai ‘a Pailato, ko ia, naʻe ‘ave leva ‘e Siosifa ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú.

Na‘e ‘alu atu fakataha ‘a Siosifa mo Nikotimasi, ʻa e tangata na‘e ‘alu poʻuli atu kia Sīsuú. Pea naʻe haʻu ‘a Nikotimasi mo ha ngaahi me‘a fakanamulelei, ko e mula mo e ‘ālosi na‘e fe‘unga nai mo e kilo ‘e tolungofulu.

Pea hanga ‘e he ongo tangatá ‘o kofu ʻa e sino ‘o Si̇̄suú ʻaki ha tupenu li̇̄neni, fakataha mo e ngaahi me‘a fakanamulelei̇́, ‘o fakatatau ki he founga ʻa e kakai Siú, ‘i hono teuteu ha taha ke telio.
Pea na‘e ‘i ai ha ngouetapu na‘e tu‘u he feitu‘u na‘e tukifaʻo ai ‘a Sīsuú, pea na‘e ‘i ai ha fonualoto ai na‘e te‘eki ke tanu ai ha taha.
Pea koe‘uhi̇̄ ko e vave ʻa e kamata ʻa e Sāpaté, pea mo ʻene ofi mai̇́, naʻa nau telio ai ʻa Si̇̄sū.

20.text: Pea ʻi he hengihengi ‘o e ‘uluaki ʻaho ‘o e uiké, lolotonga ʻoku kei fakapoʻupoʻuli pē, naʻe ʻalu atu ʻa Mele Makitaline ki he fonualotó ʻo ne ʻilo, kuo ʻosi teka‘i ʻa e fuʻu maka naʻe tāpuni ʻaki̇ ʻa e fonualotó.

Pea lele mai leva ia kia Saimone Pita mo e toko taha ako ko ē na‘e ‘ofa ai ‘a Sīsuú, ʻo ne talaange kiate kinaua: ‟Kuo nau ‘ave ʻa e ‘Eiki̇́ mei he fonualotó, pea ‘oku ‘ikai te tau ‘ilo pē kuo nau tuku ia ki fē.”
Pea tutu‘u hake leva ‘a Pita mo e toko taha ako ʻe taha, ke ō ki he fonualotó;
Peá na kamata lele fakataha, kae ve‘e vave ange ʻa e toko taha ako ko eé ‘ia Pita, ʻo ne fuofua a‘u atu ia ki he fonualotó.
Pea naʻe punou hifo ‘o sio ki loto, ‘oku tuku mai ai ʻa e ‘ū kongokonga tupenu li̇̄neni̇́. Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne hū ki loto.
Kae faifai pea a‘u mai ‘a Pita, ‘o naʻe hū ki loto fonualoto ‘o vakai ki he ‘ū kongokonga tupenu līneni̇́, ʻene tuku ai̇́;
Pea ʻi ai foki mo e konga tupenu na‘e takai ʻaki ʻa e fofonga ‘o Sīsuú. Na‘e ‘ikai ke tuku fakataha ia mo e kongokonga tupenu ko eé, ka kuo pelupelu ia ‘o tuku mavahe.
Pea toki hū atu leva ʻa e toko taha ako ko eé, ‘a ē na‘e fua a‘u ki he fonualotó. Pea naʻe sio atu ia ki ai, ʻo ne tui.
He kuo te‘eki pē ke mahino kia Pita mo e toko taha ako ko eé, ‘a e lau ‘a e Tohitapú, ki he pau ke toetu‘u ‘a Si̇̄sū mei he maté.
Peá na toki foki atu leva ki he toenga ʻo e kau akó.
Ka na‘e tu‘u ai pē ‘a Mele he ve‘e fonualotó, ʻo tangi. Pea lolotonga pē ʻene tangi̇́, naʻá ne punou hifo ‘o fakasio atu ki he loto fonualotó;
ʻO ne vakai atu, tā ‘oku ‘i ai ha ongo ‘āngelo teunga hina ‘okú na ta‘utu he me‘a na‘e fakatokoto ai ʻa e sino ‘o Sīsuú, ko e taha mei ‘ulu pea taha mei va‘e.
Pea ‘eke ange ‘e he ongo ‘āngeló kia Mele: ‟Fefine, Ko e hā ‘okú ke tangi ai̇́?”
Pea ʻi heʻene lea pehē: naʻá ne tafoki ‘o sio atu kimui, ʻo ne mamata ‘oku tu‘u mai ai ‘a Si̇̄sū, ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne ʻilo, ko Si̇̄sū ia.
Pea ‘eke ange ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Fefine, Ko e hā ‘okú ke siʻi tangi ai̇́? Ko hai ‘okú ke kumi ki ai̇́?”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate ia: ‟‘E Mele!”

Pea folofola ange ‘a Si̇̄sū: ‟‘Oua te ke ala mai kiate au. He kuo te‘eki ai ke u ‘alu hake ki he Tamai̇́. Ka ke ‘alu ki he‘eku kau akó ‘o tala kiate kinautolu, Te u ‘alu hake ki he‘eku Tamai̇́ ʻa ia ko hoʻomou Tamai̇, pea ki hoku ‘Otuá ʻa ia ko homou ‘Otuá.”
Pea toki ‘alu ‘a Mele ‘o tala ki he kau akó: ‟Kuo u mamata ki he ʻEiki̇́.” Pea naʻe fakamatalaange kiate kinautolu ‘a e me‘a na‘e folofolaʻaki ange ‘e he ‘Eiki̇́ kiate iá.

Pea ʻi he efiafi hifo ʻa e ʻaho Sāpate ko iā, naʻe nofo taha ‘a e kau akó ʻi ha fale kuo tātāpuni koe‘uhi̇̄ ko ‘enau ilifia ki he kau taki ʻo e kakai Siú. Pea fakafokifa pē kuo tu‘u ‘a Si̇̄sū ‘i honau lotolotongá, ʻo ne fakalea atu kiate kinautolu: ‟ʻTauange ke nofoʻia kimoutolu ʻe he melinó.”
Pea naʻe toki fakahā ange leva hono ongo nimá mo hono vakavaká.
Pea toe fakalea ange ‘a Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu, ʻo pehē: ‟Tauange ke ʻiate kimoutolu ʻa e melinó. Hangē ko hono fekau mai au ‘e he Tamai̇́, ‘oku pehē foki ‘eku fekau atu kimoutolú.”
Pea naʻe toki hō kiate kinautolu, ʻo ne pehē ange: ‟Mou ma‘u ā ʻa e Laumālie Mā‘oni‘oni̇́.
Kapau te mou fakamolemole‘i ʻa e angahala ‘a ha taha, pea kuo fakamolemole‘i ia. Pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai te mou fakamolemole‘i ha taha, pea ‘e ‘ikai ke fakamolemole‘i ia.”
Ka ko e toko taha ʻi he kau akó, ko Tōmasi, ʻa ia naʻe hingoa fakatenetene ko ‟Titimasi̇́,” na‘e ‘ikai ke nofo fakataha mo kinautolu ‘i he ha‘u ko ʻeni ‘a Sīsuú.
Ko ia, naʻe talaange ‘e hono toé ki ai: ‟Na‘a mau mamata kimautolu ki he ‘Eiki̇́!”

Pea ‘osi ha uike ‘e taha mei ai, kuo toe nofo fakataha ʻa e kau akó, pea na‘e ‘i ai foki mo Tōmasi. Neongo na‘e tātāpuni ʻa e falé, ka na‘e ha‘u pē ‘a Sīsu ‘o tu‘u honau lotolotongá ‘o fakafeʻiloaki atu kiate kinautolu.
Pea naʻe toki pehēange kia Tōmasi: ‟Ala mai ki hē. Sio mai, ko hoku nimá ē. Pea ʻai mai ho nimá foki ki hoku vakavaká. Pea tuku hoʻo taʻe tui̇́, ka ke tui.”
Pea tali ‘e Tōmasi kiate ia: ‟Tā ko hoku ‘Eiki̇́ pē koe mo hoku ‘Otuá!”
Pea folofola ‘a Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Ko ho‘o toki tui̇́ koā ʻeni ‘i ho‘o sio tonu kiate aú? ‘Oku monūʻia ange ʻakinautolu kuo ʻikai te nau mamata tonu kiate au, ka nau tui pē.”
Na‘e fai foki ‘e Si̇̄sū ha ngaahi mana kehekehe na‘e mamata ki ai ‘ene kau akó ka kuo ‘ikai hiki he tohi ko eni̇́.
Ka kuo hikitohi̇ eni̇́, ke mou tui ko e Mi̇̄saiá ‘a Si̇̄sū, ko e ‘Alo ‘o e ‘Otuá, pea ‘i ho‘omou tui̇́, ke mou maʻu moʻui ʻi hono huafa.

21.text: Pea hili ʻa e ngaahi meʻa ko iā, na‘e toe hā ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó he matātahi ʻo e Tahi ʻo Taipilioó.

Na‘e fakataha ki ai ʻa Saimone Pita, mo Tōmasi, naʻe ui ko ‟Titimasi̇́,” mo Natāniela ko e tangata mei Kena ʻi Kāleli̇́, mo Sēmisi mo Sione, ko e ongo foha ‘o Sēpeti̇́, mo e toko ua kehe he kau ako ʻa Sīsuú.
Pea pehē ‘e Pita kiate kinautolu: ‟Te u ‘alu au ‘o toutai.”
Pea ʻi he maama hake ʻa e ʻahó, tā ko Si̇̄sū ‘ena ‘oku tu‘u mai he matātahi̇́, ka na‘e ‘ikai ke ʻilo ‘e he kau akó ko Si̇̄sū ia.
Pea ‘eke ange ʻe Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Tamaiki, naʻe ma‘u ha me‘a?”

Pea naʻe folofola kiate kinautolu: ‟Li̇̄ ʻa e kupengá ki he to‘omata‘u ‘o e vaká, kae ma‘u ha‘amou ika.” Pea nau li̇̄ leva ki ai, pea naʻa nau fiu hono toho mai ʻa e kupengá koeʻuhi̇̄ ko e lahi ʻa e ika na‘e ma‘ú.

Pea pehēange ‘e he toko taha ako na‘e ‘ofa ai ʻa Si̇̄sū, kia Pita: ‟Tā ko e ‘Eiki̇́ ia!” Pea ʻi he fanongo leva ʻa Pita ki he lau: ‟Ko e ‘Eiki̇́ iá,” naʻá ne toe haʻi hono kofu tuʻá, he naʻá ne vete ia kae fai ‘ene ngāué, pea hopo ia ki tahi.
Kae nofo ai pē ʻa e kau ako ko eé ‘i vaka, he kuo fonu ʻa e kupengá he iká, ka naʻe ʻikai te nau mamaʻo mei ʻuta, ko ha mita pē nai ʻe hivangofulu mei ʻuta, naʻa nau toho atu ai ʻa e kupengá.
Pea ʻi heʻenau hake atu ki ‘utá, tā kuo tafu ai ha afi malala, pea ‘oku tunu ai ʻa e ika mo ha foʻi mā.
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he kau akó: ‟‘Omai ha ika mei̇́ he me‘a na‘a mou ma‘ú.”
Pea toe heka ʻa Pita ki he vaká ‘o toho mai ʻa e kupengá ki ‘uta, naʻe fonu ai ʻa e ika lalahi̇́, feʻunga mo ha mata‘i ika ‘e teau nimangofulu mā tolu, ka na‘e ‘ikai ke mahae ʻa e kupengá.
Pea folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kiate kinautolu: ‟Mou omi ‘o kai.”
Pea haʻu ʻa Si̇̄sū ʻo to‘o mai ʻa e foʻi maá, ‘o naʻe tufotufa atu kiate kinautolu, pea pehē pē mo e iká.
Ko hono tu‘o tolu ia, ʻa e hā ʻa Si̇̄sū ki he‘ene kau akó, ‘i he hili ‘ene toetu‘u mei he pekiá.
Pea ʻi he ‘osi ‘enau kai̇́, naʻe folofola ʻa Si̇̄sū kia Saimone Pita: ‟‘E Saimone, foha ‘o Sione, ‘oku lahi ange koā ho‘o ‘ofa kiate aú ‘i he ‘ofa ʻakinautolú ni?”
Pea toe ‘eke ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ko hono tuʻo uá ia: ‟‘E Saimone, foha ‘o Sione, ‘okú ke ‘ofa koā ‘iate au?”
Pea toe ʻeke ange ‘e Si̇̄sū, ko hono tu‘o tolú ia: ‟‘E Saimone, foha ‘o Sione, ‘okú ke ‘ofa koā kiate au?”

‘Oku ou fakapapau atu, ʻi he taimi ʻokú ke kei talavou ai̇́, te ke tu‘u hake ‘o ʻalu atu ki ha feitu‘u pē ʻokú ke fie ʻalu ki ai. Ka ‘oka ke ka motu‘a, te ke hiki hake ho nimá ke puke ia ‘e ha taha kehe, ʻo ne toki taki atu koe ki ha feitu‘u ‘e ‘ikai te ke fie ʻalu ki ai.”
Ko e lau ko ia ‘a Si̇̄suú ke mahino kia Pita ‘a e anga ‘o e mateʻanga te ne fai ai hono fakalāngilangi‘i ʻo e ‘Otuá. Pea toki folofola ange ‘e Si̇̄sū ki ai: ‟Muimui mai kiate au.”

Pea tafoki ai ‘a Pita ‘o sio atu ‘oku muimui mai ‘i hono tuʻá ‘a e tokotaha ako ko ē na‘e ‘ofa ai ‘a Sīsuú, ‘a ē na‘e taupotu kia Si̇̄sū he kai̇́, pea ko ia ē naʻá ne ‘eke ange: ‟Ko hai te ne lavaki‘i koé, ‘Eiki?”
Pea ʻi he sio atu ‘a Pita ki ai̇́, naʻá ne ‘eke ange kia Si̇̄sū: ‟Fēfē ‘a e tangata ko ená, ‘Eiki?”
Pea tali ‘e Si̇̄sū: ‟Kapau te u loto ke ne tolonga ‘o a‘u ki he‘eku toe foki mai̇́, he ko ha meʻa ia ‘okú ke kau ai? Muimui mai pē koe kiate au!”
